Imishinga yihariye Dorcas & Vestine na Gisubizo Ministries binjiranye muri " " " " Rwanda Gospel Stars Live . " " " "
Irushanwa ryiswe " " " " Rwanda Gospel Stars Live " " " " ryahurijwemo abahanzi 15 bari ku ruhembe rwa abafite igikundiro mu muziki uhimbaza Imana , bahataniye igihembo cya miliyoni zirindwi za amafaranga ya u Rwanda .
Mu mabwiriza agenga iri rushanwa harimo ko abatoranyirijwe kuryitabira bagomba kumurika imishinga yabo .
Gisubizo Ministries iri mu matsinda afite ibigwi mu muziki uhimbaza Imana yavuze ko umushinga wayo ari ugufasha abana baturuka mu miryango itishoboye binyuze mu kubigisha ijambo rya Imana no kubafasha kwihangira imirimo .
Nkomezi Alexis wari uhagarariye Gisubizo Ministries yavuze ko ari ibikorwa itsinda risanzwe rikora ariko mu gihe baba babonye andi maboko babyagura bikagenda neza kurushaho .
Gisubizo Ministries yamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo zirimo " " " " Amfitiye byinshi , " " " " " " " " Mana uriho , " " " " " " " " Ndaguhetse ku Mugongo , " " " " " " " " Narababariwe " " " " na izindi .
Ni umuryango ukora ivugabutumwa rinyuze mu ndirimbo mu bihugu binyuranye ku Isi ndetse mu bihe bitandukanye ryegukanye ibihembo byinshi mu muziki uhimbaza Imana .
Dorcas na Vestine baturuka mu Majyaruguru ya u Rwanda ubwo baganirizaga itangazamakuru ibya umushinga wabo , bavuze ko bashaka kubaka studio igezweho ikaba na ikigo cyo kwigishirizamo urubyiruko umuziki .
Ni igitekerezo aba bana bavuga ko bakuye ku kuntu bakoze umuziki baturuka mu Ntara ya Amajyaruguru ariko badafite studio hafi , byatumye bashaka gufungura iyabo yajya inafasha abandi bafite impano ntibavunike nkuko bo bavunitse .
Bagize bati " " " " Twe twavaga i Musanze tuje gukora umuziki mu Mujyi wa Kigali , ni ibintu bituvuna cyane , rero abantu badushyigikiye tugatsindira ariya mafaranga byadufasha gukora ikigo cyigisha umuziki kirimo na studio byajya bifasha na abandi banyempano . " " " "
Dorcas na Vestine bari mu bahanzikazi bashya bahanzwe amaso mu muziki uhimbaza Imana .
Iri tsinda rya abavandimwe ryamenyekanye mu ndirimbo " " " " Nahawe ijambo " " " " . " " " "
Aba bana basengera muri ADEPR ndetse baririmba bya umwihariko muri Korali Goshen ya i Musanze .
Abakunzi ba umuziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana , yaba abo mu Rwanda no hanze yarwo bakomeje gushyigikira abahanzi bakunda binyuze mu mushinga " " " " Rwanda Gospel Stars live . " " " "
Byitezwe ko tariki 30 Nzeri 2021 umuhanzi uzahiga abandi kugira umushinga mwiza no gushyigikirwa cyane , azashyikirizwa miliyoni zirindwi za amafaranga ya u Rwanda ziyongera ku yo yagiye ahabwa mu gushyigikira umushinga we .
Izi miliyoni zirahatanirwa na abahanzi barimo Serge Iyamuremye , Israel Mbonyi , Aline Gahongayire , Tonzi , Gaby Kamanzi , Rata Jah Naychah , James na Daniella , Gisubizo Ministries , MD , Dorcas & Vestine , Chorale Christus Regnat , Gisele Precious , True Promises Ministries , Aimee Frank Nitezeho na Aneth Murava .
Abahanzi batangiye gukangurira abakunzi babo kubaha inkunga yo gushyira mu ngiro imishinga yabo , binyuze mu bitaramo binyura kuri Televiziyo ya u Rwanda .
Buri wese wifuza gushyigikira umuhanzi akunda muri 15 bamaze gutangazwa , arasabwa kujya muri telefone ye umurongo yaba akoresha wose , agakanda * 544 * 300 * nimero ya umuhanzi ashyigikiye hanyuma agashyiraho # cyangwa .
Nta giciro cyashyizweho , buri wese yitanga uko yifite mu rwego rwo gushyigikira umuhanzi akunda .
Britney Spears agiye guhagarika umuziki burundu .
Yabitangaje mu ibaruwa yabonywe bwa mbere na ikinyamakuru Deadline aho yanditse agaragaza ko atakomeza kuba umujyanama [ manager ] wa uyu muhanzikazi kandi ateganya kuva mu muziki mu minsi iri imbere .
Ati " " " " Hari hashize umwaka na igice kuva ubwo Britney nanjye twavuganaga akambwira ko ashaka gufata ikiruhuko .

Nari nahawe akazi ku busabe bwe ngomba kumufasha mu bya umuziki ndetse no kumushyigikira mu rugendo muri muzika . " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko atakomeza kumubera umujyanama kandi yararetse umuziki , ati " " " " Ndetse nka manager we mu muziki , nizera ko biri mu nyungu ze kuba nareka inshingano zanjye kuko zitagikenewe .
Mwakire iyi baruwa nko kwegura kwanjye ku mugaragaro . " " " "
Iyi baruwa yanayigeneye abarimo se wa uyu muhanzikazi , Jamie Spears , uri mu bakurikirana imitungo ye na umunyamategeko wa uyu muhanzikazi Jodi Montgomery .
Rudolph ntiyigeze agaragara mu bacunga ibintu byose bya Britney birimo no kumenya ubuzima bwe bwa buri munsi uko yitwara [ Conservatorship ] , ibintu uyu muhanzikazi aheruka kuvuga mu rukiko ko atagikeneye ndetse akanavuga ko abifata nko kumuhohotera , ahubwo yari umujyanama mu bya umuziki gusa .
Rudolph yakoranye na Spears guhera mu 1995 ndetse anamufasha mu muziki ku buryo yabaye icyamamare kurusha uko bahuye ameze .
Uyu mugabo yanafashije abandi bahanzi barimo itsinda rya Aerosmith , Miley Cyrus , Justin Timberlake , Backstreet Boys , 98 Degrees , O - Town , will . i . am , Toni Braxton , Nicole Scherzinger , Swizz Beatz na Kim Petras .
Muri Gicurasi 2019 , Britney Spears , yahagaritse kongera kuririmbira ku rubyiniro mu bitaramo ndetse icyo gihe hari amakuru yavugaga ko bishobora kuba bitazongera kubaho ukundi .
Yari afite ibitaramo muri Gashyantare ariko ntiyabyitabira kubera impamvu yavuze ko zirimo na iz uburwayi .
Hagati ya 2007 na 2008 , Britney Spears yafashwe na uburwayi bwo kwigunga no guhuzagurika mu bwonko bwatumye se aba umwe mu bakurikirana ubuzima bwe bwa buri munsi , akanamufasha gucunga umutungo we .
Amaze iminsi mu manza aburana na we ku bijyanye no kongera gusubirana uburenganzira ku gucunga imitungo ye .
Sosiyete ya Bessemer Trust yari isanzwe ireberera inyungu mu bijyanye na imitungo uyu mukobwa ifatanyije na se iheruka gusohora itangazo igaragaza ko itagishaka kumukurikiranira imitungo ndetse umucamanza wa Los Angeles ahita abibemerera .
Britney Spears afite imyaka 39 , ni umwe mu bahanzi ba ibihangange ku Isi mu njyana ya Pop .

Mu buhamya bwinshi bwatanzwe , benshi bagaragaje ko Mukeshabatware yari umuntu ugira umutima wo gufasha , agakunda Imana na abantu kandi akitanga cyane mu byo akora .

Mukeshabatware yitabye Imana ku wa 30 Kamena 2021 , aguye mu bitaro byitiwe Umwami Faisal .
Uyu mugabo wari mu bazwi cyane mu myidagaduro yo mu Rwanda yamenyekanye nka Mbirikanyi , Rutaganira muri " " " " Musekeweya " " " " na andi mazina mu makinamico atandukanye yagiye akina ndetse agakundwa bihambaye na abatari bake .

Mukeshabatware yavukiye i Nyaruguru mu 1950 ku ngoma ya Umwami Rudahigwa .
Yasoje amashuri abanza mu 1965 atsinze ikizamini ahabwa amahirwe yo kujya kwiga muri St André .

Yigeze kubwira IGIHE ati " " " " Nyuma ya uko Inyenzi ziteye muri Nshiri bahise batujyana mu gisirikare ku ngufu njya muri ESO ( Ecole des Sous Officiers ) kwiga , sinahatinze kuko namazemo amezi atatu nkora ikizamini cyo kwandika mu binyamakuru mba ndagitsinze mpita njya mu Bubiligi . " " " "
Mukeshabatware avuga ko mu Bubiligi yahamaze umwaka umwe na amezi atandatu .
Ati " " " " Mvuyeyo ndi mu batangije icapiro rya gisirikare . " " " "
Mu icapiro rya gisirikare yahakoraga yarahawe ipeti rya Kaporali .
Mukeshabatware avuga ko mu 1973 ari umwe mu bacapye amafoto ya uwari Perezida Habyarimana ubwo yari amaze guhirika ubutegetsi bwa Kayibanda .
Igisirikare Mukeshabatware yagikoreye imyaka umunani aza kukivamo agaye umushahara muto bahabwaga icyo gihe .
Yahawe akazi kenshi iwabo ariko kuko yari akeneye akaruhuko agenda akanga , icyakora abo biganye mu Bubiligi bakoraga mu icapiro rya ORINFOR mu 1979 basabye ubuyobozi ko bwamutumaho akaza kubafasha .
Yatangiye mu icapiro rya ORINFOR mu 1980 .
Mu 1982 Mukeshabatware yinjiye mu itsinda ryakinaga amakinamico ya ORINFOR ryaje guhabwa izina rya Indamutsa .

Mu Cyumweru gishize nibwo iyi nkuru yatangiye kuvugwa cyane nyuma ya uko aba bahanzi bashyize hanze amafoto agaragaza Lydia Jazmine yagiye kwerekana iwabo Ykee Benda .
Ni igikorwa cyasamiwe hejuru na itangazamakuru ryo muri Uganda bamwe bahamya ko aba bahanzi bakoze ubukwe , mu gihe ku rundi ruhande hari abavuga ko ari ugushaka gusasira indirimbo baba bateganya gusohora mu minsi iri imbere .
Mu gihe bari bakibaza kuri ibi bibazo , aba bahanzi bongeye kuzamura impaka ku mbuga nkoranyambaga no mu itangazamakuru ryo muri Uganda ubwo basohoraga amafoto ya imihango yo gusaba no gukwa .
Icyakora nubwo hari abahamya ko aba bahanzi baba barakoze ubukwe , ku rundi ruhande hari abahamya ko ari umupango wabo wo gushaka kumenyekanisha indirimbo izasohoka mu minsi iri imbere .
Byinshi mu binyamakuru bihakana amakuru yo gukundana kwa aba bahanzi , bishingira ku kuba atari abantu basanzwe ari inshuti .
Ykee Benda na Lydia Jazmine basanzwe ari abahanzi bakomeye muri Uganda , ariko bose bahurije ku kuba ababyeyi babo bafite inkomoko mu Rwanda , byanatumye ubwo bifotozaga amafoto yo gusaba no gukwa bari bakenyeye Kinyarwanda .
Lion Gaga yashyize hanze amashusho ya " " " " Intare " " " " yanditse akomoye ku bwitange bwa Inkotanyi
Ku wa 4 Nyakanga u Rwanda rwizihiza umunsi wo Kwibohora , aho hongera kwibukwa no guha icyubahiro abitanze bose kugira ngo igihugu Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 ihagarikwe .
Ibikorwa byakoze na FPR Inkotanyi yagize uruhare rukomeye mu kubohora igihugu byagiye bikora benshi ku mutima ndetse bigatuma abahanzi bamwe bahanga bazirahira .
Lion Gaga ari muri abo ndetse afite iyo yise " " " " Intare . " " " "
Yabwiye IGIHE ko ubutumwa yayikoze ashaka gushimira " " " " Inkotanyi " " " " no kwerekana ubwitange bwazo .
Ati " " " " Nayikoze nshaka kwerekana ko ubutwari bwa ababohoye igihugu batweretse bwatubereye umurage . " " " "
Avuga ko akenshi iyo agiye hanze ya u Rwanda abona ko igihugu cya u Rwanda kimaze kwiyubaka no kugera ku rundi rwego ugereranyije na ahandi yagiye agera .
Muri iyi ndirimbo ya Gaga hari aho aririmba ati " " " " Turi Intare duhagaze bwuma , turi Intare turi intavogerwa turakomeye .
Twe turi ruti , turi rutikura , turakomeye [ . . . ] " " " "
Lion Gaga yakoze indirimbo zitandukanye zirimo " " " " Rekura amazi , " " " " " " " " Uhoraho , " " " " " " " " Ba intwari " " " " na izindi nyinshi .
Lion Gaga ubusanzwe witwa Gaga Jean Bosco afite izindi ndirimbo zikoze mu njyana ya Reggae ndetse afite album yuzuye .
Uyu musore wa imyaka 33 , yatangiye umuziki mu 2012 .
Mu buryo bwa amajwi iyi ndirimbo ye nshya yakozwe na Bob Pro muri The Sounds naho amashusho yakozwe na Eliel Sando .
Muri aya mashusho yakoresheje imyenda ya mukotanyi nka imyenda yibutsa ishusho ya inkotanyi zihagarika Jenoside .
Ni umwana bareranywe !
Ndanda yambitse impeta umukobwa bagiye kurushinga .
Nizeyimana wirinze gutangaza amazina ya umukobwa bitegura kurushinga , aganira na IGIHE yahamije ko ari umwe mu bo babyirukanye .
Ati " " " " Ni umwe mu rungano twabyirukanye ku Gisozi aho nakuriye , twakundanye kuva cyera ahubwo ni kumwe igihe kiba kitaragera ngo usobanukirwe uwawe . " " " "
Bitewe na ingamba zikomeye zo kwirinda Covid - 19 u Rwanda rurimo , Nizeyimana yavuze ko atahita avuga gahunda ihamye ya ubukwe bwe .
Nizeyimana Alphonse Ndanda uherutse gusezera umupira yabaye umunyezamu wakinnye mu makipe akomeye nka Rayon Sports , Mukura VS , AS Kigali na izindi .
Mu minsi ishize nibwo hatangiye kwamamazwa film " " " " Intandaro ya Ikibi " " " " yakinnyemo , icyakora avuga ko atari ibintu agiye kugira umwuga ahubwo yayikinnyemo ashyigikira inshuti ye .
Britney Spears mu ntambara ikomeye imuganisha ku kwigenga .
Aheruka kubwira urukiko byinshi bijyanye na ihohoterwa yakorewe ndetse anatunga agatoki se James " " " " Jamie " " " " Parnell Spears ufite uburenganzira bwo kumugenzurira imitungo no kumukurikirana mu muziki ko yagiye amufata nabi , bigatuma ahura na ihungabana .
The New Yorker yatangaje ko nyina wa uyu muhanzikazi witwa Lynne Spears , kubera ibibazo umukobwa we yagiye anyuramo yagiye agira ibyiyumviro bitandukanye .
Ati " " " " Nagiye ngira ibyiyumviro bivanze kuri buri kimwe .
Ntabwo nzi icyo gutekereza .
Ni umubabaro mwinshi na impungenge nyinshi . " " " "
Yanavuze ko umukobwa we mbere ho umunsi umwe ngo yumvikane mu rukiko atanga ubuhamya , yabanje guhamagara Polisi akishinganisha avuga ko akorerwa ihohoterwa mu kumugenzurira imitungo na ibindi bijyanye na ubuzima bwe .
Se wa Britney aheruka guhakana ibyo umukobwa amushinja birimo no kuba yaranze ko abyarana na umusore bakundana .
Nyamara mu minsi ishize sosiyete ya Bessemer Trust yari isanzwe ireberera inyungu mu bijyanye na imitungo uyu mukobwa ifatanyije na se iheruka gusohora itangazo igaragaza ko itagishaka kumukurikiranira imitungo ndetse umucamanza wa Los Angeles ahita abibemerera .
Mu nyandiko People yabonye yandikiye urukiko , iyi sosiyete yavuze ko nyuma ya ubuhamya bwa Britney yahisemo kuba ivuye mu bamureberera inyungu .
Muri Mata uyu mwaka Britney yari yasabye ko yazaburanira mu ruhame ndetse ku wa 23 Kamena biza kuba aho yatanze ubuhamya bwababaje benshi bakavuga ko akwiriye guhabwa ubwigenge .
Nyuma yaho iyi sosiyete ikuyemo akayo , se wa Britney niwe usigaye areberera inyungu umukobwa we ariko bitegerejwe ko hari icyo urukiko ruzanzura mu gihe kiri imbere .
Kuva Britney yatanga ubuhamya bwe mu rukiko , abantu batandukanye barimo ibyamamare bagaragaje ko ibyo yakorewe bidakwiriye cyane cyane ubwo yavugaga ko se amugenzura kugeza aho yamubujije kubyarana na umukunzi we .
Nka Justin Timberlake yaranditse ati " " " " Nyuma ya ibintu byose twabonye tugomba gushyigikira Britney kuri iyi nshuro .
Twirengagije ahahise hacu ibyiza cyangwa se ibibi ndetse tukirengagiza uko igihe gishize kingana .
Ibiri kumubaho ntabwo bikwiye .
Nta mugore ukwiriye kubuzwa uburenganzira ku mubiri we .
Nta muntu ukwiriye kubuzwa uburenganzira kugeza aho yaka uburenganzira kuri buri kintu yakoreye cyane . " " " "
Abandi barimo Mariah Carey , Rose McGowan , Missy Elliott , Meghan McCain , Brandy , Khloé Kardashian , Halsey na abandi benshi bagaragaje ko Britney Spears akwiriye kwigenga .
Britney byatangiye agenzurwa na se bya igihe gito nyuma yo kugaragaza ko yaba yaragize ibibazo byo mu mutwe mu 2007 .
Kuva mu 2008 kugeza mu 2019 se niwe wakurikiranaga ibikorwa bye byose birimo gufata imyanzuro itandukanye mu buzima , gusurwa no gusura , ibijyanye na amasezerano ashobora gukora na ibindi .
Muri Nzeri 2019 yasimbuwe bya agateganyo na Jodi Montgomery kubera ibibazo bya ubuzima ariko muri Mutarama 2020 James " " " " Jamie " " " " Parnell Spears arongera asubirana umwanya we .
Ubusanzwe se wa Britney yafatanyaga na sosiyete ya Bessemer Trust mu kumureberera inyungu none yakuyemo akayo .
Don Cheadle yarushinze na Bridgid Coulter nyuma ya imyaka 28 bakundana .
Cheadle wa imyaka 56 mu kiganiro aheruka kugirana na " " " " The Ellen DeGeneres Show " " " " yabwiye Wanda Sykes wari ukiyoboye ko we na Bridgid Coulter ufite imyaka 52 bari bamaze igihe kinini bakundana , bafashe icyemezo cyo kurushinga .
Sykes yavuze ko Cheadle ko yamubwiye ko yarushinze umwaka ushize agatungurwa .
Ati " " " " Waranyandikiye mu ntangiro za umwaka umbwira ko warushinze .
Naravugaga nti igihe cya icyorezo gitumye Don na Bridgid barushinga . " " " "
Cheadle mu kumusubiza yagize ati " " " " Yego .
Ndabumva cyane ko twari tumaranye imyaka 28 dukundana mbere yo kurushinga .
Ntabwo nakurenganya . " " " "
Aba bombi bakundanye guhera mu 1992 .
Bafitanye abana babiri ba abakobwa barimo uwitwa Ayana ndetse na Imani .
Don Cheadle ni umwe mu bakomeye muri sinema ya Hollywood .
Yamamaye muri filime zitandukanye zirimo Hamburger Hill , Colors , Blue Dress , Captain America : Civil War , Avengers : Infinity War , Captain Marvel na izindi nyinshi .
Bya umwihariko bamwe mu banyarwanda bamumenye ubwo yakinaga muri filime " " " " Hotel Rwanda " " " " irata ubutwari mpimbano bwa Paul Rusesabagina .
Mico The Best yambitse impeta umukunzi we ; Reba amafoto ya uburanga bwe .
Ku mugoroba wo kuri Cyumweru tariki 4 Nyakanga 2021 nibwo uyu muhango wabaye mu ibanga rikomeye , nta inshuti za uyu muhanzi zari zihari kuko imihuro ya abantu benshi ibujijwe muri iki gihe .
Amakuru IGIHE ifite ni uko aba bombi bemeranyije kurushinga nyuma ya iminsi mike uyu mukobwa yerekanye Mico The Best iwabo , umuhango nawo wagizwe ibanga .
Uyu mukobwa bagiye kubana , twamenye ko yitwa Clarisse .
Ntabwo azwi cyane mu myidagaduro yo mu Rwanda gusa yigeze kujya amurika imideli nubwo byamaze igihe gito .
Yanagaragaye mu gace gato ka filime ya Bad Rama yitwa " " " " Cowboy . " " " "
Bivugwa ko bombi batamaranye igihe kinini , inshuti zabo zivuga ko nta mwaka ushize bakundana .
Reba filime ya Bad Rama uyu mukobwa agaragaramo .
Bashimye ibyagezweho biyemeza kubisigasira : Ubutumwa bwa ibyamamare ku munsi wo # Kwibohora27 .
Kuri iyi nshuro u Rwanda rwizihiza uyu munsi ku nshuro ya 27 Abanyarwanda mu nzego zitandukanye bishimira ibyiza igihugu cyagezeho nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 .
Uyu munsi abantu batandukanye bagaragaza imbamutima zabo , bamwe mu byamamare baganiriye na IGIHE bagaragaje ko bishimiye aho u Rwanda rugeze kandi biteguye gukomeza kurwubaka .
Mu butumwa bwabo bikije ku gushima ingabo zitangiye kubohora igihugu no kugiteza imbere .
Nyampinga wa Umurage 2021 , Ishimwe Sonia , yifurije Abanyarwanda umunsi mwiza wo Kwibohora abibutsa ko bakwiye guharanira kwiyubaka .
Ati " " " " Imyaka 27 irashize u Rwanda rubohowe .
Turazirikana umunsi twaharuriwe inzira nshya ubwo Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yahagarikwaga .
Abatubohoye bari bazi neza ko kwibohora ariryo pfundo rya ibyishimo , natwe biduha inshingano zo gukomeza gukora . " " " "
Umuhanzi akaba na umwanditsi wa indirimbo , Semivumbi Daniel [ Danny Vumbi ] , yavuze ko ukwibohora nyakuri Abanyarwanda bakwiriye ari ukugena inzira nziza abato bazanyuramo .
Ati " " " " Ubutumwa nagenera Abanyarwanda ni uko kwibohora bya ukuri ari ugutegura inzira abato bazanyuramo mu bihe bizaza hagamijwe kudasubira inyuma ku ntambwe imaze guterwa .
Twese duharanire uburenganzira bukwiriye umunyagihugu mu gihugu cye duteza imbere u Rwanda rwacu . " " " "
Umukinnyi wa Filime , Niyitegeka Gratien uzwi nka Seburikoko , yasabye Abanyarwanda gufatanyiriza hamwe mu guhangana na icyorezo cya Covid - 19 cyugarije Isi na u Rwanda .
Ati " " " " Mu gihe twizihiza Umunsi wo Kwibohora ku nshuro ya 27 ni ingenzi kuzirikana ko igihugu cyugarijwe na icyorezo cya Covid - 19 . " " " "
" " " " Turwane urugamba rwo kurengera ubuzima bwacu na ubw abandi .
Dukurikize , tunakangurira abandi kubahiriza ingamba zo kurwanya Covid - 19 .
Niryo shimwe rikwiye guhabwa Intwari zarwaniye igihugu muri iki gihe . " " " "
Urubyiruko rwasabwe kudakerensa amahirwe rwahawe
Nyampinga wa u Rwanda mu 2009 , Bahati Grace , yasabye urubyiruko aho ruri ku Isi hose guharanira icyateza imbere igihugu cyabo .
Yagize ati " " " " Ndifuriza buri Munyarwanda wese umunsi mwiza wo Kwibohora ku nshuro ya 27 . " " " "
" " " " Ndakangurira buri wese aho ari hose ku Isi , cyane cyane urubyiruko dore ko ari rwo mbaraga za igihugu , kwirinda icyadusubiza inyuma icyo ari cyo cyose .
Duharanire kubaho neza twirinda gushyira imbere inyungu zacu , ahubwo dushaka icyateza imbere igihugu cyatwibarutse . " " " "
Umuraperi Abayizera Grace wamamaye nka Young Grace , yashimiye Inkotanyi ubutwari zagize bwo kubohora u Rwanda , asaba urubyiruko kurinda ibyagezweho .
Ati " " " " Turashimira Ingabo za Igihugu ku butwari na ubwitange zagize mu rugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda na Abanyarwanda .
Ndasaba urubyiruko gusigasira ibyagezweho no guharanira gukomeza kwigira . " " " "
Ikinyarwanda cyasabiwe umwihariko ku Banyarwanda baba hanze
Umuhanzikazi Teta Diana yifurije Abanyarwanda umunsi mwiza wo kwibohora ndetse asaba abatazi ikinyarwanda kucyiga kuko ari ikirango cyabo .
Ati " " " " Ndifuriza Abanyarwanda aho bari hose Umunsi mwiza wo Kwibohora .
Dufite igihugu cyiza , giteye ishema kurata no mu mahanga . " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko " " " " abatazi Ikinyarwanda bacyige , ni wo musingi wa ibindi byinshi twifuza kubaka imbere . " " " "
Umukinnyi wa Filime , Uwihoreye Jean Bosco Moustapha [ Ndimbati ] , yagarutse ku butwari bwaranze Inkotanyi ndetse asaba Abanyarwanda kurinda ibyagezweho .
Ati " " " " Kwibohora ni umunsi ukomeye cyane kuko hari ababohoye igihugu ku bwa ubwitange !
Buri Munyarwanda akwiye kubiha agaciro , akumva ko ari ikintu gikomeye . " " " "
" " " " Abanyarwanda bareke dusigasire ibyagezweho kugira ngo Kwibohora kwacu kutazasubira inyuma .
Dukwiye kubiraga abana na abuzukuru bacu kugira ngo bazature mu gihugu cyiza . " " " "
Umukinnyi wa Filime , Mugisha Clapton , wamamaye nka Kibonge yasabye Abanyarwanda gukomeza kurinda no gusigasira ibyagezweho .
Ati " " " " Ndasaba Abanyarwanda gukomeza gukunda igihugu , kugikorera no kukirwanira ishyaka kuko cyaduhaye ijambo . Twaribohoye .
Hanyuma natwe dusigasire ibyagezweho dukomeza gukorera u Rwanda rwacu . " " " "
Umuhanzi Emmy ukorera umuziki we muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika , yibukije Abanyarwanda ko kwibohora ari igihe cyiza cyo gusubiza amaso inyuma no gukomeza iterambere .
Yagize ati " " " " Kwibohora ni igihe cyiza cyo gusubiza amaso inyuma tukibuka aho igihugu cyavuye naho kigeze ubu , kugira ngo bidutere imbaraga zo kwiyubaka no kubaka ejo hacu hazaza heza . " " " "
Bagaragaje ko " " " " umugore " " " " ari uwa agaciro mu iterambere rya igihugu
Umuhanzikazi Uwayezu Ariel uzwi nka Ariel Wayz , yavuze ko anyuzwe na uburyo u Rwanda rwiyubatse cyane rugaha ijambo umugore .
Yagize ati " " " " Kwibohora27 kuri njye bisobanuye kwibuka ibitambo byose byatanze ngo igihugu cyacu kibe kiri aho kiri ubu , ibi bintera umurava wo kugira umusanzu ntanga mu kubaka ejo hazaza ha igihugu cyanjye . " " " "
" " " " Nka umukobwa ukiri muto ni ibya agaciro gakomeye kuba mu gihugu aho umugore yahawe ijambo , nishimiye kuba mu gihugu aho abaturage bafite uburenganzira bungana .
Nshimishijwe no kuba mu Rwanda rwibohoye . " " " "
Nyampinga wa u Rwanda wa 2016 , Mutesi Jolly , yatanze u Rwanda imyato asaba urubyiruko kurinda ibyo igihugu kimaze kugeraho .
Ati " " " " U Rwanda rurishimira ibyiza rwagezeho , igihugu gitekanye muri Afurika , igihugu gifite umwanya wa kabiri mu biri ku isonga muri Afurika , kiri ku mwanya wa kabiri mu koroshya ishoramari muri Afurika , kiri ku mwanya wa cyenda mu guha ijambo umugore . " " " "
" " " " Igihugu kiri mu bifite ubuyobozi bwiza ku Isi , igihugu cya karindwi ku Isi mu gucunga umutekano wo kuri internet muri Afurika , igihugu cyiza cyiyubatse kandi gikataje mu iterambere . " " " "
Yakomeje asaba urubyiruko kurinda ibyagezweho no gutanga umusanzu warwo mu iterambere rya u Rwanda .
Rita Kagaju yasohoye album ye ya mbere yahurijemo abahanzi bakomeye .
Iyi album uyu mukobwa yayise " " " " Sweet Thunder " " " " igizwe na indirimbo 18 .

Izi ndirimbo ziri kuboneka ubu ku mbuga zicururizwaho nka Spotify , iTunes , YouTube na izindi .
Rita Kagaju yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi album yahisemo kuyita " " " " Sweet thunder " " " " ashaka kugaragaza ishusho ye nka umuhanzikazi ariko ashaka no kugaraga inkuru 16 ziyiriho .
Avuga ko ari itangiriro za ibyo yifuzaga .
Ati " " " " Iyi album ni itangiriro rya ibyo nifuza gukora mu muziki munyarwanda .
Ni intambwe yanjye ya mbere kandi nashakaga gukora umuziki utandukanye na usanzwe uzwi mu Rwanda .
Indirimbo zose ziriho zirihariye .
Ndabararikira Kumva imvange ya Ikinyarwanda na izindi nganzo mvamahanga kuko ni kimwe mu bintu nagerageje gukora kuri Iyi album . " " " "
Yavuze ko amasomo yagiyemo muri Amerika umwaka ushize atazabangamira ibikorwa bye bya muzika .
Ateganya kugaruka mu Rwanda mu mpera za uyu mwaka .
Indirimbo zirimo " " " " No offense , " " " " " " " " Send flowers , " " " " " " " " Gukunda , " " " " na " " " " Jamaa " " " " zamenyekanye cyane za uyu mukobwa ntabwo ziri kuri iyi album , kuko igizwe na izindi nshya .
Ange Rita Kagaju afite ubuhanga mu kuririmba na umwihariko wo kuba abasha kubijyanisha no kucuranga gitari , bidasanzwe ku bakobwa benshi mu Rwanda .
Ni umukobwa wa imyaka 21 , uvuka mu Karere ka Rwamagana mu Ntara ya Iburasirazuba .
Avuka mu bana icyenda akaba ari uwa karindwi .
Yatangiye kuririmba mu 2015 yiga mu wa Gatatu wa amashuri yisumbuye .
Yasoje amashuri yisumbuye mu 2018 mu ishami rya Imibare , Ubugenge na Ubumenyi bwa Isi mu ishuri rya Rwamagana Lutheran School .
Ushaka kumva indirimbo ziri kuri iyi album wakanda hano :
Mu myambaro ya amabara ya gisirikare , abarimo ibyamamare basuye ahatangirijwe urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda .
Mu rwego rwo guhugura Abanyarwanda bya umwihariko urubyiruko , ku mateka yaranze urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda , Sosiyete itembereza ba Mukerarugendo , " " " " MB Simba Safaris Rwanda LTD , " " " " yateguye urugendoshuri rwibanze kuri aya mateka .
Ni urugendo rwitabiriwe na abantu batandukanye biganjemo abafite amazina akomeye mu myidagaduro ya u Rwanda .
Bamwe mu bazwi bifatanyije na urundi rubyiruko muri uru rugendo harimo ; Muyoboke Alex , David Bayingana , Ntalindwa Diogene benshi bazi nka Atome , Kirenga Saphina uzwi muri sinema nyarwanda , Umuhanzi Cyusa Ibrahim na abandi batandukanye .
Mu gutangira uru rugendo , abarwitabiriye wabonaga bagaragaza amatsiko adasanzwe yo kumenya uko urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu rwatangiye , icyakora rwagiye kurangira buri wese afite amatsiko ya igice cya kabiri cyarwo kizaba mu Ukwakira 2021 .
Ibya uru rugendo ntabwo byari ibintu byoroshye bitewe na ibihe Igihugu kirimo byo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Covid - 19 .
Muyoboke Alex uri mu bateguye uru rugendo , yabwiye IGIHE ko bafite ibyishimo bya uko ibyo batekereje byagezweho , anashimira buri rwego rwababaye hafi .
Ati " " " " Si ibintu byari byoroshye ariko turashimira inzego zose zagize uruhare mu kugira ngo iki gikorwa gikunde .
Uyu munsi twasuye igice cya mbere cya Urugamba rwo kwibohora , ubutaha tuzagenda twihugura no ku bindi bice . " " " "
Igice cya mbere cya ahabereye urugamba rwo kubohora Igihugu , uru rubyiruko rwasuye ni ku mupaka wa Kagitumba utandukanya u Rwanda na Uganda .
Muri aka gace hagaragara amateka ya uburyo Ingabo za RPA zatangije urugamba rwo kubohora Igihugu ariko zikagorwa cyane no kubura abari abayobozi babo ba mbere kubera imiterere ya aho hantu .
Igihe ingabo za RPA zageraga i Kagitumba tariki ya 1 Ukwakira 1990 , Maj . Gen . Fred Rwigema wari uyoboye urugamba , yasobanuye mu magambo make impamvu yarwo , avuga ko mu mateka ya u Rwanda ubuyobozi bubi ari bwo bwazanye amacakubiri na ibindi bibazo byose byayogoje igihugu , kandi ko nta wundi wabibohora Abanyarwanda , uretse
Abanyarwanda bakunda igihugu .
Iki gihe yasabye abarwanyi bari umwe kwiyambura inyenyeri za gisirikare bari bavanye muri Uganda bazita mu mazi , abizeza ko izo bazakorera muri urwo rugamba arizo zizaba ari izabo .
Yahise atanga amabwiriza ya uburyo urugamba rugiye kugenda ubundi aha amahirwe uwumva atiteguye ko yakwisubirira muri Uganda .
Nyuma ya umunsi umwe urugamba rutangiye , ku wa 2 Ukwakira 1990 Maj . Gen . Rwigema yahise agwa ku rugamba i Kagitumba ho mu Karere ka Nyagatare arashwe na imodoka yari itwaye ingabo za Leta zasakiranye na iza RPA .
Nyuma ya urupfu rwa Rwigema , Maj Gen Paul Kagame yahise ava muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ( USA ) aho yari yaragiye kwiga , maze akomeza kuyobora urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda .
Aka gace uru rubyiruko rwasuye kabitse kandi amateka ya abandi basirikare bari bakomeye muri RPA batahiriwe na iminsi ya mbere ya urugamba barimo Major Peter Bayingana na Major Chris Bunyenyezi .
Nyuma yo gucengerwa na amateka ya Igihugu cyabo , uru rubyiruko rwakomereje urugendo rwabo ku nkengero za Ikiyaga cya Muhazi ( Muhazi beach resort ) , aho bataramiye mu ndirimbo zo kwibohora .
Bacurangirwaga na DJ Diallo ndetse na Dj Rugamba umuziki bumvaga bifashishije ama Ecouteurs , ibimenyerewe nka Silent Disco .
Usibye aba bavangaga imiziki na David Bayingana wari umushyushyarugamba , Cyusa Ibrahim nawe yasusurukije abarenga 60 bitabiriye uru rugendo .

Isubukurwa rya uru rubanza ryashyizwe ku wa 16 Nyakanga 2021 .
Fireman yaherukaga kwitaba Urukiko Rukuru rwa Gisirikare tariki 7 Kamena 2021 , ari kuregwa mu itsinda rya abantu 11 bakurikiranyweho icyaha cyo gukubita no gukomeretsa abanyeshuri bagororerwaga Iwawa .
Mu mpera za umwaka ushize Urukiko rwa Gisirikare rwari rwamukatiye igifungo cya imyaka itatu na ihazabu ya ibihumbi magana atanu ya amafaranga ya u Rwanda ( 500 000 Frw ) .
Muri 11 bakurikiranywe na Urukiko rwa Gisirikare , batatu ni bo bagizwe abere hanyuma umunani barimo na Fireman bahabwa igihano cyo gufungwa imyaka itatu na ihazabu ya amafaranga ibihumbi 500 .
Bitewe na uko ibihano bahawe kimwe na abagizwe abere bitanyuze Ubushinjacyaha bwa gisirikare , bwahise bujurira Urukiko Rukuru rwa Gisirikare .
Ubushinjacyaha buvuga ko butumva impamvu Urukiko rwa Gisirikare rwirengagije ibimenyetso byatanzwe , hakagira abagirwa abere naho abandi bagahabwa ibihano birimo inyoroshyacyaha kandi batarigeze bacyemera cyangwa ngo hagaragazwe ibyashingiweho bahabwa ibihano bito .
Ubu bujurire bwa Ubushinjacyaha bwahuriranye na ubw abaregwa barimo na Fireman bagaragarije Urukiko ko batanyuzwe na imikirize ya urubanza kuko bahanwe kandi ku bwabo bumva ari abere .
Fireman ari kuregwa muri dosiye imwe na abayobozi batatu bahoze bayobora Ikigo ngororamuco cya Iwawa , abasirikare batanu na abandi bahoze ari abayobozi ba abanyeshuri babiri .

Covid - 19 yateje icyuho cya abasura Ingoro ya Amateka ya Abami i Nyanza .
Mu Karere ka Nyanza ahitwa mu Rukari , ni ho hari Ingoro ya Abami ba u Rwanda igaragaramo amateka yihariye kandi ateye amatsiko , ku buryo buri wese uhasuye amara umwanya areba ibimenyetso bihari bigaragaza uko Abami ba u Rwanda babagaho ndese na umuco wihariye wa abenegihugu .
Nyanza yafatwaga nka Umurwa wa Ubwami kuva mu mpera za ikinyejana cya 19 kugeza mu mwaka wa 1961 .
Aha mu Kagari ka Rwesero mu Murenge wa Busasamana niho hari Ingoro za Abami , hahoze urugo rwa Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa wabatijwe Charles Leon Pierre , watwaye u Rwanda kuva mu mwaka w " " " " 1931 kugeza mu mwaka w " " " " 1959 .
Gahongayire Yvonne uyobora Ingoro ya Amateka ya Abami mu Karere ka Nyanza avuga ko kuva icyorezo cya Covid - 19 cyatumye abayisura bagabanuka cyane .
Ati " " " " Mu mwaka wa 2018 - 2019 twakiriye abashyitsi 65 , 017 ; mu 2019 - 2020 twakira abantu 35 , 965 kuko batangiye kugabanuka kubera Covid - 19 naho mu 2020 - 2021 hasuwe na abantu 7 , 910 .
Avuga ko mu mwaka wa 2019 - 2020 ari bwo ababasura batangiye kugabanuka kuko icyorezo cya Covid - 19 cyageze mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020 hashize amezi arindwi umwaka wa ingengo ya imari utangiye .
Ati " " " " Abantu bahise bagabanuka cyane bigaragara kandi nibwo igihe cyo kuza kwa abashyitsi benshi kiba kigeze kugera mu kwezi kwa gatanu na ukwa gatandatu . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa Akarere ka Nyanza , Ntazinda Erasme , avuga ko igitaramo ngarukamwaka " " " " Nyanza Twataramye " " " " cyinjiririzaga Abanyenyanza benshi amafaranga mu gihe gito ariko na cyo Covid - 19 yatumye gisubikwa .
Icyo gitaramo cyahuzaga abarenga ibihumbi bitatu mu ijoro rimwe bakarara inkera i Nyanza ntabwo kikihabera kuko umwaka ushize cyabereye kuri televiziyo abantu ntibahura ngo bidagadure ndetse na uyu mwaka bigaragara ko ari ko bizagenda .
Ntazinda avuga ko kuba kitakibera i Nyanza ngo abantu bahure basabane byateje icyuho mu basura akarere na igihombo ku bakora ubucuruzi .
Ati " " " " Icyuho kirahari kinini kuko iyo uganiriye na abacuruzi bo mu Mujyi wa Nyanza bavuga ko uwo munsi wri igitangaza kuri bo kuko kuva ka ufite hoteli kugera no ku munyonzi wa igare , kugera no ka ucuruza avoka mu gatebo , abo bose baracuruzaga bakanezererwa . . " " " "
Nyanza Twataramye ni igitaramo kibanziriza umuganura uba mu kwezi kwa Kanama buri mwaka .
Yatangiye kubera mu Karere ka Nyanza mu 2014 .
Bamwe mu bakorera ubucuruzi mu Mujyi wa Nyanza na bo bavuga ko kuri ubu batakibona abakiriya nka mbere kubera Covid - 19 .
Musengimana Gérard ati " " " " Abakiriya ni bake cyane ntabwo bakiza nka mbere kubera iki cyorezo .
Umuntu ashobora kumara umunsi wose nta bakiriya batanu yakiriye kuko nta bashyitsi bakiza i Nyanza . " " " "
Ingoro ya Amateka ya Abami igizwe na ibice bine ; icya mbere ni Ingoro Umwami Yuhi V Musinga yabayemo na abandi bamubanjirije bose , igaragiwe na izindi nzu ebyiri za kagondo ( Iya amata ndetse ndetse na iy inzoga ) .
Igice cya kabiri kigizwe na inyambo ( inka za amahembe ashyorongoshyoye ) .
Icya gatatu ni ingoro ya Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa , naho icya kane kigizwe na aho Abami batabarije i Mwima .
I Nyanza hatuwe na Abami bane ari bo Kigeli IV Rwabugiri wari utuye ku misozi ya Mwima na Mushirarungu ; Yuhi IV Musinga watuye i Mwima na Gakenyeri ; Mutara III Rudahigwa watuye mu Rukali ndetse na Umwami Kigeli V Ndahindurwa watuye i Busasamana .
Umugore wa Steve Harvey yasuye ingagi mu Birunga .
Uyu mugore ari mu Rwanda mu ruzinduko aho yasuye ingagi zo mu Birunga mu muryango wa Muhoza .
Yanditse ku rukuta rwe rwa Instagram , ati " " " " Mwarakoze Pariki ya Ibirunga gufata neza izi ngagi nziza ndetse no kundeka nkagirana igibe nazo mu buturo bwazo . " " " "
Marjorie Elaine Harvey yasezeranye kubana na Steve Harvey mu 2007 .
Uyu mugore wa imyaka 54 ri arushinze ku nshuro ya gatatu ndetse yari afite abana batatu mbere yo kubana na Steve Harvey .
Aba bombi kandi bafitanye abana babiri ba abakobwa Lori Harvey na Morgan Harvey .
Marjorie Elaine Harvey ni umuhanzi wa imideli ndetse afite umuryango udaharanira inyungu ufasha urubyiruko witwa The Steve and Marjorie Harvey Foundation .
Umugabo we ni icyamamare muri Amerika no ku Isi yose kubera ibikorwa bitandukanye akora mu ruhando rwa imyidagaduro .
Broderick Stephen Harvey [ Steve Harvey ] yavutse ku wa 17 Mutarama 1957 .
Ni umunyamakuru kuri televiziyo , umunyarwenya , umukinnyi wa filime , umwanditsi , umushabitsi na ibindi byinshi .
Azwi mu biganiro nka The Steve Harvey Morning Show , Family Feud , Celebrity Family Feud ndetse ni na nawe uyobora irushanwa rya Miss Universe kuva mu 2015 .
Uyu mugabo yatangiye ari umunyarwenya mu myaka yo mu 1980 nyuma aza kwinjira no mu itangazamakuru .
Hotel Akagera Game Lodge izacumbikira abazitabira CHOGM yashyizwe ku rwego rwa inyenyeri enye
Iyi hoteli yubatswe mu 1974 , iza kugurwa na RSSB mu 2013 hagamijwe gushora amafaranga mu bikorwa bizagira uruhare mu iterambere rya igihugu bikanahindura imibereho myiza ya abaturage .
Nyuma yo kuyigura RSSB yashatse kuyivugurura ikajya ku rwego rwiza rukurura ba mukerarugendo .
Mu 2018 yagiranye amasezerano na Sosiyete yo muri Afurika ya Epfo ikora ibijyanye na amahoteli , Mantis kugira ngo ivugururwe .
Ubuyobozi bwa Mantis bwavuze ko mu mirimo yo kuyivugurura hibanzwe cyane mu kwagura ibyumba no kubishyira ku rwego rwiza kuruta uko byari bimeze mbere .
Hongewemo ibyumba bibiri bifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abakuru ba ibihugu .
Uwari Umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe Ishoramari na Ubukungu muri RSSB , Gacandaga Jean Marie , yavuze ko uru rwego rumaze gushora amafaranga agera kuri miliyari 8 Frw kugira ngo iyi hoteli ivugururwe kuko yari ishaje .
Yagize ati " " " " Twayiguze ishaje , ni yo mpamvu twashoyemo amafaranga kugira ngo igere ku rwego rwiza .
Ubwo twayijyagamo yego abantu benshi barayisuraga amafaranga akaboneka ariko ntabwo yari ku rwego twifuza . " " " "
" " " " Urwego ubu iriho ni inyenyeri enye kandi ni rwiza twizeye ko ari umushinga mwiza , rero iyo urebye na imibare usanga amafaranga yashowemo azagaruzwa . " " " "
Gacandaga yavuze ko kugura iyi hoteli biri mu murongo bihaye wo gukora ishoramari mu mishinga igamije guteza imbere igihugu ndetse na imibereho myiza ya abaturage .
Akagera Game Lodge iri mu mahoteli azakira abazitabira Inama ya 26 ya Abakuru ba Ibihugu bikoresha ururimi rwa Icyongereza , Commonwealth , izwi nka CHOGM , ibintu Gacandaga avuga ko ari amahirwe akomeye kuba bibaye na imirimo yo kuyivugurura yarangiye .
CHOGM iteganyijwe kubera mu Rwanda ku wa 21 Kamena uyu mwaka .
Iyi nama iba nyuma ya buri myaka ibiri , yagombaga kubera mu Rwanda ku wa 22 - 27 Kamena 2020 ariko iza gusubikwa ku mpamvu za icyorezo cya COVID - 19 , cyahagaritse inama na ibindi bikorwa bikomeye .
Guverineri wa Intara ya Uburasirazuba , Gasana Emmanuel , yavuze ko iyi hoteli igiye gukomeza kurushaho kubera abaturage ivomo rya imibereho myiza na iterambere rya intara cyane ko ubukerarugendo buri mu nkingi za mwamba bifuza kubakiraho ubukungu .
Yakomeje ati " " " " Turifuza ko ubukerarugendo buba mu bintu bitatu tuzashingiraho iterambere ryacu , birimo guteza imbere ubuhinzi , ubukerarugendo ndetse na ubucuruzi .
Ikindi ariko abaturiye aha ngaha imibereho izagenda ihinduka kuko babona akazi . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa Ishami rya Ubukerarugendo mu Rwego rwa Igihugu rwa Iterambere ( RDB ) , Belise Kariza , yashimye intambwe imaze guterwa mu bukerarugendo , avuga ko na ubwo Covid - 19 yakomye mu nkokora uru rwego , u Rwanda rudateze gucika intege mu kubushyigikira no kubuteza imbere .
Yashimiye Ubuyobozi bukuru bwa RSSB ku gikorwa cyo gushora imari mu bukerarugendo , avuga ko adashidikanya ko kizatanga umusaruro ushimije mu gihe Covid - 19 izaba yacogoye ndetse na ingendo zigakomeza nka uko byari bisanzwe .
Hotel Akagera Game Lodge ifite ibyumba 59 harimo igishobora kwakira Umukuru wa Igihugu ( Presidential Suite ) na igishobora kwakira abandi bayobozi mu nzego nkuru ( Executive Suite ) .
Sosiyete ya Mantis ifite inshingano zo gukurikirana iyi hoteli umunsi ku wundi isanzwe icunga izindi ebyiri arizo Kivu Marina Bay iri mu karere ka Rusizi na Epic Hotel iherereye mu Karere ka Nyagatare .
Umukarani yatawe muri yombi akekwaho kwiba shebuja ibihumbi 10 $ ( Video ) .
Ku wa Mbere tariki ya 12 Mata 2021 ni bwo uyu mugabo ukekwaho kwiba shebuja amafaranga yafatiwe i Nyamirambo asigaranye ibihumbi 9 . 6 $ .
Uwo mugabo wa imyaka 38 , afite umuryango na abana batanu , ubusanzwe atuye mu Karere ka Nyarugenge , mu Murenge wa Kimisagara .
Yavuze ko amafaranga yayatwaye ubwo umukoresha we yari amutumye kuyabitsa kuri banki , akagenda ntagaruke .
Yagize ati " " " " Yari antumye kuri banki ngo njye kuyabitsaho , hanyuma sinabikora ndayajyana .
Muri ako kanya ntacyo nari ndi gutekereza icyakoze naje gukuraho telefoni ngo hatagira unshaka akambona maze nyuma ya igihe gito nongera nyisubizaho ariko numvaga umutima uri kundya ko bashobora kumfata . " " " "
Akomeza agira ati " " " " Bamfashe nagiye mu rundi rugo , nari nahunze ntinya ko bashobora kumbona .
Icyo gihe nari mfite ubwoba , nari nakuyeho 200 $ [ agera ku 200 . 000 Frw ] ndayakoresha mu rugo . " " " "
Nyuma yo gufatwa uyu mugabo yemeye ko yakoze icyaha abisabira na imbabazi ndetse aburira bagenzi be bashobora gukora ibisa na ibyo ko baba bikururira akaga .
Uwibwe amafaranga ni umucuruzi ukorera mu Isoko rya Nyarugenge witwa Gihana Zabulon .
Ubwo yari amaze gushyikirizwa amafaranga ye yagarujwe ku bufatanye na inzego za umutekano , uyu mucuruzi yishimiye kongera kuyabona avuga ko atari ikintu cyoroshye .
Yagize ati " " " " Numvaga uko byagenda kose dufite ubuyobozi bwiza ndetse na RIB ishobora kumfasha uwo muntu yaba atarambuka umupaka agafatwa .
Uwo mukozi yari umuntu mwiza , twari dusanzwe dukorana neza ariko sinzi ukuntu uwo munsi byagenze kuko namuhaga na arenze ayo ngayo .
Ni umuntu ufite umugore na abana sinatekerezaga ko yagira umutima wo kunyiba . " " " "
Uyu mucuruzi yavuze ko yatangiye gutekereza ko yibwe hashize amasaha ane , kuko yabajije aho yamukekaga hose ntamubone kandi na amafaranga atashyizwe kuri konti .
Icyo gihe yatekereje ko yibwe , ashyikiriza ikirego Ubugenzacyaha .
Yashimiye uruhare RIB yagize mu gikorwa cyo gukurikirana uwamwibye agafatwa .
Gihana yavuze ko mu byamubayeho yakuyemo isomo rikomeye ririmo no kugira amakenga mu bikorwa bya ubucuruzi .
Umuvugizi wa Umusigire wa RIB , Dr Murangira B . Thierry , yabwiye IGIHE ko hakoreshejwe imbaraga mu gukurikirana uwibye amafaranga kugira ngo atabwe muri yombi .
Ati " " " " Icyo tubwira abantu bose na abo bakoranaga bose ni uko uwaba afite umutima wo kugerageza gutwara ibitari ibye , cyangwa kwiba ko ntaho yacikira ubutabera .
Icyiza na uko bareka uwo mutima wo gukora ibyaha . " " " " " " " "
Yibukije abaturage kurushaho gukorana na inzego mu guhanahana amakuru kugira ngo bakomeze umurongo wo guhashya ibyaha .
Uyu mugabo watawe muri yombi aramutse ahamwe na icyaha cya ubujura yahanishwa ingingo ya 166 , iteganya igihano cya igifungo kitari munsi ya umwaka ariko kitarengeje imyaka ibiri .
Imyiteguro irarimbanyije ku bazakira na ahazakirirwa abazitabira Inama ya CHOGM .
CHOGM iba nyuma ya buri myaka ibiri , yagombaga kubera mu Rwanda ku wa 22 - 27 Kamena 2020 ariko iza gusubikwa ku mpamvu za icyorezo cya COVID - 19 , cyahagaritse inama na ibindi bikorwa bikomeye .
Nyuma yo gusuzuma imiterere ya COVID - 19 , Ubunyamabanga Bukuru bwa Commonwealth , bwanzuye ko iyi nama izaba mu Cyumweru cya tariki 21 Kamena 2021 .
Kuri ubu ibijyanye na imyiteguro irimo za site inama izaberaho mu Mujyi wa Kigali , amahoteli azakira abazayitabira , imihanda ndetse na ibindi bikorwa remezo irarimbanyije kugira ngo izasange biri ku murongo .
Iyi nama itegerezanyijwe amatsiko menshi i Kigali ndetse imyiteguro ku mahoteli no ku bantu bayobora abakerarugendo irarimbanyije .
Itanga ishusho ya igihugu cyayakiriye muri rusange , kuva ku mihanda inyuramo imodoka za abashyitsi , kugera ku byumba bya hoteli bararamo , inyubako ziberamo inama , ndetse na aho batemberezwa mu bice binyuranye bya igihugu , cyane ko yitabirwa na abantu baturutse hirya no hino ku Isi mu bihugu 54 bibarizwa muri The Commonwealth .
Bitandukanye na izindi nama zabayeho , iya uyu mwaka isaba indi myiteguro irenze iyo kubaka imihanda cyangwa iyo kurimbisha ibyumba na ahazakorerwa inama kubera icyorezo cya Covid - 19 kimaze umwaka urenga kibasiye Isi .
Igitezwe amaso kuruta ibindi , ni umutekano wa abazitayitabira , cyane ku byerekeye ubuzima , kureba niba hari uburyo buhagije bwo kwirinda Covid - 19 , kugira ngo hatazagira umushyitsi uyandurira mu Rwanda cyangwa se hakagira uyinjiza mu gihugu akanduza abo asanze .
Mu kiganiro IGIHE yagiranye na abanyamahoteli batandukanye na bamwe mu bayobora ba mukerarugendo bazwi nka " " " " Tour guides , " " " " basobanuye uko biteguye iyi nama ndetse na ingamba zafashwe mu kwirinda Covid - 19 .
Muri za hotel byifashe bite ?
Amahoteli ni yo zingiro rya ishusho umushyitsi ashobora kuvana mu gihugu , kuko ariho amara igihe kinini kuruta ahandi .
Uburyo yakirwa aho afatira ifunguro , aho arara , hose hamusigira ishusho ituma azagaruka cyangwa akahazinukwa .
Ni ibya ingenzi rero ko yitegura neza bishoboka , hashyirwa ingufu mu bintu byose cyane mu kwirinda Covid - 19 , nka icyorezo gihangayikishije Isi .
Mugesera Eric ushinzwe Abakozi muri Serena Hotel yasobanuye ko biteguye neza , baguze ibyuma bipima umuriro na ibyibutsa abantu kwambara agapfukamunwa .

na abo bazakira .

Moges Hanna ushinzwe Itumanaho na Imenyekanishabikorwa muri Kigali Convention Centre and Radisson Blu Hotel , yavuze ko iyi hotel yatangiye imyiteguro ya CHOGM mu ntangiriro za Werurwe , ndetse ko aho abashyitsi bazarara hateguwe .
Ati " " " " Twongereye imiti yica udukoko mu byumba bya abashyitsi , dukuramo ibikoresho byakoreshejwe birimo ibitabo byo gusoma , imisego myinshi na ibyo kwiyorosa biri mu tubati tubikuramo dutera imiti ahantu hose mu byumba yaba ku ntebe , kuri telefoni , telekomande za televiziyo , ku nzugi , ku madirishya ku tubati na ahandi . " " " "
Yavuze ko ibikorwa byose bizabera muri hotel birimo inama , gufata amafunguro , aho abashyitsi barara bizakorwa hirindwa Covid - 19 , basiga intera haba mu bashyitsi no mu bakozi , ndetse imiti yica udukoko igashyirwa ahantu hose , ku buryo yaba umukozi cyangwa umushyitsi yayibona . Abayobora abakerarugendo biteguye kubereka ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda
Mu gihe cya inama zikomeye , benshi mu bazitabira banasura ibice bitandukanye bakareba ibyiza biri mu rwa Imisozi igihumbi kuva ku moko ya inyoni zirenga 300 zo muri Pariki ya Nyungwe kugera ku ngagi zo mu Birunga zikurura abanyamahanga benshi .
Abayobora ba mukerarugendo bazwi nka aba - guides bavuga ko biteguye neza kwakira abashyitsi bazitabira CHOGM ndetse hari abatangiye kubasaba ko bazabatembereza .
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Home Rwanda Safaris , Tuyigire Aimable , yavuze ko nka abatembereza ba mukerarugendo biteguye guhesha ishema na isura nziza u Rwanda , cyane ko nyuma ya igihe kinini cyari gishize nta nama zikomeye ziba mu gihugu biteze kuzabona ababagana .
Ati " " " " Ubu twamaze guhugura abakozi batwara ba mukerarugendo bijyanye na ibihe turimo byo kwirinda Covid - 19 ku buryo ntawe uzagira ikibazo mu rugendo .
Turi gukorana na ibice bisurwa birimo pariki za igihugu ndetse imodoka zabugenewe zarateguwe ku buryo twiteguye kuzereka Isi ko u Rwanda ari igihugu kibereye ubukerarugendo . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa Sosiyete itwara ba mukerarugendo ya Show me Around Rwanda Safaris , Bukuru Augustin , we yagize ati " " " " Twiteguranye kwakira abashyitsi na ubwuzu bwinshi .
Twatangiye gutegura aho abantu bazasura bya iminsi mike hafi ya Kigali bijyanye na umwanya muto baza bafite kugira ngo bizaborohere cyane . " " " "
Muri rusange imyiteguro mu bantu bose bafite aho bazahurira bya hafi na abashyitsi bazitabira CHOGM imeze neza ndetse na ubwo bataramenya umubare wa abantu bazitabira , mu mezi abiri gusa asigaye byitezwe ko imirimo yo kwitegura inama no gukingira abantu bizaba byarangiye .
Biteganyijwe ko iyi nama ishobora kuzitabirwa na abagera ku bihumbi 10 .
Usibye ibijyanye na imyiteguro ya amahoteli na abayobora ba mukerarugendo , Umujyi wa Kigali nawo ukomeje ibikorwa byawo byo kurimbisha imihanda izakoreshwa ahanini na abazitabira CHOGM hagamijwe kubafasha kuryoherwa na igihe bazamara ku butaka bwa u Rwanda .
Inama ya CHOGM iheruka kubera mu Bwongereza mu 2018 , byari biteganyijwe ko izabera mu Rwanda mu 2020 irimurwa kubera Covid - 19 .
Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje imibereho itangaje ya ingagi za imfubyi
Byagaragajwe mu bushakashatsi bwakorewe ku ngagi 59 zifite hagati ya imyaka ibiri na umunani zo muri Pariki ya Ibirunga iri mu Majyaruguru ya u Rwanda , kuva mu 1967 kugeza mu 2019 .
Hifashishijwe amakuru na izindi nyigo zakozwe mu myaka yabanje , ibyabuvuyemo byerekanye ko kuba abana ba ingagi baba imfubyi bitababuza gukomeza kubaho , kororoka no kwisanga mu zindi .
Ni mu gihe abashakashatsi basobanura ko inguge ibuze nyina ikiri nto , bisa na igikuba gicitse mu mibereho yayo , kuko nyina ari yo iyirinda ikanayitoza inzira nyinshi za ubuzima bwayo .
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na RFI , Umuyobozi wa itsinda rya abashakashatsi bakoze iyo nyigo , Robin Morrison , yatangaje ko ibyo biterwa na uko ingagi zikunze kubana mu matsinda kandi zigafashanya .
Ati " " " " Icyo twabonye muri ubu bushakashatsi ni uko uretse ukwita ku mwana kwa ingagi za imbyeyi kuba kutagihari , iyo zigejeje ku myaka ibiri zishobora gukomeza kubaho kandi ntizihungabane .
Bisa na aho biterwa na uko zibana mu itsinda rigari , riba ryuzuyemo ngenzi zazo bifitanye isano zikuriwe na ingabo ishobora kuba ari se cyangwa atari we . " " " "
Morrison yavuze ko mu mibereho yazo " " " " zose ziba zisa na izishaka kuba hafi ya izo za imfubyi " " " " bigatuma zisanga mu zindi bityo ntizigerweho cyane na ingaruka za ubupfubyi .
Muri uko kwisungana kandi ngo ingabo ikuriye itsinda ifasha abana batagifite ba nyina , ikabaryamisha buri joro kabone na iyo yaba atari yo se .
Ku rundi ruhande , umuhanga mu bya imyitwarire ya ibinyabuzima , Matthew Zipple , yavuze ko kuba ingagi zibuze nyina zikiri nto zishobora gukomeza kubaho kandi neza " " " " bitangaje kandi byongeye urujijo . " " " "
Ati " " " " Ubundi mu bwoko bwa ziriya nyamaswa icyo tuba twiteze ni uko kubura nyina bishobora kuyigiraho ingaruka mbi zikomeye ku kuba yakomeza kubaho . " " " "
Icyakora na inyigo Zipple aheruka gukorera mu mwaka ushize ku nkende , ingagi , inkima na inguge yerekanye ko nta ngaruka mbi zigaragara ku ngagi iba yarabuze nyina ikiri nto .
Muri rusange , ingagi ziba imfubyi biturutse ku mpfu , ubushimusi cyangwa se kuba zakwimuka zikava mu gace kamwe zisize abana .
Iyo nyigo nshya yamuritswe muri eLife ku wa 23 Werurwe 2021 , yakozwe na abashakashatsi bo muri Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund Rwanda , University of Exeter na University of Southern Denmark .
Radisson Blu Hotel & Kigali Convention Centre yabonye umuyobozi mushya .
Rob Kucera afite ubunararibonye burenga imyaka 20 mu bijyanye na urwego rwa amahoteli .
Yakoze mu micungire ya amahoteli muri Afurika ya Epfo , Turikiya , Uganda na Kenya .
Yakoze mu mahoteli akomeye nka The Westin Cape Town and Arabella Hotel , Golf & Spa Resort , Movenpick Wilderness Hotel na Protea Hotels .
Si ubwa mbere Rob Kucera agiye kuyobora Radisson Blu Hotel kuko yayoboye iyo muri Turikiya izwi nka Radisson Blu Bosphorus Hotel , Istanbul ndetse na iyo muri Kenya izwi nka Radisson Blu Hotel , Nairobi Upper Hill .
Rob Kucera asanzwe kandi ari we muyobozi wa hoteli za Radisson Blu mu Karere ka Afurika ya iburasirazuba .
Mu itangazo ubuyobozi bwa Radisson Blu Hotel na Kigali Convention Centre bwashyize hanze kuri uyu wa 30 Werurwe 2021 bwavuze ko ubunararibonye bwa Kucera mu bijyanye no kubera icyitegererezo abakozi , ndetse no kubashishikariza gufata inshingano mu bijyanye na imicungire myiza ya hoteli biri mu byo bamwitezeho .
Izi ndangagaciro za uyu mugabo mu bijyanye na imiyoborere ya amahoteli byatumye we na amatsinda ya abakozi bakorana babona ibihembo bitandukanye .
Mu 2015 ubwo yakoraga muri Starwood Hotels & amp , Resorts Group bahawe igihembo mpuzamahanga kijyanye na imikoranire myiza nka itsinda rya abakozi .
Mu 2004 yahawe kandi igihembo nka umuyobozi mwiza wa umwaka mu itsinda rya amahoteli ya Protea ( Protea Hotels ) .
Rob Kucera yabaye kandi Umuyobozi wa Inama ya Ubutegetsi mu kigo kigenzura ibikorwa bya ibigo 700 biri mu bikorwa bya amahoteli na ubukerarugendo mu Ntara ya Western Cape muri Afurika ya Epfo kizwi nka " " " " FEDHASA . " " " "
Radisson Blu Hotel Kigali ni hoteli ya inyenyeri eshanu fite ibyumba 292 , icyumba cya inama cyakira abantu basaga 2500 , ibiro byo gukoreramo na ibindi .
Yatashywe ku mugaragaro mu 2016 , ndetse ifatwa nka inkingi ya mwamba muri gahunda Guverinoma ya u Rwanda yihaye yo kwagura ubukerarugendo hibandwa ku kwakira ibiganiro , inama mpuzamahanga na ibikorwa bitandukanye byiswe MICE mu magambo ahinnye ya Icyongereza bizwi nka Meetings , Incentives , Conferences and Events .
Huye : Amayobera ku nkende yapfuye imanitse mu mugozi .
Umunyeshuri wo muri Kaminuza ya u Rwanda , Rwamucyo Nsengimana Jean de Dieu , yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi nkende bayibonye mu masaha ya mu gitondo imanitse , bihutira kubimenyesha ubuyobozi .
Ati " " " " Byatubereye urujijo kuko twabibonye mu gitondo nka saa mbili , bivugwa ko yari imaze iminsi ifite umugozi mu ijosi , birashoboka ko yagiye hejuru kwa kundi ziba zikina akagozi kagafatwa mu ibati kagahita kayizirika . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Ubuyobozi bwahise buhagera ariko nta cyo bwayikoraho kuko hari izindi nkende zarakaye , urumva ni hejuru cyane kandi bisaba na abantu kuba bakurira kandi na izindi nkende zihari byari bigoye kuba wazihakura . " " " "
Hari amakuru ko urupfu rwayo rwatewe na abantu bayiteze umugozi ku bushake , bakayambika agasinga mu ijosi bitewe na uko hari abakunze kuvuga ko zibonera imyaka zikanabasagarira .
Umukozi wa RDB ushinzwe kubungabunga urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima , Ngoga Télesphore , yabwiye IGIHE ko bagiye gushaka amakuru ya icyaba cyayishe .
Ati " " " " Turi kubikurikirana kugira ngo turebe uko bimeze maze hashakishwe ikintu cyakorwa byihutirwa .
Ubu turi kuvugana na abayobozi ba Kaminuza ngo tumenye uko bimeze . " " " "
Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE ni uko nyuma iyi nkende yamanuwe aho yari imanitse ikajyanwa ahakusanyirizwa inyamaswa muri Kaminuza Nkuru ya u Rwanda mu Ishami rya Huye , kugira ngo iterwe imiti itazangirika maze ijye yifashishwa mu bushakashatsi na abanyeshuri biga ibijyanye na imibereho ya inyamaswa .
Gusa kugeza ubu hategerejwe ko ibanza gukorerwa ibizamini hakarebwe niba nta ndwara ifite , mu gihe yasanganwa uburwayi igahita ishyingurwa .
Bimwe mu birwa bitatse ibyiza nyaburanga mu kiyaga cya Kivu .
Ikiyaga cya Kivu ni cyo kiyaga kinini mu Rwanda cyikaba gikurura imbaga ya abantu haba Abanyarwanda ndetse na abandi baturutse mu bihugu bitandukanye .
Igice cyacyo kimwe kiri ku ruhande rwa u Rwanda mu gihe ikindi kiri muri Repuburika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo .
Ku ruhande rwa u Rwanda gikora ku turere tune aritwo Rusizi , Nyamasheke , Karongi na Rubavu , aha hakaba harangwa na ibyiza nyaburanga bitandukanye birimo nka amahoteri akikije ikiyaga ndetse na umucanga abantu bidagaduriramo .
Ibi ni ibigaragara inyuma ariko imbere muri iki kiyaga harimo ibirwa bitandukanye byuje ubwiza butandukanye bituma uwabigezeho atifuza gutaha .
Mu gushaka kumenya amakuru kuri ibyo birwa , IGIHE yaganiriye na umwe mu bakozi ba sosiyete " " " " Golden Rwanda Safaris Ltd , " " " " izobereye mu gutembereza ba mukerarugendo .
Umwe mu bayikorera yavuze ko igikurura abantu kujya kuri ibi birwa ari ukurira imisozi bizwi nka " " " " Hiking " " " " ndetse no kureba inyoni .
Ati " " " " Abantu bajya ku turwa ni abantu baba bagira amatsiko cyane , wa wundi uba ushaka kumenya ikiri imbere mu kiyaga .
Abajyayo rero ibyo bakorayo ni ukurira imisozi ndetse no kureba inyoni kuko zibamo cyane haba ari heza iyo ukunda ibyo bintu . " " " "
Ibirwa biri mu kiyaga cya Kivu
Ikirwa cya Nkombo
Nkombo ni cyo kirwa kinini mu kiyaga cya Kivu kuko gifite ubuso bungana na kilometero kare 29 , 7 harimo 22 , 7 km2 za ubutaka na 7 km2 za amazi , uyu akaba ari umurenge wose uri mu Karere ka Rusizi .
Iki kirwa gituwe na abaturage bakabakaba ibihumbi 18 , gikurura abatari bake bashaka kujya kureba ukuntu abantu batuye hagati mu mazi ndetse bakururwa na imico yaho itandukanye na isanzwe irimo nka ururimi rwa Amashi rwumvwa na abaho gusa ndetse na imbyino zabo zizwi nko gusama .
Abaturage baho benshi batunzwe no kuroba na ubundi bucuruzi butandukanye bakorera muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo .
Ba mukerarugendo barahakunda kuko ubuzima bwaho butandukanye na ubw ahandi mu gihugu .
Iki kirwa nta terambere ryaharangwaga mu myaka yashize ariko muri iyi myaka ryarahageze kuko haboneka ibikorwa remezo bitandukanye nka umuriro , amazi meza , amashuri , ivuriro ndetse na hoteli .
Ikirwa cya Gihaya
Gihaya na ho ni mu Karere ka Rusizi ndetse ni hafi na Nkombo ariko ho ni hato .
Ni ikirwa ba mukerarugendo bakunda kujya gusura bashaka kurira imisozi ndetse no gutembera mu bwato .
Ubuzima bwaho ni nka ubwo ku Nkombo .
Akarwa ka Abakobwa
Aka ni akarwa kari mu Karere ka Nyamasheke gafite amateka akomeye mu Rwanda , kera bajyaga ku kajugunyaho abakobwa babaga baratwaye inda za indaro ngo badateza ishyano ku musozi .
Abantu baturutse imihanda yose biganjemo igitsina gore bajya kuhasura bagira ngo barusheho kumenya amakuru ya uko byagendaga ku bakobwa bahajugunywaga .
Ikirwa cya Nyamunini
Nyamunini izwi cyane nka Napoleon Island , ni ikirwa kiri mu kiyaga cya Kivu ku ruhande rwa Karongi .
Iki ni kimwe mu birwa bikurura ba mukarerugendo bitewe na ubwoko bwa inyoni butandukanye buhari ndetse na imbuto zihari .
Ikirwa cya Amahoro
Amahoro na cyo kiri ku ruhande rwa Karongi , nka uko cyitwa amahoro koko ngo gitemberwa na abantu babuze amahoro muri bo kandi ngo bahageze bakabona amazi agikikije na amajwi ya inyoni ziririmba bakumva buzuye amahoro muri bo .
Ikirwa cya Nyakarwa
Nyakarwa ni ikirwa giherereye mu Karere ka Karongi cyizwiho kugira inyoni zitandukanye .
Uwahegeze nta yandi majwi aba yumva usibye urusobe rwa amajwi atandukanye ya inyoni .
Ikirwa cya Mpembe
Mpembe na yo iherereye muri Karongi akaba ari icyirwa kigengwa na umuntu ku giti cye , aho yashyizeho ahantu hangana na ibilometero bine abantu bagenda na amaguru .
Gikurura benshi kuko kibafasha kuruhuka mu buryo bwihariye .
Si ibi birwa gusa biri muri iki kiyaga kuko muri 2012 , Ikigo cya Igihugu cyo Kubungabunga Ibidukikije ( REMA ) , cyatangaje ko mu kiyaga cya Kivu habarizwamo ibirwa 250 .
Muri byo , 56 biri ku rahande rwa u Rwanda .
Ibi twavuzeho ni ibyo ba mukerarugendo bakunze muri gusura muri iki gihe .
Amaso ahanzwe u Rwanda mu kiganiro Echappées Belles cya France 5 .
Ibihugu bya Afurika buri gihe usanga bigarukwaho mu itangazamakuru rya abo " " " " bavuga ko bageze kuri demokarasi " " " " bigaragazwa nka ahari kubera ihonyorwa rya uburenganzira bwa muntu , intambara , indiri ya imitwe ya iterabwoba , ibyorezo na inzara ; ukagira ngo ni nka imbabare itabarizwa .
Nko mu Bufaransa bya umwihariko , isura ya u Rwanda mu mboni zabwo ntiyakunze kuba nziza bitewe ahanini na uruhare abari abayobozi babwo bashinjwa kugira muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 , nyuma bakajya no mu murongo wo kuyihakana no kutavuga ukuri kuri yo .
Ibyo byatumye na abanyamakuru baho bagendera muri uwo mujyo , kuvuga ibyiza bya u Rwanda bigasa na ibitabaho .
Buri wese wumvise ko itangazamakuru rya Abafaransa ryavuze ibyiza bya u Rwanda ntiyabura kugwa mu kantu .
Ibyo ariko birashoboka kuko mu nshuro nke bibaho na iy uyu munsi irazamo .
Ikiganiro Echappées Belles gica kuri Televiziyo ya France 5 buri wa Gatandatu kuva ku wa 30 Ukuboza mu 2006 , kiraza kwerekana ibyiza u Rwanda rumaze kugeraho mu rugendo rwa imyaka 27 rwiyubaka .
Kiraba Saa 20 : 50 za i Paris , saa 21 : 50 za i Kigali .
Ni ikiganiro gisanzwe kigaragaza agace , igihugu cyangwa akarere runaka na icyerekezo cyaho .
Gikorwa na abanyamakuru ba Abafaransa barimo Sophie Jovillard wanagitangije , akagikorana na Tiga ukomoka muri Bénin , Ismaël Khelifa na Jérôme Pitorin .
Mu itegurwa ryacyo , abo banyamakuru bakora urugendo bakajya gusura agace kadakunze kuvugwaho ibyiza ( akenshi basura agace kari kure ya u Bufaransa ) , bakareba icyerekezo cyako na ibihari byihariye bidakunze kuboneka ahandi , maze bakabyereka abagikurikira .
Mu minota 60 yacyo yo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 6 Werurwe 2021 , Jovillard arerekana u Rwanda na iterambere rumaze kugeraho na ubwiza rufite mu myaka 27 rumaze rushegeshwe na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 , aho yibanda ku guteza imbere abagore banagaragara cyane mu nzego nkuru za igihugu .
Arabyerekanira mu mashusho arimo ayafatiwe mu Majyaruguru ya u Rwanda muri Pariki ya Ibirunga , Jovillard atemberana na Nyirakaragire Natalie wabaye umuganga wa mbere wa inyamaswa zo muri iyo pariki .
Haragaragaramo uko Abanyarwandakazi bari mu rwego rwa abikorera bageze kuri 40 % , intambwe ikomeye itaraterwa na ibindi bihugu byitwa ko bikomeye nka u Bufaransa kuko bwo bufite 27 % .
Muri Echappées Belles ya uyu munsi kandi haragaragarizwamo uko u Rwanda ruri kubaka ubukungu bushingiye ku ikoranabuhanga hahangwa imishinga myinshi izana udushya muri urwo rwego , ari nako rwongera ingamba zo kurengera ibidukikije .
Intambwe yo kuba rwaraciye umuco wo gupfunyika mu mashashi hakifashishwa ibindi bikoresho ni hake yatewe , naho ikoranabuhanga ryo gutwara amaraso ku bitaro bitandukanye hifashishijwe Drones ni ibigwi .
Mu mashusho ya umunota umwe yashyizwe kuri YouTube na Facebook bya Echappées Belles , Sophie Jovillard yakumbuje abantu icyo kiganiro abararikira kudacikanwa kuko cyerekana ibyiza nyaburanga bya u Rwanda birimo ikiyaga cya Kivu na inyamaswa zo muri Pariki ya Akagera .

Mwitegure tujyane mu rugendo rudasanzwe , mwese muhawe ikaze mu Rwanda , ahari ubwiza bushya butuma bamwe barubonamo Singapore ya Afurika , naho abandi bakarwita u Busuwisi bwo muri Afurika . " " " "

Abashaka gutembera no kumenya Umujyi wa Kigali bashyizwe igorora .
Uwageze muri uyu mujyi ntiyifuza gutaha kubera ibyiza byinshi birimo imiturirwa myiza , amahoteli yo ku rwego rwo hejuru , ubusitani burimo ibiti bitanga umwuka mwiza na ibindi byinshi binogera ijisho rya abawugezemo .
Abawugenda bakoresha uburyo butandukanye butuma babasha kwirebera ibyiza biwugize , hari abagenda na amaguru cyangwa abakoresha imodoka zabo biterwa na icyo bashimye .
Mu gukomeza korohereza abatembera uyu Mujyi , Kigali City Tour yazanye imodoka nini zifasha abantu kureba no kumenya neza Umujyi wa Kigali batavunitse .
Iyi modoka nini ikoze mu buryo bugeretse ku buryo ushaka kurebera Kigali ahirengeye ayibona ndetse no hasi akayibona , ikaba ikora ingendo zitandukanye buri munsi mu Mujyi wa Kigali .
Iyi modoka ihagurukira kuri Kigali Arena ikazenguruka hirya no hino mu duce two muri Kigali nka Kimironko , Kibagabaga , Rebero , mu mujyi rwa gati no mu tundi duce twa umujyi .
Abashaka gutembera bashobora kugenda mu modoka ya mu gitondo cyangwa ihaguruka nyuma ya saa Sita , bakagenda basobanurirwa byinshi kuri Kigali buri wese yishyuye ibihumbi 10frw gusa akaza no guhabwa ibyo kurya .
Akarusho kandi na uko abashaka gutegura ibirori kandi banagenda bashobora kwishyira hamwe iyi modoka ikabatembereza bari no kwishimisha mu birori byabo .
Ushinzwe guteza imbere ubucuruzi muri Kigali City Tour , Hassan Yakubu Mapesa , yavuze ko izi modoka zazanywe mu Mujyi wa Kigali mu gufasha abashaka kuwumenya ndetse no guteza imbere ubukerarugendo butandukanye ku buryo abantu bishimisha mu buryo butandukanye .
Ati " " " " Izi modoka zifasha abantu kumenya Kigali ndetse no gusobanukirwa amateka yayo , ku buryo umuntu wakoze urugendo ataha yamenye byinshi kandi yanishimye yafashe amafoto meza na ibindi byinshi byiza yabibonye . " " " "
Si abo mu Mujyi wa Kigali gusa kuko ushaka kwishimana na abawe mushobora kwishyira hamwe ku buryo babatembereza aho mushaka hose mu gihugu .
Mantis uBuranga , ubwato bwa akataraboneka buzakora nka hotel mu Kivu bugiye gutahwa .
Ubu bwato bwiswe Mantis Kivu Queen uBuranga byari biteganyijwe ko buzatangira gukora mu kwezi kwa Kane uyu mwaka , ariko kubera imbogamizi zitandukanye zatewe na icyorezo cya Covid - 19 , imirimo yo kubaka yagiye idindira .
Umuyobozi uhagarariye ibikorwa bya Mantis mu Rwanda , Dino Urbani , yabwiye IGIHE ko bataramenya neza igihe buzarangirira ariko bateganya ko buzatangira gukoreshwa mu kwezi kwa Karindwi .
Ati " " " " Ntituramenya neza igihe ubwato buzaba bwarangiye , bityo sinakubwira ngo ni iyi tariki , cyangwa ni uku kwezi [ . . . ] gusa turifuza ko mu kwezi kwa Karindwi bwaba bwarangiye . " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko nyuma ya ukwezi na igice ni ukuvuga mu mpera za Werurwe , hazaba hamenyekanye igihe nyacyo buzaba bwarangiye .
Ibikoresho byo kubaka ubu bwato bituruka muri Afurika ya Epfo bigateranyirizwa mu Rwanda .
Dino yakomeje agira ati " " " " Twahuye na imbogamizi nyinshi , kubera Covid - 19 ibintu byose byarafunze , nta kintu cyavaga mu gihugu kimwe kijya mu kindi [ . . . ] imvura nyinshi yaraguye muri Kibuye abantu ntibabona uko bakora bituma ibikorwa bitinda . " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko uretse izo mbogamizi bahuye nazo , ibikorwa byo kubaka byasubukuwe ndetse ko hari gutegurwa aho ubwato buzakorera , kandi ko hari gushyirwamo imbaraga nyinshi kugira ngo burangire .
Mantis Kivu Queen uBuranga ni ubwato buzaba bufite ibyumba bigezweho ( cabin ) icumi , kimwe gishobora kwakira abantu bo ku rwego rwo rwa abakuru ba ibihugu na ikindi cya abanyacyubahiro basanzwe .
Buri cyumba kizaba kirimo ikintu cyose umuntu yakenera , nka uko nyine yaba ari muri Hotel , ni ukuvuga ubwiherero na ubwogero , ibyuma bitanga ubushyuhe na ubukonje , televiziyo , restaurant , bar , na ibindi bitandukanye .
Ubu bwato buri kubakwa na sosiyete yo muri Afurika ya Epfo yitwa AfriNest , imikorere yabwo ikazagenzurwa na Mantis izobereye mu gucunga amahoteli .
Mantis isanzwe ifite hotel mu Rwanda mu Karere ka Rusizi nayo yo ku rwego rwo hejuru .
Yitwa Mantis Kivu Marina Bay , ifite ibyumba 79 birimo kimwe gishobora kwakira nka Umukuru wa Igihugu .
Ubushobozi bwo kwitunga bwa Pariki ya Akagera bwaragabanyutse cyane kubera Covid - 19 .
Imibare yatangajwe na iyi Pariki igaragaza ko mu 2019 yasuwe na abakerarugendo barenga 50 000 , mu gihe mu 2020 yasuwe na abagera ku 15 844 gusa , ni ukuvuga ko bagabanutseho 68 % .
Ushinzwe Ubukerarugendo na Imenyekanishabikorwa muri Pariki ya Igihugu ya Akagera , Karinganire Jean Paul yabwiye IGIHE ko kimwe na izindi nzego zose , urwego rwa ubukerarugendo narwo rwagizweho ingaruka cyane na icyorezo cya COVID - 19 , bikaba byaratumye amafaranga ava mu bukerarugendo yinjizwaga na pariki ya Akagera
agabanuka cyane .
Yagize ati " " " " Ugereranyije ukwezi na Mutarama 2020 na ukwezi kwa Mutarama 2021 , harimo ikinyuranyo kinini cyane cya igabanuka , bitewe na none na uko abakerarugendo batakigenda nka uko bagendaga COVID itaraza na ubundi haracyariho COVID - 19 , ibihugu byinshi byo mu Burayi byashyizeho Guma mu rugo , abaturage babyo ntabwo
babasha gutembera nka uko batemberaga . " " " "
Kuva muri Werurwe 2020 COVID - 19 igeze mu Rwanda , ibikorwa bya ubukerarugendo byahise bihagarikwa , byongera gusubukurwa muri Kamena ubwo abantu bari bavuye muri Guma mu rugo .
Karinganire yavuze ko na ubwo ibikorwa bya ubukerarugendo byongeye gufungura , hakiri ikibazo cya uko ibintu bitarasubira mu buryo , kuko ahenshi hakiri ingamba zo kwirinda zituma bidashoboka ko baza mu gihugu ku mpamvu za ubukerarugendo .
Yagize ati " " " " Ingaruka za COVID - 19 na ubundi ziracyariho uko ibihugu biracyafunze , na ubwo ubukerarugendo bufunguye .
Abanyarwanda baraza , abanyamahanga batuye mu Rwanda baraza , ariko abanyamahanga bava mu mahanga bazanywe na ubukerarugendo baragabanutse na ubundi kubera Coronavirus . " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko mu mibare ya abantu nta gihinduka cyane , ariko amafaranga ya pariki ava mu bukerarugendo ngo yo ariyongera , kuko nka ayinjiye muri Mutarama uyu mwaka aruta ayinjiye muri Kamena na Nyakanga ndetse na Kamena 2020 , mu gihe mu Ukuboza ari bwo hinjiye menshi kuko mu Rwanda hari hafunguye na abantu bashobora gutembera bisanzwe .
Pariki ya Akagera mu Ukuboza yinjije arenga miliyoni 120 Frw , mu gihe muri Mutarama yinjije arenga miliyoni 100 Frw .
Karinganire yavuze ko ingaruka za COVID - 19 kuri Pariki ya Akagera ari nyinshi cyane , kuko nka umwaka wa 2019 yabashaga kwibonamo ubushobozi bungana na 90 % ikaba yari ifite intego yo kugera ku kigero cya 100 % ariko bigakomwa mu nkokora na icyorezo , kuko kuri ubu ngo byasubiye inyuma bari ku kigero cya 34 % gusa .
Yavuze ko mu rwego rwo kurushaho guhangana na izi ngaruka zatewe na icyorezo bashyizeho poromosiyo ku Banyarwanda na abandi banyamahanga baba mu Rwanda bifuza gusura pariki ya Akagera , aho bagabanyirijwe ibiciro byo kurara mu macumbi ( lodge ) agenzurwa na iyi pariki ari yo ya Ruzizi na Karenge .
Kuri ubu ngo kurara muri rimwe muri ayo macumbi kuva ku ijoro rimwe kugera kuri atatu , ni 100 $ , mu gihe ngo mu bindi bihe byari 199 $ .
Na ubwo iyi pariki yahuye na ibizazane mu mwaka ushize , yabashije kugira umwanya wo kunoza uburyo bwo kurushaho kwita ku nyamaswa ziri muri iyo pariki .
Mu mwaka ushize inzovu eshanu na intare zambitswe utwuma dupima amerekezo ( GPS ) , ndetse na inkura icyenda zashyizwemo " " " " transmitters , " " " " ibyo byose ni mu rwego rwo kumenya aho izo nyamaswa ziherereye ndetse na uko zimeze mu rwego rwo kurushaho kuzitaho .
Mu mwaka ushize kandi muri iyi pariki hagaragaye ubwoko bushya bwa inyoni bwa " " " " Flamingo , " " " " Karinganire yavuze ko ari amahirwe bagize kuko ari zimwe mu nyoni ubundi zidakunda kuboneka .
Ati " " " " Ni ubwoko bwa inyoni buba budakunze kuhaza , izi rero flamingo ni imwe mu nyoni zidakunze kuba mu Akagera , iyo yaje iba yavuye nko muri Tanzania , iyo zibonetse biba ari amahirwe cyane , hari na izo tuba dufata ko zanarangiye , kuzibona rero ni amahirwe . " " " "
Pariki ya Igihugu ya Akagera ni imwe mu zujuje inyamaswa zisurwa cyane kuri uyu mugabane , nyuma yo gusubizwamo Inkura na Intare zari zarahacitse kubera ibikorwa bya muntu .
Ubu iyi pariki ibarizwamo inyamaswa zikomeye muri Afurika arizo Intare , Inzovu , Imbogo , Inkura na Ingwe .
Mu mwaka wa 2020 abasura Pariki ya Akagera bagabanutseho 68 %
Pariki ya Akagera ivuga ko iyi mibare itari yitezwe ariko kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyahungabanyije bikomeye uru rwego , bituma na abayisura bagabanuka .
Mu mwaka wa 2019 iyo pariki yari yasuwe na abakerarugendo 49 000 , yinjiza miliyoni 1 . 5 za amadolari .
Ubuyobozi bwa iyi pariki bwatangaje ko umwaka ushize nta bantu basuye pariki ngo bahamare igihe kinini nkuko byakorwaga mbere ndetse na abagiye bahaza , ntabwo bagiye bakoresha amafaranga menshi nkuko byahoze .
Pariki ya Igihugu ya Akagera ni imwe mu zujuje inyamaswa zisurwa cyane kuri uyu mugabane , nyuma yo gusubizwamo Inkura na Intare zari zarahacitse kubera ibikorwa bya muntu .
Ubu iyi pariki ibarizwamo inyamaswa zikomeye muri Afurika arizo Intare , Inzovu , Imbogo , Inkura na Ingwe .
Bisate Eco Lodge yashyizwe mu mahoteli 10 ya mbere ku Isi atangiza ibidukikije .
Uru rutonde rwakozwe na Urubuga Elite Traveler , rwandika amakuru arebana na ibintu bihenze kandi bigezweho , ubukerarugendo na ibindi , rugaragaraho hoteli nziza kandi zigezweho hagendewe kuri buri mugabane .
Umugabane wa Afurika ufitemo hoteli ebyiri zirimo Bisate Eco Lodge yo mu Majyaruguru ya u Rwanda ndetse na Grootbos Private Nature Reserve yo muri Afurika ya Epfo .
Urubuga Elite Traveler ruvuga ko rwakoze uru rutonde mu rwego rwo gufasha ba mukerarugendo guhitamo aho bashobora kuruhukira hajyanye na igihe kandi hatangiza ibidukikije .
Imiterere ya Bisate Lodge ituma ba mukerarugendo bizihirwa no kuharara .
Ni hoteli iri mu rwego rwa hoteli za inyenyeri eshanu yatashywe ku mugaragaro na Perezida Paul Kagame ku wa 1 Nzeri 2017 .
Kuva iki gihe Bisate Eco Lodge yatangiye kwirahirwa na abatari bacye barimo icyamamare mu mukino wa Tennis , Maria Sharapova wayirayemo igihe yasuraga u Rwanda mu 2019 .
Iyi hoteli yubatswe hagendewe ku muco Nyarwanda kuko uwayikoreye inyigo yagendeye ku buhanga bwa imyubakire gakondo ndetse na ibirunga bya u Rwanda .
Igizwe na inzu za ibyatsi esheshatu , buri yose ifite ishusho ya kimwe mu birunga byo mu Rwanda ikaba ahitegeye ku gasozi keza kari mu ishyamba , ku buryo uburanga bwa imisozi iyikikije na ikirere bituma uhari yumva umwihariko waho .
Uretse kuba ifite ishusho ya ibirunga nka Bisoke , Mikeno na Kalisimbi , urebye Bisate Lodge uhita kandi uyibonamo ishusho ya ingoro ya Umwami yo mu Rukari i Nyanza .
Urwego rwa Igihugu rushinzwe Iterambere ( RDB ) ruvuga ko kuba mu Rwanda harafunguwe Bisate Eco Lodge ari ikimenyetso ko umuhate wa igihugu mu kubungabunga ibikorwa bikurura ba mukerarugendo , amabwiriza yorohereza ishoramari ndetse na politiki iharanira impinduka nziza byatangiye gutanga umusaruro .
Kuba kandi iyi hoteli igenewe kwakira ba mukerarugendo bo ku rwego rwo hejuru bifuza kugirira ibihe byiza muri Pariki ya Ibirunga , ihorana abashyitsi bishyura amafaranga abarirwa muri miliyoni imwe ya amafaranga ya u Rwanda , bishimangira ko hari byinshi byisumbuye igihugu cyasangiza abaturutse mu mahanga .
Uretse Bisate Eco Lodge , u Rwanda rufite na izindi hoteli zubatswe mu buryo bugabanya ingaruka mbi ku bidukikije zigera ku 10 zirimo nka Inzu Logde iri mu Karere ka Rubavu , intego akaba ari ukubaka izindi nyinshi .
Urutonde rwa Elite Traveler rugaragaraho izindi hoteli zifite umwihariko wo kutangiza ibidukikije nka Pikaia Lodge yo mu Birwa bya Gal á pagos , Habitas Tulum yo muri Mexique , Whitepod yo mu Busuwisi , Borgo Pignano yo mu Butaliyani , Song Saa Private Island Resort yo muri Cambodia , Soneva Fushi yo muri Maldives na Kokomo Private Island yo muri Fiji .
Amabwiriza mashya ku basura pariki za u Rwanda na ahantu nyaburanga .
Kuva kuwa Kabiri tariki ya 19 Mutarama 2021 , Umujyi wa Kigali washyizwe muri gahunda ya Guma mu Rugo ya iminsi 15 nyuma ya uko ubwandu bwa Coronavirus bukajije intera mu gihugu no muri uyu mujyi bya umwihariko .
Icyo gihe Inama ya Abaminisitiri yatangaje ko usibye serivisi za ingenzi zizakomeza gukora , izindi zizafunga aho bishoboka abantu bagakorera mu ngo .
Iki cyemezo cyaje gisanga ikindi cyari cyafatiwe mu yabanje cyahagarikaga ingendo zihuza Umujyi wa Kigali na Intara .
Mu rwego rwo kubahiriza imyanzuro ya iyi nama , kuri uyu wa Gatatu RDB yashyize ahagaragara amabwiriza arebana na ibikorwa bya ubukerarugendo azakomeza kubahirizwa mu gihe hategerejwe izindi ngamba zizagenda zifatwa na inzego zishinzwe ubuzima mu Rwanda .
Mu bikubiye muri ayo mabwiriza harimo ko ingendo zijyanye na ubukerarugendo zemewe mu Mujyi wa Kigali no hagati ya Kigali na izindi Ntara na Uturere , hubahirizwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID - 19 .
Harimo kandi ko abagenzi bose , baba abinjira cyangwa abasohoka mu gihugu bagomba kugaragaza icyemezo cya uko bapimwe COVID - 19 hifashishijwe uburyo bwihuse bwa RT - PCR mu masaha atarenze 120 , mbere yo kuza cyangwa kugenda kandi abaganga bakaba barasanze batayirwaye .
Andi mabwiriza
Hoteli zakira abaturutse mu mahanga bya igihe gito zizakomeza gukora hubahirizwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID - 19 .
Ibikorwa bya ubukerarugendo , harimo no gusura Pariki za Igihugu , ingoro ndangamurage , ahantu nyaburanga ho gutembera ndetse no gusura imijyi bizakomeza mu gihugu hose , haba ku banyamahanga cyangwa abatuye mu gihugu , mu buryo bwubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID - 19 .
Abatanga serivisi zifasha ba mukerarugendo basabwa kumenyesha RDB gahunda zabo ndetse na inzira bateganya kunyura .
Abagenzi ubariyemo na abashoferi , basabwa kuzuza inyandiko isaba urushushya rwa inzira bagashyiraho kopi za ibyemezo bya uko bipimishije COVID - 19 kandi batayirwaye , bakabyohereza hasigaye nibura amasaha 24 ngo batangire urugendo .
Ibigo bya ubukerarugendo bisabwa gusabira abakozi babyo uruhushya rwa inzira byuzuza buri cyumweru .
Hoteli zemerewe kwakira gusa inama za ngombwa , zibanje kubihererwa uruhushya rwanditse na RDB .
RDB , yongeye kwibutsa abantu bose ko bagomba kubahiriza amabwiriza ya isuku no kwirinda yatanzwe na Minisiteri ya Ubuzima hagamijwe kurwanya ikwirakwira rya icyorezo cya COVID - 19 .
Kuva ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020 ubwo umurwayi wa mbere yabonekaga mu Rwanda hamaze gufatwa ibipimo bya Coronavirus 804 337 , byasanzwemo 11 548 banduye .
Muri bo 7580 barasezerewe nyuma bikemezwa ko nta bwandu bagifite mu mibiri yabo mu gihe 3820 bakiri kwitabwaho , abapfuye ni 148 .
Umunara nka uwa Eiffel i Kigali : Umushinga mushya u Rwanda rweretswe wakongera ubukerarugendo .
Ni umunara wa metero 200 yagaragaje ko waba wihariye umwimerere Nyarwanda kuko ugaragaramo imirya ya inanga , ukaba wajyamo utubari , restaurants , inzu ndangamateka , indebakure ( Jumelles ) na ibindi .
Umunara wa Eiffel umwe mu miremire ku Isi , ufite metero 300 za uburebure .
Uwo mu Rwanda uramutse wubatswe waba uwugwa mu ntege .
Icyo gitekerezo kiramutse cyemewe , nyira umushinga agaragaza ko byakongerera u Rwanda kuba igicumbi cya ubukerarugendo muri Afurika , amafaranga rwinjiza akiyongera .
Didier Gakuba ni inshuti ya uwo munyamahanga utifuje ko amazina ye atangazwa umushinga we utaremerwa dore ko we icyo atanga ari icyo gitekerezo na igishushanyo , hagashakwa abashoramari .
Gakuba ni na we watangaje bwa mbere kuri Twitter amafoto agaragaza igishushanyo mbonera cya uwo munara , asaba abayobozi mu Rwanda gusesengura niba uwo mushinga ushoboka .
Mu butumwa buherekejwe na amafoto , Gakuba yagize ati " " " " Muraho bayobozi bacu .
Inshuti yanjye yakoze iki gishushanyo kiri mu bwoko bwa Umunara wa Eiffel .
Yifuzaga ko gishyirwa kuri Mont Kigali kuko gifite metero 200 , kikaba kijyamo restaurants , utubari na indebakure .
Iki gitekerezo murakibona gute ?
Ese abashoramari babyinjiramo nka umushinga wa ubukerarugendo ? " " " "
Meya wa Umujyi wa Kigali ni umwe mu bayobozi bahise basubiza kuri Twitter , bavuga ko igitekerezo ari cyiza , anatanga igihe cyo guhura na nyira umushinga ngo baganire .
Yagize ati " " " " Umwaka mushya Didier Gakuba .
Bwira iyo nshuti yawe ko byaba byiza tuganiriye birambuye kuri uyu mushinga .
Ese yaba ari hafi ngo dupange uko twahura mu cyumweru gitaha ? . " " " "
Meya wa Umujyi wa Kigali ni umwe mu bayobozi bahise basubiza kuri Twitter , bavuga ko igitekerezo ari cyiza , anatanga igihe cyo guhura na nyira umushinga ngo baganire .
Yagize ati " " " " Umwaka mushya Didier Gakuba .
Bwira iyo nshuti yawe ko byaba byiza tuganiriye birambuye kuri uyu mushinga .
Ese yaba ari hafi ngo dupange uko twahura mu cyumweru gitaha ? " " " "
Ubukerarugendo butavugwa bushingiye ku buhinzi i Nyamasheke .
Abakorana na bamukerarugendo mu karere ka Nyamasheke barashishikariza abantu gusura ibikorwa bya ubukerarugendo bishingiye ku ubuhinzi .
Ibi babigarutseho mu rugendo rwa iminsi ibiri bakoze basura ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku mateka na ibihingwa birimo ubuhinzi bwa icyayi mu karere ka Nyamasheke .
Ni urugendo rwari rugamije kumenyekanisha ibikorwa bya ubukerarugendo bishingiye ku muco na amateka ya abantu birimo na ubushingiye ku buhunzi .
Nyuma yo gusura bimwe mu bikorwa birimo ubuhinzi bwa icyayi cya Gisakura na uruganda rugitunganya biherereye mu murenge wa Bushekeri , babwiye IGIHE ko usanga abantu bakunze gusura za pariki za inyamanswa , ibiyaga , imigezi ariko ugasanga badasura ibikorwa bya ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku buhinzi .
Rugero Jeannette uherekeza ba mukerarugendo yagize ati " " " " Ntabwo baragira amakuru yimbitse ku gusura ubuhinzi , nashishikariza buri wese gusura ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku bihingwa .
Urugero abantu benshi banywa icyayi batazi uko gitunganywa , gihingwa gute .
Abenshi babisura ni abanyamahanga . " " " "
Kamugisha Kirenga yunzemo ati " " " " Ntabwo abantu bafite amakuru ahagije , bayafite bajya babishyira muri gahunda zabo bakamenya ko nibagera hano bazajya gusura inganda za icyayi , imirima ya icyayi , uko basoroma ndetse akaba yanasoma kuri icyo cyayi .
Ni ukutabimenyekanisha , hari ibindi byinshi bitamenyekana harimo icyayi kuko abenshi bazi icyayi ku meza .
Bipfira mu kumenyekanisha . " " " "
Karangwa Anaclet uhagarariye Ivomo , umuryango uteza imbere ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku umuco na abaturage yavuze ko abantu benshi bazi ko ubukerarugendo ari parike na hoteli kandi hari na ubundi bwafasha abantu .
Ati " " " " Hari ikintu cyagiye kijya mu bantu kumva ko ubukerarugendo ari amaparike na za hoteli ariko hari ibintu byinshi byakorwamo ubukerarugendo .
Bakeneye kuza kureba umuturage ahinga gute , nka ibi twajemo bya icyayi biri mu buzima bwo guhinga .
Hari abantu rero bishimira kugenda muri kiriya cyayi gisa neza , akareba uburyo bagisoroma . " " " "
Mu karere ka Nyamasheke , ni hamwe mu hantu hari ibikorwa bya ubukerarugendo birimo ishyamba rya Nyungwe , ikiyaga cya Kivu ndetse na ubuhinzi bwa icyayi na amateka .
Aba bakora mu bikorwa bya ubukerarugendo bakaba biyemeje kuzamura imyumvire ku bukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco , ubuhinzi na abantu .
Abashoramari ba i Rusizi beretswe amahirwe bakwiye kubyaza umusaruro .
Mu nama yahuje abayobozi muri RDB na abashoramari bo muri Rusizi , bagaragaje ko hari amahirwe yo kwihutisha ishoramari batari bazi ko ari muri aka karere .
Umuyobozi ukuriye Ishami rya Ishoramari muri RBD , Lucky Philip , yagaragaje ko abashoramari bafite amahirwe yo kubakiraho babyaza umusaruro .
Mbere ya uko Isi yibasirwa na Coronavirus yatumye hafatwa ingamba zitandukanye zirimo no guhagarika ingendo zihuza ibihugu , imipaka ya Rusizi ya I na iya II , na uwa Bugarama yanyurwagaho na Abanyarwanda na Abanye - Congo mu ngendo za ubucuruzi .
Rusizi ifite abashoramari banini 65 bahafite amahoteli na ibindi bikorwa binini ariko hari ibicuruzwa byinshi bigitumizwa mu Mujyi wa Kigali , bigatuma bihagera bihenze cyane .
Abitegereza Akarere ka Rusizi bakabona nka zahabu ikiri mu gitaka kuko katarabyazwa umusaruro mu buryo bugaragara ukurikije ko gafite na isoko utasanga ahandi rya abaturanyi ba i Bukavu muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo batuma kagira isoko ryagutse rya ibicuruzwa bitandukanye .
Abashoramari bo muri Rusizi beretswe ko hari amahirwe batarabyaza umusaruro kuko nko mu cyanya cyahariwe inganda kugeza ubu hamaze kugeramo rumwe gusa .
Ikiyaga cya Kivu uretse kugishakiramo isambaza na zo ubu zisigaye zarabuze , nta kindi kintu kigaragara abagituriye bagikesha nyamara , abazi ibya ubukerarugendo bakibonamo imari ikomeye .
Izi ngingo kimwe na izindi ziri mu zo abashoramari bo mu Karere ka Rusizi beretswe nka izo bakeneye kubyaza umusaruro .
Umujyi wa Rusizi ni umwe muri itandatu yunganira uwa Kigali muri gahunda ya Leta ya u Rwanda ya uko 35 % bya Abanyarwanda bazaba batuye mu mijyi bitarenze 2020 .
Teddy Riley yasazwe na ibyishimo ubwo yasuraga ingagi mu Birunga .
Uyu mugabo wa umunyabigwi muri muzika , agiye kumara icyumweru mu Rwanda mu rugendo rwe bwite ariko byitezwe ko rushobora gushibukamo imikoranire yo mu yindi sura .
Amashusho yashyizwe ku rukuta rwa Twitter rwa Visit Rwanda , amugaragaza ari mu Birunga yagiye gusura ingagi , ndetse asangiza abantu ibyishimo afite .
