Yasuye umuryango wa Kwitonda , abona uburyo izi nyamaswa zifite imiterere igiye kumera nka iy umuntu na ibindi .
Ku rukura rwe rwa Instagram naho yasangije abamukurikira amashusho ya umwana usa na uri ahantu mu cyumba uri kubyina , avuga ko yishimiye kuba ari mu Amakaro ( hotel ya akataraboneka iri hafi ya Pariki ya Ibirunga ) , avuga ko ari ahantu bakirana ababagana urugwiro ha mbere yabonye mu buzima bwe .
Teddy Riley wageze mu Rwanda ku wa Gatandatu tariki 5 Ukuboza akabanza gushyirwa mu kato kugira ngo apimwe Covid - 19 , ku wa Mbere tariki 7 Ukuboza yasuye Urwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi rwa Kigali ku Gisozi , anunamira inzirakarengane ziharuhukiye .
Nyuma yasuye ishuri rya muzika rya Nyundo aganira na abanyeshuri baho ndetse abemerera kuzagaruka azanye na inshuti ze bakareba impano ziri mu Rwanda .
Yagiranye ibiganiro kandi na abakora mu ruganda rwa imyidagaduro mu Rwanda anasura inzu ihanga imideli ya House of Tayo .
Abandi ba mukerarugendo bo muri Israel basuye u Rwanda .
Ahagana saa sita kuri uyu wa Kane nibwo iyi ndege yageze i Kigali .
Ambasaderi wa Israel mu Rwanda , Ron Adam , niwe watangaje ko aba ba mukerarugendo bageze mu Rwanda , baje " " " " kureba ibyiza " " " " birutatse .
Baje nyuma ya aho mu mpera za Ugushyingo Sosiyete ya Israel itwara abantu na ibintu mu kirere , Israir , yatangizaga ingendo zayo mu Rwanda za buri cyumweru itwaye ba mukerarugendo 80 .
Mu Ugushyingo Israir yari yatangaje ko izatangira gukora ingendo rimwe mu cyumweru uhereye kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 26 Ugushyingo , aho ikiguzi cyo kugera i Kigali uvuye muri Israel ari amadolari 399 , ni ukuvuga hafi ibihumbi 400 Frw .
U Rwanda na Israël byatangiye imibanire mu 1962 ubwo u Rwanda rwabonaga ubwigenge .
Uyu mubano waje gusa na uhagarara kubera Jenoside u Rwanda rwaciyemo na ibibazo byayikurikiye , ariko urasubukurwa ku buryo rufite ambasade ifite icyicaro i Tel Aviv guhera mu 2015 .
Tariki ya 1 Gicurasi 2019 nibwo Israel yafunguye Ambasade yayo mu Rwanda ; nibwo bwa mbere iki gihugu cyagize Ambasaderi [ Ron Adam ] , ugihagarariye i Kigali kuva mu myaka 50 ishize .
Yafunguwe nyuma ya uko muri Nzeri 2018 , Perezida Kagame na Minisitiri wa Intebe wa Israël , Benjamin Netanyahu , bemeranyije kubaka umusingi uhamye wa umubano mu bya dipolomasi na ubukungu ushingiye ku kugira za ambasade mu bihugu byombi .
Ku wa 25 Kamena 2019 nibwo indege ya Sosiyete Nyarwanda ikora ingendo zo mu kirere , RwandAir , yageze i Tel Aviv muri Israel .
Ni igikorwa cyazamuye amahirwe ya ubukerarugendo , ubucuruzi na ishoramari ku bihugu byombi ndetse abakora ingendo za gihanuzi boroherwa no kugana i Yerusalemu .
Forest of Hope Guest House and Camp Site yafunguye imiryango muri Pariki ya Gishwati - Mukura .
Forest of Hope Guest House and Camp Site yashyizweho na Forest of Hope Association ( FHA ) isanzwe ibungabunga Ishyamba rya Gishwati ifatanyije na Urwego rwa Igihugu rwa Iterambere ( RDB ) .
Ba mukerarugendo bazacumbikirwa mu nyubako yabugenewe ndetse no mu ihema ryubatswe mu buryo bugezweho mbere cyangwa nyuma yo gutambagizwa muri Pariki ya Gishwati - Mukura bitegereza ibyiza biyitatse .
Iyi nyubako ifite ibyumba bibiri bishobora kwakira abantu bane , bahabwa serivisi zose bakenera zirimo amafunguro atatu ku munsi , aherekejwe na ikinyobwa kidasembuye .
Ihema ryubatswe hafi ya Pariki ya Gishwati - Mukura ryo rishobora gukambikwamo nibura na abantu umunani .
Ba mukerarugendo basura iyi pariki bazoroherwa no kubona ibimera gakondo na ubwoko bwa inyamaswa zinyuranye ziganjemo inkende na impundu ( chimpanzee ) na inkima ( golden monkey ) , inyoni na izindi nyamaswa nto zinyuranye .
Mu rwego rwo gukomeza kubungabunga urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima ndetse na ibidukikije , buri mukerarugendo uhasura azajya asabwa gutera igiti .
Umuhuzabikorwa wa FHA , Thierry Aimable Inzirayineza , yavuze ko biteguye kwakira ba mukerarugendo ba mbere muri Forest of Hope Guest House and Camp Site .
Yagize ati " " " " Turi gukorana na Wilderness Safaris mu bijyanye no kubungabunga urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima no guteza imbere umuryango , twita ku gukurikirana inguge , gutanga uburezi ndetse tuzabisangira na abashyitsi bacu .
" " " " Forest of Hope Association yishimira umubano twubatse na abafatanyabikorwa bacu muri sosiyete mu myaka ishize ndetse imyumvire ihuriweho ku gaciro ko kurinda no kubungabunga Gishwati yatumye tugera kuri iyi ntambwe yo kuyibyaza umusaruro mu buryo burimo no gukurura ba mukerarugendo . " " " " " " " "
Umuyobozi wa Ishami rya Ubukerarugendo muri RDB , Belise Kariza , yashimangiye ko Forest of Hope Guest House and Camp Site ari inyongera ku bikorwa remezo byakirirwamo ba mukerarugendo , bituma bishimira serivisi zinoze bahabwa .
Yakomeje ati " " " " Ndashimira Forest of Hope Association na Wilderness Safaris ku kongera imbaraga muri gahunda ya u Rwanda yo kuba igicumbi cya ba mukerarugendo giha agaciro , kikanarinda umutungo wacu kamere . " " " " " " " "
RDB iheruka gutangaza ko Pariki ya Gishwati - Mukura iherutse no gushyirwa mu murage wa Isi na Ishami rya Umuryango Mpuzamahanga ryita ku Burezi na Umuco ( UNESCO ) , igomba gutangira kwakira abakerarugendo mu Ukuboza 2020 .
Iyi ntambwe ni irindi tafari ryiyongereye mu rugendo u Rwanda rufite rwo kongera amafaranga rukura mu bukerarugendo , ku buryo mu 2024 , ruzaba rwinjiza miliyoni $ 800 ku mwaka avuye kuri miliyoni 438 $ mu 2017 .
Mu 2014 nibwo u Rwanda rwakiriye miliyoni 9 , 5 $ agamije kurufasha gutunganya neza ishyamba rya Gishwati - Mukura , yavuye mu Kigo Mpuzamahanga cyita ku Bidukikije , kibinyujije muri Banki ya Isi .
Muri Gashyantare 2016 nibwo ishyamba cyimeza rya Gishwati - Mukura riherereye mu ruhererekane rwa Imisozi ya isunzu rya Congo - Nil , ryemejwe nka Pariki ya Igihugu ya kane , yitezweho gutanga umusanzu mu kwinjiza amadevize binyuze mu bukerarugendo na izindi nyungu zituruka ku bidukikije .
Iyi pariki iherereye mu Turere twa Rutsiro na Ngororero mu Ntara ya i Burengerazuba bwa igihugu , ingana na hegitari 3 558 , harimo icyanya cya Gishwati gifite ubuso bungana na hegitari 1 570 , na icya Mukura kingana na hegitari 1 988 .
Ayo mashyamba azwimo ibimera gakondo na ubwoko bwa inyamaswa zinyuranye ziganjemo inkende na impundu na inkima , amoko arenga 130 ya inyoni , harimo 15 aboneka muri iyi pariki gusa , na izindi nyamaswa nto zinyuranye .
Ni pariki yabashije kubaho kubera uruhare rwa leta na abaturage , kuko nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yari yakendereye , ituzwamo abaturage ndetse ibindi bikorwa byabo birushaho kuyangiza .
Mu 2009 nibwo yatangiye kubungabungwa no gusubiranywa , ngo yongere ibe igicumbi cya urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima .
Muri Mata 2019 , RDB yagiranye amasezerano ya imyaka 25 na Ikigo Imizi Eco - Tourism Development Ltd yo gutunganya no gucunga Pariki ya Igihugu ya Gishwati - Mukura , ku buryo ihinduka igice gikorerwamo ubukerarugendo .
Bigiye kwikuba kabiri : Menya impinduka nshya mu biciro byo gusura Pariki ya Igihugu ya Akagera .
Mu ihame rya ubucuruzi busanzwe , uko ugira abakiliya benshi niko utera imbere kurushaho , ariko iryo kurengera ibidukikije ribivuga ukundi , kuko iyo abantu babaye benshi cyane , ibihombo biba byinshi .
Imibare igaragaza ko nko mu mwaka wa 2010 , Pariki ya Igihugu ya Akagera yasurwaga na abantu bagera mu 15 , 000 ku mwaka , kugeza mu 2019 barazamuka cyane kuko bageze hafi ku 50 . 000 .
Ubuyobozi bwa iyi pariki buheruka kumenyesha abafatanyabikorwa bayo ko bijyanye no kuba ba mukerarugendo benshi bayisura mu mezi ane ya umwaka , hari igihe yarenzaga ubushobozi ifite bwo kubakira , kandi bifite ingaruka mbi kuri pariki na abayisura .
Yakomeje iti " " " " Bumwe mu buryo bwo kugabanya iri zamuka na ingaruka rigira kuri pariki , kandi hagakomeza kuboneka ubushobozi bukenewe mu gucunga pariki , ni mu kugena ibiciro . " " " "
" " " " Uburyo bushya bwo kugena ibiciro bigamije gushishikariza abantu kuhamara igihe kirekire , ikintu dukeneye kongeramo imbaraga kandi twanabonye cyane muri iki gihe cyo kuzahura ubukerarugendo bwa imbere mu gihugu . " " " "
Ibiciro byakubwe akarenga kabiri
Mu mpinduka zikomeye zakozwe , harimo kongera igiciro cyo kwinjira muri pariki , ariko bikagenda bigabanywa igihe umuntu ahamaze ijoro rya kabiri na irya gatatu .
Bibarwa ko nta kiguzi cya inyongera umuntu azajya asabwa kuva ku ijoro rya 4 - 7 , bizaba nka inyongezo ya pariki .
Mu byiciro bishya kandi hashyizwemo igiciro cyo kuba indege yagwa hagati muri Pariki , aho umuntu yishyuzwa $ 50 .
Mu biciro bizatangira kubahirizwa guhera ku wa 15 Mutarama 2021 , bigaragara ko Umunyarwanda cyangwa umuturage wo muri kimwe mu bihugu bigize Umuryango wa Afurika ya Iburasirazuba ( EAC ) wishyuraga $ 7 . 50 cyangwa 6 , 500 Frw nka ikiguzi cyo kwinjira muri Pariki ,
azaba yishyura 16 $ cyangwa 15 , 000 Frw ku munsi cyangwa ijoro rimwe .
Mu gihe mbere habarwaga gusa igiciro cya umunsi ukwawo , ubu umuntu namara amajoro abiri muri iyi pariki azishyura 24 $ cyangwa 22 , 500 Frw , amajoro naba atatu yishyure 30 , 000 Frw yo kwinjira gusa .
Naho umunyamahanga ubusanzwe winjiraga yishyuye 50 $ , guhera muri Mutarama 2021 azaba yishyura 100 $ , ku majoro abiri yishyure $ 150 , mu gihe kuri atatu azishyura $ 200 .
Mu biciro byashyiriweho abana , abafite munsi ya imyaka itanu ntabwo bazajya bishyuzwa .
Ku bayirengeje ariko nabo ibiciro bizazamuka .
Abana bafite imyaka 6 - 12 bo mu Rwanda na EAC bishyuraga $ 4 ( 3 , 500 Frw ) , bazajya bishyura $ 11 ( 10 , 000 Frw ) .
Ku majoro abiri igiciro kizaba $ 16 ( 15 , 000 Frw ) naho ku majoro atatu kibe $ 21 ( 20 , 000 Frw ) .
Uretse igiciro gitangwa ku muntu , no ku gitangwa ku winjije imodoka nacyo hazabamo impinduka .
Imodoka nto ya inyarwanda cyangwa yanditswe muri EAC yishyuzwaga $ 12 ( 10 , 000 Frw ) azaba $ 10 , naho zimwe nini zitwara ba mukerarugendo zishyuzwaga $ 24 ( 20 . 000 Frw ) , yagabanyijwe aba $ 20 .
Ku modoka nto na inini zo hanze ya EAC zo ntibyahindutse , ni $ 40 na $ 100 nka uko bikurikirana .
Impinduka ku matsinda na abishyura umwaka wose
Mu buryo busanzwe , byateganywaga ko iyo abantu bishyize hamwe ari Abanyarwanda barenga 20 , bahitaga bagaranyirizwa 1500 Frw kuri buri muntu , maze bakishyura 5000 Frw kuri buri umwe winjiye muri Pariki ya Igihugu ya Akagera .
Mu buryo bushya guhera muri Mutarama 2021 , " " " " amatsinda ya Abanyarwanda bishyize hamwe basaga 20 bagabanyirizwaho 20 % ku giciro gisanzwe cyo kwinjira muri pariki ; 12 . 000 Frw ku muntu mukuru na 8000 Frw ku bana . " " " "
Mu mpinduka kandi harimo izamuka mu biciro bya umuntu wishyura gusura pariki mu mwaka wose .
Ku munyarwanda cyangwa umuturage wa EAC , umuntu ku giti cye yishyura 95 , 000 Frw ( nta cyahindutse ) , ariko ku bantu babiri yavuye 115 , 000 Frw agera ku 150 , 000 Frw ; naho ku muryango ava ku 150 , 000 Frw agera ku 205 , 000 Frw .
Ni mu gihe ku banyamahanga batuye mu Rwanda cyangwa muri EAC bo bishyuraga $ 250 ku muntu umwe , yabaye $ 300 .
Ku bantu babiri yari $ 400 yabaye $ 500 , mu gihe ku muryango wose yari $ 600 yabaye $ 700 .
Ku bantu bari baramaze kwishyura gusura Pariki mu mwaka utaha ntabwo bazishyuzwa andi mafaranga .
Ntabwo izi mpinduka ariko zageze ku biciro byo kurara ahantu nka Ruzizi Tented Lodge cyangwa Karenge Bush Camp .
Ni nka uko ibiciro byishyurwa abayobora ba mukerarugendo muri pariki bitahindutse , ni $ 25 ku gice cya umunsi na $ 40 ku munsi wose .
Pariki ya Igihugu ya Akagera ni intaho ya inyamaswa eshanu zikomeye kuri uyu mugabane , zirimo Intare , Inkura , Inzovu , Imbogo na Ingwe .
Ni na iwabo wa inyoni za amoko asaga 482 , ikanagira umwihariko ko uretse ibinyabuzima byo mu gasozi , iyi pariki inabamo ibinyabuzima byinshi byo mu mazi .
Ibyo wamenya ku ishyamba rya Ibanda - Makera rigiye kugirwa icyanya cya ubukerarugendo ( Amafoto ) .
Ni ishyamba ribarizwamo inyamanswa zirimo inkima , inkende , isatura , ingwe , amoko ya inyoni zitandukanye , isha na amoko menshi ya inzoka .
Habarizwamo kandi amoko 124 ya ibiti birimo na ibivura indwara zitandukanye .
Umugabo witwa Rugira Ananias yavuze ko muri iri shyamba mu myaka yo mu 1970 habagamo inyamanswa nyinshi zitandukanye zirimo imbogo , intare , inzovu na izindi .
Ngo zagiye zigenda bitewe na uburyo abantu baturaga hafi ya ishyamba bakazisagarira .
Umuhuzabikorwa wa umushinga ushinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije NAP ukorera muri REMA , Mugabo Fabrice , yatangaje ko Akarere ka Kirehe mu gihe iri shyamba ritaba ryitaweho rizagabanuka .
Ati " " " " Uko tutaryitaho rigenda rigabanuka ku buso , byagaragaye ko nitutaryitaho rizagabanuka kurushaho akamaro ryari rifitiye abaturage na igihugu muri rusange , niyo mpamvu REMA ifatanyije na abafatanyabikorwa habayeho ibikorwa byo kwita kuri iri shyamba aho ryashyizweho uruzitiro ruritandukanya na abaturage hakazanaterwamo ibiti
bishya byinshi hanongerwemo na ibindi byari bisanzwemo . " " " "
Mugabo yavuze ko abaturage barituriye bazahabwa ibiti birimo ibya imbuto na ibindi bisanzwe ndetse banafashwe mu bundi buryo burimo kubahuriza mu makoperative abakora ubuvumvu bahabwe inkunga , yavuze ko mu myaka ine leta igiye kurishoramo miliyoni 400 Frw .
Abaturage baturiye iri shyamba batangiye kubona inyungu
Rugina yavuze ko gutangira kurivugurura byatangiye kubafasha kuko bamwe mu baturage batangiye kuhabona akazi abandi basabwa kwibumbira mu makoperative kugira ngo bahabwe ubufasha .
Ati " " " " Abaturage benshi babonye akazi mu kurizitira abandi bakabona mu gukora imihanda itandukanya ishyamba na imirima , abandi basabwe kwibumbira mu makoperative kugira ngo bazabashe gufashwa bari hamwe . " " " "
Nikuze Clementine we yavuze biteguye kwakira abakerarugendo baza kurisura agasaba leta kubakorera umuhanda ukaba mwiza ndetse bakanagezwaho na amashanyarazi kugira ngo nabo bagire ibikorwa bya iterambere bakora .
REMA ivuga ko mu myaka ine iri shyamba rizaba rimaze kuvugururwa aho rizashorwamo miliyoni 400 Frw .
Iri mu biganiro na RDB bigamije kureba uko ryahindurwa ahantu nyaburanga ku buryo nyuma ya iyo myaka ine ryatangira gusurwa na ba mukerarugendo .
Ni ku nshuro ya mbere iyi kompanyi ikoreye urugendo mu Rwanda , gusa byitezwe ko izi ngendo zizakomeza kujya zikorwa buri Cyumweru .
Mu Ugushyingo , iyi sosiyete yari yatangaje ko izatangira gukora ingendo rimwe mu cyumweru uhereye kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 26 Ugushyingo , aho ikiguzi cyo kugera i Kigali uvuye muri Israel ari amadolari 399 , ni ukuvuga hafi ibihumbi 400 Frw .
Saa Munani nibwo iyi ndege yageze i Kigali itwaye ba mukerarugendo bari bakandagiye ku butaka bwa u Rwanda ku nshuro yabo ya mbere , ibyishimo byari byose ku bari bayirimo muri uru rugendo rwanditse amateka .
Abageze mu Rwanda , bagaragaje ko gusura u Rwanda ari ukwifatanya narwo nka ibihugu byombi bihuje amateka , kandi banyotewe no kubona ibyiza birutatse .
RwandAir yari isanzwe ikorera ingendo mu Mujyi wa Tel Aviv muri Israel gusa zahagaritswe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus , ndetse ntiharatangazwa itariki zizasubukurirwa .
Bivugwa ko iyi ndege ya Israel mu cyumweru gitaha nabwo izongera gukorera urugendo mu Rwanda , kuri iyo nshuro izaba itwaye ba mukerarugendo barenga 100 .
Sosiyete ya indege ya Israel igiye gukorera urugendo rwa mbere mu Rwanda .
Ku manywa yo kuri uyu wa Gatanu nibwo iyi ndege iza gusesekara ku Kibuga cya Indege Mpuzamahanga cya Kigali i Kanombe itwaye ba mukerarugendo 80 bagamije gutembera mu bice bitandukanye nyaburanga bya u Rwanda .
Ambasaderi wa Israel mu Rwanda , Ron Adam , yatangaje ko " " " " Israir iza kugera ku butaka bwiza bwa Kigali itwaye abakerarugendo 80 . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Murakaza neza . " " " "
Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE ni uko mu bari bukorere urwo rugendo mu Rwanda harimo na Minisitiri ushinzwe ibijyanye na indege ugomba kugirana ibiganiro na bagenzi be ba u Rwanda .
Ni ibiganiro bigamije ko iyi sosiyete yatangira gukorera mu Rwanda ingendo ziva i Kigali zerekeza i Tel Aviv muri Israel .
RwandAir yari isanzwe ikorera ingendo muri uyu mujyi gusa zahagaritswe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus , ndetse ntiharatangazwa itariki zizasubukurirwa .
Bivugwa ko iyi ndege ya Israel mu cyumweru gitaha nabwo izongera gukorera urugendo mu Rwanda , kuri iyo nshuro itwaye ba mukerarugendo baruta abo iza kugerana i Kigali kuri uyu wa Kane .
Abarenga 100 bagiye kwifashishwa mu rugendo mbarankuru ruva imuzi ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda ( Amafoto ) .
Rwanda Nziza ni urugendo ruzagera mu turere twese twa igihugu , hagamijwe kuvumbura no kumenya ahantu nyaburanga hadakunze kuvugwa ndetse no kwerekana ishusho nyarwo ya u Rwanda rwo muri iki gihe .
Ni igitekerezo kigamije ahanini guteza imbere uburyo bwo kubara inkuru za u Rwanda kandi bikozwe na Abanyarwanda aho gutegereza ko bigirwamo uruhare na abanyamahanga .
Rwanda Nziza izifashisha abafotozi na abakora amashusho kugira ngo berekane imiterere ya u Rwanda , Isi yose irusheho kurumenya .
Ni muri gahunda yo gukomeza gushishikariza ba mukerarugendo ko hari ibyiza nyaburanga byo gusura mu rwa Gasabo no gukuza umuco wo gusura ibya iwacu mu Banyarwanda .
Abatangije iyi gahunda bizeye ko izafasha mu kuzahura urwego rwa ubukerarugendo rwazahajwe na icyorezo cya COVID - 19 cyarusubije inyuma bya umwihariko .
Ku bufatanye na Urwego rwa Igihugu rwa Iterambere ( RDB ) na gahunda ya Tembera u Rwanda , Rwanda Nziza izakorwa na itsinda rya abantu barenga 100 , harimo abafotora , abafata amashusho , abashakashatsi , abanyamateka , abayobora ba mukerarugendo na abakora ibijyanye no kubungabunga ibidukikije .
Rwanda Nziza ni rwo rugendo rwa mbere rwo muri ubu bwoko ruzaba ari runini mu Rwanda kuko ruzagera mu turere 30 twose twa igihugu .
Iyi gahunda yatangijwe na Image Rwanda na abanyamuryango bayo nyuma yo kubona ko hakenewe ibikorwa bituma ubukerarugendo bwongera kuzamuka , kandi amashusho akaba ari bumwe mu buryo bwizewe ibi byakorwamo .
Uru rugendo ruzakorwa mu byiciro bibiri birimo icyo gufata amashusho kizatangira mu Ukuboza 2020 kugeza muri Gicurasi 2021 na icyo kuyatunganya no kuyatangaza kizakomerezaho kugera mu mpera za umwaka utaha .
Amashusho azakusanywa muri uru rugendo azerekanirwa mu mamurika atandukanye ndetse hanifashishwe ikoranabuhanga rihambaye rya " " " " Virtual Reality , " " " " mu Rwanda no hanze yarwo .
Bizamurikirwa ku rubuga rwa Image Rwanda ( ) , rusanzwe rucuruza ibihangano bya Abanyarwanda .
Biteganyijwe kandi ko hazakorwa igitabo kizitwa " " " " Rwanda Nziza " " " " kizaba gikubiyemo ibyiza bitatse buri karere ka u Rwanda .
Image Rwanda ni ihuriro rya abafotora na abakora amashusho na ibindi bijyanye nabyo .
Ifite urubuga rucururizwaho ibi bikorwa ( Stock Photo ) rufite amafoto arenga 200 000 na amasaha arenga 3000 ya amashusho .
Iri huriro ryashinzwe na Ishimwe Innocent na Habimana Jean Luc , kuri ubu rifite abanyamuryango barenga 100 barimo abafotora , abafata amashusho na abashushanya bifashishije ikoranabuhanga rigezweho .
Amashusho ya Image Rwanda amaze gukoreshwa na imbuga zinyuranye nini ku Isi harimo nka Paris St Germain , urwa Visit Rwanda na ahandi .
Burera Beach Resort hotel igiye kwegurirwa abikorera .
Iyo hotel iherereye mu Murenge wa Kagogo , hafi ya Ibiyaga bya Burera na Ruhondo .
Yubatswe mu rwego rwo guteza imbere ubukerarugendo muri ako gace .
Yuzuye mu 2016 ariko ntabwo iratangira gukoreshwa .
Umwanzuro wo kuyegurira abikorera ufashwe nyuma ya aho akarere gasheshe amasezerano na rwiyemezamirimo wari wahawe kuyicunga .
The New Times yatangaje ko Barakabuye Nsengiyumba ari we wari wahawe gucunga iyo hotel , icyakora muri Nzeri uyu mwaka amasezerano yarasheshwe , akarere kamushinja kuzana andi mabwiriza atandukanye na ayari mu masezerano basinye .
Visi Meya ushinzwe ubukungu muri Burera , Joseph Munyaneza , yavuze ko bahisemo gusesa amasezerano kuko rwiyemezamirimo yabasabaga guhindura inyigo ya hotel , gukora ubusitani no kugezamo internet kandi bitari biri mu masezerano .
Munyaneza yavuze ko nibura rwiyemezamirimo yari kubisaba yatangiye imirimo aho kubisaba ataratangira .
Yavuze ko bahisemo kuyegurira abikorera , kuri ubu Urwego rwa Igihugu rwa Iterambere ( RDB ) rukaba ruri gushaka umushoramari wayegukana .
Hatangiye uburyo bwo kuyigenera agaciro kugira ngo babone uko bayegurira abikorera .
RDB yavuze ko bakiri kwiga uko iyo hotel izagurishwa , icyakora amahirwe menshi ngo ni ukuyegurira burundu umushoramari aho gusigaranamo imigabane mike .
RDB yatangiye gushaka abashoramari bayegukana , nyuma yo kubabona nibwo hazamenyekana igihe hotel izatangirira .
Iyi hotel imaze imyaka ine yuzuye ariko itarakoreshwa , ubuyobozi bwa akarere buvuga ko byatewe no gutinda kubona ibikoresho na ibindi byangombwa bizifashishwa .
U Rwanda ku rutonde rwa ibihugu bitangaje bizakorerwamo ingendo za ubukerarugendo za Four Seasons .
Izi ngendo zizwi nka Four Seasons Private Jet Experience zitabirwa na abakerraugendo batandukanye bashaka kureba ibyiza bitatse isi .
Bitewe na gahunda iba yateguwe , indege ihagurukana abantu ikabajyana mu gihugu kimwe , bahava bagakomereza mu kindi gutyo gutyo .
Four Seasons Hotels yatangaje ko muri izi ngendo zizaba umwaka utaha , izaba ikoresha indege yayo yihariye ( Private Jet ) kuko ngo yasanze abakora izi ngendo za ubukerarugendo badakunda kugenda mu ndege rusange cyane cyane muri ibi bihe bya Covid - 19 , bityo ngo izakoresha indege yayo nshya yo mu bwoko bwa Airbus ikaba ifite imyanya 48 .
Izatangira ingendo mu mpera za 2021 .
U Rwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu iyi ndege izanyuzamo ingendo zayo za ubukerarugendo bwa ibihugu bidasanzwe kandi bitera benshi amatsiko .
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibikorwa muri Four Seasons Hotels Limited , Christian Clerc avuga ko biteze kubona abagenzi benshi muri 2022 .
Ati : " " " " Ingendo zacu zaraguzwe cyane , kandi zakunze kugurwa na abantu bamwe , mu gihe rero abagenzi bareba ahazaza , turitegura kubona abakiriya benshi mu nzira tugiye gufungura muri 2022 , abagenzi ba uyu munsi bahitamo kujyana na abo bizeye ko bazarinda ubuzima bwabo na umutekano wabo kandi bakanabaha serivise nziza .
Iyi ndege izajya ikora ingendo ikurikije umwihariko wa ibihugu .
U Rwanda ruri mu cyiciro cya ibihugu bya Afurika izakoreramo ingendo bitewe nuko ari ibihugu bitera abantu amatsiko bakifuza kubimenya , ibyo bise mu cyongereza " " " " Africa Wonders . " " " "
Urugendo rwo muri Afurika ruzaba hagati ya amatariki ya 28 Ukuboza 2021 na 9 Mutarama 2022 .
Mu bindi bihugu iyi ndege izageramo biri muri icyo cyiciro harimo Afurika ya Epfo , Misiri , Tanzania , Ibirwa bya Maurice , Zambia na Tanzania .
Ingendo za iyi ndege kandi zizongera kunyura mu Rwanda ku matariki yo hagati ya 28 Gicurasi kugeza 20 Kamena 2022 , icyo gihe bizaba ari mu cyiciro cyo gusura ibihugu bidasanzwe kandi bishimishije kurusha ibindi ku isi , mu cyongereza byiswe " " " " World of Adventures . " " " "
Ibyo bihugu birimo u Rwanda , Miami , umujyi wa Kyoto uri ku kirwa cya Honshu mu Buyapani ; Ikirwa cya Bali muri Indonesia ; Ibirwa bya Seychelles ; Marrakech muri Maroc ; Bogota muri Colombia ; na Ikirwa cya Galapagos kiri mu Nyanja ya Pasifika .
Izi ngendo zigamije gufasha abantu kumenya ahantu hadasanzwe baba bafite amatsiko yo kugera .
Ni ingendo zizaba zigenzurwa na sosiyete yo mu Buhinde izobereye ibyo kugenzura ingendo za indege yitwa TCS ( Tata Consultancy Services Limited ) serivise zayo zikazunganirana na iza Four Seasons Hotels zo kwita ku buzima na umutekano wa abagenzi .
Four Seasons Hotels itegura izi ngendo za ubukerarugendo ifite amashami arenga 100 mu bihugu bitandukanye , ikaba ifite icyicaro i Toronto muri Canada .
Pariki ya Gishwati - Mukura igiye kugururirwa abakerarugendo .
Iyi ntambwe ni irindi tafari ryiyongereye mu rugendo u Rwanda rufite rwo kongera amafaranga rukura mu bukerarugendo , ku buryo mu 2024 , ruzaba rwinjiza miliyoni $ 800 ku mwaka avuye kuri miliyoni $ 438 mu 2017 .
U Rwanda rukomeje gukaza umuvuduko mu kuzahura ubukerarugendo , bwari bwarazahaye cyane kubera icyorezo cya COVID - 19 .
Umuyobozi wa Ishami rya Ubukerarugendo muri RDB , Kageruka Ariella , yavuze ko biteguye gutangira kwakira abakerarugendo basura Pariki ya Gishwati - Mukura vuba .
Yagize ati " " " " Turateganya gukoresha Pariki ya Gishwati - Mukura mu bikorwa bya ubukerarugendo .
Twari tukiri gutunganya ibintu bimwe na bimwe , tuzayifungurira abakerarugendo mu mpera za uyu mwaka . " " " "
Ibi Kageruka yabitangaje ubwo Urwego rwa Igihugu rwa Iterambere ( RDB ) ari narwo rweguriwe imicungire ya iyi pariki , rwashyikirizwaga na Ikigo cya Igihugu gishinzwe kubungabunga Ibidukikije ( REMA ) , icyicaro cyayo gifite agaciro ka miliyoni 900 za amafaranga ya u Rwanda .
Mu 2014 nibwo u Rwanda rwakiriye miliyoni $ 9 , 5 agamije kurufasha gutunganya neza ishyamba rya Gishwati - Mukura , yavuye mu Kigo Mpuzamahanga cyita ku Bidukikije , kibinyujije muri Banki ya Isi .
Kageruka yavuze ko kuba Gishwati - Mukura yaragizwe pariki , bizagira uruhare runini mu kuzamura ubukungu bwa igihugu , kuko izunganirana na izindi pariki zisanzwe mu kwakira abakerarugendo , kuko irimo urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima bishobora kunyura abakerarugendo .
Muri Gashyantare 2016 nibwo ishyamba cyimeza rya Gishwati - Mukura riherereye mu ruhererekane rwa Imisozi ya isunzu rya Congo - Nil , ryemejwe nka Pariki ya Igihugu ya kane , yitezweho gutanga umusanzu mu kwinjiza amadevize binyuze mu bukerarugendo na izindi nyungu zituruka ku bidukikije .
Iyi pariki iherereye mu Turere twa Rutsiro na Ngororero mu Ntara ya i Burengerazuba bwa igihugu , ingana na hegitari 3 558 , harimo icyanya cya Gishwati gifite ubuso bungana na hegitari 1 570 , na icya Mukura kingana na hegitari 1 988 .
Ayo mashyamba azwimo ibimera gakondo na ubwoko bwa inyamaswa zinyuranye ziganjemo inkende na impundu na inkima , amoko arenga 130 ya inyoni , harimo 15 aboneka muri iyi pariki gusa , na izindi nyamaswa nto zinyuranye .
Ni pariki yabashije kubaho kubera uruhare rwa leta na abaturage , kuko nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yari yakendereye , ituzwamo abaturage ndetse ibindi bikorwa byabo birushaho kuyangiza .
Mu 2009 nibwo yatangiye kubungabungwa no gusubiranywa , ngo yongere ibe igicumbi cya urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima .
Muri Mata 2019 , RDB yagiranye amasezerano ya imyaka 25 na Ikigo Imizi Eco - Tourism Development Ltd yo gutunganya no gucunga Pariki ya Igihugu ya Gishwati - Mukura , ku buryo ihinduka igice gikorerwamo ubukerarugendo .
Nyuma ya iminsi ihawe abayicunga bashya , muri Kigali Arena hagiye gushyirwa restaurant igezweho .
Umunyabigwi mu guteka , Coco Reinarhz , ni we uzatangirana na icyo gikoni mu ntangiriro za 2021 , nka uko ikigo QA Venue Solution Rwanda cyahawe gucunga Kigali Arena cyabitangaje .
QA Venue Solution Rwanda iherutse gusinyana amasezerano na Guverinoma ya u Rwanda ya imyaka irindwi yo gucunga iyo nyubako yakira abantu bagera ku bihumbi icumi .
Umutetsi Coco Reinarhz ugiye gutangirana na igikoni cya Kaffé Sports , yavukiye mu Burundi .
Yakoze imirimo yo guteka mu bigo bikomeye mu bihugu nka u Bubiligi , Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo , Côte da Ivoire na Afurika ya Epfo .
Ni we nyiri restaurant Épicure iherereye i Sandton mu Mujyi wa Johannesburg muri Afurika ya Epfo .
Coco Reinarhz yagize ati " " " " Tuzakira abashyitsi ba ubwoko bwose , duhereye ku ku batekera indyo nyafurika na mpuzamahanga .
Intego yanjye ni ugukorana na abanyempano ba imbere mu gihugu ngo tugaragaze umwihariko mu ndyo zitandukanye .
Turifuza ko abantu bazana imiryango yabo na inshuti zabo bakishima . " " " "
Coco Reinarhz yizeye ko ibiribwa na ibinyobwa bizajya bitangwa na Kaffé Sports bizatuma abantu benshi bagana Kigali Arena ku bwinshi .
Umuyobozi wa QA Venue Solutions , Kyle Schofield , yavuze ko amasezerano bagiranye na Coco Reinarhz ari intambwe ya mbere mu byo biyemeje , byo kugira Kigali Arena ahantu hafasha abagana iyo nyubako bakabona serivisi nziza kandi zigezweho .
Coco Reinarhz azwi ku guteka indyo zitandukanye yagiye ahererwa ibihembo mpuzamahanga .
Indyo azwiho guteka ni iyitwa " " " " Sel et Poivre " " " " yanatoranyijwe mu bihembo American Express Fine Dining .
Iyo ndyo yanahawe igihembo mu 2013 mu bihembo byiswe Diners Club Diamond Award .
Ubuhanga bwe mu guteka yabugaragaje kuri televiziyo zitandukanye ku Isi nka SABC1 , SABC3 , E - tv , CNN , TV5 na BBC Food .
QA Venue Solutions izakorana na amashyirahamwe ya imikino yo mu gihugu na mpuzamahanga kimwe na abategura inama na ibindi bikorwa binini , hagamijwe gutegura ibikorwa bizabera muri Kigali Arena .
Biteganyijwe ko QA Venue Solutions izashora miliyoni 2 , 4 $ , hagamijwe kwakira ibikorwa binyuranye kandi bikomeye .
QA Venue Solutions Rwanda izanoza imikorere ya Kigali Arena binyuze mu gushyiraho uburyo bwo kuyicunga , kugurisha amatike , gutegura ibijyanye na amajwi ( sound ) , kubyaza umusaruro ibikoresho bya Made in Rwanda ku buryo umuntu uzajya ahagera azajya yizihirwa na igihe yahamaze .
Iki kigo kandi kizahuza imbaraga na abafatanyabikorwa ba imbere mu gihugu no hanze yacyo mu gushyiraho ishuri rizafasha kongerera ubushobozi abari mu ruganda rwo gutegura inama na ibitaramo bitandukanye .
Ibyiza bya Sainte Famille Hotel nyuma ya umwaka umwe ifunguye imiryango ( Amafoto ) .
Ku wa 5 Ugushyingo 2020 , umwaka umwe wari wuzuye itangiye imirimo , ari nabwo yatumiye abafatanyabikorwa bayo bifatanya mu kwishimira iyi ntambwe imaze guterwa .
Arkiyepiskopi wa Diyosezi ya Kigali , Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda uheruka no gutorerwa kuba Cardinal , yashimiye abafatanyabikorwa bayo , abizeza ko bazakomeza kwakiranwa urugwiro muri iyi hotel .
Yashimiye byimazeyo abakiliya na abafatanyabikorwa batahwemye kubana na Sainte Famille Hotel mu bihe bitoroshye bya icyorezo cya COVID - 19 .
Ati " " " " Ni umwaka utari woroshye kuko twatangiye COVID - 19 ikadukoma mu nkokora , ariko twanze guhera hasi turabyuka .
Nka abafatanyabikorwa ba hafi mwakomeje gufatanya natwe , turabashimiye ku buryo bwa umwihariko . " " " "
" " " " Inshuti nyanshuti igaragarira aho rukomeye , kuba mwarakomeje kutuba hafi mu bihe bikomeye kugira ngo tuzanzamuke , ubu tukaba duhagaze , reka dushingure tugende , dukomezanye urugendo . " " " "
Yavuze ko kwakira abantu neza ari imwe mu nshingano za Kiliziya Gatolika .
Ati " " " " Mu ivanjili biratubabaza kubona umwana wa Imana yaraje ku Isi akabura icumbi , akazenguruka mu mahoteli ya i Yeruzaremu bakavuga bati haruzuye nta cumbi .
Ubwo rero Kiliziya biri mu butumwa bwayo , kwakira abantu ibifite ku mutima . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa Sainte Famille Hotel , Egide Bukumura , yavuze ko mu mwaka umwe iyi hoteli imaze ikora , bishimira urwego igezeho .
Ati " " " " Tumaze kumenyekana mu rwego rushimishije , noneho byisumbuyeho kuba ari hoteli ya Kiliziya Gatolika ifite umwihariko mu gutanga serivisi nziza , bituma abakiliya bacu batugirira icyizere . " " " "
Yavuze ko bishimiye cyane kuba Cardinal Kambanda yifatanyije na bo mu kwizihiza isabukuru ya umwaka wa mbere bamaze bakora .
Ati " " " " Ni ibyishimo kuri hoteli yacu , kuba Cardinal yaje akifatanya natwe mu gushimira abafatanyabikorwa babanye natwe muri uyu mwaka , biragaragariza abakiliya ko abatekereza umunsi ku munsi . " " " "
Sainte Famille Hotel ifite ibyumba 67 byo kuraramo , ikagira na ibyumba bya inama birimo ibiringaniye byakira abantu 40 , ibinini byakira 100 , na ikindi kinini cyane gikorerwamo inama , ubukwe na indi myidagaduro gishobora kwakira abantu hagati ya 800 na 1000 .
Iyi hoteli kandi ifite ibyumba byiza byo gukoreramo imirimo irimo ibiro , bikodeshwa ku biciro byiza .
Ifite pisine ( piscine ) , restaurant na akabari bigezweho .
Amafunguro ya ku manywa ahoraho kuva ku wa Mbere kugeza ku wa Gatanu , hagati ya saa Sita na saa Cyenda .
Iyi hoteli ifite umwihariko wo kuba ikozwe ahanini na ibikoresho byakorewe mu Rwanda , ikagira parikingi ihagije ku bakiliya na abahakorera , kandi ifite ahantu hanini yakirira abakiliya ku buryo babasha kwisanzura mu mahumbezi .
Sainte Famille Hotel iherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali , hafi ya inyubako ya Paruwasi Ste Famille .
U Rwanda rwashyizwe mu hantu 20 ku Isi ho gusurwa mu 2021 .
Uru rutonde rwakozwe nyuma ya aho buri hantu muri 20 hari kuri uru rutonde hagiye hatoranywa na abantu bazobereye ibijyanye na ubukerarugendo , bafite ubunararibonye mu gutembera hirya no hino ku Isi cyangwa se bafasha ba mukerarugendo .
Kuri iyi nshuro , u Rwanda rwatoranyijwe na Umunyamerikakazi , Julie Danziger , ukunze kugaragara kenshi mu bikorwa byo gusura ahantu hatandukanye ubarizwa mu kigo gifasha ba mukerarugendo cya Embark Beyond .
Buri muntu uhitamo igihugu abandi basura , aba asabwa gusobanura impamvu koko kibereye kuba cyasurwa .
Danziger asobanura impamvu yatoranyije u Rwanda , yavuze ko mu gihe COVID - 19 yatumye ingendo hirya no hino ku Isi zihagarara , ibyerekezo bitandukanye byatangiye kureba uburyo mu gihe kiri imbere abantu bazakora ingendo mu mutuzo .
Ku ruhande rwa u Rwanda , yavuze ko gukora ingendo mu buryo butekanye byashyizwe ku isonga rya buri kimwe igihugu gikora , ndetse ko buri gikorwa kijyanye na ubukerarugendo kuva mu 2005 giteguwe neza kugeza no kuri gahunda zigamije gufasha abaturage baturiye za pariki .
Ati " " " " U Rwanda rwakoze akazi gakomeye mu gusubukura bwangu ibikorwa bya ubukerarugendo , hashyirwaho ingamba zo kwirinda bitari mu rwego rwo kurinda ba mukerarugendo ahubwo na abaturage ba igihugu , hamwe na inyamaswa ziba mu mashyamba . " " " "
Danziger yahamagariye ba mukerarugendo bashaka kumenya byinshi kuri Afurika no kumenya ibice bitandukanye gusura u Rwanda .
Mu Rwanda hari ibice byinshi bikurura ba mukerarugendo , aho ku isonga haza Pariki ya Igihugu ya Iburanga ibonekamo ingagi .
Ahandi ni nka Pariki ya Nyungwe ibonekamo ikiraro cyo mu kirere kiri hake muri Afurika , iya Akagera irimo inyamaswa eshanu za inkazi arizo Intare , Inzovu , Imbogo , Inkura na Ingwe .
Hari kandi nka Pariki ya Gishwati na ibindi bice bitandukanye byishimirwa na ba mukerarugendo .
Ibi binajyana na uko ari kimwe mu bihugu bifite hotel ziteye amabengenzi zirimo Bisate Eco Lodge iherereye mu Birunga , Magashi Camp iherereye muri Pariki ya Akagera , One & Only Nyungwe House na izindi .
Mu handi hantu hashyizwe mu ho umuntu akwiriye gusura mu mwaka utaha harimo Qatar , Kenya , Ibirwa bya Tahiti , Misiri , Paris , Nouvelle - Zélande , Tunisie , Ireland na ahandi .
Dusure inyamaswa eshanu zihatse izindi muri Pariki ya Igihugu ya Akagera na izizigaragiye ( Amafoto ) .
Ubu iyi pariki ibarizwamo inyamaswa eshanu zikomeye muri Afurika arizo Intare , Inzovu , Imbogo , Inkura na Ingwe .
Muri iri shyamba uretse Intare yubahwa nka Umwami wa Ishyamba , indi nyamaswa ya igitinyiro ni Inzovu , inagira umutima uzirikana ku buryo bukomeye , ari nayo nyamaswa itajya ipfa kwisukirwa .
Harimo na Inkura nka inyamaswa iheruka kuzanwa mu Rwanda vuba , abakurikiranira hafi ibya inyamaswa bahamya ko yiyemera nka igisimba gifite imbaraga zihagije na ihembe rikomeye , ku buryo nta cyayihagarika .
Umwe aheruka kubwira IGIHE ati " " " " Yumva byanga bikunda niba hari ikintu ibonye cyamaze kuyisatira , igomba gukoresha za mbaraga kugira ngo igikure imbere .
Ishobora gukubita na igiti cyangwa indi nyamaswa . " " " "
" " " " Ikindi kizwi kuri yo ntabwo ireba neza , ikoresha guhumurirwa no kumva cyane , ireba ari uko ibona ikintu gitambuka .
Ikintu gihagaze ntabwo iba ikibona .
Uramutse ucunze ukareba nka umuyaga , niba uri kukuvaho uyiganaho uba uri hafi na urupfu , ihita ikumva ako kanya . " " " "
" " " " Na none iyo ikintu kigenda ikibona vuba , ariko uhise uhagarara cyangwa ukaryama , ishobora no kukunyuraho . " " " "
Iyi nyamaswa nta nubwo ibana na izindi , ahubwo iba yonyine kuko zakwicana .
Mu nyamaswa ziri muri iyi Pariki habamo na Isatura , yo ni inyamaswa ifatwa nka idatekereza cyane , ku buryo ishobora kumva urusaku rwa imodoka igaturumbuka iyinyura imbere ku buryo yanayigonga .
Mu mazi ho umwami ni Imvubu , ku buryo ibindi binyabuzima biyibererekera , bitayitinyiye ubunini bwayo gusa , ahubwo na iryinyo ryayo rinini kandi rikomeye .
Pariki ya Akagera kandi ni ahantu hakunze gusurwa cyane , aho umuntu abasha kwibonera ndetse akamenya nka inyamaswa yitwa Indonyi ifite ububasha bwo kwishariririza mu gihe yikanze , bigatuma na inyamaswa yayica itabasha kuyirya , cyangwa se ko Imparage ifite umugeri wa inyuma uremereye , ku buryo na iyo Intare
iyisukiriye ishaka kuyica ikayitera wa mugeri iba itakiharenze .
Inyamaswa muri Pariki ya Igihugu ya Akagera kandi zikomeje kwiyongera , aho ubuyobozi bwayo buheruka gutangaza ko Intare zimaze kuba 37 kuva muri 2015 , ubwo zagarurwaga mu Rwanda .
Ibintu icumi ukwiye kumenya kuri Nyiragongo , ikirunga gifite ikiyaga gihora gitogota .
Ni byinshi byibazwa kuri iki kirunga mu miterere yacyo ndetse na ibyago gishobora guteza abantu , hagendewe ku hantu giherereye na kamere yacyo bya umwihariko .
1 . Ni kimwe mu birunga bifite ikiyaga cya amazuku
Ikirunga cya Nyiragongo ni kimwe mu birunga bitanu byonyine ku Isi bifite ibiyaga bya amazuku ( igikoma kiremye ikiyaga gihora gitogota , gituruka ku bibuye byashonze byo mu nda ya Isi ) , cyavutse guhera mu 1980 ndetse na na ubu kiracyariho .
Ibindi biyaga nkacyo ni mu kirunga cya Kilauea muri Hawaii , Mount Erebus muri Antarctica , Ambrym muri Vanuatu na Erta " " " " Ale muri Ethiopia .
Agasongero kacyo kareshya na kilometero ebyiri
Agasongero ka ikikirunga kazwi nka crater ari nako kagizwe na ikiyaga cya amazuku ( Lava Lake ) , kareshya na kilometero ebyiri za ubugari .
Uretse aya mazuku aba arimo hagati , ku mpande hari ibisa na ibikuta binini bya amazuku yumye akarema ibibuye binini , ku ruhande rumwe rureshya na metero 3 , 175 naho urugufi rukareshya na metero 2 , 975 .
Nyiragongo imaze kuruka inshuro 34
Ntabwo ari byinshi bizwi neza kuri iki kirunga nka igihe cyatangiriye kuruka , ariko ababikurikiranira hafi bavuga ko kuva mu 1882 kimaze kuruka inshuro 34 , ndetse iheruka ku rwego rukomeye ni iyo mu 2002 .
Ubujyakuzima bwa amazuku bushidikanywaho
Ubutumburuke bwa ikiyaga cya amazuku ntabwo buvugwa mu buryo ntakuka , ariko habarwaga metero 3250 mbere ya iruka ryo muri Mutarama 1977 , ariko imibare ya vuba yo yerekaga metero 2700 .
Nyiragongo yigeze gusuka ibikoma kuri 60km / h
Ubwo iki kirunga cyarukaga mu mwaka wa 1977 , cyoherezaga amazuku yagendaga kilometero 60 ku isaha amanuka ku musozi , icyo gihe ariko bwo cyahitanye bake kuko bari 70 .
Yasandaye ku muvuduko wo hejuru kurusha izindi nshuro , ku buryo mu minota 30 cya kiyaga cya amazuku cyari gikamye .
Nyiragongo na Nyamuragira , bisangiye nibura 40 % bya iruka rya ibirunga rya vuba ku mugabane wa Afurika .
Iruka ryo mu 2002 ryangije byinshi
Iruka rikomeye rya Nyiragongo ryatangiye ku wa 17 Mutarama 2002 , nyuma ya iminsi yari ishize imitingito yarabaye myinshi mu bice byegereye ikirunga , kugeza ubwo iki kirunga cyaje kwiyasa maze gisuka ibikoma mu masaha menshi hagati ya metero 2 , 800 na 1 , 550 , bigera mu mujyi wa Goma uri hafi aho , ku nkengero za ikiyaga cya Kivu .
Abaturage bari baburiwe ndetse abagera ku 4000 bari bamaze kuvanwa muri aka gace kimwe no mu mujyi wa Gisenyi , mu gihe cya iruka rya icyo kirunga .
Abantu bagera kuri 245 bahasize ubuzima kubera kubura umwuka bitewe na gaz yoherezwaga na ikirunga , ndetse inzu zimwe zirahirima kubera amazuku na imitingito .
Bibarwa ko hafi 15 % bya umujyi wa Goma byangijwe na icyo gikorwa , ku buryo abantu 120 000 basigaye badafite aho kwikinga .
Nyuma ya amezi atandatu Nyiragongo yongeye kuruka
Nyuma ya iruka ryo mu 2002 , ikirunga cya Nyiragongo cyongeye kuruka nyuma ya amezi atandatu , ku buryo ibikoma bitasohotse byahise biharema ikiyaga cya amazuku .
Ikirunga cya Nyiragongo gikurikiranwa na itsinda ryihariye rya abahanga mu bumenyi bwa ibiri mu Isi , Goma Volcanic Observatory .
Bakurikirana iki kirunga buri munsi mu minsi yose igize umwaka , aho baba bakurikirana amakuru atangwa na ibipimo yaba ajyanye na ubushyuhe cyangwa ibibera imbere muri ibi birunga .
8 . Iki kirunga kizamura imyuka myinshi ihumanya
Kuva ku iruka ryo mu 2002 , iki kirunga cyazamuye mu kirere imyuka ihumanya , bikekwa ko yanatumye hari abantu benshi bahasiga ubuzima cyane cyane mu bana .
Hari ubushakashatsi buheruka kugaragaza ko indwara za ubuhumekero ziri mu zivuzwa cyane mu bice byegereye ibirunga bya Nyiragongo na Nyamuragira ( 12 . 2 % ) , mu gihe malaria yari ku mwanya wa mbere ( 32 . 3 % ) .
Ntabwo byoroshye kugisura
Ku bantu bamenyereye gusura ibirunga cyangwa guterera imisozi miremire , Nyiragongo ni ahantu hadakunda kwisukirwa na ubonetse wese , kuko bisaba kuzamuka kilometero 3 . 47 kugira ngo ubashe kugera hejuru ku kiyaga cya amazuku .
Ikiyaga cya amazuku cyahageze mu 1994
Bibarwa ko ikiyaga cya amazu kigaragara hejuru kuri Nyiragongo cyahanzwe mu 1994 , ariko kiza kwisubiza mu 2002 nyuma ya iruka rya ikirunga .
Iki kirunga kitarazima , bibarwa ko kiruka nibura mu mpuzandengo ya imyaka 30 hagati ya iruka rimwe na irindi .
Pariki ya Igihugu ya Nyungwe yeguriwe African Parks .
Aya masezerano agamije gukomeza kubyaza umusaruro iyi pariki no kwita ku nyamaswa zibarizwamo kimwe na ibindi binyabuzima .
Aya masezerano asanga imikoranire yari imaze imyaka icumi hagati ya RDB na African Parks agamije kwita no kubungabunga ibimera na inyamaswa ziboneka muri iri shyamba kimwe no kubibyaza umusaruro mu buryo bwa amafaranga .
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RDB , Clare Akamanzi , yatangaje ko aya masezerano ashimangira ubufatanye bwiza hagati ya u Rwanda na African Parks mu myaka icumi ishize .
African Parks niyo yafashije RDB maze mu 2015 muri Pariki ya Akagera hasubizwamo intare zari zimaze imyaka 20 zihacitse , mu 2017 hongerwamo inkura .
Akamanzi yakomeje avuga ko ikigamijwe muri ubu bufatanye , ari ugutuma Pariki ya Igihugu ya Nyungwe iba ahantu heza umuntu yakwifuza gusura binyuze " " " " mu kwita no kubungabunga ibinyabuzima , kwagura ibikorwaremezo bya ubukerarugendo no kurushaho kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo . " " " "
Yavuze kandi ko ubu bufatanye buzarushaho gutanga umusaruro binyuze mu gukorana na abaturiye pariki .
Pariki ya igihugu ya Nyungwe ni ishyamba cyimeza ribarizwa mu burengerazuba bwa amajyepfo ya u Rwanda .
Rifatanye na Pariki ya Igihugu ya Kibira yo mu Burundi aho rifite ubuso bwa 1019 km2 .
Ribarizwamo amoko 13 ya inyamaswa zo mu bwoko bwa inguge na inkende na amoko asaga 300 ya inyoni bikurura ba mukerarugendo .
Ririmo kandi ubwoko bwa ibiti birenga 1000 .
Mu 2018 , abashakashatsi bigisha ibijyanye na ibinyabuzima muri Kaminuza ya Moscow bageze muri Pariki ya Igihugu ya Nyungwe inshuro eshatu biga ku bimera na indabo ziyirimo , hari ubwoko bahabonye butakiba ahandi ku Isi batekereza ko burimo umuti ukomeye .
Umuyobozi wa African Parks , Peter Fearnhead , yatangaje ko gushora imari ya igihe kirekire mu kwita kuri Pariki ya Nyungwe , bijyanye na intego za Guverinoma ya u Rwanda yo gukomeza kubungabunga ibinyabuzima nka kimwe mu bifasha mu mibereho myiza ya muntu , ubuzima bwa abaturiye izi pariki no mu buryo bwa ubukungu .
Nyungwe ni kimwe mu bigega bya amazi ya u Rwanda kuko itanga hafi 70 % bya amazi ya u Rwanda kandi isoko ya uruzi rwa Nil iri muri iryo shyamba .
Ibarizwamo ikiraro cyo mu kirere , Canopy Walk , kiri mu bikurura ba mukerarugendo cyane .
Kireshya na metero 70 za ubutumburuke ( kuva hasi kugera hejuru ) na metero 150 za uburebure cyubatswe mu byuma na imigozi ikomeye .
Cyafunguwe ku mugaragaro mu 2010 .
Ni icya mbere mu Karere ka Afurika ya Uburasirazuba , kikaba icya gatatu muri Afurika nyuma ya icyo muri Ghana na Nigeria .
Imibare ya RDB igaragaza ko nko mu 2017 Pariki ya Nyungwe yinjije amadolari 534821 nyuma yo gusurwa na ba mukerarugendo 13941 .
Imiterere ya " " " " Resorts " " " " 10 zabaye iza mbere ku isi zirimo na Bisate Lodge ( Amafoto ) .
Ni urutonde rwakozwe mu bihembo bizwi nka Condé Nast Traveller Readers " " " " Choice Awards 2020 , aho ibikorwa bihiga ibindi byatangajwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri .
Ni ibihembo byatangajwe mu gikorwa kibaye ngarukamwaka ku nshuro ya 33 , aho abasomyi ba uru rubuga batora " " " " resort " " " " bakunze kurusha izindi ku Isi .
10 . ya Igihugu ya Ibirunga , Rwanda
Bisate Eco Lodge yatashywe ku mugaragaro na Perezida Paul Kagame tariki ya 1 Nzeri 2017 .
Yubatse muri Pariki ya Ibirunga aho uba witegeye neza udusongero twa ibirunga bya Bisoke , Kalisimbi na Mikeno .
Iyi hoteli iza mu za mbere zakira ba mukerarugendo bo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu Rwanda , yubatswe na ikigo Wilderness Safaris .
Impumeko yayo yavuye ku miterere ya Ingoro ya Umwami iherereye i Nyanza mu Ntara ya Amajyepfo .
Bisate Lodge ifite ibyumba bitandatu bigiye biteretse mu ishyamba hagati , bisakaje ibyatsi hejuru , ndetse byihagazeho kuko kuharara ijoro rimwe wishyura amadolari ya Amerika ari hagati ya 1100 - 1400 .
Chamilandu , The Bushcamp Company - South Luangwa National Park , Zambia
Ni inyubako zigezweho muri Pariki ya Igihugu ya Luangwa ya Amajyepfo muri Zambia , aho Bushcamp Company ari cyo kigo cyonyine gifite izo nyubako ahantu nka aho , ku buryo ibyiza uhabona biba bizira kirogoya .
Ni inyubako zitegeye umugezi wa Luangwa na imisozi ya Chindeni , ku buryo umuntu abasha kwitegereza neza inyoni , inzovu na imvubu icya rimwe .
Morukuru Family Beach Lodge - De Hoop Nature Reserve , Afurika ya Epfo
Agace ka Morukuru gaherereye nibura mu masaha atatu uturutse mu Mujyi wa Cape Town , umuntu akabasha kuruhukira ku nkombe za inyanja ya Abahinde , bitandukanye na uko Afurika ya Epfo izwiho cyane kugira umwihariko ku bakerarugendo bashaka gusura ibinyabuzima bya agasozi binyuze muri pariki .
Ni ahantu umuntu ashobora kuruhukira ku mucanga wa umweru , akagira na ibindi bimushimisha birimo gusura inyamaswa cyangwa indi mikino yo mu mazi .
Abantu bagirwa inama yo gusura Afurika ya Epfo hagati ya Nyakanga - Ukwakira , aho umuntu anabasha kubona amafi ya rutura agenda ku nkombe za amazi , nubwo umuntu yaba ari mu cyumba cye .
Singita Grumeti - Grumeti Game Reserve , Tanzania
Zipline yakusanyije miliyoni 250 $ yo kwagura ibikorwa .
Coronavirus yasubije ubukungu bwa Isi inyuma na ibigo byinshi bigwa mu gihombo .
Serivisi itanga ni zo ziri ku isonga mu bikenewe cyane muri ibi bihe , haba mu gukwirakwiza imiti , ibikoresho bya ubwirinzi ku baganga na inkingo .
Miliyoni 250 $ Zipline yakusanyije zatumye agaciro kayo kazamuka kagera kuri miliyari 2 , 75 $ ndetse zitezweho kurushaho kwagura ibikorwa byayo muri Afurika na Amerika .
Mu Rwanda Zipline izwi cyane kubera ikoreshwa rya drones yahatangirije mu 2016 , zifashishwa mu gukwirakwiza amaraso , inkingo , imiti na ibindi bikoresho byo kwa muganga zibigeza aho bikenewe mu bitaro biri hirya no hino mu gihugu .
Uretse aho bikenewe vuba , hari na aho zifashishwa bitewe na uko imihanda yaho itameze neza ku buryo byagora imodoka kuhagera cyangwa yatwara iyo miti ikayangiza kubera kugenda yicunda .
Ubu itanga izo serivisi mu bigo nderabuzima 260 , ifite ibyicaro i Kayonza na Muhanga .
Muri Gashyantare uyu mwaka yatangiye kujya itanga serivisi zayo amasaha 24 ku yandi iminsi yose mu Rwanda , naho muri Werurwe yatangaje ko ifite gahunda yo kugeza imiti mu ngo za abarwayi hirya no hino hifashishijwe izo drones na ubundi .
Zipline kandi itanga serivisi zo gukwirakwiza imiti na ibikoresho byo kwa muganga no muri Ghana , Nigeria na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika .
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Zipline , Keller Rinaudo , yabwiye Tech Crunch ko hari na amasezerano mashya ya imikoranire aherutse gusinywa muri ibyo bihugu ya ahantu hashya hazajya hagezwa serivisi nka izo .
Yavuze ko ibikorwa byayo bikomeje kwaguka kubera imikoranire bafitanye na ibigo bikomeye nabyo bisanzwe bifasha mu kugeza ibicuruzwa na ibindi bintu iyo bijyanwa .
Ibyo ni ibya Abanyamerika birimo icyitwa UPS ( Ishami rikorera mu Rwanda ) na icyitwa Walmar hakaba na icy Abayapani , Toyota .
Rinaudo yakomeje agira ati " " " " Kuba ibigo byinshi bikomeye nka Toyota na Walmart bitangiye gushora muri ubu bwikorezi , ntekereza ko ari ikimenyetso cyiza cya uko abantu babona ko birimo kuza . " " " "
Zipline yagiye yitabazwa mu gukwirakwiza ibikoresho abaganga bifashisha mu bwirinzi , igira na uruhare mu bwikorezi bwa inkingo aho iteganya kuzaba yaratwaye dose miliyoni 2 , 4 mu mpera za uyu mwaka .
Ubu iri mu biganiro na Urwego rushinzwe ibya Indege za Gisivile muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ( FAA ) bigamije ko ihabwa icyemezo kiyemerera gukora no mu bihe bigoye bya icyorezo , aho izaba ibaye iya mbere igihawe muri sosiyete zifite drones .
Microsoft mu ntambara ya ikoranabuhanga ihanganyemo na Apple
Ubwo Microsoft yamurikaga OS nshya ya Windows 11 , umuyobozi wayo , Satya Nadella , yavuze udushya twinshi iyi Windows izaba ifite ndetse yongeraho ko tuzerekana ko Microsoft itandukanye na ibindi bigo bifite Operating System zikoreshwa cyane .
Bimwe mu byo iyi Windows 11 izaba ifite harimo kuba yemerera umuntu kumanura [ download ] " " " " application " " " " na imikino byakozwe na ibindi bigo bitari Microsoft .
Ibintu uruganda rwa Apple rutarakora , kuko kenshi rugira ibyo rugenderaho rwemerera izindi application zitari izayo gukoresha OS yayo .
Nadella kandi yavuze ko abahanga mu bya ikoranabuhanga ubu bemerewe kugurisha porogaramu zabo na iyo zaba zitari iza Microsoft , bakoresheje uburyo bwa Microsoft Store kandi ntibishyure amafaranga ku nyungu baba babonye .
Bitandukanye na ibindi bigo nka Google cyangwa Apple , aho yo mbere yishyuzaga 30 % bya inyungu abakoresha Operating System yayo baba bakuye mu kugurisha application zabo , gusa ikaza kugabanya ubu ikaba yishyuza 15 % bya inyungu ku mwaka cyo kimwe na Google , nyuma ya aho hari abayireze .
Mu ijambo rye Umuyobozi wa Microsoft yagize ati " " " " Ubu Isi ikeneye urubuga rufunguye kuri bose , urubuga ruha application ubwigenge busesuye bwo kuba urubuga ubwayo .
Windows ni urubuga rwemerera izindi mbuga ziyirusha ubushobozi kuvuka . " " " "
" " " " Turashaka gukuraho imbogamizi zose zikiriho mu Isi ya ikoranabuhanga kugeza ubu , maze tugaha abantu amahitamo nyayo no kwisanga mu bandi .
Operating Systems na ibikoresho bya ikoranabuhanga bigomba kubaho bijyanye na ibyo dukeneye . " " " "
Muri Windows 11 , Microsoft yashyizeho application ituma abantu bashobora kuvugana barebana ndetse yemerera application zitandukanye gukora na iyo zaba ari iza izindi porogaramu za ibanze za mudasobwa nka iOS , Android , Mac , Linux na izindi .
Ni mu gihe Apple ari gake yemerera izindi app zose gukoresha OS yayo .
Gusa mu ntangiriro za Kamena yavuze ko igiye kwemerera apps za Android na Windows gukoresha OS yayo .
Mu bihe byashize Apple yararwanyijwe izira kuba iteza imbere application zayo muri Operating System zayo .
Na Microsoft yarabikoraga ariko ubu iki kigo cyo gitangiye korohereza buri wese kumanura [ Download ] Application za Android muri Windows 11 , ndetse iri guha abantu amahitamo ya ibyo bashaka gukoresha .
Microsoft yaherukaga gushyira hanze porogaramu ya ibanze ya mudasobwa mu 2015 ubwo yasohoraga " " " " Windows 10 " " " " gusa uko imyaka yagiye ishira yagiye ikorerwa amavugurura .
Windows 10 yagiye ku isoko ikurikira " " " " Windows 8 . 1 . " " " "
Microsoft yazanye Windows 11
Habura imyaka ine ngo Windows 10 yatangiye gukoreshwa mu 2015 ite agaciro nka uko Microsoft iheruka kubitangaza .
Abayikoresha , bazajya bakora " " " " update " " " " babone Windows 11 ku buntu .
BBC yatangaje ko ubwo Windows 11 yamurikwaga Umuyobozi Mukuru wa iyo sosiyete , Satya Nadella , yavuze ko ari " " " " ibuye rya ifatizo mu mateka ya za windows . " " " "
Izaba yemera ikoreshwa rya applications za Android kuri mudasobwa , bitandukanye na uko byasabaga kwiyambaza porogaramu yitwa Bluestacks ku zindi windows .
Izaba ifite imiterere itandukanye na izindi , aho mudasobwa yashyizwemo Start Menu yayo izajya iza hasi ariko rwagati kuri écran bitandukanye na uko isanzwe iza ibumoso .
Uyikoresha kandi azabasha gukorera byinshi kuri mudasobwa imwe nta gikingiriza ikindi ( multiple desktops ) ku buryo wakwitabira nka inama , ureba na filime , wandika cyangwa ukina na imikino icya rimwe nta kibangamiye ikindi .
Windows 11 izajya kuri mudasobwa zifite nibura RAM ya 4G na processor ya 1GHz .
nkomoko yatanze telefone 500 zigezweho zo gufasha impunzi muri gahunda ya Connect Rwanda .
Byakozwe muri gahunda ya Connect Rwanda igamije guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga .
Izi telefone zatanzwe ku bufatanye bwa Inkomoko Entrepreneur Development , MTN Rwanda , Minisiteri ishinzwe Ubutabazi na Ishami rya Umuryango wa Abibumbye ryita ku Mpunzi ( UNHCR ) .
Iyi nkunga yemejwe kuri iki Cyumweru mu gihe Isi yose yizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Impunzi , wizihizwa buri tariki 20 Kamena .
Intego ni ugufasha ba rwiyemezamirimo batandukanye ba impunzi kugera kuri serivisi zitandukanye mu buryo buboroheye zirimo iza Leta , iza imari na iterambere rya ikoranabuhanga muri rusange .
Gahunda ya Connect Rwanda yatangijwe mu Ukuboza 2019 igamije gufasha imiryango idafite telefone zigezweho kuzibona kugira ngo ijyane na abandi mu iterambere rya ikoranabuhanga .
Inkomoko yatangaje ko iyo nkunga yatanzwe ku Munsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Impunzi , ari uburyo bwiza bwo gufasha impunzi na abaturage baturiye inkambi kurushaho kugera kuri serivisi za imari .
Ibikorwa byo gutanga telefone mu mpunzi bizatangirizwa mu Nkambi ya Gihembe mu Karere ka Gicumbi aho Inkomoko imaze imyaka itanu ikorera .
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibijyanye na Impunzi mu Inkomoko , Olive Ashimwe , yavuze ko telefone zizagira uruhare mu gukomeza gutanga serivisi muri ibi bihe bya COVID - 19 .
Yagize ati " " " " Mu gihe cya COVID - 19 , kugabanya ingendo byagabanyije uburyo twajyaga dutangamo serivisi mu miryango ya impunzi .
Nka ubundi bucuruzi bwose , byabaye ngombwa ko twifashisha ikoranabuhanga mu gufasha abagenerwabikorwa bacu .
Byadufashije gukomeza gukorana na ba rwiyemezamirimo bacu nubwo ingendo zitari zemewe . " " " "
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Inkomoko , Julienne Oyler , yavuze ko gutera inkunga impunzi bigira uruhare mu kwihutisha iterambere .
Ati " " " " Imikoranire ya Inkomoko na ba rwiyemezamirimo byagaragaje ko gushora imari mu bucuruzi bwa impunzi ari umusemburo wa iterambere rya ubukungu .
Twabashije kugeza amahirwe mashya ya iterambere , ishoramari na ikoranabuhanga mu bafatanyabikorwa bacu . " " " "
Telefone 500 Inkomoko yatanze zitezweho gukomeza kuziba icyuho muri serivisi za imari , mu gihe uwo mushinga ugiye gutangiza porogaramu ya ikoranabuhanga izafasha impunzi na imiryango ituranye na inkambi kubona inguzanyo mu buryo bworoshye .
Iyi porogaramu ya telefone izaba iri mu Kinyarwanda , Icyongereza , Igifaransa na Igiswahili .
Telefone zose zizatangwa na Inkomoko muri Connect Rwanda zizana na iyo porogaramu .
Umwaka ushize ku munsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Impunzi , Inkomoko ku bufatanye na Mastercard Foundation byatanze inkunga ya miliyoni 2 . 6 za amadolari kuri ba rwiyemezamirimo ba impunzi basaga 3600 , mu kuzahura ubukungu bwashegeshwe na Covid - 19 .
Kuri ubu Inkomoko igaragaza ko iyo nkunga yatanzwe umwaka ushize , ubucuruzi bwatewe inkunga bumaze kunguka asaga miliyoni 10 za amadolari , bwanahaye akazi abasaga ibihumbi 20 .
Ni mu gihe 98 % bya ubucuruzi bwari bwarafunze kubera Covid - 19 bwongeye gufungurwa .
Inkomoko yiyemeje gukomeza gufasha mu guteza imbere impunzi harimo guha igishoro imiryango 25 . 000 ya impunzi mu myaka iri imbere , kandi byose bikazakorwa hashyirwa imbere ikoranabuhanga .
U Bushinwa bwohereje mu isanzure itsinda rya abantu bazamarayo amezi atatu
Uru ni rwo rugendo rwa mbere rwa itsinda rizamara igihe kirekire mu isanzure rukozwe na u Bushinwa , rukaba ari na rwo rwa mbere rukozwe muri rusange mu myaka itanu ishize .
Rwatangirijwe mu butayu bwa Gobi , ahasanzwe hatumbagirizwa ibyogajuru mu ntara ya Jiuquan , mu cyogajuru Shenzhou - 12 , kuri uyu wa Kane .
U Bushinwa bukomeje kugaragaza ubushobozi na ubuhangange bwabwo mu ruhando mpuzamahanga mu rwego rwa ubumenyi bwa ikirere aho mu mezi atandatu ashize bwabashije kugeza mu gihugu ingero za amabuye na ubutaka ( sample ) bivuye ku kwezi ndetse bwoherezakuri Mars robot ya imitende itandatu muri gahunda yo gufasha iki gihugu mu
bushakashatsi .
Uru rugendo intego yarwo ni ugutangiza imirimo ya sitasiyo Tianhe iri mu isanzure nka uko byatangajwe na Nie Haisheng wagiye uhagarariye itsinda .
Ati " " " " Niteze byinshi , dukeneye gushyiraho urugo rwacu rushya mu isanzure tukanagerageza uruhererekane rwa ikoranabuhanga rishya .
Rero uru rugendo rurakomeye kandi runarimo imbogamizi nyinshi ariko niringiye ko tuzakorana uko turi batatu tugatsinda izo mbogamizi kandi mfite icyizere ko intego izagerwaho . " " " "
Biteganyijwe ko mu gihe kizaza , abandi bantu batari Abashinwa bashobora kuzemererwa gusura iyi sitasiyo ya Tianhe cyangwa se inzobere zindi mu bumenyi bwa isanzure zikiyambazwa muri ubu bushakashatsi mu isanzure na ikirere u Bushinwa bukomeje kugaragazamo umuvuduko wo hejuru .
Twitter igiye gukora impinduka zituma umuntu yikura mu bakorewe " " " " tag . " " " "
Mu busanzwe mu biganiro bibera kuri Twitter " " " " Tagging " " " " irakoreshwa cyane nka igihe umuntu ashaka kuvuga izina rya ufite aho ahuriye na ibiri kuvugwa .
Tagging kandi ikoreshwa igihe umuntu ashaka kwerekana abo yageneye ubutumwa runaka .
Gusa imbogamizi zikunze kubaho ni uko nta buryo bubaho umuntu ashobora kwikura muri ubu butumwa igihe ibyamuvuzweho atabyishimiye cyangwa abona byamuteje ikindi kibazo .
Amakuru dukesha Ikinyamakuru " " " " Nerdist " " " " avuga ko itsinda rya abahanga muri Twitter riri gukora ku mushinga wo gutangiza uburyo buzaba buzwi nka " " " " Unmention " " " " buzajya bufasha abantu kwikura muri ubu butumwa bashyizwemo batabishaka .
Umukozi ushinzwe kubika amakuru ya abantu muri Twitter , Dominic Camozzi yavuze ko izi mpinduka zigamije korohereza abantu .
Ati " " " " Ndashaka korohereza abantu kuba bakwikura mu butumwa cyangwa ibiganiro badashaka kugaragaramo . " " " "
Nubwo ubu buryo bwitezweho kuzafasha benshi ntiharatangazwa igihe buzatangira gukoreshwa .
MTN yakoze impinduka zigamije gukemura ikibazo cya " " " " réseau " " " " nke na internet igenda gahoro .
Nyuma ya aho bamwe mu bakiliya ba iyi sosiyete bagaragaje ko babangamiwe na ikibazo cya réseau nke , aho bahamagaraga ntibabashe kumvikana na abo bahamagaye ndetse na internet igenda gahoro , MTN Rwanda yashyizeho iminara mishya 40 hirya no hino mu Mujyi wa Kigali .
Mu gukemura iki kibazo hibanzwe cyane ku Karere ka Gasabo kuko ariko kari kugarijwe cyane .
Umuyobozi ushinzwe itumanaho muri MTN Rwanda , Gakwerere Eugen , yavuze ko hari impamvu zitandukanye zishobora gutuma internet igenda gahoro .
Yagize ati " " " " Hari uburyo butatu butuma umuntu abura internet , ubwa mbere ni uko umufatabuguzi wacu yaba ari ahantu serivisi zacu zitagera .
Ubwa kabiri ni uko baba bari ahantu hamaze kuba ubucucike bwinshi bwa abakoresha umurongo wa MTN , ubwa gatatu ni uko wenda icyuma bafatiraho gishobora kuba cyagize ikibazo mu gihe runaka . " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko mu gukemura ibi bibazo hashyizweho iminara kandi ko hari byinshi bikiri gukorwa kugira ngo babashe gutanga serivisi nziza .
Ati " " " " Icyo turi gukora , ku batuye ahantu hatagera réseau za MTN twabamara impungenge ya uko muri aya mezi atatu ashize twongereye iminara igera kuri 40 i Kigali , cyane cyane mu mirenge ikikije umujyi , harimo Nduba , Jabana , Rusororo , Bumbogo , aho hose na ahandi , abafatabuguzi bacu bahatuye baraza kubona impinduka , cyane
cyane abakoresha internet . " " " "
" " " " Hari na indi minara ya MTN 27 igiye gushyirwa hirya no hino bitarenze muri Kanama kugira ngo abakiliya bayo barenga miliyoni esheshatu bagerweho na serivisi nziza kandi zinoze . " " " "
Yavuze ko kandi ibibazo bitandukanye mu byitumanaho abakiliya ba MTN Rwanda bagiye bahura na byo mu minsi yashize byatewe na uko hari amavugurura yari ari gukorwa , abizeza ko bagiye gutangira kubona serivisi nziza .
MTN Rwanda yorohereje abakiliya bayo
Usibye kongera iminara bizatuma ikibazo cya réseau gikemuka , MTN Rwanda yanogeje serivisi zayo zitandukanye nka aho ushobora kwihindurira umubare wa ibanga wa MTN mobile money bitagusabye kujya ku cyicaro cyayo .
Kuri ubu umuntu wibagiwe umubare wa ibanga we ariko afite amafaranga ari munsi ya 3 000 Frw kuri Mobile Money ye ashobora kuwihindurira atiriwe ajya aho MTN ikorera , akanda * 182 * 9 * 3 # agakurikiza amabwiriza ubundi akabasha kuwihindurira .
Ikindi cyashyizweho ni kode izajya ifasha abakiliya bayo kubona amakode yandi bakeneye bitabasabye kuyafata mu mutwe ibyiswe Shortcode , aho bazajya bakanda * 456 # .
Hagiye gushyirwaho kandi uburyo bushya bwa ikoranabuhanga , aho umuntu azajya yandikira abakozi ba MTN Rwanda bitamusabye kujya aho bakorera cyangwa ngo ahamagare .
Azajya aca ku rubuga rwa .
Mu kwegereza abakiliya bayo ikoranabuhanga hagiye gushyirwaho kandi nimero izajya ikoreshwa kuri Whatsapp ku buryo ushobora kubandikira ubamenyesha ikibazo cyawe , ugahita usubizwa .
Akarusho kandi MTN Rwanda ifite ni gahunda yatangije mu mpera za 2020 ya " " " " Ni Dilu " " " " aho umuntu ajyana telefone ishaje iyo ari yo yose , yaba Tecno , Samsung , iPhone , Infinix , na izindi , akongeraho amafaranga make agahabwa indi nshya .
Bigakorerwa kuri Service Center za MTN cyangwa se hifashishijwe application ya " " " " Vuba Vuba . " " " "
Umuyobozi ushinzwe imitangire ya serivisi muri MTN , Dusabe Rosine , yavuze ko ibi byose bari kubikora kugira ngo abakiliya babo barusheho kugendana na ikoranabuhanga .
Ati " " " " Abakiliya bacu turabasaba kugendana na iterambere bagakoresha ikoranabuhanga bakikemurira ibibazo bari mu rugo batiriwe bajya kuri Service center za MTN . " " " "
Yongeyeho ko MTN izakomeza gukora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo abakiliya bayo babone serivisi nziza bishimiye .
Abafite ibibazo bya murandasi bitarakemuka bashobota kunyura kuri bagasiga ubutumwa buriho nimero bakoresha na aho batuye kugira ngo babakemurire ibyo bibazo .
Icyogajuru cya u Bushinwa kiri kuri Mars cyohereje amafoto
Kuwa Gatanu nibwo u Bushinwa bwashyize hanze amafoto yafashwe na icyogajuru Zhurong kimaze iminsi kuri uwo mubumbe udatuwe , bikaba ari ikimenyetso cya iterambere mu bushakashatsi ku isanzure icyo gihugu kigezeho .
U Bushinwa nicyo gihugu cya kabiri kigeze kuri Mars nyuma ya abashakashatsi bo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika .
Amashusho Zhurong yohereje ni aya kabiri nyuma ya andi yoherejwe muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka .
Amafoto mashya yafashwe arimo agaragaza agace gakikije aho icyo cyogajuru cyururukiye , na andi yafashwe kiri gutembera kuri Mars .
Hari indi foto yafashwe igaragaza ubutaka bwo kuri Mars na ibisate bya urutare ndetse na umucanga mwinshi .
Indi foto ni igaragaza akantu icyogajuru Zhurong cyururukiyeho na ibendera rya u Bushinwa hafi aho .
Biteganyijwe ko Zhurong izamara amezi atatu kuri Mars mu bushakashatsi bugamije kumenya niba uwo mugabane warigeze guturwaho na ibindi biremwa .
Ibiro Ntaramakuru bya Abashinwa , Xinhua byatangaje ko ibizava mu bushakashatsi bizatangarizwa isi yose .
Tanzania irashaka kuvanaho umusoro kuri telefoni zigezweho .
Intego ni ugufasha icyo gihugu kugera ku muhigo cyihaye wa uko mu 2025 abaturage 80 % bazaba bakoresha internet .
Minisitiri wa Imari na Igenamigambi , Dr Mwigulu Nchemba , yavuze ko urwego rwa itumanaho mu ikoranabuhanga rufatiye igihugu runini no mu bukungu , nkuko The Citizen yabitangaje .
Kugeza ubu ikoreshwa rya internet muri Tanzania riri ku kigero cya 46 % , Nchemba akaba asanga ahanini biterwa no guhenda kwa ibikoresho bya ikoranabuhanga birimo na za telefoni zigezweho .
MTN yatanze miliyoni 100 Frw zo kubaka ibyumba byigishirizwamo mudasobwa mu mashuri ya TVET .
ya mafaranga yashyikirijwe Minisiteri ya Uburezi kuri uyu wa Gatanu , tariki 11 Kamena 2021 , muri gahunda ngarukamwaka ya iki kigo yo kugira uruhare mu gufasha abaturage mu bikorwa bya iterambere cyane ko ari nabo bakiriya bacyo .
Kuva mu myaka 15 ishize , MTN Rwanda itegura ukwezi kwahariwe ibikorwa byayo mu baturage , aho ukwezi ka uyu mwaka kwahawe insanganyamatsiko igira iti " " " " WeCare Month . " " " "
Iki kigo gitanga serivisi za itumanaho cyiyemeje gukora ibikorwa birimo ibigamije gufasha leta muri gahunda yo kwimakaza ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwa uburezi .
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Misiteri ya Uburezi ushinzwe Ikoranabuhanga na TVET , Irere Claudette , yashimye iyi gahunda yatangijwe na MTN avuga ko bizafasha mu iterambere rya urwego rwa uburezi muri rusange .
Ati " " " " Gukoresha ikoranabuhanga mu burezi ntibikiri ishema ahubwo ni ngombwa .
Niba hari icyo icyorezo cya Covid - 19 , cyatwigishije , ni uko kwinjiza ikoranabuhanga mu burezi byihutirwa . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Umusanzu wa MTN Rwanda urihutirwa , ibi ntabwo byakwirengagizwa .
Twishimiye kwakira iyi nkunga izadufasha mu kubaka ibyumba 10 byigishirizwamo mudasobwa mu turere dutandukanye . " " " "
Ubu bufasha MTN Rwanda yatanze kandi bwari buherekejwe na internet ya ubuntu izamara umwaka na ubundi ikoreshwa muri ibyo byumba 10 byubatswe mu bigo bya amashuri 10 atandukanye .
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa MTN Rwanda , Mitwa Nga ambi , yavuze ko igihe cyo gukoresha ikoranabuhanga cyageze ndetse ikigo abereye umuyobozi gifite icyerekezo cyo gutanga ibisubizo mu rugendo rwo kwimakaza ikoranabuhanga mu Rwanda .
Yagize ati " " " " Uyu munsi twatanze miliyoni 100 Frw yo gushyiraho ibyumba byigishirizwamo mudasobwa 10 , nka imwe mu ntambwe ziganisha ku kugera ku ntego zacu . " " " "
Muri uku kwezi kwiswe " " " " We Care , " " " " MTN izatanga umusanzu wayo mu yindi mishinga igamije kuzana impinduka nziza ku baturage mu rwego rwo guteza imbere ubukungu , uburezi na ubuzima .
Apple yahishuye udushya turi muri iOS 15
Iyi iOS ibashisha abantu kuvugana kuri telefoni barebera filimi hamwe , bumvira indirimbo hamwe kandi bagakomeza no kuganira nka abicaye hamwe mu cyumba cya uruganiriro .
Ubu buryo kandi buzemerera abasanzwe bakoresha telefoni zikoresha Operating System ya Android na Windows kuba bavugana batyo na ababukoresha bifashishije iza Apple .
Apple iranateganya gutangiza utundi dushya twinshi muri telefoni ngendanwa zayo harimo gukurikirana gahunda zo mu rugo , ku kazi no kuri hoteli , kuba umuntu yafunga cyangwa agafungura imiryango ya inzu , imodoka na ibindi yifashishije ikoranabuhanga riri muri iyi iOS .
iOS 15 kandi izajya ifasha abagenzi ku bibuga bya indege mu gihe cyo kugenzura no gusuzuma ibyangombwa .
iOS 15 izaba ifite uburyo bwihariye bufasha nyirayo guhitamo amatangazo ahabwa bitewe na ibyo ahugiyemo nka aho ashobora kujya yemezamo " " " " work " " " " mu gihe ari mu kazi maze akajya yakira ubutumwa bwerekeranye na akazi gusa cyangwa se ubwoherejwe na abo bakorana .
Mu gihe nyirayo atari mu mwanya wo gusubiza abandi bamwandikira ashobora kwemezamo " " " " do not disturb " " " " nka ubutumwa buzajya bwiyohereza kuri abo bantu atarindiriye kwandikamo cyangwa gufata kuri telefoni .

Mu butumwa yanyujije kuri Instagram , Bezos yavuze ko gutemberera mu isanzure ari ikntu yifuje kuva akiri muto .

IHS Rwanda yaguze imodoka 11 zikoresha amashanyarazi
Iki gikorwa cyabereye ku cyicaro cya IHS Rwanda i Remera kuri uyu wa 4 Kanama 2021 kikaba cyitabiriwe na abantu bo mu nzego zitandukanye barimo na Mbasaderi wa u Buyapani mu Rwanda .
Iki gikorwa kandi cyahuriranye no gutangiza ku mugaragaro , Station za imodoka zikoresha umuriro wa amashanyarazi izaba iherereye ku cyicaro cya IHS .
Umuyobozi wa GreenLeaf Autofast Rwanda , Judith Muhongerwa , yashimiye IHS Rwanda ku bwo kugura izi modoka zikoresha umuriro wa amashanyarazi kuko bijyanye na gahunda ya leta yo kurengera ibidukikije hirindwa gukoresha imodoka zohereza imyuka ihumanye mu kirere .
Yagize ati " " " " Dufite icyizere kandi dutewe ishema cyane na uko u Rwanda ruri imbere mu kwimakaza ibikorwa birengera ibidukikije , binyuze mu gukoresha ikoranabuhanga rigezweho muri Afurika .
Nka GreenLeaf Autofast Rwanda twishimiye kuba bamwe mu bateza imbere iri koranabuhanga rirengera ibidukikije . " " " "
Muhongerwa yavuze ko Ikigo ayoboye ndetse na uruganda rwa Mitsubishi bazakomeza kugendera mu murongo wa u Rwanda wo kurengera ibidukikije .
Ambasaderi wa u Buyapani mu Rwanda , Imai Masahiro , yavuze ko gukoresha imodoka za amashanyarazi ari ibya ingenzi , kuko hagendewe ku mihindagurikire ya ikirere cya u Rwanda ndetse na icyerekezo rufite cya 2050 , imodoka za ubu bwoko zizagenda ziyongera ndetse bikanafasha mu kurengera ibidukikije no kubungabunga umwuka " " " " duhumeka .
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Umubano mwiza usanzwe hagati ya u Buyapani na u Rwanda , wavuyemo imbuto nziza kuko wemereye sosiyete nyinshi zo mu Buyapani kuza gukorera mu Rwanda , ndetse na indi mishinga myinshi ibihugu byombi bifitanye , harimo na uwo gushyira satellite ya u Rwanda mu kirere . " " " "
Ambasaderi Imai Masahiro yakomeje avuga ko imodoka zikoresha umuriro wa amashanyarazi zihendutse kurusha izikoresha ibikomoka kuri peteroli kandi zikanarangera ibidukikije kuko zitoherereza imyuka ihumanya mu kirere .
IHS yahawe na " " " " chargeurs " " " " za izi modoka zishyiramo umuriro mu minota iri hagati ya 15 na 25 ndetse umuriro ugiyemo ukaba wafasha imodoka kugenda ibirometero hagati ya 60 na 80 .
Gusa hari izindi zo mu rugo ushobora kuzirazaho cyangwa ukayicomeka mu gihe utari kuyikoresha kuko zo zishyiramo umuriro mu masaha atatu .
U Rwanda rurakataje mu gukoresha imodoka zikoresha umuriro wa amashanyarazi ndetse muri Werurwe 2021 Uruganda rwa Volkswagen rufite imodoka 20 zikoresha umuriro wa amashanyarazi , rwamuritse Station ya kabiri yongera umuriro mu modoka .
Mu Rwanda hatangijwe amasomo ya igihe gito yo kwerekana amashusho imbonankubone , Live Streaming .
Live streaming ni uburyo bwo gufata amajwi na amashusho bigasakazwa imbonankubone ( live ) ku batabashije kugera aho igikorwa runaka kiri kubera , ukaba wagikurikira nka uhibereye wifashsishije internet .
Ayo mashusho na amajwi bishobora kunyuzwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga cyangwa urundi rubuga rwatoranyijwe , maze wahanyura ukaba wabasha kugendana na abandi muri gahunda bitagusabye kugera aho igikorwa nyirizina kiri kubera .
Ntabwo byahabwaga agaciro cyane mu myaka yashize , ariko uwavuga ko ari kimwe mu masomo Coronavirus yahwituriye abantu ko ari ngombwa ntiyaba agiye kure ya ukuri .
Guhuriza abantu benshi hamwe mu bihugu byinshi byarahagaritswe kandi kwitabira inama , ibitaramo , imihango ya ubukwe na iyo gushyingura , kwiga , kureba umupira na ibindi bikorwa byari bisanzwe bihuza imbaga biracyakorwa ariko noneho mu gihe umubare ugenwe urenze bigasaba ko hitabazwa ikoranabuhanga .
Ibyo byose live streaming na iyo ibikora neza kandi mu buryo bworoshye .
Uretse kukugeza ahabereye igikorwa iki na iki bitagusabye ingendo , ubikora biramwinjiriza ku buryo byamutunga nka umwuga .
Uko abakenera iyo serivisi bagenda biyongera , ni ko na ababikora bagenda binjiza cyane kuko uko ayo mashusho arebwa na abantu benshi mu gihe runaka ni ko na uyabagezaho ifaranga riba ryibara .
Si ibyo gusa kuko no mu gihe abantu bananiwe bavuye mu mirimo live streaming ibafasha kuruhura ubwonko bakina imikino ya amashusho .
Aho naho nyira ukuyibagezaho aba yinjiza .
Nka ubu byitezwe ko abagera kuri miliyoni 383 mu Isi yose bazareba amashusho banyuze ku mbuga zitandukanye mu 2021 , naho Ifluencer Marketing Hub ikerekana ko mu 2025 isoko rya streaming ya amashusho rizaba rigeze ku gaciro ka miliyari 124 , 6 $ mu 2025 .
Ni muri urwo rwego AHUPA Business Network ishaka gufasha na Abanyarwanda kubona kuri ayo mafaranga cyane ko imirimo yagabanutse benshi bakaba bataka ibura rya akazi .
Yatangije amasomo ya ingenzi mu gihe gito ku bashaka kubikora , mu mahugurwa yise " " " " Live Streaming Master Class . " " " "
Ayo masomo azajya amara iminsi irindwi kuva ku wa 31 Gicurasi kugeza ku wa 30 Kamena 2021 , ahabwe abantu bose bafite ubumenyi bwa ibanze mu gukoresha mudasobwa babyifuza kandi ku musozo wayo bahabwe impamyabushobozi .
Uwitabira asabwa kuba kandi afite mudasobwa ye , ndetse akaba yamaze kwishyura 100 . 000 Frw .
Mu gihe yaba yifuza ibikoresho bijyanye no gutangira umwuga arangije ayo mahugurwa , nabyo hateganyijwe uburyo bwo kubibona byoroshye .
Ahmed Pacifique wateguye ayo mahugurwa ni umwe mu Banyarwanda bafite ubumenyi mu bijyanye na ikoranabuhanga rya amajwi na amashusho ku rwego rwo hejuru , cyane ko amaze imyaka irenga 18 abikoramo .
Ni umwe mu bashinze BTN TV ndetse ni na we Muyobozi Mukuru wayo .
Yavuze ko ari urubuga rwiza na amahirwe adasanzwe abonetse kuko ubusanzwe ayo masomo ahenda mu bindi bihugu .
