United Airlines irateganya kugura indege zifite umuvuduko uruta uwa ijwi .
Aya masezerano ya agateganyo avuga ko United Airlines izagura indege 15 zakozwe na icyo kigo , ku giciro cya miliyoni 2004 ku ndege imwe , zikazaba zigenda ku muvuduko ukubye kabiri uwa indege zisanzwe .
Byitezwe ko izi indege zikiri kubakwa , zizatangira gukorerwa amagerageza mu mwaka wa 2026 , akazarangira muri 2029 ari nabwo United Airlines izatangira kuzitwaramo abagenzi .
Urugendo rwavaga New York rugana i Londres rwatwaraga amasaha atandatu , ruzajya rutwara nibura amasaha atatu na igice , mu gihe urugendo rugana Tokyo ruvuye Amerika ruzakorwa munsi ya amasaha ane .
Indege United Airlines iteganya kugura zizaba zigendera ku muvuduko wa kilometero zirenga 1800 ku isaha imwe , ndetse ibindi byose nibugenda neza ikazagura izindi ndege 35 , ibizatuma yuzuza indege 50 zifite ubushobozi bwo kugenda ku muvuduko uruta uwa ijwi .
Boom Supersonic izakora izi ndege yatangaje ko bari gukora ikoranabuhanga rizatuma izo ndege zitangiza ikirere , kuko bitewe na umuvuduko uri hejuru izi ndege zigenderaho , zikoresha mazutu nyinshi bityo zikohereza umwuka wangiza ikirere ari mwinshi .
Si ubwa mbere indege zifite umuvuduko uruta uwa ijwi zivuzwe , kuko ahagana mu 1978 zakoreshwaga na ibigo nka British Airways na Air France , ariko zikaza guhagarikwa muri 2003 kuko zangizaga ikirere , zikagira urusaku rukabije ndetse zikaba zinahenze , kuko urugendo ruva Londres rujya New York rwashoboraga gutwara 10 000 $ .
Ibirwa bya Maurice bigiye kohereza icyogajuru cya mbere mu isanzure .
Iki cyogajuru kiroherezwa mu ijoro ryo kuri uyu wa Kane , gihagurukire mu Kigo cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika cyitwa Kennedy Space Center giherereye muri Florida .
Icyo cyogajuru nikigera mu isanzure , kizatangira kuzenguruka Isi , cyohereze amakuru mu kigo gishinzwe ubushakashatsi no guhanga udushya muri Maurice .
BBC yatangaje ko icyo cyogajuru kizajya cyohereza amakuru inshuro enye cyangwa eshanu ku munsi .
Ayo makuru azajya asesengurwa afashe icyo gihugu kiri mu Nyanja ya Abahinde , gufata ingamba zigamije gukumira ibiza .
Byitezwe ko kandi amakuru kizatanga azafasha kugenzura ibinyabuzima na undi mutungo wo mu nyanja no guhangana na ikibazo cya igabanuka rya amafi mu nyanja .
Mu bindi amakuru icyo cyogajuru kizatanga azajya yifashishwamo ni ukumenya kare ahashobora kwibasirwa na imyuzure .
Uburyo bworoshye bwagufasha kumenya ko waciwe amande na Polisi mu muhanda .
Hari umuntu ufite ikinyabiziga RA . . 305 H , ashobora kuba atazi ko afite umwenda wa ibihumbi 300 Frw , yandikiwe na camera ku wa 1 Kamena .
Ni cyo kimwe na RAE400 . . . wandikiwe ibihumbi 25 Frw ku wa 2 Kamena ku bwo kutubahiriza ibyapa .
Ubwo twandikaga iyi nkuru , twagiye ku rubuga rwa Irembo , tukajya dutomboza Pulake tutazi ba nyirazo .
Ugerageje nka icumi , usangamo nibura eshatu zifite umwenda zitarishyura .
Ibyo biterwa na impamvu nyinshi .
Imwe muri zo ni uko umuntu ashobora kuba ari mu muhanda , wenda camera ikamwandikira kubera amakosa runaka , hanyuma ntahite abona ubwo butumwa kuri telefoni ye .
Ibyo bishobora gutuma amande aba menshi ariko we ntabimenye .
Ubusanzwe ibihano bihabwa uwakoze amakosa yo mu muhanda bishyirwaho mu rwego rwo kwirinda impanuka zihitana ubuzima bwa benshi ndetse zikanangiza .
Mbere iyo Polisi yaguhagarikaga mu muhanda wakoze amakosa yakwandikiraga agapapuro , ukakajyana muri banki , bakagufasha kwishyura .
Kuva aho ikoranabuhanga riziye , ubu umuntu akora akosa mu muhanda , akakira ubutumwa bwa amande aciwe kuri telefoni ye bitewe na ikosa yakoze , buriho uburyo ashobora kwishyura , ku buryo ibyo kujya kuri banki bitakibaho .
Kubera ko ubutumwa bwa amande bwoherezwa kuri telefone , hari benshi baba batazi umubare wa amafaranga barimo bitewe na uko hari igihe ikinyabiziga kiba kitabanditseho cyangwa rimwe na rimwe yaba yafashwe na camera yo mu muhanda ubutumwa ntibuze .
Kubera izo mbogamizi zose , Polisi ya u Rwanda yashyizeho uburyo umuntu ufite telefoni ngendanwa igezweho " " " " smartphone " " " " cyangwa mudasobwa ashobora kwirebera umubare wa amafaranga ikinyabiziga cye gifite yifashishije urubuga rwa Irembo , atiriwe ajya kubarisha cyangwa se ngo abimenye kuko polisi yahagaritse
ikinyabiziga cye .
Kimwe nka izindi serivisi za leta zose , kureba amande [ Contravention ] urimo ujya ku rubuga rwa Irembo ukamanuka hasi ukareba umutwe wa amagambo wanditseho " " " " Polisi " " " " , haba hariho serivisi nyinshi zihatangirwa .
Iyo uhageze ubona interuro ya kabiri yanditseho ngo " " " " Kwishyura Konterevasiyo " " " " ukayikandaho , hakaza imbonerahamwe nto iriho ibisobanuro bya uko iyo serivisi ikoreshwa , ubundi ugakora ahanditse ngo " " " " Saba " " " " mu mabara ya ubururu .
Iyo umaze kuhakanda ureba mu mbonerahamwe , ugakanda ahanditse " " " " Nimero ya Pulaki , " " " " munsi yaho ukandikamo izo nimero ukagakora ku ruhande ahari ibara rya ubururu .
Ako kanya uhita ubona amafaranga ikinyabiziga cyawe kirimo , iyo ntayo gifite nabwo bakubwira ko ntayo .
Ibyo ni ukureba umubare wa amafaranga ikinyabiziga cyawe kirimo , ariko ushobora no kwishyura amafaranga unyuze muri iyo nzira .
Ku ruhande rwa ahanditse " " " " Nimero ya Pulaki " " " " handitseho ngo " " " " Nimero ya Tike , " " " " urahakanda maze munsi yaho ugashyiramo izo nimero ubundi ugakurikiza amabwiriza .
Nubwo hari bamwe binubira amande bacibwa mu muhanda , ni ibya ingenzi ko umushoferi utwara imodoka akwiriye kwitwararika ntarenge ku mategeko yo mu muhanda hato adatanga amafaranga atari yateganyije azize amakosa yari kwirinda bigashoboka .
Microsoft igiye gushyira ku isoko " " " " Windows " " " " nshya
Microsoft yaherukaga gushyira hanze porogaramu ya ibanze ya mudasobwa mu 2015 ubwo yasohoraga " " " " Windows 10 " " " " gusa uko imyaka yagiye ishira yagiye ikorerwa amavugurura .
Windows 10 yagiye ku isoko ikurikira " " " " Windows 8 . 1 . " " " "
Amakuru ya uko Microsoft yaba igiye gushyira hanze ubwoko bushya bwa " " " " operating system " " " " yatangiye gucicikana ubwo yatangiraga gutanga impapuro za ubutumire ku bitangazamakuru ivuga ko kuwa 24 Kamena 2021 ifite umuhango ukomeye izamurikiramo porogaramu nshya .
Icyatumye abantu barushaho gukeka ko Microsoft kuri iyi tariki aribwo izashyira hanze iyi Operating System shya ni uko ubu butumire bwaje nyuma ya icyumweru kimwe Umuyobozi Mukuru wayo , Satya Nadella , avuze ko amaze igihe agerageraza ubwoko bushya bwa Windows .
Amakuru dukesha The Verge avuga ko iyi Windows nshya izaba itandukanye na Windows 10 ndetse na izindi zose zari zisanzwe ku isoko , uhereye ka uko igaragaza ibintu .
Zimwe mu mpinduka zizayigaragaramo na uko icons zizaba zigaragara mu buryo butandukanye kandi igihe ufunguye nka " " " " folder " " " " impande zayo zizajya ziba ziburungushuye aho kugira dogere 90 nka uko byari bisanzwe .
Ubu bwoko bushya bwa Operating System buzajya ku isoko busanga ubundi Microsoft yagiye ishyira hanze mu bihe bitandukanye burimo Windows 8 , Windows 7 na Windows Vista .
Kugeza ubu ntiharatangazwa uko iyi Windows izaba yitwa gusa hari amakuru avuga ko izitwa " " " " Windows 11 . " " " "
U Rwanda na u Budage byatangije irushanwa rizavumbura abanyempano mu ikoranabuhanga .
Ni irushanwa ryiswe " " " " Tech Upskill Talent Detection " " " " rigamije kubaka no kongera ubushobozi bwa abanyadushya na abanyempano mu bya ikoranabuhanga bo mu Rwanda .
Mu kiganiro na abanyamakuru cyabereye muri IPRC Kicukiro ku wa 2 Kamena 2021 , hasobanuwe ko iryo rushanwa rireba abafite ubumenyi mu bijyanye na ikoranabuhanga ( ICT & Engineering ) , haba mu gukora za porogaramu ( software ) cyangwa ibindi byakora hifashishijwe mudasobwa ( hardware ) na ubundi buryo bwafasha mu gutunganya ibintu runaka mu nganda ( manufacturing )
Abo bazatoranywa mu Ishuri Rikuru rya Imyuga na Ubumenyingiro ( RP ) na andi yigisha amasomo nka ayo ( TVETs ) na abandi babyifuza bataba muri ayo mashuri ariko bafite imishinga bazaba babisabye .
Umuyobozi ushinzwe gukurikirana Ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya uyu mushinga muri ICT Chamber , Dushime Christophe , yatangaje ko imishinga myinshi ya udushya mu ikoranabuhanga ikunze kuba iri mu Mujyi wa Kigali , bityo ko iyi gahunda yatangijwe izagezwa mu bice bya icyaro kugira ngo icyo cyuho kizibwe .
Yagize ati " " " " Twasanze ibikorwa bya ikoranabuhanga byinshi biherereye muri Kigali , kandi niba dushaka ko u Rwanda ruba icyitegererezo mu bya ikoranabuhanga muri Afurika nta na umwe ugomba gusigara inyuma . " " " "
" " " " Ni yo mpamvu twatekereje ko tugomba gusanga no kugaragaza za mpano ziri hanze ya Kigali , kuko ikibazo ntabwo ari ugufasha sosiyete zatangiye gukora , [ ahubwo ] ikibazo ni ukumenya uko dukora umuyoboro ku buryo abanyeshuri barangije bafite ubumenyi buhagije bwo kuba bahanga imirimo na udushya babigeraho . " " " "
Ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya uyu mushinga ryashyizwe mu maboko ya 250STARTUPS isanzwe ifasha imishinga itandukanye kugera ku baterankunga , FabLab izwiho kuba uruhumbikiro rwa imishinga ya ikoranabuhanga ndetse na KLab ihuza ba rwiyemezamirimo mu bya ikoranabuhanga bagahanga udushya .
Umuyobozi wa Ishuri Rikuru rya Imyuga na Ubumenyingiro ( Rwanda Polytechnic ) , Dr Gashumba James , yabwiye itangazamakuru ko iri rushanwa ari ingenzi kuko rizatuma abanyeshuri berekana impano bafite zagirira igihugu akamaro .
Yakomeje ati " " " " Nka Kaminuza tuba dufite ingengo ya imari idahagije , amikoro yacu ari make .
Guhuza abo banyeshuri na abashoramari na abandi bantu bareba bakavuga bati " " " " hano hari akantu keza " " " " nashyiramo amafaranga , uwo mwana na we akabyungukiramo bikagira aho bimugeza .
Niko gufatanya na ibikorwa nka ibi bya ICT Chamber bigiye kuduhuza na abandi bashobora kuba bafite ubushobozi kuturusha dusanga ari igisubizo . " " " "
Biteganyijwe ko abanyadushya mu ikoranabuhanga bazatoranywa muri iri rushanwa bazahabwa amahirwe yo gukorana na imishinga ya 250STARTUPS , naho abanyempano bo bemererwe gukora imenyerezamwuga mu miryango ya imbere mu gihugu na sosiyete za Abadage .
Bashobora no kuhakura amahirwe yo kubona akazi binyuze muri KLab .
Kuri iyi nshuro ya mbere ya iri rushanwa hazafatwa abanyempano 30 bose hamwe muri ibyo byiciro byombi , bafashwe kugeza mu Ukuboza 2021 .
Gusaba kuba umwe muri abo banyamahirwe bizarangira ku wa 17 Kamena 2021 , aho usaba azajya anyura kuri :
Ku banyempano uwiyandikisha asabwa kuba hari umushinga umwe cyangwa myinshi yakozeho ku ishuri , ushobora kwerekanwa hakoreshejwe amafoto cyangwa link ; kuba azi neza ibyo gukora porogaramu za telefoni no guhanga website no kuba azi gukoresha porogaramu ya CAD .
Abanyadushya biyandikisha basabwa kuba imishinga yaba iya software cyangwa iya hardware no kuba ishushanyije cyangwa yarakorewe inyigo ishobora kwerekanwa mu mafoto cyangwa link .
Hasinywe amasezerano agamije kubaka ubushobozi bwa urubyiruko rwa Afurika mu bijyanye na ikoranabuhanga .
Ubusanzwe Digital Opportunity Trust ( DOT ) ikorana bya hafi na urubyiruko , ibigo byigenga , guverinoma zitandukanye na imiryango igamije kurengera sosiyete , mu bihugu bisaga 25 kuva yashingwa mu 2001 , ifite urubyiruko rusaga 6000 rwahinduye ubuzima bwa agera kuri miliyoni muri Afurika , Aziya , Amerika ya Epfo na Canada .
DOT yatangaje ko yagiranye amasezerano ya imikoranire na IBM agamije kubakira ubushobozi urubyiruko rwa abakobwa na abasore mu bijyanye no gukoresha ikoranabuhanga , kubagira abashobora guhangana ku isoko rya umurimo , ubumenyi mu bijyanye no kwihangira imirimo , imibereho myiza na iterambere rya ubukungu .
Imikoranire hagati ya impande zombi ishingiye ku bwuzuzanye aho IBM izakoresha ikoranabuhanga ryayo na abahanga bafite inararibonye mu guhanga imirimo , naho DOT yo ikaba ari inzira yo kugera ku rubyiruko rwifuzwa .
Muri ibi bikorwa bigamije kubakira urubyiruko ubushobozi , DOT yatangaje ko izakorana na imiryango itandukanye ya imbere mu bihugu kugira ngo bafashe abakiri bato kwisanga muri porogaramu ya IBM izwi nka Open P - Tech .
Open P - Tech ni uburyo bwo kwigisha ikoranabuhanga no kubaka ubushobozi mu ikoranabuhanga uwayigishijwe , ifasha kandi kugira ubumenyi bwa ibanze no guhangana mu ikoreshwa ikoranabuhanga .
Ubu ni uburyo bugamije guhereza abanyeshuri ubumenyi bwa ibanze mu ikoranabuhanga bukenerwa mu nguni zose , burimo gukoresha Al , Cloud computing , gukumira ibitero na ibyaha bikorerwa ku ikoranabuhanga ( Cybersecurity ) no gukora igishushanyo mbonera " " " " design thinging , " " " " teaming na Presentation .
Biteganyijwe ko uyu mushinga uzafasha abagera ku bihumbi 40 bo mu bihugu birimo u Rwanda , Tanzania , Uganda , Zambia , Malawi , Ghana , Jordan na Lebanon .
Muri aba bagera kuri 70 % bazaba ari aba igitsina gore .
Kuba abagore bari mu barebwa cyane na iyi gahunda byatewe na uko umubare wa abari mu bijyanye na ikoranabuhanga ukiri muto , aho abasaga 50 % bya abagore bo mu bihugu bikiri mu nzira ya amajyambere bagaragaraga gake gashoboka mu ikoreshwa rya ikoranabuhanga .
Umuyobozi Mukuru wungirije ushinzwe Imikoranire ku rwego Mpuzamahanga muri IBM , Justina Nixon - Saintil , yavuze ko iyo myumvire ariyo bifuza guhindura binyuze mu gukorana na Digital Opportunity Trust , cyane ko isanzwe ifite umubano mwiza na urubyiruko hirya no hino ku Isi .
Yagize ati " " " " Gutanga ubumenyi ku mwuga mu rubyiruko , bya umwihariko abagore na ba bandi baturuka mu miryango ya amikoro make , bishobora guhindura ubuzima .
Hamwe na ikigo nka IBM binyuze muri porogaramu ya Open P - Tech na imbaraga za imiryango irimo na DOT twifuza kongera ubumenyi no kubaremera amahirwe . " " " "
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa DOT , Janet Longmore , yavuze ko ashingiye ku mikoranire isanzwe hagati ya impande zombi yizeye ko bizatanga umusaruro .
Ati " " " " DOT na IBM bifitanye amateka akomeye ya imikoranire kandi icyizere cya iterambere gihuriweho gituma habaho imikoranire myiza .
Ubu bufatanye binyuze muri iyi porogaramu ya Open P - Tech , ni urugero rwiza rwa uburyo inzego za abikorera na ibigo byita ku mibereho myiza ya abaturage byakorana , bigakoresha umutungo ukagirira akamaro urubyiruko , haba mu bice bya icyaro na ibice bya kure .
Twese twizera ko urubyiruko rwifuza guhanga udushya no kuba umusemburo wa impinduka mu mirimo ya ahazaza . " " " "
Ubushakashatsi DOT yakoze bwagaragaje ko urubyiruko rufite ubumenyi mu ikoreshwa rya ikoranabuhanga ari rwo ruvamo abayobozi na abagamije guhindura sosiyete barimo , igihugu ndetse na ubukungu .
Wari uziko umuvuduko Isi igenderaho wiyongereye ; Uku niko byagenze .
Ibi babishingira ku buryo kera mu myaka miliyoni 600 ishize , Isi yizengurukaga amasaha 21 gusa , bivuze ko umunsi wamaraga amasaha 21 , ariko uko imyaka yagiye ihita igihe yizenguruka cyagiye cyiyongera ku buryo ubu umunsi umara amasa 24 byerekana ko Isi yagiye igenda gahoro .
Gusa mu 2020 byarahindutse , abashakashatsi bo mu Kigo Mpuzamahanga gishinzwe uko Isi izenguruka ( The International Earth Rotation and Reference Systems Service , IERS ) gihereye i Paris mu Bufaransa bagaragaje ko aho kugenda gahoro ahubwo isigaye yihuta .
Ni ibintu bitigeze bibaho mu myaka 50 ishize ndetse mu 2020 habayeho iminsi 28 ifite amasegonda make ku yo umunsi ugomba kugira 86 . 400 .
Forbes itangaza ko muri iyi minsi harimo umunsi umwe , ku itariki 19 Nyakanga 2020 wagize igihe gito kuva igihe kubara amasaha byatangiriye , umara amasegonda ari munsi ya 86 . 400 ho milliseconde 1 . 4602 [ milliseconde ingana na isegonda rimwe ugabanyije 1000 ] .
Umunsi muto waherukaga kubaho hari tariki 5 Nyagakanga 2005 , aho Isi yizengurutse amasegonda ari munsi ya 86 . 400 ho milliseconde 1 . 0516 .
Ibi bishobora kugaragara nka aho ari igihe gito ariko bigira ingaruka ku isaha , cyane ko hari système nyinshi zigendera ku myubakire ya isaha zihereye kuri milliseconde , ku buryo igihe habayeho impinduka niyo yaba nto bishobora guteza ikibazo .
Izo harimo ikoranabuhanga rya GPS rikoreshwa na Satellite , uburyo bwa NTP bukoreshwa mu kugena isaha muri telefoni zigezweho ( smart phone ) , mudasobwa ndetse no muri serivisi zitandukanye za itumanaho zikoresha murandasi .
Ibi byose bishobora kugirwaho ingaruka na uku kwihuta kwisi .
Abashakashatsi bavuga ko batazi impamvu nyakuri yatumye Isi yihuta bitandukanye na uko byahoze .
Ariko hari impamvu nyinshi bakeka zishobora kubitera zirimo imitingito , imitere ya ikirere , inyanja ndetse na ukwezi .
Indi impamvu ikomeye bakeka ni ugushyuha ku Isi guterwa na imyuka ihumanya ikirere , kwatumye urubura ruba rwarabaye nka umusozi ruherereye hafi ya aho Isi yikaragira ( pôle ) rwaratangiye kuyonga bigatuma amazi ya inyanja ziri kuri pôle yiyongera , Isi ikaremera bigatuma yihuta .
Nubwo bimeze bitya ariko , nta ngaruka na nke bizagira ku mibereho ya abantu ndetse aba bashakashatsi bavuze ko bizamara igihe runaka kitari kinini , ubundi Isi igasubira ku kugenda gahoro nka uko byahoze .
Menya ibidasanzwe kuri Cotam Unité , indege Perezida Macron agendamo .
Cotam Unité cyangwa se COTAM 001 ni izina rihabwa indege itwaye Perezida wa u Bufaransa .
Mu Ugushyingo 2010 ni bwo indege Airbus A330 - 200 yasimbuye indege zari zisanzwe zikoreshwa mu gutwara Perezida wa u Bufaransa .
Iyi ndege ni nayo iherutse kugeza Perezida Emmanuel Macron ku Kibuga cya Indege Mpuzamahanga cya Kigali mu ruzinduko rwa iminsi ibiri yagiriye mu Rwanda .
Iyi ndege ifatwa nka iya gisirikare cyane ko aricyo gishinzwe kuyigenzura umunsi ku munsi aha ni naho ikomora izina ryayo kuko mu busanzwe Cotam ni impine ya umutwe wa Igisirikare cya u Bufaransa kirwanira mu kirere uzwi nka ( Commandement du transport aérien militaire ) gusa mu 1994 uyu mutwe waje guhindura izina ariko indege itwaye Perezida yose
ikomeza kwitwa gutya .
Mu 2010 Nicolas Sarkozy wayoboraga u Bufaransa niwe watanze igitekerezo cya uko hagurwa indege nshya izajya itwara Perezida wa iki gihugu .
Iki gihe yasabaga ko hagurwa indege yagutse kandi ishobora gukora urugendo rurerure idahagaze kuko yavugaga ko ebyiri zakoreshwaga zo mu bwoko bwa Airbus A319CJ zifite ubushobozi buri hasi .
Iki gitekerezo cya Sarkozy cyakiriwe neza na Leta ya u Bufaransa ariko Minisiteri ya Ingabo igaragaza ko idafite amafaranga ahagije yatuma igura indege nshya , ahubwo ifata umwanzuro wo kugura iyakoreshejwe ariko ikavugururwa .
Aha niho Minisiteri ya Ingabo yarambagije indege nziza ikwiriye Perezida wa Igihugu maze iza guhitamo Airbus A330 - 200 yari isanzwe ari iya ikigo gikora ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere cya Air Caraïbes .
Amakuru avuga ko iyi ndege yaguzwe arenga miliyari 60Frw ariko ikaza kugenda yongerwamo ikoranabuhanga ritandukanye ari nako ikorerwa amavugurura atuma iva ku kuba indege ya abagenzi ikaba indege itwara Umukuru wa Igihugu .
Iyi ndege kugeza uyu munsi itwara Perezida Macron ikunze guhabwa akazina ka Inyoni na abasirikare bamurinda .
Iyi ndege yihariye ikoreshwa na Perezida wa u Bufaransa , ifite icyumba cyihariye cya perezida kirimo ibitanda bibiri , urwambariro , ubwogero na ubwiherero bubiri .
Ifitemo ibiro bya Perezida ashobora gukoreramo akazi ke ka buri munsi akanatangiramo amabwiriza ku ngabo cyangwa abandi bose ashatse kugezaho ijambo .
Iyi Airbus A330 - 200 ya Perezida wa u Bufaransa kandi ifite aho Perezida ashobora kunywera ikawa , ikagira ibiro bya umunyamabanga we ndetse na icyumba cya inama cyayo gifite uburyo butuma amajwi adasohoka , iki cyumba cya inama kandi kirimo ameza ashobora gukikizwa na abantu 12 bicaye bari mu nama .
Itumanaho rikoreshwa muri iyi ndege rimufasha gukomeza inshingano nka umukuru wa igihugu , afite gutanga ubutumwa ashaka aho ashaka amasaha 24 ku yandi .
Indege ya Macron kandi mu gihe akiri ku mwanya wa umukuru wa Igihugu ifite gahunda za ubuvuzi buteye imbere aho muri yo harimo icyumba gito kirimo serivisi za ubuvuzi mu gihe cyose haba hari uzikeneye .
Cotam Unité kandi ifite igice gishobora kujyamo abantu 60 baherekeje Perezida barimo abanyamakuru , abakozi na abandi ba ingenzi umukuru wa igihugu yakwifuza guherekezwa na bo .
Iyi ndege ya Macron ihuriye na Air Force One itwara perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ku buryo bwo kwirinda ibisasu bikomeye nka misile , zikomora ku gisirikare cya Israel kiri mu bikomeye ku isi nka uko byatangajwe na urubuga rwa Mako rwo muri Israel aho ruvuga ko uburyo bwa ubwirinzi izi ndege zidasanzwe zikoresha bwakozwe
na Ikigo cya Aba - Israel cyitwa Elbit Systems .
Mu zindi ndege zakoreshejwe mu gutwara abaperezida ba u Bufaransa harimo Falcon7X kuva mu 2009 kugeza 2010 , iyi yo iracyanifashishwa mu gihe perezida agiye hafi cyangwa ahantu hadafite ubushobozi bwo kwakira indege nini nka Airbus A330 - 200 , ikoreshwa kandi mu gutwara Minisitiri wa Intebe na abandi bayobozi bakuru .
Google yatangije impinduka zizatuma ushaka kuyibikaho ibintu byinshi yishyura .
Umuntu wese ufunguye konti kuri Google , binyuze nko muri Gmail , aba afite uburenganzira bwo kubika amakuru ari munsi ya 15GB kuri " " " " Google Drive , " " " " serivise ibika amakuru ya abakiliya ba Google .
Kuva muri 2015 , Google ifite indi serivise yitwa " " " " Google Photos , " " " " ifasha abantu mu kubika amafoto na video zabo zitaremereye ku buntu , kandi ikaba itagira umupaka mu bijyanye na amakuru ishobora kubikwaho .
Nyuma yo kubona uburyo abantu bakomeje kugira inyota yo kubika amakuru arimo amafoto na video ahantu hizewe , mu 2018 Google yazanye indi serivise izwi nka " " " " Google One , " " " " icuruza umwanya wo kubikaho amakuru ku bantu bamaze kuzuza za 15GB za ubuntu kuri " " " " Google Drive , " " " " ariko bakaba bifuza undi mwanya wo kubikaho
amakuru yabo .
Mu gutera ingabo mu bitugu iyi serivise nshya , Google yavuze ko abantu bakoresha Google Photos batari basanzwe bafite umwanya ntarengwa wo kubikaho amakuru , bazajya bahabwa 15GB za ubuntu nka uko bigenda kuri Google Drive , ubundi umuntu yamara umwanya yateganyirijwe , agomba kugura uwundi kuri " " " " Google One . " " " "
Ku bantu bari basanzwe bafite amafoto na video kuri Google Photos , iki cyemezo ntikizagira ingaruka ku makuru bari barabitseho , ahubwo kizagira ingaruka ku makuru bazatangira gushyiraho nyuma ya tariki ya 1 Kamena 2021 .
Igiciro cya macye kuri Google One ni 2 $ ( arenga 1 , 900 Frw ) ku kwezi , umuntu akazajya ahabwa umwanya ungana na 100GB cyangwa se 20 $ ku mwaka .
Uwifuza 200GB azajya yishyura 3 $ ku kwezi na 30 $ ku mwaka mu gihe ushaka 2TB azajya yishyura 10 $ ku kwezi na 100 $ ku kwezi .
Umuntu ukoresha Google One kandi azaba afite uburenganzira bwo kuyisangira na abandi bantu batanu .
Bivugwa ko 80 % bya abasanzwe bakoresha serivise za Google Drive batazakenera kugura serivise za Google One vuba kuko ibyo babikaho bidasaba umwanya munini , icyakora bitewe na uburyo abantu bashishikajwe no kubika amakuru yabo ahantu hizewe ,
byitezwe ko abazakenera serivise zo kubika amakuru yabo mu buryo bwa ikoranabuhanga baziyongera mu minsi iri imbere .
Microsoft yashinje u Burusiya igitero cya ikoranabuhanga cyagabwe kuri emails zisaga ibihumbi bitatu .
Microsoft yavuze ko igitero cyo muri iki Cyumweru cyagabwe kuri emails 3 . 000 za abo mu miryango na ibigo byiganjemo ibyo muri Amerika , ariko ba nyirazo bakaba ari abo mu bihugu 24 .
Iyo Sosiyete yasobanuye ko ibigo byari bigenderewe cyane ari ibya Guverinoma kandi bifite aho bihuriye na amahanga , bityo ko " " " " ubutasi bwa u Burusiya ari bwo bwabikoze " " " " kuko no mu mwaka ushize hari ikindi kijya gusa na icyo cyagabwe kuri Sosiyete ya Solar Winds hagenderewe kwiba amakuru nka ayo .
Icyo gihe igitero cyageze ku bigo bya Leta ya Amerika , sosiyete 100 za abikorera na indi miryango mike ya Abongereza .
Abantu 18 . 000 ni bo bagizweho ingaruka nacyo .
Igitero giheruka ngo cyatangiye hinjirirwa email ikoreshwa mu kumenyekanisha ibikorwa bya Ikigega cya Abanyamerika gishinzwe Iterambere Mpuzamahanga ( USAID ) , abakigabye bayikoresha bohereza ubutumwa busa na ubw ubugiraneza ariko burimo link ukandaho ikazana virus kuri mudasobwa , ukibwa amakuru ndetse na izindi mudasobwa zihuriye ku
muyoboro wa internet umwe na iyo zikagerwaho na virus .
Microsoft yatangaje ko icyo gitero cyagiye gihagarikwa kuri mudasobwa nyinshi ariko ntiharamenyekana umubare wa ab ibwe amakuru na mudasobwa zashyizweho virus .
U Burusiya bwabihakanye buvuga ko ntaho buhuriye na ibyo bitero byombi , nka uko no mu mwaka ushize bwabigenje
Hagiye gutoranywa imishinga mito ya ishoramari rishingiye ku ikoranabuhanga izahabwa ubufasha bwa miliyoni 19 Frw .
Ni ku nshuro ya kabiri iyo mishinga igiye gutoranywa muri gahunda yiswe FinTech Hub ibaho ku bufatanye na Ikigega cya Umuryango wa Abibumbye gishyigikira Iterambere rya Imishinga yo mu bihugu bikiri mu nzira ya amajyambere ( UNCDF ) Ishami rya u Rwanda , Minisiteri ya Ikoranabuhanga na Inovasiyo na Kigali Innovation City .
Ine yatoranyijwe ku ikubitiro mu Ukwakira 2020 irimo Benefactors , Hepta Pay Ltd , Raisin Ltd na Exuus .
Mu kiganiro na itangazamakuru cyabaye kuri uyu wa 25 Gicurasi 2021 , Umuyobozi wa Ishami rishinzwe Ikoranabuhanga muri PSF ari naryo rigenzura ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya iyo gahunda , Ntale Alex , yavuze ko buri nyuma ya amezi atandatu hazajya hatoranywa imishinga itanu , ifashwe hagamijwe kongerera ba nyirayo ubumenyi , kubahuza
na abafatanyabikorwa , kubafasha kubona igishoro no kugera ku isoko , ndetse no kugaragaza amahirwe ahari .
Yavuze ko intego ya FinTech Hub ari uko 80 % bya imishinga ikora iryo shoramari mu Rwanda yagerwaho na iyo gahunda , byarimba bikaba 100 % .
Yakomeje ati " " " " Turashaka gushyigikira imishinga yacu ku buryo ibasha kongera umubare wa abakiliya ikaguka , ari nako tubafasha mu bukangurambaga bwo gutangiza imishyikirano na imikoranire izayifasha [ imishinga ] gukura . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa UNCDF Ishami rya u Rwanda , Uwamahoro Roselyne , yavuze ko icyo Kigega cyagize ubufatanye muri FinTech Hub hagamijwe gushyigikira uburyo bwo gushaka ibisubizo bya ibibazo byugarije ubukungu hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga ; bya umwihariko nyuma ya ingaruka bwagizweho na icyorezo cya COVID - 19 .
Yagize ati " " " " Turi gushaka uko twakorana na za guverinoma zitandukanye bya umwihariko iya u Rwanda , mu guteza imbere ubukungu bushingiye ku ikoranabuhanga . " " " "
Umusesesenguzi wa Ikoranabuhanga rya Ibigo bya Leta muri Minisiteri ya Ikoranabuhanga na Inovasiyo , Munezero Angelos , yatangaje ko FinTechHub iri mu murongo umwe na gahunda Leta ya u Rwanda yihaye yo guteza imbere ihangwa rya udushya mu ikoranabuhanga , haba imbere mu gihugu no mu Karere .
Yifashishije urugero rwa indege za Drone zifashishwa mu buvuzi , yagize ati " " " " Ikoranabuhanga ritangirizwa mu Rwanda hashakishwa ibisubizo [ bya ibibazo bihari ] nyuma rikitabazwa na ibihugu bya amahanga . " " " "
Drone za Zipline zatangiye gukoreshwa mu rwego rwa ubuzima mu 2016 , nyuma ziza kwitabazwa na Ghana , Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na u Buyapani .
Imishinga itoranywa muri FinTech Hub ihabwa ubufasha mu buryo bwa ubumenyi ikeneye , ubwa imikorere ndetse igahabwa amafaranga ya igishoro ku musozo wa iyo gahunda imara amezi atandatu .
Inyungu umushinga watoranyijwe ukuramo zibarirwa agaciro ka 20 . 000 $ .
Imishinga iri gutoranywa binyuze mu gukora igenzura ku rwego igezeho ikura ( kuko hafashwa iyatangiye gukora ) , igihe ishobora kuramba ndetse na ibisubizo itanga mu ishoramari ryimakaza ikoranabuhanga .
Abashaka kurushanwa babisaba banyuze kuri rubuga
NASA muri gahunda yo kohereza icyogajuru ku Kwezi mu 2023 .
Icyo kigo gisanzwe gifite umushinga wiswe Artemis ugamije kuzageza umushakashatsi wa umugore wa mbere ku Kwezi mu 2024 , hakagezwayo na uw umugabo bwa kabiri nyuma ya Neil Armstrong na Edwin Aldrin Buzz bahageze ku wa 20 Nyakanga 1969 .
Mu gutegura urugendo rwa abo bahanga mu bya isanzure , NASA izohereza icyogajuru cyiswe VIPER mu mpera za 2023 , kizaba gifite amatara kikahagendagenda mu gihe cya iminsi 100 ya hano ku Isi igereranywa na itatu yo ku Kwezi .
Cyateguranywe batiri ya imirasire ya izuba ifite ubushobozi bwo kubika 450 watts .
Dail Mail yatangaje ko icyo cyogajuru kizaba cyoherejwe ngo kijye gushaka ahantu heza abashakasahatsi bo mu 2024 bazashinga ibirindiro na uduce turimo amazi .
Umuyobozi wa Itsinda rishinzwe Ubushakashatsi bwo kuri uwo mubumbe muri NASA , Lori Glaze , yavuze ko amakuru VIPER izafata azafasha abazoherezwayo kumenya ahantu hatuje bajya ndetse na aho urubura ruherereye .
Yagize ati " " " " Amakuru tuzahabwa na VIPER afite ikintu gikomeye azafasha abashakashatsi bacu mu kumenya ahantu hakwiye [ bakorera ] na ahari urubura ku Kwezi . " " " "
Byitezwe ko VIPER izagwa mu gice cya Amajyepfo , ikagenda kilometero 20 .
Umushinga wayo ufite agaciro ka miliyoni 433 . 5 $ .
Umushinga wa Artemis witezweho ko nyuma yo kugeza umugore ku Kwezi nka agashya mu 2024 , hazakurikiraho gutuza umuntu kuri uwo mubumbe mu 2028 .
BAL yatanze mudasobwa 150 ku barimu bo mu mashuri ya i Kigali ( Amafoto )
Iki gikorwa cyabaye kuri uyu wa 23 Gicurasi 2021 hagati ya umukino wa umunsi wa karindwi wa Basketball Africa League wahuje AS Douanes na Zamalek muri Kigali Arena .
Ubuyobozi bwa Basketall Africa League bwahisemo gushyigikira uburezi muri Afurika nyuma ya uko bukomwe mu nkokora na icyorezo cya COVID - 19 cyerekanye ko hakwiye ko nabwo bugendana na ikoranabuhanga rigezweho mu myigishirize , mu kazi no mu itumanaho .
BAL yatanze mudasobwa 150 kugira ngo ishyigikire umushinga wo kugeza mudasobwa kuri buri munyeshuri na buri mwarimu mu Rwanda nka uko byagarutsweho na Perezida wayo , Amadou Gallo Fall mu butumwa bwe .
Ati " " " " Kuva mu mwaka ushize , BAL yashyigikiye imiryango itandukanye mu kurwanya icyorezo cya COVID - 19 .
Uyu munsi twishimiye gushyigikira abarezi binyuze mu mushinga wa REB wo gufasha buri mwarimu kubona ibyo akeneye bijyanye na iki kinyejana cya 21 . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Buri mwarimu hano , iri joro arabona mudasobwa yo gushyigikira iterambere rya umwuga wabo .
Uyu munsi ndashaka gushimira Umuyobozi Mukuru wa REB , Dr Nelson Mbarushimana na ikipe ye bari kumwe natwe hano .
Uyu munsi ni uwanyu barimu , ndabashimira ubwitange mugirira urubyiruko rwacu . " " " "
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Urwego rwa Igihugu rushinzwe Uburezi bwa Ibanze ( REB ) , Dr . Nelson Mbarushimana , yavuze ko kuba BAL yatanze izi mudasobwa ari ikimenyetso cya uko ishyigikiye ikoranabuhanga kandi bijyanye na intego ziyemejwe mu burezi bwa u Rwanda .
Ati " " " " Ni ikimenyetso cyiza kigaragaza ko bakunda ikoranabuhanga cyane ko natwe twatangiye gahunda yo guha mudasobwa buri mwarimu .
Dufite intego ya uko tuzaha buri mwarimu mudasobwa kuko iki cyorezo cyatwigishije ko umwarimu agomba kuba ayifite kugira ngo abashe kwigisha neza , anakoreshe ikoranabuhanga ahashyira amasomo ye , anavugana na abanyeshuri aho bari , bityo ireme rya uburezi rigatera imbere . " " " "
Uwimana Pétronille uri mu bahawe izi mudasobwa , yavuze ko bigiye kuzamura imyigishirize kuko wasangaga umwarimu akoresha ibitabo bihari gusa , ariko ubu bakaba zajya banashakisha ibintu bitandukanye bazifashishije .
Ati " " " " Ziraza kudufasha gukora ubushakashatsi , ubundi twigishaga twifashishije ibitabo biri mu ishuri .
Bizazamura urwego rwa imyigishirize . " " " "
Mbarushimana Steven wigisha muri GS Kimisagara na we yavuze ko bigiye kuzamura imyigishirize kuko hari ubumenyi bazungukira kuri internet .
Ati " " " " Iyi mudasobwa mpawe iraza kumfasha gufasha abanyeshuri mu myigire ya buri munsi .
Twibandaga mu bitabo , ariko ubu dushobora kujya kuri Google tukahabona amakuru menshi , ziradufasha gusobanukirwa . " " " "
Abarimu 150 bahawe izi mudasobwa ni abo mu bigo bya amashuri 65 byo mu Turere twa Nyarugenge , Kicukiro na Gasabo .
Muri iki gihe cya vuba , u Rwanda rwubatse ibyumba bishya bya amashuri 22 . 000 ndetse rutanga akazi ku barimu bashya 29 . 000 .
Irushanwa rya Basketball Africa League riri kuba ku nshuro ya mbere , ryateguwe na FIBA Afrique ku bufatanye na Shampiyona ya Basketball muri Amerika , NBA .
Amakipe 12 yo mu bihugu 12 bya Afurika ni yo yaryitabiriye , aho rizasozwa tariki ya 30 Gicurasi 2021 .
Microsoft yatangaje ihagarikwa rya burundu rya Internet Explorer . Sean Lyndersay uhagarariye porogaramu nshya ya uru ruganda yitwa Microsoft Edge yasimbuye Internet Explorer , yavuze ko izahagarikwa tariki 15 Kamena 2022 .
Bivuze ko hakiri umwaka wo kuyifashisha ku bayikoresha .
Internet Explorer yatangiye tariki 16 Kanama 1995 , yagiye yigarurira Isi ya ikoranabuhanga uko murandasi yagendaga irushaho gukoreshwa , kugeza ubwo mu 2004 iciye agahigo ikiharira isoko rya abantu bakoresha murandasi bashakisha , ku gipimo cya 95 % .
Yakomeje muri iyo nzira kugeza mu 2012 , ubundi nyuma yaho itangira kubura abafana .
Icyo gihe izindi porogaramu zifasha abantu gushakisha ibintu kuri internet zari zimaze igihe zivutse , zizana udushya Internet Explorer itagiraga zitangira kwigarurira imitima ya abakoresha murandasi , harimo nka Chrome ya Google yatangiye mu 2008 yazanye umwihariko wo gukoreshwa muri telefone ngendanwa , bituma imenyekana cyane .
Kugeza ubu Chrome ni yo ifite isoko rinini ku Isi , aho yihariye 65 % bya abashakisha kuri murandasi , igakurikirwa na iyitwa Safari ya Ikigo Apple gikora telefone za iPhone , ifite 19 % , iya gatatu ikaba Firefox ya Mozilla ifite 3 . 59 % , iya kane ni Edge yasimbuye Internet Explorer ifite 3 . 39 % nka uko bitangazwa na ikigo cya Statscounter gikora ubusesenguzi
bwa imbuga za ikoranabuhanga .
Sean Lyndersay watangaje ibya ihagarikwa rya Internet Explorer , yavuze ko Microsoft Edge yayisimbuye ifite udushya twinshi ndetse yaje ikosora amakosa yose ya Internet Explorer , aho yihuta cyane kuyirusha , ikagira na uburyo bugezweho bwo gushakisha ibintu bitandukanye .
Guhagarikwa kwa iyi porogaramu ntabwo bije bitunguranye kuko muri Kanama 2020 Microsoft yatangaje ko iyi porogaramu izaba yahagaritswe muri Kanama 2021 , gusa igihe kiza kwigizwa inyuma .
Nubwo izahagarikwa mu 2022 , tariki 17 Kanama 2021 ntibizaba bigishoboka ko Internet Explorer ikoreshwa muri serivisi zitandukanye za Microsoft nka Microsoft 365 , Outlook ikoreshwa mu kohererezanya email ndetse na One Drive ikoreshwa mu kubika ibintu ubikuye kuri murandasi ( download ) .
Amerika : Ikigo cya Itumanaho AT & T na Discovery bigiye guhuzwa .
Ubu bufatanye bufite agaciro ka miliyari 150 za amadolari ya Amerika bwitezweho gutangiza muri Hollywood studio ya akataraboneka nyuma ya aho AT & T yegukanye CNN , HBO na studio ya Warner Bros ikora filime kuva mu 2018 .
Aganira na BBC , Dan Ives , Umuyobozi wa Ikigo cya Ubushakashatsi mu Ikoranabuhanga , Wedbush Securities , yavuze ko ubu bufatanye bwa AT & T na Discovery bwitezweho kuzafasha ibikorwa byayo mu guhangana na ibindi bigo nka Netflix , Disney na Amazon , yongeraho ko iyi ari intambwe nziza itewe na iki kigo .
Uku guhuza amaboko kuzahuriza hamwe inzu ikora film ya Warner Bros . WarnerMedia ifitwe na HBO na HBO Max ubu ifite abafatabuguzi bagera kuri miliyoni 64 ku Isi yose na ho Discovery izwiho kwerekana ibyerekeye inyamaswa imaze kugeza ku bayikurikira muri Amerika miliyoni 88 .
Ubwo AT & T yegukanaga Time Werner mu myaka itatu ishize yateganyaga gushyiraho igitangazamakuru na ikigo cya itumanaho gikomeye .
AT & T yafashe ideni rya miliyari 14 ryiyongera kuryo yari isanganywe aho yiteze ko ubu bufatanye na Discovery buzakemura ibibazo bya amadeni .
Mu kwezi kwa kabiri AT & T yemeye kugurisha igice cya imigabane televiziyo ya DirecTV ikorera kuri Satellite .
AT & T ni Ikigo cya Itumanaho cya mbere ku Isi cyinjiza agatubutse , cyashinzwe na Alexander Graham Bell mu mwaka wa 1877 .
André Gromyko yavumbuye ubwoko bushya bwa feri ishobora gushyirwa mu modoka nini mu kwirinda impanuka .
Uyu mugabo wa imyaka 49 yifata nka impirimbanyi ya umutekano wo mu muhanda kuko iyo yivuga agaragaza ko yatangiye gutwara imodoka akiri muto , kuva icyo gihe atangira no guhirimbanira ko umutekano wo mu muhanda waba usesuye .
Mu 2009 yatangiye kwandika ku mutekano wo mu muhanda mu mushinga yise " " " " Road Safety Initiative Project " " " " urimo na feri yamaze kurangiza gutunganya afata nka urukingo rwa impanuka cyane zikorwa na imodoka nini .
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE , yavuze ko iyi feri ifite umwihariko wa uko yahuje amavuta na umwuka ku buryo ari nabyo biyiha imbaraga nyinshi zidasanganzwe .
Ati " " " " Iyi feri ifite umwihariko wo kuba yarakozwe hahujwe amavuta na umwuka bityo bikaba biyiha ububasha bwo kubasha gufata neza kandi cyane .
Amavuta ni ikintu kigira ingufu ariko kitihuta cyane mu gihe umwuka wo wihuta cyane .
Iyo ubihuje rero birafatanya . " " " "
Yavuze ko iyi feri izajya ishyirwa mu modoka nini gusa .
Ati " " " " Kuyishyira mu modoka ni ugupfusha ubusa .
Ni ingufu nyinshi waba ushyize ku kantu gato ntabwo imodoka nto zikunze kubura feri . " " " "
Avuga ubu bushakashatsi bujyanye na iyi feri yabutangiye mu 2009 ariko ubu mu 2021 akaba aribwo abashije gusohoza umuhigo yari yarihaye .
Ati " " " " Ni ubushakashatsi natangiye nyuma ya impanuka ziba cyane cyane iza amakamyo , bus , mini - bus ndetse na amakamyoneti . " " " "
Arakomeza ati " " " " Ni feri izajya ikora nyuma ya aho izindi feri zose bidashoboka .
Ubu nakoreye ubu bushakashatsi ku modoka nto kubera igerageza .
Yari ukuyifashisha mu bushakashatsi nsigaye kuyifata nkayishyira mu modoka nini .
Ni feri ya ingoboka izajya ikora izindi zose zananiwe .
Nta kindi kintu umuntu asigaranye uretse gufata imodoka ukayiroha mu mukingo . " " " "
Avuga ko iyi feri nta ngaruka na nkeya ifite ku modoka ko ahubwo ari igisubizo ku mpanuka zahitanaga abantu benshi , zikangiza byinshi .
Ati " " " " Nta ngaruka ifite ahubwo nagiye mbaza abantu batwara imodoka igenewe , bambwira ko umunsi izaba yatangiye kwifashishwa ku bwinshi bizabafasha kugira ngo batazongera kugira ibibazo bya feri .
Nta ngaruka ziza ku mudoka yashyizwemo iyi feri .
Ni ikintu gishya umuntu agishyiraho nka uko amategeko ya tekiniki abisaba . " " " "
Iyi feri yamaze kuyandikisha mu Kigo cya Igihugu cya Iterambere , RDB , nka umutungo mu bya ubwenge akaba asigaje kuyijyana kuyipima agahabwa icyangombwa cya uko yujuje ubuziranenge kigaragaza ko mu buryo bwa tekiniki yizewe ishobora gukora noneho ababishaka bakaba bamugana akayibashyiriramo .
Kuri we iyi feri ni urukingo kuko yemeza ko igiye kugabanya ibibazo bikurikiraho iyo umuntu yakoze impanuka ndetse bikanorohereza ibigo bya ubwishingizi na banyiri imodoka .
Ati " " " " Bitewe na ubwishingizi ufite bishyura ibyo waryojwe ariko ibyawe bashobora kutabyishyura bitewe na uko wishingiye , mu gihe iyi feri izajya ikingira imodoka ya umuntu ndetse na abantu ntibapfe .
Ari ibyo yakagombye kuryozwa ntabwo azabiryozwa ndetse na ibyo yakagombye kubura ntabyo azabura .
Abishingizi ntabwo bazongera kugira ibibazo bya impanuka nyinshi . " " " "
Mu myaka yose yamaze akora iyi feri yemeza ko ikibazo gikomeye yahuye nacyo ari ukubura ubushobozi bwa amafaranga , gusa akaba yishimira ko yabashije kugera ku cyo yifuzaga ndetse feri ubu akaba atakiri kuyifata nka iye ahubwo ari iya igihugu .
Ati " " " " Iyi feri ntabwo ari iyanjye .
Ni iya igihugu , izava ku gihugu ijya ku Isi .
Kuko niba uyu munsi ushaka kugura ikamyo ya miliyoni izi cyangwa izi ashobora kubwira uruganda rwaje guhaha hano ubu bumenyi noneho abo bakajya bavuga bati reka ntumize ikamyo ariko bongereho na feri ya ingoboka . " " " "
Iyo umubajije akamuri ku mutima nyuma ya aho iyi feri isa nka aho yamaze kuyisoza avuga ko yaruhutse ku mutima we , ubu nta kintu azongera kwishinja .
Ati " " " " Ndaruhutse .
Mu myaka yashize najyaga mbona habayeho impanuka yatewe no kubura feri nkishinja ko ntacyo nakoze .
Ariko , uyu munsi ni nko gukaraba feri igiye mu maboko ya igihugu .
Nyuma yo kureba ko feri ikora tugiye kuyishyira mu ikamyo yikoreye ibintu byinshi .
Iyo urukingo rwakoreshaga doze runaka mu mbeba , iyo ugiye kurushyira mu muntu urayongera . " " " "
Nikobisanzwe wakoze iyi feri , ubusanzwe yize mécanique automobile .
Mu bindi yakoze harimo umushinga wa umuriro uzajya ubyarwa no guhita kwa imodoka ku muhanda gusa nturarangira .
Yakoze na uburyo bushyirwa ku modoka bugatuma rétroviseurs zitibwa .
Iyi feri yakoze nta gihe runaka yashyiriweho igomba kumara mu modoka ahubwo izajya igenzurwa mu gihe imodoka irimo nayo igiye kugenzurwa muri controle technique .
Icyogajuru cya NASA cyakoraga ubushakashatsi ku mibumbe igaragiye izuba cyagarutse ku Isi .
Umushinga wo kwiga imiterere na uko byagenze kugira ngo imibumbe igaragire izuba watangijwe na NASA mu 2016 iwita " " " " OSIRIS - REx , " " " " aho yahise yohereza icyogajuru mu isanzure kijya gucukura utumanyu ku ibuye ryegereye Isi ryiswe " " " " 101955 Benu " " " " nyuma yo kuvumburwa mu 1999 .
Ni urugendo rurerure rwa kilometero miliyari 2 , 25 rwagitwaye imyaka ibiri kugira ngo kigereyo mu 2018 , kihamara indi myaka ibiri gicukura utuvungukira kuri iryo buye .
Dail Mail yatangaje ko cyazanye udufite uburemere bwa garagama 60 .
Muri izo garama ngo NASA izakoreshaho 25 % maze 75 % bisigazwe bizajye byifashishwa na abandi bashakashatsi bo mu bihe bizaza bazaba baragize ikoranabuhanga ryisumbuye .
Biteganyijwe ko ku wa 24 Nzeri 2023 ari bwo icyo cyogajuru kizashyika ku butaka .
Twitter yashyizeho uburyo bwo koherereza ishimwe umuntu watanze igitekerezo cyiza
Ubu buryo bwashyizweho mu rwego rwo kugira ngo abantu batambutsa ibitekerezo byiza bifitiye sosiyete umumaro bajye babishimirwa .
Uru rubuga rwatangaje ko mu ntangiriro iyi gahunda hari abantu igenewe barimo abanyamakuru , inzobere mu bintu bitandukanye , na abantu bavugira rubanda batagamije inyungu .
Uburyo bwa " " " " tip jar " " " " bwashyizwe kuri Twitter niho ushaka koherereza undi amafaranga azajya akanda ubundi ahabwe uburyo butandukanye bwo kohereza burimo Bandcamp , Cash App , Patreon , PayPal na Venmo .
Gusa ubu buryo bwo gutanga amafaranga abantu ntibabuvuzeho rumwe kuko bugaragaza imyirondoro ya uwohereje amafaranga , bifuzaga ko byagirwa ibanga .
Ikindi cyanenzwe kuri iyi serivisi ni ku ruhande rwa abanyamakuru abantu bavuga ko kuboherereza amafaranga bishobora gutuma bashyira amarangamutima mu byo batangaza .
Impungenge ku cyogajuru cyo mu Bushinwa byitezwe ko kiri bugwe ku Isi , ahantu hataramenyekana .
Iki cyogajuru cyahawe izina rya Long March - 5b gipima toni 22 , gifite uburebure bwa metero 53 . 7 , cyagiye mu isanzure tariki 29 Mata , muri kilometero 160 kuri 375 za ubutumburuke uvuye ku Isi , gusa kuva ubwo cyagiye gitakaza imbaraga , rukuruzi ya Isi ikagenda igikurura bikaba ariyo mpamvu kigiye kugwa bitari
biteganyijwe .
Ikigo cya i Burayi kigenzura ibyogajuru , European Space Agency , cyatangaje ko aho iki cyogajuru kiri bugwe hataramenyekana , ariko gishobora kugwa aho ari ho hose hagati ya dogere 41 . 5 uvuye mu majyaraguru ya Isi na dogere 41 . 5 uvuye mu Majyepfo yayo .
Uduce duherereye hagati ya izo dogere , harimo igice gito cya Amerika ya Amajyaruguru harimo na Umujyi wa New York , igice kinini cya Amerika ya Amajyepfo , Afurika yose , Australie ,
ibice bimwe byo muri Aziya harimo Amajyepfo ya u Buyapani n " " " " ibice bimwe byo mu Bushinwa , ibihugu bya i Burayi birimo Espagne , Portugal , u Butaliyani na u Bugereki .
Umunyamabanga muri Minisiteri ya Ingabo muri Amerika , Lloyd Austin , yavuze ko bizeye ko kiza kugwa ahantu kitari bwangize ubuzima bwa abantu nko mu nyanja cyangwa ahandi hataba abantu .
Jonathan McDowell , umuhanga mu bya ubumenyi bwa ikirere ukora muri Harvard University yabwiye CNN ati " " " " Ibyago bya uko iki cyogajuru kiri bwangize ibintu cyangwa kikica umuntu biri ku rugero rwo hasi , nubwo bishobora kubaho , ariko ni ruto cyane . " " " "
" " " " Turateganya ko kiri bugaruke ku Isi hagati ya itariki umunani na icyenda za Gicurasi , kandi muri iyo minsi ibiri kiraba kizengurutse isi inshuro 30 .
Iki cyogajuru kiri kugenda kilometero hafi ibihumbi 29 ku isaha rero ntushobora kumenya isaha kiri bugwe ku Isi . " " " "
Amahirwe ahari ni uko iki cyogajuru gishobora kugwa mu nyanja kubera ko igice kinini cya Isi ari amazi kandi na ahari ubutaka henshi hakaba hadatuwe .
Ubusanzwe ibyogajuru byinshi bigwa ku Isi bikunda gushwanyukira mu kirere bitaragera ku butaka bwa Isi , ku buryo bidashobora kugira uwo byaginza .
Gusa birashoboka nanone ko gishobora kugera ku Isi kitarashwanyuka nubwo bibaho gake .

Umushinga iyo sosiyete ya umuherwe Elon Musk irimo wiswe Starship ugamije gukora ibyogajuru bizajya bigeza abantu na imizigo ku mibumbe itandukanye yo mu isanzure nka Mars ndetse no ku Kwezi mu gihe bazaba batangiye kuhashyira ibikorwa no kuhatura .
Ni ibyogajuru bikorwa ku buryo amavuta ashyirwa muri moteri yongera agakoreshwa mu rwego rwo kugabanya ikoreshwa rya ingufu .
Muri bitanu bimaze gusuzumwa byoherezwa mu kirere , icyoherejwe ku wa 5 Gicurasi 2021 cyiswe SN15 ni cyo cyonyine cyagarutse kikagera ku butaka kidaturitse , nyuma yo koherezwa muri kilometero zisaga icumi .
Elon Musk na akanyamuneza kenshi yahise yandika kuri Twitter ati " " " " Starship igeze ku butaka mu buryo busanzwe . " " " "
Ni intambwe ikomeye uwo muherwe yateye ndetse imuha icyizere ko umushinga we uzagerwaho .

Byatangajwe na Umuyobozi wa Canal + mu Rwanda , Sophie Tchatchoua mu muhango wo kumurika Pacis TV ya Kiliziya Gatolika , nayo yahise yiyongera ku mubare wa izizajya ziboneka kuri uyu muyoboro wa Canal + .
Pacis TV yaje yiyongera ku zindi zisanzwe zigaragara kuri Canal + zirimo BTN Tv , Isango Tv , Authentic Tv , Genesis Tv , KC2 , Flash Tv , TV1 , Televiziyo ya Igihugu ( RTV ) na Tv10 .
Tchatchoua yavuze ko kugeza ubu bagize televiziyo 10 zo mu Rwanda ziboneka ku muyoboro wabo ariko hari gahunda ya uko na izindi zisigaye bazakorana nazo .

Rurageretse hagati ya Apple na Spotify bapfa inyungu ya umurengera icibwa abakoresha porogaramu za umuziki .
Komisiyo ya uwo muryango ishinzwe ubugenzuzi yatangaje ko hari abakiliya benshi bamaze igihe binubira amafaranga bacibwa kugira ngo babashe gukoresha porogaramu zikinirwaho umuziki mu bikoresho bya Apple nka telefone na ibindi .
Ikirego cyatanzwe mu myaka ibiri ishize gitangwa na Spotify , porogaramu yifashishwa na benshi kumva umuziki bihitiyemo .
Iyo sosiyete yatangaje ko Apple iri kwica isoko kuko porogaramu yose ikinirwaho umuziki , iyo isabye gushyirwa muri App Store icibwa inyungu ya umurengera , bigatuma na abakiliya binuba .
Ibi birego biramutse bihamye Apple , BBC yatangaje ko yabihanirwa cyane kandi igasabwa guhindura imikorere .
Porogaramu zikina umuziki zikoreshwa na abifashisha ibikoresho bya Apple , zisabwa kwishyura iyo sosiyete 30 % bya ayo zaciye umukiliya .
Spotify yatanze ikirego ivuga ko ayo mafaranga ari menshi .
Komisiyo ya EU ishinzwe ubugenzuzi yagaragaje ko ibyo Apple ikora biri kwica isoko rya abakora porogaramu zikinirwaho umuziki , bikagira na ingaruka ku bifashisha ibikoresho byifashiha iOS ya Apple , aribo bakiliya .
Ibyo bihabanye na amabwiriza ya EU .
Apple yahise nayo isohora itangazo , ivuga ko Spotify itakabaye ibarega mu gihe na 99 % bya amafaranga yinjije nta nyungu Apple irayabonera .
Bavuze ko ikigaragara , Spotify ishaka kwikubira inyungu zose ziva muri porogaramu yayo , ariko ikirengagiza ko kugira ngo abakiliya bayibone hari abandi baba babigizemo uruhare bakwiriye gushimirwa .
Hashize igihe bamwe mu bakora porogaramu zifashishwa na Apple binubira uburyo inyungu bacibwa ihanitse .
Byatumye iyo sosiyete igabanya , ishyiraho inyungu ya 15 % ku bafite porogaramu zinjiza munsi ya miliyoni ya amadolari ku mwaka .
Epic Games yakoze umukino uzwi nka Fortnite nayo iheruka kurega Apple igaragaza ko bacibwa amafaranga menshi , basaba ko 30 % bishyura Apple kuri buri mukiliya babonye agabanywa .
Byarangiye Apple ivanye uwo mukino muri App Store nubwo rukigeretse mu nkiko hagati ya izo sosiyete zombi .
Urubanza rwazo ruzasubukurwa mu cyumweru gitaha .
Abiga mu yisumbuye bashyiriweho ikoranabuhanga ribafasha mu masomo ya siyansi na imibare .
Iki kigo cyatangiye gukorera mu Rwanda mu Ukwakira 2020 , gisanzwe gikorera muri Afurika ya Epfo , Ghana no muri Nigeria , aho gitanga imyitozo ya imibare , ubugenge ( Physique ) na ubutabire ( Chimie ) ku banyeshuri biga muwa Mbere wa amashuri yisumbuye kugera mu wa Kane .
Uko bikorwa , umunyeshuri wiyandikishije muri iyi gahunda , ajya ku rubuga rwa Siyavula haba harimo imyitozo ya buri somo bijyanye na inyigisho zaryo , ubundi akayikora .
Haba hariho na ibisubizo ku buryo iyo acyishe bamwereka igisubizo na inzira cyakozwemo .
Iyi gahunda ifasha abanyeshuri gusubira mu byo bize , ndetse hari na uburyo umwarimu wabo abasha kureba ibyo bakoze bityo akamenya aho ashyira ingufu mu masomo .
Bamwe mu banyeshuri baganiriye na IGIHE biga King David Academy , bavuze ko iyi porogaramu ibafasha mu kwimenyereza amasomo baba bize .
Sesonga Brian Bugingo wiga mu mwaka wa Kabiri yagize ati " " " " iyi gahunda imfasha cyane cyane mu kwitegura ibizamini , nkakora imyitozo ikanamfasha kumenya birushijeho amasomo , cyane cyane mu mibare na physique ( ubugenge ) . " " " "
Umwangange Anaise Norah wiga mu mwaka wa Mbere we yagize ati " " " " Mu bihe bya Coronavirus hari igihe cyigeze kugera tukajya muri guma mu rugo , Siyavula yamfashije kwiyibutsa amasomo nize [ . . . ] ubu iyo umwarimu yakwigishije ibintu ntubyumve neza , ukoresha Siyavula ukiha imyitozo kugira ngo urebe ko ibyo yakwigishije
wabifashe . " " " "
Umwarimu wa aba banyeshuri mu isomo rya ubugenge , Nawugaba Stephen , avuga ko gahunda ya Siyavula imufasha cyane mu kureba urwego abanyeshuri be bumviseho isomo .
Ati " " " " Siyavula igira imyitozo myinshi , rero iyo nigishije isomo runaka mbaha isuzuma bumenyi nkoresheje Siyavula , nkabaha umwanya bakajya muri " " " " computer lab " " " " ( icyuma kibamo mudasobwa ) kurikora .
Iyo nsanze benshi batsinzwe , mbaha undi mwanya bagakomeza kwitoza . " " " "
Kugeza ubu iki kigo gikorana na ibigo icyenda mu Rwanda , birimo King David Academy , Lycée Notre Dame de Cîteaux , Collège Saint André , Groupe Scolaire Gahini , Group Scolaire Nsanga , Groupe Scolaire Duha , Groupe Scolaire Bumba , Group Scolaire Juru , na Group Scolaire Bigugu .
Uretse ibigo bikorana na iki kigo hari na abandi banyeshuri barenga 800 baturuka mu bigo binyuranye hirya no hino mu Rwanda bakorana na iyi gahunda ya Siyavula .
Mu ruzinduko abayobozi bayo bagiriye mu Rwanda mu ishuri rya King David Academy tariki 29 Mata 2021 , bavuze ko Siyavula iri gufasha abanyeshuri mu Rwanda ndetse ko bafite intego yo kuyigeza mu mashuri yose nubwo hakiboneka imbogamizi .
Uwitwa Chiara Walsh ushinzwe ibikorwa bya Siyavula mu Rwanda , yagize ati " " " " Twagiye duhura na imbogamizi mu bigo bya amashuri , aho hari ibidafite internet , ibindi bikagira mudasobwa nkeya kandi muri iyi gahunda dukoresha ikoranabuhanga , niyo mpamvu twahereye ku bigo byigenga na ibifite ubushobozi , ariko dufite gahunda yo
kuyigeza no mu yandi mashuri mu Rwanda hose . " " " "
Ibigo bya amashuri birashishikarizwa gukoresha iyi gahunda
Umwe mu bahagarariye Siyavula mu Rwanda , Habimana Jean Damascene , avuga ko iyi gahunda kuyikoresha byorohereza abarimu na abanyeshuri mu myigire na imyigishirize kuko bituma abana bamenyera gukora imyitozo myinshi , bityo bikabafasha gutsinda mu ishuri .
Yongeyeho ati " " " " Ibigo bitaratangira gukoresha uburyo bwo kwigisha abanyeshuri hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga , nababwira ko ari byiza bifasha .
Iyi gahunda ni ubuntu ntabwo duca amafaranga ngo umwana atangire kuyikoresha , rero turasaba ko abana bakomeza kuyikunda , uwo ari we wese yakwandika rw . siyavula . com akiyandika agatangira kuyikoresha . " " " "
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibikorwa bya ikoranabuhanga muri King David Academy , Alex Sasu , yavuze ko iyi gahunda ya Siyavula iri gufasha abanyeshuri babo gukora imyitozo myinshi nka bumwe mu buryo bufasha umunyeshuri kumva neza isomo .
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Njye ku giti cyanjye ndashishikariza ibigo byose bishoboka mu Rwanda gukorana na Siyavula , kuko nibayikoresha bazabona ko hari byinshi izahindura mu myigire ya abanyeshuri , kuko ibaha amahirwe yo kumenya uko basubiza ibibazo . " " " "
Uretse gufasha abanyeshuri gukora imyitozo , Siyavula igira na amarushanwa buri kwezi , aho ihemba abanyeshuri na abarimu ba indashyikirwa ikabaha telefone zigezweho ( smartphone ) , ndetse na ama - unite ya telefone .
Iki kigo kandi kizagira amarushanwa ya umwaka muri Kanama 2021 , aho kizahemba ibigo , abanyeshuri na abarimu ba indashyikirwa .
Igihembo gikuru kizaba ari mudasobwa .

Abarimo Miss Kalimpinya bakoze ikoranabuhanga ryifashishwa na amahoteli hirindwa Covid - 19 .
Igitekerezo cyabo bakigize bagamije gufasha abagana za resitora na hoteli kujya basaba bakanahabwa serivisi na ibindi bashaka batagombye kujya kuvugana na abakozi baho cyangwa ngo bafate ku rupapuro ruriho urutonde rwa ibihari na ibiciro byabyo ( menu ) cyane ko byanaba intandaro yo gukwirakwiza icyorezo .
Ni muri urwo rwego Miss Kalimpinya wize ibya Ishoramari , Rushita Alfene wize ibya Ikoranabuhanga na Bisamaza Ismaïl wize ibya Politiki mpuzamahanga bishyize hamwe bakora application bise " " " " Ordefene " " " " ifasha umukiliya kubona ibiribwa na ibinyobwa biteguye , agahitamo ibyo atumiza , maze akabishyikirizwa aho ari .
Mu kiganiro Rushita Alfene uhagarariye iryo tsinda yagiranye na IGIHE yavuze ko basanze " " " " ikintu cya mbere umuntu akenera ageze muri resitora na hoteli ni menu " " " " maze batangira kureba uko yashyirwa mu ikoranabuhanga .
Yagie ati " " " " Twahisemo kubishyira mu ikoranabuhanga ku buryo umukiliya abasha gufotora ( scan ) QR Code akabona menu ya iyo resitora cyangwa hoteli , akaba yatumiza ibyo ashaka yagaragaje na ameza yicayeho , cyangwa icyumba arimo .
Icyo gihe byakirwa na ubishinzwe , ndetse akabona na igihe bikenewe , na we akagaragaza ko bije umukiliya akabona ko babimuzaniye . " " " "
Gukoresha Orderfene " " " " bisaba kuba ufite telefoni igezweho [ smartphone ] " " " " na resitora cyangwa hoteli ugiyemo ikaba ifite QR code ya iyo application .
Ugera ku meza yawe ukahasanga urupapuro ruriho ya code , maze ukayifotora na camera ya telefoni bagahita bakwereka menu ugasaba ibyo ukeneye .
Haba ibiryo , ibinyobwa cyangwa izindi serivisi zo mu cyumba cya hoteli wabasha kuzihasabira .
Kuva yatangira gukoreshwa muri Kanama 2020 , iratanga icyizere cyo kudatenguha abayikoresha mu gihe internet yaba ikora neza , cyane ko basigaye banayitangana Wifi nyuma ya uko abayikoresheje bwa mbere batenguhwaga na internet .
Icyongereza na Igifaransa ni zo ndimi zikoreshwa kuri iyo application kugeza ubu , ariko hari gahunda yo kuzashyiramo na Ikinyarwanda kugira ngo hatagira uhura na imbogamizi za ururimi mu gihe ashaka kuyikoresha .
ifasha umukiliya na umucuruzi gutanga no guhabwa serivisi mu buryo bwihuse , bunoze kandi bujyanye na igihe .
U Rwanda ku mwanya wa 13 muri Afurika mu kugira internet ihendutse .
Iyo raporo ikorwa na Ikigo cya Abongereza gikora ubushakashatsi ku ikoranabuhanga , Cable , igaragaraho ibihugu 230 byo hirya no hino ku Isi .
Urutonde rwakozwe hashingiwe ku mpuzandengo ya igiciro cya gigabyte imwe ya internet mu gihugu maze ako gaciro kagashyirwa mu madorali ya Amerika .
Ku Rwanda , hagaragajwe ko gigabyte imwe mu 2021 iri ku mpuzandengo ya 1 . 133 , 33 Frw angana na 1 , 25 $ ivuye ku 1 , 48 $ mu 2020 , mu gihe mu 2019 yabarirwaga 3 , 79 $ .
Ibikorwa remezo nka iminara na internet ya 4G na 5G zigezweho nabyo byarebweho kuko bishobora gutuma ikiguzi cyiyongera cyangwa kikaganuka .
Raporo iragira iti " " " " Ibihugu bimaze igihe kinini bifite 4G na 5G nshya , byagiye bigaragara ko internet yaho ihendutse .
Ibyo biterwa na uko umubare wa gigabyte abakoresha internet bagenerwa warenze kuba hagati ya imwe na 10 , ukagera mu magana cyangwa ugasanga nta na urugero ntarengwa ruhari .
Igiciro cya gigabyte muri ibyo bihugu kizaba kiri hasi cyane . " " " "
U Rwanda ntiruragira 5G ariko mu gihugu hagera 4G ndetse yagejejwe mu mu gihugu mu 2014 .
Ku bwa izo mpamvu , iyo raporo yerekanye ko gigabyte ihenze cyane mu Rwanda muri uyu mwaka igura 21 . 000 Frw ( 23 , 1 $ ) naho ihendutse ikaba igura 315 , 79 Frw ( 0 , 35 $ ) .
Uretse umwanya wa 70 mu bihugu 230 byo ku Isi byakorewemo inyigo , u Rwanda ruri ku mwanya wa 13 muri Afurika yo munsi ya Ubutayu bwa Sahara , no ku wa kabiri muri Afurika ya Iburasirazuba inyuma ya Tanzania ifite impuzandengo ya 0 , 75 $ .
Muri ako karere kandi rukurikiwe na Uganda ibarirwa 1 , 56 $ , u Burundi bubarirwa 2 , 1 $ naho Kenya yatangiye gukoresha 5G ni 2 , 25 $ .
Ku Isi urutonde rubimburiwe na Israel ifite impuzandengo ya 0 , 5 $ kuri gigabyte imwe , Kyrgyzstan iri kuri 0 , 15 $ , Fiji kuri 0 , 19 $ , u Butaliyani kuri 0 , 27 $ .
Guinée Equatorial niyo ya nyuma ku kiguzi cya 49 , 67 $ .
Cable yatangaje ko hari ibihugu bitashyizwe ku rutonde kuko amakuru yabyo yagiye abura cyangwa agaciro ka amafaranga bikoresha kukagereranya na amadorali ya Amerika bikagorana .
Ibyo birimo Sudani ya Epfo , RDC , Erythrée , Zimbabwe , Koreya ya Ruguru , Venezuela na ibindi .
Ibihugu bifite ubukungu buteye imbere nabyo ntibiri mu myanya ya imbere cyane kuko internet igurishwa ku giciro cyo hejuru bijyanye na uko ababituye baba banashoboye kuyigura kuri menshi nka uko iyo raporo ibivuga .
Nka u Bushinwa buri ku mwanya wa 18 na impuzandengo ya 0 , 52 $ , Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ziri ku wa 155 na 3 , 33 $ .
U Burusiya bwo buri ku mwanya wa karindwa na impuzandengo ya 0 , 29 $ kuri gigabyte .
Kugeza muri Mutarama 2021 , habarurwaga ko abakoresha internet mu Rwanda bageze kuri miliyoni 4 , 12 bangana na 31 , 4 % bya Abaturarwanda , biyongeyeho ibihumbi 806 ugereranyije no mu 2020 .
Abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga bo biyongeyeho ibihumbi 240 bagera ku bihumbi 850 bangana na 6 , 5 bya abaturarwanda .
Abatunze telefoni mu Rwanda bo ni miliyoni 9 , 69 bangana na 73 , 9 % , umubare wiyongeyeho ibihumbi 175 ugereranyije na umwaka ushize .
Elon Musk mu mushinga wo gushyira utwuma mu bwonko bwa muntu ibyo atekereza bikikora kuri mudasobwa .
Sky News yatangaje ko iyo nkende yabashije kubikora nyuma ya ibyumweru bitandatu utwo twuma tuyishyizwe mu bice byose bya ubwonko , ikina umukino kuri mudasobwa irimo kunywa umutobe wa umuneke yari yashyiriwe hafi aho .
Uko utwo twuma dukora , icyo ubwonko butekereje duhita tugikora kuri mudasobwa kuko biba byahujwe ariko mu buryo bwa inziramugozi ( wireless ) .
Ni duto cyane ku buryo tugereranywa na kimwe cya cumi cya ubwoya , ariko tukabasha kugenzura utunyangingo twa ubwonko dusaga 1000 .
Neuralink ivuga ko ifite intego ya uko iryo koranabuhanga ryakoreshwa ku bantu .
Yagize iti " " " " Intego yacu ni ugutuma umuntu wagagaye abasha gukoresha mudasobwa cyangwa telefoni , bigizwemo uruhare na ubwonko gusa . " " " "
Icyo kigo kandi giheruka gutangaza ko cyashyize utwuma nka utwo tujya kungana na igiceri mu bwonko bwa ingurube ebyiri , byose bigendanye na iyo nyigo .
Avuga kuri iyo nkende yakinaga umukino wa amashusho , Musk yagize ati " " " " Ntiwabasha kubona aho utwo twuma twashyizwe kandi ni inkende yishimye . " " " "
Neuralink yemeza ko ubu bushakashatsi nibugenda neza buzanafasha kuzana igisubizo ku ndwara za ubwonko cyangwa izindi zatuma ingingo zidakora neza nko kutumva , kwibagirwa na izindi .
Ku rundi ruhande , hari na ibitekerezo Musk afite muri uwo mushinga abashakashatsi bataremeza ko bishoboka , birimo nko guhindura imikorere ya umubiri mu gihe umuntu yaba yapfuye .
Ati " " " " Rero niba ugiye gupfa uko umeze bishobora guhindurwa mu bundi buryo cyangwa ukagirwa Robot .
Ushobora guhitamo niba ushaka kuba Robot , umuntu cyangwa ikindi kintu . " " " "
Elon Musk asanzwe afite na izindi sosiyete zikomeye zizwi mu bya siyansi na ikoranabuhanga nka Space X ikora ibyogajuru na ubushakashatsi bwo mu isanzure , ndetse na iyitwa Tesla ikora imodoka zifashisha amashanyarazi .
Afite kandi umushinga wo kuzageza abantu kuri Mars mu 2024 .
U Bufaransa : Umushoramari yahisemo kwikorera iperereza ku bamwibye kuko Polisi yananiwe .
Pagani yabwiye AFP ko umukozi ushinzwe icungamutungo muri sosiyete ye yitwa Avon yandikiwe na umuntu kuri email isa na aho ari iye ( Pagani ) , maze aramubaza ati " " " " Ese Bertrand yaguhamagaye ? . " " " "
Aho hari kuwa 8 Mata 2021 .
Mu minota mike , uwo mukozi yahise ahamagarwa na umugabo amubwira ko ari we witwa Bertrand , amusaba ko amwoherereza byihuse ibihumbi 27 bya amayero ( 325 . 911 $ ) ngo yo kugura indi sosiyete muri Hongrie .
Barakomeje barandikirana kuri email ariko amubuza kugira undi muntu yabibwira .
Pagani yavuze ko abo batekamutwe bari bazi neza imikorere ya sosiyete ye ku buryo bayobeje uwo mukozi akayohereza .
Ku munsi wakurikiyeho umukozi wa banki yohererejwemo ayo mafaranga yabimenyesheje Pagani agwa mu kantu , ariko ku bwa amahirwe birakurikiranywa aragaruzwa .
Pagani yahise asaba uwo mucungamutungo we gukomeza kwandikirana na abo bantu kugira ngo amenye aho baherereye abakurikirane , kuko polisi yo yavuze ko " " " " ikurikirana ibyo ishobora gukora mu buryo bwubahiriza amategeko . " " " "
Ubu uwo munyemari yamaze gushyira ikoranabuhanga rishya muri mudasobwa ye kugira ngo batongera kumwiba amakuru , ndetse yatangiye gukoresha uburyo bwose bushoboka ngo amenye aho abo batekamutwe baherereye yifashishije ikoranabuhanga .
Yagize ati " " " " Sinshaka kubareka ngo bagende gutyo gusa .
Sinshobora kwihanganira abo batekamutwe , kandi mu gihe mbona abakabikurikiranye badakora akazi kabo ndabyikorera . " " " "
Polisi ya icyo gihugu yavuze ko gukurikirana icyo kibazo bigoye cyane kuko bisaba imikoranire mpuzamahanga no kuba ifite amakuru ahagije ku buryo abo batekamutwe bakoresheje bahisha imyirondoro yabo .
Ibyo wamenya kuri Breakthrough Starshot , umushinga uri kureba ko ubuzima bushoboka ku nyenyeri .
Magingo aya , abantu baba ku Isi gusa kandi nta na ikimenyetso kiragaragaza ko hari ahandi babaye mu isanzure .
Uretse umuntu , nta na ibindi binyabuzima bizwi neza ko biba mu isanzure kuko ntabyo siyansi yari yemeza .
Ibivejuru ( Aliens ) ni byo bikekwa ko biba mu isanzure , ariko nabyo ntibyemezwa na siyansi ahubwo bamwe bemera ko bibaho abandi bakabihakana .
Umushinga wa Breakthrough Starshot watangijwe mu 2016 , ugamije gukora ubushakashatsi bwifashisha ikoranabuhanga rigezweho hagenzurwa imiterere ya inyenyeri yitwa Alpha Centauri .
Muri uwo mushinga washowemo miliyoni 100 $ , hazoherezwa mu isanzure udukoresho twa ikoranabuhanga wagereranya na twa mudasobwa duto cyane [ batwise nonocrafts ) .
Ni udukoresho duto ku buryo kamwe kabumbatirwa mu kiganza , ariko tugira uburyo bwo kubika umuriro , aho tubasha kubonwa na ikoranabuhanga , ndetse tukagira Camera zizafata amafoto yo kuri iyo nyenyeri .
Amafoto afatwa azajya yoherezwa ku Isi .
Ntabwo biremezwa neza igihe uwo mushinga uzarangirira , ariko hagaragazwa ko bizatwara imyaka myinshi .
Stephen Hawking na Yuri Milner bibaza niba koko " " " " umuntu azaba ku Isi ubuzima bwe bwose , cyangwa ashobora no kugera ku nyenyeri " " " " cyane ko habarurwa miliyari nyinshi zazo mu isanzure .
Ni muri urwo rwego bashatse gusubiza icyo kibazo bategura inyigo bahereye ku yitwa Alpha Centauri iri hafi ya imibumbe igaragiye izuba .
Uretse Breakthrough Starshot , Ikigo cya Abanyamerika gikora ubushakashatsi mu isanzure , NASA , gifite umushinga cyise Artemis wiga ku Kwezi na Mars naho Space X ya Elon Musk iri kwiga kuri Mars .
Apple yashyize hanze ibikoresho bishya birimo iPad Pro na mudasobwa za iMacs za amabara atandukanye .
Ibi byose byashyizwe ahagaragara kuwa Kabiri tariki 20 Mata 2021 , aho uru ruganda kandi rwashyize hanze agakoresho ka Airtag kagufasha gushaka ibintu byatakaye na televiziyo zerekana amashusho ya 4K zifite telekomande za Siri Remote zifite umwihariko wo kuba wakoresha ijwi ushaka kugira icyo uhindura kuri Televiziyo yawe .
Dore tumwe mu dushya ibi bikoresho byashyizwe hanze na uruganda rwa Apple bifite
Izi iPad za ubwoko bushya zashyizwe hanze , zifite ubushobozi bwo kwihuta cyane , zakira internet ya 5G nayo yihuta bidasanzwe , umuntu ashobora kuzicomekaho ibikoresho bya ikoranabuhanga birenze kimwe ndetse zifite urumuri rwo muri tableaux rufite ikoranabuhanga rirenze irya izindi iPad .
Zifite Camera ziteye imbere , zifite ubushobozi bwo gukora amashusho meza , ndetse ku bantu bakora inama bifashishije ikoranabuhanga , izi iPad zabazaniye udushya , aho zifite ikoranabuhanga ryitwa Center Stage rituma mu gihe uri gukoresha camera mu nama , isura yawe ituzura muri camera ahubwo izajya isubira inyuma ikagaragara neza nta ruhare wabigizemo .

Mudasobwa za iMac zifite amabara atandukanye
Mudasobwa za iMac zari zisanzwe zimenyerewe ku ibara rya umweru , uretse kuba zifite amabara atandukanye zifite na undi mwihariko utandukanye na izari zisanzwe .
iMac zashyizwe hanze , zifite ubwoko bushya mwa M1 Chip umuntu yakwita nka icyumba cya ikoranabuhanga rya musadobwa , aho ifite " " " " système " " " " ituma mudasobwa idashyuha , itume yihuta cyane birenze ibisanzwe ndetse izatuma uyifite agira ubushobozi bwo gukoresha porogaramu za iPhone muri iyi mudasobwa zirimo
Zillow na Headspace na utundi dushya twinshi .
Izi mudasobwa zifite uburebure bwa cm 60 , pixel miliyoni 11 . 3 , ziri mu mabara arindwi , harimo umutuku , icyatsi na move byose byerurutse ,
iMac zizajya ku isoko mu matariki yo hagati muri Gicurasi , iziri muri aya amabara atatu zizaba zigurishwa amadolari 1 . 499 ( hafi miliyoni 1 , 5 Frw ) , mu gihe iziri mu yandi mabara ane asigaye zizagurishwa 1 . 299 $ ( hafi miliyoni 1 , 2 Frw ) .
Agakoresho gafasha mu kubona ibintu byatakaye , AirTag
Uruganda rwa Apple rwashyize hanze agakoresho ka Airtag rutari rusanzwe rufite , gakoreshwa mu kubona ibintu byatakaye .
Ugafatisha ku kintu runaka kagafasha kukibona mu gihe cyatakaye .
Ushobora kugashyira ku mfunguzo , ku ikofi , kuri mudasobwa cyangwa se ku modoka .
Iyo wagahuje na uburyo bwa Apple bwitwa " " " " Find My app " " " " ushobora kubona icyo wataye udataye umutwe .
AirTag za Apple zifite ubushobozi bwo kutangizwa na amazi , cyangwa ivumbi , gakozwe ku buryo iyo wabuze ikintu ( kariho ) kavuga mu ijwi riranguruye ukabasha kukibona .
Aka gakoresho kari gasanzwe gasohorwa na uruganda rwa Samsung , Sony na Tile , uruganda rwa Apple ruzagashyira ku isoko tariki 30 Mata 2021 , kamwe kagura 29 $ ( hafi ibihumbi 30 Frw ) mu gihe tune tuzagurwa 99 $ ( hafi ibihumbi 100 Frw ) .
Si ibi gusa kandi uru ruganda rwasohoye na Televiziyo za ubwoko bushya zibasha kwakira amashusho ya 4K , zifite telekomande ya Siri Remote , ikozwe muri aluminium 100 % .
Izashyirwa ku isoko ku itariki 30 Mata 2021 , aho izifite ububiko bungana na 32 GB zizaba zigura 179 $ naho izifite 64GB zigure 199 $
Hasohowe kandi na iPhone 12 na iPhone 12 mini ziri mu ibara rya move , ziyongera ku zari zifite amabara ya ubururu , icyatsi , umukara na umweru .
Izatangira kugurishwa ku itariki 30 Mata 2021 , amadolari 799 ( hafi ibihumbi 800 Frw ) .
Space X yahawe ikiraka cyo gukora icyogajuru kizageza abantu ku kwezi . BBC yatangaje ko Space X yatoranyijwe igahabwa ayo masezerano ya miliyari 2 , 89 $ ihigitse izindi sosiyete zimaze igihe kinini mu byo gukora ibyogajuru zari zihurije hamwe .
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibya ubuvumbuzi muri NASA , Kathy Lueders , yatangajko ayo masezerano azatuma uwo mushinga wa Artemis wa akataraboneka ugerwaho . Ati " " " " Ku bwa aya masezerano , NASA na abafatanyabikorwa bacu bazuzuza uyu mushinga ugiye kuba uwa mbere ugaragaza ukuri ko ku kwezi muri iki kinyejana cya 21 . " " " "
Amakuru avuga ko muri sosiyete zasabaga icyo kiraka zose Space X ari yo yasabaga amasezerano ahendutse , nabyo bikaba byagize uruhare mu gutuma yegukana ayo mahirwe .
Biteganyijwe ko icyo cyogajuru kizageza undi mugabo na umugore wa mbere ba Abanyamerika ku kwezi mu 2024 .
Bivugwa ko hari na izindi sosiyete NASA ifite zishobora kuyifasha kugeza abantu ku kwezi mu gihe imwe yaba itabashije kubigeraho .
Space X ifite mu maboko ako kazi kugeza ubu , yatangijwe na Elon Musk mu 2002 ari nawe muyobozi wayo kugeza ubu .
Isanzwe ikora ibyogajuru ndetse nayo ubwayo ikora ubushakashatsi bwo mu kirere , aho ifite gahunda yo kugeza abantu kuri Mars mu 2026 .
Twitter yagize ikibazo cya ikoranabuhanga bigira ingaruka ku barimo na abo mu Rwanda .
Abarenga ibihumbi 80 barimo na abo mu Rwanda bagaragaje ko bahuye na ibibazo bakoresha urwo rubuga mu masaha ya nyuma ya saa kumi na imwe kugera mu masaha ya igitondo gusa byaje gukemuka .
Ubutumwa bwagaragaraga nka ibisanzwe , ariko umuntu akaba atakora like , comment cyangwa retweet .
Itsinda rya Twitter rishinzwe ubufasha , ryiseguye ku bagize ikibazo gusa ntiryavuga imvano yacyo .
Ibibazo nka ibi byaherukaga kuba kuri Twitter mu Ukwakira 2020 , aho byamaze amasaha arenga abiri .
Icyo gihe yiseguye ivuga ko byatewe na impinduka mu mikorere zitari zigambiriwe .
Hagiye gukorwa imodoka ifite ikirango cya Apple .
9To5 Mac yatangaje ko ayo masezerano azaba yakozwe mu mpera za uyu mwaka , Apple isanzwe izwiho ibikoresho bya ikoranabuhanga birimo telefoni na mudasobwa ikazaba ari yo mukiliya wa imena .
Mu ntangiriro za uyu mwaka byari byatangajwe ko Apple ishaka kugirana amasesezerano ya miliyari 4 $ na sosiyete za Kia na Hyundai zikora imodoka , ariko muri Gashyantare zitangaza ko zitakiri mu biganiro nayo .
Bivugwa ko Apple yifuza ko imodoka izakorwa yazayitirirwa maze sosiyete zayikoze zikabarwa nka izabigizemo uruhare , ari nayo mpamvu izo zizwi zabyanze maze igahitamo gukorana na izidasanzwe zifite amazina akomeye mu byo gukora imodoka .
Apple ya Tim Cook abenshi bayimenye kubera ibikoresho byayo bya ikoranabuhanga biba byivugira mu mikorere , bituma yizerwa cyane .
Ubwo buhangange bwayo irashaka kubugeza no mu isoko rya imodoka , aho ifite gahunda yo kuzaba yamaze kwikorera imodoka ikoresha amashanyarazi mu 2025 .
Ampersand yashowemo asaga miliyari 3 Frw mu gukwirakwiza moto zikoresha amashanyarazi mu Rwanda .
Umushinga wa EIF ( Ecosystem Integrity Fund ) ukomoka muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika usanzwe ushora imari mu nganda no muri sosiyete zikoresha ingufu za amashanyarazi ugamije kurengera ibidukikije , niwo washoye arenga miliyari 3 Frw muri Ampersand .
Ni ubwa mbere hashowe amafaranga angana gutya muri sosiyete itanga serivisi za ibinyabiziga bikoresha amashanyarazi muri Afurika yo munsi ya Ubutayu bwa Sahara .
Umuyobozi wa Ampersand , Josh Wale , yavuze ko kuba hashowe amafaranga menshi mu binyabiziga bikoresha amashanyarazi , ari intambwe nziza itewe mu 2021 , bizatuma haboneka abashoferi benshi muri Afurika ya Iburasirazuba bakoresha moto za amashanyarazi .
Yongeyeho ati " " " " Twishimiye iri shoramari rya amateka EIF yakoze .
Ubu dufite ikizadufasha kugera ku ntego yacu , aho duteganya ko mu 2030 tuzaba twahinduye moto zingana na miliyoni eshanu zo muri Afurika ya Iburasirazuba , zigakoresha ingufu za amashanyarazi aho gukoresha ibikomoka kuri peteroli . " " " "
" " " " Ubu bufasha bwa EIF bugiye gukuraho imyumvire idahwitse ya uko ibihugu bikize ari byo bizabanza kugira ibinyabiziga bikoresha amashanyarazi maze ibikennye bikagerwaho nyuma , bikoresha ibinyabiziga byabanje gukoreshwa . " " " "
Moto , ni bwo bwoko bwa ibinyabiziga bwifashishwa cyane muri Afurika bya umwihariko iya Uburasirazuba , aho hakoreshwa izigera kuri miliyoni 5 , ariyo mpamvu Ampersand ariho yashyize ingufu mu guteza imbere izikoresha ingufu za amashanyarazi .
Umwe mu bayobozi ba EIF , James Everett , yavuze ko yishimiye gufatanya na iyi sosiyete mu rwego rwo kwirinda ibihumanya ikirere .
Igitabo kivuga ku budasa bwa u Rwanda na u Bushinwa cyashyizwe kuri Amazon .
Iki gitabo cyanditswe na Gerald Mbanda , kiri mu rurimi rwa Icyongereza .
Gifite umutwe ugira uti " " " " China and Rwanda : Effective Leadership is Key to Transformational Governance . " " " "
Mbanda wacyanditse afite uburambe mu mwuga wa itangazamakuru aho yakoze imirimo itandukanye dore ko yabaye Umuyobozi wa Ishami rishinzwe Itangazamakuru mu Rwego rwa Igihugu rwa Imiyoborere , RGB .
Iki gitabo cyamuritswe bwa mbere muri Kamena 2019 mu muhango wabereye i Kigali muri Marriott Hotel , witabiriwe na abayobozi barimo Tito Rutaremara ; Ambasaderi wa u Bushinwa mu Rwanda Rao Hongwei ; Umuyobozi wa Urwego rwa Imiyoborere , RGB , Dr . Usta Kayitesi na abandi bagera kuri 200 .
Muri icyo gitabo Mbanda yasobanuye ko u Rwanda na u Bushinwa nubwo ari ibihugu biri ku migabane ya Isi itandukanye , byagaragaje ubudasa mu miyoborere yabyo aho abayobozi bagira uruhare mu gushyira mu bikorwa gahunda zihutisha iterambere bakurikije ibibabereye aho kwigana ibya ahandi .
Yavuze kandi ku bijyanye na demokarasi buri gihugu gifite uburenganzira bwo guhitamo uburyo bukinogeye , ko nta buryo bumwe bwabera ibihugu byose , ko icya ingenzi ubuyobozi ari bwo bufite uruhare runini mu kuzana imiyoborere mpinduramatwara .
Amazon iki gitabo kiriho ni urubuga rwa kabiri rumaze kwakira iki gitabo nyuma ya Lambert Academic Publishing yo mu Budage .
Kiboneka ku buryo bwa ikoranabuhanga buhendutse ( electronic version ) ku rubuga ruzwi nka kindle kuri Amazon .
Inteko ya Umuco yiyemeje gushyira ingufu mu kunoza imyigishirize ya Ikinyarwanda .
Byagarutsweho mu nama nyunguranabitekerezo yahuje Inteko ya Umuco , abarimu na abanyeshuri bafite aho bahurira na ururimi rwa Ikinyarwanda , bagamije kurebera hamwe icyakorwa ngo imyigishirize ya urwo rurimo irusheho kunozwa .
Mu bya ingenzi byavuzwe harimo kunoza imyigishirize ya ururimi rwa Ikinyarwanda hashyirwaho ibitabo bya ikibonezamvugo birimo amuga azwi kandi ahuriweho na bose .
Amuga ni amagambo akoreshwa mu ngeri ya ubumenyi cyangwa umwuga runaka .

Abitabiriye batandandukanye bagaragaje ko mu rurimi rwa Ikinyarwanda hakoreshwa amuga anyuranye , aho usanga ijamo rimwe rivugwa mu buryo butandukanye , bikajijisha abakurikirana ubwo bushakashatsi .
Dr . Valentin Uwizeyimana , umushakashatsi akaba na umwarimu muri kaminuza , yavuze ko ibi byakemuka hashyizweho inkoranyamuga .
Yagize ati " " " " Hategurwa inkoranyamuga , na iyo itaba inkoranyamuga ya ikibonezamvugo yose muri rusange , ariko byibuze hagakorwa agatabo gato cyane kagerageza gushyira hamwe amuga ya ingenzi akoreshwa mu rurimi rwa Ikinyarwanda . " " " "
" " " " Aho ngaho hahita hashakishwa uburyo abarimu na abandi bantu bafite aho bahuriye na ikibonezamvugo cya Ikinyarwanda mu Rwanda bakoresha iyo nkoranyamuga cyangwa ako gatabo .
Icyo gihe rwose icyo kibazo numva cyahita gikemuka . " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko ibi byakorwa habayeho ubufatanye bwa Inteko ya Umuco , Ikigo cya Igihugu gushinzwe Uburezi , REB , ndetse na Kaminuza ya u Rwanda ishami rya uburezi .
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Inteko ya Umuco , Ambasaderi Masozera Robert , yavuze ko iki kibazo kizacyemuka , binyuze mu bufatanye maze amuga akoreshwa mu Kinyarwanda akegeranywa , akabonezwa , akemezwa ndetse agashyikirizwa abarimu bakayigisha mu mashuri .
Yagize ati " " " " Ni ibintu tuzakoraho mu bufatanye , abafatanyabikorwa twese .
Icyo twavanyemo ni umukoro wa ibyo gukora , umukoro ugamije gukemura ibibazo byagaragajwe , dufatanyije namwe mwese abashakashatsi , abarimu , na abanyeshuri . " " " "
Masozera yasabye ubufatanye muri gahunda ya # NdigaIkinyarwanda yatangijwe yo kwigisha no kwiga Ikinyarwanda benshi bakakimenya .
Yavuze ko ibyo byose bitagerwaho hatabayeho ubufatanye na abashakashatsi ndetse na abarimu muri urwo rurimi .
Ati " " " " Ni gahunda twifuza ko aba ariyo twese dukoreramo ibikorwa byose byo kwiga no kwigisha Ikinyarwanda .
Iyi gahunda irimo bya bindi byose twavuze , harimo ibya imfashanyigisho , hazamo ibya amategeko ariko cyane cyane kuyisakaza . " " " "
Yavuze ko guteza imbere Ikinyarwanda bikwiriye kuba gahunda ya buri wese , ikamamazwa kandi igakoreshwa .
Ati " " " " Iyi # NdigaiKinyarwanda tuyigereranye na izi gahunda ziriho zikorwa .
Murabona mu nganda no mu bukorikori haje ubukangurambaga bwitwa " " " " Made in Rwanda , " " " " ibikorerwa iwacu .
Urareba ugasanga ubukangurambaga buri hose na abantu barabyumva vuba [ . . . ] Nifuza ko twazana ngo # NdigaiKinyarwanda , ikaba gahunda twakoreraho . " " " "
Ikinyarwanda gikoreshwa na abantu bari hagati ya miliyoni 35 - 40 babarizwa mu Rwanda , Tanzania , Uganda , Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo na ahandi hirya no hino ku Isi .
Inteko ya Umuco ikomeje gukora ibishoboka ngo Ikinyarwanda cyimakazwe , ndetse mu kiganiro giherutse guhuza Amb . Masozera na abandi bantu batandukanye kuri RBA , yavuze ko ari ibya ingenzi ko ururimi rwa Ikinyarwanda rubungwabungwa kugira ngo rutazajya mu mubare wa indimi ziri mu kaga .
Indimi ziri mu kaga ni indimi zivugwa mu buryo butanoze , zikavuga zivangitiranye na izindi ndimi nyinshi kandi zikandikwa nabi .
Habururwa ko indimi 40 % bya indimi 7 000 zivugwa ku Isi ziri muri aka kaga .
Rwagasani yanditse igitabo ku mbwirwaruhame za Perezida Kagame .
Iki gitaboa The Driven Wisdom from Paul Kagame " " " " giteganyijwe gusohoka muri Werurwe 2021 , Rwagasani yabanje kugishyira ahagaragara ngo abantu batandukanye batangeho ibitekerezo atoranyemo ibyo ashobora kongera muri iki gitabo , azabone kukimurikira abanyarwanda ku mugaragaro .
Amagambo yagiye atoranywa mu mbwirwaruhame Umukuru wa Igihugu yagiye atanga mu bihe bitandukanye .
Nko mu 2012 , ubwo yari I Gatsibo , Perezida Kagame yavuze ko " " " " Abanyarwanda bameze nka abandi bantu , Imana yaduhaye ubuzima , ubwenge na imbaraga na igihugu yaduhaye twese ibikenewe bya ibanze kugira ngo duhindure ubuzima bwacu natwe ntabwo tugomba kubutakaza .
Iyo abantu bahinduye imyifatire yabo , byose bizashoboka . " " " "
Rwagasani yabwiye IGIHE ko yifuje guhuruza hamwe amagambo ya ingenzi , Perezida Kagame yagiye avuga mu mbwirwaruhame zitandukanye akenshi usanga zigaruka ku kubaka abakiri urubyiruko .
Yagize ati " " " " Ubundi ndi mu rubyiruko , iyo ubona ibintu Umukuru wa igihugu , akora cyangwa ibyo atubwira akenshi ntabwo abantu bakunze kubibika ngo babishyire hamwe .
Rero ugasanga ubishyize hamwe na ibindi bihugu bishobora kuzajya byifashisha cya gitabo . " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko " " " " Abantu bashobora gusoma , kandi uko ugenda usoma izo mbwirwarumahe usanga hari ibintu ugenda urushaho kwiga no kuzirikana ku Rwanda " " " "
Ni ibiganiro bigera kuri 41 yagiye atoranyamo amagambo cyangwa interuro zuje ubutumwa yagiye atoranyamo abihuriza hamwe muri iki gitabo .
Rwagasani yasabye urubyiruko bagenzi be , kujya rukurikira inama ruhabwa na ubuyobozi bwa igihugu bya umwihariko Perezida Kagame .
Yagize ati " " " " Inama mpa urubyiruko ni ugukomeza umurage duhabwa na ubuyobozi bwacu cyane cyane byinshi tubonera muri gahunda za leta cyane cyane ibyo tubwirwa na umukuru wa igihugu kugira ngo tudatakaza ibya uyu munsi dukwiye kubibika mu buryo bwo kwandika ndetse na abari hanze bakwiye kumva no gusoma
ibyo tubwirwa na umukuru wa igihugu noneho bakazakomeza iyo nzira . " " " "
Rwagasani yanditse ibitabo bitandukanye birimo icyo yaherukaga kumurika cyitwa " " " " Ubumwe , Inzira yo Kugarura Ubumwe bwa Abanyarwanda no kubumbatira ubusugire bwa igihugu . " " " "
Ubushakashatsi no kongera umubare wa abakivuga : Imirongo migari yitezweho kwagura no gusigasira Ikinyarwanda .
Abahanga mu ndimi na umuco bagaragaza ko ari amahirwe ataboneka henshi kuba u Rwanda rufite ururimi kavukire ari na rwo rwa Igihugu , ruvugwa na abarenga 99 , 4 % .
Andi mahirwe ni ukugira uburezi bunigisha indimi kandi butangwa mu rurimi rwa Igihugu bukajijura rubanda benshi bigafasha mu kubaka ubukungu bushingiye ku rurimi kavukire .
Mu Rwanda , Ikinyarwanda cyemewe na Itegeko Nshinga nka Ururimi rwa Igihugu ndetse na Ururimi rwa Ubutegetsi .
Indirimbo yubahiriza Igihugu na yo irubona nka umusingi wa ubumwe na agaciro bya Abanyarwanda aho igira iti : " " " " Umuco dusangiye uraturanga , ururimi rwacu rukaduhuza . " " " "
Leta ya u Rwanda yashyizeho Inteko ya Umuco nka Ikigo cya Igihugu gishinzwe kurengera , kubungabunga no guteza imbere ururimi rwa Ikinyarwanda nka uko bigaragara mu Iteka rya Perezida no 082 / 01 ryo ku wa 28 / 08 / 2020 rishyiraho Inteko ya Umuco .
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE , Umuyobozi Wungirije wa Inteko ya Umuco , Uwiringiyimana Jean Claude , yavuze ko bashyize gahunda yo gusigasira ururimi rwa ikinyarwanda .
Yagize ati " " " " Mu kurengera ururimi ni uko turufata nka ishingiro rya ubumwe bwa Abanyarwanda .
Ubwo rero ikintu twita ishingiro rya ubumwe bwa Abanyarwanda ugomba kukirengera kugira ngo igihe cyose urwo rurimi ruzahore ruduhuza . " " " "
Abavuga Ikinyarwanda bakwiriye Isi
Ubusanzwe ururimi rwose rugira indimi shami , nka ikinyarwanda usanga gifite indimi shami zitandukanye zizwi na izikirimo gukorwaho ubushakashatsi .
Abavuga Ikinyarwanda barimo abari imbere mu gihugu , abasigaye inyuma yacyo ubwo abakoroni bakataga imipaka mu myaka ya 1900 .
