Imibare ya Inteko ya Umuco igaragaza ko ku Isi hose iyo urebye usanga abavuka Ikinyarwanda babarirwa muri miliyoni 30 [ harimo miliyoni 12 , abo basigaye inyuma ya u Rwanda kubera imipaka ndetse na abari hirya no hino ku Isi ] .
Uwiringiyimana yavuze ko kugeza ubu Ikinyarwanda cyamaze kurenga imipaka aho usanga uretse mu Rwanda , hari na amashuri makuru na za kaminuza zo hanze zigisha Ikinyarwanda .
Ingero zitangwa ni Kaminuza ya Indiana muri Leta ya Indiana , muri Leta Zunze ubumwe za Amerika yatangije isomo rya ikinyarwanda mu 2019 .
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Hari za kaminuza bya umwihariko izo muri Amerika zigisha Ikinyarwanda .
Buriya iyo Umunyarwanda agiye hanze , ajyana Ikinyarwanda na iyo ahuriyeyo na mugenzi we bafite Ikinyarwanda ni cyo kibahuza .
Icyo kintu kirakomeye . " " " "
" " " " Na Abanyarwanda benshi baba mu mahanga , Ikinyarwanda cyaragutse ku buryo bagenda bakigisha na abandi .
Hari abazungu usanga bavuga Ikinyarwanda ukagira ngo bavutse bakivuga , kubera ubushake bwo kukimenya ndetse na abo Banyarwanda bakigisha . " " " "
Uwiringiyimana avuga ko hari gahunda ikomeye yo gushakira Ikinyarwanda amuga kugira ngo hirindwe ko cyaba uruvangitirane rwa izindi ndimi bityo kizagumane wa mwimerere wacyo .
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Ikindi hari uko kugikoraho ubushakashatsi kuko uririmi rudakorwaho ubushakashatsi rurapfa .
Ikindi mu kugiteza imbere hari na uburyo dushyize imbere bwo kugishyira mu ikoranabuhanga . " " " "
Kuva muri Gashyantare 2020 , Ururimi rwa Ikinyarwanda rwashyizwe mu ndimi zizajya zihindurwa mu zindi hifashishijwe uburyo bwa Ikoranabuhanga rya Internet buzwi nka " " " " Google Translate . " " " "
Inteko ya Umuco igaragaza ko ibi na byo byitezweho kongera umubare wa abavuga Ikinyarwanda ku Isi kandi bikazanorohereza abagikoraho ubushakashatsi .
Inama Rusange ya Umuryango wa Abibumbye mu mwanzuro wayo A / RES / 61 / 266 wo mu kwezi kwa Gicurasi 2000 , yashyizeho itariki 21 Gashyantare kuba Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wa Ururimi Kavukire .
Ubuyobozi bwa Inteko ya Umuco bwatangaje ko ibikorwa bijyanye no kwizihiza ku nshuro ya 18 Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wa Ururimi Kavukire uzaba ku Cyumweru tariki ya 21 Gashyantare 2021 , bizaba hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kubahiriza ingamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID - 19 .
Umunsi wa ururimi kavukire ugiye kwizihizwa herekanwa ibyakozwe mu kubungabunga Ikinyarwanda .
Insanganyamatsiko ya uyu mwaka igira iti " " " " Ururimi rwa Ikinyarwanda , umusingi wa ubumwe na agaciro bya Abanyarwanda " " " " mu gihe ku rwego rwa Isi , hatoranyijwe igira iti " " " " Duharanire guteza imbere indimi nyinshi nta ruhejwe mu burezi no mu muryango . " " " "
Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono na Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Inteko ya Umuco , Ambasaderi Masozera Robert , rivuga ko mu gihe isi muri rusange yugarijwe na icyorezo cya Covid - 19 , uyu munsi uzizihizwa hifashishijwe iyakure ( Online ) .
Ibikorwa biteganyijwe
Ubuyobozi bwa Inteko ya Umuco kandi bwatangaje ko umunsi nyirizina uzabimburirwa na icyumweru cyo kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wa Ururimi Kavukire 2021 .
Muri icyo cyumweru hateganyijwe ibikorwa birimo kuba Minisiteri ya Urubyiruko na Umuco ibinyujije mu Nteko ya Umuco izagaragariza Abanyarwanda ibyagezweho mu rwego rwo gusigasira no guteza imbere Ikinyarwanda nka ururimi rwa Igihugu na Ururimi rwa ubutegetsi .
Hazibandwa cyane ku ngamba zo gushishikariza abakoresha na abahugura Ikinyarwanda nka abarezi , abanyamakuru , abashakashatsi , abanyeshuri na Abanyarwanda muri rusange gukoresha Ikinyarwanda kinoze no kugiha agaciro .
Iki cyumweru kandi kizarangwa na ibiganiro bigenewe Abanyarwanda baba mu Gihugu na ababa mu mahanga ( Diaspora ) .
Ibiganiro bizagaruka ku guhuza imyigishirize ya Ikibonezamvugo cya Ikinyarwanda mu mashuri , kizibanda ku ruhare rwa umuhanzi na umunyamakuru mu gusigasira no guteza imbere Ikinyarwanda na indangagaciro za umuco wa u Rwanda .
Iki cyumweru kandi kizarangwa na inama nyunguranabitekerezo izagaruka ku ngamba zo gukungahaza ururimi rwa Ikinyarwanda mu ngeri zose za ubumenyi , izagaruka cyane cyane ku Kinyarwanda na ikoranabuhanga , ubuhanzi na ubuvanganzo , Ikinyarwanda na itunganyandimi , amuga na ikibonezamvugo bya Ikinyarwanda .
Umunsi nyirizina uzarangwa na ibihangano gakondo bya muzika , ikinamico na ubuvanganzo nyemvugo bya Abanyarwanda no gutangaza abatsindiye ibihembo bitandukanye .
Inteko ya Umuco ishishikariza Abanyarwanda kuzirikana ko Ikinyarwanda ari ingobyi ya umuco , kikaba ipfundo rya ubumwe abenegihugu basangiye " " " " na ishingiro rya isano dufitanye aho turi hose ; kikaduha kugira icyerekezo kimwe . " " " "
Abanyarwanda bafite amahirwe yo kuba bavuga ururimi rumwe rwabo kavukire rukabahuza na umuco wabo ukabaranga .
Ikinyarwanda kandi gifasha kwihutisha imigabo na imigambi bya iterambere kuko ari umuyoboro wa ubumenyi , ikoranabuhanga na ubuhanzi .
Kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wa Ururimi Kavukire bijyanye no kurushaho kwita ku Kinyarwanda , gutekereza ku kamaro kacyo , buri wese agahagurukira kugikoresha neza mu byo avuga no mu byo yandika .
Ishami rya Umuryango wa Abibumbye ryita ku Bumenyi , Uburezi na Umuco ( UNESCO ) niryo ryashyizeho Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wa Ururimi Kavukire mu mwaka wa i 1999 .
Inama Rusange ya Umuryango wa Abibumbye na yo mu mwanzuro wayo A / RES / 61 / 266 wo mu kwezi kwa Gicurasi 2000 , yashyizeho itariki 21 Gashyantare kuba Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wa Ururimi Kavukire .
Mu Rwanda , Ikinyarwanda cyemewe na Itegeko Nshinga nka Ururimi rwa Igihugu ndetse na Ururimi rwa Ubutegetsi .
Indirimbo yubahiriza Igihugu na yo irubona nka umusingi wa ubumwe na agaciro bya Abanyarwanda aho igira iti " " " " Umuco dusangiye uraturanga , ururimi rwacu rukaduhuza . " " " "
Leta ya u Rwanda yashyizeho Inteko ya Umuco nka Ikigo cya Igihugu gishinzwe kurengera , kubungabunga no guteza imbere ururimi rwa Ikinyarwanda nka uko bigaragara mu Iteka rya Perezida no 082 / 01 ryo ku wa 28 / 08 / 2020 rishyiraho Inteko ya Umuco .
Inkovu ya umutwe mwasatuye si uburanga navukanye , ntimukadutoneke - Kayitesi Judence .
Kayitesi wavukiye muri Rutongo muri Gasabo kuri ubu atuye mu Budage guhera mu mwaka wa 2010 aho yageze nyuma yo kurokoka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 , yiciwemo ababyeyi be bombi na abavandimwe babiri .
Uyu mubyeyi wa imyaka 38 , afite abana batatu barimo abahungu babiri ba imyaka 13 na 12 na umukobwa wa imyaka 15 arera nka umwana we .
Mu kiganiro cyihariye IGIHE yagiranye na Kayitesi , yavuze ko yanyuze mu bihe bikomeye ari nabyo byashibutsemo icyemezo cyo kwandika ayo mateka .
Yagize ati " " " " " " " " Ntabwo byoroshye kuvuga amateka twaciyemo ariko tuzajya tubikora kuko ni bwo buryo bwo gusubiza abadutse muri ibi bihe byo gupfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .
Ese iyi nkovu ya umutwe wanjye basatuye ni uburanga navukanye ? " " " " " " " "
Aya mateka avuga ko yayashyize mu gitabo yise " " " " " " " " Ein zebrochenes leben " " " " " " " " mu Rurimi rwa Ikidage , ari byo " " " " " " " " Broken life " " " " " " " " mu Cyongereza , bikaba bisobanura " " " " " " " " Inzira ya Inzitane " " " " . " " " "
Mu buhamya bwe yavuze ko muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bamutemye mu mutwe ata na ubwenge bimuviramo kugira ubumuga bwo kuvuga igihe kirekire ariko nyuma aza gukira .
Yakomeje ati " " " " " " " " Bakimara kuntema ubwo nari mfite imyaka 11 twari mu bihe bikomeye , sinigeze mvurwa , igisebe cyaje kumera nabi , kubera kutitabwaho , aho twari mu mpunzi na abandi bana bakavuga ngo na ubundi nzapfa simvurwe .
Nyuma babonye nkomeje gukomeza umutsi nibwo banshyizeho igipfuko batangira kubona ko ntahise mpfa .
Byanteye ubumuga kuko nagize ubumuga bwo kutavuga nkajya mvuga nkoresheje amarenga , nari mfite ubwoba bwo kutazabasha kuvuga ibyo nabonye . " " " " " " " "
" " " " " " " " Ni bwo ngize amahirwe mbishyira mu gitabo kugira ngo abana be batazajya babaza amateka ya iwabo .
Bizaba na uburyo bwo kwerekana ubukana bwa abateguye bakanashyira mu bikorwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi . " " " " " " " "
Kayitesi yavuze ko ikintu kimubabaza cyane ari uko abishe abantu banajugunye amafoto kuko basazabe be babiri barokokanye bahora bamubaza uko ababyeyi babo basaga .
Ati " " " " " " " " Duhora twibaza buri munsi uko babyeyi bacu basaga , ugasanga hari nka musaza wanjye muto ambwira ngo wowe uri nka Mama kuko numva musa na ibindi byinshi twibaza tutajya tubonera ibisubizo . " " " " " " " "
" " " " " " " " Tukiva muri Jenoside , najyaga njya kwa Rubangura nkategereza Mama ko namubona asohotse muri bisi , ibyo nabikoraga ntawe mbwiye .
Umugore wese nabonaga yambaye igitenge naramukurikiraga ngasanga si we , kuko numvaga ko Mama wanjye atapfa . " " " " " " " "
Mu kubara inkuru , yavuze ko yemeye ko umubyeyi we yishwe ubwo yabyaraga ntajye kumuhemba .
Akomeza ati " " " " " " " " Byari bikomeye kuri njye kubyara imfura yanjye ntahabe .
Kuva icyo gihe rero narabyemeye rwose . " " " " " " " "
Kayitesi yahisemo kwandika ashaka ko abana be bazamenya amateka ababyeyi babo banyuzemo ndetse na igihugu .
Ati " " " " " " " " Sinigeze nibaza ko nzamara iyi myaka 27 nyuma ya Jenoside yadukorewe , maze kubyara numva nkunze ubuzima , kubona abana banjye bakura nabo bakazabyara nibwo batangiye kujya bambaza amateka ya iwabo kwa ba se na sekuru na ba nyirakuru .
Nafashe icyemezo cya uko nta wundi wayababwira atari njye , ni ko kwandika iki gitabo kandi nari nsanzwe ntandika . " " " " " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko nyuma yo kubyara abana bajyaga bamubaza ibibazo bikorogoshora ngo kuki batabona ba sekuru .
Ati " " " " Na nyuma yaho ntangiye ubuhamya mu 2018 mu ruhame mu gihe cyo kwibuka , nahise mfata icyemezo byanyongereye imbaraga zo gukomeza kwandika igitabo . " " " "
Kayitesi avuga ko kwandika igitabo byari ugutanga umusanzu we kugira ngo bitazongera kubaho ukundi haba mu Rwanda na ahandi .
Yatangaje ko yifuza ko urubyiruko rwagisoma rukamenya amateka igihugu cyanyuzemo kugira ngo ntiruzagwe mu mutego nka uwo bagenzi babo baguyemo .
Iki gitabo cyanditse mu buryo bworoheje kuko buri wese wagize ibihe bikomeye azibonamo .
Kayitesi avuga ko igitabo cye kizasohoka no mu Cyongereza hanyuma hagakurikiraho Igifaransa na Ikinyarwanda .
Uko Kigeli IV Rwabugili yanze kugurisha Abanyarwanda mu bucakara avuga ko ari aba Imana .
Abanyamateka bagaragaza ko nibura ku nkengero za Inyajya ya u Buhinde hagurishirijwe miliyoni 17 za Abirabura .
Icyo gihe ibice bimwe bya Afurika abaturage baragabanyutse , bicwa na inzara , umuruho kubera ingendo ndende no gufatwa nabi .
Umwanditsi wa Umunyamerika , Sir Henri Morton Stanley nawe uri mu bageze muri Afurika mu bukoloni , yanditse ko nyuma yaje gusubira mu gace ka Maniema ko muri Repubulika Iharanira Demukarasi ya Congo asanga abaturage baragabanyutse cyane .
Iri curuzwa rya abantu na ubucakara byaherekejwe no gutesha agaciro , iyicarubozo , na ihohoterwa rya abirabura bo muri Afurika .
Byagize ingaruka zikomeye ku birabura bose aho bava bakagera kugeza na uyu munsi baracyahangana na ibisigisigi bya izi ngaruka .
Ku ngoma ya Umwami Kigeli IV Rwabugili nibwo abaturage bo mu bihugu byo muri Afurika yo munsi ya ubutayu bwa Sahara no mu Karere ka Ibihugu byo mu Biyaga Bigari muri rusange , bari imari ishyushye ku isoko rya ibihugu bya Amerika na iby Abarabu .
Rwabugili ni we mwami wenyine wanze gufata abaturage be ngo abagurishe .
Ahandi mu bindi bice bya Afurika bararaga bafata abagabo na abagore bafite imbaraga bakabagurisha abazungu na Abarabu .
Abami bagurishaga abacakara , bahabwa impano zitandukanye zirimo indorerwamo , amasaro , imyenda na ibindi .
Umwanditsi akaba na Impuguke mu mateka , Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu agaragaza ko Umwami Rwabugili yari yaramenye amahano Abarabu bari gukora mu Banyamwezi , mu Bagande , mu Banyoro na i Karagwe na ahandi hirya no hino mu karere .
Abarabu bafatanyije na Abami baho bari bamaze igihe bafata abaturage babo bakabagurisha .
Umwami Rwabugili amaze kumenyeshwa ko Abarabu bageze ku nkengero za Ikiyaga cya Tanganyika , yahaye itegeko ingabo ze ko umuntu wese wa uruhu rwera bazabona akandagira ku butaka bwa u Rwanda bagomba kumwica .
Hari amateka agaragaza ko mu 1871 , Abarabu ba mbere binjiye mu Rwanda baje gufata abantu , nta na umwe warusohotsemo .
Ayo makuru barayabwiranye , baratinya cyane .
Nyuma bagerageje kureshya umwami Rwabugili , bamuzanira impano nyinshi zirimo amatungo , imyenda na ibindi kugira ngo yemere kugurisha Abanyarwanda ariko arabyanga ni yo mpamvu abarabu benshi bakambitse bakagarukira hakurya ya Akagera , ntibatinyuke kwinjira mu Rwanda .
Rwabugili yababwiye ko Abaturage ari aba Imana
Abakoraga ubucuruzi busanzwe buzwi bo barambukaga neza bakinjira bagacuruza bakongera bagasubira iwabo .
Abarabu bakoze ibishoboka byose ngo binjire mu Rwanda bafate abagabo na abagore ariko umwami Rwabugili ababera ibamba .
Umushakashatsi akaba na Impuguke mu mateka , Innocent Nizeyimana [ yanditse igitabo yise " " " " Ubumwe bwa Abanyarwanda mu mateka yabo " " " " ] avuga ko abanyarwanda na Ubwami bwabo bari bazi agaciro ka ikiremwamuntu ndetse na uburenganzira bwe , ari nayo mpamvu bamaganye icuruzwa rya abantu .
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na RBA , Nizeyimana yavuze ko Rwabugili yakundaga abaturage be ku buryo na ubwo byari bisanzwe bizwi ko abaturage ari rubanda rwa Umwami , kuri we atari ko byari bimeze .
Yagize ati " " " " Iki gihe cyo gucuruza abirabura , Rwabugili yarabahakaniye aravuga ati njyewe ntabwo nagurisha abanyarwanda kuko si abanjye , ahubwo ninjye wabo .
Abanyarwanda ni aba Imana . " " " "
Nizeyimana avuga ko muri icyo gihe Abanyarwanda bitaga Umwami wabo , Nyagasani .
Ni ukuvuga ko yari ahagarariye Imana , iyi akaba ari nayo mpamvu bikekwako yatumye yanga ko abanyarwanda bagurwa mu bucakara .
Ati " " " " Abanyarwanda bumvaga ko Umwami ahagarariye Imana , none se Nyagasani yari kubagurisha ku banyamahanga ?
Na ubwo Umwami baje bakamwinginga yakomeje kwimana abaturage be . " " " "
Amateka agaragaza ko hari abantu bagurwaga mu Burundi no muri Congo , mu Burengerazuba bwa Afurika no Mu burasirazuba icyo gihe banyuzwaga mu Rwanda bagiye gupakirwa mu bwato bwo ku cyambu cya Dar es Salaalam bakanyuzwa mu Nyanja ya Abahinde .
Mu banyuzwaga mu Rwanda habaga harimo abana , abagore na abandi bantu barwaye , u Rwanda rwababona kubera ubumuntu bwahoze buranga abanyarwanda , rugasaba ko abo bantu bagumishwa mu gihugu noneho u Rwanda rugatanga ingurane .
Nizeyimana ati " " " " Abanyarwanda barazaga bakabategera mu nzira , u Rwanda rukemera rugatanga amaturo rukabagura , rugatanga ihene nyinshi rukemera rukarenza kubyo bari batanze aho babaguze rwarangiza rubabwira ruti aba bantu ntabwo mwabagezayo dore bararembye bameze nabi . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Babaguraga na Abarabu babaga babajyanye muri Tanzania ku cyambu , ibyo rero byose birakwereka ko u Rwanda cyari igihugu kihagazeho .
Ntirwigeze rugurisha abantu barwo ahubwo na abanyamahanga rwarabaguraga rukemera rukabishyurira . " " " "
Lt Col Gérard Nyirimanzi , umwe mu bagize Urwego rwa Intwari , impeta na Imidari ya Ishimwe akaba no mu Ishyirahamwe rya Abacukumbuzi ba Ireme rya Umuco na Amateka bya u Rwanda , yavuze ko kimwe mu bigaragaza uko Rwabugiri yanze gucuruza abantu ari uko bamwise " " " " Bwana Mkali " " " " cyangwa se umugabo ukaze .
Ati " " " " Abacuruza abacakara bo byari byarabananiye kwinjira mu Rwanda ku buryo hari umucuruzi umwe wavuze ati " " " " Pale musiende wana , kuna Bwana Mkali , " " " " banavuga ko kariya gace kitwa Bwana Mukari banakitiriye uwo Rwabugiri wari waranze gucuruza abantu . " " " "
Nyirimanzi avuga ko no mu Rwanda hari hari amasoko yacururizwagaho abantu ariko babaga ari abavanywe mu bihugu byo hanze nka Repubulika Iharanira Demukarasi ya Congo .
Ati " " " " No mu Rwanda hari isoko rya icuruzwa rya abacakara ariko igihamya gihari ni uko Rwabugili yanze gucuruza abantu .
Babimusabye arabaseka cyane . " " " "
Umusizi Nsanzabera yavuze ko Rwabugili yanashyizeho ingabo zo kurwanya abacuruza abacakara , zishyirwa mu Bugesera ngo zihangena na Abarabu .
Icyo gihe ngo hapfuye abarabu icumi .
Kigeli IV Rwabugili yari mwene Mutara II Rwogera na Nyirakigeli Murorunkwere .
Yimye mu mwaka w " " " " 1853 kugera muri Nzeri 1895 .
Hagiye gusohoka igitabo kivuga ibigwi bya Nyirarumaga mu mateka ya u Rwanda .
Nyirarumaga yabaye umugabekazi wa ingoboka wa umwami Ruganzu II Ndoli .
Nsanzabera yabwiye IGIHE ko yatekereje kwandika iki gitabo afite intego yo gukeza intwari zigaragaje mu mateka ya u Rwanda , umuco avuga ko ukwiye gucengera mu Banyarwanda , maze abanyabigwi barwubatse rugahamya igitinyiro bagahabwa urubuga rubasingiza .
Yagize ati " " " " Bafite amavugwa na amarorwa mu Rwanda .
Igiti ntikimenyekana kubwa izina cyitwa , kimenyekana ku bwa imbuto cyera , ibikorwa byabo bya ubutaneshwa bikwiriye gushyirwa ahabona , buri wese akabigira ibye , bikamubera igikabuzo cyo kubaka ahazaza hazira icyasha . " " " "
Yavuze ko ibyo abanyarwanda bagezeho byose bagiye babiharanira bityo ko bakwiriye gushimira no kumenyekanisha intwari zose zagize uruhare ngo ibyiza igihugu cyagezeho kibigereho .
Ati " " " " Ibikorwa byubaka igihugu cya u Rwanda , ubuhangange na ubudasa , byagiye bigira intwari zabimburiye izindi mu kubyitangira haba mu kubihanga , mu kubyubaka no mu kubirinda .
Ntacyo Abanyarwanda twagezeho kubera amahirwe , ahubwo byose twarabiharaniye , tubigeraho twiyushye akuya .
Ni byiza ko twimakaza umuco wo gukeza no gusingiza intwari zagize icyo zikora ngo u Rwanda rube urwo ruri rwo uyu munsi . " " " "
Amateka agaragaza ko Nyirarumaga ari umwe mu bagore babaye ibihangange mu Rwanda , aho yarunambiye kugeza ku munota wa nyuma , akabundisha ( guhungisha ) Ruganzu mwene Cyamatare ubwo Abanyabyinshi bamuhigiraga kubura hasi no kubura hejuru ngo bamwivugane , ingoma ya u Rwanda bayegukane .
Nyirarumaga yemeye gucibwa intoki ebyiri ku gaherere ubwo yangaga gutangaza aho Ndoli yabundiye ( yahungiye ) ubwo bashakaga kumwica .
Ruganzu Ndoli yaje kwitura Nyirarumaga amugira umugabekazi wa ingoboka ku ngoma ye , kuko nyina Nyabacuzi ba Kibogora yari yaraguye mu miko ya abakobwa i Rubi rwa i Nyundo .
Nyirarumaga na Ndoli batwaye u Rwanda ahasaga mu wa 1510 - 1543 .
Ni umwe mu bagabekazi 27 u Rwanda rwagize akaba umwe mu bakoze ibikorwa bya ikirenga byubatse u Rwanda mu rwego ruhanitse mu bihe bya ingoma ye , cyane cyane ku kubaka umuco mbonera wa ubumuntu na ubumana .
Kubaka imibereho na imibanire ya Abanyarwanda , imyidagaduro na ubuvanganzo no kurushaho gukuza agaciro ka umugore wa i Rwanda .
Abasizi bo bamwibukira ku kuba ariwe nyirakuruza wabo kuko ibisigo bya mbere ari ibye .
Nsanzabera yavuze ko abanyabigwi nka Nyirarumaga , bakwiye kubahwa no kwibuka ibihe byose , abakiri bato bagatozwa umuco wa ubutwari bushingiye ku bwitange no guhanga ibishya .
Iki gitabo " " " " Nyiraruganzu II Nyirarumaga , Inkingi mwikorezi ya umuco na amateka ya u Rwanda " " " " kizajya hanze mu minsi mike iri imbere .
Kwagura Urukari no kubaka Umudugudu Ndangamuco : Umushinga wihariye mu Karere ka Nyanza .
Ni umushinga watangiye ku bufatanye bwa Akarere ka Nyanza na Inteko ya Umuco , ukaba uzakorerwa ahitwa mu Rukari ahari Ingoro ya Abami ba u Rwanda no mu nkengero zaho ndetse no hafi ya Icyuzi cya Nyamagana .
Umuyobozi wa Akarere ka Nyanza , Ntazinda Erasme , yabwiye IGIHE ko batangiye uwo mushinga ari umwihariko bafite nka icyerekezo cya Akarere .
Ati " " " " Icyerekezo cya akarere ni ukuba izingiro rya ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco na amateka .
Icyakozwe ni uko twagerageje gushaka uburyo bwo kwagura Urukari dufatanyije na Ikigo cya Igihugu cya Ingoro za Umurage wa u Rwanda . " " " "
Yavuze ko abaturage batuye mu nkengero za Urukari aho ruzagurirwa bamaze guhabwa ingurane hakaba hasigaye igikorwa cyo gushaka amafaranga kugira ngo kubaka bitangire .
Yakomeje avuga ko umushinga wo kwagura urukari uzajyana no kubaka Umudugudu Ndangamuco hafi ya icyuzi cya Nyamagana .
Uwo mudugudu ubwawo uzakorerwa ku buso bwa hegitari icyenda , kandi ibikorwa byo kwimura abaturage byari byaratangiye ariko bidindizwa na icyorezo cya Covid - 19 .
Mu bazimurwa ahazajya uwo mudugudu hose hamaze kwishyurwa ahangana na hegitari ebyiri , bikaba biteganyijwe ko abatarishyurwa bo bazongera kubarirwa kuko ibiciro byahindutse .
Ntanzida ati " " " " Hari habazwe amafaranga agera muri Miliyoni 200 ariko tuzongera tubare kuko hashize hafi imyaka ibiri , ubwo tuzongera tubare tubihe agaciro bundi bushya . " " " "
Akarere ka Nyanza kabumbatiye amateka menshi yiganjemo ayo hambere kuko Nyanza yabaye Umurwa Mukuru wa Ubwami kuva mu 1899 kugeza mu mu 1962 .
I Nyanza hatuwe na Abami bane ari bo Kigeli IV Rwabugiri wari utuye ku misozi ya Mwima na Mushirarungu ; Yuhi IV Musinga watuye i Mwima na Gakenyeri ; Mutara III Rudahigwa watuye mu Rukali ndetse na Umwami Kigeli V Ndahindurwa watuye i Busasamana .
Hari ingoro ya Abami yo mu Rukari , Ingoro ya Umurage wo Kwigira , Umusezero wa Abami , Ibigabiro , Inzira Gakondo za Ubukerarugendo ; haboneka Amariba ya Mutende yafukuwe ku ngoma ya Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa , aho Inyambo ze ndetse na inka za abaturage ziturutse imihanda yose zashokaga .
Hari kandi icyuzi cya Nyamagana cyafukujwe na Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa afatanyije na agoronome wa Umubiligi witwaga Dubois .
I Nyanza kandi hafatwa nka igicumbi cya ubutabera kuko hahoze urukiko umwami yaciragamo imanza .
Inyubako ziri mu Mujyi wa Nyanza zose zatakishijwe imitako gakondo ifite ibisobanuro bijyanye na umuco nyarwanda hagamijwe kuwurimbisha ugasa neza ; kubungabunga amateka ndetse no kongera umubare wa abawusura kandi bakahatinda .
Hashyizweho kandi Inzira eshatu za Ubukerarugendo gakondo za kinyarwanda zizwi na The Nyanza Cultural Trials , zitezweho kongera umubare wa abahasura .
Icyorezo cya Covid - 19 kitaraza Akarere ka Nyanza kasurwaga na ba mukerarugendo basaga ibihumbi 70 ku mwaka .
Umurage urubyiruko rukwiye kuvoma kuri Gihanga Ngomijana wahanze u Rwanda .
Ni ubutumwa yageneye abitabiriye Uruhererekane rwa Ibiganiro bya Umuco na Amateka byiswe " " " " Amateka Series " " " " bitegurwa na Urubyiruko ruba mu bihugu bya Australie na Nouvelle - Zélande .
Iyi gahunda igamije gufasha urubyiruko ruba mu mahanga kumenya Umuco na Amateka bya u Rwanda .
Abitabiriye iki kiganiro cyabaye mu buryo bwa ikoranabuhanga , baganirijwe ku nkomoko ya u Rwanda rwahanzwe na Gihanga , ubutwari bwaranze Abanyarwanda ba mbere ya Ubukoloni ndetse na uruhare rwa abagore na urubyiruko mu gukomeza gusigasira uwo murage .
Abatanze ibiganiro barimo Minisitiri Bamporiki Edouard , Umuhanzi Mukankuranga Marie Jeanne [ Mariya Yohana ] na Umunyarwanda uba mu Mujyi wa Perth muri Australie , Niyonzima Jean Paul .
Umuhanzi Icyoyitungiye Jules Bonheur [ Jules Sentore ] niwe wasusurukije abari bakurikiye ikiganiro .
Minisitiri Bamporiki yabwiye uru rubyiruko ko Gihanga atekereza umushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda , yasize intekerezo zihamye zishobora kuyobora abazabaho nyuma kandi zanafasha abariho uyu munsi .
Ati " " " " Gihanga yatumye tugira igihugu ariko aravuga ngo kugira igihugu ni ukumva ko ukirwanirira , ukavuga ngo nzagikorera iki , nzakimarira iki , nzagisigamo iki , ko ngisanzemo umurage njyewe nzasiga ndaze abandi iki ?
Ugasigara wumva ko ikitwa inyungu za igihugu , ziruta kure inyungu za undi muntu . " " " "
Minisitiri Bamporiki yavuze ko umuntu urutisha inyungu ze iza igihugu aba ari kure cyane ya umurage wa Gihanga , aba ahemukira abakurambere na Intwari za u Rwanda kuko zo zari zizi ko nta cyaruta u Rwanda .
Ati " " " " Iyo ni impamba yaguherekeza aho uri dukura kuri Gihanga .
Ariko yavuze na ibintu bikomeye , yaravuze ngo " " " " Uwubaka u Rwanda ntagegena yigeraho , arwubakana na abato . " " " "
Ni nayo mpamvu igihugu cyacu cyahisemo guha inshingano abakiri bato kugira ngo abahari batagegena bigeraho bubaka u Rwanda . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Ni ikintu cyavuzwe na Gihanga , ni umurage tumwubahira uyu munsi .
Kwigira no kwishakamo ibisubizo , kwihangira imirimo na ubunyamwuga tubyikoreye , tubyishatsemo .
Gihanga birimo no guhanga , uyu munsi ubwo twubaha Gihanga bidusigire na intekerezo yo kuvuga ngo ndahanga iki ? " " " "
Mbere ya umwaduko wa Abakoloni babibye amacakubiri n " " " " ivangura mu Banyarwanda babacamo ibice kugira ngo babategeke , Abaturarwanda bari bunze ubumwe nka umurage basigiwe na Gihanga .
Umurage wa Gihanga wakomeje gukura mu Banyarwanda ndetse nka uko amateka abigaragaza mu 1500 , Abaryankuna banze guhemukira u Rwanda biyita abadahemuka banga kuruhemukira kugeza ku munota wa nyuma .
Minisitiri Bamporiki ati " " " " Banze guhemukira u Rwanda , badusigira umurage wa ubudahemuka , umwana wa umunyarwanda , urubyiruko na ubwo yaba ari mundiba ya Isi , iyo bigeze ku Rwanda agomba kurubera umudahemuka .
Singahemuke , ntimugahemuke , mu ruhererekane dukomora kuri Gihanga byaduhaye Abadahemuka . " " " "
Mu 1700 , ku ngoma ya Cyilima II Rujugira , u Rwanda rwaratewe nabwo abantu bahagurukira rimwe biyita abataneshwa bararurwanira kandi batsinda ibihugu bine birimo u Burundi , Igisaka , Ndorwa na u Bugesera .
Icyo gihe nibwo Umwami Cyilima yahise avuga ngo " " " " u Rwanda ruratera ntiruterwa . " " " "
Minisitiri Bamporiki avuga ko nyuma ya abataneshwa haje Abakoloni banesha abanyarwanda , babahimbira amoko ya Abatwa , Abatutsi na Abahutu ari nabyo byagejeje kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 .
Ati " " " " Abakoloni bo mu 1890 bishyira mu 1900 , batangira kutureba bati ariko wowe waturutse aha , undi bati wowe waturutse aha .
Barabivangavanga bica umurage , bica indangagaciro , bica igihugu bitugeza kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi . " " " "
Akomeza avuga ko Inkotanyi zabohoye u Rwanda zabahaye umurage wa abadaheranwa zakomoye kuri Gihanga , ari nawo ukomeye urubyiruko rwa ubu rukwiye gusigasira .
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Umuntu yagutsinda ariko ntiyaguherana .
Rero rubyiruko aho muri hose , ntihagire uheranwa na ubusinzi , ubwomanzi ubwo aribwo bwose , mwishakemo imibereho , umunyarwanda arababara , aratsindwa arakubitika ariko ntaheranwa .
Niko Inkotanyi zatwigishije . " " " "
Umuhanzikazi Mariya Yohana yabwiye urubyiruko bya umwihariko abakobwa ko bakwiye gukurikiza umurage barazwe na abakurambere babo barimo ba Ndabaga na abandi bagiye bagaragaza ubutwari bwo gukorera u Rwanda .
Yagarutse ku ruhare abakobwa na abagore bagize mu rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu no guhagarika Jenoside .
Ati " " " " Abagore ntabwo bigeze bicara ku gushyira u Rwanda imbere , ari ibya cyera hari abagore bagize ishyaka , bagize agaciro kanini na ubu twibuka , birashoboka ko ari nabo tureberaho .
Bana bacu rubyiruko namwe turashaka kuzabavuga nka uko tuvuga abo bagore ariko kandi mugomba kumenya ko u Rwanda mugomba kururirimba kandi niko gaciro kanyu . " " " "
Gahunda ya " " " " Amateka Series , " " " " ni umushinga watangijwe mu Ukuboza 2020 , ukubiyemo ubukangurambaga bwatangijwe na urubyiruko ruba mu mahanga hagamijwe kwigisha bagenzi babo , yaba ababa hirya no hino mu mahanga ndetse na abari mu Rwanda , ibijyanye na amateka ya u Rwanda hamwe na ubugeni mu ngeri zitandukanye .
Beata Umubyeyi Mairesse yahawe igihembo " " " " " " " " Prix des Cinq Continents de la Francophonie " " " " " " " " ( Video ) .
" " " " " " " " Prix des Cinq Continents de la Francophonie " " " " " " " " ni igihembo gihabwa intyoza mu buvanganzo , cyatangiye gutangwa mu 2001 bigizwemo uruhare na Umuryango Mpuzamahanga wa ibihugu bikoresha Igifaransa ( OIF ) .
Gihabwa igitabo cya umwanditsi wagaragaje umwihariko mu guteza imbere Ururimi rwa Igifaransa .
Umubyeyi wegukanye iki gihembo yavuze ko yishimiye kukibona ndetse ari icya ingenzi mu rugendo rwe nka umwanditsi .
Yatangiye kwandika afite imyaka 30 ndetse icyo gihe ntiyizeraga ko azaba umwanditsi wa ibitabo .
Yakomeje ati " " " " " " " " Nakunze gusoma kuva kera nkiri muto cyane , ngira amahirwe yo kuvukira mu Mujyi wa Butare , wari ufite inzu za amasomero , izigurishirizwamo ibitabo na ububiko bwabyo .
Tukiri abana byaradufashaga cyane kubona ibitabo ukabivanamo ubumenyi bwinshi , harimo kugukundisha na we kuzaba wavamo umwanditsi , ukiga neza ururimi usomamo na ibindi .
Ni ho hampaye imbaraga zo kwandika no kubikunda . " " " " " " " "
Mu kiganiro cyihariye IGIHE , uyu mwanditsi yavuze ku gitabo cye " " " " " " " " Tous tes enfants dispersés " " " " , " " " " bishatse kuvuga " " " " " " " " Abana bawe bose batatanye " " " " " " " " cyamuhesheje igihembo .
IGIHE : Wakiriye ute iki gihembo ?
Umubyeyi : " " " " Prix des Cinq Continents de la Francophonie " " " " ni igihembo gikomeye nishimiye cyane , barampamagaye mu minsi ishize barabimbwira .
Ni igihembo gitangwa biciye mu kanama nkemurampaka ( Jury ) gashinzwe ijonjora , riba rigizwe na abanditsi bakomeye bo mu bihugu byinshi bitandukanye bivuga Igifaransa .
Kari kayobowe na Paula Jacques , Jean - Marie Gustave Le Cle ́ zio , Lise Bissonnette , Ananda Devi , Hubert Haddad , Monique Ilboudo , Ve ́ nus Khoury - Ghata , Liliana Lazar , Wilfried Na Sonde ́ , Rene ́ de Obaldia , Lyonel Trouillot , Abdourahman Waberi , Jun Xu et Gilles Jobidon .
Aba barimo na abigeze guhabwa iki gihembo .
Babanje guhitamo ibitabo bya abanditsi 10 , muri ibyo bakuramo ibindi bibiri bihembwa , ari na ho icyanjye cyaje ku isonga gikurikirwa na icya Paul Kawaczak , umwanditsi wa imyaka 34 wo muri Québec .
Iki gitabo rero kikaba ari nacyo cya mbere nanditse mu buryo bwa Roman , bikaba byaranshimishije ko bwa mbere cyabonye igihembo .
IGIHE : Ni iyihe mpamvu wagize amahitamo yo kwandika roman aho kwibanda ku buhamya bwa amateka ya Jenoside warokotse ?
Umubyeyi : Ni byo koko kwandika ubuhamya kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ni ibintu nubaha bikomeye .
Nshima kandi ngasanga ababikoze kugeza ubu ari ubutwari , kuva nagera hano mu Bufaransa nyuma yo kurokoka , uko hasohokaga igitabo kirimo ubuhamya naragisomaga , abenshi turi no mu kigero kimwe ndabazi .
Ibitabo byabo birakomeye cyane ku mateka yacu , kuko bituma abantu bamenya ibyakorewe Abatutsi muri kiriya gihe ku buryo nyabwo bivugwa na ababibayemo babikorewe , bigatuma nta warengera avuga ibindi bitari byo .
Njye rero kwandika mu buryo bwa Roman hari impamvu nyinshi zabinteye , imwe muri izo ni uko wenda nari ntaragira ubwo butwari bwo kuvuga amateka yanjye .
Njya mbabazwa cyane na Abafaransa bamwe usanga bavuga ngo ni amateka yabereye kure muri Afurika , mbese ugasanga bisa nkaho bitabareba , ariko Jenoside iyo ariyo yose ni icyaha cya iyicarubozo kireba ikiremwamuntu cyose ku Isi .
Mu kwandika rero inkuru karemano ( Roman ) na inkuru yihariye mba nshaka kwerekana ariko bitavuze ko ari amateka muri rusange aho uhuza abantu batandukanye mu nkuru ishobora kubaho ariko mpimbano .
Hari aho usanga ya mateka yo muri Jenoside ajemo , noneho wa muntu usoma igitabo uwo ariwe wese na umugabane yaba aherereyemo wose , na we ashobora kumva bimureba cyangwa bisa na ibyo yaciyemo , atavuze ko byabereye kure bitamureba .
Ubwo rero ni bwo buryo bwanjye bwo kuvuga ibintu bikomeye ariko bikakirwa mu buryo bworohera uwo ari we wese kandi akibonamo .
Hari umwanditsi wo mu Bwongereza witwa Zedie Smith wanditse mu gitabo cye inyandiko ya nyayo ya David Foster Wallace ngo " " " " La bonne littérature est faite pour réconforter les gens dérangés et déranger les gens confortables " " " " , " " " " bivuze ngo " " " " Inyandiko nziza ifasha abatameze neza kubera ibibazo bahuye nabyo mu buzima wenda , ikanababaza abari bamerewe neza
bashaka ko ikibi kitavugwa muri rusange . " " " " " " " "
Hari uba afite intimba ku mutima yasoma inkuru akumva hari abandi bahuje akababaro akumva biramufashije nkuko mu Rwanda bakunda kuvuga bati " " " " Si urwa umwe " " " " kuko abona muri iyo nkuru harimo abakomeza umutsi , bagakora ku buryo bagira ejo heza habo , na we bikamugiraho ingaruka nziza .
Aho abandi twavuze baba badashaka gusoma ibintu bikomeye babona gusa umutwe wa inkuru ko uvuga kuri Jenoside agahita avuga ati " " " " Sinshaka gusoma ibintu bintera umutwe aribo nise ( les gens confortables ) .
Muri make ni uko nabonye ibyiza byo gukoresha inkuru karemano .
IGIHE : Mu gitabo wibanze ku byo wise Métissage na Transmission , gifite uburemere bwa uruhererekane rwa umuco , uburere , ingiro ku cyo umuntu ari cyo ukanagaruka kuri Jenoside .
Iki gitekerezo cyo guhuza ibintu biremereye bya ingeri nyinshi cyakujemo gite ?
Umubyeyi : Byaturutse ahantu henshi , mu bitabo nasomye bya abanditsi batandukanye harimo na abaturuka mu Birwa bya Antilles .
Abirabura bo muri Amerika na abandi benshi bavuze amateka ya abirabura muri Diaspora ku Isi yose niho navuga navanye inganzo ( inspiration ) .
Ikindi ni uko umuntu ashobora no kwandika agendeye ku mateka azi nka aya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi cyangwa kuba imvange ya umwirabura na umuzungu ( Métisse ) nkuko Gaël Faye avuga ati " " " " ni hagati ya imigezi ibiri hagati ya intebe ebyiri . " " " "
Njyewe mu Rwanda batubwiraga ko turi abazungu , njyeze mu Bufaransa batwita abirabura .
Ibyo rero ni ibintu abantu benshi usanga baranyuzemo .
Icyo nagerageje gukora muri iki gitabo " " " " Tous tes enfants dispersés " " " " mu bihe bishize , ni ukuvuga nka umukecuru wavukiye mu Rwanda , avukirayo , abyirukirayo , ahura na Umufaransa barashakana babyarana umwana wa mbere bise Blanche , nyuma aza kubyara na undi mwana yise Bosco , ariko we amubyarana na Umunyarwanda bakundanye bakiri mu
mashuri yisumbuye .
Ubwo rero ukabona hari umwana umwe wa Umu - métisse , undi wa Umunyarwanda , kuri uwo mubyeyi ubarera wenyine , hakaba na ibyo atababwira kubera umuco wa Abanyarwanda akenshi ababyeyi batavuga bumva ko ari ukurengera umwana ariko abana bakazakura bibaza ku mateka yaho bakomoka mu miryango yacu na ibindi .
Icyo gihe rero mu Rwanda intambara yatangiye wa mwana Bosco ajya mu Inkotanyi , wa mubyeyi agumana na umukobwa we .
Jenoside itangiye abwira uwo mukobwa ati " " " " Wowe uri Métisse jyana na bariya bazungu bava i Butare utoroke ugende uzagere i Burayi mu gihugu cya so uzarokokereyo .
Uwo mubyeyi na we yagize amahirwe aza kurokoka .
Igitabo gitangira Blanche umukobwa we yarize i Burayi mu Bufaransa ararangiza , ashaka umugabo wa umu - métisse na we aza gushaka uko yataha mu Rwanda gusura nyina na musaza we Bosco .
Nyuma rero igitabo kivuga ukuntu muri uwo muryango habaye agahinda kenshi na ibintu byinshi bitabashije kuganirwaho kuko byagumye mu mitima yabo bikabatera intimba nyinshi .
Umubyeyi yagaragaje ko iki ari ikibazo kibaho ku miryango myinshi ivukamo aba - métisse ndetse yashakaga ko ibyo yashyize mu gitabo byaba imbarutso ya ibiganiro kugira ngo abana babakomokaho bazabashe kubaho neza no kumenya inkomoko yabo .
Uyu mwanditsi avuga ko mu myandikire ye akunda kwerekana imitekerereze itandukanye ku kintu runaka , cyangwa gufungura ibiganiro , kuko abantu bose batabona ibintu kimwe .
Umubyeyi ufite ubwenegihugu bwa u Rwanda na u Bufaransa , yarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ; yavukiye i Butare - Ngoma , ubu ni mu Karere ka Huye , mu 1979 .
Afite abana babiri akaba atuye mu Mujyi wa Bordeaux mu Bufaransa .
Musenyeri Alexis Kagame na Mgr Bigirumwami : Intwari zibagiranye ?
Babayeho mu bihe bimwe , byari bikomeye u Rwanda ruri mu maboko ya Ababiligi ariko baharanira ko amateka na umuco nyarwanda bitibagirana , nka imwe mu nkingi ikomeye yatumye igihugu kimara imyaka ibihumbi gishikamye .
Musenyeri Alexis Kagame yavutse tariki 15 Gicurasi 1912 i Kiyanza mu Buliza ( ubu ni mu Karere ka Rulindo , Umurenge wa Ntarabana ) , hari ku ngoma ya Umwami Yuhi V Musinga .
Yahawe ubupadiri mu 1941 .
Kagame ni umwe mu banyarwanda ba mbere bize kaminuza , ayiga mu mahanga mu bijyanye na filozofiya .
Mu mateka ya u Rwanda azwi nka umwe mu ba mbere bakozeho ubushakashatsi butandukanye , yandika ibitabo byatumye abiga amateka bamenya aho bahera birimo nka Inganji Kalinga , un abrégé de la ethno - histoire du Rwanda .
Yanditse ibindi bitabo byinshi na inyandiko yamenyekanye nka Indyoheshabirayi , Umuririmbyi wa Nyiribiremwa , Isoko ya Amajyambere , La Philosophie Bantu - Rwandaise de l " " " " être " " " " na ibindi .
Musenyeri Aloys Bigirumwami we yavutse kuwa 22 Ukuboza 1904 avukira i Gisaka i Zaza .
Mu 1952 yagizwe Musenyeri wa Nyundo , abimburira abandi birabura kwambikwa iryo kamba muri Afurika Mbiligi yari igizwe na u Rwanda , u Burundi na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo .
Mu 1954 , Musenyeri Bigirumwami yashinze akanyamakuru ka abana kitwa Hobe kamamaye cyane , kugira ngo bamenyere gusoma babone na inkuru basoma mu Kinyarwanda .
Yanditse inyandiko zibanda ku muco na imyemerere ya Kinyarwanda zirimo ; Imigani miremire ( 1972 ) , Imana ya abantu , abantu ba Imana , Imana mu bantu , abantu mu Mana ( 1979 ) ndetse na Imihango , Imiziro na imiziririzo mu Rwanda ( 1984 ) byose bigaruka ku muco nyarwanda .
Nubwo ibikorwa bya aba bagabo bitavugwa cyane , ni bimwe mu byabimburiye ubundi bushakashatsi bacukumbuye amateka na umuco nyarwanda .
Ikirenzeho bagiye babikora nta zindi nyungu barambirijeho .
Buruga Aloys Gonzague , murumuna wa Musenyeri Alexis Kagame mu muryango , aherutse kubwira IGIHE ko mukuru we akwiriye guhabwa agaciro kuko ibyo yakoze ari ibya ubutwari .
Yagize ati " " " " Hari ubwo intwari ziba izo ku rugamba , izaguye igihugu zikagitsindira abanzi ariko hakwiriye kubaho na abo twakwita abakurambere bafite ibindi bakoze bifitiye igihugu akamaro . " " " "
" " " " Tumwise intwari , si ikigwari kuko yarwanye urugamba rwa uko umuco wa u Rwanda utazima , aharanira ko amateka ya u Rwanda atazimira ayashyira mu nyandiko .
Navuga ngo yakwibukwa nka intwari . " " " "
Muri abo bombi , Musenyeri Kagame niwe wahawe impeta ya ishimwe , kuwa 5 Nyakanga mu 1979 ubwo yagirwaga " " " " Officier de la ordre national des Grands lacs . " " " "
Kuwa 3 Nzeri 2014 , yahawe igihembo na Inteko Nyarwanda ya Ururimi na Umuco cyiswe " " " " Igihembo cya Akademi , " " " " cyashyizweho hagamijwe gushima abantu bakora ibikorwa bya indashyikirwa mu kubungabunga ubusugire na iterambere bya ururimi na umuco bya u Rwanda .
Icyakora hari ababona abo bagabo nka abitanze batizigama ngo umuco nyarwanda na amateka yarwo adasibangana , ku buryo bakwiriye ubutwari cyangwa impeta za ishimwe bihanitse kandi ibikorwa byabo bikagaragara henshi .
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa urwego rushinzwe Intwari za Igihugu , Impeta na Imidari bya ishimwe , Nkusi Déo , yabwiye IGIHE ko Musenyeri Bigirumwami na Musenyeri Kagame batibagiranye nkuko bamwe babikeka , kuko gushyirwa mu ntwari cyangwa guhabwa umudari runaka , hakorwa ubushakashatsi bwimbitse .
Ubusanzwe kugira ngo umuntu akorweho ubushakashatsi bushobora kumushyira mu ntwari , hagomba kuba hari ababimusabiye cyangwa se urwego rubishinzwe rukibwiriza .
Nkusi yagize ati " " " " Abo bantu babiri rero ni abantu bazwi cyane mu mateka kandi birumvikana banakoze na ibintu byinshi ku byerekeye amateka na umuco , bafite inyandiko zinadusfsha nka abanyarwanda ku bintu byinshi cyane , byumvikane rero ko abo bantu batibagiranye . " " " "
Nkusi yavuze ko kuba ibitabo na inyandiko za Musenyeri Kagame na Bigirumwami bikoreshwa mu mashuri atandukanye no mu zindi nzego , nabwo ari ubundi buryo bwo kubaha agaciro .
Ntabwo yeruye ngo avuge niba haba hari ubushakashatsi buri kubakorwaho , kuko bitemewe kubitangaza ubushakashatsi butararangira , icyakora yumvikanishije ko hari ikiri gukorwa .
Ati " " " " Twakiriye amazina menshi cyane ya abantu batandukanye , birumvikana ko abantu bazwi cyane ntibabura na ababavuga ariko inshingano zo kuvuga uwakozweho ubushakashatsi ntabwo ari izacu , hari inzego zibishinzwe igihe nikigera zizababwira ubushakashatsi icyo bwatanze . " " " "
Nkusi yavuze ko gukora ubushakashatsi ku muntu kugira ngo abe yagirwa intwari cyangwa yahabwa umudari bifata igihe kandi bigasaba ubushishozi buhambaye .
Ati " " " " Si nko kwatsa itara ngo pa ! riratse cyangwa rirazimye , ni ibintu bifata igihe , byitonderwa bigaca mu nzgeo zitandukanye akaba yashyirwa mu rwego runaka rwa intwari cyangwa yahabwa impeta ya ishimwe bitewe na ibikorwa bye . " " " "
Kugeza ubu hari amazina asaga 200 ya abanyarwanda basabiwe gukorwaho ubushakashatsi kugira ngo bashyirwe mu ntwari , abandi babe bambikwa impeta za ishimwe .
Kuwa 2 Ukuboza 1981 nibwo Musenyeri Alexis Kagame yitabye Imana aguye mu bitaro bya i Nairobi muri Kenya aho yari yagiye kwivuza .
Aloys Bigirumwami we yatabarutse afite imyaka 81 ku wa 03 Kamena 1986 mu bitaro bya Ruhengeri azize indwara ya umutima .
Ikiganiro na Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa CHENO , Nkusi Déo .
Menya byinshi ku bakurambere biziritse ku Rwanda bakanga kururekura .
Birashoboka ko u Rwanda rwari kuba rungana nka Seychelles , agahugu gato kaba muri Afurika , ariko kubera abami barurwaniriye bakagenda barwagura , bakarwizirakaho bamwe bagahara na ubuzima bwabo , rwabaye u Rwanda rugari , nubwo abakoloni batarurebeye izuba bakarugabagabanya mu nama yabereye i Berilini .
Mu kiganiro RBA yagiranye na abanyamateka batandukanye barimo Kalisa Rugano impuguke mu muco na amateka ; Umuraza Landrada , komiseri mu itorero rya igihugu ndetse na umwanditsi wa amateka , Nizeyimana Innocent , bagarutse cyane ku butwari bukomeye bwaranze abanyarwanda kuva kera , harimo na abami ba u Rwanda Ruganzu Bwimba ndetse na Ruganzu II Ndoli .
Ruganzu Bwimba niwe mwami wenyine wa u Rwanda wameneye igihugu amaraso
Mu bami barurwaniriye bakarwizirakaho , harimo Ruganzu Bwimba wategetse u Rwanda mu wa 1312 - 1345 , akarumenera amaraso , akemera kuba umutabazi wa umucengeri ari umwami , kugira ngo u Rwanda rwigarurire i Gisaka .
Umutabazi wa umucengeri ni umuntu wiyemezaga kuba igitambo akemera kumena amaraso mu gihugu cya amahanga agamije kurinda u Rwanda no kurwagura .
Kalisa Rugano yavuze ko ibi byabaye ubwo i Gisaka cyashakaga kwigarurira u Rwanda bikabananira , niko kwiga umutwe wo gushaka mushiki wa Bwimba , Robwa Nyiramateke , kugira ngo azahabyarire umwana wa umuhungu maze agire u Rwanda ingaruzwamuheto , kuko yari kuba ari umunyarwanda akaba na umunyagisaka .
Kugira ngo baramire u Rwanda byasabye ko Robwa apfa umwana ntavuke , ariko mu muco wa kera byari ngombwa ko hagira na undi bapfana maze bikitwa ko batabaye u Rwanda .
Bararaguje ngo barebe uwo indagu zifata , maze zemeza ko ari Nkurukumbe nyirarume wa Ruganzu Bwimba ugomba kuba umutabazi wa umucengeri .
Abyumvise ahimba amayeri atuma atajya gupfira u Rwanda , nuko birakaza umwami Ruganzu maze ubwe yiyemeza kwitabarira bucengeli .
Aba abaye umwami wa mbere na uwa nyuma mu mateka ya u Rwanda umeneye igihugu amaraso .
Ruganzu II Ndoli yategetse u Rwanda nyuma ya imyaka 11 rwarigaruriwe na abanyamahanga
Undi mwami wamenyekanye cyane , wagaragaje ubutwari bukomeye ni Ruganzu Ndoli , wategetse u Rwanda akiri muto ku myaka 33 , akarukura mu maboko ya abanyabungo nyuma ya imyaka 11 bararwigaruriye .
Nizeyimana Innocent agaruka ku butwari bwe , yavuze ko hambere havutse amakimbirane hagati ya se Ndahiro II Cyamatare na abavandimwe be aribo Byinshi na Bamara maze bagambanira u Rwanda , bituma rwigarurirwa na abanyabungo .
Akomeza avuga ukuntu barugabagabanye , bakarutobanga aho bamaze imyaka 11 bari mu Rwanda .
Abahanuzi ba umwami babonye ko ibintu biri gufata indi ntera ni ko guterana babwira umwami ko yashaka ukuntu yohereza Ruganzu Ndoli kwa nyirasenge Nyabunyana wari warashatswe na umwami wa i Karagwe ( Tanzania ya ubu ) .
Yagiye kwa nyirasenge mu buryo bwo kumuhungisha kugira ngo atazapfa , arindwe neza , yigishwe ategurwe kuzaba umwami , azaze aje gutabara u Rwanda .
Ni ko byagenze koko , arategurwa agaruka mu Rwanda .
Yagiye mu Rwanda se na nyina na nyirakuru barishwe , aza afite agahinda ariko ntiyihorera , aza aje gutabara abanyarwanda .
Ntabwo yagiye arwituramo kuko nta bantu bari bamuzi uretse abiru na abatware ba i Bwami , yagiye arurwanirira yica mwene se Byinshi wari waragambaniye u Rwanda , aramunyaga igihugu agisigaramo wenyine ari umwami wa u Rwanda .
Ruganzu Ndoli yamenyekanye ku bintu byinshi , birimo ko yari azi ubwenge bwinshi cyane , yiswe Cyambarantama ndetse na ingabo ze zitwaga ibisumizi .
Hari na abandi bami benshi bagaragaje ubutwari barimo na Mutara III Rudahigwa , bimanye u Rwanda bakanarurwanira ishyaka .
Nsanzabera yashyize hanze igitabo gikubiyemo ikinamico yise " " " " Ingizi yabwo ntiyabugaruriwe . " " " "
Kamere ya iki gitabo cya amapaji 56 , ni iya Ikinamico zishobora gukinwa mu ruhame cyangwa se kuri Radiyo .
Ikaba ari Ikinamico yimakaza umuco wo kubabarira no gusaba imbabazi , ubumwe na ubwiyunge , no kurwanya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi na ingengabitekerezo yayo .
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE , Nsanzabera yagize ati " " " " Na ubwo umutima muhanano utuzura igituza , ariko ntujya uganza umutima wa imbabazi na ubugiraneza burenga akahise bukubakira ku ntego yo kwimakaza amahoro na imico mbonera ya ubumuntu " " " "
Si kenshi uwabereye undi imfura , akabugirira na abandi , abwiturwa na abo yabugiriye .
Nibyo byabaye ku musaza Rusaneza na umugore we Nyirayuhi , batengushywe na abaturanyi babo Rukarabankaba na umugore we Nyirabyavu , babakoreye ibya mfura mbi kandi baranabagabiye Inka , bakababera abaturanyi beza .
Umukecuru Nyirayuhi , ni urugero rwiza rwo kurenga imitekerereze yo kubakira ku nzika , yimakaje kubabarira abamwiciye abana na umugabo , arahindukira abahindura abana be , ndetse yiyemeza no kubaha umurage mu kigwi cya abe batakiriho .
Nsanzabera yavuze ko urwo ari urugero rwiza buri wese akwiye kugira urwe , agaharanira kwimakaza umuco wo kubabarira .
Yavuze ko yifuza ko uzasoma iyi Kinamico cyangwa se uzayibona bayikina , izamubera urugero rwiza rwa ubutwari bwo kubabarira ku biciwe no gusaba imbabazi ku bishe imbaga ya Abatutsi muri Jenoside .
Ibitabo byanditswemo iyi Kinamico " " " " Ingizi yabwo ntiyabugaruriwe , " " " " byamaze kugera ku isoko , aho biboneka mu maguriro ya ibitabo nka Caritas no mu Ikirezi i Kigali .
Urwibutso ku miterere ya ibirango bya u Rwanda mu mateka ya impitagihe .
Kuva mu bihe bya Abami kugeza mu bya Repubulika , u Rwanda rwanyuze mu bihe bitandukanye bijyanye na inkingi zikomeye igihugu cyubakiraho , bigatuma gihamya igitinyiro mu ruhando rwa ibindi .
Mu ihanga rya ibihugu kuva u Rwanda rwaturwa ahasaga mu mwaka wa 300 , haremwe ibihugu bigera kuri 29 bya mbere ya uko urwa Gasabo rubaho .
Buri gihugu cyagize ikirango cyariho muri ibyo bihe cyitwaga " " " " Ingoma Ngabe " " " " wagereranya na ibendera rya igihugu .
Ikirangantego ni cyo cyari izina ryayo , ryabaga rikagiriyemo ibigwi bya ba nyiracyo na intego bafite mu iyubaka bihugu byabo .
Muri ibyo bihe ni bwo ibihugu byose byahuriye ku kuramvura ingoma mu biti , bakayiha ishusho bashaka , bakayita izina rikagiriyemo intego zabo na icyerekezo baganamo .
Aha ni ho dusanga nka Ingoma Ngabe ya u Bugesera yitwaga Rukombamazi , iy " " " " u Bushiru ikitwa Nkundubushiru , iya u Bungwe ikitwa Nyamibande , iya u Rweya ikitwa Sera ,
iya u Budaha na u Bwishaza ikitwa Mpatsibihugu , iya i Gisaka ikitwa Rukurura , iya u Buliza ikitwa Bushizimbeho , iya u Bwanacyambwe ikitwa Kamuhagama , iya Nduga ikitwa Nyabihinda , iya u Bunyabungo ikitwa Karyamahugu , iya u Bunyambilili ikitwa Nkunzurwanda , iya u Bukunzi ikitwa Nyamuganza , iya u Bugoyi ikitwa Nyamwishyura , iya u Burera ikitwa Bazarubaze , iya Rwankeri ya Abalindi ikitwa Kabuce , iya Rwankeri ya Abaguyane ikitwa
Ndahaze , iya u Bukonya ikitwa Ruvugamahame , iya u Buhoma ikitwa Nkandagiyabagome , iya u Bwanamwali ikitwa Rugoruhindingoma , iya Bugamba - Kigamba ikitwa Kayenzi - Iravumera , iya Cyingogo ikitwa Simugomwa , iya i Ndorwa ikitwa Murorwa , iya u Bugara ikitwa Rugara .
Ibi bihugu byose byabaga bifite ibyangombwa byuzuye ngo bibe biganje , bifite ubusugire bwabyo na ubutavogerwa ku Isi , harimo na ingoma ngabe nka ibendera rya igihugu na ikirangantego cya ba nyiracyo .
Ni cyo cyatumye byitwa ibihugu na ubwo wasangaga bifite ubutaka buto bungana na akarere ka iki gihe cyangwa se ugasanga hari na aho kamwe karimo ibihugu bibiri .
Muri iyi nkuru tugiye guterura amateka ya ibirango bya u Rwanda mu mateka yanzikira ku ihangwa rya igihugu kugeza mu bihe bya Repubulika .
Ibirango bya Gihanga ahanga u Rwanda
Amateka yerekana ko u Rwanda rwahanzwe na Gihanga cya Kazi ahasaga mu wa 1091 .
Ahanga u Rwanda , yasanze rugandagajemo ibihugu 24 , icye cya Gasabo cyaje kubyara u Rwanda kiba icya 25 , hiyongeraho na ibindi bine byahanzwe na abana be mu bisigara bya ubutaka bwasigaye bahanga ibindi bihugu .
Mu ihangwa rya u Rwanda , Gihanga na we yaje muri uwo mujyo wo kugira ibirango bya igihugu ariko bitandukanye na iby abami ba ibindi bihugu byamutanze kurema kuri ubu butaka .
Ibirango Gihanga yahanganye u Rwanda birimo urusengo , inyundo na umuriro kandi byose byari bifite igisobanuro muri icyo gihe .
Urusengo : Ni igikoresho cya umuziki cyashushanyaga ubwisanzure , ubusugire na ibitaramo bya abaturage bafite amahoro , cyiswe " " " " Nyamilinga . " " " "
Iri zina rikomoka ku nshinga yitwa " " " " Kulinga " " " " " " " " isobanura " " " " Icyizere ntagamburuzwa cya ahazaza ha igihugu kiramye . " " " "
Inyundo : Gihanga yahanganye u Rwanda inyundo isanzwe bifashisha mu bucuzi .
Yayihaye izina rya " " " " Nyarushara , " " " " bivuga " " " " Inyundo yacuze Abami , igahanga igihugu . " " " "
Umuriro : Umuriro uvugwa hano wagombaga guhora waka ubutazima .
Washushanyaga " " " " Uburame bwa ubwami , ubumwe bwa Abanyarwanda na ubusugire bwa igihugu . " " " "
Ibirango bya ibihugu byiyunze bikaba kimwe
Ahasaga mu 1100 , ni bwo Gihanga yahaye igitekerezo Abami ba Abasangwabutaka cyo guhuza ibihugu bito bafite kandi bitubakitse , bakarema igihugu kimwe kigwije igitinyiro .
Aya masezerano yasinyiwe i Nkotsi na Bikara mu Buhanga [ Ubu ni mu Murenge wa Nkotsi mu Karere ka Musanze ] .
Nyuma yo kwemeranya ayo masezerano ya ihuzabihugu , bahise barema ikirango cya igihugu gishya cya ibihugu byiyunze .
Icyo kirango cyabaye Ingoma Ngabe Rwoga yaramvuwe na Nyamuhindura wa Rubunga wa Umusinga wa Umurenge , bakura igisekuruza cyabo ku Basinga ba Abasangwabutaka .
Ingoma - Ngabe " " " " RWOGA " " " " isobanura " " " " Kogera cyangwa Kwamamara . " " " "
Kuva Rwoga yaremwa , u Rwanda rwahise ruyigira iyarwo , kubera ko arirwo rwahawe ubunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa bushyira mu bikorwa umushinga wa ukwiyunga kwa ibihugu , na ubwo bwose byari bitariyunga ngo bibe kimwe .
Kuva ubwo ibirango Gihanga yahanganye u Rwanda , byasimbuwe na Rwoga ariko bikomeza kuba mu mihango ya iyimikabami ba u Rwanda no mu yindi ya ubucamanza , iyo gutangiza intambara , kohera ibiza na ibyorezo byabaga byibasiye igihugu .
Ibirango bya u Rwanda byaremwe na Ruganzu Ndoli
Nyuma ya aho bicikiye i Rubi rwa i Nyundo , bene Gahima barwaniye ingoma Ndahiro Cyamatare akahagwa , ingoma ngabe Rwoga ikanyagwa na Abanyabungo u Rwanda rukamara imyaka 11 ruraranze , Ruganzu Ndoli amaze kubundura u Rwanda , yahise arema indi ngoma ngabe isimbura Rwoga yari yaranyazwe na Abanyabungo .
Ingoma ngabe Ruganzu Ndoli yaremye , ni yo yiswe Kalinga mu mateka ya ibirango bya u Rwanda .
Kalinga yaramvuwe mu Ishyamba rya Cyungo ho muri Cyungo ( ubu ni mu Murenge wa Cyungo mu Karere ka Rulindo ) , iramvurwa na Minyaruko ya Nyamikenke ahasaga mu wa 1510 .
Imihango ya iramvura rya Kalinga yateguriwe kwa Minyaruko ya Nyamikenke mu Busigi ( ubu ni mu Mirenge ya Bushoki , Tumba na Mbogo yo mu Karere ka Rulindo ) , ha handi yarasukiye bwa mbere , mu ijoro yabundukiyemo ubwo yageraga i Rwanda .
Igisobanuro cya Ingoma Ngabe Kalinga , ari na cyo kirangantego za ba nyiri u Rwanda , usanga na ubundi gisa na icya Nyamilinga yahangiweho u Rwanda .
Igisobanuro cya Kalinga na ubundi gikomoka ku nshinga Kulinga , Kalinga yo bikavuga " " " " Inkingi ya icyizere cya ahazaza . " " " "
Ibirango bya ingoma ya cyami bya agateganyo ku bwa Rudahigwa
Mu bihe abakoloni ba Ababiligi bari mu Rwanda , batangiye kugerageza ikirangantego cya ingoma ya cyami mu buryo bwa kizungu butandukanye na ingoma ngabe Kalinga yariho muri ibyo bihe .
Icyo gitekerezo bakizanye ku ngoma ya Umwami Mutara Rudahigwa mu 1935 , nyuma ya uko bamaze kureba Ibuku ari yo ndangamuntu ya mbere ya Abanyarwanda irimo ubwoko bwa Abahutu , Abatwa na Abatutsi .
Muri icyo kirangantego kirimo interuro igira iti " " " " Imbaga ya inyabutatu ijya mbere . " " " "
Gusa ntaho amateka adutekerereza ko kigeze cyemerwa ngo gikoreshwe mu miyoborere ya Abanyarwanda .
Ibirango bya u Rwanda mu bihe bya Repubulika ya Mbere na iya Kabiri
Aho ingoma ya cyami ibererekeye Repubulika , ibirango bya igihugu na byo byarahinduwe , babyambura umuco byahanzwemo .
Repubulika yakuyeho ingoma ngabe irema ibendera rya igitambaro cyakorewe mu ruganda gifite amabara afite ibisobanuro bya intego zashyizweho , hakiyongeraho na igishushanyo cya ubugeni kirimo ibimenyetso biranga icyo bimirije imbere .
Imiterere na imihangire ya ibirango bya igihugu mu bihe bya Repubulika , bayifatiye ku birango bya Abanyaburayi bakolonizaga Afurika muri ibyo bihe , bakuraho umuco wa Kinyafurika wa ibirango bifatiye ku ngoma ngabe .
Muri ibyo birango hiyongereyeho na Indirimbo yubahiriza Igihugu .
Ibendera rya u Rwanda rya mbere ryamuritswe ku wa 1 Nyakanga 1962 , ubwo u Rwanda rwabonaga ubwigenge , Kayibanda Grégoire , akarubera Perezida wa Kabiri warutegetse mu 1962 - 1973 .
Amabara yari agize ibendera rya Repubulika ya Mbere , yari " " " " Umutuku , umuhondo na icyatsi . " " " "
Indirimbo yubahiriza Igihugu yari " " " " Rwanda rwacu . " " " "
Ikirangantego cyari kigizwe na ibimenyetso bitandukanye ariko kivuga " " " " Ubumwe , Amahoro na Amajyambere . " " " "
Ibyo birango bya u Rwanda rwa Repubulika , ni byo rwagendeyeho mu bihe bya Repubulika ya Mbere na iya Kabiri kugeza ku wa 31 Ukuboza 2001 .
Iki cyemezo cyafatiwe mu nama zidasanzwe zo kwigira hamwe uko igihugu kizabaho mu myaka iri imbere zabaye mu 1998 - 1999 .
Ibirango bya u Rwanda mu bihe kuzuka ka u Rwanda
Nyuma ya uko habayeho amahano rurangiza ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi igahitana abasaga miliyoni , ikaza guhagarikwa na Ingabo za FPR - Inkotanyi zari zirangajwe imbere na Kagame Paul , Leta ya ubumwe bwa Abanyarwanda , yashinzwe ku wa 19 Nyakanga 1994 , yatangiye kwiga uburyo ibirango bya igihugu byahindurwa .
Byakozwe hagamijwe gushyiraho ibijyanye na ibyo igihugu cyifuza kugeza ku benegihugu mu Rwanda rushya .
Ibirango bya Repubulika ya Mbere na iya Kabiri , byari byiganjemo amacakubiri , irondakoko na irondakarere .
Aha ntiwakwirengagiza na ubwishongoro bwinshi Abaparimehutu babigaragajemo ubwo birukanaga benshi mu baturarwanda bakajya kuba impunzi mu mahanga , na abasigaye mu gihugu bakaba impetamugongo na impunzi mu gihugu cyabo .
Nuko ku wa , 31 Ukuboza 2001 , ni bwo hasohotse ibirango bishya bya u Rwanda , birimo ibendera rya igihugu rigizwe na amabara atatu , ari yo " " " " Ubururu - juru , umuhondo wa izahabu na icyatsi kibisi . " " " "
Ni na bwo kandi habonetse na indirimbo nshya yubahiriza igihugu yiswe " " " " Rwanda Nziza . " " " "
Ikirangantego cyo kiganjemo ibimenyetso bitandukanye , bifite igisobanuro cy " " " " " " " " Ubumwe , Umurimo no gukunda igihugu , " " " " nka intego ya Abanyarwanda bagiye kurandura icyo bapfa , bakabagarira icyo bapfana .
Ikirangantego gishya na ibendera rya igihugu , biranga u Rwanda muri ibi bihe byahanzwe na umunyabugeni Alphonse Kirimobenecyo , aho yatsinze bagenzi be basaga 400 bari bahanganye .
Indirimbo yubahiriza igihugu yo yahanzwe na abagororwa batatu bari bafungiye muri Gereza ya Karubanda barangajwe imbere na Munyaneza Vedaste , barimo Kalisa Evariste , Shenge Laurent na Mbonyizina Jean Marie Vianney .
Umurage wa u Rwanda mu birango ba igihugu
Ukurikiye amateka ya iremwa rya u Rwanda na iyubakwa rya rwo , usanga ari igihugu cyubakiye ku murage utajya uhinduka kugeza magingo aya ubwo aya mateka yandikwaga .
Uwo murage tunawusanga no mu birango bya igihugu uko byagiye bihererekanwa kuva kuri Gihanga , ugakomereza kuri Ruganzu Ndoli no kuri Perezida Kagame Paul , ariko twirengagije intego mbi zikubiye mu mitekerereze mibi yadukanywe mu birango bishya bya Repubulika ya Mbere na iya Kabiri .
Mu busesenguzi bwa Amateka buri mu gitabo " " " " Nkurangire u Rwanda , igihugu cya Benimana , " " " " umwanditsi agaragaza ko ibirango bya u Rwanda byagiye bikagirirwamo umurage udasaza ugikoreshwa mu mushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda , no mu kinyejana cya 21 .
U Rwanda rwagize ibirango bitandukanye , byinshi muri byo bikaba bikagiriyemo umurage ndagwabuvivi uzafasha bene rwo kurwubaka rugwije igitinyiro na icyubahiro mu mahanga aruzengurutse .
Igihamya gikomeye , ni iryo huzabitekerezo ryaremye ibirango bya u Rwanda byaba ibya abami na Perezida Kagame .
Nga ayo nga uko !
Nga ayo mateka ya impitabihe ku birango bya u Rwanda bimaze imyaka isaga 930 ( 1091 - 2021 ) .
Nihaganze umurage ukagiriye mu birango bya u Rwanda twarazwe na abakurambere batuboneye iryo mu museso .
Ibyadukanye umurage - mutindi , wa abadakunda u Rwanda na bene rwo , byo bigende nka ifuni iheze .
No muri Paradizo hashobora kumeramo imifatangwe - Ev Uwagaba avuga ku rushako rwe rutarambye .
Nubwo aba bombi bari bamaze amezi atandatu bahamije isezerano ryo kubana nka umugabo na umugore [ basezeranye ku wa 3 Werurwe 2018 ] , iminsi mike ni yo bamaranye kuko igihe kirekire Mucyo yakimaze mu bitaro .
Mucyo Sabine yitabye Imana ku wa 4 Ukwakira 2018 azize indwara yitwa Systemic Lupus Erythematosusituma ; inkuru yabaye incamugongo kuri Uwagaba , inshuti na umuryango we .
Uwagaba uvuka i Rwamagana yateye intambwe ya mbere yandika igitabo cya amapaji 170 yise " " " " A Hundred days in marriage " " " " kivuga ku bigwi na amateka ya umugore we .
Uyu mugabo wa imyaka 31 ya amavuko kuri ubu abarizwa muri Pologne aho yagiye kwiga amasomo ya Icyiciro cya Gatatu muri Kaminuza ya Varsovie mu bijyanye na Ubwikorezi na Ubucuruzi Mpuzamahanga .
Mu kiganiro cyihariye na IGIHE , Uwagaba yavuze ko igitabo cye " " " " " " " " A hundred days in Marriage " " " " " " " " bishatse kuvuga " " " " " " " " Iminsi 100 ya mbere ya urushako " " " " , " " " " yacyanditse ashaka gusohoza ibyo yemeranyije na umugore we .
Yagize ati " " " " " " " " Nashakaga kubahiriza isezerano nagiranye na umugore wanjye Mucyo Sabine mbere ya uko yitaba Imana .
Mu gihe yari arwaye hari ibyo namusezeranyije nzakora , impamvu ya kabiri ni uko namufashe nka umuntu wa icyitegererezo numva ko ubuzima bwe na amateka bye bitapfa kurangira gutya gusa kubera ko yitabye Imana .
Oya Sabine ntazibagirana kuko namushyize mu gitabo .
Nifuza ko umuntu wese uzabishaka azamenye amateka ye . " " " " " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko ikindi cyamuteye kwandika ari uko abahanga mu bijyanye na isanamitima bavuga ko ari umuti wavura agahinda cyangwa ihungabana runaka kuko " " " " bifasha kuvuga ibyo utabashaga kwatura ngo uvuge kubera amaranga mutima yawe . " " " "
Ati " " " " " " " " Nanditse rero ngo ibindimo mbikure ku mutima bisohoke bimvemo mbisangire na abandi . " " " " " " " "
Yasobanuye ko ibikubiye mu gitabo bitanga na igisubizo ku bibaza ku rupfu rwa umugore we .
Yakomeje ati " " " " " " " " Dukora ubukwe byari nka ibisanzwe nka uko abandi bose bakundanye babigenza twari tumaze igihe kinini tumenyanye , aha nashakaga no kwerekana ukuntu abantu bajya bivuga ko urugo ahanini ari Paradizo nibyo koko ariko ntibihira bose kuko muri iyo Paradizo hari igihe hashobora kumeramo amahwa
ya ibitovu cyangwa imifatangwe ku buryo utungurwa . " " " " " " " "
Uwagaba yavuze ko igitabo cye gifite amasomo bya umwihariko mu kubaka ingo .
Ati " " " " " " " " Urugo si ugutura muri paradizo ni nayo mpamvu , nibanze ku minsi mike twabanyemo na Mucyo kuko benshi bakeka ko ari iminsi ya buki yo kwishimisha mu buzima ariko byabaye ibindi kandi tuguma ku isezerano twagiranye . " " " " " " " "
" " " " " " " " Nyuma ya ubukwe twagiye mu kwezi kwa buki nka abandi bose , tujya mu gihugu duturanye , tujya ku Gisenyi turatembera , turataha tugeze mu rugo umugore atangira kugaragaza ibimenyetso bya uburwayi .
Twagiye kwa muganga batubwira ko ari ibintu bitagoye baduha imiti isanzwe , bavuga ko ari umunaniro . " " " " " " " "
Nyuma ya icyumweru , Mucyo yasubiye mu kazi ariko hashize igihe gito atangira kubyimba ibirenge , ibyo bamwe bitiranyije no gusama , ariko " " " " uko iminsi ishira akarushaho kuremba . " " " "
Uwagaba yahungabanyijwe na urupfu rwa umugore we
Ku wa 28 Nzeri 2018 , Mucyo yajyanywe mu Bitaro bya CHUK ndetse abaganga baza kumenya indwara arwaye .
Uwagaba avuga ko icyo gihe yatangiye gushaka uko yajya kumuvuriza mu bihugu bifite ibikoresho bihambaye kuko mu Rwanda byari byananiranye ariko [ Mucyo ] ajya muri koma yamazemo ibyumweru bitatu , ahita yitaba Imana .
Ati " " " " " " " " Uburwayi bwe bwari bugoye ku buryo byampungabanyije cyane .
Sabine yari umukobwa ukora siporo , ubona ko afite ameze neza ariko nyine ubuzima burahinduka . " " " " " " " "
Mu gitabo cye , Uwagaba akomeza gushimangira isezerano yagiranye na umugore we .
Ati " " " " " " " " Urukundo nyarwo , kurinda isezerano , kwitanga , ni byo nahaye umutwe wa kabiri wa izina rya igitabo .
Kugira urugo rwiza cyangwa urushako rwiza bisaba kwitanga , kwitonda , kugira ibyo wigomwa kugira ngo uwo mugiye kubana abe we wuzuye . " " " " " " " "
Mu gihe umugore we yari arwaye , Uwagaba yagombaga kumwitaho ariko agakomeza gushaka imibereho ngo abone ikibatunga .
Ati " " " " " " " " Umugore wanjye arwaye twarakubititse cyane kuko nagombaga no gukora ngo tubeho , na we nkamugeraho kenshi bishoboka .
Haje kugera igihe yumva yorohewe yakize , twaraganiriye arambwira ati " " " " ariko uzi ko ubuzima twaciyemo bugoye kandi bubabaje ? " " " "
Icyo gihe yacurangaga gitari , arambwira ngo " " " " uwazahimba indirimbo cyangwa nkakora umuvugo ariko nkagira ikintu nkora nka inkuru ivuga iminsi twabanyemo muri aya mezi . " " " " " " " "
Icyo kiganiro ni cyo cyanogerejwemo igitekerezo cyo kwandika igitabo " " " " " " " " A hundred days in Marriage " " " " " " " " kigaruka ku minsi ya mbere yabo mu rushako .
Uwagaba ati " " " " " " " " Abari aho bamubwiye bati " " " " byaba birebire kereka mubishyize mu gitabo .
Sabine ati " " " " nimumbwire rero tuzakita dute ? " " " "
Avuga ko ubwo tumaze amezi atatu mu bibazo reka tuzacyite " " " " Mu minsi 100 twubatse urugo . " " " "
Ni we wihitiyemo , nibyo nise isezerano .
Ubwo twaje gusezererwa turataha nyuma aza kwitaba Imana . " " " " " " " "
Urupfu rwa umugore we rwaramuhungabanyije kugeza aho yagiye gushaka umuganga wa indwara zo mu mutwe amugira inama yo kuruhuka bitewe na ihungabana yari afite .
Ati " " " " " " " " Uwo muganga yangiriye inama yo kwandika kuko njye rwose sinigeze ntekereza ko nzandika igitabo . " " " " " " " "
Akimara kumurika " " " " A Hundred days in marriage , " " " " Kaminuza yigamo i Varsovie muri Pologne yamugeneye igihembo cya umunyeshuri wakoze ikintu gikomeye .
Igitabo cya Uwagaba kiri mu Cyongereza , anateganya kugishyira mu Gifaransa no mu Kinyarwanda .
Kiboneka ku maguriro ya murandasi azwi ku Isi yose nka , , Barnes , Noble , Google , iBooks , Scribd , Booktopia na ayandi .
Reba ikiganiro na Uwagaba Joseph asobanura Igitabo cye " " " " A Hundred days in marriage " " " "
Imigogo ibiri ya abami ba u Rwanda iri gukorwaho ubushakashatsi .
Ntabwo muri iyo ngoro ariho abo bami batabarijwe ahubwo imigogo yabo ihari ngo ikorweho ubushakashatsi buzafasha abahanga kumenya byimbitse amateka ya u Rwanda .
Uruhererekane nyemvugo rugaragaza ko Cyilima II Rujugira yatanze nyuma yo
gutegeka u Rwanda kuva mu 1675 kugeza mu 1708 .
Mu migenzo ya cyami , abami bitwa ba Cyilima bagombaga gutabarizwa ( gushyingurwa ) na abami bitwa ba Mutara .
Cyilima amaze gutanga , umugogo we wasizwe imiti ituma udashanguka , ubikwa mu rugo rwe rwari ruherereye i Kayumbu muri Kamonyi .
Umwami witwa Mutara wagombaga gutabariza Cyilima ni Rwogera wategetse u Rwanda hagati ya 1830 na 1853 .
Ntabwo byakozwe kuko Rwogera yatanze atunguranye .
Byabaye ngombwa ko bategereza undi mwami uzima ingoma yitwa Mutara , umugogo wa Cyilima ukomeza kubikwa .
Umwami wagombaga gutabariza Cyilima Rujugira ni Mutara III Rudahigwa mu 1931 , icyakora yimye mu bihe bibi u Rwanda rwari rwarinjiriwe na abakoloni ndetse ni nabo bamwimitse bitandukanye na imigenzo ya ubwiru .
Igitabo " " " " Ibitaramo ku mateka ya u Rwanda " " " " cya Zephrin Kagiraneza kivuga ko abiru aribo bafashe umwanzuro wo gutabariza Cyilima Rujugira , bikorwa rwihishwa mu 1931 i Gaseke ( Rutobwe : Ubu ni mu murenge wa Kayumbu mu karere ka Kamonyi ) .
Umwami Kigeli IV Rwabugiri we yiciwe mu Bunyabungo ( muri Congo ) mu gitero yari yahagabye , umugogo we uzanwa mu Rwanda atabarizwa i Rutare mu karere ka Gicumbi , ahari imisezero ya abami .
Imigogo yabo iri gukorwaho ubushakashatsi
Igitabo cya Kagiraneza kivuga ko umugogo wa Cyilima Rujugira wataburuwe mu mwaka wa 1969 kugira ngo ukorerweho ubushakashatsi .
Muri icyo gihe ni nabwo hataburuwe uwa Nyirayuhi Kanjogera , nyina wa umwami Yuhi V Musinga .
Kanjogera yapfuye mu 1933 .
Mu musezero ( imva ) wa Cyilima , hakuwemo ibindi bikoresho byo mu gihe cye birimo nka amacumu , amasaro , imitako , utubindi na ibindi .
Ubushakashatsi bwakorewe kuri ibyo bikoresho byasanzwe mu mva ye , bwagaragaje ko mu gihe yari akiri umwami amasaro na indi mitako byakorerwaga i Burayi cyangwa mu Buhinde , byageraga mu Rwanda binyuze mu nyanja ya Abahinde .
Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu yavuze ko nta gitangaza kirimo kuba mu mva ya Cyilima Rujugira barasanzemo amasaro , kuko imyenda na imitako nka amasaro byaje mu Rwanda ku ngoma ya Yuhi III Mazimpaka ( 1642 - 1675 ) , ari we se wa Rujugira .
Umushakashatsi mu Kigo cya Igihugu cya Ingoro za Umurage wa u Rwanda , Maurice Mugabowagahunde , yavuze ko na umugogo wa Kigeli IV Rwabugiri uri mu ngoro ya umurage i Huye , aho uri gukorerwaho ubushakashatsi .
Kugeza ubu abemererwa kugera aho iyo migogo ibitse , ni abashakashatsi babiherewe uburenganzira gusa , abasura ingoro ndangamurage ntabwo babyemerewe .
Ati " " " " Keretse uri umushakashatsi naho umushyitsi ntiwawubona .
Icyo wabona ni ibindi bikoresho byari biri kumwe na we , ariko turacyari mu bushakashatsi ariko duteganya ko ubushakashatsi niburangira uzongera ugatabarizwa . " " " "
Mugabowagahunde yavuze ko umugogo wa Cyilima ukimara gutabururwa , wajyanywe mu Bubiligi muri laboratwari zifite ubushobozi bwo gupima ibya kera , zigaragaza ko yabayeho imyaka igera ku ijana mbere ya iyo uruhererekane nyemvugo nyarwanda ruvuga ko yatangiyeho .
Yagize ati " " " " Amagufa ye yagiye mu Bubiligi muri laboratwari bigaragaza ko na igihe Mgr Alexis Kagame yagerageje gukora agaragaza igihe yapfiriye , laboratwari yo igaragaza ko ari vuba cyane .
Yabayeho mu myaka ijana mbere ya iyo Kagame yandikaga .
Ibyo bituma umenya neza igihe kurusha kugenekereza . " " " "
Biramutse byemejwe neza , byaba bivuze ko umwami Cyilima Rujugira yabayeho mu myaka yo hagati ya 1500 na 1600 .
Ibikoresho byasanzwe mu musezero ( imva ) wa Cyilima Rujugiro nabyo byakoreweho ubushakashatsi .
Mugabowagahunde yavuze ko utubindi twasanzwemo , twapimwe bakagaragaza ko twari turimo inzoga zikoze mu buro .
Ibyo ashimangira ko bifite igisobanuro mu myemerere ya Abanyarwanda bo hambere .
Ati " " " " Ibyo bigaragaraza imyemerere ya Abanyarwanda ko umwami adapfa , ko akomeza ubuzima akanywa . " " " "
Mu mateka kandi bivugwa ko guhera ku bwa Yuhi III Mazimpaka , abami batari bemerewe kunywa urwagwa .
Banywaga inzoga zikoze mu binyampeke .
Kuba barasanze mu tubindi twa Cyilima inzoga zikoze mu buro , Mugabowagahunde avuga ko bihuza na ibyo amateka avuga .
Ubushakashatsi buracyakomeje , gusa Mugabowagahunde yavuze ko hakiri imbogamizi yo kubona abahanga bahagije bo gufasha muri ubwo bushakashatsi na ibikoresho .
Ati " " " " Ikibazo gihari turabura inzobere mu bushakashatsi ku bisigaramatongo ( archeologists ) .
Mu Rwanda dufite bake kandi nta laboratwari ikomeye ariko turi gusinyana na Inzu ndangamurage yo mu Bubiligi Tervuren kugira ngo ubushakashatsi bwihute . " " " "
Gahunda ihari ni uko imigogo ya abo bami nimara gukorerwaho ubushakashatsi , izongera gutabarizwa .
Inkomoko ya " " " " Amateka Series , " " " " gahunda igamije kwigisha umuco urubyiruko ruba mu mahanga .
Inkomoko ya " " " " AMATEKA SERIES , " " " " gahunda igamije kwigisha umuco urubyiruko ruba mu mahanga
Ubu bukangurambaga bukubiyemo ibiganiro bizajya bitumirwamo impuguke zitandukanye mu bya umuco , inararibonye zizafasha mu kwigisha urubyiruko ibijyanye na amateka , abahanzi mu ngeri zitandukanye na abandi .
Linda Iriza uri mu bategura " " " " Amateka Series " " " " yabwiye IGIHE ko igitekerezo cyo gutangiza uyu mushinga bakigize muri Mutarama 2020 .
Ati " " " " Igitekerezo cyo gutangiza " " " " Amateka Series " " " " twakigize muri Mutarama 2020 , ubwo twateguraga ibikorwa bya urubyiruko ruba mu Mujyi wa Perth muri Australie .
Gutekereza iki gikorwa byatewe na uko benshi muri twe tutazi byinshi , ndetse hari na abatazi na bike , ku mateka na umuco bya u Rwanda . " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko hahise haduka icyorezo COVID - 19 biba ngombwa ko abantu batongera guterana .
Icyo gihe ubwo bari muri " " " " guma mu rugo " " " " ni bwo batangiye gutegura gahunda zose zijyanye na iki gikorwa ndetse muri Gicurasi 2020 batangira kujya baganira bifashishije ikoranabuhanga .
Muri Kanama 2020 , amabwiriza ajyanye no kuguma mu rugo yarorohejwe ndetse hategurwa Umuganura wahujwe na " " " " Amateka Series . " " " "
Icyo gihe hatumiwemo abantu bakuru batanze ibiganiro ku bijyanye na umuganura ndetse bababwira amateka yawo byimbitse .
Iriza avuga ko benshi mu rubyiruko baba muri Perth nibura bageze muri Australie bafite imyaka itatu ndetse abandi bakaba ari naho bavukiye bituma batagira amahirwe yo kumenya byinshi ku gihugu cyabo cya inkomoko .
Ku bwa iyo mpamvu bashaka kwiga byinshi ku muco Nyarwanda ndetse na amateka ya igihugu .
Yavuze ko ari ikintu cyakiriwe neza cyane , ati " " " " Twashimishijwe na ibitekerezo byiza twakiriye ndetse na ubufasha turimo kubona . " " " "
Iriza yakomeje ashimira Ambasade ya u Rwanda muri Singapore , Minisiteri ya Ububanyi na Amahanga na Ubutwererane na Minisiteri ya Urubyiruko na Umuco ya u Rwanda bababaye hafi kandi bakabashyigikira .
Avuga ko bafite intumbero ya uko iki gikorwa kizakomeza ndetse abagitegura bagashishikariza urubyiruko gukora ubushakashatsi , bakandika , bagasangiza abandi ibyo bagezeho kandi bakarushaho kwiga byinshi ku muco wabo .
Iriza yasoje asaba urubyiruko rwa abanyarwanda aho bari hose ku Isi kuzitabira igikorwa giteganyijwe ku italiki ya 06 Gashyantare aho bazaganirizwa ku nkomoko ya u Rwanda ndetse bakanataramirwa na umuhanzi Jules Sentore .
Ibi biganiro bizanyura ako kanya ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zose za Amateka Series ( Twitter , Facebook , Instagram na YouTube ) .
Umwaka ushize ibiganiro byakozwe byari byatumiwemo abantu batandukanye barimo Turahirwa Moses washinze inzu ya imideli Moshions ; Hope Azeda watangije Mashirika Performing Arts and Media Company ; Ambasaderi Uwihanganye Jean de Dieu uhagarariye u Rwanda muri Singapore na abandi .
Ushaka gukomeza kumenya amakuru atandukanye ku bikorwa bitegurwa binyuze mu " " " " Amateka Series " " " " wabasura kuri uru rubuga .
Guma mu rugo , umwanya mwiza ku banditsi ba ibitabo nyarwanda .
Ibitabo bifasha abantu ba ingeri zitandukanye kwiyungura ubumenyi bubafasha gutera imbere haba mu kwihangira imirimo , kwimakaza indangagaciro na kirazira mu iterambere , ubumenyi bwa Isi na ibindi .
Mu gihe umujyi wa Kigali uri muri gahunda ya Guma mu rugo , ni umwanya mwiza ku banditsi ba u Rwanda , kujya mu nganzo bagahanga , bakandika ibifasha igihugu nabo ubwabo kwiteza imbere .
Nta mwanditsi ukwiriye kuvuga ko yabuze icyo akora muri Guma mu rugo .
Umwanya munini wa abanditsi bawushyire mu gukora ubushakashatsi bandikire u Rwanda , bandikire Afurika bandikire Isi .
Muri Guma mu rugo yabaye umwaka ushize , hari abanditsi bayibyaje umusaruro , irangira ibitabo babigeze kure , ku buryo amezi yakurikiyeho yari ayo kubimurika , abo ni abo gushimirwa .
Ntabwo kwandika bikwiriye kuba ibya bamwe , kuko buri wese afite inkuru yo kwandika .
Ni byiza ko Abanyarwanda bose barushaho kwimakaza umuco wo kwandika no gusoma ibitabo kuko ari umuco mwiza wongera ubumenyi na ubuhanga .
U Rwanda rudutegerejeho ubuhanga na ubumenyi bwo kurwubaka kandi nta handi bituruka uretse mu gusoma ibitabo .
Ni umukoro kuri buri wese , mu rwego aherereyemo yakwandika kandi bikaba umusanzu ukomeye ku bariho bashaka kumenya ibyo mu rwego akoramo na abazaza nyuma .
Wakubaka u Rwanda ute utandika cyangwa udasoma ibitabo ? Wakubaka Afurika ute utandika cyangwa udasoma ibitabo ?
Wakwandika ute ibitabo utabisoma ?
Gusoma ibitabo niwo musingi wa ibikorwa byubaka u Rwanda ndetse na Afurika .
Mucyo duce imigozi twaziritswe na Bagashakabuhake , ngo " " " " Umunyafurika umuhisha mu bitabo ?
Tubyamagane .
Twimakaze umuco wo kwandika no gusoma ibitabo nkuko Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika adahwema kubidusaba kuko nibyo bizadufasha kubaka u Rwanda ndetse na Afurika twifuza .
Ubuzima butoroshye bwa Kurawige wiciwe se mu maso muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .
Kuva icyo gihe yatangiye ubuzima bwo gushaka aho yerekeza , ku bwa amahirwe ahungana na umuryango wo kwa nyirakuru ariko ntiyawutekaniyemo kuko yahahuriye na ibibazo birimo no gufatwa ku ngufu .
Mu kubika ayo mateka no kuba umuhamya wayo , Kurawige yanditse igitabo yise " " " " From Bondage to Freedom " " " " bishatse kuvuga ugenekereje mu Kinyarwanda " " " " Gufatwa bunyago ukaza kwibohora " " " " cyashibutse ku nzira ya inzitane yanyuzemo muri Jenoside .
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE , Kurawige yavuze ko igitabo cye yacyanditse ashaka gutanga ubuhamya bwa ibyamubayeho muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ubwo yicirwaga se umubyara bikozwe na Interahamwe .
Yagize ati " " " " Ni igitabo nanditse kugira ngo abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , nkanjye wiciwe Data mu maso , mbibere umuhamya hatazagira ubeshya abatabizi kandi turiho .
Ni igitabo nanditse mpawe imbaraga na ubuhamya numvise muri filime mbarankuru " " " " La Traverse du Génocide " " " " bituma nanjye numva nzasubira aho nababariye nkahakora filime mbarankuru . " " " "
Yavuze ko iki gitabo nacyo mu minsi iri imbere ateganya gusinya amasezerano ya uko cyakorwamo filime mbarankuru muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika .
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Mu byo niyemeje rero ni ukuvuga amateka nabayemo na abo tuyahuje kugira ngo abagenda babeshya kubera inyungu ntazi bafatwe bahanwe . " " " "
Umutoni avuga ko ku myaka itanu ubwo Interahamwe zicaga se Dr Kurawige Jean Baptiste , yabanje kumuhisha munsi ya intebe .
Uyu mukobwa wari ukiri umwana yarungurutse munsi abona uko bamutema , abona amaraso atemba , ariko mu bitekerezo yari afite ku myaka ye yumvaga ko umubyeyi we ari bugaruke akamukura aho yamubwiye kwihisha , ariko siko byagenze .
Umutoni avuga ko yaje kuhavanwa na nyirakuru ubyara nyina babasha guhunga bagera muri Uganda mu nkambi , bahava berekeza muri Burkina Faso , tariki ya 3 Ugushyingo 1994 .
Avuga ko bavuye muri Burkina Faso agana muri Afurika yepfo , mu mwaka wa 2011 , avuyeyo yasubiye mu Rwanda bwa mbere mu 2012 , ariko izi nzira zose ntabwo byari byoroshye , kuko guhera igihe se yicwaga kugeza 2011 yari mu bibazo bikomeye .
Umutoni avuga ko byamubabaje cyane kuko abishe se ari abo mu muryango wo kwa nyina ndetse no mu guhunga ajyana na nyirakuru ubyara nyina yakomeje kubabamo batamukunda , uretse gusa nyirakuru wahoraga amubwira ati " " " " Mwana wanjye ujye uhora wimenya ntibagukunda " " " " " " " "
Bageze muri Burkina Faso , nyina wabo wari warashatse muri icyo gihugu yamushumuriye umugabo we akajya amufata ku ngufu ku myaka 16 .
Ati " " " " Bari barabuze urubyaro bashaka ko umugabo we yambyaraho umwana , ku buryo yamfataga ku ngufu byibura gatanu mu cyumweru .
Uyu mugabo yari akomeye cyane muri kiriya gihugu kuko yari inshuti ya Perezida waho icyo gihe , ku buryo na Perezida basuranaga mu ngo , ibi bikamuha imbaraga zo gukora icyo ashaka muri iki gihugu . " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko " " " " Byaje no kumenyekana ko mfatwa ku ngufu mu Banyarwanda batuye muri icyo gihugu ariko bagira uwo babibwira mu butegetsi bwaho bigafata ubusa . " " " "
Umutoni avuga kandi ko muri icyo gihugu yahagiriye amakuba ya uko umugabo witwa Athanase wishe se , yahageze babana atamuzi .
Yagize ati " " " " Turabana ntamuzi , nzi ko ari umuntu nyine wo mu muryango nkumva mukunze , akamperekeza ku ishuri tukaganira nka umwana nashakaga kumenya byinshi .
Nyuma Interpol yaje kumushaka nibwo namenye ko ariwe wishe Papa , nakwibuka ukuntu nari naramugize umuntu numva nkunze ngashengukira mu mutima . " " " "
Igihe cyarageze nyirakuru yitaba Imana , atangira gushakisha uko yahunga ariko biramugora kuko yari yakumiriwe .
Yakomeje ati " " " " Nasigaye nsa nka aho ntaho ndi , nshakisha uko nahunga birangora cyane .
Bari barashyize amatangazo ku kibuga cya indege ku mipaka ya ibihugu byose bikikije Burkina Faso ko ntashobora gusohoka mu gihugu .
Nabiganirije umwe mu basirikare bakuru baho , ambwira ko bagiye kumfasha ariko azangira inama ya uko nzabigenza bigakunda . " " " " " " " "
Yamusabye guhindura amazina , ashaka ibindi byangombwa ndetse amufasha guhungira muri Afurika ya Epfo , aho yatangiriye ubuzima bushya .
Kurawige yize muri Kaminuza ya Pretoria mu bijyanye na Géologie , ahasoje amasomo mu 2016 , yasabye kwimenyerereza umwuga mu Rwanda aho yagarutse afite imyaka 23 .
Avuga ko yahuye na umwe mu bafunzwe uri mu bohereje abishe umubyeyi we ariko ngo amugeze imbere aramusuzugura cyane yanga kwemera ibyo yakoze .
Akomeza ati " " " " Na na ubu ntiyemera ibyo yakoze , ariko njye mu masengesho yanjye nahisemo kubabarira kugira ngo nduhuke uwo mutwaro . " " " " " " " "
Kurawige kuri ubu utuye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika , mu Mujyi wa Dallas , yavukiye i Ngoma mu Karere ka Huye mu Ntara ya Amajyepfo mu 1988 .
Ni umwe mu bayobozi ba ikigo gikomeye gikora ibijyanye na ubucukuzi bwa amabuye ya agaciro .
Reba ikiganiro IGIHE yagiranye na Umutoni
Menya Amanda Gorman , umusizi ukiri muto waciye agahigo mu irahira rya Perezida .
Uyu mukobwa yanditse amateka ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 20 Mutarama 2021 , ubwo yavugaga umuvugo mu muhango wo kurahira kwa Perezida mushya wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika , Joe Biden na Visi Perezida Kamala Harris .
Uyu mukobwa yavuze umuvugo yise " " " " The Hill We Climb " " " " cyangwa " " " " Umusozi tuzamuka " " " " " " " " mu rurimi rwa Ikinyarwanda .
Ni umuvugo yari amaze ibyumweru bibiri ari gukoraho , ugaruka ku bumwe na ubwiyunge ku banyamerika .
Avuga ko guhimba uyu muvugo ari kimwe mu bintu bya ingirakamaro yakoze mu buzima bwe , ati " " " " Nari mfite ibintu byinshi , ariko mu bya ukuri ni kimwe mu bintu bya ingenzi nakoze mu buzima bwanjye bujyanye no kuvuga imivugo .
Naravugaga nti ningerageza kuzamuka uyu musozi rimwe , nzagera kure . " " " "
Imwe mu mirongo igize uyu muvugo yayanditse ku wa 6 Mutarama 2021 , ubwo ibihumbi bya abaturage bashyigikiye Donald Trump binjiraga mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Amerika ubwo abayigize bari bateranye ngo bemeze intsinzi ya Joe Biden , bakarwana inkundura na Polisi bigateza impagarara muri Amerika .
Uyu mukobwa wa umwiraburakazi ufite inkomoko ku bacakara yarezwe na nyina gusa .
Afite inzozi zo kuzaba Perezida umunsi umwe .
Yatangiye kugaragaza impano yo kuvuga imivugo akiri muto ndetse atangira kuzamura impano ye vuba cyane .
Yakuriye mu Mujyi wa Los Angeles aho nyina yari umwarimu .
Ku myaka 16 yahize abandi mu mivugo mu marushanwa ya abakiri bato muri Los Angeles .
Imyaka mike yakurikiyeho ubwo yigaga ibijyanye na " " " " Sociologie " " " " muri Harvard yahize abasizi ku rwego rwa igihugu bakiri bato .
Nyuma yo kwigaragaza mu irahira rya Joe Biden , yashimwe na benshi barimo Barack Obama ndetse na umugore we , Michelle Obama yagaragaje uburyo yakozwe ku mutima na umuvugo wa Amanda Gorman .
Ati " " " " Hamwe na amagambo ye akomeye kandi akora ku mutima , Amanda Gorman atwibukije imbaraga dufite mu gusigasira demokarasi .
Komeza urabagirane Amanda mfite amatsiko ya ibyo uzakora mu bihe biri imbere . " " " "
Abandi bantu bakomeye barimo Oprah Winfrey bose bagaragaje ko batewe ishema na uyu mukobwa wa umwiraburakazi wanditse amateka akomeye .
Abari bari mu itsinda ryateguraga irahira rya Joe Biden bahamagaye uyu mukobwa mu mpera za ukwezi gushize .
Yavuze ko atari yahawe amabwiriza ya ibijyanye na umuvugo we .
Yahamagawe biturutse ku mugore wa Joe Biden , Jill Biden wabonye inyandiko ze mu isomero .
Yagize ati " " " " Nta mabwiriza bari bambwiye ajyanye na ibyo ngomba kwandika .
