Insanganyamatsiko ya irahira yari " " " " ubumwe bwa Amerika " " " " rero ubwo numvaga ko ariyo nsanganyamatsiko yabo byaranyoroheye kuko nanjye ni cyo kintu nashakaga kwandikaho mu muvugo wanjye , ku bumwe bwa Amerika . " " " "
Uyu mukobwa yabonye izuba mu 1998 avukira mu Mujyi wa Los Angeles , yakuranye na impanga ye yitwa Gabriella na nyina wa umwarimukazi .
Mu 2015 yashyize hanze igitabo cye cya mbere cya imivugo " " " " The One for Whom Food is Not enough " " " " gikubiyemo insanganyamatsiko zitandukanye zirimo izivuga ku burenganzira bwa abagore , ubwoko na inkomoko na abanyafurika baba muri Amerika .
Mu bantu afatiraho icyitegererezo harimo Winston Churchill wigeze kuba Minisitiri wa Intebe wa u Bwongereza , Martin Luther King Junior na Malala Yousafzai umukobwa wa umunya - Pakistan watsindiye igihembo cya amahoro mu 2013 .
Amanda afite inzozi zo kuziyamamariza kuzaba Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2036 ubwo uzaba afite imyaka 38 .
Uretse kuvuga imivugo , ni na impirimbanyi ya uburenganzira bwa muntu .
Silas Majoro , Umunyarwanda wa mbere wize Kaminuza " " " " Ababiligi bagahinda umushyitsi " " " "
Yigishije Milton Obote wabaye Perezida wa Uganda
Yashyizwe na Umwami Mutara mu nama nkuru ya igihugu
Yapfuye urupfu rwa amarabira
Nta gasozi kabura intwari !
Muri ibyo bihe bikomeye aho kwiga amashuri abanza byasaga nka inzozi ku Banyarwanda , mu 1917 i Gahini muri Kayonza havutse umuhungu akitwa Majoro Silas arenga izo nzitizi zose aba Umunyarwanda wa mbere wize Kaminuza yirwanyeho .
Mu myaka Majoro yavutsemo , mu Rwanda amashuri abanza yari mbarwa na ahari amenshi yari mu maboko ya abihayimana ba Kiliziya Gatolika .
Majoro yavukiye mu muryango wa Abangilikani , byumvikana ko kwiga mu mashuri ya Kiliziya byasaga nka ibidashoboka .
Ababyeyi bamurwanyeho , ashakisha ishuri , birangira abonye iryo muri Uganda rizwi nka Kinga s College Budo .
Yahize amashuri abanza na ayisumbuye araharangiza .
Umwarimu muri Kaminuza ya u Rwanda Ishami rya Uburezi , Dr Evariste Karangwa , ni umwe mu bize kuri Kinga s College Budo , ashishikazwa no kumenya amateka ya Umunyarwanda wa mbere wahize , ari we Majoro .
Dr Karangwa yabwiye IGIHE ko muri iryo shuri Majoro yari umuhanga cyane , bya umwihariko mu ishami rya Imibare .
Majoro yiganye muri iryo shuri na Kabaka II Edward Mutesa waje kuba Umwami wa Buganda .
Yagize ati " " " " Icyo nabonye muri archives za iryo shuri ryatangiye mu 1906 , bafite archives za kera , icyo bamuziho yari umuhanga cyane cyane mu mibare . " " " "
Mu myaka ya 1940 Majoro yari arangije amashuri yisumbuye abanza gukora muri Uganda .
Icyo gihe mu Rwanda nta Kaminuza na imwe yari ihari , yewe nta na umunyarwanda wari wakayize abenshi barangizaga mu mashuri yisumbuye nabo ari mbarwa .
Majoro yabanje kwigisha muri Uganda mu ishuri ryitwa Mwili College .
Muri iryo shuri yigishijemo abarimo Milton Obote waje kuba Perezida wa mbere wa Uganda .
Majoro amaze kwigisha muri iryo shuri , yaje gukomereza amasomo ye muri Kaminuza ya Makerere , yiga ibijyanye na uburezi .
Yarangije mu 1949 .
Igitabo " " " " Ibitaramo ku mateka ya u Rwanda " " " " cya Zephrin Kagiraneza kivuga ko icyo gihe Majoro ari we wari Umunyarwanda wa mbere wize Kaminuza , akaba uwa kabiri mu Rwanda no mu Burundi .
Kigira kiti " " " " Muri Ruanda - Urundi , uwabonye impamyabushobozi ya kaminuza bwa mbere ni umuganwa wa Umurundi witwa Birori Joseph mwene Baranyanka .
Mu 1949 mu Rwanda habonetse Umunyarwanda Silas Majoro .
Yatsindiye impamyabushobozi ya uburezi muri Kaminuza ya Makerere muri Uganda . " " " "
Majoro arangije muri Kaminuza ya Makerere , yafashe icyemezo cyo gutaha mu Rwanda gufasha mu iterambere rya uburezi .
Yanzwe na Ababiligi , aba inshuti ya Umwami Rudahigwa
Dr Karangwa avuga ko yageze mu Rwanda abakoloni ba Ababiligi bakamwanga cyane kuko yagaragazaga amatwara ya impinduramatwara ngo uburezi bugere kuri bose .
Mu bindi bamwangiraga , ngo ni uko yari uwo muri Angilikani kandi amashuri menshi ari aya Kiliziya , hakiyongeraho ko yari yarize mu Cyongereza mu gihe amashuri yo mu Rwanda yakoreshaga Igifaransa .
Ati " " " " Nyuma yo gusoza amashuri , yasuzuguwe cyane na ubuyobozi bwa abakoloni kubera idini rye na amashuri yizemo .
Yagiye kwigisha mu ishuri rya iwabo i Gahini .
Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa yabibonye kare , amushyira mu nama nkuru ya Igihugu , Conseil Supérieur du Pays ariko akomeza kwangwa bikomeye na abakoloni . " " " "
Bivugwa ko Majoro yari agiye kugirwa Umuyobozi Mukuru wa amashuri yose yo mu Rwanda ariko ubuyobozi bwa abakoloni na Kiliziya Gatolika bakabyitambika kuko yari umuporotestanti .
Dr Karangwa ati " " " " Bashakaga kumugira Umuyobozi Mukuru wa amashuri ya u Rwanda .
Ntabwo bamushyizeho ahubwo bashyizeho Kayibanda Grégoire .
Baramwangiye ngo nta Gifaransa azi ariko ubwo harimo na ibindi bya uko ari umuporotesitanti na ibindi . " " " "
Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa amaze kumutera imboni , yabaye inshuti ye ya akadasohoka .
Dr Karangwa avuga ko Majoro ari we watangiye guhuza umwami Mutara na Kabaka Mutesa II wa Uganda kuko Majoro na Mutesa bari inshuti cyane .
Ati " " " " Yabaye umuyobozi wa ishuri ribanza rya Gahini ariyobora neza , akora ibishya byinshi , abakobwa batangira kwiga , Ababiligi baramwikanga ariko Rudahigwa aramukunda kubera amatwara yo gushaka abantu bazana amajyambere mu gihugu , amushyira mu nama nkuru ya Igihugu . " " " "
Inama Nkuru ya Igihugu muri ibyo bihe yakoraga nka Inteko Ishinga Amategeko , cyangwa se abajyanama ba umwami .
Umusaruro ukomeye wa ubwo buhuza bwa Majoro hagati ya Rudahigwa na Mutesa , ni uruzinduko rwa amateka umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa yagiriye mu bwami bwa Buganda guhera tariki 14 Ukwakira kugeza kuwa 2 Ugushyingo 1956 .
Muri urwo ruzinduko , umwanya munini Rudahigwa yawumaze asura amashuri yo muri Buganda harimo na Kinga s Budo College Majoro yizeho , rikaba ishuri ryamushimishije cyane .
Musenyeri Alexis Birindabagabo wahoze ayobora Diyozezi Angilikani ya Gahini , yabwiye IGIHE ko Majoro yashakaga ko u Rwanda rwihuta mu iterambere vuba .
Ati " " " " Yaravugaga ati Ababiligi ibyo badukorera ntitujya mbere .
Ubundi inshuti za mbere za Rudahigwa yari Majoro na Church wa Umwongereza .
Ubwo Majoro yashakaga kumuhuza na Abongereza nibwo bavuze bati umuntu araducitse , mumwohereze ahandi . " " " "
Birindabagabo avuga ko Majoro yari umuntu ugendera ku mahame .
Bigaragarira mu banyeshuri yigishije i Gahini , kuko ngo hari interuro yari yaranditse ku gikuta igira iti " " " " Le Patriotisme ca est la amour de la patrie " " " " ( Gukunda Igihugu ni ugukunda aho ukomoka ) .
Bivugwa ko iyo yabaga agiye mu nama nkuru ya Igihugu i Nyanza , yagendaga mu modoka ye bwite , yitwaye .
Mu myaka ya 1950 , amajwi yatangiye kuba menshi mu Rwanda , basaba ko Abanyarwanda bahabwa amahirwe bakajya kwiga Kaminuza mu mahanga cyangwa se hakubakwa Kaminuza mu gihugu .
Ababiligi babanje kwica amatwi ariko bikomeza kuvugwa cyane ndetse binandikwa mu binyamakuru byari biriho icyo gihe .
Igitabo " " " " Ibitaramo bya amateka ya u Rwanda " " " " kivuga ko Leta Mbiligi yageze aho ikavuga ko ntawe izarihirira .
Kinyamateka yo muri Gicurasi 1956 , ivuga ko u Bubiligi bwatangaje itegeko ribuza abategetsi bo muri Ruanda - Urundi gukora mu isanduku ya igihugu bashaka gufasha ushaka kujya kwiga mu mahanga .
Byaje kumenyekana mu nama nkuru ya Igihugu ari nabwo Rudahigwa yatangizaha ikigega cyamwitiriwe " " " " Fond Mutara , " " " " kugira ngo abana ba Abanyarwanda bajye kwiga mu mahanga .
Majoro yapfuye amarabira
Mu ba mbere barihiwe na icyo Kigega harimo na Majoro washakaga kujya kwihugura i Burayi mu bijyanye na Ubutegetsi na Igifaransa dore ko mu byo Ababiligi bamwangiraga ari uko yize mu Cyongereza .
Ubwo yari amazeyo igihe gito , Majoro yafashwe na uburwayi butunguranye aza kugwa mu maboko ya umuganga wamuvuraga i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi tariki 31 Werurwe 1958 .
Dr Karangwa avuga ko urupfu rwe rwajemo amayobera nka urw Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa kuko nta ndwara ikomeye izwi yari arwaye .
Bikekwa ko na we yaba yarishwe ku kagambane ka Ababiligi batifuzaga umuntu ujijutse ugaragaza amafuti bakora cyangwa se uharanira ubwigenge na iterambere nyabyo .
Musenyeri Birindabagabo na Dr Karangwa bahuriza ku kuba Majoro yari umuntu ukunda igihugu , wari unyotewe no guteza imbere uburezi .
Dr Karangwa ati " " " " Yakundaga igihugu cya u Rwanda mu gihe gito yabayeho . " " " "
Ishuri ribanza rya Gahini Majoro yigishijemo riracyariho ariko inyubako zaryo zaravuguruwe .
Ahari hubatse ishuri rya umwimerere yigishirijemo , ubu hubatse Katederali ya Diyosezi ya Gahini mu Itorero Angilikani .
Nyuma ya Majoro , abandi Banyarwanda babashije kujya muri Kaminuza mu bihe bya mbere harimo Déogratias Mbandiwimfura wagiye kuminuza mu mategeko ya Kiliziya i Roma guhera mu 1947 kugeza mu 1951 na Musenyeri Alexis Kagame wagiye kwiga mu 1952 yiga Filozofiya .
" " " " Nanditse ngo ntsinde abifuje ko dushira ntihazagire ubara inkuru ye " " " " Ndizeye Omar .
Iki gitabo ugenekereje mu Kinyarwanda cyitwa " " " " Ubuzima na urupfu i Nyamata " " " " cyashyizwe hanze umwaka ushize .
Ndizeye utuye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika , mu kiganiro cyihariye yagiranye na IGIHE , yagarutse ku mpamvu zatumye yandika ayo mateka nka umwe mu bagize amahirwe bakarokoka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri 1994 .
Ati " " " " Navuga ko igitabo kigaruka ku mateka ya Nyamata aho mvuka nakuriye , nkaharokokera .
Kiravuga ku buzima no ku rupfu muri Jenoside .
Nyamata kandi nyigarukaho nka ahantu hari ibimenyetso bya amateka ya Jenoside ariko ahera mu 1959 , nkanagaruka uko nibuka ibyabereye aho nise mu Rusengero rwuje umwijima mu Rwanda . " " " "
Ndizeye avuka ahahoze ari Komine Kanzenze , ubu ni mu Murenge wa Ntarama mu Kagali ka Kanzenze .
Muri uyu murenge niho hari urusengero rwiciwemo ibihumbi bya Abatutsi , bakicanwa ubugome bukabije .
Mu gitabo cye , agaruka ku buryo Abatutsi batujwe mu Bugesera mu 1959 bakahajyanwa batabihisemo ahubwo ari amayeri ya ubutegetsi bwari buriho mu mugambi wabwo wo gutegura Jenoside .
Ati " " " " Mu 1959 nibwo ubutegetsi bwa Ababiligi bwahimuriye Abatutsi babakuye mu gice cya Amajyaruguru za Gakenke na za Rulindo ndetse na za Burera bya umwihariko .
Hari na abandi Batutsi bakuwe mu gice cya epfo muri za Butare na Gikongoro .
Kujyanwa mu Bugesera rero ntabwo bari babisabye kuko bajyanwaga basize ibintu byabo , amatungo , inzu na isambu , ni muri ibyo bihe rero na abandi Batutsi benshi birukanywe mu gihugu bagana ibihugu bidukikije . " " " "
Iki gitabo Ndizeye agaragazamo ibyo yibaza ku buzima ababyeyi be babayemo mu nkambi zo mu Bugesera hagati ya 1959 na 1962 na uburyo bakomeje gutoterezwa muri izo nkambi , bamwe bakicwa .
Ati " " " " Hari byinshi bitatumye ngoheka , aha navuga nka amateka ya umubyeyi wa mwarimu wanjye Uwamaliya Enatha wanyigishije mu wa mbere wa amashuri abanza , waje kubura se wishwe mu 1963 mu Batutsi bishwe barasiwe aho bitaga kuri Nyabarongo ku kiraro cya Kanzenze , se wa Uwamaliya rero akaba yari Data wacu . " " " "
" " " " Bahuye kandi na ibindi bibazo mu Nkambi ya Nyamata kuko barwariyemo indwara nka za Tifoyide kubera isuku nke , hapfamo benshi cyane ibyo nzabigarukaho mu kindi gitabo ndimo kwandika . " " " "
Uretse ubwo buzima bwo mu Bugesera mu nkambi , Ndizeye agaruka ku byo yiboneye na amaso ye birimo iyicwa rya Abatutsi hagati ya 1990 na 1993 , mitingi za amashyaka bya umwihariko MRND na CDR yateguye akanashyira mu bikorwa Jenoside .
Mu kindi gice , avuga bya umwihariko kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , aho avuga uburyo umuryango we wishwe .
Ati " " " " Igice cya Jenoside nyira izina gitangira mu 1994 , uko twahizwe , tukaza guhungira i Ntarama , nkabona uko bishe Data , muri ako kanya simbitekerezeho cyane kuko muri Jenoside , buri munota wabaga ari ubuzima , iyo wabonaga uwishwe wumvaga ko mu kanya ari wowe ukarwana no kureba ko wahanyanyaza ngo wihishe , akababaro
kaza nyuma wongeye kubitekereza no kubiha umwanya . " " " "
Ndizeye yavuze ko gutanga ubuhamya bwa ibyo abarokotse babayemo muri Jenoside , bifasha benshi kugabanya umutwaro wa ibyo baba bafite batavuze byibera mu mutima no mu bitekerezo byabo .
Ati " " " " Twari nka inyamanswa ziba mu ishyamba zitegereje guhigwa no kwicwa isaha iyo ariyo yose buri munsi ku manywa , kuko mu ijoro nibwo twagiraga icyo nakwita agahenge . " " " "
Tariki 13 Gicurasi 1994 nibwo Inkotanyi zabarokoye .
Ati " " " " Byari ibyishimo bivanze na umunaniro , agahinda na inzara .
Tujya i Nyamata Inkotanyi zitangira kutwondora , baduha icyo gufungura , amazi yo koga na ibindi , turongera tuba abantu . " " " "
Ndizeye yavuze ko icyakomeje gutuma abaho ari icyizere cya ejo heza , kuko " " " " bitagenze bityo byaba ari Jenoside igikomeza kuko umugambi wa abayitegura bakayikora ni ukurimbura . " " " "
Yavuze ko kwandika ari uburyo bwo guhashya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside no guha agaciro abe bishwe .
Ati " " " " Kwandika rero kuri njye ni uburyo bwa isanamitima , kandi kugira ngo ntsinde ingengabitekerezo yo kumaraho abanjye , kuko bifuzaga ko amazina yabo asigara mu bitabo bya amateka kuko nta na umwe wari kuzarokoka ngo avuge inkuru ye . " " " "
Yashishikarije abandi barokotse Jenoside kwandika amateka babayemo kugira ngo atazasibangana .
CHENO yashyizeho amarushanwa ya indirimbo na imivugo bisingiza Intwari za Igihugu .
CHENO mu itangazo yashyize hanze ku wa 11 Mutarama , yakanguriye Abanyarwanda babizi kandi babifitiye ubushobozi gukora imivugo na indirimbo bisingiza Intwari za igihugu , bikanakangurira abiganjemo urubyiruko kwimakaza umuco wa ubutwari .
Imyaka icumi ya igihirahiro kuri Sudani ya Epfo , Perezida Kiir " " " " arananiwe . " " " "
Icyizere cyari cyose kuri Aquil De Chut Deng na abandi bagore bagenzi be babyinaga intsinzi mu mihanda ya Juba , bishimira ko noneho bagiye kubyara bagaheka , bagatunga bagatunganirwa .
Ntibyateye kabiri , icyizere cyaraje amasinde inzozi batifuzaga kurota ziba impamo .
Intambara zatangiye mu 2013 kugeza na ubu zanze kurangira kugeza ubwo na Perezida Salva Kiir avuga ko ananiwe .
Mu 2013 , Perezida Salva Kiir wari umaze imyaka ibiri ayoboye icyo gihugu gishya ku ikarita ya Isi , yashwanye na Riek Machar wari Visi Perezida , Kiir ashinja mugenzi we gushaka kumuhirika ku butegetsi .
Salva Kiir aturuka mu bwoko bwa aba - Dinka naho Machar agaturuka mu bwoko bwa aba - Nuer .
Imirwano yahereye mu barinda Perezida , abo mu moko yombi batangira gushwana kugeza ubwo bigeze no mu baturage , imirwano ifata indi ntera .
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 9 Nyakanga 2021 , abanya - Sudani ya Epfo basaga ibihumbi 400 bamaze kugwa muri iyo ntambara mu gihe abasaga miliyoni 4 . 5 bavuye mu byabo .
Ni igihugu gikennye ariko gikungahaye kuri peteroli ari na yo ivamo 90 % bya amafaranga igihugu cyinjiza , nubwo Perezida Kiir aherutse kubwira Citizen TV yo muri Kenya ko Peteroli bafite " " " " yababereye umuvumo " " " " aho kuba isoko ya ubukire .
Kubera ko ariko gace kari gakungahaye kuri peteroli na andi mabuye ya agaciro , Sudani ya Epfo yabonye ubwigenge ifite bimwe mu bikorwa remezo byiza , nyamara Croix Rouge ivuga ko nibura mu bitaro na amavuriro Sudani ya Epfo yari ifite mbere ya ubwigenge , ibisigaye bikora ari 40 % .
Ishami rya Umuryango wa Abibumbye ryita ku bana ( UNICEF ) rivuga ko nibura miliyoni 4 . 5 za abana muri Sudani ya Epfo bakeneye ubufasha ngo bave mu mirire mibi .
Umubare wa abaturage bakeneye inkunga muri Sudani ya Epfo ugeze kuri miliyoni 8 . 5 muri miliyoni zisaga 10 zituye icyo gihugu .
Kubera imvururu , imyaka icumi ishize igihugu nta bushobozi kiragira bwo gutegura amatora , ataha akaba ateganyijwe mu 2023 ariko icyizere cya uko azaba ni gike hashingiwe ku bibazo bya intambara , inzara na imvururu za politiki zicyugarije igihugu .
Igitutu cya amahanga , cyatumye abayobozi bombi bemera gusangira ubutegetsi , mu 2018 Machar yongera kugaruka mu gihugu nka Visi Perezida wa mbere , mu ba Visi Perezida batanu igihugu gifite .
Muri Gashyantare 2020 Kiir yashyizeho Guverinoma ya Ubumwe ariko ntabwo yabujije ko ubwicanyi bushingiye ku moko hirya no hino mu gihugu bukomeza .
Isabukuru ya imyaka icumi yakabaye ibirori bidasazwe ku gihugu cyabonye ubwigenge kimaze imyaka 30 kibuharanira , nyamara Perezida Salva Kiir yategetse ko nta birori bidasanzwe biba kuko ntacyo kwishimira gihari .
Aherutse kugira ati " " " " Ibihano Sudani ya Epfo yafatiwe byaradukenesheje nubwo mu bisanzwe dukize .
Ibihano byose baduhaye , ntabwo byatumye tuzamuka mu buryo twifuzagamo .
Niyo mpamvu tudashobora kwizihiza imyaka 10 ishize nka uko abantu babyifuzaga .
Abantu barashonje , ubushobozi dufite ntabwo twabushyira mu birori , byarakaza abaturage bacu . " " " "
Ubwo Sudani yemezaga ko ibonye ubwigenge , Akanama ka umutekano ka Loni katoye kemeza ko ingabo za Loni zishinzwe kubungabunga amahoro zigomba kujya mu gihugu gishya gusubiza ibintu ku murongo .
Izo ngabo zigerageza gushyira ibintu mu buryo ariko ntabwo bibuza imvururu gukomeza .
Umuyobozi wa ingabo za Loni muri icyo gihugu , Nicholas Haysom kuri uyu munsi Sudani ya Epfo imaze imyaka icumi yigenga yagize ati " " " " Turasaba abanyapolitiki kubyaza umusaruro aya mahirwe kugira ngo inzozi abaturage bari bafite mu myaka icumi ishize , zibe impamo .
Baharanire amahoro arambye na iterambere . " " " "
Umuryango Mpuzamahanga na Kiir bararebana aya ingwe
Nubwo amatora yitezwe mu 2023 ngo hatorwe undi uzasimbura Salva Kiir , benshi ntibizera ko ayo matora azaba .
Hari ababona ko kugira ngo Sudani ya Epfo igire amahoro , bizasaba ko Kiir ava ku butegetsi akajyana na Riek Machar .
Ibyo byifuzo ababifite babisangiye na Loni dore ko Raporo yatanzwe muri Mata 2021 ya inzobere za Loni kuri Sudani ya Epfo , yavuze ko " " " " Kiir na Machar bahindutse ikibazo kuri demokarasi , iterambere rya ubukungu na imibereho myiza muri Sudani ya Epfo . " " " "
Iryo tsinda rya impuguke ryakomeje rivuga ko abo bayobozi bombi bakwiriye kuvaho " " " " kugira ngo igihugu kibone undi murongo mushya wa politiki hanakumirwe izindi mvururu . " " " "
Nubwo Loni isanga Kiir ari we kibazo muri Sudani ya Epfo , nyira ubwite we asanga Umuryango mpuzamahanga ari wo utuma igihugu kidatera imbere .
Mu kiganiro aherutse kugirana na umunyamakuru wa Citizen TV Kenya , Jeff Mwaura Koinange , Perezida Kiir yagize ati " " " " Ndananiwe , ariko ntabwo nanijwe na abaturage , nanijwe na umuryango mpuzamahanga .
Niyo mpamvu mfite ba Visi Perezida batanu .
Njya kubona nkabona na umuntu utarigeze arasa na rimwe , baramuzanye ngo ari mu masezerano ya amahoro . " " " "
Umunyamakuru yahise abaza Kiir impamvu bakora ibyo badashaka akabyemera , ati " " " " Nagira nte se ?
Ndabareka bagakora icyo bashaka . Ubu se iyo ufashe inka ukayijyana mu ibagiro , yatera amahane .
Niko bakora , bo icyo bashaka ni ukumvana ku butegetsi . " " " "
Kubera imvururu na intambara , Loni yafatiye Sudani ya Epfo ibihano birimo ibya ubukungu , kutemererwa kugura intwaro , gufatira imitungo ya bamwe mu bashinjwa uruhare mu mvururu no kubabuza gukorera ingendo mu mahanga .
Ibyo byakomye mu nkokora iterambere rya icyo gihugu .
Bishobora kuba ari nabyo bituma icyo gihugu kitagira igisirikare gikomeye cyabasha guhangana na imitwe yitwaje intwaro .
Abaturage ntibizeye umutekano utangwa na Leta , ari yo mpamvu imbunda na izindi ntwaro zinyanyagiye mu baturage zikanifashishwa iyo habaye imvururu zishingiye ku moko cyangwa ibindi .
Perezida Salva Kiir yavuze ko izo ntwaro bigoye kuzimara mu baturage , ngo keretse bahawe ingengo ya imari bakazibagurira .
Ati " " " " Niba umuntu yaragiye akagurisha inka ze akigurira imbunda ngo yirinde , ntabwo yapfa kuyitanga .
Twe twumva ko kugira ngo ibyemejwe mu masezerano bigerweho , bizasaba ko dutekereza uburyo abaturage bamburwa intwaro .
Bizakunda ari uko tubahaye amafaranga , tukazigura . " " " "
Hari ababona impamvu ibintu byazambye muri Sudani ya Epfo , ari uko Kiir asa na uwaguweho na ubutegetsi , akabufata atiteguye .
The Sudan Peoplea s Liberation Army , umutwe wa ingabo warwaniye ubwigenge bwa Sudani ya Epfo washinzwe mu 1983 na John Garang .
Garang yari afite impamyabumenyi ya ikirenga ( Phd ) mu bukungu bushingiye ku buhinzi yakuye muri Iowa State University .
Yari azi kureshya amahanga kugira ngo yemere impamvu yatumye bafata intwaro , ari nabyo byabagejeje ku bwigenge .
Mu 2005 , Garang yasinye amasezerano ya amahoro na Guverinoma ya Sudani ari nayo yabanzirizaga ubwigenge .
Yaje kugirwa Visi Perezida wa Guverinoma ya inzibacyuho ya Sudani , hashize iminsi agwa mu mpanuka ya kajugujugu .
Inyeshyamba za Garang zisanze mu ihurizo ryo gushaka umusimbura , bagena Salva Kiir wari umusirikare mukuru umenyereye ibyo kurwana , udafite amashuri menshi na ubunararibonye muri politiki .
Mu gihe Garang yari azi kureshya amahanga no gutera ibipindi , Kiiir we yaje ari umuntu ucecetse .
Ikinyamakuru Foreign Policy giherutse gutangaza ko hari inama yigeze guhuza Kiir na George W Bush wayoboraga Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika , gusobanura neza ibibazo byabo biramunanira biba ngombwa ko havuga abaminisitiri be .
Bush wakundaga cyane Garang , yabaye nka utishimira politiki ya Kiir , gusa ibintu byarushijeho kuzamba ku ngoma ya Barrack Obama , ubwo Amerika yamenyaga ko Sudani ya Epfo yaba itera inkunga imitwe ya inyeshyamba irwanya Sudani .
Salva Kiir nubwo avuga ko ananizwa , ntatanga umuti uhamye wa icyakorwa ngo imvururu zihoshe mu gihugu cye .
Gusa yizera ko mu myaka icumi iri imbere , Sudani ya Epfo izaba imeze neza .
Ati " " " " Abaturage ba Sudani ya Epfo nibemera ko amahoro aganza , mu myaka icumi iri imbere kizaba ari igihugu kidasanzwe .
Nibatongera kurwana , nyuma ya imyaka icumi kizaba ari igihugu . " " " "
Icyakora , Kiir avuga ko hari " " " " Hari abantu bakinyotewe na amaraso , bashaka kubona abantu bapfa muri Sudani ya Epfo . " " " "
Kuba Minisitiri wa Intebe , uko yahunze na abamusabye kugambanira igihugu - Ikiganiro na Dr Rwigema Pierre - Célestin .
Ubu afite imyaka 68 ya amavuko .
Yabaye Minisitiri wa Intebe muri Guverinoma yari iyobowe na Pasiteri Bizimungu hagati ya 1995 na 2000 mbere yaho yabaye Minisitiri wa Uburezi mu gihe cya umwaka umwe [ 1994 - 1995 ] .
Ni Umudepite uhagarariye u Rwanda mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Afurika ya Iburasirazuba [ EALA ] . Mbere ya Jenoside yari Umuyoboke wa MDR .
Mu 2001 , yaje gushinjwa kugira uruhare muri Jenoside , hashize iminsi mike yeguye ku mwanya wa Minisitiri wa Intebe .
Byatumye ahunga ava mu Rwanda ajya muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika , ashaka ubuhungiro nka umunyapoltiki .
Muri icyo gihe yarimo akomereza amasomo ya Masters muri Bowling Green State University muri Leta ya Ohio .
Ihunga rye ryavuzweho byinshi ndetse bivugwa ko yageze iyo imahanga akareshywa na abantu ba ingeri zitandukanye kugira ngo yiyunge ku barwanya FPR Inkotanyi .
Ibi byose ni byo yagarutseho mu kiganiro kirambuye yagiranye na IGIHE .
IGIHE : Waba wibuka uko winjiye muri Politiki na icyabiteye ?
Dr Rwigema : Inkundura ya amashyaka ije , ntabwo nabigiyemo .
No muri MRND baje kunsaba kujyamo ndanga , gusa naje kurushwa imbaraga na uko icyo kintu cyari gikomeye i Gitarama aho nkomoka , barantumira kugira ngo njyemo ndanga , mbanza kubaha icyo nakwita ubufasha , bageze aho bati " " " " amafaranga ntabwo tuyashaka ni wowe dushaka . " " " "
Mbura uko mbigenza , nemera kujya mu nzego zikomeye za ishyaka rikomeye iwacu , dutangira tuvuga ko tugiye kurwanya Habyarimana , kandi akomeye ariko twe nta na imbaraga dufite ; nta mbunda twagiraga [ . . . ] .
Ni uko ngiye iwacu muri Kigoma bahita bantora mu nzego , bigeze kuri Perefegitura ngira ngo nabaye uwa gatatu .
Ni uko ninjiye muri politiki .
Hari na abavuga ko wigeze kwigumura kuri Habyarimana ; ni ukuri ?
Mu 1993 , Habyarimana yabonye ko opozisiyo ikomeye , ahitamo kugira ngo abikatemo kabiri , ari na bwo bamwe yabahaga icyo nakwita nka ubushobozi cyangwa amafaranga , barabagura abandi turanga .
Ndibuka ko muri kongere yabereye i Gitarama , nafashe ijambo mbabwira ko ntashobora kubyemera , ndasohoka , ikindi gipande kinini kirankurikira .
Ni uko byacitsemo kabiri , noneho rero abantu batangira guhigana .
Ubwo icyo gihe hari abagiye ku ruhande rwa Inkotanyi . . .
Hari abashyigikiye Habyarimana abandi tuvuga rumwe na Inkotanyi , abantu batangira guhigana hagati yabo kuko ibyo twari twaremeranyije nka Demokarasi bamwe basa nka aho bagambaniye abandi kubera ko ubutegetsi bwabaciyemo kabiri .
Wabaye Minisitiri wa Uburezi wa mbere nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ; usobanura ute uko izo nshingano zari zimeze ?
Kuba Minisitiri wa Uburezi nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 ni nka inzozi kuko nanjye iyo nsubije amaso inyuma hari igihe nibaza uko nabikoze ariko narabikoze .
Mu 1994 kukubaza umubare wa abanyeshuri , abarimu bari mu gihugu noneho hagakubiraho na uko u Rwanda rwarimo rwakira ababyeyi bazanye na abana babo bavuye muri Kenya bize mu cyongereza , bavuye muri Tanzania bize mu Kiswahili , bavuye muri Uganda bize mu Cyongereza , abavuye muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo bize mu Gifaransa abavuye i Burundi
bize mu Gifaransa na abari basanzwe mu Rwanda bize mu Kinyarwanda ntabwo byari byoroshye .
Ndakubwiye ni ikizamini kimwe na ibindi .
Twatangije amashuri muri Nzeri mu 1994 , nakoze gahunda nyijyanye no muri guverinoma kugira ngo ize kubyemera byafashe igihe , bumvaga bidashoboka .
Ndabasobanurira hanyuma barambwira bati wabaye woroheje ?
Ndababwira nti ariko ndakeka ko dukwiye kugerageza kuko ababyeyi na abana na iki gihugu gikwiye kongera kugira icyizere cyo kubaho .
Ni bande bari bagushyigikiye icyo gihe mu bari muri Guverinoma ?
Perezida wa Repubulika [ Perezida Kagame ] ari mu banshyigikiye cyane , aravuga ati mumureke agerageze kuko nanjye nari maze kuvuga nti mureke ngerageze nibyanga njyane na byo mushyireho undi .
Ni iki wihutiye gukora ?
Natangije amashuri , icyo gihe hari Perefegitura , natangiriye mu Ruhengeri , icyo gihe yayoborwaga na uwitwaga Kagiraneza Deus , nkora ku buryo tumenya ibigo byashobokaga kugira ngo bitangire , noneho aho tudafite abarimu tugashyiramo na abanyeshuri barangizaga bashoboraga kwigisha .
Za UNICEF zirahurura , za GIZ mbese imiryango itari iya leta yose na abanyamakuru baza kureba uburyo ibyo bintu bizahaho .
Ibigo bitandatu byose turatangira barigisha , bigenda neza .
Mwakurikijeho he ?
Umunsi wa kabiri tubikora i Byumba , hayoborwaga na Colonel Lizinde Théoneste na Musenyeri we ukinariho baradufashije cyane , tubikora kimwe na uko twabikoze mu Ruhengeri , umunsi wa Gatatu tujya i Kibungo hari umugabo wa umukozi witwa Musoni Protais na Musenyeri Rubwejanga .
Rubwejanga yari na inshuti yanjye na bo turakorana turabipanga birakora , umunsi wa kane tujya i Gitarama , tubikora uko twabikoze mu ntangiriro .
Ubwo byakirwaga gute hanze aha ?
Ku munsi wa Gatanu ari na ho Inama ya Guverinoma yabaga , inkuru yari yasakaye Isi yose , bati ya Guverinoma itaranamara na amezi abiri yakoze igikorwa cya indashyikirwa , yatangije amashuri .
Noneho ndakomeza , ni uko byagenze .
Nyuma ya umwaka umwe wahise ugirwa Minisitiri wa Intebe . . .
Ukurikije amasezerano ya Arusha , bavugaga ko Minisitiri wa Intebe azaturuka muri MDR , Twagiramungu yari yanditse muri ayo masezerano , Twagiramungu rero amaze kunanirwa inshingano , arasezera , bagombaga gushaka umuntu umusimbura .
Bashatse umuntu umusimbura rero ntabwo bari gusaba iryo shyaka ngo ribahe umuntu kanaka , byari bikomeye .
Ariko barababwiye bati nimuduhe abantu bane , turahitamo umwe .
Urumva icyo gihe njye nari Minisitiri kandi mfite na amanota ya ibikorwa nari maze gukora .
Bivuze rero ko watowe ?
Nka ishyaka twakoze inama ya Biro Politiki , baratora , batora abantu bane , mu bantu bane hatowe uwitwaga Mbonimpa Jean Marie Vianney wari Ambasaderi wa u Rwanda mu Busuwisi ; Mfizi Christophe wari Ambasaderi wacu i Paris , nkurikiraho mba uwa gatatu nari Minisitiri wa Uburezi , uwa kane yari Eugène Ndahayo , wari Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibikorwa bya
Guverinoma muri Minisiteri ya Itumanaho .
Batanga bane , noneho FPR ihitamo Rwigema ari we njyewe .
Ni uko nabaye Minisitiri wa Intebe , hari tariki 29 Kanama 1995 .
Ni wowe wahabwaga amahirwe muri bose ?
Na amaradiyo yari yamaze gutangaza ko ari njye na ibyemezo bitarasohoka .
Kuko ngira ngo nari Minisitiri wa Uburezi , maze kugira ibikorwa bigaragara , abantu bose ahari ni ko babyifuzaga .
Mu biganiro byo mu Rugwiro ubwo byumvikane ko na ho wari uhari
Mu nama zo mu Urugwiro nari mpari , nazigizemo uruhare rukomeye nari ndi Minisitiri wa Intebe .
Ni iki wazivugaho ?
Inama zo mu Urugwiro , ni ikintu gikomeye kandi ni na ikintu umuntu yashimira FPR kuko yahuje abantu batashoboraga guhura .
Abantu bari aba UNAR muri za 1959 , abari aba Sous - Chefs , abari muri za RADER mbese ihuza ibintu bitashoboraga guhura .
Ariko twaganiriye ku mateka ya u Rwanda , ibyatanyije abanyarwanda , ibishobora kongera kubahuza na uburyo abantu bavugisha ukuri .
Ni gute usobanura umusingi wazo ku Rwanda rwa none ?
Ni ukuri kwa Imana ni ikintu gikomeye mu bintu byubatse iki gihugu kuko zahujije abantu batashoboraga guhura , barongera baricarana barebana mu maso , bavuga amateka mbere ya umwaduko wa abazungu , igihe cya Ubukoloni na nyuma ibintu bijya kuba nabi hakaza ubwicanyi cyane cyane Umwami Mutara Rudahigwa bamaze kumuhitanira i Bujumbura .
Ni ikintu gikomeye rero ngira ngo Inama zo mu Urugwiro abantu bari bakwiye kuzazandikaho ibitabo kuko hari abantu bari bahari bakuru , umuntu agize Imana bakinariho , umuntu agahera no ku byo abantu bibuka .
Mu 2001 wahunze igihugu , hari bahaye iki ?
Njyewe icyo nari nkeneye ni ukugira ngo mbone ibyangombwa banyakire , kandi ibyo narabikoze .
Maze kubigeraho ahasigaye njya mu mirimo yo gutunga umuryango wanjye nditonda , mba Umunyarwanda .
Nka Umunyarwanda ukunda igihugu cye .
Kandi abantu baranshatse kugira ngo banshyire muri ibyo bintu , mbese nanjye ngambanire igihugu , njye muri iyo mitwe ya politiki ndabihunga ndanabyanga .
Ubwo bagusabaga kubangamira igihugu mu buhe buryo ?
Hari na abanzaniye amafaranga ngo nandike ibitabo byo gusebya igihugu cyanjye , ndababwira nti ayo mafaranga ndayakeneye ariko ntabwo nabikora .
Nti nta kintu nasebya u Rwanda ntagizemo uruhare , urumva rero ni ukuvuga ngo ndasebya igihugu nayoboye , nabayemo Minisitiri wa Intebe , ni ukuvuga se ko ibyo ntakoze njyewe ari ibihe ?
Waje kugaruka mu Rwanda ute ?
Bivugwa ko wabisabye Perezida Kagame . . . niko biri ?
Nanjye ubwanjye na umutimanama wanjye numvaga ko ngomba gutaha , aho mbisabiye na we rwose abyakirana umutima mwiza .
Ibyo nabyita ubutwari bukomeye kuko aho kugira ngo ube warabaye Minisitiri wa Intebe utahe urwana wataha wubaka .
Uko gukunda igihugu ni byo byanyoboye .
Ariko ubu , umurongo u Rwanda rwahawe kubera ubuyobozi bwiza , imiyoborere myiza na ibikorwa rumaze kugeraho , ni nde se utakwishimira kuza ahubwo kuba mu Rwanda ?
Njye ndi Umudepite muri East African Community iyo tuvuganye na bagenzi bacu ba Abadepite baba abo muri Kenya , Tanzania na Abagande , iyo bageze hano mu Rwanda barareba bakumirwa .
Baravuga bati ni agahugu ka i Burayi bateruye baraza bagashyira muri Afurika .
Ubwo se iryo shema urumva utaryishimira ?
Kandi rero nta muntu na umwe ukunda iki gihugu , ukunda u Rwanda wakumva ko aho rugeze yakumva ko rukwiye gusubira inyuma .
Ntabwo bishoboka , nta wabyemera kuko twe twishimira kuba Abanyarwanda .
Kubera uko u Rwanda , ruteye , ruyobowe , ibyo rumaze kugeraho , ubuyobozi rufite , wumva utakwishimira ko [ . . . ] utanatekereza ko rukwiye gusubira inyuma .
Uyu munsi u Rwanda wifuza ni urumeze rute ?
U Rwanda nifuza ni uru Rwanda ndimo kandi nkumva ko rukwiye gukomeza rugatera imbere kandi urwo nifuza ntabwo ari urwo bazampa , oya , ni urwo nzafatanya na abandi kubaka .
Tukajya inama tukavuga ngo turashaka kugera aha , tukahagera .
Ntabwo ari u Rwanda rwa impanuka , ni u Rwanda tugomba kubaka tukagera aho dushaka .
Mu 1994 ndi Minisitiri nta telefone yabagaho , twakoreshaga ibyombo , nta mishahara twahembwaga , twahaga abarimu ibishyimbo , akawunga , umuceri na ibindi kugira ngo abantu bongere batangire ibikorwa bundi bushya .
Ariko uko turiho ubu na uko turiho , wabigereranya se na icyo gihe ?
Ntabwo rero hari na uwakwifuza ko byongera gusubira inyuma .
Cyera wajyaga hanze Umunyarwanda bakagufata nka umwicanyi ariko ubu ugera hanze wavuga ko uri Umunyarwanda bati ba bantu batekereza neza , ba bantu ba abakozi , igihugu kiri ku murongo , gifite isuku , . . .
Ibyo rero tubikesha ubuyobozi bwiza , tubikesha Intore izirusha intambwe , kuba turi mu Itorero , tugatozwa , tukareba , tukagira ibyo dukunda tukabihitamo kandi tukabigeraho .
Ni nko kugereranya umuriro na ijuru - Rutaremara na Sheikh Harerimana ku Rwanda rwa 1994 na urwa 2021
Tariki ya 4 Nyakanga 1994 , ifite igisobanuro kinini ku kwibohora kwa Abanyarwanda .
Abato kuri ubu babona ibishashagirana , bashobora kwibwira ko ariko byahoze .
Ni aha inararibonye muri Politiki zabashije kubona u Rwanda rwa mbere ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , urwo muri Jenoside na urwa nyuma ya aho ari narwo gusa hafi 60 % bya Abanyarwanda bazi .
Impuguke muri Politiki akaba na Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Urwego rwa Igihugu Ngishwanama rwa Inararibonye , Tito Rutaremara yavuze ko ubwo urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda rwarangiraga uretse kuba abantu bari barishwe , ibindi bintu birimo ibikorwa remezo byari byarasenywe .
Mu kiganiro cyihariye yagiranye na IGIHE , Rutaremara yagize ati " " " " Ibintu byose byari byarasenyutse , amazu , imihanda barayishwanyuje .
Sinzi icyo bayihoraga .
Ikindi cyari gitangaje umuntu yajyaga kwibaza ni uko mu mashuri , ari muri za Minisiteri , ari amazu wasangaga inzugi zitariho , intebe zidahari , utubati ntatwo , ukabona amadirishya ya ibyuma ariko wabona aya ibiti ugasanga nta yariho . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Twaje kugenda tubimenya .
Muri icyo gihe cyose birirwaga bajya kwica , babonaga amatungo , inyamanswa , imiceri na ibindi basahuye na iki byose bakajya guteka kugira ngo ejo bazasubire ku kazi kabo .
Nta kindi rero ibyo bikoresho nibyo batekeshaga . " " " "
Rutaremara yavuze ko na nyuma ya urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu ubwo hashyirwagaho ubuyobozi bushya , hari hasigaye ikibazo cyo kubona aho gukorera kuko Leta yakoze Jenoside yari yarasenye ibintu byose .
Ati " " " " Ni na cyo cyatumye leta itangiye bwa mbere abantu bagiye bajya gushaka udutebe , intebe zose mu mashuri na ahandi wasangaga barazitwaye barazitekeshaga kugira ngo babone uko bazasubira kwica . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Ni na cyo twibazaga tuti " " " " ese ko dufashe igihugu mwo kabyara mwe turabigenza gute ? " " " "
Dusanga ariko BNR ifunze [ . . . ] wenda na amafaranga arimo cyangwa ibindi , izo za banki wenda na BCR yari ifunze ariko izindi zose zari zifunguye byose byari byasamye .
Nyuma twaje kumenya impamvu yabyo . " " " "
Ni ukuva mu muriro tujya mu ijuru !
Ubwo urugamba rwa amasasu rwo kubohora igihugu rwari rurangiye , hakurikiyeho urugendo rwo Kwibohora bya nyabyo , rugana ku cyerekezo cyo kugira u Rwanda rutarangwamo ubukene , rurimo ubumwe , rufite ibikorwaremezo byorohereza abaturage kugera ku bukire .
Umwe mu bagize Urwego Ngishwanama rwa Inararibonye , Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana , yabwiye IGIHE ko bya umwihariko Ukwibohora kwa Abanyarwanda gusobanuye byinshi ku gihugu muri rusange .
Sheikh Harerimana wanabaye Umujyanama wa Perezida Kagame , avuga ko bya umwihariko tariki ya 4 Nyakanga 1994 , ari umunsi usobanuye byinshi ku Banyarwanda kuko ariwo munsi batangiye gukora bashaka iterambere rirambye kandi bizeye ko ntacyo bazaba .
Yavuze ko FPR Inkotanyi ijya gutegura urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda , hari impamvu nyamukuru zari zigenderewe zirimo ubumwe bwa abanyarwanda , guca ubuhunzi na izindi mpamvu zibutera , iterambere rya abanyarwanda bose na ibindi byinshi kandi kuri ubu byamaze kugerwaho .
Ati " " " " Ni ibyo kwishimira rero uyu munsi ibyo byose byagezweho , urebye iterambere rirambye Abanyarwanda bamaze kugeraho ukareba ububanyi na amahanga , imibereho myiza na ibindi byagezweho kandi na ibitaragerwaho hari icyizere .
Numva rero ivuka rya FPR Inkotanyi ryaraziye igihe . " " " "
Rutaremara we yavuze ko kugereranya u Rwanda rwa mbere ya tariki 4 Nyakanga 1994 , na urw uyu munsi ari nko kuva mu muriro ujya mu Ijuru .
Ati " " " " Reka nkoreshe imvugo abantu bose bazi , ni nko kuva mu muriro ujya mu Ijuru .
Ubu turi mu ijuru , icyo gihe abantu bari mu muriro .
Mu buryo ubwo aribwo bwose , urebye uko abantu ba abagome bari bakiri aho , icyo gihe abantu barebaga uko igihugu kimeze cyarashwanyaguritse . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Urumva ko harimo ibibi nka ibyo mu muriro .
Ku rundi ruhande ariko hari hari icyizere cya uko wenda ubwo FPR Inkotanyi yari itsinze , ibintu bigiye kujya mu buryo ariko ubundi cyari nko kuva mu cyubo ujya ahantu heza .
Ni nko gufata ikimoteri cya Nduba , ukagereranya na Kigali Convention Centre .
Ni ibintu bidashobora guhura . " " " "
Yavuze ko uyu munsi u Rwanda rumeze neza ariko urugamba rwo kwibohora rutarangiye kuko hagezeweho urwa iterambere kandi na rwo rukomeye cyane .
Ati " " " " Icya mbere Kwibohora ni inzira ndende kuko iyo utangiye kwibohora uba ugomba kubohora igihugu cyawe muri byose , iyo nzira iba ifite igice cyayo nka icyo gushaka ibitekerezo , icyo kurwana intambara , gukuraho igitugu .
Rero iyo wakuyeho igitugu ari na cyo cyabohaga abantu , uba ufite ububasha bwo gutangira kubohora abantu za ngoyi babashyiragaho . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Hari ikindi gice rero cyo gusana no kongera kubaka igihugu bundi bushya , kubaka inzego ndetse noneho muri rusange hari ahantu tugeze aho umuntu aba afite ibimutunga , aba yumva umwana we yakwiga , umwana we yakwivuza , akaba yabika udufaranga na ibindi .
Ubu rero twinjiye mu cyerekezo cya 2050 , cyo kubaka ubukungu bwacu ngo bugere ku kigero nka ikibihugu byateye imbere . " " " "
Kurangara ka urubyiruko byaba ari icyaha gikomeye cyane
Abateguye urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu bari bato ndetse na uwari uruyoboye Paul Kagame , ubwo rwarangiraga ku wa 4 Nyakanga 1994 , yari afite imyaka 36 gusa .
Ni ibintu inararibonye muri politiki zisanga bikwiye kuba umukoro ukomeye ku bakiri bato ba uyu munsi .
Sheikh Harerimana avuga ko urubyiruko rwa uyu munsi rukwiye kumenya ko arirwo rufite inshingano zo kubaka igihugu ku buryo kurangara byaba ari ukwikorera icyaha gikomeye .
Ati " " " " Abakiri bato ni ukubakangurira ko ibyubatswe bitagomba gusenywa barebera kandi aho amatafari ageze ababyeyi babo bubaka na bo bafite inshingano zo kongeraho andi matafari , igihugu kirubakwa kandi kizubakwa na bose . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Icyo gihe rero urubyiruko nirurangara rukagira ngo u Rwanda ni uku rwari rumeze , byaba ari icyaha gikomeye barimo kwikorera kandi bakorera na abazabakomokaho .
Bakomeze rero bakore kandi babitoze na abazabakomokaho . " " " "
Rutaremara we yagize ati " " " " Abenshi muri twe ntabwo tuzaba tukiriho muri icyo cyerekezo 2050 , hari urubyiruko nirwo ruzaba ruhari .
Turabasaba ko babimenya bakabiharanira kuko bafite igihugu cyiza , bariga neza , bigishwa kuyobora na andi mahirwe ya ngombwa atuma babaho neza . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Uretse no kugira ibyo byose , banashyirwa mu buyobozi guhera hasi , ntabwo babigisha ubuyobozi ahubwo babushyirwamo guhera hasi ku Isibo kugera mu Nteko no muri Guverinoma .
Urumva ko rurimo rwiga kuyobora kandi nirwo ruzaba ruyobora mu minsi iri imbere .
Bafite imbaraga , bafite leta ibakunda , yabakinguriye amarembo , urumva ko izo mbaraga zabo nizo zizatugeza hariya . " " " "
Kwizihiza Kwibohora ku nshuro ya 27 bisanze u Rwanda rwarateye imbere mu nzego zose nka ubukungu , imibereho myiza , ibikorwa remezo na ibindi .
Perezida Kagame yakiriye intumwa yihariye ya Perezida wa Mali .
Perezida Kagame yakiriye Minisitiri Amb Abdoulaye kuri iki Cyumweru Tarik 4 Nyakanga 2021 , bagirana ibiganiro ndetse anamugezaho ubutumwa bwa mugenzi we wa Mali , Colonel Assimi Goïta .
Ibiro bya Umukuru wa Igihugu , Village Urugwiro byatangaje ko " " " " Perezida Kagame yakiriye Amb Abdoulaye , uri mu Rwanda nka Intumwa yihariye yazanye ubutumwa bwa Col Assimi , Perezida wa inzibacyuho muri Mali . " " " "
Muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka nibwo Colonel Assimi Goita yagiye ku butegetsi ahiritse Perezida wa inzibacyuho Bah Ndaw
Mu kiganiro Perezida Kagame yagiranye na TV5 Monde muri uko kwezi , yabajijwe icyo avuga kuri iryo hirikwa rya ubutegetsi .
Yavuze ko icyangombwa abantu bagakwiriye kurebaho , ari umutekano wa abaturage na ububabare bari kunyuramo kubera ibyabaye , mbere yo kwamagana cyangwa kutamagana ihirikwa rya ubutegetsi .
Ati " " " " Ntabwo ntekereza ko umuyobozi uwo ari we wese wo muri Afurika cyangwa se undi muturage wo muri Afurika yakwishimira umutekano muke nka uriya .
Abantu bavuga ku ihirikwa rya ubutegetsi , bakavuga ku bayobozi na ibindi ariko ikintu gikomeye gikwiriye kuduhangayikisha , ni ububabare abaturage bari kunyuramo kubera ibyo . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Ikibazo cyo kumenya byimbitse ngo ni ibiki byabaye , ni nde wabikoze ?
Ibyo abantu babivugaho ariko igikomeye ubu ni umutekano muke na ububabare bwa abaturage , ni bariya bantu batabona neza ejo hazaza .
Ni byiza ko twishyira mu mwanya wa abaturage ba Mali . " " " "
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ashyigikiye inzira yatangijwe na Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe yo kumvikanisha impande zitavuga rumwe muri Mali , umutekano na ituze rusange bikagaruka .
U Rwanda na Mali bifitanye imikoranire mu ngeri zitandukanye aho hari amasezerano byasinyanye ajyanye na ubwikorezi bukorerwa mu kirere yemerera indege zo muri ibi bihugu byombi gukoresha ibibuga mpuzamahanga byabyo .
Ubutumwa butandukanye amahanga yageneye u Rwanda ku munsi wa Ubwigenge
Minisitiri wa Intebe wa Qatar , Sheikh Tamim Bin Hamad Al Thani , unashinzwe Ububanyi na Amahanga na Ubutwererane , bifurije u Rwanda umunsi mwiza wa Ubwigenge ndetse banashimira Perezida Paul Kagame na Minisitri wa Intebe wa u Rwanda , Ngirente Édouard .
Ni mu butumwa bugira buti " " " " Nyakubahwa Minisitiri wa Intebe wa Qatar akaba na Minisitiri wa Ububanyi na Amahanga na Ubutwererane yashimiye Nyakubahwa Minisitiri wa Intebe wa u Rwanda ku munsi igihugu cye cyaboneyeho ubwigenge " " " "
Minisitiri wa Ububanyi na Amahanga wa Maldives , Abdulla Shahid na we yifurije umunsi mwiza wa Ubwigenge mugenzi we wa u Rwanda , Minisitiri Vincent Biruta na Abanyarwanda muri muri rusange , anashimangira ko bazakomeza kubaka umubano mwiza hagati ya ibihugu byombi .
Ati " " " " Ndashimira Minisitiri wa Ububanyi na Amahanga , Vincent Biruta na abaturage ba u Rwanda kuri uyu munsi mwiza bizihiza Ubwigenge .
Twizeye ko tuzakomeza gushimangira umubano mwiza hagati ya Maldives na u Rwanda . " " " "
Minisiteri ya Ububanyi na Amahanga ya Ukraine na yo yanyujije ubutumwa bushimira u Rwanda ku munsi warwo wa Ubwigenge ku rubuga rwa Twitter .
Yagize iti " " " " Turashimira cyane abaturage ba inshuti zacu ba u Rwanda na bagenzi bacu bo muri Minisiteri ya Ubabanyi na Amahanga kuri uyu munsi bizihizaho Umunsi wa Ubwigenge .
Turabifuriza amahoro , umutekano ndetse na ubukire !
Twizeye ko tuzakomeza kubaka umubano mwiza hagati ya ibihugu byacu ku nyungu za abaturage bacu . " " " "
Malaysia na yo yoherereje u Rwanda ubutumwa bwo kurwifuriza isabukuru nziza ku munsi wa Ubwigenge , ibinyujijie muri Minisiteri yayo ya Ububanyi na amahanga yitwa Wisma Putra .
Bagize bati " " " " Wisma Putra irashimira cyane Repubulika ya u Rwanda kuri uyu munsi mwiza yizihizaho imyaka 59 imaze ibonye Ubwigenge .
Malaysia na u Rwanda byubatse umubano wabyo mu 2005 , Ambasade ya Malaysia muri Kenya ni yo ifite izo nshingano [ zo gukurikirana umubano wa ibihugu byombi . ] " " " "
Minisiteri ya Ububanyi na Amahanga ya Ubwami bwa Bahrain yagize iti " " " " Turashimira Repubulika ya u Rwanda kuri uyu munsi yizihizaho ubwigenge . " " " "
Ni mu gihe Ambasade ya Finland muri Tanzania ariko inahagarariye iki gihugu mu Rwanda yaruhaye ubutumwa bugira buti " " " " Embasade ya Finland muri Dar es Salaam irifuriza u Rwanda Isabukuru Nziza ya imyaka 59 rumaze rubonye ubwigenge . " " " "
Ishami rya Umuryango wa Abibumbye rikorera muri Lithuania na ryo ryifurije u Rwanda ibyiza .
Riti " " " " Turifuriza abaturage ba Repubulika ya u Rwanda umunsi mwiza , ubwo bishimira umunsi babonyeho ubwigenge .
Turifuriza u Rwanda rwose umunsi mwiza wa Ubwigenge . " " " "
Ku rundi ruhande Umuryango wa Ibihugu bya Afurika ya Iburasirazuba , EAC wagize uti " " " " Turifuriza guverinoma na abaturage ba u Rwanda umunsi mwiza bizihizaho imyaka 59 bamaze babonye ubwigenge .
Umunsi Mwiza wa Ubwigenge Rwanda ! " " " "
U Rwanda rwizihije umunsi wa Ubwigenge hamwe na igihugu cya u Burundi ndetse na Somalia , aho ibi bihugu byose byavuye mu maboko ya Abakoloni ku itariki ya 01 Nyakanga 1962 .
Ibya ingenzi byagize u Bushinwa igihangange burangajwe imbere na Ishyaka CPC rimaze imyaka 100 ( Amafoto ) .
Muri make , ubukungu bwa u Bushinwa icyo gihe bwanganaga na ubwa Hong Kong kuri ubu , imwe mu duce tugengwa na u Bushinwa .
Ni agace gafite umusaruro mbumbe wa miliyari za amadolari zisaga gato 360 .
Nubwo Isi yugarijwe na Covid - 19 , ibirori mu Bushinwa birarimbanyije bishimira imyaka 100 ishize ishyaka rya rubanda , The Communist Party of China ( CPC ) , rishinzwe ari na ryo ryagize uruhare mu kuzana izo mpinduka zose zituma u Bushinwa buri ku mwanya wa kabiri mu bihugu bikize cyane ku Isi , nta muturage wabwo na umwe ukibarizwa munsi
ya umurongo wa ubukene .
Ishyaka CPC ryashinzwe muri Nyakanga 1921 , rishingwa na abantu 13 bari baje bahagarariye abandi 50 mu gihugu hose , bafite intego yo gutangiza impinduramatwara na urugamba byamaze imyaka 28 bigasiga bihiritse ubutegetsi bwa igitugu bwa Aba - Kuomintang ( KMT ) .
Rya shyaka ryatangijwe na abantu 50 , ubu ni ryo rinini ku Isi rifite abayoboke benshi basaga miliyoni 95 , rifite agahigo ko gutangiza ingamba zatumye mu myaka 30 ishize , abantu basaga miliyoni 700 baravuye mu bukene bukabije .
Ni ishyaka ryaje rishyize imbere abaturage nka uko biri mu mazina yaryo , bikanagaragarira mu mazina igihugu cyahawe rimaze kujya ku butegetsi mu 1949 , Repubulika ya Rubanda ya u Bushinwa ( Peoplea s Republic of China ) .
U Bushinwa bushya bwisanze mu gihe kibi , Isi iri mu bibazo byasizwe na Intambara ya Kabiri ya Isi yose .
Cyari igihugu kikishakisha , hafi kimwe cya kabiri cya abagituye bari mu bukene bukabije , ibikorwa remezo ari iyanga na ibindi .
Isi yakurikiwe na ibihe bibi bya Intambara ya Ubutita , u Bushinwa bufatwa mu murongo wa Aba - Communistes bari bahanganye na Aba - Capitalistes bo mu Burengerazuba bwa Isi .
Kubera ingufu Abanya - Burayi na Abanyamerika bari bafite , u Bushinwa ntibwagize ababureba neza benshi , ibihugu byinshi byakoranaga na bwo byikandagira .
Nta mukene rwimbi usigaye mu Bushinwa
Mu gihe byinshi mu bihugu ku Isi bigowe no kugera kuri imwe mu nkingi za umuryango wa abibumbye zigamije iterambere rirambye ( SDGs ) , yo kuba ubukene bukabije bwaranduwe mu 2030 , u Bushinwa bwo bwabigezeho mbere ya imyaka icumi .
Mu mpera za 2020 , u Bushinwa bwakoze ibyo benshi basanga bidasanzwe ubwo bwaranduraga burundu ubukene bukabije mu baturage babwo .
Miliyoni zisaga 98 za abaturage bavuye mu bukene bukabije mu myaka icumi gusa , ubaze neza ni nka abatuye Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo bose , cyangwa se inshuro icyenda abatuye u Rwanda .
Mu mwaka wa 1990 , 61 % bya abaturage ba u Bushinwa babaga munsi ya umurongo wa ubukene .
Byageze mu 2002 ubukene mu Bushinwa bugeze kuri 33 % .
Mu mwaka wa 2015 , abaturage 4 % mu Bushinwa ni bo bari basigaye mu bukene .
Mu myaka itarenze 30 gusa , miliyoni 700 za abatuye u Bushinwa zakuwe mu bukene .
Ni ibintu bitigeze biba ahandi ku Isi kandi byose byakozwe ku ngamba zagiye zifatirwa mu buyobozi bwa Ishyaka CPC nka moteri ya Guverinoma ya u Bushinwa .
Uku gutera imbere gukomeye ka u Bushinwa kwatewe na ingamba Leta yashyizeho zigamije kuzamura abatuye mu bice bya icyaro byari byiganjemo ubukene bukabije .
Abaturage benshi bimuwe mu bice bari batuyemo bashyirwa mu midugudu igezweho ibonekamo amahirwe ya imirimo na ubuzima bwiza .
Ubukungu bwazamukanye na imibereho myiza
Umushinwa wo mu 1949 , iyo yuzuzaga imyaka 35 byabaga bidasanzwe , muri make yabaga ari umurame .
Byaterwaga na impamvu zitandukanye zirimo ubukene , intambara za hato na hato zahoraga muri icyo gihugu na ibindi .
Kuri ubu icyizere cyo kubaho ku Mushinwa kiri ku myaka 77 .
Ubwo bwiyongere bwa icyizere cyo kubaho bwaturutse ku ngamba zirimo kongera ishoramari , ibikorwa remezo na ibindi .
Kuri ubu , abantu batuye mu mijyi yo mu Bushinwa bafite akazi bavuye kuri miliyoni 15 bari bariho mu 1949 , ubu bageze kuri miliyoni zisaga 435 .
Iki gihugu mu 1949 cyari gifite imijyi myiza 132 ariko ubu igeze kuri 670 .
Uburezi ni imwe mu nkingi yatejwe imbere cyane muri icyo gihugu gituwe na miliyari 1 . 4 .
Imibare igaragaza ko 99 . 95 bya abana bageze igihe cyo kwiga amashuri abanza bayiga nta nkomyi , mu gihe 48 % bya abagomba kuba biga Kaminuza bayiga .
Umusaruro mbumbe wa u Bushinwa ubu ugeze kuri miliyari ibihumbi 14 . 3 za amadolari , uvuye kuri miliyari $ 360 mu 1990 .
Ni ubwa kabiri kuri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zifite umusaruro mbumbe wa miliyari ibihumbi 21 za amadolari .
Ubukungu bwa iki gihugu bwarushijeho gutumbagira mu 2001 ubwo u Bushinwa bwinjiraga mu Muryango Mpuzamhanga wa Ubucuruzi ( World Trade Oraganisation ) .
Kwinjiramo byabuhaye amahirwe yo gukomorerwa kwa ibicuruzwa byabwo mu ruhando mpuzamahanga , gukwirakwira kwa ishoramari ryabwo mu mahanga na ibindi .
Agaciro ka ibyo u Bushinwa bwoherezaga na ibyo bwavanaga mu mahanga mu 1950 kabarirwaga miliyari 1 . 13 za amadolari , nyamara mu 2018 byari bigeze kuri miliyari 4600 za amadolari .
Igihugu cya mbere gifite imihanda myinshi ya gari ya moshi igezweho
Mu gihe urujya na uruza rwa abantu rudashoboka ngo ubucuruzi busagambe , nta gihugu cyarota iterambere .
Imihanda myiza ni imwe muri moteri ya iterambere ryihuse , ni yo mpamvu ahanyujijwe kaburimbo mu bihugu byacu bya Afurika , agaciro ka ikibanza kiwegereye kazamuka bitajenjetse , ubucuruzi bunini na ubuciriritse bikahaza .
Guhera mu kinyejana cya 21 , u Bushinwa bwashyize imbaraga mu kuvana mu bwigunge ibice byabwo bitandukanye , bwubaka imihanda igezweho ya gari ya moshi zihuta ( high - speed railway ) .
Mu mwaka wa 2000 , nta muhanda wa gari ya moshi yihuta ( high - speed railway ) na umwe u Bushinwa bwagiraga .
Gari ya moshi zahakoraga inyinshi zari iza kera zishaje zimwe zicumba umwotsi , zangiza ibidukikje ku buryo washoboraga kuva mu ntara imwe ujya mu yindi , bikagutwara iminsi na iminsi .
Inkuru yarahindutse , ubu u Bushinwa ni cyo gihugu cya mbere ku Isi gifite imihanda myinshi ya gari ya moshi zihuta .
Iyo mihanda ibarirwa ibilometero nibura 37 . 900 .
Kimwe cya kabiri cya iyi mihanda cyubatswe mu myaka itanu ishize .
Icyerekezo cya u Bushinwa ni ukuba bwubatse nibura ibilometero 70 . 000 bitarenze umwaka wa 2035 .
Myinshi muri iyo mihanda gari ya moshi zikoresha umuvudulo wa kilometero 350 ku isaha .
Mu mwaka wa 2020 , ibice 75 % bya imijyi yo mu Bushinwa byari byaragejejwemo imihanda ya gari ya moshi yihuta .
U Bushinwa ni cyo gihugu cyonyine ku Isi cyabashije kugera ku iterambere rihambaye mu bijyanye na gari yamoshi zihuta kuko nka u Bwongereza bufite kilometero 107 gusa mu gihe nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zifatwa nka igihugu cya mbere gikize ku Isi , gifite umuhanda umwe wa gari ya moshi yihuta kandi nawo izinyuramo zigendera ku
muvuduko wa kilometero 240 ku isaha , bivuze ko gariyamoshi zo mu Bushinwa ziri imbere ho ibilometero 100 kandi ari na nyinshi birenze .
Muri uku kwezi , u Bushinwa bwashyize hanze ubwoko bushya bwa gari ya moshi yihuta ( bullet train ) ikoresha amashanyarazi gusa .
Ni ukuvuga ko ntaho ihuriye na zimwe za kera zakoreshaga amakara , izikoresha ibikomoka kuri peteroli na ibindi byangiza ibidukukije .
Ni cyo gihugu cya mbere ku isi cyabashije kubigeraho .
Iyo gari ya moshi nshya ya amashanyarazi ishobora kugendera ku muvuduko wa kilometero 160 ku isaha .
Ni ukuvuga ko ihagurutse i Kigali saa Mbili za mu gitondo , saa Mbili na iminota 50 yaba yageze i Rubavu mu ntera ya ibilometero 148 .
Igisirikare kiyingayinga icya Amerika
Iterambere ryose rituruka ku mutekano , ni yo mpamvu u Bushinwa bwashyize imbaraga nyinshi mu kubaka inzego zabwo za umutekano bya umwihariko igisirikare cyizwi nka icya rubanda , Peoplea s Liberation Army ( PLA ) .
Ibyo bigaragarira mu ngengo ya imari igisirikare gikoresha yiyongereye mu myaka ishize .
Igisirikare cya u Bushinwa kandi cyiza mu bya mbere bikoresha ikoranabuhanga cyane cyane imashini zikoresha ubwenge bwa ubukorano ( AI ) , misile zishobora gushwanyaguza ubwato bwa intambara mu gihe gito ( anti - ship ballistic missiles ) na ibindi .
Nko kugeza mu 2018 , igisirikare cya u Bushinwa cyazaga ku mwanya wa kabiri mu gukoresha amafaranga menshi ku mwaka kuko cyakoreshaga nibura miliyari 239 za amadolari , gikurikiye icya Amerika gikoresha miliyari 634 ku mwaka nkuko byatangajwe na Stockholm International Peace Research Institute ( SIPRI ) .
Ni inyongera ikomeye kuko mu 1998 , Igisirikare cya u Bushinwa cyakoreshaga ku mwaka ingengo ya imari ya miliyari 38 za amadolari .
Iki gisirikare kandi cyongereye ubushobozi bwacyo mu bijyanye na ubwirinzi mu kirere , indege za intambara kandi zikomeye ndetse na drones za ikoreshwa mu butasi .
Mu 2015 , Ikigo cya Abanyamerika RAND Corporation cyatangaje ko nibura kimwe cya kabiri cya indege za intambara u Bushinwa butunze ari izigezweho .
ki gisirikare bivugwa ko gifite ibisasu bishobora kuraswa bikagera ku bwato bwa intambara bwa Amerika buherereye mu Burengerazuba bwa Inyanja ya Pacifique .
U Bushinwa buri gukora misile zihuta cyane ku kigero gisumba cyane umuvuduko wa ijwi ku buryo byagora umwanzi kubona umwanya wo kwitegura guhangana nabyo mu gihe byaba birashwe .
U Burusiya ni bwo bwonyine bwari butunze ubwo bwoko bwa ibisasu buzwi nka Hypersonic Missiles .
Mu myaka yatambutse , igisirikare cya u Bushinwa cyakoreshaga nyinshi mu ntwaro zakorewe mu Burusiya ariko ubu byarahindutse , inyinshi zikorerwa mu nganda za imbere mu gihugu .
Igisirikare cyateje imbere umubano na Kaminuza zikomeye ku buryo ikorwa rya intwaro mu Bushinwa rihorana udushya mu ikoranabuhanga .
Raporo ya SIPRI yo mu 2020 , ivuga ko u Bushinwa bushobora kuba buri ku mwanya wa kabiri mu gukora intwaro nyinshi ku isi , nyinshi muri izo zikagurishwa mu bihugu biri mu nzira ya Amajyambere .
Mu mwaka wa 2017 , Perezida wa u Bushinwa Xi Jinping yatangaje ko igisirikare cya igihugu cye gifite intego yo kuba ari intangarugero mu mwaka wa 2049 .
Ibihugu bikize byarakangaranye
Amagambo make , ibikorwa byinshi ni wo murongo u Bushinwa bufite .
Kubera guceceka cyane , akenshi ibihugu bikomeye byisanga icyo gihugu cyageze ku bintu bidasanzwe ku buryo hari impungenge ko bishobora kwisanga byanyuzweho mu nzego zose .
U Bushinwa burajwe ishinga no kurushaho gufungura imiryango binyuze mu bufatanye mpuzamahanga , ahanini mu bihugu bikiri mu nzira ya amajyambere , bigakorwa muri politiki itari iya gikoloni ahubwo ishingiye ku bwubahane
Iki gihugu mu 2013 cyatangije umushinga wo kubaka ibikorwa remezo bihuza imigabane yose ya Isi , umushinga wiswe Belt and Road Initiative .
Muri uyu mushinga , u Bushinwa bwiyemeje gutanga inkunga mu kubaka ibikorwa
remezo birimo imihanda ya gariyamoshi , ibyambu , imirongo migari ya internet , itumanaho , imihanda na ibindi bituma imigenderanire na urujya na uruza byoroha mu batuye isi .
Uyu mushinga ureba cyane ibihugu bikiri mu nzira ya amajyambere .
Numara kujya mu bikorwa , uzasiga iki gihugu kiri ku mwanya wa mbere ku Isi mu bukungu byongere na ijambo ryabwo mu ruhando mpuzamahanga .
Biteganyijwe ko uyu mushinga uzahuza kimwe cya kabiri cya abatuye Isi , byongere amahirwe ya ishoramari na ubucuruzi .
Ibihugu bisaga ijana byamaze gusinyana amasezerano na u Bushinwa muri uwo mushinga .
Ibihugu birimo ibya i Burayi na Amerika byatangiye kureba ikijisho u Bushinwa kubera uwo mushinga ushobora gusiga nta jambo bigifite mu bukungu no mu buryo bwa politiki .
Mu nama iherutse yahuje ibihugu bikize ku Isi ( G7 ) , byarwanyije cyane u Bushinwa ndetse bitangiza undi mushinga wo kubaka ibikorwa remezo bihuza isi mu guca intege uwa u Bushinwa .
Mu gihe umuvuduko u Bushinwa buriho mu iterambere waba ukomeje , iki gihugu biteganyijwe ko mu 2030 kizaba ari icya mbere gikize ku Isi na umutungo wa miliyari ibihumbi 38 za amadolari .
Buzaba bukurikirwa na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na miliyari ibihumbi 23 za amadolari , u Buhinde buri ku mwanya wa gatatu .
Amb . Karega yahawe igihembo cya ibikorwa bya indashyikirwa .
Iki gihembo yagishyikirijwe kuri uyu wa 1 Nyakanga 2021 .
Mu mpamvu zatumye iki kigo kimugenera igihembo harimo kuba bya umwihariko yaragaragaje ubushobozi na ibikorwa bya ingirakamaro haba mu rwego rwa politiki , dipolomasi , ubuyobozi na ibindi bya kimuntu .
Nka uko bigaragara kuri iki gihembo mu magambo yanditseho , ikigo Panorama cyasobanuye ko Karega yagize uruhare mu gushimangira umubano muri dipolomasi ya ibihugu byombi , amateka na ubufatanye bwa abaturage ba ibihugu byombi .
Mu butumwa yanyujije kuri Twitter , Ambasaderi Karega yavuze ko yatunguwe kandi ko yishimiye iki gihembo na uburyo yazirikanwe na iki kigo .
Ahawe iki gihembo mu gihe muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka bamwe mu bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga na ibinyamakuru muri RDC bamwibasiye bamushinja ubugizi bwa nabi .
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Ikinyamakuru cyitwa Business et Finances cyo muri RDC , Karega yavuze ko byari ibihuha bidafite ishingiro byakwirakwijwe na abafite inyungu atazi izo ari zo .
Ambasaderi Vincent Karega amaze umwaka urengaho amezi make ahagarariye u Rwanda muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo , inshingano nka izi akaba yarazibayemo no muri Afurika ya Epfo .
RDC ni cyo gihugu yavukiyemo anagikuriramo kuko ababyeyi be bafite inkomoko mu Rwanda ari ho bari batuye akaba yarahavuye afite imyaka 27 agaruka mu Rwanda mu 1995 avuye muri Afurika ya Epfo aho yari atuye nka umwenegihugu wa Zaïre ya icyo gihe .
Avuga adategwa indimi eshatu zikoreshwa muri Congo zirimo Igifaransa , Igiswahili na Ilingala naho igi - Tshiluba na Ikikongo akazivuga mu buryo bworoheje .
Impaka muri Loni ubwo u Rwanda na u Burundi byangaga kumvira amahanga ngo bibe igihugu kimwe .
Imyaka 59 irashize ibihugu byombi bibonye ubwigenge , bwabanjirijwe na imyaka ibiri ya inkundura bisaba kuva mu maboko ya u Bubiligi , Umuryango wa Abibumbye ukabanza kubisaba kwihuza kugira ngo bitazawurushya .
Mu 1960 Congo ikimara kubona ubwigenge , nibwo u Burundi na u Rwanda byari bimaze imyaka ari indagizo Loni yahaye u Bubiligi , byihutishije umushinga wo kwigenga kwabyo .
Ni inkundura yari irimbanyije no mu bindi bihugu byinshi bya Afurika nyuma ya imyaka ya ubukoloni .
Bya umwihariko mu Rwanda , hari hari ibibazo bikomeye na imvururu zaterwaga na amashyaka ya Abahutu yari ashyigikiwe na u Bubiligi yari amaze iminsi ahiritse ubwami akanirukana umwami mu gihugu , ikibazo Loni yizeho bikarangira ikiburiye umwanzuro .
Kwihutisha uwo mushinga wa ubwigenge ku ruhande rwa u Rwanda , raporo za Loni muri iyo myaka zigaragaza ko byari uburyo bwo gushyira igitutu kuri Loni ngo yemere ubutegetsi bushya bwari buherutse gushyirwaho na Parmehutu ya Grégoire Kayibanda , bityo mu maso ya amahanga u Rwanda rugaragare nka Repubulika , ikibazo cya ubwami na Umwami
kiburizwemo .
Umwaka wa 1962 , ibiganiro bigamije guha ubwigenge u Rwanda na u Burundi byafashe indi ntera .
Inteko rusange ya Loni yateranye tariki 23 Gashyantare 1962 yafashe imyanzuro itandukanye ku kibazo cya u Rwanda na u Burundi kugira ngo bibashe kubona ubwigenge .
Loni yatoye ko kugira ngo " " " " ejo hazaza ha u Rwanda harambirije mu kwihuza nka igihugu kimwe gihuje ubukungu , igisirikare na ububanyi na amahanga ariko ntibivaneho ubuzima gatozi bwa buri kimwe nka u Rwanda na u Burundi . " " " "
Icyo gihe Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Loni yasabwe gushyiraho Komisiyo igamije gufasha mu guhuza impande zitavuga rumwe haba mu Rwanda na u Burundi , gukurikirana iyubahirizwa rya uburenganzira bwa muntu na ubwo gutanga ibitekerezo , iyubahirizwa rya umutekano na amategeko , gutegura uko ibihugu byagira igisirikare na inzego
zabyo zishinzwe umutekano , gukurikirana itahuka rya impunzi na ibindi .
Hasabwe ko iyo Komisiyo itegura mu maguru mashya inama ikabera Addis Abeba u Rwanda na u Burundi bigahararirwa na abantu batanu kuri buri ruhande , bakigira hamwe uburyo ibihugu byombi byakwihuza bikavamo kimwe kizahabwa ubwigenge .
Byari bigiye kwihuza na Congo cyangwa Tanganyika
Ibihugu bihuriye mu muryango Commonwealth , ibya Aziya na Afurika byari bishyigikiye ko u Rwanda na u Burundi biba igihugu kimwe .
Ikibazo gikomeye ibyo bihugu byagaragazaga ku gutandukana ka u Rwanda na u Burundi , ni uburyo ari ibihugu bikennye , bitagira abakozi ba inzobere , abasirikare na abapolisi babyo bwite ku buryo gutatanya imbaraga byari kuba ikibazo gikomeye .
Amahanga na Loni ngo byari kuyagora kujya abona amafaranga yo guha buri gihugu nka inkunga .
Ibaruwa Canada yandikiye umunyamabanga wungirije wa Loni ushinzwe ububanyi na amahanga ku wa 24 Mutarama 1962 , ivuga ko kuba nta bukungu buri gihugu cyari gifite buhagije , na byo babibonaga nka ikibazo ngo buri kimwe kizabashe kwibeshaho .
Canada yumvaga ko kuba u Rwanda na u Burundi byaba igihugu kimwe bizoroshya imikoreshereze ya ingengo ya imari .
Canada yavuze ko iyo muri Congo haba hatarabayeyo imvururu , ngo baba barashyize igitutu ku Rwanda na u Burundi bikemera kwihuza na yo bikaba igihugu kimwe gifatika .
Icyo ntabwo cyari kigishobotse kuko Congo itari ikigaragara nka iyo kwizerwa kubera imvururu zabaye hicwa Abasirikare ba Ababiligi byanihutishije gahunda yayo yo kubona ubwigenge .
IKindi ni uko na Congo ubwayo yari yatangiye gucikamo ibice .
Muri raporo za Loni , ntabwo hagaragazwa neza icyo u Rwanda na u Burundi byashingiragaho byanga kwihuza , icyakora mu ibaruwa ya Canada , bigaragara ko hari ibindi bihugu byari byatangiye kwegera u Rwanda na u Burundi ngo bibe igihugu kimwe .
Hari amakuru ya uko Moïse Tshombe warwaniraga ukwigenga kwa Katanga yiyomoye kuri Congo , yaba yaregereye u Rwanda na u Burundi abyumvisha ko bazihuza bagakora igihugu kimwe gihuje u Rwanda na Katanga na u Burundi .
Ni ubusabe bwashobokaga kuko Katanga yabisabaga ari intara ikungahaye ku mutungo kamere .
Andi makuru yari aya uko Julius Nyerere yari yatangiye kwegera u Rwanda na u Burundi abisaba kwihuza na Tanganyika bikaba igihugu kimwe .
Tanganyika yari itarihuza na Zanzibar ngo bibyare Tanzania .
Canada yavuze ko yabiganiriyeho na u Bubiligi , bukagaragaza ko icyo cyifuzo cyaba ari cyiza kandi bazagishyigikira .
Byanavugwaga ko ibihugu byombi bishobora kwihuza na Uganda , Tanganyika na Kenya bigakora Leta ihuriweho ya East Africa .
Impamvu ibihugu byinshi bya Afurika byari bishyigikiye ko u Rwanda na u Burundi biba igihugu kimwe , ni uko mu buso byari ibihugu bito kandi bikennye ku buryo hashobora kujya hahoramo amakimbirane ashingiye ku bukene .
Ikindi ntabwo ibihugu bya Afurika byashakaga ko ikomeza gucikagurikamo uduce twinshi .
Bakekaga ko uko gucikamo ibice ka u Rwanda na u Burundi kwihishwe inyuma na u Bubuligi bwari bufitanye umubano mwiza na Guverinoma ya Parmehutu yariho mu Rwanda mu gihe ku ruhande rwa u Burundi Guverinoma ya Umwami Mwambutsa IV batacanaga uwaka .
Mu nteko rusange yo ku wa 9 Gashyantare 1962 , Minisitiri wa ububanyi na amahanga wa u Bubiligi yavuze ko bashyigikiye ugutandukana kwa ibihugu byombi .
Impamvu yatanze , ni uko ngo imyumvire ya abanyapolitiki mu bihugu byombi yari itandukanye bityo ko kubahatira kumvikana byaba " " " " ntaho bitaniye na ubundi bukoloni bari kwirukana . " " " "
Mu nama ya Commonwealth yabaye tariki 18 Mutarama , abari bahagarariye Australia barwanyije igitekerezo cyo gutandukana ka u Rwanda na u Burundi , basaba ko habaho uburyo bwo guhuza abayobozi ku mpande zombi bakabyumvikanaho uko byagenda kose .
Uwo munsi u Buhinde bwavuze ko byaba ari " " " " ishyano " " " " kwemera ko habaho uduhugu duto gutyo kandi mbere twari igihugu kimwe .
Nubwo amahanga yakomeje gushyira igitutu ku Rwanda na u Burundi ngo byemere kuba igihugu kimwe , abari bahagarariye ibihugu byombi ntibigeze babyemera .
Mu biganiro byahurije hamwe intumwa za ibihugu byombi na iza Komisiyo yari yashyizweho na Loni bikabera Addis Abeba muri Ethiopia , ibihugu byombi byakomeje gutsimbarara gusa bigaragara ko bizemera guhuza za gasutamo na ibijyanye na ubukungu .
Ntabwo mu myanzuro ya izo nama za Addis Abeba hagaragara neza icyashingirwagaho u Rwanda na u Burundi byanga kwihuza , icyakora imiyoborere ya buri kimwe ishobora kuba yarabigizemo uruhare .
U Burundi bwari mu maboko ya abatutsi mu gihe u Rwanda rwari mu maboko ya Abahutu .
Byari bigoye ku Bahutu mu Rwanda bari bari ku butegetsi nyuma ya iminsi mike bahiritse ubwami bashinjaga kubaheza ngo bemere kuyoborwa na Abatutsi bavuye mu Burundi .
Ikindi ku Burundi byari bigoye ko Umwami Mwambutsa na Leta ye bemera guhara ubutegetsi ngo babusigire Abahutu bo mu Rwanda .
Kugenda kwa ingabo za u Bubiligi byabaye ihurizo
Ikindi kibazo cyabaye insobe mu biganiro byaganishije ku bwigenge bwa u Rwanda na u Burundi , ni ukugenda kwa ingabo za u Bubiligi zari zishinzwe umutekano mu bihugu byombi .
Umwami wa u Burundi Mwambutsa yashakaga ko ingabo za Loni ziguma mu gihugu cye ariko abo bategekana batabishaka .
Byatumye mu biganiro bya Addis Abeba aho u Burundi bwari buhagarariwe na Minisitiri wa Intebe , bwamaganye icyemezo cyo kugumisha ingabo za Loni mu gihugu .
U Rwanda rwo rwarifashe cyane , ruvuga ko ruzabyigaho rukareba niba bitaba ngombwa ko zihaguma cyangwa se zikahava .
Impungenge zari zihari , kwari uko ibihugu byombi nta ngabo byari bifite ku buryo ikibazo cya umutekano cyavuka nyuma yo kugenda kwa Ababiligi , nta bushobozi byari kubona bwo guhangana na cyo .
Ikinyamakuru Le Monde muri Gashyantare 1962 cyatangaje ko ibihugu bya aba - Communistes byashakaga ko ingabo za u Bubiligi zihita zivanwa mu Rwanda na u Burundi , ahubwo Loni igashyiraho uburyo bufasha gutoza abasirikare ba ibyo bihugu bazahita bafata inshingano Ababiligi bakihava mbere ya ubwigenge .
Loni yo yatangarije ibyo bihugu ko u Rwanda na u Burundi nibitemera ko ingabo za u Bubiligi zihaguma , nta mafaranga izabiha yo kubifasha gutoza no kwita ku mutekano wabyo kuko nta bushobozi ibifitiye .
Byakomeje kuzurungutana kugeza ubwo tariki 27 Kamena 1962 , Inteko rusange ya Loni yatoye umwanzuro uvuga ko u Bubiligi bwambuwe inshingano zo kurebera u Rwanda na u Burundi nka indagizo bwahawe na Loni , bityo ko ibihugu bihawe ubwigenge buzatangira kubahirizwa tariki 1 Nyakanga uwo mwaka .
Ingabo za u Bubiligi zahawe kuba zahavuye bitarenze Kanama 1962 kandi Loni igahita yohereza intumwa ziyihagararira mu Rwanda gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya iyo myanzuro no gufasha ibyo bihugu bishya kwisuganya mu nzego zitandukanye za iterambere .
Ibihugu byombi hemejwe ko bizakomeza gukorera hamwe ku bijyanye na ubukungu nka gasutamo na imicungire ya amafaranga , Banki nkuru ikomeza kuba Banque da Emission du Rwanda et du Burundi ( BERB ) yari iherereye i Bujumbura .
Tariki ya 1 Mutarama 1964 nibwo ibihugu byombi byatandukanye mu bya ubukungu , buri cyose kigira Banki yacyo na gasutamo .
Umurwa Mukuru wa u Burundi byemejwe ko ukomeza kuba Bujumbura mu gihe u Rwanda rwahisemo Kigali kuko ariho hagaragaraga nko hagati mu gihugu .
Kubera ko mu Rwanda nta kibuga cya indege mpuzamahanga cyahabaga , u Burundi bwemeye ko Abanyarwanda bazakomeza gukoresha ikibuga cya indege cya Bujumbura kugeza babonye icyabo kiri ku rwego mpuzamahanga .
Minisitiri wa Intebe Dr Ngirente yitabiriye ibirori bya Isabukuru ya Ubwigenge bwa u Burundi .
Abarundi na inshuti zabo kuri uyu wa 1 Nyakanga 2021 , bitabiriye Ibirori ngarukamwaka byo kwizihiza Umunsi Mukuru wa Ubwigenge mu Burundi , bibera ku Gicumbi cya Intwari Igikomangoma Louis Rwagasore ufatwa nka intwari yaharaniye Ubwigenge bwa Abarundi .
Tariki ya 1 Nyakanga ni nayo u Rwanda rwaboneyeho ubwigenge , nyuma ya igihe ibihugu byombi bikolonijwe na u Bubiligi .
Ibiro bya Minisitiri wa Intebe byagize biti " " " " Minisitiri wa Intebe , Dr Ngirente Edouard yageze i Bujumbura guhagararira Perezida Kagame mu birori byo kwizihiza isabukuru ya imyaka 59 ya Ubwigenge bwa Repubulika ya u Burundi . " " " "
Minisitiri wa Intebe Dr Ngirente ubwo yageraga ku Kibuga cya Indege cyitiriwe Melchior Ndadaye yakiriwe na Visi Perezida wa u Burundi , Prosper Bazombanza .
Bahaye icyubahiro Igikomangoma Louis Rwagasore
Ibirori byo kwizihiza Ubwigenge mu Burundi , byabimburiwe no guha icyubahiro Igikomangoma Louis Rwagasore , aho abanyacyubahiro bayobowe na Umukuru wa Igihugu , Gen . Évariste Ndayishimiye bashyize indabo ahari imva ye .
Igikomangoma Louis Rwagasore yagizwe Minisitiri wa Intebe mbere gato ya Ubwigenge ariko araswa nyuma ya amezi atandatu na umucuruzi wa umugereki wari kumwe na abarundi batatu , kuri hoteli i Bujumbura , ku wa 13 Ukwakira 1961 .
Ni mbere ya amezi make ngo hatangazwe ubwigenge ku wa 1 Nyakanga 1962 .
Rwagasore ni umwe mu ntwari za Abarundi ndetse yanitiriwe Stade Nkuru ya Igihugu .
Afite amashuri na imihanda yagiye imwitirirwa .
Rwagasore yari umuhungu mukuru wa Umwami Mwambutsa IV .
Sarkozy utaranyuzwe no kwirengagizwa na Macron i Kigali babiganiriyeho .
Agahinda ka Nicolas Sarkozy katumye nyuma ya iminsi ine Macron avuye mu Rwanda , amutumira mu biro bya Perezida ( Elysée ) , babiganiraho .
Ikinyamakuru Opinion cyatangaje ko Sarkozy yababajwe na uburyo atatumiwe ngo aherekeze mugenzi we mu ruzinduko rwa amateka yagiriye i Kigali , akaba ataranakomojweho mu ijambo yahavugiye uwo munsi , ryagaragaje ukwicuza no kwemera uruhare igihugu cye cyagize muri politiki yagejeje kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .
Mu baherekeje Macron i Kigali harimo abayobozi batandukanye mu nzego nkuru za u Bufaransa nka Minisitiri wa Ububanyi na Amahanga , Jean - Yves Le Drian na abandi barimo na abashoramari bashaka gutangira gukorera mu Rwanda .
Harimo kandi abantu bazi amateka ya u Rwanda nka Gen Jean Varret wahoze ari Umuyobozi ukuriye Ibikorwa bya Gisirikare bya u Bufaransa mu Rwanda hagati ya 1990 na 1993 .
Kwinuba kwa Sarkozy gufite imizi mu kuba ari we Perezida wa mbere wa u Bufaransa wasuye u Rwanda nyuma ya Jenoside mu 2010 , akemera ko igihugu cye cyakoze amakosa .
Nubwo igihu hagati ya u Bufaransa na u Rwanda cyakomeje nyuma ya Sarkozy kubera politiki , uyu mugabo yakomeje kugaragaza ko yumva u Rwanda na ingaruka za ubufasha igihugu cye cyahaye abakoze Jenoside .
Na nyuma yo kuva ku buyobozi yakomeje gusura u Rwanda ndetse tariki 5 Gicurasi 2021 abinyujije muri Le Point , Sarkozy yasabye Macron gusura u Rwanda kandi akahava asabye imbabazi kuko gukomeza gutegereza birambiranye .
Umwe mu ba hafi ba Sarkozy yabwiye Opinion ko " " " " yatunguwe cyane na iyi myitwarire " " " " ya Macron yo kutamutumira ngo bajyane i Kigali , yanahagera ntagaragaze ko hari mugenzi we wagerageje kubyutsa umubano mbere ye nubwo bitakunze neza .
Macron agihaguruka mu Rwanda , Sarkozy yanze kuripfana atangira kugaragaza akababaro ke .
Byatumye tariki 31 Gicurasi Macron amutumira basasa inzobe baraganira .
Muri icyo kiganiro , Macron yamubwiye ko imbwirwaruhame yavugiye mu Rwanda yifuzaga ko iba rusange aho kwibanda ku bantu ku giti cyabo , ari nayo mpamvu atamukomojeho .
Bamwe mu ba hafi ba Macron batangaje ko ibiganiro bya abo bombi byagenze neza kandi babyishimiye .
Uruzinduko rwa Emmanuel Macron mu Rwanda rwafunguye amarembo ya imibanire myiza hagati ya ibihugu byombi , nyuma ya imyaka 27 yo kurebana aya ingwe kuko icyo gihugu kitemeraga uruhare rwacyo muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .
Kuva yava ku buyobozi , Sarkozy yakomeje gushimangira umubano mwiza na u Rwanda ; bya umwihariko akunda kurangira abashoramari ba Abafaransa ingeri bashoramo imari yabo mu Rwanda .
Ku wa 15 Mutarama 2018 , yagiriye uruzinduko mu Rwanda anabonana na Perezida Kagame .
Ni urugendo yazanyemo na Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Ikigo gikora Ubwikorezi bwa ibicuruzwa byambuka imipaka mu ndege , ku butaka no mu mazi , Cyrille Bolloré .
Umusaruro wavuye muri uru ruzinduko , ni uko Vivendi Group , ikigo gishamikiye kuri Bolloré Holdings ya Cyrille Bolloré cyemeye gushora imari ya miliyoni 40 za amadolari ya Amerika mu bikorwa bitandukanye bizakorerwa muri Kigali Cultural Village i Rebero mu Karere ka Kicukiro .
Hari na amakuru avuga ko Sarkozy yaba yaragize uruhare mu koroshya ibikorwa byo gusinya amasezerano ya imikoranire hagati ya u Rwanda na PSG .
Bivugwa ko byaba byarashingiye ku mubano afitanye na QSi iyoborwa na Al - Khelaifi ari na we Perezida wa PSG cyane ko uyu wahoze ari Perezida wa u Bufaransa ariwe watumye igurwa rya iyi kipe ryoroha .
Ibidasanzwe mu byaranze uruzinduko rwa Tshisekedi i Rubavu na Kagame i Goma .
Ku munsi wa nyuma wa iyo nama yabereye muri Kigali Convention Centre ikitabirwa na abasaga 1800 mu 2019 , Tshisekedi yavuze ko ibyo abanyapolitiki bakwigira byose " " " " ibihugu byacu [ u Rwanda na Congo ] bizahora bituranye . " " " "
Uwabonye cyangwa wumvise u Rwanda na Congo ku bwa Joseph Kabila , biragoye kumwemeza ukuri kwa amashusho amaze iminsi acicikana ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ya abasirikare babiri , uwa u Rwanda na Congo basuhuzanya , bacunze umutekano mu bwubahane nta na umwe usagariye undi .
Biragoye kumvisha uwo muntu ko Perezida Tshisekedi yasuye u Rwanda kuwa Gatanu , bugacya kuwa Gatandatu Perezida Kagame na we amusura , bakajyana kureba ingaruka zatewe na iruka rya Nyiragongo ryanashegeshe u Rwanda mu kwezi gushize .
IGIHE yakusanyije bimwe mu bintu bidasanzwe byaranze uruzinduko rwa abakuru ba ibihugu byombi mu mpera za icyumweru gishize , bishimangira ko Abanyarwanda na Abanye - Congo ari abavandimwe kurusha uko bamwe babitekereza .
Ubusabane mu bashinzwe kurinda umutekano
Ingabo za u Rwanda na Congo mu myaka yashize , zahoraga zirebana aya ingwe cyangwa se bagahura bakozanyaho bya hato na hato ku mupaka , umwe yakwibeshya akarenga ku rubibi rwa igihugu cye , imirwano ikarota .
Itsinda rishinzwe kugenzura imipaka ya u Rwanda na Congo , Expanded Joint Verification Mechanism ( EJVM ) ryari ryarahagorewe .
Ryahoraga mu mpaka zo guhosha umwuka mubi , ufite inkomoko mu myaka isaga 20 ishize ubwo Ingabo za u Rwanda zambukaga muri icyo gihugu cya kabiri mu bunini muri Afurika , zigiye gusenya inkambi za impunzi zari ziri kwisuganya ngo zigaruke guteza umutekano muke , nyuma ya aho benshi basize bagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe
Abatutsi .
Kuri ubu uwo mwuka wa intambara ku mpande zombi warashize , ibyo bikagaragazwa na amashusho ndetse na amafoto yakwirakwijwe mu mpera za icyumweru gishize , agaragaza umusirikare wa u Rwanda na uwa Congo bahagararanye ku burinzi ntawe usagariye mugenzi we .
Hari andi mashusho yakoze benshi ku mutima , ya umusirikare wa u Rwanda na uwa Congo ku nkengero za ikiyaga cya Kivu , aho umusirikare wa u Rwanda asanga uwa Congo akamusuhuza ( bimwe urubyiruko rwita gutanga chance ) , bakaganira gato imbere yabo mu mazi hari ubwato bugenda .
Ni ikimenyetso cya uko umugani wa Tshisekedi , abanyapolitiki ba ibihugu byombi babishatse batahiriza umugozi umwe mu gushaka amahoro , akaba umusingi wa iterambere rya abaturage ba ibihugu byombi , aho gushora imari mu ntambara " " " " isenya itubaka . " " " "
Ntabwo ari kenshi Umukuru wa Igihugu kimwe ashobora gusura ikindi , ngo bucye uwo yasuye amwishyura .
Akenshi biterwa na uko imyiteguro ikomeye ibanziriza uruzinduko rwa Perezida , ifata igihe .
Mu mpera za icyumweru gishize si ko byagenze , kuko ubwo Perezida Tshisekedi yasozaga uruzinduko rwa umunsi umwe yagiriye mu karere ka Rubavu ku ruhande rwa u Rwanda , Perezida Kagame yazindutse kuwa Gatandatu amusura mu Mujyi wa Goma , banajyana kureba ingaruka zatewe na Iruka rya Ikirunga cya Nyiragongo .
Ibi ubwabyo bitanga ubutumwa bukomeye .
Icya mbere ni uko kwa kwishishanya hagati ya ibihugu byombi kwashize , aho igihe cyose umuyobozi ashakiye gusura mugenzi we , ashobora kubikora kandi bigakunda .
Ikindi ni icyizere Perezida Kagame afitiye ubuyobozi bwa Congo , ku buryo yemera gusura agace nka Goma kari muri Kivu ya Amajyaruguru , yakunze kuvugwamo umutekano muke uterwa na imitwe yitwaje intwaro irimo na igamije guhungabanya u Rwanda .
Ni icyizere kandi na umusanzu ku ngamba Tshisekedi aherutse gufata zo guhashya iyo mitwe , byanatumye ubuyobozi bwa Kivu ya Amajyepfo na Amajyaruguru bushyirwa mu maboko ya igisirikare .
Perezida Kagame yavuze Igifaransa
Ntabwo ari kenshi Perezida Kagame yagiye yumvikana mu ruhame avuga Igifaransa , inshuro zose yabikoze byabaga bifite igisobanuro gikomeye , yishimye cyangwa ashaka gutanga ubutumwa bukomeye .
Inshuro yibukwa ni tariki 7 Mata 2014 muri Stade Amahoro , ubwo yagarukaga ku ruhare rwa u Bufaransa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu muhango wo Kwibuka Jenoside ku nshuro ya 20 .
Perezida Kagame wavuze ijambo mu gihe umubano wa ibihugu byombi wari ukirimo agatotsi , yavuze ijambo rya Igifaransa ryabaye ikimenyabose aho yagize ati " " " " les faits sont têtus " " " " [ Ibimenyetso birivugira ] .
Indi nshuro ni mu Ugushyingo 2018 ubwo yari Erevan muri Armenia mu nama ya Francophonie .
Mu muhango wo kwishimira intsinzi ya Mushikiwabo mbere ya uko atangira inshingano ze nka Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa OIF , Perezida Kagame yahishuye uko ari i Erevan yavuze Igifaransa mu kuranga uyu wahoze ari Minisitiri wa Ububanyi na Amahanga .
Ati " " " " None se na icya " " " " on est ensemble " " " " cyananira ?
Louise " " " " a dit qua on est ensemble . " " " " " " " "
Kuba kuri uyu wa Gatandatu yarongeye avugira Igifaransa i Goma , ururimi ubundi adakunze gukoresha dore ko yigeze kuvuga ko rumugora .
Na Tshisekedi ubwe yaratangaye ubwo Perezida Kagame yavugaga ati " " " " Monsieur le president , vraiment je vous remercie " " " " [ Nyakubahwa Perezida , ni ukuri ndabashimira ] . " " " "
Umwambaro mushya ku basirikare barinda Perezida Kagame
Ingabo zishinzwe kurinda Umukuru wa Igihugu [ Republican Guards ) nazo zaserukanye umucyo mu ruzundiko Tshisekedi yagiriye mu Rwanda na urwo Perezida Kagame yagiriye muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo .
Ahanini izo ngabo zari zimenyerwe mu ipantalo za umukara na ishati zijya gusa na ubururu bwa ikirere , bakarenzaho gillets za umukara .
Hari ubwo kandi bajyaga bagaragara bambaye amakositimu asanzwe .
Mu cyumweru gishize byari byahindutse .
Haba i Rubavu na i Goma , izi ngabo zagaragaye mu mwambaro mushya .
Ni ukuvuga amapantalo ya imikara , imipira ya imikara inyuma barengejeho gillets za kaki .
Ni ubwa mbere bari bagaragaye muri iyo myenda , ijya kumera nka iy abarinda Minisitiri wa Intebe wa Israel .
Perezida Kagame yatwaye Tshisekedi mu modoka
Tapi itukura , icyubahiro cya gisirikare na ibindi ni bimwe bisanzwe bimenyerewe ku mukuru wa igihugu wasuye mugenzi we , icyakora si kenshi Perezida akunze kugaragara ari mu modoka kuri " " " " volant " " " " atwaye mugenzi we .
Mu ruzinduko Tshisekedi yagiriye mu Rwanda kuwa Gatanu , Perezida Kagame yamutwaye mu modoka bagenda baganira ubwo bajyaga gusura ibikorwa remezo byangijwe na imitingito yakurikiye iruka rya Ikirunga cya Nyiragongo ryabaye ku wa 22 Gicurasi 2021 .
Si kenshi Perezida Kagame akunze kugaragara yitwaye mu modoka cyangwa atwaye mugenzi we wamusuye , icyakora nanone si ubwa mbere .
Gusa inshuro nke byabaye hari mu Ukuboza 2016 ubwo umwami wa Maroc , Mohammed VI yasuraga u Rwanda .
Muri Gashyantare 2018 ubwo Perezida Ali Bongo wa Gabon yasuraga u Rwanda , nabwo Perezida Kagame yagaragaye amutwaye mu modoka .
Muri Werurwe 2019 , Kagame yongeye gutwara mu modoka Uhuru Kenyatta wa Kenya mu ruzinduko rwa umunsi umwe yagiriye mu Rwanda .
Muri Mata uwo mwaka , nabwo Perezida Kagame yatwaye mu modoka Umuyobozi wa Ikirenga wa Qatar , Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al - Thani wari wasuye u Rwanda .
Ubufatanye mu gucukura no gutunganya zahabu
Wumvise ibivugwa na abanyapolitiki batavuga rumwe na Leta ya Congo cyangwa se abandi batifuza ko umubano wa ibihugu byombi wasagamba , watekereza ko gufatanya bya umwihariko mu bijyanye na iby amabuye ya agaciro ari sakirirego hagati ya u Rwanda na Congo .
Umuhanda mwiza cyangwa inzu nziza yuzuye i Kigali , uzasanga bavuga ngo ni " " " " amabuye ya Congo . " " " "
Ni ibintu u Rwanda rwakunze guhakana kenshi nyamara bidasiba kugaragara muri raporo za Loni ku mutekano wo mu Burasirazuba bwa Congo .
Icyiza ni uko Leta ya Congo nta na rimwe yo ubwayo irabishinja u Rwanda .
