Kubera ayo makuru ahora mu kirere , nta wakekaga ko kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ibihugu byombi bishobora gusinya amasezerano ya ubufatanye mu kwimakaza umucyo mu bucukuzi na ubucuruzi bwa Zahabu hagamijwe guhashya ubucuruzi bwayo bukorwa na imitwe yitwaje intwaro ikorera muri RDC .
Ibigo bibiri , Sakima yo muri RDC na Dither SA yo mu Rwanda nibyo bizagenzura urugendo rwose kuva mu gucukura zahabu bizakorwa na Sakima kugeza mu kuyitunganya bizakorwa na Dither SA , hirindwa ko yakomeza kujya mu maboko ya imitwe yitwaje intwaro ikoresha amafaranga yavuye muri ayo mabuye ya agaciro , mu gukomeza guteza umutekano muke
Uku kurenga ku bivugwa no ku byakabaye bitanya ibihugu byombi ahubwo bigashyira imbere ibibihuza , ni ikimenyetso cya uko u Rwanda na Congo ari ibihugu " " " " bivandimwe , " " " " abaturanyi bahoraho byabishaka bitabishaka .
Dr Vincent Biruta yasabye urubyiruko rwa PSD gutinyuka kwiyamamaza mu matora ya inzego za ibanze .
Ibi Dr Vincent Biruta yabisabye kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ya 19 Kamena 2021 , mu mahugurwa ya iminsi ibiri ya urubyiruko na abagore bo muri PSD agamije gushishikariza abagore na urubyiruko kugira uruhare mu bikorwa bya politiki bikorerwa mu mutwe wa politiki na ibiteza imbere Igihugu muri rusange .
Yagize ati " " " " Mu gihugu cyacu ubu harategurwa amatora ya inzego za ibanze , iza urubyiruko na izabagore mukaba musabwa kubigiramo uruhare muharanira imigendekere myiza yayo ariko kandi munatinyuka kwiyamamaza ndetse mukanabishishikariza abandi . " " " "
Yavuze ko kwiyamamaza biba bivuga ko umuntu aba yiteguye gutanga umusanzu we mu miyoborere ya Igihugu kandi yiyumvamo ubushobozi na ubushake bwo gutanga umusanzu we mu kucyubaka .
Dr Biruta yashishikarije kandi abitabiriye inama , kwirinda no kudaha umwanya abakwirakwiza ku mbuga nkoranyambaga amakuru asebya leta ya u Rwanda , apfobya Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu 1994 na andi yose adafite akamaro , ko ahubwo bakwiye guharanira ibiteza imbere igihugu .
Uhagarariye PSD mu Murenge wa Bwisige mu Karere ka Gicumbi , Munyaneza Vianney yabwiye IGIHE ko aya mahugurwa yatumye yiyumvamo ubushobozi na ubushake bwo kwiyamamaza mu nzego zifata ibyemezo .
Ati " " " " Mbere urubyiruko twitinyaga kuko tutari twagasobanukiwe uburenganzira bwo kuba urubyiruko twajya mu nzego bwite za Leta zifata ibyemezo ariko aya mahugurwa twahawe agiye gutuma dushishikariza bagenzi bacu batari bagatinyutse gutera iyo ntambwe ijya imbere mu kwiyamamaza muri izo nzego zifata ibyemezo . " " " "
Nibagwire Leonia na we uri mu bahuguwe yavuze ko bagomba kwiyamamaza kugira ngo bagire umusanzu batanga mu kubaka Igihugu .
Ati " " " " Kudushishikariza kwiyamamaza tujya mu myanya ya ubuyobozi ni kimwe mu bintu nka abagore na urubyiruko tugomba kwitabira kuko natwe tugomba gutanga umusanzu mu gihugu cyacu . " " " "
Yongeyeho ko mbere inshuro nyinshi bitinyaga ariko aya mahugurwa yabatinyuye ku buryo babonye ko bashobora kwiyamamaza bagatanga umusanzu wubaka igihugu muri rusange .
Aya mahugurwa yitezweho kongerera abagore na urubyiruko ubumenyi ku buhanga bwo kwiyamamariza kujya mu myanya ya ubuyobozi bwa umutwe wa politiki na indi myanya ya ubuyobozi ifatirwamo ibyemezo hagamijwe kugira uruhare rugaragara mu nzego zinyuranye za ubuyobozi , Gushishikariza abayoboke ba PSD gukomeza gushimangira
ihame rya uburinganire na ubwuzuzanye , kwishyirahamwe hagamije kwiteza imbere , kwishakamo ibisubizo no kwigira ndetse no kuganira ku mategeko azagenga urugaga rwa urubyiruko na urw abagore rushamikiye kuri PSD .
U Rwanda rwamaganye ibyo kuba icyambu cya amabuye ya magendu acukurwa muri RDC .
Raporo yakozwe kuri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo mu 2020 , igashyikirizwa Perezida wa Akanama ka Umuryango wa Abibumbye gashinzwe Umutekano , yagaragaje ko kimwe mu bibazo bituma umutekano muri icyo gihugu utaboneka , ari imitwe ya iterabwoba na inyeshyamba zikorera mu Burasirazuba bwa Congo , kandi zose zigatungwa
na amabuye ya agaciro zicuruza mu bihugu bya amahanga .
Bibarwa ko Uburasirazuba bwa Congo bukoreramo imitwe ya inyeshyamba irenga 130 , yose ivuga ko ifite impamvu za intambara imbere muri Congo ndetse no mu bihugu icyenda bihana imbibi na Congo .
Iyi mitwe imaze gutuma nibura abaturage bari hagati ya miliyoni enye na eshanu bahungira imbere muri Congo , mu gihe abandi benshi bahungiye mu bihugu bya ibituranyi , byose biturutse ku bitero bisaga 100 byagabwe na imitwe ya iterabwoba mu mwaka ushize .
Raporo yashyikirijwe Akanama ka Umuryango wa Abibumbye gashinzwe Umutekano , igaragaza ko imyinshi muri iyo mitwe ikura amikoro mu bikorwa bya ubucukuzi bwa amabuye ya agaciro , ndetse ikavuga ko amwe muri ayo mabuye anyuzwa mu Rwanda mbere yo kujyanwa ku isoko mpuzamahanga ,
mu bihugu birimo u Bushinwa , Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Abarabu na Hong Kong .
Abakoze raporo ahanini bashingira ku byavuzwe na ababahaye ubuhamya badatangaza amazina , bavuga ko ngo amabuye anyuzwa mu Rwanda kuko ari byo bihendutse , akinjira anyuze mu Kiyaga cya Kivu ndetse no ku mipaka ya Rubavu na Rusizi , avuye muri Kivu ya Ruguru na iy Epfo .
Batanze urugero rwa abantu batatu babwiye iri tsinda ryari mu bushakashatsi ko amabuye ya agaciro yabo bayacuruza ku bacuruzi banini bari i Goma , nabo baba bazayambutsa bakayageza mu Rwanda akajyanwa mu ndege .
Iyi raporo kandi ivuga ko mu Ukuboza 2020 , sosiyete ya Avanish Sarl ikorera i Bukavu yohereje Sosiyete ya Al - Hallaq Jewellery LLC ya i Dubai ibiro 5 103 bya zahabu binyujijwe mu Rwanda , ndetse na sosiyete yitwa KMC Sarl , nayo ikorera i Bukavu , ngo ikaba yarohereje ibiro 4 795 bya zahabu kuri sosiyete ya Gold Fun Corporation Ltd ya i Hong Kong , kandi
nabyo bikanyuzwa mu Rwanda .
U Rwanda rwabihakanye rwivuye inyuma
Nyuma yo kumva ibirego ku Rwanda , iri tsinda ryagerageje kuvugana na uruhande rwarwo kugira ngo ryumve icyo u Rwanda rubivugaho , rubitera utwatsi .
U Rwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu bike byemeye gusubiza kuri iyo raporo kuko ibindi byinshi byahisemo kwinumira burundu .
Muri iyi raporo harimo ko umwe mu bayobozi ba u Rwanda utarashatse ko amazina ye atangazwa , yagize ati " " " " Nta na rimwe u Rwanda rwabonye amabuye ya magendu afite aho ahuriye na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo kuva mu Ugushyingo 2020 kugera muri Mata uyu mwaka . " " " "
Ubusanzwe u Rwanda rufite inzego za umutekano ku mupaka uruhuza na Congo zishinzwe gukurikirana no kurinda ko hari amabuye yaturuka muri icyo gihugu yinjira mu Rwanda .
Mu 2020 , u Rwanda rwari rweretse iryo tsinda rya abashakashatsi ko hari ibiro 155 bya Coltan rwafashe kuwa 23 Mutarama 2020 , biturutse muri RDC mu buryo bwa magendu .
Izi coltan zari zibitse mu Karere ka Rubavu .
Iri tsinda kandi ryaneretswe andi mabuye menshi yafatiwe hirya no hino mu gihugu kuva muri Kamena 2019 .
Yarimo ibiro 360 bya ayakekwaga ko ari beryllium , ibiro 293 bya cassiterite , ibiro 250 bya wolfram na ibindi biro 54 bya coltan .
Ambasade ya u Rwanda mu Muryango wa Abibumbye nayo yahakanye aya makuru ya icuruzwa rya amabuye mu buryo bwa magendu , ndetse ibwira aba bashakashakatsi ko " " " " RwandAir idafite ibyemezo bya uko ariyo yatwaye ayo mabuye ya magendu . " " " "
Si ubwa mbere u Rwanda rugaragaza ko amakuru atangwa muri bene izi raporo ku bijyanye na magendu ya amabuye ya agaciro anyuzwa mu Rwanda atari ukuri kuko na umwaka ushize , rwashimangiye ko bitemewe na amategeko kurunyuzamo amabuye hatabanje kwerekanwa inkomoko yayo .
U Rwanda rwemeje Antoine Anfré nka Ambasaderi wa u Bufaransa
Mu ruzinduko Perezida wa u Bufaransa , Emmanuel Macron yagiriye mu Rwanda mu kwezi gushize nibwo yagennye ugomba guhagararira igihugu cye nka Amabasaderi .
Ambasaderi Anfré umaze kwemezwa na u Rwanda azaba afite icyicaro i Kigali .
Ni mu gihe ibikorwa bya Ambasade ya u Bufaransa mu Rwanda byayoborwaga na Chargé da affaires witwa Jérémie Blin wasimbuye Etienne de Souza , kuva aho Michel Flesch , wasoje imirimo ye muri Nzeri 2015 nka Ambasaderi agendeye .
Anfré wa imyaka 58 asanzwe ari amenyereye dipolomasi ; yari Umugenzuzi wa Ibijyanye na Ububanyi na Amahanga muri Minisiteri ya Ububanyi na Amahanga mu Bufaransa .
Izina rye rigaragara muri Raporo ivuga ku ruhare rwa u Bufaransa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yitiriwe Vincent Duclert .
Mu myaka ya 1990 , Anfré yari Umuyobozi wa Ishami rishinzwe Ibikorwa bya Afurika na Malgaches [ ikirwa cya Madagascar ] ryitwaga DAM rikaba ryarakoreraga i Quai da Orsay muri Minisiteri ya Ububanyi na Amahanga .
Muri raporo Duclert agaragazwa nka uwari ushyigikiye ko Politiki ya u Bufaransa ku Rwanda ihinduka , umurongo wari uhabanye cyane na Politiki ya u Bufaransa ku Rwanda .
Antoine Anfré yakoze mu nzego zitandukanye mu bijyanye na ububanyi na amahanga kugeza ubwo mu 2014 yagizwe Ambasaderi wihariye wa u Bufaransa muri Niger kugeza muri Nyakanga 2015 ubwo yahamagazwaga na igihugu cye .
Yahawe izindi nshingano nyuma ya aho , agirwa Ambasaderi ushinzwe Siporo muri Minisiteri ya u Bufaransa , inshingano yamazeho umwaka hagati ya 2015 na 2016 .
Hari mbere yo gusubira kuba Umugenzuzi muri Minisiteri ya Ububanyi na Amahanga ya u Bufaransa .
Guhera mu 1962 , u Bufaransa bumaze kohereza mu Rwanda ba ambasaderi 16 , kuva kuri Jean - Marc Barbey wabimburiye abandi kugeza kuri Michel Flesh wagiye mu 2015 .
Amb Rugwabiza yagaye ibihugu bikomeje kugenda biguru ntege mu gufata abakekwaho Jenoside .
Yabitangaje kuri uyu wa Kabiri ubwo afatanyije na Ubuyobozi bwa Urwego Mpuzamahanga Rwashyiriweho Gukora Imirimo ya Insigarira ya Inkiko Mpanabyaha ( IRMICT ) , bagezaga ku Kanama ka Umutekano ka Loni raporo ya ibikorwa ya 18 .
Rugwabiza yasabye akanama gashinzwe umutekano kugira icyo gakora ku kibazo cya ubufatanye buke mu korohereza akazi IRMICT , ni ukuvuga kuyifasha gufata abakekwaho Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bakidegembya hirya no hino .
Yagize ati " " " " Twibukiranye ko u Rwanda rwohereje impapuro zisaga igihumbi zo guta muri yombi abakekwaho Jenoside bari hirya no hino ku Isi , rusaba ko bafatwa bagacirwa imanza cyangwa bakoherezwa mu Rwanda .
Ibihugu bike nibyo byagize icyo bikorwa . " " " "
Kugeza ubu impapuro 1145 nizo zimaze gutangwa zisaba ko abagize uruhare muri Jenoside bihishe mu bihugu 33 bafatwa , abafashwe ni mbarwa .
Rugwabiza yashimiye ibihugu bike byagaragaje ubushake mu gufata cyangwa kuburanisha ababyihishemo bakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .
Ibyo bihugu birimo u Bufaransa biturutse ku mbwirwaruhame Perezida Emmanuel Macron aherutse kuvugira i Kigali , yizeza ko u Bufaransa butzaha umwanya abakekwaho Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .
Yashimiye iki gihugu kandi ku bufatanbye bwagaragaje umwaka ushize mu itabwa muri yombi rya Felicien Kabuga wari umaze imyaka isaga 20 ashakishwa na ubutabera nka umwe mu baterankunga ba imena ba Jenoside .
Iki gihugu kandi giherutse gutangaza ko muri Gicurasi 2022 aribwo urubanza rwa Laurent Bucyibaruta wahoze ari Perefe wa Gikongoro ruzatangira .
Ni igikorwa Rugwabiza yagaragaje ko gitanga icyizere .
Yashimiye kandi Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ku bufatanye ziherutse kugaragaza bwohereza mu Rwanda Béatrice Munyenyezi ukekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside .
Ati " " " " Ibi bigaragaza ko nta kabuza ubutabera bushobora gutangwa iyo hari ubushake bwa politiki na ubufatanye mu kugeza mu butabera abakekwaho uruhare mu byaha byibasiye inyokomuntu . " " " "
Icyakora , Rugwabiza yagaye bimwe mu bihugu bya Afurika ari nabyo bibarizwamo umubare munini wa abakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , ariko abafatwa bakaba ari mbarwa .
Yibukije umwanzuro wa akanama ka Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe gashinzwe Umutekano wo ku itariki 12 Mata 2021 usaba ibihugu byose bigize uwo muryango gukora iperereza , guta muri yombi , gucira imanza cyangw akohereza abakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside babibarizwamo .
Yavuze ko kudashyira mu bikorwa ibikubiye muri uwo mwanzuro ari amakosa .
Insiriri na uruhumbikiro rwa ibibazo bya Uganda na u Rwanda : Depite Mukasa Mbidde yabivuye imuzi .
Mbidde ni Umunyapolitiki wo muri Uganda uhagarariye iki gihugu mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Umuryango wa Afurika ya Iburasirazuba , EALA .
Hari umuntu ushobora kuba azi Icyongereza , yaracyize yewe yaranakiminujemo ariko ugasanga hari amagambo runaka atajya avuga na umunsi na umwe .
Bene uwo ashobora guhura na Mbidde agataha ubwumvane bwanze kuko akoresha amagambo akakaye , amwe asaba kuyumva usubije inyuma cyangwa inkoranyamagambo za Longman cyangwa Oxford ziri hafi aho .
Mu mwaka ushize ubwo hizihizwaga Noheli , abinyujije kuri Twitter yandikiye abamukurikira ubutumwa bugira buti " " " " ​ Hon Fred Mbidde Musaka wishes you a splendiferous , supercalifragilisticexpialidociou ​ s , droll , chuppy ​ and frolicsome Christmas " " " " .
Aya magambo yose yakoresheje nubwo adakoreshwa na benshi , ari mu ya Icyongereza cyemewe .
Wifashishije inkoranyamagambo , Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious bisobanura ikintu cyiza bya agatangaza , nubwo kurisoma byumvikana nka ikigeragezo .
Kuri we ni nko kunywa amazi .
Ni cyo kimwe na splendiferous ugenekereje mu Kinyarwanda risobanura agahebuzo .
Mu yandi magambo adakoreshwa na benshi mu Cyongereza ariko usanga akoresha kenshi harimo nka " " " " poohoo " " " " risobanurwa kurira bimwe bita kuboroga ariko iyo umuntu afite ububabare , " " " " Kowtow " " " " rishatse kuvuga guca bugufi , cyangwa " " " " Jabberwocky " " " " akunda gukoresha risobanura ibintu bidafite ishingiro
Yigeze kuvuga ati " " " " Abantu bavuga ko nkoresha Icyongereza gikomeye ndetse bakanenga bavuga ko ntari umuntu uzi gusobanura ibintu , ariko ndashaka kubabwira ko narangije Kaminuza mu itangazamakuru muri Makerere University , kandi twari 60 gusa bigaga iryo somo . " " " "
Ni umunyamategeko wa umwuga , winjiye mu ruhando rwa Politiki guhera mu myaka ya 1999 ariko ntiyahirwa na imyanya ya imbere mu gihugu kugeza ubwo mu 2011 yatsindwaga amatora ya Abadepite ariko akabona inenge mu mategeko yahaga uburenganzira ishyaka rya NRM bwo kugira umuntu urihagararira mu Nteko ya EALA .
Yuririye kuri iyo nenge , atanga ikirego anatsinda urubanza yinjira muri EALA atyo .
Muri iyi nteko yabaye muri Komisiyo zitandukanye ndetse aranaziyobora zirimo ishinzwe Itumanaho , Ubucuruzi na Ishoramari ; ubu anayobora agashami kayo gashinzwe amategeko .
Mu kiganiro cyihariye yagiranye na IGIHE , yasesenguye byimbitse imvano ya ikibazo cya umubano mubi umaze igihe hagati ya u Rwanda na Uganda , umuti wacyo na igihombo bikomeje gutera .
Gufunga umupaka byari igisubizo , si ikibazo
Mbidde yasobanuye ko hari bamwe bakeka ko ikibazo cya u Rwanda na Uganda cyatangiye mu 2019 ubwo Umupaka wa Gatuna wafungwaga , nyamara yemeza ko bifite imvano ya kure cyane .
Ati " " " " Gufunga umupaka , byari bigamije gukemura ikibazo .
Ntabwo byo ubwabyo ari ikibazo .
Icyo rero umuntu yakwibaza , ikibazo cyari ikihe ? " " " "
Uyu mugabo yavuze ko kuba abantu baravaga mu Rwanda , bakambuka umupaka bajya muri Uganda , bagahura na ibibazo birimo gutabwa muri yombi na inzego za umutekano za Uganda , bakamara umwaka bari muri gereza nta muntu ubizi batotezwa , ari impamvu ikomeye yagombaga gutuma umupaka ufungwa .
Ati " " " " Ibyo ubwabyo byatumye biba ikintu cya ingenzi cyane kuri Guverinoma ya u Rwanda ifunga umupaka wayo ku buryo abaturage baguma ari bazima .
Icya kabiri , Uganda yatangiye guhishira abantu bikekwa ko bashaka guhungabanya umutekano wa u Rwanda . " " " "
Yatanze urugero kuri Mukankusi Charlotte uri mu buyobozi bwa RNC wahawe Pasiporo na Uganda .
Uyu na bagenzi be banahuye na Perezida Museveni ndetse aza kubyiyemerera , avuga ko ngo guhura na bo " " " " byari impanuka . " " " "
Ibi bikubitana na uko imbere muri Uganda , abantu bose baruciye bakarumira ntihagira na umwe uhaguruka ngo asabe ko iki kibazo gikemurwa .
Mbidde yagize ati " " " " Ni njye muntu wa mbere wavuze mu ruhame kuri ibi bibazo muri Uganda kuko abandi bose bari barabitinye .
Kandi icyo nakubwira ni uko Guverinoma yafashe umurongo wo kuruca ikarumira . " " " "
Usibye Abanyarwanda bagirirwa nabi muri Uganda , Mbidde yavuze ko na Abanya - Uganda bafite inkomoko mu Rwanda bakunze kwibasirwa , ati " " " " Na ubu baracyahungabanywa . " " " "
Yagize ati " " " " Nibuka umunsi umwe Abanya - Uganda 40 bafite inkomoko mu Rwanda bafatiwe mu rusengero bashinjwa kuba intasi .
Niba atari Politiki yo guhutaza Abanyarwanda , ni ukubera iki intasi 40 zahurira mu rusengero ?
Bari gushinga ishyaka se ?
Cyangwa se gutata ni umurimo ukorwa abantu bahuriye hamwe ? " " " "
Mbidde yavuze ko abantu bose bakekwaho kugira uruhare mu bikorwa byo guhungabanya umutekano , barimo Tribert Rujugiro bose ubushabitsi bwabo bwahawe rugari muri Uganda nta nkomyi .
Igiteye inkeke kurushaho ni uko abo mu bwoko bwa Abanyarwanda bwemewe muri Uganda bakomeje guhohoterwa .
Ati " " " " Mfite ikirego ndi gukurikirana cya Abanyarwanda , Abanya - Uganda bafite inkomoko mu Rwanda no muri iki gihe bivugwa ko ibihugu byombi biri mu nzira ya amahoro , bo barirukanwe bajyanwa mu Rwanda .
Bamaze hafi umwaka baba muri hotel mu Rwanda , kuko birukanwe mu gihugu cyabo , basiga ibikorwa byabo , ni njye uri gukurikirana imitungo yabo iri muri banki . " " " "
Mbidde yavumbuye ikintu kidasanzwe amaze guhura na Museveni
Hari benshi bahuza ikibazo cya uyu munsi cya u Rwanda na Uganda na amateka ari hagati ya ibihugu byombi ahera mu rugamba rwo kubohora Uganda cyangwa se urwo guhagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi na intambara yo muri Congo .
Mbidde yavuze ko yagize amahirwe yo guhura na abakuru ba ibihugu byombi , aza gutahura ko bishoboka cyane ko Museveni yaba afitiye Abanyarwanda urwango rwa karande .
Ati " " " " Icyo natahuye ni uko bishoboka cyane ko Museveni afitiye urwango Abanyarwanda .
Urwango rukomeye , ku mpamvu ntazi ; ku buryo uba Umunyarwanda mwiza mu gihe umushyigikiye .
Ariko iyo uri umuntu wumva ko ufite uburenganzira bwo kubaho nka ikiremwamuntu , aho uba ufitanye ibibazo na we . " " " "
Yavuze kuba hari abantu bafite inkomoko mu Rwanda bakoranye na Museveni ariko bahagarika iyo mikoranire , " " " " bakagarukira hafi ya urupfu . " " " "
Kuri we ngo uramutse ufashe urutonde rwa ababohoye Uganda bo muri Afurika ya Iburasirazuba , mu mazina , abenshi uyu munsi wabasanga mu Rwanda .
Ati " " " " Aho kubashima , arabarwanya .
Ibyo bigomba kuba bifitanye isano na amateka ku buryo bari beza mu gihe bamukoreraga ariko ubu bari kwikorera ubwabo , ni babi . " " " "
Urwo rwango si urwa none !
Mu 1987 ngo Museveni yasabye ko Prof Karugire Samwiri atangiza urugendo rwo kwandika Itegeko Nshinga rishya rya Uganda .
Birangiye , yazaniwe imiterere yaryo , ariko arakazwa na ikintu kimwe gikomeye .
Ati " " " " Mfite amakuru yizewe ko ubwo yarizanirwaga , yarakajwe no gushyira Abanyarwanda mu bwoko bumwe bwa Uganda .
Yajugunyiye icyo gitabo uwo " " " " Professor , " " " " avuga amagambo abo bantu bananiwe kwakira .
Kuri we Abanyankole ni abantu beza kurusha Abanyarwanda .
Kuri we , ababohoye u Rwanda si abantu beza . " " " "
Mbidde yavuze ko igikwiriye gukorwa ari ugukomeza kubwira Museveni ko ibyo ari gukora atari byo , kandi ngo urwo rugendo rwaratangiye .
Yashingiye ku kuba igice kinini gituwemo abo mu bwoko bwa Abanyarwanda cyaranze kumutora nka abatuye Masaka , Mityana , Luwero , Mubende na ahandi .
Ufite agatwe gato akarinda ubuhiri
Mbidde yavuze ko Abanyapolitiki benshi bo muri Uganda bahisemo inzira yo guceceka kugira ngo babeho atari uko bayobewe ukuri .
Ati " " " " Navumbuye ko bahisemo ihame rimwe rya ingenzi rivuga ngo " " " " ubwoba ni ubuzima . " " " "
Bahitamo guceceka kugira ngo babeho .
Hanyuma abandi badaceceka , bashyigikiye ibyo turi kurwanya . " " " "
Uyu mugabo yavuze ko nka abaturage bari batunzwe na ubucuruzi bwambukiranya imipaka , bazi neza ikibazo .
Yatanze urugero rwa abarenga 600 mu gihe cya amezi ane mu 2019 banditse basaba ko iki kibazo cyakemurwa kubera igihombo .
Ati " " " " Abantu 600 mu mezi ane , nawe wakwibaza ayo abo bantu bahombye .
Kubera iki ?
Kuko umuntu umwe yafashe umwanzuro wo gushotora igihugu kirengana ku mpamvu yananiwe gusobanura .
Kandi turabizi , iyo Museveni afite ingingo , ntabwo ashobora kuyiceceka .
Yaracecetse kuko nta ngingo afite kuri iki kibazo . " " " "
Ukuri ni ko kuzakemura ikibazo
Mbidde yavuze ko bikwiye ko igihugu cye cyemera ko ari cyo " " " " gishotora " " " " u Rwanda , kandi ko ibyo bizavaho mu gihe kizaba cyemeye kuvugisha ukuri .
Uko kuri kugomba kujyana no gushyira mu bikorwa amasezerano yasinywe na ibihugu byombi , nka uburyo bwo gukemura ikibazo .
Ati " " " " Hasinywe amasezerano yo guhererekanya abanyabyaha .
Ibyo bivuze iki ?
Biravuze ngo Uganda ikwiriye guhagarika gushyigikira abarwanya u Rwanda ahubwo ikaruboherereza bakaburanishwa .
Hari uwakeka ko ibyo na byo bizakemura ikibazo , oya , ikibazo kizakemurwa na ubushake bwo gukorera hamwe , bwo kubana neza . " " " "
" " " " Icyo ni cyo kikibura ku ruhande rwa Uganda .
Turasenga dusaba Imana ko kuri iyi nshuro Perezida uherutse kurahira , yumva neza ko u Rwanda na Uganda biva inda imwe . " " " "
Kuki Museveni yishyizemo u Rwanda ?
Mbidde asobanura ko bishoboka cyane ko Museveni afitiye u Rwanda urwango rushingiye no ku byo rumaze kugeraho kurusha igihugu cye .
Ati " " " " Uganda imaze imyaka irenga 35 ifite amahoro , ifite ubutunzi kamere [ . . . ] yananiwe kugira ibintu byinshi igeraho . " " " "
Mbidde yavuze ko impamvu Museveni agikora ibyo ashaka ari uko mu nzego zitandukanye za Uganda , hari abantu bamushyigikiye , atanga urugero kuri Abel Kandiho uyobora CMI na abandi biganjemo abinjiye mu gisirikare mu myaka ya 1990 na abandi bari muri Guverinoma .
Ati " " " " Afite abantu bafite imyumvire imwe gusa si benshi .
Abenshi bigira nka abumva ibintu kimwe na we kugira ngo bakomeze kubona umugati cyangwa se abandi bakumva ko umutekano uzava mu kwemeranya na we . " " " "
Politiki imeze nka igikinisho cya muzika
Iki kiganiro na Mbidde twagikoze ku munsi Museveni yarahiraga .
Mu gusobanura niba hari icyo umuntu yakwitega muri iyi myaka igiye kuza , yagarutse ku nkuru za ibicurangisho bya muzika .
Yifashishije urugero rwa igikinisho cyashyirwagamo igiceri , hanyuma kigacuranga indirimbo yabaga yarashyizwemo mbere na uwagikoze .
Ati " " " " Umbajije niba hari amakuru mashya tuzabona muri iyi manda nshya atangiye , azakora nka iyo mashini .
Azakora ibyo asanzwe akora kuko ni byo azi gukora .
Ntiwitege ikintu gitandukanye . " " " "
Mbidde yakomeje avuga ko uko iminsi ishira , ibimenyetso byerekana ko nta bushake Museveni afite mu gukemura ikibazo cya u Rwanda na Uganda .
Yatanze urugero ku buryo Museveni yohereje Dr Adonia Ayebare nka intumwa ye kugira ngo aganire na Perezida Kagame ku kibazo kimaze igihe hagati ya ibihugu byombi , ariko murumuna we akaba ari we ushyirwa mu majwi mu gukorera iyicarubozo Abanyarwanda .
Ati " " " " Niba Museveni yohereje Dr Ayebare ngo ahure na Perezida Kagame nka umuhuza mu gihe azi neza ko umuvandimwe we , Abel Kandiho , ari umuyobozi wa CMI iri kwica Abanyarwanda , kuri njye ibyo bisa nka umukino na none . " " " "
Mbidde yavuze ko nka umunyapolitiki utavuga rumwe na Leta , ari gukora ibishoboka kugira ngo ikibazo gikemuke ariko byose abikora ashingiye ku kuvuga ukuri .
Ati " " " " Ukuri kutavuzwe , iki kibazo ntikizigera gikemuka .
Ikindi , njye nafunguye amarembo , igihe cyose Perezida wa Uganda yashaka kumenya ukuri , nabwiye abaturage ukuri kandi na we sinagira impungenge zo kumubwira ukuri . " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko nka umunyapolitiki , undi mwanzuro ari uko Museveni yava ku butegetsi nubwo " " " " bitoroshye " " " " ariko icyo we na bagenzi be bari gukora ari " " " " ugukora cyane . " " " "
Mbidde yavuze ko nka abadepite ba EALA ntacyo bakora mu gukemura iki kibazo kuko na bo ubwabo bafite byinshi bitaboroheye birimo kuba batabona umushahara wabo uko bikwiriye na ibindi .
U Rwanda na Uganda hashize hafi imyaka ibiri bisinye amasezerano yo gukemura ibibazo biri hagati ya ibihugu byombi , icyakora umusaruro wayo ugerwa ku mashyi kuko Abanyarwanda bacyumvikana batawe muri yombi mu buryo budakurikije amategeko .
Ikindi imitwe igamije guhungabanya umutekano wa u Rwanda iracyafite ibirindiro muri Uganda .
U Rwanda rwamaganye ibyo kwicisha inzara Rusesabagina byakwirakwijwe na The New York Times
Ni amakuru yatangajwe na Ikinyamakuru The New York Times kimaze igihe gisohora inkuru zisa na izigamije guharabika isura ya u Rwanda , bya umwihariko ku kibazo cya Paul Rusesabagina ukurikiranyweho ibyaha bya iterabwoba .
Inkuru ya icyo kinyamakuru yasohotse kuri uyu wa Gatandatu yavugaga ko umuryango wa Rusesabagina ngo yawumenyesheje ko agiye guhagarikirwa ibiribwa , amazi na imiti yahabwaga .
Mu nkuru ntabwo hagaragazwa ikigomba gushingirwaho Rusesabagina yimwa amafunguro na imiti .
Umunyamakuru Abdi Latif Dahir nta nubwo yigeze atera intambwe ngo abaze inzego bireba mu Rwanda ngo zibitangeho ibisobanuro cyangwa zibyange mbere yo gusohora inkuru .
RCS ibinyujije kuri Twitter , yamaganye ayo makuru ya ibihuha kuri Rusesabagina , ivuga ko atigeze yimwa ibiribwa cyangwa imiti .
Iti " " " " Urwego rushinzwe amagereza mu Rwanda rufata imfungwa na abagororwa bose kimwe kandi rwita ku bakenewe kwitabwaho byihariye .
Ku kibazo cya Rusesabagina Paul , ubwo yoherezwaga muri Gereza ya Nyarugenge yahawe icyumba cyihariye na amafunguro yihariye . " " " "
" " " " Mu minsi ishize yashyizwe mu cyumba rusange kirimo na izindi mfungwa nyuma yo kwinubira icyo yise " " " " gufungirwa mu kato , " " " " ibintu bitaba mu magereza yo mu Rwanda .
Kuri ubu ahabwa ifunguro rimwe nka iry izindi mfungwa kandi abonana na muganga igihe cyose abikeneye nkuko byari bimeze na mbere . " " " "
Rusesabagina uri imbere ya ubutabera bwa u Rwanda aregwa ibyaha icyenda birimo kurema umutwe wa ingabo utemewe , Kuba mu mutwe wa iterabwoba , gutera inkunga iterabwoba , ubwicanyi nka igikorwa cya iterabwoba , itwarwa rya umuntu ritemewe na amategeko nka igikorwa cya iterabwoba no kwiba hakoreshejwe
intwaro nka igikorwa cya iterabwoba .
New York Times , umusangirangendo wa umuryango wa Rusesabagina ?
Mu mboni za ibinyamakuru byinshi byo mu Burengerazuba , usanga u Rwanda rugaragazwa nka igihugu kitagira akeza kakirangwamo .
Na ibyiza u Rwanda rwagezeho , abanyamakuru bo mu Burengerazuba usanga babyihunza , banabitangazaho inkuru runaka ugasanga bisa na ba bandi bataha ubukwe baje gutara imishono .
The New York Times ni kimwe muri byo .
Hashize igihe isohora inkuru ziteye kwibaza ku Rwanda ndetse rimwe na rimwe zakwitwa nka ubushotoranyi .
Byageze ku kibazo cya Rusesabagina ho isya itanzitse .
Iki kinyamakuru kiri mu bya mbere bike ku Isi byabashije kuvugana na Rusesabagina akigezwa mu Rwanda muri Nzeri 2020 .
Mu byo bavuganye icyo gihe , we ubwe yivugiye neza ko afashwe neza .
Inkuru ya New York Times yasohotse tariki 18 Nzeri 2020 , Rusesabagina wari ukiri mu maboko ya Urwego rwa Igihugu rwa Ubugenzacyaha ( RIB ) yagize ati " " " " yego nyuma ya iyo minsi itatu , nafashwe neza cyane , nta kintu na kimwe nanenga kugeza ubu .
Ndya ibyo buri munyarwanda wese arya , mpabwa buri kimwe cyose nshatse .
Ubwo rero mfashwe kimwe nka undi munyarwanda wese . " " " "
Umuntu yakwibaza uburyo Rusesabagina yaba yarafashwe neza ari muri kasho , yagera muri gereza akaba ariho afatwa nabi kurushaho .
Ikindi kigaragaza ko inkuru ya New York Times igamije guteza byacitse , ni uburyo ishimangira ko agiye guhagarikirwa amafunguro , amazi na imiti !
Ni mu gihe bizwi neza ko umuntu abeshwaho na ibiryo , u Rwanda rwaba rufite nyungu ki mu kwima umuntu ibiryo cyangwa imiti , kandi ari kimwe mu mahame ya uburenganzira bwa muntu ? .
Mu mahame agenga umwuga wa itangazamakuru ubusanzwe inkuru ivuzwe ku mpande ebyiri zitumva ibintu kimwe , buri ruhande ruhabwa umwanya rukagira icyo ruyivugaho .
Mu nkuru ya The New York Times nta na hamwe bigeze bavugisha Guverinoma ya u Rwanda kuri ibyo birego bya umuryango wa Rusesabagina , ngo wenda yange kugira icyo ibitangazaho ariko yabimenye !
Ni imikorere ya abanyamakuru bo mu biro ( armchair journalists ) , bicara bakandika amabwire gusa nta kugenzura ukuri na guke mu byo babwiwe cyangwa se ngo biyererutse bavangemo ukuri guke , babaze impande bireba .
Mu nkuru , hagaragazwa ko umunyamategeko wa Rusesabagina na umuryango we bagerageje kujya kumusura mu mpera za iki cyumweru ntibabashe kumugeraho .
Umuntu aha yakwibaza uburyo nyiri ugufungwa yabamenyesheje ko agiye guhagarikirwa imiti , amazi na ibiribwa kandi bataramugezeho .
Icyakora ku bamaze iminsi bakurikiranira hafi ibya New York Times ku Rwanda nta gitangaza kirimo .
Iki gitangazamakuru kuva Rusesabagina yafatwa , cyakomeje kumubogamiraho bidasanzwe , kimwerekana nka intwari ngo " " " " yarokoye " " " " amagana muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , inkuru itavugwaho rumwe na abitirirwa ko barokowe kuko bemeza ko babanzaga kwishyura kugira ngo bahabwe ubuhungiro muri Hotel des Mille Collines Rusesabagina
yacungaga .
Ntacyo icyo kinyamakuru kivuga ku baturage ba Nyabimata na ahandi ibitero bya umutwe wa iterabwoba wa FLN byagabwe , bigahitana inzirakarengane za abaturage cyangwa se ibindi byaha ushinjwa aregwa .
Ikindi kigaragara , New York Times iri mu murongo uhishe wo gufasha umuryango wa Rusesabagina gukomeza guharabika u Rwanda , no kwereka amahanga ko adafashwe neza .
Umuntu yavuga ko ibya New York Times na Umuryango wa Rusesabagina ari bimwe bya ushaka kukurya atabura imboga agukoza .
Kuva Rusesabagina yatabwa muri yombi muri Kanama 2020 , abo mu muryango we bagerageje kweza no gusibanganya ibyaha akurikiranyweho .
Mu kubigeraho , bagiye bakoresha uburyo bwose bafitiye ubushobozi burimo no gukorana na ibinyamakuru bikomeye bisanganywe umurongo wo kugaragaza nabi isura ya u Rwanda .
Uwo muryango wabanje kuvuga ko Rusesabagina yakorewe iyicarubozo , New York Times iri mu bamugezeho bwa mbere akigera mu Rwanda kandi ibyo bya iyicarubozo ntabyo yababwiye , nta na aho mu nkuru yabo bagaragaje ko wenda bamusanganye ibikomere cyangwa ihungabana , nyamara inkuru bakomeje kugenda bwamwandikaho zimugaragaza nka inzirakarengane .
Umuryango wa Rusesabagina ahanini bigizwemo uruhare na umukobwa we , Carine Kanimba wakomeje kwiruka mu bihugu bya u Burayi na Amerika ushaka uburyo ifungwa ndetse no kugezwa imbere ya ubutabera kwa Rusesabagina byaburizwamo ndetse ngo byaba ngombwa na Leta ya u Rwanda ikaba yashyirwaho igitutu .
Carine Kanimba , yageze na aho anenga imyitwarire ya u Bubiligi nka igihugu cya kabiri cya se , aho yibazaga icyo kuba se afite ubwenegihugu bwa iki gihugu bimumariye mu gihe kidashobora kumukurikirana ngo arekurwe .
Ibi byose byakorwaga na umuryango wa Rusesabagina ushaka ko Leta ya u Rwanda ishyirwaho igitutu na amahanga ikamurekura , gusa ntibyabahiriye kuko u Rwanda rutasibye kugaragaza ko ikibazo cye kiri mu rukiko , hakwiye gutegerezwa umwanzuro ruzagifataho .
Uwanditse iyi nkuru ihimba imibereho itariyo ya Rusesabagina ni Umunya - Kenya ufite inkomoko muri Somalia , Abdi Latif Dahir , Ushinzwe Akarere ka Afurika ya Iburasirazuba muri The New York Times kuva mu 2019 .
Numvise nduhutse , nkeye ku mutima - Rtd Lt Col Guillaume Ancel avuga ku rugendo rwa Macron i Kigali .
Guillaume Ancel wahoze ari Umusirikare Mukuru wa u Bufaransa wari mu Rwanda mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994 , yatangaje ko yashimishijwe na imbwirwaruhame Perezida Emmnuel Macron yavugiye mu Rwanda kuko irimo ukuri ku ruhare rwa iki gihugu muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .
Perezida wa u Bufaransa , Emmanuel Macron yasuye u Rwanda ku wa 27 Gicurasi mu ruzinduko rwa iminsi ibiri , rwarangiye ibihugu byombi biteye intambwe mu kuzahura umubano wari umaze imyaka 27 ucumbagira .
U Rwanda rwashinjaga u Bufaransa kugira uruhare mu gutera inkunga umugambi wa Jenoside na ishyirwa mu bikorwa ryawo ariko u Bufaransa ntibwari bwarigeze bushaka kugaragaza uruhande buhereyemo .
Perezida Macron ubwo yasuraga Urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali yemeye uruhare iki gihugu cyagize muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 .
Mu Kiganiro IGIHE yagiranye na Rtd Lieutenant Colonel Guillaume Ancel wari mu Rwanda mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , yavuze ko kuba Perezida Macron yaraje i Kigali akajya ku Rwibutso agasaba abarokotse Jenoside impano ya imbabazi yicishije bugufi ari ikintu cyamukoze ku mutima .
Ancel yari amaze igihe agaragaza uruhare rwa iguhugu cye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ndetse yabyanditseho ibitabo bitandukanye .
Yagize ati " " " " Numvise nduhutse , nkeye .
Numvise nduhutse kuko imyaka 27 yo guhakana uruhande rwa u Bufaransa yari ishize .
Twari tumaze imyaka myinshi twibeshya , twibeshye mu gihe cya Jenoside , twibeshya na nyuma ya Jenoside . " " " "
Ancel ashima intambwe Macron yateye akemera uruhare u Bufaransa bwagize muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi
Guillaume yakomeje avuga ko igihe cyari kigeze ngo u Bufaransa bubare inkuru itandukanye nyuma ya igihe kinini bwifatanyije na abo yise " " " " Aba - Nazi bo mu Rwanda , " " " " ikuraho ihakana kandi ihoza abarokotse Jenoside .
Ati " " " " Ibyo ni byo Macron yazirikanye muri iyo mbwirwaruhame , ntekereza ko ari iya amateka ikwiye .
Numvise nkeye kuko hari hashize igihe duharanira ko ukuri kuri iyi ngingo kujya ahabona . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Ibyo ntacyo bivuze ugereranyije na akababaro ka abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi no ku Banyarwanda ariko nari mfite ipfunwe kubera igihugu cyanjye .
Nari mfite ipfunwe ku bwanjye nka umuntu wahoze ari umusirikare mukuru kuba narabaye mu mwanya nafatanyijemo na abicanyi bo mu Rwanda ( yagereranyije na aba - Nazi ) nari mfite ipfunwe ku bwa abarokotse tutahaga icyubahiro tubagomba mu gihe bibuka ababo barenga miliyoni twashoboraga kuba twaratabaye . " " " "
Guillaume ashima intambwe ya Macron utariyibagijeumwanya arimo mu Bufaransa , akagira imbaraga zo guhagarara imbere ya Perezida Kagame yemera ko " " " " bibeshye " " " " kandi basaba abarokotse jenoside impano ya imbabazi .
Ati " " " " Ni ibintu bindema umutima mu buryo budasanzwe . " " " "
Intambwe ya Kagame ni ikimenyetso cya ubwiyunge
Perezida Paul Kagame uherutse mu ruzinduko mu Bufaransa , yagiranye ibiganiro na abahoze ari abasirikare bakuru ba iki gihugu bari mu Rwanda kuva mu 1990 kugeza mu 1994 .
Guillaume Ancel abajijwe uko yakiriye uyu mubonano aho Kagame yicaranye na abantu bari bahanganye mu gihe cya Operation Turquoise , yavuze ko ari ikimenyetso cya amahoro na ubwiyunge .
Ati " " " " Ntacyo mpisha , nashimye uyu mubonano .
Ni ikimenyetso cya amahoro yagaragaje .
Ntiyigeze ashaka kurwana na u Bufaransa kandi twagombye kuba twaramwumvise mu gihe cya Operation Turquoise .
Inshuro nyinshi abasirikare [ Inkotanyi ] babaga bafite uburyo bwo kwica cyangwa gukomeretsa Abafaransa ariko Kagame yarababujije .
Ntekereza ko Abafaransa batari bazi ko Kagame atigeze ashaka kurwana na u Bufaransa . " " " "
Uyu mubonamo ngo ni inzira yo kugarura amahoro no kubaka ahazaza mu mubano wa u Bufaransa na u Rwanda .
" " " " Byaranshimishje cyane , ndashimira Kagame ku bwa iki kimenyetso yakoze .
Ni ikimenyetso cya ubwiyunge , ni ikimenyetso cya ahazaza . " " " "
Umunyamakuru yabajije Ancel uko yakiriye guhura kwa abahoze ari abasirikare ba u Bufaransa na Perezida Kagame , asubiza agira ati " " " " Ntakubeshye nanjye nifuzaga kuba naba ndi muri bariya basirikare bakuru bakiriye Perezida Kagame , ariko bahisemo abagize uruhare mu kuyobora ibyo Ingabo za ubufaransa zakoze mu Rwanda hagati ya 1990 na 1994 .
Yavuze ko iyo aza kugira amahirwe yo guhura na Perezida Kagame yari kumushimira , akamubwira ko ari " " " " umuyobozi wa intangarugero na umugabo udasanzwe wanditse amateka akomeye . " " " "
Ancel nubwo yanditse ibitabo bitandukanye ku ruhare rwa u Bufaransa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , ntabwo yaherukaga mu Rwanda .
Yagiye ahabwa kenshi ubutumire ariko akanga kuza .
Kuri ubu Ancel yavuze ko icyamubuzaga kuza Perezida Macron yagikuyeho .
Ati " " " " Ubu uyu munsi niteguye kuza mu Rwanda nkeye igihe cyose natumirwa kuko inzitizi Perezida Macron yazikuyeho . " " " "
Guillaume Ancel yavuze ko uruzinduko rwa Macron mu Rwanda na imbabazi yahasabiye byamuruhuye umutima
Guillaume Ancel yavuze ko kuba Kagame yaricaranye na abantu bari bahanganye mu gihe cya Operation Turquoise ari ikimenyetso cya amahoro na ubwiyunge
U Rwanda na Afurika ya Epfo byashashe inzobe , byiyemeza kuzahura umubano umaze igihe mu rwijiji .
Byatangajwe kuri uyu wa Gatanu , tariki ya 4 Kamena 2021 , nyuma ya ibiganiro byahuje Minisitiri wa Ububanyi na Amahanga wa u Rwanda , Dr Vincent Biruta na mugenzi we wa Afurika ya Epfo , Dr Naledi Pandor .
Muri ibyo biganiro byabaye mu ruzinduko Dr Biruta yagiriye muri Afurika ya Epfo , aba bombi bemeranyije ko bagiye gusubiza mu buryo umubano wa ibihugu byombi nyuma ya ibiganiro Perezida Paul Kagame na Cyril Ramaphosa bagiye bagirana mu bihe bitandukanye .
Itangazo ryasohowe na Ibiro bya Minisiteri ya Ububanyi na Amahanga na Ubutwererane ya Afurika ya Epfo , ryavuze ko abo bayobozi bahuye hagamijwe gusesengura uko umubano wa ibihugu byombi wifashe na imbogamizi zikiwuzitira kugira ngo zikurweho .
Bemeranyije kugarura umubano wari uhari mbere ya uko ibintu bitangira kudogera mu 2013 .
Ryakomeje riti " " " " Mu biganiro birambuye kandi birimo ukuri , ba minisitiri bombi biyemeje gusubiza umubano mu buryo nka uko Perezida Kagame na Cyril Ramaphosa babyemeranyije nyuma ya ibiganiro bagiranye . " " " "
Ibihugu byombi kandi byashyizeho ibikorwa na ingamba bihuriweho biganisha ku nzira yazana inyungu ku baturage ba ibihugu byombi .
Hanemejwe ko hagomba gushyirwaho uburyo bwo gufasha inzira yo gusubiza uwo mubano mu buryo , hubahirizwa amategeko mpuzamahanga .
Hashyizweho itsinda rihuriweho riyobowe na Minisitiri Biruta ndetse na Pandor rigamije kuyobora urugendo rwo kuzahura umubano wa ibihugu byombi .
Iryo tsinda rizasesengura ibibazo byose bibangamiye umubano wa ibihugu byombi , raporo ishyikirizwe abaminisitiri bombi .
Ibi biganiro bije bikurikira ibyahuje abakuru ba ibihugu byombi tariki 18 Gicurasi 2021 i Paris aho bari bitabiriye Ihuriro ryiga ku Iterambere rya Ubukungu bwa Afurika .
Umuhanzi Julio Kamungu yasubukuye umuziki nyuma ya imyaka icyenda .
Uyu mugabo yakoze umuziki mu 2003 aririmba muri za korali kugeza mu 2009 ubwo yafataga umwanzuro wo gukora umuziki ku giti cye ariko mu 2012 aza kuba awuretse akajya aririmba mu nsengero gusa .
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE yavuze ko mu 2012 yahisemo kuba asubitse umuziki akajya mu bindi .
Yakomeje ati " " " " Kuva icyo gihe nakoze indirimbo zigeze kuri esheshatu ariko guhera mu 2012 naje guhagarika nsigara ndirimba mu rusengero gusa . " " " "
Avuga ko afite intego yo kubwira abantu ubwami bwa Imana , akabereka ko bakwiriye kuva mu mwijima .
Ati " " " " Intego mfite ikubiye mu ijambo riri muri Habakuki 2 : 14 ; rigira riti " " " " Kuko Isi izakwirwa no kumenya ubwiza bwa Uwiteka , nka uko inyanja ya amazi isendera . " " " " " " " "
Ubutumwa nibandaho ni ubwa Ubwami , kubwira abantu ko ubwami bwa Imana bwaje ko umwanzi nta mwanya agifite mu bana ba Imana , ukubimenya bikaba aribwo buzima kandi ko hamwe na Kirisitu dukwiye kuba mu buzima buzira umwijima . " " " "
Ubu Julio Kamungu yamaze gushyira hanze indirimbo nshya yise " " " " " " " " Ni wowe " " " " " " " " avuga ko ikubiyemo ibya Ubwami bwa Imana .
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Nayihawe nka ihishurirwa nagize ku bya Ubwami bwa Imana aho Yesu yabwiye abamwitaga ngo ni umukuru wa abadayimoni bavuga ko ariyo mpamvu abasha kwirukana abadayimoni , we akababwira ko nta bwami bwirwanya ahubwo ko iyo bwirwanyije buba busenyuka . " " " "
Amajwi ya iyi ndirimbo " " " " Ni wowe " " " " yakozwe na Bruce & Boris , amashusho yayo afatwa ndetse atunganywa na Fleury Legend .
Uyu muhanzi avuga ko agiye gufatiraho agakora ibindi bihangano kandi yizera ko bizafasha benshi .

Batuye i Gikondo mu Mujyi wa Kigali .
" " " " Africa Haguruka " " " " igiye kongera kuba hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga .
Iki gikorwa ubusanzwe gitegurwa na Umuryango Authentic Word Ministries na amatorero ya Zion Temple Celebration Center giteganijwe kuva ku cyumweru tariki 11 kugera ku wa 18 Nyakanga 2021 .
" " " " Africa Haguruka " " " " uyu mwaka izibanda ku ijambo riboneka muri Bibiliya , mu Gitabo cya Ezekiyeli 37 : 1 - 10 .
Insanganyamatsiko yacyo igira iti " " " " Afurika akira umuyaga wa impinduka nziza . " " " "
Mu iki gikorwa haba ibiterane , gutanga inyigisho , ibiganiro cyangwa guhuza abantu baturutse mu bihugu bitandukanye , byose bigamije kuzamura iterambere rya Afurika no guhembura abawutuye binyuze mu gusobanukirwa umugambi Imana ifitiye uyu mugabane no kuwugenderamo .
Apôtre Dr Paul Gitwaza watangije iki gikorwa yemera ko Imana ifitiye Afurika na abaturage bayo basaga miliyali 1 na miliyoni 200 umugambi mwiza na amasezerano akomeye bakwiriye gusingira .
Ati " " " " Africa Haguruka rero ni urubuga aho Abanyafurika na inshuti zabo bahura ngo baganire , basengane kandi bige icyo Imana ivuga ku Mugabane wa Afurika maze babashe kuzana impinduka nziza mu mibereho ya abatuye uyu mugabane , banamamaza ubutumwa bwiza bwa Kirisitu . " " " "
Africa Haguruka ya 2021 izaba mu buryo bwa iyakure kubera icyorezo cya COVID - 19 , izatangirwamo inyigisho ku miryango , uburezi na ubuyobozi .
Mu minsi umunani ya igiterane kandi hazigwa na uburyo Afurika ikeneye ubucuruzi buzana iterambere kandi bwubahisha Imana .
Inzobere na abakozi ba Imana bazajya batanga ibiganiro bizajya bisozwa na ibihe byo guhimbaza no kuramya Imana ndetse hatangwe na ijambo rya ububyutse .
Hazabamo na Gahunda ya urubyiruko izwi nka Youth Arise , aho abasore na inkumi bazaganira uko bahaguruka mu nzego za iterambere no mu kubaha Imana .
Iki giterane kizaca kuri YouTube na Facebook kikananyuzwa kuri Authentic TV , igaragara kuri shene ya 111 kuri StarTimes ndetse no kuri Canal + kuri shene ya 384 .
Kizananyuzwa kuri Radio Authentic na amaradiyo ya abaturage yigenga .
Africa Haguruka yashibutse mu iyerekwa Dr Paul Gitwaza uyobora Itorero Zion Temple Celebration Center yagize mu 2000 , rigamije kuzamura iterambere rya Umugabane wa Afurika no guhembura abawutuye binyuze mu ijambo rya Imana .
Dr Paul Gitwaza watangije iki gikorwa cya Africa Haguruka Urabagirane yavuze ko muri iki gihe igikwiye guhabwa agaciro ari ubuzima na umutekano bya abantu .
Light Of Christ yakoranye indirimbo na Kadogo wo muri Healing Worship Team ( Video ) .

Tuyizere yavuze ko impamvu bahisemo gukorana na Kadogo ari uko ari umuririmbyi wa umuhanga ndetse wicisha bugufi .
Yagize ati " " " " Kadogo ni umuhanga akaba imfura cyane , aca bugufi , akunda Imana .
Ni byinshi byatumye aba ari we duhitamo , gusa byavuye no mu kuba ari inshuti na bamwe muri twe bihita byoroha gukorana na we , Imana imuhe umugisha ko twavuze rimwe we akabyumva kabiri . " " " "
Light Of Christ ni itsinda rikorera umurimo muri EPR - Kamuhoza rikaba rihuje abaririmbyi bava mu matorero ya gikirisitu atandukanye harimo ADEPR , Evangelical Restoration Church , EAR na andi atandukanye .
" " " " Ndi Uwo Ndiwe " " " " ni indirimbo ya gatatu iri tsinda ryakoze muri gahunda ryihaye ryo gusohora iza amajwi ziherekejwe na amashusho .

Nka uko abemera Bibiliya babisoma mu gitabo cya Itangiriro 2 : 24 hagira hati " " " " Ni cyo gituma umuntu azasiga se na nyina , akabana na umugore we akaramata , bombi bakaba umubiri umwe , " " " " Irimbere Jean Christian na we yatangiye urugendo ruganisha ku gutera umugongo ubugaragu asaba Semutakirwa Cheline kumubera umufasha .

Korali Ukuboko kwa Iburyo yasohoye " " " " Si ku Kidendezi gusa " " " " , " " " " ivuga ko imirimo ya Imana itagira imipaka
Iyi ndirimbo ya iminota itandatu na amasegonda 39 , yubakiye ku butumwa bushimangira ko imirimo ya Yesu Kirisitu itarangiriye ku kidendezi ubwo yakizaga umurwayi kuko kugeza na uyu munsi agikora ibitangaza .
" " " " " " " " Si Kukidendezi gusa " " " " " " " " ikubiyemo ubutumwa buhumuriza abantu ko mu makuba na ibibazo bahura nabyo , Imana itabibagiwe kuko isaha yayo iyo igeze iratabara .
Umuyobozi wa Korali Ukuboko kwa Iburyo , Kwizera Seth , yatangaje ko icyatumye bakora iyi ndirimbo bashakaga kubwira abantu ko Yesu agikora imirimo ikomeye .
Yagize ati " " " " " " " " Kugera na uyu munsi Yesu Kirisitu aracyakora ibitangaza .
Mu bihe nka ibi Isi yose yugarijwe na icyorezo cya COVID - 19 , abantu ntibakwiye gukuka umutima ahubwo bizere Umwami Yesu kuko uko yari ari kera na ubu niko akiri kandi niko azahora iteka ryose ( Abaheburayo 13 : 8 ) . " " " " " " " "
" " " " " " " " Ikidendezi " " " " " " " " ni indirimbo yigaruriye imitima ya benshi mu Rwanda , yanarenze imipaka ikundwa na abatumva Ikinyarwanda cyane cyane muri Afurika ya Uburasirazuba .
Nyuma yo gukundwa bihebuje , Korali Ukuboko kwa Iburyo yahisemo no kuyishyira mu Giswahili iyita " " " " Kisima " " " " kugira ngo na abanyamahanga bumve ubutumwa buyirimo .
Iyi ndirimbo irimo ubutumwa buboneka muri Yohana 5 : 1 - 9 ahari inkuru ya umurwayi wari umaze imyaka 38 ku Kidendezi cya Betesayida , cyihindurizaga maze utanzemo abandi barwayi agakira , we kuko atagiraga umuterera mu Kidendezi yamaze imyaka myinshi ategereje gukira .
Igihe cyarageze Yesu rimwe ahanyuze amenya ko arwaye igihe kirekire amukiza atagombye kwiterera mu kidendezi .
Korali Ukuboko kwa Iburyo ni imwe mu nkuru mu Itorero ADEPR mu Rwanda kuko yashinzwe ahagana mu 1989 .
Igizwe na abaririmbyi barenga 150 .
Kuva yashingwa yakoze ibikorwa binyuranye , itegura kandi yitabira ibitaramo bitandukanye mu Rwanda no muri Uganda .
Igitaramo gikomeye Korali Ukuboko kwa Iburyo iheruka gutegura ni icyabereye muri Dove Hotel cyiswe " " " " Ikidendezi Live Concert " " " " cyabaye ku wa 1 Ukuboza 2019 gihuruza imbaga ku buryo abenshi batabashije kubona aho bicara bagikurikiranira hanze ya icyumba cya Dove Hotel ku Gisozi .

Patient Bizimana ​ yerekanywe mu rusengero na umukunzi we bitegura kurushinga .
Kuri uyu munsi ni bwo aba bombi berekanwe bwa mbere mu rusengero rwa Evangelical Restoration Church ( ERC ) Masoro , Patient asanzwe ateraniramo .
Intambwe yo kwerekanwa kwa abasore na inkumi bitegura kurushinga iri mu za ibanze zibanziriza umuhango wo gusezeranira imbere ya itorero .
Kiba kigamije no gushimangira ko abagiye kurushinga ari indakemwa mu mico na imyifatire kandi abanyetorero babitangamo ubuhamya .
Mu materaniro yo ku Cyumweru ni bwo Patient Bizimana na Uwera Gentille bamaze igihe bari mu rukundo berekanwe imbere ya abakirisitu ba ERC Masoro .
Ni igikorwa cyabaye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus .
Hahamagarwaga couple imwe ku yindi hanyuma hakerekanwa ifoto yabo .
Muri couples zaranzwe zizakora ubukwe uyu mwaka harimo na iya Patient Bizimana na Uwera Gentille usanzwe atuye muri Leta ya Tennessee muri Amerika .
Ubwo Pasiteri Kamanzi Marcellin yahamagaraga amazina yabo byahinduye isura , humvikanye amajwi arenga aherekejwe na umuziki wumvikanagamo indirimbo ya Patient Bizimana yitwa " " " " Menye Neza . " " " "
Ni ikimenyetso gisa na icyerekanaga ko bishimiye kubona umukunzi wa uyu muhanzi uri mu bafite izina rikomeye mu muziki uhimbaza Imana wa u Rwanda .
Nubwo nta tariki iratangazwa ya igihe Patient Bizimana azarongorera , kuba ari mu rutonde rwa abaranzwe ni icyerekana ko uyu mwaka uzasiga atakiri mu busiribateri .
Patient Bizimana yamaze kuba umugabo byemewe na amategeko kuko yasezeranye na Uwera muri Kamena 2019 mu Karere ka Rubavu .
Ni umuhango wabaye mu bwiru bukomeye , uhezwamo itangazamakuru ndetse no kubona ifoto yabaye ingume .
Uyu muhanzi yavuzwe mu nkuru za urukundo na bamwe mu bakobwa barimo na abo basengana .
Uwa nyuma baciye amarenga yo gukundana ni Deborah Uwamahoro Masasu [ warushinze ] , uyu akaba ari umukobwa wa Apôtre Yoshua Ndagijimana Masasu , uyobora Evangelical Restoration Church ku Isi .
Uwamahoro yaje nyuma ya andi makuru yavugaga ko Patient Bizimana yagiranye ibihe byiza mu rukundo ruhishe na Gaby Kamanzi ariko yatangaje ko amufata nka umuvandimwe we yubaha basangiye itorero ndetse na umuhamagaro mu murimo wa Imana .
Uyu muhanzi kandi yanavuzwe mu rukundo Miss Rwanda 2015 Kundwa Doriane , na we avuga ko batagiranye ubucuti bwimbitse .
