Ambasaderi wa Australie muri EAC yacyeje impano ya Vestine na Dorcas .
Abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter yanditse agaragaza ko aryohewe na impera za icyumweru kubera indirimbo ya aba bana yitwa " " " " Nahawe Ijambo . " " " "
Yanditse ati " " " " Muri weekend ndi kumva indirimbo ya Vestine na Dorcas .
Abantu babiri bafite impano bo mu Rwanda bafitiye ubutumwa Isi .
Muyishimire . " " " "
Iyi ndirimbo ya Vestine na Dorcas ni yo ya mbere bahereyeho gusa yarakunzwe mu buryo bukomeye ndetse abasaga miliyoni eshatu bamaze kuyireba .
Irimo ubutumwa buvuga ku muntu wahuye na ibigeragezo ariko akaza gutabarwa na Imana , akaba ayishima mu buryo bukomeye .
Mu minsi ishize basohoye iyo bise " " " " Papa " " " " yaje ari iya kabiri mu rugendo rwabo rwa muzika ndetse nayo yarakunzwe .
Ishimwe Vestine Taricy yavutse tariki 2 Gashyantare 2004 , ubu yiga mu mwaka wa Gatatu wa amashuri yisumbuye .
Kamikazi Dorcas we yavutse ku wa 28 Kamena 2006 .
Yiga mu mwaka wa kabiri wa amashuri yisumbuye , bombi bavuka kuri Uzamukunda Elizabeth na Nizeyimana Mazimpaka .
Bavuka ari batandatu mu rugo iwabo , harimo abakobwa bane na abahungu babiri .
Baririmba muri Goshen Choir yo muri ADEPR i Musanze .
Batangiye kuririmba ku giti cyabo mu 2018 , mbere yo gushyira hanze indirimbo yabo ya mbere mu mpera za umwaka ushize .
Ubu bari gufashwa mu muziki na Murindahabi Iréné .
Bahuriye na Niyo Bosco mu nzu ifasha abahanzi yitwa M . Irene Entertainment .
Umuhanuzi T . B Joshua yitabye Imana .
Uyu mugabo wari ufite imyaka 57 yamenyekanye cyane bitewe na inyigisho yagiye atanga ahantu hatandukanye cyane kuri televiziyo , ndetse yamaye mu gukora ibitangaza byo gusengera abarwayi hirya no hino .
Inkuru dukesha BBC ivuga ko urupfu rwa uyu mugabo rwamenyekanye kuri iki Cyumweru , bikaba byemejwe na urusengero rw .
Bavuze ko umurimo wa Imana yakoze utazibagirana .
Kugeza ubu ntiharamenyekana icyishe uyu mugabo , gusa umwe mu bagize umuryango we yabwiye Peoples Gazette ko T . B Joshua yapfuye ku mugoroba wo ku wa Gatandatu , umurambo we ukaba wajyanywe mu buruhukiro ngo basuzume icyamwishe .
Urupfu rwe rwatunguranye cyane kuko rwatangiye kuvugwa nyuma ya uko yari amaze gutanga inyigisho kuri televiziyo ye ya Emmanuel TV .
Ibyo wamenya kuri T . B . Temitope Balogun Joshua , yavutse tariki ya 12 Kamena mu 1963 , avukira muri Nigeria muri Leta ya Ondo , abyarwa na Folarin Balogun washakanye na Kolawole Balogun .
Uyu mugabo yavutse mu buryo budasanzwe kuko amakuru avuga ko yavukiye amezi 15 .
Yakuze ari umwana ukunda gusenga cyane kuko yabitojwe na nyina ndetse aza gukurikira umuhamagaro we ubwo yari mu mashuri yisumbuye aho yigishaga Bibiliya .
Mu 1987 yashatse gukomeza umuhamagaro we ndetse no kurushaho kwegerana na Imana amara iminsi 40 mu masengesho , ayavuyemo nibwo yatangije urusengero rwe rwa Synagogue Church of All Nations ( SCOAN ) .
Uru rusengero rwatangiye rufite abayoboke umunani kuri ubu rukaba rusengeramo abasaga ibihumbi 15 buri cyumweru .
Yagiye yagura itorero rye kuko rifite amashami muri Ghana , mu Bwongereza no muri Afurika ya Epfo .
T . B Joshua yashakanye na Evelyne Joshua babyarana abana babiri ba abakobwa Serah Joshuana na Promise Joshua .
Uyu muvugabutumwa yamenyekanye mu bikorwa bitandukanye byo gusengera abarwayi aho yari azwiho gukiza indwara zidakira nka Sida , Kanseri na izindi .
Uyu mugabo kandi yari umwanditsi wa ibitabo akaba yaramenyekanye cyane mucyo yise The Wisdom to Breakthrough .
Ni umwe mu bihayimana ba abaherwe ku mugabane wa Afurika dore ko mu 2011 yasohotse ku rutonde rwa abaherwe , ayo yabarirwaga hagati ya miliyoni 10 za amadolari na miliyoni 15 za amadolari .
Kuki bisigaye ari ihurizo kumenya ukijijwe na udakijijwe muri iki gihe ? .
Hari na uwo ubwira uti " " " " runaka arakijijwe , ati yewe byihorere kuko muri iki gihe kumenya ukijijwe na udakijijwe byabaye ihurizo . " " " "
Icyakora na none bibaye ari uku bimeze , byaba biteye isoni .
Ubwo ikibazo nka iki cyazamukaga mu mitima ya intumwa , Yesu yarababwiye ati " " " " Nuko igiti cyiza cyose cyera imbuto nziza , ariko igiti kibi cyera imbuto mbi . " " " "
Matayo 7 : 17
Iyo ugenda hirya no hino ushobora gusanga umuntu akakubwira ati " " " " ubu njye narakijijwe , " " " " wabana na we igihe bikakunezeza kuko akwereye imbuto nziza mu buzima mwabanyemo .
Hari na undi ushobora kubikubwira ukumva ni byiza ariko mukanya gato yakwereka indi sura ukayoberwa ibibaye .
Mu minsi yanone usanga abakijijwe na abadakijijwe bakubwira ko kumenya umuntu ukijijwe na udakijijwe bibabera ihurizo , aho usanga umuntu wakabaye ikitegererezo akora ibihabanye na ibyo avuga , wabireba ukumva .
Bibiliya ibisobanura igira iti " " " " muzabamenyera ku mbuto zabo . " " " " " " " "
Mbese burya imbuto wera zigaragaza uwo uri we , ntabwo watera urubuto rwa indimu ngo nirujya kwera rwere avoka , ibyo ntabwo bibaho ahubwo indimu ubwayo yera indimu hanyuma na avoka ikera indi avoka .
Byumvikane ko imbuto wera ari nako uri , iyo umukristo akijijwe bya ukuri kamere ya kera ntabwo iba ikimugenga ahubwo we aba ayigenga .
Iyi niyo mpamvu imbuto wera ari ikintu ugomba guhereza agaciro .
Nawe ubwawe ushobora kumenya niba ukijijwe cyangwa se niba utarakizwa kuko mu bintu bidashobora kukubeshya , ni umutima wawe .
Imbuto za umwuka wera nicyo gipimo cyonyine gipima " " " " Ubukirisito " " " " bwa umuntu .
Abantu bamenyereye kuvuga ko nta gipimo cya ubukristo ariko aba ari uburyo bwo kwihagararaho no kubeshya kuko imbuto za umwuka wera nizo gipimo .
Ibi Yesu yabibwiye abigishwa be ubwo yababwiraga ati " " " " Bazabamenyera ku imbuto zanyu . . . . " " " "
Ntabwo ubukristo ushobora kubupimira mu ndwara wakijije cyangwa mu masengesho wasenze kuko ibyo hari igihe bigeramo ntibigire agaciro abantu bagasigara bareba ukuntu wowe umeze cyangwa uko witwara .
Kwera imbuto ni urugendo .
Uzitegereze igiti cyose cyera imbuto uko bigenda , habanza indabo nyuma hakazagenda habaho impinduka zitandukanye kugeza ubwo hazaboneka imbuto nzima zuzuye zishobora gukoreshwa .
Na umukristo niko akwiriye kwera imbuto muri ubu buryo .
Uko wari umeze ejo ntibigomba gusa na uko uzaba usa ejo hazaza , ahubwo ugomba kuba wahindutse wabaye mushya .
Benshi mu bo mubana baba bategereje kureba ko bakubonaho za mbuto , iyo rero ntazo babonye ni ha handi wumva umuntu avuze ati " " " " aho gukizwa nka kanaka nabireka . " " " "
Bivuze ngo ntacyo uba umurusha nubwo wowe uba witwa ko ukijijwe nyamara sibyo kuko nta mbuto uba ugaragaza .
Biradukwiriye ko niba twemeza ko dukijijwe tugenzura na imbuto twera mubo tubana ndetse no mubyo dukora kugira ngo ntitwishushanye na ab iki gihe , ahubwo duhinduke rwose tugize imitima mishya kugira ngo tumenye neza icyo Uwiteka Imana yacu idushakaho muri iki gihe .
Inzira ya Umusaraba ya Abanya - Uganda bahowe Imana , ikabageza ku kugirwa Abatagatifu .
Abo bahowe Imana bashyizwe mu gitabo cya Abatagatifu Kiliziya yiyambaza , gusa ubwo bicwaga na Umwami Kabaka Mwanga wari utwaye icyo gihugu hagati ya 1885 na 1887 bari 45 kuko bari kumwe na abo mu Idini ya Angilikani 23 .
Buri wa 3 Kamena Abanya - Uganda bahurira ahitwa Namugongo kuri Bazilika ya Mutagatifu Karoli Lwanga , ahiciwe abagera kuri 26 batwitswe ari bazima barimo na uwo wahitiriwe .
Urugendo rwa abo 22 bagizwe Abatagatifu , rwatangiye ubwo Umufaransa , Cardinal Charles Lavigerie , wari warashinze Ihuriro rya Abamisiyoneri ba Abafaransa yageraga muri Afurika mu 1874 .
Cardinal Lavigerie yageze mu Bwami bwa Buganda mu 1879 ari kumwe na bagenzi be 10 bagiye mu bice bya Tanganyika , Kivu na Ituri nyuma ya uko ubusabe bwe bwemejwe na Papa Leo XIII .
Ubwo bwami yabugezemo butwawe na Muteesa I Mukaabya Walugembe Kayiira .
Icyo gihe Abanya - Uganda bari bafite ubwami bukomeye kandi ari bwo bukize muri Afurika yo Hagati , abamisiyoneri bahitamo kuhatangirira kwigisha ivanjili kugira ngo babone abayoboke .
Umwami Muteesa ntiyakiriye neza abo Bera bari bafite na imikorere idasanzwe , ariko bamusabye ibiganiro aza kubemerera ko agiye kureba abo yakira hagati ya Islam , Kiliziya Gatolika na Abaporotestanti .
Nyuma ya aho gato Muteesa yisubiyeho maze mu Rukiko rwa ibwami avuga ko nta myizerere na imwe yemera kwakira .
Amaze gutanga mu 1884 yasimbuwe na umuhungu we Kabaka Mwanga wa Kabiri wari mu myaka 18 .
Kuko yari akiri muto yabanje kwemera ibiganiro na Abazungu abana nabo , nyuma na we agenda abahunga atinya ko yazatakaza ubutegetsi kubera kuva ku myemerere gakondo .
Muri Mutarama 1885 , Mwanga yafashe Abanya - Uganda batatu barimo Rugarama Joseph , Kakumba Mark na Serwanga Noah bari barayobotse Ivanjili abica urwa agashinyaguro asa na utanga urugero .
Mwanga yabakuyemo imbavu imibiri yabo arayitwika .
Mu Ukwakira uwo mwaka ubwo Musenyeri mushya wa Angilikani , James Hannington yazaga mu Bugande , yarafashwe arafungwa nyuma ya iminsi umunani we na abo bari kumwe Mwanga ategeka ko bicwa .
Joseph Mukasa wari umuhuza wa Mwanga na abamisiyoneri yamushinje kwica Hannington atamuhaye uburyo bwo kwisobanura , na we Umwami ahita ategeka ko bamuca umutwe .
Yishwe ku wa 15 Ugushyingo 1885 .
Charles Lwangwa wari warakiriye Ivanjiri , ku munsi wa urupfu rwa Joseph Mukasa we na abandi bari barakiriye agakiza bagiye aho abapadiri babaga maze barabatizwa .
Mu ibanga rikomeye Padiri Siméon Lourdel yababatije barimo na Mutagatifu Kizito wari ufite imyaka 14 ya amavuko .
Karoli Lwanga yakoze ibikorwa bitandukanye birimo no kurwanirira abagore bafatwaga ku ngufu na umwami Mwanga , ubwo ingoro ye yashyaga akajya kuba ku nyubako yari ku nkombe ya Ikiyaga cya Victoria .
Ku wa 26 Gicurasi 1886 , abenshi mu bashinjwaga kuva kuri gakondo ya Abanya - Uganda bagejejwe mu rukiko , ari naho urugendo rwo kuba Abatagatifu rwatangiriye kuko benshi batinyutse bagahamiriza imbere ya umwami ko bazaguma mu bukrisitu kugeza ku gupfa kwabo .
Umwami yahise ategeka ko bajyanwa gufungirwa Namugongo .
Abajyanywe bari abayoboke ba Kiliziya Gatolika 16 na abangilikani 10 .
Bakoze urugendo rwa kilometero zirenga 10 bajyanwa baziritswe iminyururu na imigozi .
Mu rugendo rutoroshye rusezera ku Isi , bagiye baririmba ari nako baherekejwe na isengesho .
Ku wa 3 Kanama 1886 , Karoli Lwanga wari waragiye ku ruhande rwa Abazungu hamwe na abo bari kumwe i Namugongo , Umwami yategetse ko bicwa babanje gutwikwa ari bazima .
Mu magambo yavuze arimo gupfa , Mutagatifu Karoli Lwanga , yagize ati " " " " Muri kuntwika ariko mumeze nka abari kumenaho amazi . " " " "
Kizito we agiye gupfa yasezeye agira ati " " " " Murabeho nshuti , turi mu nzira yacu ! . " " " "
Byasaga na aho yarimo atera imbaraga abababonaga batwikwa ngo batazacika intege zo gukorera Imana .
Uwishwe bwa nyuma muri abo Banya - Uganda bahowe Imana ni Jean Marie Muzeyi waciwe umutwe tariki 27 Mutarama 1887 .
Mu 1920 Papa Benedigito XV yabashyize mu rwego rwa Abahire , ku wa 18 Ukwakira 1964 Papa Paul VI abashyira mu gitabo cya Abatagatifu .
Kuva icyo gihe buri wa 3 Kanama , Kiliziya Gatolika yizihiza Umunsi wa Abatagatifu bahowe Imana ba Abanya - Uganda .
Nyuma yo kubagira Abatagatifu , hashize imyaka itanu Papa Paul VI yabaye umupapa wa mbere usuye Afurika yo Munsi ya Ubutayu bwa Sahara , aje gushyira ibuye rya ifatizo kuri Bazilika ya Mutagatifu Karoli Lwanga i Namugongo yuzuye mu 1975 .
Ubu isurwa na amamiliyoni ya abaturutse hirya no hino mu Isi , ndetse na Papa Francis yarahasuye mu 2015 .
Nyuma yo gusinyana na ikigo cyo muri USA , Gahongayire yasubiyemo indirimbo " " " " Hari impamvu pe . " " " "
" " " " Hari impamvu pe " " " " ni indirimbo igizwe na iminota ine na amasegonda umunani , iri mu ndimi ebyiri zirimo Ikinyarwanda na agace gato karirimbwa mu Cyongereza .
Ikigo cya Abanyamerika gicuruza umuziki kikaba kiyobowe na umunyamuziki Julia Wade , uzwi mu ndirimbo zirimo " " " " Lauv . " " " "
Kuva mu 2006 , Watchfire Music ikorana na abahanzi bo mu bihugu bitandukanye byo ku Isi ndetse icuruza indirimbo , igategura ibitaramo byagutse , ikaba inafite ishami rizitunganya .
Amasezerano Gahongayire yasinyanye na Watchfire Music afite agaciro ka miliyoni zigera kuri 50 Frw .
Uyu muhanzi yagurishije album enye muri zirindwi afite .
Iki kigo kikimara kugura izi album cyakozemo imwe ndetse buri ndirimbo iyigize ihabwa amagambo ayisobanura mu Cyongereza .
Nyuma yo kwinjira muri iyi mikoranire , Gahongayire yasohoye indirimbo " " " " Hari impamvu pe . " " " "
Yayishyize hanze bwa mbere mu 2009 ; irimo ubutumwa bukangurira abantu gushima Imana nubwo banyura mu bikomeye .
Iyi ndirimbo ifite amateka yihariye kuko ariyo ya mbere uyu muhanzikazi uri mu bubashywe mu muziki uhimbaza Imana , yasohoye indirimbo yiyandikiye .
Kuva icyo gihe yayigiriyeho umugisha ndetse izamura izina rye mu ruhando rwa umuziki uhimbaza Imana , aho ari umwe mu bubashywe kubera ibihangano bitandukanye yasohoye bigahembura imitima ya benshi .
Gahongayire yavuze ko nyuma ya imyaka 11 yasohoye iyi ndirimbo iri kumwe na amashusho yayo nyuma yo kubisabwa na abakunzi ba ibihangano bye .
Yagize ati " " " " Indirimbo turirimba ntizisaza .
Imicurangire ishobora gusigara inyuma ariko ijambo rya Imana ntirisaza .
Indirimbo yongeye kumbera nshya , kuko uko biri kose hari impamvu nyinshi zo gushimana Imana . " " " " " " " "
Yakomeje ati " " " " Nabisabwe na abantu benshi nanjye nsanga iri mu murongo ndimo wo kugwiza amashimwe .
Nayikoze nyuma ya indirimbo nka " " " " Ndanyuzwe " " " " navuga ko biri mu murongo umwe . " " " " " " " "
" " " " Hari impamvu pe " " " " yatunganyijwe mu buryo bwa amajwi na Santana mu gihe amashusho yayo yafashwe na Doux wo muri PRAY VISUALS .
Mu bandi bayirambitseho ikiganza harimo Rugamba Serge [ Music Director ] , Peace Hoziana na Aline Apendeki bafashije mu kuririmba , Makeup yakozwe na Trendy Shadow , yambitswe na Ben Fashion na Alga Fashion mu gihe amafoto yafashwe na abarimo Musinga Patrick uvukana na Papi Clever .
Gahongayire ubusanzwe akorera umuziki muri Kina Music kwa Producer Ishimwe Clement .
Yavuze ko indirimbo ye nshya yayikoze yamuhaye uburenganzira ndetse yanyuzwe na uburyo yakoranye na abantu bafatanyije .
Izina rya uyu muhanzi ryazamuwe na indirimbo zirimo " " " " Hari impamvu pe , " " " " " " " " Iyabivuze , " " " " " " " " Ndanyuzwe , " " " " " " " " Warampishe , " " " " " " " " Nta banga , " " " " " " " " " " " " Nzakomeza " " " " " " " " na izindi .
Amaze gukora album zirindwi zirimo iyo yise " " " " New Woman " " " " aheruka kumurika ku wa 27 Ukwakira 2017 .
Gahongayire ubarizwa muri Moriah Entertainment ari gukora kuri album izaba iriho abahanzi batandukanye , ateganya kumurika muri uyu mwaka .
Mu yindi mishinga afite harimo ijyanye na ibikorwa bya ubugiraneza byo gufasha abatishoboye anyuza mu muryango we Ndineza Foundation .
Korali Shalom yasohoye indirimbo " " " " Umuntu wa imbere , " " " " ihanura abantu kudacogora gukora neza .
Iyi korali ibarizwa mu Itorero ADEPR muri Paruwasi ya Nyarugenge , yashinzwe mu myaka yo hambere mu 1986 .
Kuva icyo gihe ikora ivugabutumwa rigamije guhindura benshi ku kwakira agakiza .
Indirimbo nshya ya Korali Shalom igusha ku buzima abantu babamo buri munsi no kubakomeza mu gihe bari kunyura mu bikomeye .
Perezida wa Korali Shalom , Ndahimana Gaspard , yabwiye IGIHE ko indirimbo yabo nshya yubakiye ku butumwa bushimangira ko abantu bakwiye kwita ku muntu wa imbere .
Yagize ati " " " " Umuntu wa inyuma arakubitwa , agaterwa amabuye , akagirirwa nabi ariko uwa imbere ari bwo bugingo arushaho gukomera .
Dukwiye kurushaho gukora neza , dukiranuka .
Ubutumwa umuntu wa imbere avuga butuma ahinduka mushya . " " " " " " " "
Abajijwe niba ubutumwa buri mu ndirimbo bwaba bufitanye isano na ibyo Korali cyangwa abakunzi bayo banyuzemo , yasubije ko abakozi ba Imana baca mu bibabaza umubiri ariko bikabakomeza mu gihe bavuga ubutumwa bwiza .
Perezida Ndahimana yavuze ko mu minsi iri imbere , Korali Shalom ifite imishinga iteganya gukora irimo gukomeza gusohora ibihangano binyura abakunzi ba indirimbo zo ku musaraba .
Korali Shalom yahisemo no kongera imbaraga mu gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga mu gukomeza gusakaza ubutumwa bwiza mu batuye mu mfuruka za Isi yose .
Indirimbo " " " " Umuntu wa imbere " " " " igizwe na iminota ine na amasegonda 33 .
Abaririmbyi bayigaragaramo bose baba bambaye imyenda yera .
Mu kurushaho kugeza ubutumwa buyirimo kuri benshi , amagambo ayigize yahinduwe mu Cyongereza kugira ngo na abatumva Ikinyarwanda ibafashe .
Yasohotse nyuma ya iyiswe " " " " Ijambo Rirarema " " " " yashyizwe hanze mu ntangiriro za 2021 .
Korali Shalom imaze imyaka 35 ishinzwe , yamamaye mu ndirimbo zirimo " " " " Nzirata " " " " , " " " " " " " " Abami na abategetsi " " " " , " " " " " " " " Nzamamaza , " " " " " " " " " " " " Nyabihanga " " " " " " " " na izindi .
Iyi korali yashinzwe mu 1986 ari korali ya abana bato , yitwaga " " " " Umunezero . " " " "
Mu 1990 yemerewe kwitwa izina , ifata " " " " Shalom " " " " rimaze gushinga imizi .
Korali Shalom igizwe na abaririmbyi 105 hatabariwemo ababa hanze ya u Rwanda na abandi bayinyuzemo ariko batakiboneka kubera inshingano zitandukanye ; ni ubuheta mu makorali ya i Nyarugenge nyuma ya Hoziana .
Imaze gukora album enye za amajwi na ebyiri za amashusho .
Imanirafasha Samuel yasohoye amashusho ya indirimbo " " " " Amariba " " " " isubizamo abihebye ibyiringiro .
Amagambo agize indirimbo " " " " Amariba " " " " ahumuriza abahuye na ibibazo mu gakiza ndetse umuhanzi yababwiye ko hari Umuremyi ubitayeho .
Amashusho ya iyi ndirimbo ya iminota ine na amasegonda 24 , yafashwe anatunganywa na Karenzo Pro .
Imanirafasha ni umusore ukunda Imana no kuyikorera , ni umuvugabutumwa bwiza bwa ijambo rya Imana akaba na umunyamasengesho ubarizwa mu Itorero rya ADEPR Remera mu Karere ka Gasabo mu Mujyi wa Kigali .
Urugendo rwo gukora umuziki nka umuhanzi wigenga yarutangiye mu mwaka ushize wa 2020 .
Imanirafasha avuga uko indirimbo " " " " Amariba " " " " yaje muri we nyuma ya amagambo yasomye muri Bibiliya .
Yagize ati " " " " Indirimbo " " " " " " " " Amariba " " " " " " " " yaje ivuye mu ijambo rya Imana riri mu Gitabo cya Itangiriro 26 : 15 , 22 .
Mu bya ukuri nabonye iminsi ya none umurimo wa Imana urimo intonganya nyinshi bityo bigatuma intama zigwa umwuma , nibutsaga abantu ko umurimo ufite uwawitangiye , wawumeneye amaraso ariwe Kirisitu . " " " "
Mu ntego afite mu muziki , Imanirafasha avuga ko agiye gushyira imbaraga cyane mu gukomeza gukora izindi nyinshi kugira ngo ubutumwa Imana yamushyize ku mutima azabashe kubusangiza na abandi abinyujije mu ndirimbo .
Uyu muhanzi yatangiye guhimba no kwandika indirimbo ubwo yigaga mu mashuri yisumbuye muri Ethiopie .
Akomeza agira ati " " " " Kubera ko nkunda gusoma cyane Bibiliya kandi kikaba ari igitabo niyumvamo cyane byamviriyemo kujya nandika indirimbo ifite amagambo mvanye muri Bibiliya .
Icyo gihe izo nandikaga zose nazihaga korali zigakoreshwa mu kigo . " " " "
" " " " Amariba " " " " ni indirimbo ya kane ya Imanirafasha , mbere yayo yasohoye izirimo " " " " Humura , " " " " " " " " Ndashaka kugendana nawe " " " " na " " " " Jya Wizera , " " " " zose ziri ku rubuga rwa YouTube .
Gukoresha nabi ikoranabuhanga , kimwe mu biganisha ahabi umuryango .
Mu bya ukuri Imana niyo soko ya ubwenge kimwe na uko ariyo soko ya ibyiza byose ariko kubwo kwigomeka abantu buri gihe bahimba ubwenge bwabo bahereye ku bwa Imana bagakora amabi menshi , ndetse na Satani ahimba ubwenge akopeye ku bwa Imana maze akarimbura benshi , kuko ubwenge bwa Imana bufasha abantu
kubaho neza no kubana neza ariko ubwenge bwa isi na ubw abadayimoni buryanisha abantu kandi bukababeshaho ku nkeke .
Ikoranabuhanga rero ntabwo ari Satani warizanye ahubwo we azi gukoresha amayeri ye agatera abantu kurikoresha nabi bakisenyera .
Reka dufate urugero , nka telefone ni umugisha wa ubwenge Imana yahaye abantu kugira ngo bashobore kuvugana batari kumwe kandi mu buryo bwihuse ariko Satani we azicamo akakumvisha ko ugomba kuyikoresha mu kubeshya maze bikakuviramo gusenya .
Biratangaje kubona umuntu umuhamagara akakubwira ngo ari I Kigali kandi ari I Butare , cyangwa akakubwira ngo ari mu nama kandi ari mu muhanda mu modoka cyangwa akakubwira ko aho ari imvura iri kugwa kandi izuba ricanye , none se ubwo ikibazo ni telefone cyangwa ni abazivugiraho ?
Imana yahaye Adamu na Eva ingobyi ya Edeni kandi irimo ibyiza byose ariko irimo na icyo batemerewe gukoraho , aricyo giti kimenyesha ubwenge bwa ikibi na icyiza ariko umwanzi yarabashutse bagomera Imana bibaviramo gutakaza iyo ngobyi .
Ni kimwe nuko ikoranabuhanga rifite ibyiza byinshi ariko hari na ibyo tugomba kwirinda gukora kuko nitubikora bizadusenyera .
Muri iki gihe imbuga nkoranyambaga zigiye kuzasenya imiryango myinshi kuko abana na ababyeyi batakibonana ngo baganire , abagabo na abagore ntibakiganira nka abashakanye ahubwo usanga buri wese ari kuri telefone ye , iPad cyangwa se mudasobwa , umwe ari kuri Facebook undi ari kuri Instagram , umwe ari kureba film undi ari kureba umupira , umwe yahamagara undi
akamubwira ati " " " " mbabarira ndahuze , " " " " umwana yashaka kuvugisha umubyeyi , umubyeyi akamubwira ati " " " " mpa amahoro " " " " kandi ubwo wenda ari kwirebera uko abandi biriwe na ibyo bari gukora akibagirwa ko umuryango we ariwo uza mbere kurusha ibindi byose .
Hari na abantu batajya basenga cyangwa ngo basome ijambo rya Imana ariko usanga barahindutse abavugabutumwa bo ku mbuga nkoranyambaga , hakaba na abandi batajya babwira abakunzi babo ko babakunda ariko bakabibabwirira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga , ibi rero birema undi muntu mu muntu , hakabaho umuntu wo mu buzima busanzwe na umuntu wo ku mbuga
nkoranyambaga kandi kenshi usanga uwo ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ari umuntu mwiza utandukanye cyane na uwo mu buzima busanzwe .
Ikindi kandi hari na abasigaye bakundanira kuri izi mbuga bakabazisambaniraho ku buryo imiryango myinshi usanga umugabo atakibana na umugore barabigize ibanga ariko ugasanga umuntu aririrwa yandikirana na abantu atazi na abo atarabona yibwira ko bamukunda akirengagiza abo babana bamukundira uko ari , batamukundira uko yifotoza dore ko hari na
benshi bisiga ibirungo ubundi bakifotoza ukaba utabamenya ubabonye mu buzima busanzwe .
Mu bya ukuri ikintu cya mbere izi mbuga zitwara ni umwanya kandi umwongereza yaravuze ngo " " " " Time is Life " " " " ( Umwanya ni Ubuzima ) ugutwaye umwanya aba agutwaye ubuzima .
Dukwiriye rero kwisuzuma tukareba uburyo dukoresha izi mbuga , tukareba niba bituzanira inyungu cyangwa igihombo .
Niba mu bya ukuri ubona biguteranya na uwo mwashakanye cyangwa bigatuma udaha abana cyangwa abandi umwanya , gerageza ubigabanye kuko mu minsi iri imbere wazasanga byaragusenyeye umuryango .
Umubwiriza mu gice cya gatatu yaravuze ngo " " " " buri kintu kigira umwanya wacyo , kandi icyo uha agaciro nicyo uha umwanya munini . " " " "
Twisuzume turebe niba abantu ba ingenzi mu buzima bwacu tukibaha umwanya cyangwa niba tutawuha abatanatwitaho mu gihe bikomeye .
Gira umwanya wo kubana na abawe telefone na ibindi byuma mubifashe hasi , musangire ku meza mudafite amatelefone , muryame mutari kuri telephone maze ibyo bindi nabyo bigire umwanya wabyo kandi nubijyaho wubake abantu kandi nawe ukurikire abakubaka .
Mu bya ukuri imbuga nkoranyambaga zifasha abantu kumenya amakuru , kwiyungura ubumenyi , kongera inshuti , kumenyana , guhanahana amakuru mu buryo bwihuse , kugeza ijambo rya Imana ku bantu benshi mu kanya gato , kubaka abantu ukoresheje impano Imana yaguhaye , kuvugana na abantu wenda byari kuzakugora kugeraho , gusoroma
ubumenyi buva mu bafite inararibonye ariko na none ibyo byose ntacyo byakumarira udafite umuryango mwiza , urimo amahoro na urukundo Kandi wubaha Imana , ibyo rero birasaba ubwenge no kwitonda kuko tutitonze twazasanga twarisenyeye dusigaye tuba kuri Facebook , whatsap , Instagram , Twitter , Snapchat , tugatakaza abo twakundaga natwe bakadukunda .
Abayobora amadini ntibumva kimwe itegeko ryemerera umugore gukuramo inda .
Ibi babigarutseho kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 21 Gicurasi 2021 nyuma yo guhugurwa na HDI ku itegeko ryemerera abagore na abakobwa gukurirwamo inda kwa muganga ku muntu wujuje ibyo amategeko ateganya .
Impuguke mu buzima bwa imyororkere zitangaza ko buri mwaka abagore bagera ku bihumbi 17 bahura na ingaruka zo gukuramo inda mu buryo bwa magendu aho bakirwa mu bitaro na amavuriro ngo bahabwe serivisi ya ubutabazi bwihuse .
Ubusanzwe itegeko riteganya ibyaha na ibihano mu Rwanda mu ngingo yaryo 125 , ivuga ko kutaryozwa icyaha cyo gukuramo inda bibaho iyo byakozwe kubera impamvu zirimo kuba uwakuriwemo inda yarakoreshejwe imibonano mpuzabitsina ku gahato , kuba uwakuriwemo inda yarayitwaye nyuma yo kubanishwa na undi nka umugore na umugabo
ku gahato , kuba yaratewe inda na uwo bafitanye isano rya hafi kugera ku gisanira cya kabiri , kuba inda ibangamiye ubuzima bwa utwite cyangwa ubwa umwana atwite .
Uko abanyamadini bafata iri tegeko
Abayobora amadini na amatorero baganiriye na IGIHE hari abavuze ko badashobora kujya imbere ya abakirisitu ngo babasobanurire ibijyanye na iri tegeko kabone nubwo ritemerera buri wese gukuramo inda .
Bavuze ko uburyo ubwo aribwo bwose bwakoreshwa mu gukuriramo umuntu inda nka abakirisitu batabwemera gusa bakavuga ko na none batazarwanya gahunda za Leta ariko ko batazabyigisha mu madini na amatorero yabo .
Hari abandi bavuze ko iri tegeko kuryigisha abakirisitu ntacyo bitwaye ngo kuko impamvu izi nda zikurwamo haba hagamije kuramira ubuzima bwa wa wundi wayitwaye byashobokaga ko yamuhitana , bakavuga ko bijyanye na iterambere isi igezemo kubyigisha ntacyo bitwaye .
Umushumba wa itorero Vivante Paruwasi ya Kayonza , Rev Kareramanzi Callixte , yavuze ko bashingiye ku myizerere yabo ku bwa ijambo rya Imana rigaragaza ko gukuramo inda ari icyaha ibi ngo bikaba aribyo agenderaho atakwigishiriza mu itorero rye iri tegeko .
Ati " " " " Nkanjye ku giti cyanjye numvise ntabyigisha ariko undi bitewe na imyizerere ye ashobora kubyigisha gusa njye sinahagarara hariya ngo mbyigishe . " " " "
Yavuze ko ashobora kwifashisha ubundi buryo bwo kwigisha no guhugura abakirisitu be , akabigisha uburyo bashobora kwirinda no gukurikiza amategeo ya Imana .
Uwo binaniye ngo yamwohereza mu buyobozi bwite bwa Leta akaba aribwo bumufasha ariko we atabigizemo uruhare .
Ku ruhande rwa Pasiteri Mudaheranwa Félix uyobora ADEPR mu Mujyi wa Kayonza we asanga iri tegeko kuryigisha ntacyo bitwaye ngo kuko rigamije gutabara ubuzima bwa abanyarwanda .
Ati " " " " Nka umuyendini hari icyo nzafasha abo nyoboye nyuma yo kurisobanukirwa , gukuramo inda birashoboka igihe bibangamiye ubuzima bwa umuntu , igihe uburyo yayitwayemo buteje ikibazo , abakirisitu tuzabafasha kubasobanurira kuko si buri wese uyikurirwamo . " " " "
Pasiteri Mudaheranwa yavuze ko Leta ya u Rwanda itemerera abantu gukuramo inda kandi ari nako nabo babyemera nka abakirisitu kuko ari icyaha akavuga ko kuba hari itegeko rishobora kurengera umuntu wari ugiye gutwita iyo nda ikaba yanamuvutsa ubuzima badashobora kubirwanya .
Umuyobozi wa Akarere ka Kayonza wungirije ushinzwe imibereho myiza ya abaturage , Harelimana Jean Damascene , we avuga ko kuba umuntu atabikora bidakuraho kuba abizi neza yanabihuguriwe .
Yavuze ko icyo basaba abanyamadini ari ukutavuguruza itegeko ngo babe babuza abakirisitu babo kugana ibitaro mu gihe bakeneye iyi serivisi kandi bujuje ibisabwa , yavuze ko ikigamijwe ari ugutuma umunyarwanda ahabwa ubuvuzi bwizewe kandi agakomeza kugira ubuzima bwiza .
Umunsi Mukuru wa Eid al - Fitr uzaba kuwa Kane .
Mu itangazo RMC yashyize hanze kuri uyu wa Kabiri , yatangaje ko " " " " Ubuyobozi bukuru buboneyeho umwanya wo kwifuriza Abayisilamu na Abanyarwanda bose muri rusange kuzagira umunsi mukuru mwiza wa Eid al - Fitr . " " " "
Mufti wa u Rwanda , Sheikh Hitimana Salim yabwiye IGIHE ko kubaha Imana na urukundo bikwiriye kuba ikirango cya abayisilamu no mu bihe bisanzwe .
Ati " " " " Igisibo tuvuyemo ni nka ingando abantu barimo baba bakwiye gukuramo amasomo yo kwiyegereza Imana .
Kuyubaha na urukundo bazabikomeze no mu bihe bindi mu myaka iri imbere . " " " "
Mufti Hitimana Salim yakomeje asaba Abayisilamu kuzaza kwifatanya nabo ku munsi mukuru wa ( Eid al - Fitr , ) nyuma ya isengesho rizarangira saa yine za igitondo .
Igisibo ni rimwe mu mahame atanu ya idini ya Islam , risaba abayoboke baryo kwigomwa amafunguro , ibinyobwa mu bihe bisanzwe na ibindi bibashimisha bakarangamira Imana .
Gusa bemerewe gufata ifunguro izuba rirenze no mu rukerera .
Eid al - Fitr , ni umunsi uba ari ikiruhuko ku bakozi bose mu Rwanda , inshuti na abavandimwe bakajya kwishimana na abayisilamu kuri uwo munsi mukuru .
Minisiteri ya abakozi ba Leta na Umurimo yatangaje ko mu rwego rwo kwifatanya na Abayisilamu mu kwizihiza umunsi mukuru wa Eid al - Fitr , kuwa Kane tariki 13 Gicurasi 2021 ari umunsi wa ikiruhuko .
Minisitiri Gatabazi yasabye Kiliziya gukoresha Pacis TV mu kubaka Abanyarwanda bakunda igihugu .
Ni ubutumwa yatanze kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 4 Gicurasi 2021 , ubwo yafunguraga ku mugaragaro Televiziyo ya Kiliziya Gatolika , PACIS TV , yari imaze umwaka ikora ariko itarafungurwa ku mugaragaro ndetse ikaba yiyongereye kuri shene zizajya zigaragara kuri Canal + .
Minisitiri Gatabazi yavuze ko Leta ya u Rwanda na Kiliziya Gatolika bifitanye igihango mu bufatanye muri gahunda zihindura ubuzima bwa abaturage cyane cyane uburezi , ubuvuzi , guteza imbere imibereho ya abaturage , ibikorwa remezo na ibindi .
Ashimangira ko iyi televiziyo ije ari indi ntabwe yiyongera kuri ubwo bufatanye .
Yagize ati " " " " Leta ya u Rwanda yakomeje gushyigikira itangazamakuru no kuriteza imbere binyuze muri politiki na amategeko byashyiriweho gufasha abakora umwuga wa itangazamakuru na abifuza gushinga ibitangazamakuru byabo . " " " "
Yavuze ko gufungura Pacis TV , nka igitangazamakuru gishya mu Rwanda byabaye nyuma ya umunsi umwe hizihijwe Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wa Ubwisanzure bwa Itangazamakuru , ari igishimangira ko ubwisanzure mu gihugu bwatumye mu myaka 27 ishize ibitangazamakuru bigenda byiyongera ndetse na Pacis TV ikaba ije kubishimangira .
Minisitiri Gatabazi yavuze kandi ko iyi televiziyo ije ikurikira Radio Maria nayo isanzwe ari iya Kiliziya Gatolika kandi byose bikaba byifashishwa mu kugeza ivugabutumwa ku banyarwanda .
Ati " " " " Nsanzwe numva Radio Maria , mu bihe bya Covid - 19 yigishaga abanyarwanda uko bakwirinda Covid - 19 , kubahiriza amabwiriza yashyizweho ya ubwirinzi .
Ibi rero na Pacis TV twizeye ko izakomereza muri uwo murongo wo kwigisha ubutumwa bwiza buhindura roho ariko ikanigisha ubutumwa bufasha abantu kubaho neza no gukunda igihugu cyabo . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Na mbere ya Covid - 19 , ifasha abarwayi , abasaza na abakecuru batabasha kujya mu misa , byatumye batiheba kandi bakamenya na amakuru . " " " "
Minisitiri Gatabazi yasabye bya umwihariko ubuyobozi gukomeza kwifashisha Pacis TV , mu kubaka umunyarwanda uhamye uharanira ijuru ariko abijyanisha no guharanira gukunda igihugu cye .
Ati " " " " Kubaka umuntu uhamye ngira ngo ni ibintu abari muri Kiliziya Gatolika bazi kuturusha , bazajya bongeramo uwo mwanya .
Kenshi iyo nabonye umwanya ngakurikira ibiganiro mbonamo ibikomeye byo kubaka umuntu .
Turizera ko muzakomeza kwigisha abanyarwanda kuba Umukirisitu mwiza ariko akaba na umunyarwanda mwiza icyarimwe , gukunda ijuru no guharanira kuzarigeramo bikubakwa no gukunda u Rwanda . " " " "
Antoine Cardinal Kambanda , Arkiyepiskopi wa Kigali yavuze ko ubwo Vatican yashishikarizaga Kiliziya Gatolika ku Isi kugeza ubutumwa ku bakirisitu hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga ari nabwo hatangijwe iyi televiziyo ya Pacis Tv .
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Twashishikarijwe gukoresha ibinyamakuru kugeza inkuru nziza ku bantu bose cyane cyane ko ari ijambo ritanga amahoro ryubaka nka iyi televiziyo ya amahoro [ Pacis TV ] , ishinzwe bya umwihariko gutangaza ihumure na amahoro ku Isi yacu . " " " "
Cardinal Kambanda yavuze ko bigendeye ku busabe bwa abakristu ndetse na ubwo Minisitiri Gatabazi yabagejejeho , uretse ibiganiro byibanda ku iyobokamana na ivugabutumwa , bazongeramo ibigaruka ku kubaka umuryango .
Ati " " " " Muri iki gihe hakenewe gushyigikira umuryango , gufasha umuryango ari abato kubaka umuryango harimo imfubyi zitagize amahirwe yo kugira umuryango , usanga bibana mu mujyi , ubwo rero itangazamakuru rirabafasha mu bujyanama , mu nyigisho za uburyo urugo rwa Gikirisitu rwubakwa . " " " "
Pacis TV ifite intego yihariye yo kwegeranya abantu na Imana .
Ni yo televiziyo ya mbere ishingiye ku myemerere ya Kiliziya Gatolika ikorera mu Rwanda nyuma ya Radio Maria .
Chorale Christus Regnat yahimbye indirimbo ivuga ku buhangange bwa Imana .
Ni nyuma yo gusohora indirimbo zinyuranye mu 2020 , yongera gukora mu nganzo isohora indirimbo " " " " Umukozi wa umuhanga " " " " yahimbwe na Iyambonye Arcade umwe mu abanyamuziki ba Chorale Christus Regnat .
Bizimana Jeremie usanzwe ari umuhimbyi , umwarimu wa indirimbo ndetse akanamamaza ibikorwa bya iyi korali , yabwiye IGIHE ko igitekerezo cya iyi ndirimbo cyaje bashaka kwerekana ibikorwa bikomeye Imana ikorera muntu .
Ati " " " " Twatekereje ibikorwa bihambaye Imana ikorera umuntu , twifashisha Iyambonye Arcade maze nka umuhanzi abikuramo igitekerezo cyo kurata ibigwi bya Imana nyagasani yo dukesha byose ibyiza byose dutunze . " " " "
Iyi ndirimbo yatunganyijwe mu buryo bwa amajwi na Emmy Pro wo muri Universal Record na Bob Pro muri The Sound Studio .
Amashusho yayo akorwa na Aimé Pride ukorera muri Universal Record .
Chorale Christus Regnat imaze kuba ubukombe mu makorali ya Kiliziya Gatolika .
Ni korali igizwe na abaririmbyi bari mu byiciro bitandukanye bya imyaka , aho usangamo urubyiruko rwa abasore na inkumi , abagore na abagabo , amajigija na ibikwerere ndetse na abari hejuru ho gato mu myaka .
Christus isanzwe yamenyekanye cyane mu bitaramo byashimishaga benshi mu bihe bitandukanye .
Yashinzwe mu 2006 , ivukira kuri Centre Christus i Remera mu Mujyi wa Kigali .
Kuva mu 2008 , ibarizwa kuri Paruwasi Regina Pacis i Remera .
Ubu ifite imizingo itandatu ya indirimbo zabo mu buryo bwa amajwi , imaze gukora ibitaramo bikomeye bitanu .
Padiri Amerika yamuritse igitabo " " " " Muzabamenyera ku mbuto bera , " " " " Past Mpyisi agaya abo amadini yagize " " " " kasuku . " " " "
Ni igitabo Padiri Amerika avuga ko yanditse nyuma yo kubona ko buri munsi amadini yiyongera ariko umusaruro uyavamo ntugaragarire mu mbuto abayarimo bera .
Mu gikorwa cyo kumurika iki gitabo cyabaye kuri uyu wa Gatandatu muri muri Centre Saint Paul i Kigali , Padiri Amerika yavuze ko abigisha mu madini bakwiriye guhindura imikorere , bagaharanira kwigisha abayoboke babo ibituma berera bagenzi babo imbuto batagendeye ku myemerere , ahubwo bishingiye ku bumuntu .
Ati " " " " Burya umuntu utemera na iyo wamwigisha ntacyo yafata ariko nanone kuvuga ngo uremera gusa ukemera ibintu utabisobanukiwe , ni bwa bujiji . Uwigisha ijambo rya Imana ntakwiriye kuvugira mu rwihishwa , akwiriye kuvugira ahabona kugira ngo ikidasobanutse gisobanuke . " " " "
Yavuze ko mbere na mbere umuntu kugira ngo yemere , akwiriye kubanza kwigishwa kugira ngo amenye ishingiro rya ukwemera kwe , bimuyobore mu kwerera abandi imbuto nziza , aho kuba imbata ya idini nka umufana .
Ati " " " " Turagira ngo wa muntu aho ari ajijuke hanyuma niyera imbuto azamenye na imbuto ategereje .
Ntabwo wakwera imbuto utazi aho uhagaze .
Twigisha abantu kugira ngo bajijuke hanyuma bere imbuto . " " " "
Pasiteri Ezra Mpyisi , umudivantiste wa umunsi wa karindwi akaba umwe mu bifashishijwe mu gutanga inyigisho muri iki gitabo , yavuze uburyo na we akijya mu idini , ibyo bamubwiraga byose yabimiraga bunguri , nta bushishozi ashyizemo .
Ati " " " " Ijambo rya Imana naryakiraga nkuko abapasiteri babimbwiraga , nkaryakira nka kasuku .
Icyo bavuze nkavuga icyo , icyo bambwiye kwanga nkacyanga icyo bambwiye gukunda nkagikunda , mbifata ntyo mba umukiristo wirinda , ukomeye kugira ngo Imana izanjyane mu ijuru . " " " "
" " " " Nabaye mwarimu , igihe kiragera mba pasiteri , ariko pasiteri kasuku uvuga ibyo abwiwe .
Mba umukiristo wa intangarugero ariko ufite ubwoba .
Nakora icyaha nkajya ku mavi nkasenga ngo ngiye kubura ijuru .
Barambwiye ngo gusenga no kwiyiriza nibyo bizatuma ubona ijuru .
Icyacumi na amaturo nkabyitondera .
Mpindura imibereho myiza ikiguzi cyo kuzajya mu ijuru , kandi baratubwiraga bati ibya Imana ntibibazwa , ubyemera uko ubibwiwe .
Nkabikora ariko sinyurwe . " " " "
Pasiteri Mpyisi avuga ko yagiye kwiga iyobokamana mu mahanga ngo arebe ko yagira ubumenyi bwisumbuye kubwo yari azi , agaruka uko yagiye .
Ati " " " " Njya mu mahanga niga théologie imyaka ine , mvamo ndi kasuku , nzi ko idini rya Imana ari abadivantisiti ba umunsi wa karindwi , abandi bose ntumbwire ibyiza bakora , nti barayobye kuko niko nabwirwaga .
Igihe kiragera nza gusanga Bibiliya tuyisoma bunyuguti kandi bunyuguti iricisha . " " " "
Pasiteri Mpyisi yavuze ko abayoboke ba amadini , bakwiriye gusoma neza ibyanditswe , bagasaba guhabwa ubwenge bwo guhishurirwa no kumenya neza icyo bishatse kuvuga .
Ati " " " " Uba ukwiriye kumenya icyanditswe kiri muri icyo cyanditswe cyo kitanditswe [ . . . ] Mbere nubahaga ikimpa umugati , igihe kiragera nsanga ibyo byose ari ubusa . " " " "
Mu gitabo " " " " Muzabamenyera ku mbuto bera , " " " " umwanditsi agaragaza uburyo abantu bafite inyota yo kumenya cyane ibyo bemera , ndetse agahera muri Kiliziya Gatolika abarizwamo ashingiye ku bibazo yabajijwe ubwo bateguraga iyogezabutumwa rivuguruye mu 2017 .
Ibibazo byabajijwe muri iryo yogezabutumwa , rigaragaza ko hari abatereye icyizere amadini cyangwa se bayarimo ariko nta musaruro .
Soeur Jacqueline Mukesharugo , umwe mu batanze inyigisho ziri muri icyo gitabo , yavuze ko nubwo haba hari abatereye icyizere amadini , badakwiriye kwivumbura kuko kugira neza bifitiye inyungu ubikora na ubikorerwa .
Ati " " " " Ntabwo bakwiriye kwivumbura ku Mana cyangwa se aho basengera .
Burya muri kamere muntu ntabwo umuntu ashobora kuva ku Mana burundu .
Na iyo yava mu madini akavuga ati nta dini ngira nsengeramo ariko yabyemera atabyemera , Imana iba imurimo .
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Na izo mbuto batabona , byaba ari kwa kundi umukobwa aba umwe agatukisha bose , ntabwo ari uko imbuto zabuze hose , na uko nta muryango ubura ikigoryi , uziburiye ibumoso ntiwaziburira iburyo .
Musenyeri Havugimana André yavuze ko ibikorwa byiza umuntu akora bidakwiriye gushingira ku idini cyangwa irindi vangura , ahubwo ko gukora neza bikwiriye kuba umukoro wa buri wese .
Yavuze ko uwerera abandi imbuto aho yaba aherereye hose , abera urugero rwiza abandi .
Ati " " " " Abantu bemezwa na ubuhamya butangwa na abantu ba Imana iyo babereye imbuto .
Aho uzamusanga hose yerera abandi imbuto nziza , bazakurizamo gusingiza Imana data . " " " "

Musenyeri Musabyimana yavuze ko agakiza ko mu magambo nta mumaro .
Yabigarutseho ku wa Kane tariki ya 29 Mata 2021 ubwo mu Murenge wa Musebeya mu Karere ka Nyamagabe hatangwaga inka 18 ku batishoboye .
Izo nka zatanzwe na umushinga ufasha abana uterwa inkunga na Compassion International Rwanda ukorera mu Itorero Angilikani rya u Rwanda Diyosezi ya Kigeme , Paruwasi Busanza .
Bamwe mu bahawe izo nka bavuze ko bazitezeho kubahindurira ubuzima bukarushaho kuba bwiza .
Ryakunze Christine yagize ati " " " " Twari mu bukene bukabije kubera ko duhinga nta fumbire ya imborera bikanga kwera .

Ati " " " " Nigeze kurwaza imirire mibi kubera ko umwana yari yabuze amata , ariko ubu ikibazo kirakemutse kuko mbonye inka .
Icyo nzakora ni ukuyitaho nkayifata neza . " " " "
Musenyeri Musabyimana Assiel yavuze ko biyemeje kugira uruhare mu guteza imbere abaturage kugira ngo imibereho yabo ibe myiza kuko ari ryo vugabutumwa ryuzuye .
Ati " " " " Ubundi mu ntumbero za EAR Diyosezi ya Kigeme ni uko tugomba gukora ivugabutumwa ryuzuye , rizana iterambere mu buryo bwa umwuka no mu buryo bwa ibikorwa bifatika . " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko aho Paruwasi igeze hagomba kugaraga impinduka mu mibereho ya abaturage kuko agakiza atari ako mu magambo gusa .
Ati " " " " Ntabwo agakiza ari ako mu magambo , agakiza kaza no mu bikorwa umuntu agahinduka mu mitekerereze no mu mikorere ndete no mu myambarire na imibereho ku buryo bizana umuntu wuzuye ufite iterambere mu buryo bwa umwuka na ubw umubiri . " " " "
Yavuze ko bazakomeza gushyigikira gahunda ya Girinka Munyarwanda yatangijwe na Perezida wa Repubulika kuko babonye ko igira uruhare runini mu guteza imbere Abanyarwanda .
Umuyobozi wa Ishami rya Ubuhinzi na Umutungo Kamere mu Karere ka Nyamagabe , Ndayambaje Janvier , yashimiye amadini na amatorero ko agira uruhare mu iterambere rya abaturage .
Yavuze ko muri uyu mwaka wa 2021 muri Gahunda ya Girinka bamaze kugura inka 1115 harimo 232 zaguzwe na akarere na izindi 52 zatanzwe na abafatanyabikorwa naho izindi zikaba zikomoka mu kwitura hagati ya abaturage baba barazihawe kuko iyo ibyaye uwayihawe yoroza mugenzi we .
Yavuze ko kuva Gahunda ya Girinka yatangira mu 2006 , mu Karere ka Nyamagabe hamaze gutangwa inka zigera mu bihumbi 18 kandi uwo bayihaye igapfa bamushumbusha indi .
Izo nka zatanzwe zigira uruhare mu guteza imbere imibereho ya abaturage kuko umusaruro mu buhinzi wiyongereye na imirire mibi mu bana bato iragabanuka iva hejuru ya 35 % igera kuri 20 % .
Ikindi ni uko byongereye imibanire myiza hagati ya abaturage kuko uhawe inka akitura mugenzi we bahita baba inshuti .
Umukozi wa Compassion International mu Karere ka Nyamagabe , Nkuriza Faustin , yavuze ko muri uyu mwaka wa 2021 bamaze guha inka imiryango 44 kandi buri nka iba ifite ubwishingizi kugira ngo nigira ikibazo nyirayo ashumbushwe .
Umuhanzi Niyorick yashyize hanze indirimbo yo guhamya ko yamaramaje mu gakiza .
Yabwiye IGIHE ko ari indirimbo igamije gufasha abazayumva kwitabaza Imana kuko ariyo buhungiro .
Ati " " " " Ni indirimbo mba mvuga ko ntabasha gusubira mu buto bwanjye kandi sinabasha kumenya icyo ahazaza hazazana .
Rero aho turi hano niho hagati twagenewe kuba ariko Imana idahari simpagije !
Rero mwami hura nanjye .
Hura nanjye igitekerezo cyaje ubwo nari nicaye ntekereza ukuntu Imana nyisenga ikanyumva ikansubiza , numva ndyohewe na ibi bintu . " " " "
Yavuze ko iyi ndirimbo yerekanye ishusho ya nyayo ye kuko akora indirimbo ye ya mbere yo kuramya Imana abantu bumvaga ko atakijijwe bya nyabyo .
Ati " " " " Nkora indirimbo ya mbere yo kuramya Imana abantu bakumva ngo Niyorick yarahindutse , bamwe babanje kutabyemera bavuga bati ni bimwe bya abahanzi baba bashaka kuvugwa , ariko ubu bamaze kubyemera . " " " "
Mu minsi ishize yavuze ko kugira ngo akizwe byaturutse ku mutima wahoraga ubimuhatira , kuko kenshi yajyaga gusenga yavayo akumva akeye mu mutima kurusha uko yagiyeyo ameze .
Niyorick yakijijwe mu mpera za 2019 , abari bwo afata umwanzuro kuko yari asanzwe asenga yitabira amateraniro ariko yiyumva nka umushyitsi .
Avuga ko ikintu gikomeye yicuza mu myaka yose yamaze atarakizwa , ari igihe yataye ari iruhande rwa ubuzima bwuzuye umunezero usesuye kandi usendereye .
Yifuriza abahanzi bagenzi be bose gukizwa kuko harimo umunyenga utangaje ariko avuga ko abo yifuza cyane ko Imana yabasanga ari abarimo Meddy .
Ati " " " " Abahanzi bose mbifurizwa gukizwa ariko bibaye ngombwa bikagenda ku murongo nahera kuri Bruce melody , Meddy na The Ben .
Kubera ko atari bo babikeneye cyane ahubwo kuko aribo basa na abakurikirwa cyane muri iki gihe ( bakunzwe ) byatuma na ababakunze benshi babakurikira muri iyo nzira nziza baba bafashe . " " " "
Uyu muhanzi watangiye umuziki afashwa na Producer Lick Lick mu 2015 yaje gukizwa ndetse anabatizwa muri Zion Temple , anahita yinjira mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana .
Ubu yashinze sosiyete yitwa Mahwi Entertainment ikubiyemo inzu itunganya umuziki wa amajwi na amashusho , amafilime ndetse na ibijyanye na amafoto .
Niyo akoreramo ibikorwa bye bya muzika .
Ruhango : Amadini na amatorero yashimiwe kurenga inyigisho za ijuru gusa akajya no mu iterambere .
Byavuzwe ubwo Itorero rya Union des Eglises Baptiste au Rwanda , UEBR , ryari rimaze koroza inka 18 na ihene 80 abaturage bo mu Karere ka Ruhango aho rikorera .
Abarojwe amatungo barimo abasanzwe basengera kuri UEBR Paruwasi ya Gikoma na abandi basengera mu yandi madini ariko batuye hafi aho .
Pasiteri uyobora UEBR Paruwasi ya Gikoma , Mbarubukeye Jean Damascene , yavuze mu byo bakora harimo kwigisha abaturage gusenga no kubaha Imana ariko no kubaho neza kuko roho nzima igomba gutura mu mubiri muzima .
Ati " " " " Mu bikorwa twagiye dukora harimo kujijura abaturage batuye hafi ya aho dukorera , tubigisha kwizigamira mu bimina na amatsinda , amashuri nayo yaritabiriwe .
Abakristo muri rusange tubasaba gukomeza gukora basenga , bakora na imirimo ya amaboko kugira ngo bakomeze gutera imbere . " " " "
Bamwe mu baturage bahawe inka bavuze ko zigiye kubafasha guhindura imibereho yabo ikarushaho kuba myiza .
Mukaneza Christine ati " " " " Nka umuntu utari ufite itungo ndishimye , ngiye gukora niteze imbere kuko mbonye ifumbire na amata .
Nzahinga neze nihaze mu biribwa kandi niteze imbere . " " " "
Karemera Théogène we yavuze ko yishimira ko itorero UEBR ridahugira mu kubasaba icyacumi na amaturo gusa , ahubwo ryita no ku mibereho yabo .
Ati " " " " Ndumva nezerewe cyane nshimira iri torero kuko ryakomeje kutuba hafi rititaye ku kuvuga ngo uyu ni umukristo wacu . " " " "
Umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe imibereho myiza ya abaturage mu Karere ka Ruhango , Mukangenzi Alphonsine , yavuze ko gahunda yo guha inka abaturage bayitezeho impinduka nziza mu mibereho yabo , asaba abanyamadini gukomeza umurongo wo guteza imbere abaturage .
Yagize ati " " " " Abanyamadini na amatorero ni abantu dufatanyije mu kwereka umurongo mwiza abaturage bagomba kugenderaho , kuko ntabwo twifuza kugira umuturage wa umukene .
Turabasaba gukomeza ubufatanye . " " " "
Inka 18 na ihene 80 zahawe abaturage zifite agaciro ka asaga miliyoni 12 Frw .
mu byo bigejejeho , abaturage baba mu matsinda bamaze kwizigamira 6 , 840 , 000 Frw .
Byose babufashwamo na itorero UEBR ku nkunga ya Compassion International .
Usibye ibikorwa byo guha abaturage amatungo , mu gihugu hose bafasha abana 104 , 770 kubona ibikoresho bya ishuri no kubatangira amafaranga ya ishuri .
Mu 2020 / 21 bishyuriye ubwisungane mu kwivuza imiryango itishoboye 269 340 .
Ingaruka za Covid - 19 ku madini yo mu Rwanda na ahazaza hayo .
Uwibukwa cyane ni umunyabitangaza ukomeye wo muri Nigeria , TB Joshua , uyobora urusengero Synagogue Church of all Nations ( SCOAN ) , wari wahanuye ko tariki 27 Werurwe 2020 Coronavirus izaba yaburiwe irengero .
Iyo tariki yageze ahubwo aribwo icyorezo gisya kitanzitse .
Mu mwaka ushize habaye byinshi , ibikorwa bihuza abantu benshi byarahagaze amadini aza mu bya mbere byahagaritswe .
Uretse amadini yifite yakomeje guhanyanyaza yifashije ikoranabuhanga na ibitangazamakuru , ayacumbagiraga aheruka abayoboke muri Werurwe .
Ubusanzwe amadini na amatorero mu Rwanda ni kimwe mu bifite umwanya ukomeye mu buryo budasanzwe kuko umubare munini wa Abanyarwanda bizera Imana , nka ikimenyetso cya ubukirisitu bwadutse nyuma ya umwaduko wa Abakoloni .
Icyakora , hari impungenge ku hazaza ha amadini mu minsi iri imbere nyuma ya ihungabana rikomeye ryatewe na Covid - 19 haba mu buryo bwa umwuka na umubiri .
Mu kiganiro IGIHE yagiranye na abanyamadini na amatorero , arimo ayashegeshwe na Covid - 19 , abayobozi bayo bagarutse ku ngaruka zikomeye zabonetse mu madini ndetse na uko amwe ari kubaka ishusho nshya hagamijwe kubaka imyizerere ihamye mu bayoboke babo .
Abayoboke bari gukendera . . .
Amadini menshi ahamya ko guhurira mu nsengero byagiraga umumaro ukomeye ku bayoboke bayo kuko hari abantu bafashwaga no kuba hamwe na abandi bitewe na amateka banyuzemo cyangwa imibereho yabo mu buzima bwa none .
Kuba abantu batakiri guhurira mu nsengero nka uko byari bisanzwe , hari impungenge ko mu gihe Covid - 19 izaba irangiye amadini menshi azabogoza kubera abayoboke bayo bashobora kutazasubira mu nsengero abandi bakerekeza mu yandi madini .
Pasiteri Desiré Habyarimana yabwiye IGIHE ko amadini ashobora kuzabura abayoboke bitewe na uko Abanyarwanda bagize ihungabana mu myizerere .
Ati " " " " Urebye muri ibi bihe bya Covid - 19 , ibijyanye na imyizerere byarahungabanye , abantu benshi basubiye inyuma , amakimbirane mu ngo yariyongereye .
Kugeza uyu munsi na abantu bafunguriwe abantu ntibaratangira kuza mu rusengero ni ukuvuga ko ukwizera kwabo kwahungabanye . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa Ihuriro rya Abayobozi ba Amadini na Amatorero mu Rwanda , Bishop Rucyahana John , yavuze ko mu buryo bufatika abayoboke bazagabanuka .
Ati " " " " Urebye kwizera ko kurahari , ni ukuvuga ko abayoboke mu kwizera bazaguma kubaho ariko mu buryo bufatika bazagabanuka .
Ahubwo dukwiye kureba icyo abayobozi ba amadini bakwiye gukora kugira ngo bagarure abayoboke mu buryo bufatika . " " " "
Hari bamwe mu bayobozi ba amadini batifuje ko imyirondoro yabo itangazwa bavuze ko bishobora gutuma ubwo insengero zizaba zemerewe gukora uko byari bisanzwe bashobora kutazafungura imiryango kuko bamwe mu bayoboke babo baguye , abandi bakigira mu madini yamaze gufungurirwa .
Umuyobozi wa Itorero rya Abadivantisiti ba umunsi wa Karindwi , Byiringiro Hesron , yagize ati " " " " Buriya ingaruka za Covid - 19 nta gace na kamwe zitagezeho , ari ku miryango mito , ku miryango migari ari no ku gihugu yagize icyo ikora muri iyo miryango yose . " " " "
" " " " Itorero rero na abaturage burya kandi kugira ngo itorero rigire icyo rigeraho ni uko abaturage baba bameze neza , bakaba bafite amahoro yo mu mutima , burya iyo batabifite na itorero ntirikora neza .
Niba abantu babatizwaga mu mazi magari ubu ntibikiri gukorwa birumvikana ko hari cyo itorero ryahungabanyijweho . " " " "
Kugeza ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na Urwego rwa Igihugu rushinzwe imiyoborere mu Rwanda , RGB , mu 2015 bwagaragaje ko imiryango ishingiye ku madini na amatorero ifite ubuzima gatozi irenga 1500 .
Hambere aha wasangaga umuntu wese ashaka gushora imari ye mu bijyanye na iyobokamana atagamije kwamamaza ubutumwa bwiza ahubwo yishakira indoke .
Kuva Covid - 19 yagera mu Rwanda , ibikorwa bimwe abanyamadini bamwe babyazaga amafaranga birimo kwizeza ibitangaza abayoboke babo no gutura ntibigikorwa , abenshi bagiye muri iyo mishinga ntibabona aho bakura amafaranga nka uko babitekerezaga .
Pasiteri Habyarimana yagize ati " " " " Mbere ya Covid - 19 bigeze gufunga insengero nyinshi ziri mu kajagari , biriya byasize isomo ku bantu bose bashinga amadini uko babonye ariko Covid - 19 yo yaje ihuhura na akari gasigaye .
Abari bafite amatorero agitangira byarabagoye cyane ku buryo no kubona ifunguro byari ikibazo . " " " "
" " " " Mbona isomo Covid - 19 idusigiye ari uko abantu bakwiye kubaho mu bumwe na ubwiyunge no gufatanyiriza hamwe , bakiga gukorera mu bumwe no mu rukundo bitari ibyo kubyuka ukigumura ukajya gushinga itorero ryawe . " " " "
Yavuze ko ku bantu bagiye muri uwo murimo bagamije kubona amafaranga bizagorana cyane kuri bo kubona amafaranga ya abakirisitu kubera ko bamaze kumenya ko bashobora kubaho batajya no mu nsengero .
Himakajwe ikoranabuhanga . . .
Umuvugizi wa Itorero rya ADEPR mu Rwanda , Ndayizeye Isa ϊ e , yabwiye IGIHE ko ikoranabuhanga ryabaye uburyo bwiza bwo kugera ku bayoboke mu bihe bya Covid - 19 kandi ko bigiye gushyirwamo imbaraga mu bikorwa bitandukanye .
Yagize ati " " " " Twize ko ikoranabuhanga ari uburyo bwiza bwo kwegerana na abakirisitu , kandi twararikoresheje cyane cyane abantu bo mu mujyi tunashimira cyane na urubyiruko ko mu gihe cya Covid - 19 batanze imbaraga ngo imirimo idahagarara kuko nibo bari bafite inararibonye mu ikoranabuhanga , ku buryo na nyuma yaho twabonye ko
tugomba kurishyiramo imbaraga kuko hari ibintu byinshi byakemura . " " " "
Kuri Pasiteri Habyarimana umaze imyaka myinshi akoresha uburyo bwa ikoranabuhanga avuga ko amadini yari akwiye gukanguka akitabira gukoresha ikoranabuhanga kuruta uko yahurira mu nsengero mu rwego rwo kurushaho gufasha abayoboke bayo aho ariho hose .
Ati " " " " Nka urugero usanga muri Amerika byibuze abakina filimi za urukozasoni basohora hafi 200 ku munsi , kubera iki natwe abapasiteri bo mu Rwanda tutashyira imbaraga mu kwamamaza ubutumwa bwiza ku ikoranabuhanga ko byatuma abana bacu badahugira muri ibyo bidafite umumaro . " " " "
Pasiteri Habyarimana yavuze ko usanga abayobozi na amadini menshi batabasha kwigisha abayoboke bayo ibikenewe mu muryango .
Asanga abavugabutumwa bakwiye kwigishwa uko bafasha sosiyete hagamije kubaka umukirisitu mu mwuka no mu mubiri ku kigero cyiza ku buryo na ubwo abantu bajya mu gihugu hatabonamo urusengero cyangwa mu gihe haza ikindi cyorezo gituma abantu batazasohoka mu nzu bazakomeza kuba abizerwa .
Bishop Rucyahana asanga inyigisho zitangwa na amadini zikwiye guhinduka bakareka kwigisha ibintu bivuga ku mahanga ahubwo bakabishyira mu buryo bwa u Rwanda kandi bikajyana na icyo Abanyarwanda bakeneye .

Umuyobozi wa Korali Yesu Araje , Muhayimana Elisa Claude [ Elsa Cruz ] yabwiye IGIHE ko indirimbo yabo nshya ikubiyemo ubutumwa bwo kwamagana abahakana na abapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .

Nyuma yo gushyira hanze indirimbo yo gukomeza no kwifatanya na Abanyarwanda muri ibi bihe byo kwibuka , Korali Yesu Araje , inakora ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye .
Elsa Cruz yakomeje ati " " " " Dufite umuntu umwe tuzasura yaba incike cyangwa umupfakazi warokotse Jenoside tukamuremera ( aho tumuha nka itungo rigufi , ibyangombwa nkenerwa mu rugo cyangwa kumwubakira ) .
Kuri iyi nshuro Imana nidufasha tuzabikora muri iyi minsi 100 yo kwibuka . " " " " " " " "

Ati " " " " Ni ukumenya ko ari amateka igihugu cyaciyemo atazasibangana bakabikora binyuze mu bihangano byabo biba byumvwa na imbaga nyamwinshi ndetse bakifatanya na Abanyarwanda bagizweho ingaruka na Jenoside binyuze mu majwi agera kure Imana yabahaye . " " " " " " " "

Mu kiganiro cyihariye na IGIHE , Willy Gakunzi , yavuze ko indirimbo yayanditse nyuma yo gusoma amagambo ari mu Ibyahishuwe yerekana umunsi Isi yabuze umucunguzi ariko Yesu akitangira Isi .

Ni uko turi abaragwa baraganwa na Yesu .

Umuhanzi Willy Gakunzi asanzwe afite ibikorwa bitandukanye akora abinyujije mu Muryango Heart of Worship in Action ugamije guhindura imibereho ya abaturage mu buzima bwa umwuka na umubiri .
Heart of Worship in Action Foundation yashinzwe mu mwaka wa 2019 ; ifite intego yo gushyigikira ibikorwa bitandukanye bigamije guhindura ubuzima bwa benshi binyuze mu kubaka no kongerera ubushobozi bwa abari mu muryango Nyarwanda .
ADEPR yakoze impinduka zidasanzwe muri paruwasi , inatangaza " " " " inyito " " " " nshya mu nzego zayo .
Ubusanzwe ADEPR yari ifite paruwasi 401 mu gihugu hose ariko mu mpinduka nshya zakozwe , zagabanyijwe zigirwa 143 mu gihe imidugudu [ ubu yahindutse amatorero ari 3125 ] .
Impinduka nshya muri ADEPR zatangajwe ku mugoroba wo ku wa Gatandatu , tariki ya 3 Mata 2021 .
Igikorwa cyo kugabanya Paruwasi kiri mu rugendo rwa impinduka muri ADEPR no kubaka Umudugudu na Paruwasi byifuzwa na abanyetorero .
Cyatangajwe nyuma ya ikurwaho rya itorero rya akarere no kuvugurura indembo .
Ku wa 21 Gashyantare 2021 ni bwo hashyizweho abashumba ba indembo icyenda , na zo zongerewe kuko mbere zari eshanu .
Ibi byemezo biri gufatwa hashingiwe ku nshingano zikubiye mu ibaruwa ya Urwego rwa Igihugu rwa Imiyoborere , RGB , yashyizeho Komite nshya ya Inzibacyuho muri ADEPR ikayiha inshingano zo kuvugurura iri torero mu ngeri zitandukanye za imiyoborere .
Aya mavugurura agomba gukorwa mu miyoborere , amategeko , inzego za imiyoborere ndetse na inzego za imirimo , imikoranire na imikorere muri ADEPR no kwemeza no gushyira mu bikorwa amavugurura muri ADEPR .
Umuvugizi wa Itorero ADEPR , Pasiteri Ndayizeye Isaïe , yabwiye Life Radio ya iri torero , ko mu gukora impinduka hifashishijwe ikusanyabitekerezo mu bagize ibyiciro bitandukanye hagamijwe guhurizwa hamwe icyariteza imbere .
Yagize ati " " " " Bikorwa humvwa ibitekerezo bya abanyetorero , abashumba , abapasiteri na abandi bose binyuze mu matsinda yihariye yasesenguye ibyarushaho gukosorwa no kunozwa . " " " " " " " "
Yavuze ko impinduka zikorwa zigamije kureba uko itorero ryiyubaka , uko rikura no kwita ku hazaza haryo .
Ati " " " " Ese imikurire ya itorero ifasha na abazadukomokaho kurikuriramo .
ADEPR uko imeze ni ko abakirisitu bayifuza .
Twashyizeho uburyo bwo gukoresha audit harebwa ibikorwa na impinduka bigira ku mukirisitu . " " " " " " " "
Inyito nshya muri ADEPR
Mu mpinduka ADEPR yakoze harimo no guhindura inyito aho urwego rusanzwe rwitwa " " " " Umudugudu " " " " rwagizwe " " " " Itorero " " " " , " " " " ntibikuraho ya nyito isanzwe ikoreshwa ku rwego rwa igihugu .
Pasiteri Ndayizeye Isaïe yavuze ko hakiri kuvugururwa inzego za imirimo ariko hazanakurikizwa iza ubuyobozi .
Ati " " " " Muri uru rugendo icyifuzwa ni uko Umudugudu ariho hantu umukirisitu abonera ibyangombwa byose bimufasha gukura mu buryo bwuzuye kandi na serivisi akenera mu itorero akayihabonera . " " " " " " " "
Izi mpinduka zakozwe binyuze mu itsinda rya abanyetorero bari mu byiciro birimo abakirisitu , abashumba , abapasiteri basesenguye ibyo Umudugudu ugomba kuba wujuje na ibyo ukora .
Pasiteri Ndayizeye yakomeje ati " " " " Mu kurushaho gushyira umutima ku itorero , ntibikwiye ko turifata nka za nzego zo hejuru , aho umuntu yumva ko yageze ku itorero ari uko byageze kuri Biro Nyobozi .
Itorero ni hariya abakirisitu bari , ni hariya umukumbi uri , ni yo mpamvu mu ngamba nshya twifuje no guhindura inyito aho gukoresha Umudugudu hagakoreshwa Itorero . " " " " " " " "
Ntidushaka kwirukana abashumba
ADEPR igitangaza impinduka nshya muri za paruwasi , abakirisitu benshi bumvikanye bavuga ko zizasiga benshi mu bapasiteri babuze imirimo .
Umuvugizi wa ADEPR , Pasiteri Ndayizeye yavuze ko abashumba nta gahunda ihari yo kubaheza mu nshingano .
Ati " " " " Ntabwo dushaka kwirukana cyangwa guheza abashumba , turashaka ko umushumba akora umurimo we wo kwegera intama , akabana na zo kuko aricyo Kirisitu yaduhamagariye .
Nta rusengero rwafunzwe , zose zagumyeho . " " " " " " " "
Umudugudu wahinduriwe inyito ukitwa itorero uzajya uhabwa umushumba wawo uhoraho hagamijwe kuwongerera ubushobozi .
Inzego nyinshi zegerejwe abakirisitu mu gihe Paruwasi yagizwe nka urwego ruhuza ibikorwa byose biri ku rwa amatorero .
Umushumba wa Paruwasi azaba afite inshingano zo guhuza abayobozi hagamijwe kubongerera ubushobozi .
Kuri ubu ADEPR ifite amatorero [ ayahoze yitwa imidugudu ] 3125 mu gihugu hose ari mu ndembo icyenda aho urwa Kigali rufite amatorero 163 na Paruwasi 12 ; urwa Gicumbi rufite Paruwasi 12 na amatorero 306 ; urwa Muhoza ni Paruwasi 14 na amatorero 259 , urwa Gihundwe ni Paruwasi 21 ; urwa Huye ni Paruwasi 18 na amatorero 286 ; urwa Rubavu ni
Paruwasi 24 na amatorero 528 ; urwa Ngoma ni Paruwasi 15 na amatorero 370 ; urwa Nyagatare ni Paruwasi 16 na amatorero 452 mu gihe Ururembo rwa Nyabisindu rufite Paruwasi 11 na amatorero 262 .
Abakiristu bizihije Pasika bwa kabiri mu bihe bidasanzwe byo kwirinda Covid - 19 ( Amafoto ) .
Buri mwaka Abakirisitu bizihiza Umunsi Mukuru wa Pasika bakunze gushushanya nka umunsi ubibutsa urupfu rwa Yezu ( Yesu ) Kirisitu wabitangiye akabapfira ku musaraba .
Ibirori bya Pasika byabaye kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 4 Mata 2021 , mu gihe mu Rwanda hari insengero zitari nke zigifunze kubera kutuzuza amabwiriza yo gukumira icyorezo .
Izemerewe gukora zategetswe kutarenza 30 % bya ubushobozi bwa abo zisanzwe zakira .
Hirya no hino hari bamwe mu bakirisitu bari bagiye mu Misa na Amateraniro biba ngombwa ko basabwa gusubirayo bitewe na uko umubare insengero zabo zigomba kwakira wari wamaze kuzura .
Nko kuri Paruwasi Gatolika ya Regina Pacis mu mujyi wa Kigali , hari abakiristu bahageze bakererewe basanga umubare wa abemerewe kwinjiramo wuzuye , basabwa gusubirayo .
Abakirisitu benshi basabwe gukurikirana ubutumwa butangwa bifashishije ikoranabuhanga ririmo Radio , Televiziyo ndetse na imbuga nkoranyambaga zirimo YouTube .
Ubutumwa bwatanzwe na Abayobozi ba amwe mu madini na amatorero bwagarutse ku kwizihiza Umunsi Mukuru wa Pasika hanagarukwa ku kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda icyorezo cya Covid - 19 .
Musenyeri Thadée Ntihinyurwa wahoze ari arkiyepiskopi wa Kigali yibukije Abakirisitu ko Yezu Kristu ari urukundo ruhoraho ndetse yarukomereje ku musaraba ubwo yemeraga gupfira Abemeramana .
Ati " " " " Bakristu , ni mwakire urwo rukundo rwa Imana , urukundo rwa ibyishimo ruturuka kuri Yezu wazutse .
Urukundo rusanga bose , ntirurobanura , ntirusanga gusa ukunda ariko urukundo rusanga na abanzi kandi rugasanga na abataruzi . " " " "
Umushumba wa Itorero Angilikani muri Paruwasi ya Remera , Pasiteri Antoine Rutayisire , yavuze ko Covid - 19 , yaje bwa mbere ubwo Abakristo biteguraga kwizihiza Pasika yo mu 2020 , asaba ko mubyo basengera basaba Imana guhagarika iki cyorezo .
Ati " " " " Maze iminsi mbwira Imana nti tugeze kuri Pasika ya kabiri Coronavirus igihari , ugire ikintu ukora .
Nagira ngo uyu munsi mu bintu dusengera , twizerere ko [ . . . ] Coronavirus igiye kurangira , Imana dusenga ni Imana ifite ubushobozi kandi ishobora guhagarika ibintu . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa Itorero Zion Temple , Apôtre Dr Paul Gitwaza , yibukije Abakristo ba iri torero na abandi bari bakurikiye amateraniro mu buryo bwa ikoranabuhanga ko Yesu yatsinze urupfu kandi ari muzima bityo na Coronavirus izatsindwa .
Apôtre Dr Gitwaza yavuze ko uyu mwaka bagiriwe ubuntu bwo guterana kugira ngo bishimire Pasika bari hamwe cyane ko umwaka ushize batabashije kubona ayo mahirwe .
Ati " " " " Umwaka ushize ntabwo twabashije guterana kuri Pasika nka uku , abantu benshi twari muri guma mu rugo , murabona ko Imana irimo igenda ikingura gahoro gahoro , twizeye ko imiryango izagenda ikinguka abantu bakabasha guterana . " " " "
Apôtre Joshua Masasu Ndagijimana , Umuyobozi wa Itorero rya Isanamitima rya ERC [ Evangelical Restoration church ] , yavuze ko Kristo witangiye abantu yaje kuba imfura yo kuzuka kugira ngo areme ibyiringiro mu bamwizera .
Ati " " " " Umwami wacu Yesu Kristu yatubereye umuganura cyangwa imfura yo kuzuka kugira ngo muri we aturemere ibyiringiro bizima , bihoraho kandi bidashobora kutubeshya cyangwa kubura burundu . " " " "

Nyuma ya igihe acecetse , Dominic Ashimwe yanzikanye indirimbo " " " " Gwiza imbaraga . " " " "
Ashimwe wamenyekanye mu njyana za indirimbo zihimbaza Imana yavuze ko kumara igihe kinini nta gihangano gishya ashyira hanze byatewe na izindi nshingano yari afite mu muryango we yagombaga kuzuza .
Yagize ati " " " " Ni njye mukuru mu muryango , byansabaga kwita ku bavandimwe banjye mu buryo buhagije , hanyuma kandi ndi umunyeshuri muri kaminuza ku buryo ngomba gukurikirana amasomo nta kujenjeka kugira ngo abanze arangire ajye ku ruhande bityo nzoroherwe no gukomeza umuziki neza nta nkomyi .
Ntabwo naretse kuririmba , nta na gahunda mfite yo kubihagarika kuko ni umuhamagaro nitabye ntazuyaje , ndabikunda cyane . " " " "
Ashimwe uri gusoza amasomo ye muri Mount Kenya University mu Ishami rya Itangazamakuru na Itumanaho , avuga ko yifuje kugenda gake mu rugendo rwo kwita ku muryango we , gukurikirana amasomo no gukora umuziki .
Ati " " " " Nari kubifatanya na umuziki bikemera ariko nta cyizere nari mfite ko byose byagenda neza uko bikwiye .
Byari byiza gukora kimwe kikarangira nkabona gukora ikindi , ni bwo buryo nasanze butanga umusaruro wizewe kandi uhamye uzira kwicuza nyuma .
Ntabwo Imana izaguhembera ko wakoze byinshi cyane , izaguhembera gusa uburyo wabikozemo niba bwari buhuje na ugushaka kwayo . " " " " " " " "
Mu mikorere ya umuziki wa Dominic Ashimwe nkuko yagiye abitangaza mu myaka yo ha mbere , avuga ko kuririmba atabikora nka umwuga umuha amafaranga ya imibereho ahubwo ko abikora nka umuhamagaro gusa .
Ibi bigaragarira ku cyemezo gikomeye azwiho ko atajya yishyuza ibitaramo bye ahubwo gahunda ye ni ukugeza ubutumwa ku ngeri zose za abantu .
Icyo gihe yagize ati " " " " Nahisemo kudakora muzika nyishakamo amafaranga ambeshaho ahubwo mpitamo gushaka akandi kazi kamfasha kubaho nka abandi bose .
Gukora ibi byari amahitamo yanjye gusa ntaho bihuriye na ibindi undi wese yatekereza ko nagendeyeho .
Nifuza ko ubutumwa bwiza ndirimba bugera ku ngeri na inzego zose za abantu : abakire na abakene , abakomeye na aboroheje . . . . Imana nishima kumpera umugisha mu murimo wayo izabinkorera ku bwa ubuntu bwayo gusa , ariko si cyo mpanze amaso . " " " " " " " "
" " " " Nshishikajwe no gukora ibishoboka byose ngo ubutumwa ndirimba ntihagire na umwe ucikanwa na bwo biturutse ku mpamvu iyo ari yo yose .
Hirya ya ibi byose mbikiwe ingororano nziza zitangirika .
Uko ni ko mbyizera . " " " " " " " "
Indirimbo nshya Dominic Ashimwe yashyize hanze yayise " " " " Gwiza imbaraga " " " " , " " " " yumvikanamo amagambo akomeza abantu , akabaremamo ibyiringiro .
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE , Ashimwe yavuze ko indirimbo ye nshya yayikoze agamije kwibutsa abantu gukora kwa Imana .
Yagize ati " " " " Ntabwo Imana ijya gutira imbaraga ku wundi muntu ngo ibashe kudutabara , Oya !
Uko yakwiyeretse mu bihe byashize , kwa kundi yitamuruye usumbirijwe ukayibona na ubu iracyabishoboye kugutabara rwose kandi ibikora ku bwa ubuntu bwayo gusa nta kindi irebyeho .
Ni Imana idahindurwa na ibihe .
Gwiza imbaraga za umutima ukomere , Uwiteka ntajya ananirwa , ntasinzira ahora ari maso ku bwawe nanjye . " " " "

Reba indirimbo " " " " Ni Yesu " " " " ya Papi Clever na Ingabire Dorcas
Pasiteri Antoine Rutayisire yakomoje ku bikwiriye kuranga ubuyobozi buzana impinduka
Ibi yabigarutseho kuri iki Cyumweru tariki ya 28 Werurwe 2021 , ubwo yari mu masengesho yo gusengera igihugu ( National Prayer Breakfast ) .
Ni amasengesho yabaye mu buryo bwa ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo gukomeza kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus .
Rev . Dr Rutayisire Antoine yavuze ko umuyobozi adakwiye gucika intege mu gihe cya amage ahubwo akwiye gukomeza urugendo .
Yavuze ko buri gihe ubuyobozi buba bufite ibibazo bityo ko umuyobozi akwiriye gushaka impinduka no mu gihe cya ibibazo .
Ati " " " " Nutagira ibibazo bya abakozi , uzagira ibibazo bya ibikoresho , nutagira ibya ibikoresho uzagira ibya abashaka gutwara umwanya wawe .
Nutagira ikibazo cya ibyo , uzagira kibazo cya umunaniro kuko ushaka gukora akazi kugira ngo uzane impinduka .
Ubuyobozi ni umurimo iteka ubamo ibibazo kandi iteka bisaba ko wowe nka umuyobozi uzana impinduka . " " " "
Dr Rev . Rutayisire yavuze ko umuyobozi iteka akwiriye kugirira impuhwe abo ayobora kuko iteka ryose ahagarara hagati ya ikibazo na abo ayoboye .
Ati " " " " " " " " Hari abayobozi iyo havutse ikibazo aho kuzana ibisubizo bongera ibibazo .
Akongeramo kuvuga nabi , agakuraho telefoni cyangwa agafunga ibiro cyangwa akigendera . " " " "
Dr Rutayisire yakomeje avuga ko umuyobozi mwiza akwiye kuvugana na abantu akabaha icyizere kuko iyo bitabaye bishakira ibisubizo kandi ari we muyobozi .
Ati " " " " Niba udafite icyizere wowe cyubake mu bantu bawe .
Bashyiremo icyizere ubabwire uti ibibazo birahari , turabibona ariko mwihangane Imana igiye kuzana ibisubizo . " " " "
Dr Antoine Rutayisire yavuze kandi ko mu bindi umuyobozi mwiza akwiye kurangwa no gutuza .
Ati " " " " Umuyobozi akwiye gutuza kandi ntahunge ibibazo .
Mu ituze no mu byiringiro niho uzakura imbaraga mu gihe cya ibibazo noneho iri tuze rigomba kwiyongera . " " " "
Antoine Rutayise yavuze ko umuyobozi mwiza akwiye kubwira abantu gukomeza bakagenda kabone nubwo baba bari mu kaga .
Ati " " " " Umuyobozi akwiye kubwira abantu bagakomeza bakagenda nubwo hari ibibazo , ibibazo ntibidukura mu ntego zacu .
Ibibazo icyo bikora ni ukutugendesha gahoro " " " " .
Rev . Dr Rutayisire yatanze urugero , avuga ko u Rwanda rwahuye na ikibazo cya Coronavirus ariko bitarubujije gukomeza .
Avuga ko u Rwanda rwanyuze mu ntambara , amashuri agasenyuka , abantu bagapfa ariko ibyo byose bitaruhagaritse bityo ko umuyobozi agomba kwigirira icyizere kandi agafatanya na abo ayobora .
Amasengesho ngarukamwaka yo gusengera igihugu azwi nka " " " " National Prayer Breakfast " " " " ategurwa na umuryango Rwanda Leaders Fellowship , ukaba umaze imyaka 26 uyategura .
National Prayer Breakfast yitabirwaga na Abayobozi bahagarariye Amadini na Amatorero na abandi Bihayimana , Abayobozi muri Guverinoma , abikorera ku giti cyabo , abagize sosiyete sivile na inshuti za u Rwanda ziba zaturutse mu bihugu bitandukanye .

Nazareen Worship Team isanzwe ikorera umurimo wa Imana mu rusengero rwa Pasiteri Kawaya Pascal muri Michigan .

Ati " " " " Iyi ndirimbo ndetse na izindi ziri mu nzira turifuza ko abantu bose bamenya kandi bakizera izina rihebuje rya Kristo Yesu .
Birababaje cyane cyangwa se bizaba bibabaje birenzeho Kristo aramutse agarutse abantu bataramwizera . " " " "
