Lewis Vocal Band yasohoye amashusho ya indirimbo ibwira abantu kwiringira Imana no mu bikomeye .
Indirimbo " " " " Ndakwiringiye " " " " irimo ubutumwa bwo kubwira abantu ko no mu bihe bikomeye , inzira zose zifunze na inshuti zananiwe , bakwiriye guhora biringira Imana kuko ari yo idahemuka .
Umuyobozi wa Lewis Vocal Band , Tuyiramye Protogène , yabwiye IGIHE ko basohoye iyi ndirimbo bya umwihariko muri ibi bihe Isi yugarijwe na icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyahungabanyije ibintu byinshi mu mibereho ya benshi kugira ngo abantu bongere kwibuka ko Imana itahindutse .
Yagize ati " " " " Ni indirimbo ikoze mu buryo bwa isengesho umuntu wese yasenga abwira Imana ko akiyiringiye na ubwo ibibazo byaba byinshi bite . " " " "
" " " " Turashaka kwibutsa abantu ko na ubwo Isi iri mu bihe bitoroshye , benshi bahuye na ibibazo ntibakwiye kwiheba cyangwa ngo bumve ko byarangiye , bakwiye kugirira Imana icyizere bakagumya kuyiringira kuko yo itajya ihemuka . " " " "
Tuyiramye yakomeje avuga ko uretse iyi ndirimbo hari na izindi zikiri gutunganywa muri studio bitegura kuzasohora mu minsi iri imbere nazo zatunganyijwe mu buryo bwa " " " " Live " " " " ari amajwi ndetse na amashusho .
Lewis Vocal Band ni itsinda rigizwe ahanini na urubyiruko rubarizwa mu Itorero ADEPR , bahuriye ku kuba bakuriye mu ishuri rya icyumweru ( Sunday school ) .
Yashinzwe mu 2014 itangijwe na abasore batatu bishyize hamwe bashaka gukora umuziki wa acappella , nyuma itsinda rigenda ryaguka hiyongeramo na abandi ndetse na imikorere irahinduka , kugeza mu 2018 ubwo bavuga ko ari bwo basa na aho ari bwo binjiye mu ruhando byeruye .
Intego ya iri tsinda nka uko Tuyiramye yabitangaje ngo ni ukwamamaza ubutumwa bwiza hafi na kure ndetse no kurushaho kuba icyitegererezo bigatuma na abagiye bava ku Mana bahindukira bakayigarukira .
Bashishikariye gukomeza kubwira urundi rubyiruko kuva mu byaha rukizera Umwami Yesu na abakiri bato bagakomeza gukurira mu murongo wo kubaha Imana ndetse impano zabo bakazikoresha ku bwa Ubwami bwa Imana .
Tuyiramye yasabye abantu gukomeza kubashyigikira kuko hari ibikorwa byinshi bitegura gukomeza gukora mu bihe biri imbere , birimo gusohora na izindi ndirimbo zirimo iziri gutunganywa muri studio kuri ubu .
Jabiru da Afrique , imwe mu nyoni ziramba cyane ku isi zizirana no gucana inyuma .
Mu muryango mugari wa abantu hari abantu twita ba nyamwigendaho baba babikora mu gushaka amahoro cyangwa kubera ikibazo runaka bagize mu mibanire na abandi ariko ahantu henshi abantu bameze batyo babasha kuboneka .
Tumaze igihe kinini tuvuga ku nyoni zikunda gusabana na izindi zihuje ubwoko cyangwa se zifite ibindi bintu runaka zihuriyeho .
Ibyo siko bimeze ku nyoni za amazi zitwa Jabiru da Afrique ( Jabiru ) kuko zo zikunda kuba zonyine haba mu gushaka ibyo kurya cyangwa mu kororoka .
Uretse kuba wabona ikigabo na ikigore biri kumwe , kongera kubona izi nyoni ziri kumwe na izindi nka zo , cyangwa se izindi zo mu bundi bwoko ni ibintu bidasanzwe .
Imiterere ya Jabiru da Afrique ( African Saddle - billed Stork )
Jabiru ni inyoni yo ku mazi ifitanye isano na ibiyongoyongo na Nyirabarazana , kandi ikaba ari yo ndende muri uwo muryango mugari .
Ikigabo gikuze kiba gifite amababa ya umukara na umweru .
Ku gice cyo hejuru ku mugongo hasa na umweru ariko wagana inyuma hakaba ibara rya umukara .
Amababa na imirizo ni umukara ugaragaramo icyatsi kibisi gishashagirana .
Ku gice cyo hasi mu gatuza no kunda hasa na umweru .
Iyo amababa arambuye , ukayabona inyuze hejuru yawe ubona asa na umukara .
Iyo iyi nyoni irimo kuguruka ku mpera za amababa ubona ibara rya umweru .
Umutwe na ijosi ni umukara .
Aho umunwa utangirira haratukuye kandi hagati hagaragaramo igice cya umukara hanyuma hakongera kugaragaraho igice cya umutuku .
Jabiru ya ikigabo igira amaso ya ikijuju .
Amaguru na amano arirabura kandi ikagira mu mavi hasa na ibara rya move .
Ikigore kiba ari gito ugereranyije na ikigabo ariko bigira amabara asa nubwo ikigore kigira amaso ya umuhondo .
Iyi nyoni ishobora kugira uburebure bwa santimetero 145 - 150 , na ubugari bwa amababa bwa santimetero 240 - 270 .
Iyi nyoni ishobora kandi kugira ibilo 5 - 7 . 5 ku ngabo na ibilo 5 - 7 ku ngore .
Iyi nyoni ishobora kurama imyaka 36 .
Inyoni ikunda kuba ku migezi
Jabiru iba ahantu hari amazi nko mu bishanga , ku nkengero za imigezi , mu bishanga birimo ibiti bigufi , ibiyaga birimo amazi arimo umunyu na ahandi hatandukanye .
Izi nyoni ntabwo zikunda ahantu ha ishyamba ariko zishobora kuboneka ahantu hatumagara cyane mu gihe cya izuba .
Iyi nyoni ni indyanyama kuko itungwa na amafi harimo Tilapiya , imitubu na ibikeri .
Inarya kandi ibikururanda bitoya nka imiserebanya , ibinyamunjonjorerwa , amagi ya izindi nyoni na ibyana byazo , inyamabere ntoya na ibindi .
Kuberako iyi nyoni igenda mu mazi igashoramo umunwa ishakamo ibyo kurya nka amafi na ibindi , inshuro nyinshi amazi ashobora kwandura .
Ni yo mpamvu mbere yo kurya ifi ibanza kuyoza yarangiza ikayimira bunguri ihereye ku mutwe .
Jabiru da Afrique yororoka ite ?
Jabiru ntabwo buri mwaka yororoka ahubwo imishwi imaze umwaka umwe cyangwa ibiri ikomeza kubana na ababyeyi bayo kugeza ikindi gihe cyo kororoka kwa ababyeyi bayo .
Umushwi umaze imyaka itatu uba ukuze ku buryo uba ushobora kororoka na wo .
Iyi nyoni ikunda gutangira kororoka iyo igihe cya imvura kirangiye , ni ukuvuga ko yororoka mu gihe cya impeshyi .
Ingabo na ingore bibana ubuzima bwabyo bwose kuko bikora umuryango udacana inyuma ( Monogamie ) .
Jabiru yubaka icyari ahantu ha yonyine mu giti kirekire hafi ya amazi .
Izi nyoni kandi zikunda gukoresha icyari inshuro zirenze imwe .
Ingabo na ingore bifatanya kubaka icyari gikoze mu byatsi bikurungiye na ibyondo .
Iyo icyari kimaze kubakwa ikigore gitera amagi abiri cyangwa atatu .
Igihe cyo kurarira ayo magi ni iminsi iri hagati ya 30 - 35 kandi bigakorwa na ingabo na ingore .
Imishwi ikimara kuvuka iba isa na umweru kandi igaburirwa na ababyeyi bombi .
Imishwi imaze iminsi iri hagati ya 70 - 100 iba imaze gukura bihagije .
Muri rusange ibi bisiga biracyagaragara ahantu henshi akaba ariyo mpamvu Umuryango Mpuzamahanga wita ku bidukikije ubishyira ku rutonde rwa ibitageramiwe , nubwo muri iki gihe birimo kubangamirwa cyane no kubura ibishanga byo kubamo ndetse na imiti myinshi ikoreshwa mu kwica udukoko .
Mu Rwanda , iyi nyoni isigaye muri parike ya Akagera gusa .
Mu myaka 30 ishize , yanabonekagaga ku biyaga byo mu Bugesera .
Minisitiri Mujawamariya yasabye abanya - Gicumbi kwita ku mashyamba birinda akaga kazanwa na ubutayu .
Ibi Minisitiri yabigarutseho ku wa 7 Ugushyingo 2020 mu Karere ka Gicumbi , ho murenge wa Byumba , ubwo hatangizwaga igihembwe cyo gutera amashyamba muri gahunda za umushinga ugamije kongerera abaturage ubushobozi ku guhangana na ingaruka za imihindagurikire ya ibihe uzwi nka Green Gicumbi .
Ahatewe amashyamba kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ni ahahoze hari amashyamba ya abaturage yangiritse cyangwa yashaje .
Akarere ka Gicumbi , gasanzwe ari akarere karangwamo imisozi miremire kandi ihanamye , kakaba gakunze kwibasirwa na ibiza .
Aha niho Minisitiri wa Ibidukikije yahereye avuga ko hatagize igikorwa abaturage bakwisanga mu byago , abasaba guhuza ubutaka kugira ngo buterweho amashyamba .
Ati " " " " Kuri ziriya hegitari 20 twateyeho amashyamba , mwabonye ko hariho ubuhaname buri kugera kuri hafi 80 % .
Hatagize igikorwa rero Gicumbi yagerwaho na akaga gakomeye . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Gicumbi rero nkuko mubizi ni akarere ka imisozi miremire , ni akarere gafite na ubukungu .
Niyo mpamvu tugomba kubungabunga iyo misozi ndetse na ubwo butaka , tukabufata kugira ngo tubuhinge ariko tubungabunga ibidukikije . " " " "
Minisitiri Mujawamariya yavuze ko ahatewe amashyamba hari hasanzwe ari ubutaka bwa abaturage bwarimo ibiti bishaje , aboneraho gusaba abaturage kwita ku biti byatewe banashyiraho amaterasi ya indinganire aho bishoboka .
Ati " " " " Abaturage ibyo basabwa ni uguhuza imirima yabo kugira ngo dushobore guteraho amashyamba .
Bari basanzwe bafite amashyamba ariko ashaje tubafasha kuyavugurura . " " " "
" " " " Mu byukuri icyo dusaba abaturage ni uguhuza imirima yabo tukabungabunga iyo mirima dushyiraho amaterasi ya indinganire aho bishoboka , cyangwa se imiringoti aho bishoboka tugateraho amashyamba . " " " "
Yavuze ko abaturage bakwiriye gukurikirana bakareba ko ibiti bateye bikura , icyangiritse bakagisimbuza vuba .
Muri rusange hatewe ibiti ibihumbi 50 ku buso bungana na hegitari 20 bwagenewe amashyamba .
Guverineri wa Intara ya Amajyarugu , Gatabazi Jean Marie Vianney , yavuze ko abaturage basigaranye umukoro wo kurinda ibiti ari nako batangira kwiga umuco wo gukoresha rondereza cyangwa gaz hagamijwe kubungabunga amashyamba .
Ati " " " " Turemera ko ibicanwa bikenerwa umunsi ku munsi ariko bagomba kwinjira mu buryo umuturage akoresha ibikoresho bituma acana bike mu buryo bushoboka , yaba rondereza ndetse na gaz aho bishoboka .
Abaturage babishyigikire , babigire ibyabo hanyuma na ya mashyamba bayarinde dukomeze twagure ubuso tugomba guteraho amashyamba . " " " "
Usibye kuba aka karere katewemo amashyamba , biteganyijwe ko uyu mwaka mu gihugu hose hazaterwa ibiti bivangwa na imyaka kuri hegitari 7 410 , amashyamba kuri hegitari 909 2 , na ibiti bya imbuto ziribwa bisaga 803 , 947 .
Ni mugihe amashyamba yangiritse azasazurwa angana na hegitari 500 .
Leta ya u Rwanda yihaye intego ya uko kugera mu 2024 , 30 % bya ubuso bwa igihugu buzaba buteyeho amashyamba kandi acunzwe mu buryo burambye kugira ngo arusheho kubyazwa umusaruro uhagije .
Integuza ku byago bishobora kuzagwira Isi kubera kutita ku bidukikije .
Uru ni rumwe mu rugero rwa imibanire itari myiza ya none hagati ya umuntu na ibidukikije , aho igihe muntu yimutse , ibimera bisagamba , bikaba inganzamarumbo .
Uburyo ibikorwa bya muntu bikomeje kubangamira ibidukikije bigarukwaho bya umwihariko muri filime " " " " A Life on Our Planet , " " " " yakozwe na Umwongereza , David Attenborough wa imyaka 93 .
Yagiye hanze ku wa 4 Ukwakira 2020 , ibanza kwerekanwa kuri Netflix .
Igaruka ku rugendo rwa Attenborough wazengurutse ibihugu byinshi ku mibumbe yose ya Isi , aho yiboneye impinduka na ibyago ibikorwa bya muntu byagiye bigira kuri uyu mubumbe dutuye , uko umubare wa abawutuye wagendaga utumbagira , ibidukikije byo bikagabanyuka .
Muri Afurika ya Iburasirazuba yahageze mu 1960 .
Uko amashyamba yagendaga atemwa cyangwa atwikwa , inyamaswa zo mu gasozi zarakendereye .
Uyu munsi bibarwa ko inkoko zihariye 70 % bya inyoni zose zo ku Isi , mu gihe inyamaswa muri rusange nazo zisigaye mu matungo abantu borora , ku buryo izo mu gasozi zingana na 4 % .
Bibarwa ko mu gihe muntu adahinduye imikorere mu bijyanye na ibidukikije , akiga gukorera ibidukikije bimuri iruhande aho kubanza kubyigizayo , ibibazo bitazabura kuvuka .
Bitabaye ibyo , ubushyuhe bwa Isi buzakomeza kuzamuka ku buryo mu 2100 buzaba bumaze kwiyongeraho dogere Celcius 4 .
Attenborough yavuze ko mu guhangana na iki kibazo , ibihugu byashyira imbaraga mu gutera amashyamba ku bwinshi , ndetse bigakoresha ingufu zisubira nka izikomoka ku zuba cyangwa amazi , aho kuba amakara atuma ibiti bitemwa cyangwa ibikomoka kuri peteroli byohereza imyuka myinshi yangiza ikirere .
Bibarwa ko gutera amashyamba menshi ari ingenzi , kuko ashobora kugabanya nibura bibiri bya gatatu bya carbone yoherezwa mu kirere .
Ibyo bigahuzwa na uko abantu batangira kwiga uburyo bakora ubuhinzi bakoresheje guhinga ku butaka buto , urugero ni nka u Buholandi bwabashije kubigeraho , ku buryo buri ku mwanya wa kabiri ku isi mu kohereza mu mahanga ibiribwa byinshi .
David akomeza ati " " " " Ibi dukwiye kubikora tutazirikana ko ari ugutabara umubumbe wacu , ahubwo ni ukwitabara ubwacu . " " " "
Ibihugu byasabwe gufata ingambaUbwo herekanwaga iyi filime yakozwe na David Attenborough , Ambasaderi wa u Bwongereza mu Rwanda , Jo Lomas , yavuze ko muri uku kwezi u Bwongereza bwari bwiteguye kwakira Perezida Paul Kagame na abandi banyacyubahiro , mu nama ku kurengera ibidukikije no gihangana na ihindagurika rya ibihe , izwi nka COP26 .
Gusa kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus , yimuriwe umwaka utaha .
Ambasaderi Lomas yashimangiye ko COVID - 19 ariko idakwiriye kubuza abantu guhangana na ikibazo gikomeye cya ihindagurika rya ibihe .
Yakomeje ati " " " " Imihindagurikire nicyo kibazo gikomeye kibangamiye ibisekuru bizaza .
Muri Afurika , ukwiyongera ka ubushyuhe bikomeje kugira ingaruka ku mibereho ya abaturage , nubwo ibihugu bya uyu mubumbe byihariye gusa 2 - 3 % bya imyuka isi yohereza mu kirere .
U Rwanda rwohereza imyuka mike yangiza ikirere , ariko rukomeje kugerwaho na ingaruka za imihindagurikire ya ibihe nka imyuzure na inkangu . " " " "
Ibyo ngo bigaragaza ko ari uruhare rwa buri wese mu guhangana na imihindagurikire ya ibihe , aho gutekereza ko ari inshingano za igihugu cyangwa urwego rumwe .
Yavuze ko kwita ku bidukikije byatanga umusanzu mu ngamba zo kugabanya imyuka ihumanya ikirere bitarenze 2030 , agaragaza ko u Bwongereza bushishikajwe no gutera inkunga imishinga iri muri urwo rwego , harimo no mu Rwanda .
Mu mishinga batera inkunga harimo uwa FONERWA ugira uruhare mu bikorwa birimo kubungabunga igishanga cya Nyandungu , ndetse ikigo Bboxx cyo mu Bwongereza kiri gutanga umusanzu mu gutuma Abanyarwanda bakoresha ingufu zitangiza ikirere , zikomoka ku mirasire ya izuba .
Minisitiri wa Ibidukikije , Jeanne da Arc Mujawamariya , yavuze ko Guverinoma ya u Rwanda ishishikajwe no gukemura ibibazo bya ibidukikije hagamijwe guhangana na ingaruka za imihindagurikire ya ibihe .
Yavuze ko nubwo hari intambwe iterwa buri mwaka mu kugabanya ingano ya imyuka yoherezwa mu kirere , hari intambwe ukomeye igomba guterwa .
U Rwanda ruheruka kwiyemeza kugabanya imyuka yoherezwa mu kirere ho 38 % bitarenze umwaka wa 2020 , gahunda biteganywa ko izatwara miliyari $ 11 mu myaka icumi iri imbere , u Rwanda rukazakorana na abafatanyabikorwa batandukanye .
Bizakorwa binyuze mu mishinga irimo amazi , ubuhinzi , ibimera na amashyamba , ubucukuzi bwa amabuye burengera ibidukikije na ibindi .
Minisitiri Mujawamariya yakomeje ati " " " " Ikindi nta mushinga uzajya utangira mu Rwanda hatabayeho inyigo ijyanye no kurengera ibidukikije ngo hatangwe icyemezo . " " " "
U Rwanda rwashyizeho FONERWA mu 2012 ku bufatanye na u Bwongereza , aho gitera inkunga imishinga ijyanye kurengera ibidukikije .
Mu myaka isaga umunani ishize , iki kigega kimaze gushyira hamwe miliyoni $ 180 , kandi aho aya mafaranga yaguye ahorwa hamaze gutanga imirimo 140 000 .
Minisitiri Mujawamariya yashishikarije abikorera kongera ishoramari mu mishinga ibyara inyungu ariko irengera ibidukikije , anasaba ababyeyi kwigisha abato aho gutera igiti bagatera ishyamba , nka uburyo bwo kubaka umuco wo kurengera ibidukikije na urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima .
Nsengimana Olivier uyobora Rwanda Wildlife Conservation Association , yavuze ko bafite imishinga igamije gushishikariza abantu kongera ibiti batera .
Ati " " " " Igihe kirageze ko buri wese abigire ibye , ari nacyo ntekereza ko COP26 igamije .
Nka urugero hari gahunda turimo gutangiza mu muryango wacu , ku wa Mbere tuzasinyana amasezerano na abaturage , barimo kuduha ubutaka bwabo ngo dutere ibiti , tukajya tubaha idolari rimwe kugiti , ku mwaka . " " " "
Inyamaswa zikomeye muri Pariki ya Akagera ziri kwambikwa ikoranabuhanga ryo koroshya kuzikurikirana ( Amafoto ) .
Mu nkura kandi hari ebyiri zongewe mu mahembe yazo akuma karanga amerekezo yazo kazwi nka GPS transmitters .
Utwuma twa GPS twambitswe inyamaswa tuzajya twifashishisha iminara , maze twohereze mu cyumba kigenzurirwamo amakuru ajyanye na aho inyamaswa runaka zadushyizwemo ziherereye .
" " " " VHF transmitters " " " " nazo zishobora gufasha umuntu igihe arimo gushakisha izo nyamaswa , akabasha kubona aho ziri .
Umwe mu bagize uruhare mu gushyira utu twuma mu nyamaswa , Richard Harvey , hamwe na itsinda bakoranaga , babanzaga guzisinziriza inyamaswa kugira ngo bazambike inigi cyangwa utwuma twohereza amakuru , nka utwo bashyize mu mahembe ya inkura .
Kwambika inyamaswa iri koranabuhanga kandi bituma abazikurikirana babasha kumenya uko zifashe mu mibereho yazo , uko zikora ingendo zimuka ziva ahantu hamwe zijya ahandi , kimwe no kuzibungabunga mu bijyanye na umutekano wazo .
Mu Ugushyingo 2020 mu Rwanda hateganyijwe kugwa imvura nyinshi .
Icyo kigo cyagaragaje ko hazagwa imvura iri hagati ya milimetero 100 na milimetero 300 .
Kugira ngo byumvikane ubukana bwayo , ni uko imvura imaze iminsi mike igwa hirya no hino mu gihugu , yari milimetero ziri hagati ya 60 na milimetero 150 , iteganyijwe izaba ikubye kabiri .
Ubwiyongere bwa iyi mvura buzaterwa ahanini na ubuhehere bwa umwuka na isangano rya imiyaga byiganje mu karere u Rwanda ruherereyemo .
Umuyobozi wa ishami rya iteganyagihe muri Meteo Rwanda , Mathieu Mbati Mugunga , yavuze ko iyo mvura nta mpungenge nyinshi iteye , gusa aburira abantu kwitwararika cyane cyane abatuye mu bice bibamo ubutaka bworoshye .
Mu itangazo ryashyizwe hanze na Meteo Rwanda , rivuga ko imvura iri hagati ya milimetero 100 na 130 iteganyijwe mu majyaruguru ya Intara ya Iburasirazuba mu gice cya Iburasirazuba bwa Akarere ka Nyagatare , Gatsibo ndetse na aka Kayonza .
Ikaba kandi iteganyijwe mu Burengerazuba bwa Akarere ka Gatsibo , mu Majyepfo ya Akarere ka Gicumbi , mu gice kinini cya Akarere ka Huye ndetse na aka Gisagara .
Imvura iri hagati ya milimetero 130 na 160 iteganyijwe mu Mujyi wa Kigali , ahandi hasigaye mu Karere ka Gatsibo , igice kinini cya Uburasirazuba bwa Kayonza ndetse na Kirehe , uburengerazuba bwa Rwamagana na Nyagatare , agace gato ka Ngoma gahana imbibi na Bugesera , uburasirazuba bwa Nyamagabe , Nyaruguru na Gisagara ndetse ikaba iteganyijwe mu Karere
kose ka Nyanza .
Imvura iri hagati ya milimetero 160 na 190 iteganyijwe mu bice byinshi bya Uturere twa Kirehe , Ngoma , Bugesera , Ruhango , Ngororero , Rubavu na Gakenke .
Iteganyijwe kandi mu majyaruguru ya Uturere twa Rulindo , Gicumbi na Nyamagabe ndetse no mu gice cyo hagati cya Akarere ka Kamonyi , mu Burengerazuba bwa Rusizi na Nyagatare .
Imvura iri hagati ya milimetero 190 na 210 iteganyijwe mu Majyepfo ya Uturere twa Kirehe , Ngororero na Muhanga , mu Burengerazuba bwa Kamonyi , mu Burasirazuba bwa Karongi ndetse no Majyaruguru ya Rutsiro na Gakenke .
Imvura iri hagati ya milimetero 210 na 240 iteganyijwe mu Majyepfo ya Uturere twa Musanze , Burera na Rutsiro , agace ko hagati ka Rusizi ndetse na igice kinini cya Akarere ka Karongi na igice cya ishyamba rya Nyungwe mu turere twa Nyamagabe na Nyaruguru .
Pariki ya Gishwati - Mukura yashyizwe mu byanya kimeza byemewe na UNESCO .
Iki cyanya cya Gishwati - Mukura cyatangarijwe rimwe na ibindi byanya 23 .
Iki cyanya kigiye muri urwo rutonde gisangamo icyanya cya ibirunga giherereye mu majyaruguru ashyira uburengerazuba bwa u Rwanda , cyo cyashyizwemo mu 1983 .
Ibi byanya kimeza bibungabunga urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima bigamije gufasha abantu kurushaho gusobanukirwa no gukurikiranira hafi isano ya ibikorwa bya muntu na ibidukikije hagamijwe gukomeza kurinda urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima na ibidukikije .
Ibyo byanya kandi bifasha mu bushakashatsi , gushakira ibisubizo ibibazo bijyanye na ibidukikije byugarije Isi , ari nako byifashishwa mu kubibungabunga no guhanga udushya .
Kuba icyanya cya Gishwati - Mukura gishyizwe muri uru rutonde , bizafasha u Rwanda gukomeza kumenya neza ingaruka za ibikorwa bya muntu ku rusobe rwa ibinyabuzima biboneka muri iryo shyamba , ingaruka bigira ku baturiye iryo shyamba no ku bidukikije muri rusange ndetse no ku mihindagurukire ya ibihe nka ikibazo gihangayikishije isi muri iki
gihe .
Umuyobozi wa Ishami rya Ubukerarugendo mu rwego rwa Igihugu rwa Iterambere ( RDB ) , Belise Kariza , yatangaje ko kuba pariki ya Gishwati - Mukura igiye mu byanya byemewe na UNESCO , ari umusaruro wa imbaraga zashyizwe mu kugarura iryo shyamba ryari ritangiye gucika .
Yagize ati " " " " Icyanya cya Gishwati - Mukura ni ahantu heza kandi hakungahaye ku rusobe rwa ibinyabuzima .
U Rwanda rumaze igihe rushaka uburyo rwaribungabunga , hashyirwa imbaraga mu bikorwa karemano no kongera kuhagarura ishyamba .
Ndashimira imbaraga zatanzwe na abafatanyabikorwa bose bakoze batizigama akaba ariyo ntandaro ya umusaruro twishimira uyu munsi . " " " "
Kariza yavuze ko kubungabunga ibidukikije atari inyungu gusa ku rusobe rwa ibinyabuzima na umurage ku bazaza , ahubwo ari na uburyo bwo guteza imbere ubukungu bwa igihugu .
Muri Gashyantare 2016 nibwo ishyamba cyimeza rya Gishwati - Mukura riherereye mu ruhererekane rwa Imisozi ya isunzu rya Congo - Nil , ryemejwe nka Pariki ya Igihugu ya kane , yitezweho gutanga umusanzu mu kwinjiza amadevize binyuze mu bukerarugendo na izindi nyungu zituruka ku bidukikije .
Iyo pariki iherereye mu Turere twa Rutsiro na Ngororero mu Ntara ya i Burengerazuba bwa igihugu , ingana na hegitari 3 558 , harimo icyanya cya Gishwati gifite ubuso bungana na Hegitari 1 570 , na icya Mukura kingana na Hegitari 1 988 .
Ayo mashyamba azwimo ibimera gakondo na ubwoko bwa inyamaswa zinyuranye ziganjemo inkende na impundu ( chimpanzee ) na inkima ( golden monkey ) , inyoni na izindi nyamaswa nto zinyuranye .
Ni pariki yabashije kubaho kubera uruhare rwa leta na abaturage , kuko nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi iyi pariki yari yakendereye , ituzwamo abaturage ndetse ibindi bikorwa byabo birushaho kuyangiza .
Mu mwaka wa 2009 yatangiye kubungabungwa no gusubiranywa , ngo yongere ibe igicumbi cya urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima .
Muri Mata 2019 , Ikigo cya Igihugu cya Iterambere , RDB , cyagiranye amasezerano ya imyaka 25 na ikigo Imizi Eco - Tourism Development Ltd , yo gutunganya no gucunga Pariki ya Igihugu ya Gishwati - Mukura , ku buryo ihinduka igice gikorerwamo ubukerarugendo mu gihugu .
Imihindagurikire ya ibihe ishobora kuvana mu byabo abantu miliyari 1 . 2 mu myaka 30 iri imbere .
Muri iyi raporo yasohotse ku wa Gatatu , igaragaza ko nta gihugu na kimwe kizabasha gucika ingaruka za imihindagurikire ya ibihe mu myaka 30 iri imbere , ariko ko bya umwihariko ibihugu bikennye na abaturage batishoboye ari bo bahazaharira cyane .
Bavuga ko impamvu ari uko ibihugu bikennye iyo bihuye na ibibazo bikomoka ku mihindagurikire ya ibihe bikunze kubura amikoro , bigatuma abaturage bigaragambya , byakubitiraho uburyo bwa imiyoborere budahamye na igabanuka rikomeye rya ubukungu bikaba bibi kurushaho .
Bashingiye ku mibare na ubushakashatsi bwagiye bukorwa na imiryango mpuzamahanga , abakoze iyi raporo bagaragaza ko bashingiye cyane ku mibare ya ubwiyongere bwa abaturage , kugeza amazi meza ku baturage , amapfa , imyuzure , inkubi za imiyaga na ubwiyongere bwa ubushyuhe ku Isi .
Baje gusanga ko abasaga miliyari batuye mu bihugu 31 ku Isi bifite ubushobozi buke bwo guhangana na ibyo biza igihe byaba bije .
Afurika yo Munsi ya Ubutayu bwa Sahara niyo yugarijwe cyane , hagakurikiraho Amajyepfo ya Aziya , mu Burasirazuba bwo Hagati no muri Afurika ya Amajyaruguru .
Raporo ivuga ko mu gihe kimwe muri ibyo biza cyaba kigeze kuri ibyo bihugu , benshi mu babituye bazava mu byabo .
Ibihugu bifite amikoro ahagije muri Amerika ya Amajyaruguru na i Burayi nibyo bavuga ko bizabasha guhangana na ibyo biza , ahubwo bikazagorwa no kwakira abimukira benshi baturutse muri bya bihugu bizaba byazahajwe na ibiza .
Ubwiyongere bwa abaturage byitezwe ko buzagira uruhare runini mu guteza ibyo bibazo bya ibiza , dore ko mu 2050 abatuye Isi bazaba ari miliyari icumi bavuye kuri miliyari 7 . 8 bariho uyu munsi .
Abaturage benshi muri aba bazaba baturuka mu bihugu bikirimo imvururu na intambara nko muri Afurika yo Munsi ya Ubutayu bwa Sahara .
Raporo ivuga kandi ko nibura abantu miliyari 3 . 5 ku Isi bazaba bugarijwe na inzara .
Icyo gihe kandi abantu badafite amazi meza baziyongera , dore ko na ubusanzwe kuri ubu bagera kuri miliyari 2 . 6 ku Isi .

Rusizi : Amazi ya amashyuza aherutse gukama ashobora kugaruka aho yahoze .
Ku wa Mbere wa iki cyumweru , amazi ya amashyuza yarakamye yimukira hafi ya uruganda rwa Cimerwa rukora sima , akajya atemba ajya mu Mugezi wa Rubyiro .
Aya mayobera yateye akababaro abaturage bahakuraga amaramuko binyuze mu gukanda abagiye kuhivuriza amavunane .
Impuguke mu bijyanye na Ubumenyi bwa Isi , Dr Emmanuel Havugimana , yabwiye IGIHE ko ubushakashatsi bukiri gukorwa ariko we asanga gutemba kwa amashyuza byaba byaraturutse ku mitingito yabaye muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo na u Burundi .
Itsinda rya abakozi bo mu Kigo cya Igihugu gishinzwe Mine , Gaz na Peteroli kuri uyu wa 27 Kanama 2020 , ryagiye kureba ibivugwa na abantu batandukanye ndetse naryo rikora ubushakashatsi ku byabaye .
Ngaruye Jean Claude ushinzwe Ubushakashatsi bwa Amabuye ya agaciro muri icyo kigo , yavuze ko ibya imitingito ntaho bihuriye nabyo kuko iyo biba na isoko iba yarabuze .
Ati " " " " Nasanze ibya imitingito nta ruhare rurimo kuko iyaba birimo isoko ntituba twayisanzemo , tuba twarasanze yararigise kandi irahari .
Kubera imiterere yayo yashwanyaguje urutare iruhindura ibumba rugabanya imbaraga rwari rusanzwe rufite , byagura inzira ya amazi maze amanuka ajya mu mugezi . " " " "
Aya amazi ari kumanuka aca aho Cimerwa iri gucukura amabuye .
Ni imbogamizi cyane ku mikorere yayo ku buryo babagiriye inama yo gushaka uburyo ayo mazi yasubira aho yahoze .
Ngaruye Jean Claude yagize ati " " " " Kuko amazi agihari twabagiriye inama ko bashaka inzobere bakabanza bagatiyura isayo ririmo kuko ryanatezaga impanuka , bahagirira isuku bagacukura bakagera ku rutare rukomeye ubundi bakazamura inkuta , ariya mazi bayahamisha hariya bakajya bayaruhukiraro nkuko byari bisanzwe ndetse ntanagire ingaruka ku bantu . " " " "
Aya mazi yari asanzwe amanuka ashyushye yagera ahantu akaguma hamwe abantu bakabasha kuyoga no kuyikandisha kuko ngo yabavuraga amavunane .
Mbere ya icyorezo cya COVID - 19 , wasangaga abantu ari benshi baje kuyivurizamo harimo na abaturutse mu Burundi no muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo .
Byagenze gute ngo amazi ya amashyuza i Rusizi yimukire ahandi ?
Aya mazi yari asanzwe amanuka ashyushye yagera ahantu akaguma hamwe abantu bakabasha kuyoga no kuyikandisha kuko ngo yabavuraga amavunane .
Mbere ya icyorezo cya COVID - 19 , wasangaga abantu ari benshi baje kuyivurizamo harimo na abaturutse mu Burundi no muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo .
Bamwe mu bahaturiye babwiye IGIHE ko babibonye batyo bagasanga hari kugaragagara amabuye gusa amazi akaba yamanutse akagenda ari menshi , bakaba bumva bahombye kuko hari bamwe bahakuraga amaramuko bakora akazi ko gukanda abantu bahaje .
Uwitwa Nikobatuye Octave ati " " " " Natwe twabibonye gutya ariko turacyeka ko ari urutambi rwaturikijwe rwatumye amanuka ari menshi yagiye hepfo ya aho yari asanzwe . " " " "
Minani Japheth yunzemo ati " " " " Nibyo koko yagiye ariko ni agahinda , uzi ukuntu twabonaga amafaranga yo gukanda abantu no kubafasha koga , niho nakuraga agasabune na akunyu . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa Akarere ka Rusizi , Kayumba Euphrem , yabwiye IGIHE ko boherejeyo itsinda ririmo abakurikirana hafi ibijyanye na ibiza , ibidukikije na abashinzwe ibya mine kugira ngo harebwe icyabiteye na icyo bakora .
Ati " " " " Twoherejeyo itsinda ntabwo riraduha raporo , uretse ariya mafoto ameze kuriya ntacyo twarenzaho .
Itsinda rya abakozi rirajya kureba ubundi baduhe amakuru .
Twoherejeyo abakora mu bigo nka za REMA , abashinzwe ibya Mine , ntabwo nakubwira ngo tuzayagarura . " " " "
Dr Emmanuel Havugimana , Impuguke mu bijyanye na Ubumenyi bwa Isi , avuga ko ubushakashatsi bukiri gukorwa ariko we asanga byaba byaraturutse ku mitingito yabaye muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo na u Burundi .
Ati " " " " Ubushakashatsi buracyakorwa ariko ndabona icyo navuga ari imitingito yabaye ku tariki ya 14 na 16 za ukwa karindwi na undi mutingito wabaye ejo saa munani mu kiyaga cya Tanganyika , ibyo byose iyo bibaye bigatuma ibintu bya amabuye yo mu kuzimu binyeganyega cyane , ntabwo bitangaje ko ahantu nka hariya hari amashyuza ,
amazi yahita agenda . " " " "
" " " " Njyewe ni byo nashyize imbere abandi bavugaga ibikorwa bya amabuye acukurwa hariya ariko numvise igifite imbaraga gikomeye cyane ari iyo mitingito itatu yabaye mu buryo bukurikirana , ishobora kuba yahungabanyije amabuye yo mu kuzimu amazi akabona ahantu arigitira akagenda . " " " "
Dr Havugimana akomeza agira ati " " " " Niba umaze kuhagera amabuye yaho asa umukara nka ariya yo mu majyaruguru , biragaragara ko ari ahantu habaye iruka rya ibirunga cyera cyane mbere ya biriya birunga byo mu Majyaruguru . " " " "
" " " " Ubwo rero urumva ko habaye umutingito mu Kivu wabereye kuri kilometero 13 uvuye hejuru ya ubutaka , Epicentre ( izingiro rya iruka rya ikirunga ) ikaba iri i Karehe , hakurya ya Kivu muri Congo , nibyo mbona njye byabiteye , nta kintu kidasanzwe cyabaye . " " " "
Dr Havugimana avuga ko ahavuye amashyuza hazamera ibyatsi bikarangira , abazabaho mu myaka ijana iri mbere bazajya babyumva nka amateka ko habaga amazi .
Gusa ngo ntiyakwemeza ko amazi azagaruka .
Abatuye Isi bamaze gukoresha umutungo kamere wose wari ugenewe umwaka wa 2020 .
Umunsi aho abatuye Isi bose baba bamaze gukoresha umutungo kamere Isi iba ifite ubushobozi bwo gutanga muri uwo mwaka , uzwi nka " " " " Earth Overshoot Day , " " " " muri uyu mwaka wari ku wa 22 Kanama .
Mu busanzwe ibyo ikiremwa muntu cyangiza ku Isi , nka imyuka yangiza cyohereza mu kirere , umubumbe uba ufite ubushobozi bwo kuzongera ukabisubiranya mu gihe runaka , gusa umunsi wa " " " " EarthOvershoot Day " " " " uvuze ko abantu baba bamaze gukoresha ibyari byarabagenewe byose muri uwo mwaka ndetse Isi ikaba idafite
ubushobozi bwo kubisubiranya muri uwo mwaka .
Ibijyanye na uko abatuye Isi bamaze gukoresha umutungo kamere wa umwaka wose , kuri uyu wa Gatandatu byatangajwe na ikigo cyo muri Amerika cyagiye gikunda kugaragaza ikibazo cya uko abantu bagenda biyongera mu gihe Isi yo itiyongera , kizwi nka " " " " American NGO Global Footprint Network . " " " "
Kibinyujije kuri Twitter cyagize kiti " " " " Uyu munsi ni italiki aho twese nka ibiremwa muntu twakoresheje byinshi biturutse mu mutungo kamere kurusha ibyo umubumbe ushobora kugaruza mu mwaka wose . " " " "
Mu yindi minsi aho abatuye Isi bagiye bakoresha umutungo kamere urenze uwo Isi ishobora gusubiranya mu mwaka , harimo ku wa 29 Ukuboza 1970 , ku wa 11 Ukwakira 1990 , ku wa 23 Nzeri 2000 ndetse uwaherukaga wari ku wa 29 Nyakanga 2019 .
Abahanga mu bya ibidukikije bavuga ko muri uyu mwaka , uyu munsi watinze kugera ugereranyije na umwaka ushize kubera ko icyorezo cya Covid - 19 cyahagaritse bimwe mu bikorwa bya abantu , bityo nabo ntibakoresha umutungo kamere mwinshi .
Mu byumweru bibiri hazagwa imvura nke cyane mu duce tumwe twa igihugu .
Meteo Rwanda yatangaje ko mu gice cya gatatu cya ukwezi kwa Kanama 2020 hagati ya itariki ya 21 na iya 31 ; mu Rwanda hateganyijwe kugwa imvura iri hagati ya milimetero 0 na milimetero 15 .
Imvura iri hagati ya milimetero 10 na 15 iteganyijwe mu karere ka Musanze , agace gato ka Burera gahana imbibi na Musanze , mu karere ka Nyabihu mu bice bihana imbibi na uturere twa Musanze , Gakenke na Ngororero .
Iteganyijwe kandi mu gice kinini cya akarere ka Ngororero gihana imbibi na Musanze , mu karere ka Muhanga ahegereye Ngororero na Nyabihu , agace gato ka Gakenke kegereye Nyabihu , ndetse na agace ka Nyamagabe kegereye Nyamasheke .
Imvura iri hagati ya milimetero 1 na eshanu iteganyijwe mu turere twa Nyagatare na Gatsibo , mu bice bya Intara ya Amajyepfo , mu majyaruguru mu turere twa Rulindo na Gicumbi .
Imvura kandi izagwa muri Gasabo mu duce twegereye Rulindo no mu karere ka Nyarugenge mu duce twegereye Kamonyi .
Imvura iri hagati ya 0 na 1 iteganyijwe mu tundi turere twa intara ya Iburasirazuba no mu mujyi wa Kigali .
Meteo Rwanda yatangaje ko imvura izagwa muri ibi bihe ingana na isanzwe iboneka muri ibyo bihe .
Icyo kigo cyatangaje ko biragaragaza ko imvura iteganyijwe muri rusange ari nkeya cyane .
Gukunda ibyo yize muri Kaminuza ya u Rwanda byamuhesheje kujya kubitangamo umusanzu muri Centrafrique .
Tumwesigye yarangije Kaminuza mu 2014 , ntabwo yahise abona akazi gahoraho , gusa yakundaga gukora imirimo itandukanye yerekeye kubungabunga ibidukikije no kwita ku rusobe rwa ibinyabuzima nka uko yabyize .
Mu 2018 Ikigo cya igihugu cya Iterambere ( RDB ) cyaje kumuha amezi atandatu yo kwimenyereza umwuga , bimwongerera ubumenyi .
Muri uko kwimenyereza , yahabwaga ibihumbi 50 Frw buri kwezi yo kwifashisha .
Yatangiye kujya akuraho make akayizigamira kugira ngo azayakoreshe yihangira umurimo mu byo yize .
Amezi atandatu arangiye yaje kongererwa igihe bituma arushaho kwizigamira no kugira ubumenyi .
Ati " " " " Nagiye mbikaho make kugira ngo nzatangire gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo nize nihangira umurimo kubera ko ntatekerezaga guhita mbona akazi . " " " "
Nyuma ya iryo menyerezamwuga yaje kwihuza na urundi rubyiruko bose hamwe bagera kuri 12 bashinga umuryango utegamiye kuri leta ugamije kwita ku rusobe rwa ibinyabuzima no kurengera ibidukikije witwa SAEB ( Social Actions for Environment protection and Biodiversity conservation ) .
Batangiye gufatanya na abaturage na urubyiruko gutera ibiti bya imbuto ziribwa na amashyamba no gushyira ubusitani mu bigo bya amashuri .
Ati " " " " Intego kwari ugufasha urubyiruko na abaturage guhanga imirimo ibyara inyungu ariko igamije kurengera ibidukikije .
Bivuze ko iyo bafite ibikorwa bibazanira amafaranga bikabatunga , ntabwo bajya kwangiza amashyamba cyangwa ngo bajye mu buhigi . " " " "
Abarenga 2000 bateye ibiti bya imbuto bigishwa gukora imirima ya igikoni
Tumwesigye yavuze ko yatangiranye na urubyiruko rwo mu mashuri hirya no hino mu gihugu , aruhugurira kubaka imirima ya igikoni no gutera ibiti bya imbuto mu bigo byabo bikarangira bagiye no kubikora mu ngo zabo .
Uretse kurwanya imirire mibi , ibyo biti bya imbuto byinjirizaga amafaranga urubyiruko na abandi baturage babikora .
Ni mu gihe kandi biri mu murongo wa Guverinoma wo kugira umurima wa igikoni na ibiti bya imbuto nibura bitatu kuri buri muryango .
Ati " " " " Niba abana bateye ibinyomoro , avoka , indimu cyangwa imyembe , ni ibintu bishobora kubazanira amafaranga bakaba bakwigurira na ibikoresho bya ishuri cyangwa ibindi . " " " "
Yavuze ko abanyeshuri barenga 2000 bahuguwe kandi bagatera ibiti bya imbuto bitandukanye birimo ; ibinyomoro , imyembe , orange na ibindi bishobora kubunganira mu mirire kandi bikabazanira inyungu ya amafaranga .
Muri rusange ngo bateye ibiti bya imbuto birenga 6000 mu ngo zabo no mu bigo bya amashuri mu bice bya icyaro mu Karere ka Gasabo .
Uko yagiye gutanga umusanzu muri Centrafrique
Mu Ukuboza 2018 , Ambasade ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Rwanda ku bufatanye na Ikigo cya Indashyikirwa mu micungire ya ibinyabuzima na umutungo kamere kibarizwa muri Kaminuza ya u Rwanda ( Center of Excellence in Biodiversity conservation and Natural Resources management ) , yazanye urubyiruko 10 rwa Centrafrique kwigira ku Rwanda ibijyanye no kubungabunga urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima no kwita ku
bidukikije .
Abo baje guhuzwa na abandi banyarwanda 12 barimo Tumwesigye .
Nyuma yo gusoza urugendo rwabo mu Rwanda , baje kumutumira kugira ngo ajye kubunganira mu guhugura abantu bo muri icyo gihugu .
Mu mpera za 2019 yerekeje muri Centrafrique ku nkunga ya Kaminuza ya u Rwanda na Ambasade ya Amerika muri Centrafrique .
Ati " " " " Kubera ko ari igihugu cyazahajwe na intambara , kwita ku bidukikije nta mwanya bihabwa cyane .
Nabahuguye kureka guhiga inyamanswa .
Twabubakiye ubuhumbikiro bwa imboga na iz ibiti bya imbuto na ibiti bisanzwe bazajya bifashisha mu gutunganya amakara babikora nka ubucuruzi . " " " "
Urubyiruko rwahuguwe muri Centrafrique rwateye ibihumbi 21 bya ibiti bya imbuto ziganjemo avoka , ibinyomoro , amatunda , orange , amapapayi na ibindi biti bisanzwe byo kubungabunga amashyamba .
Hashinzwe amatsinda ( Clubs ) ya urubyiruko yo kwita ku bidukikije agera kuri arindwi rimwe rigizwe na abantu 50 hashingwa na imiryango 11 ya abahoze ari abahigi yiyemeza kurengera ibidukikije .
Umuyobozi wa Ikigo cya Indashyikirwa mu micungire ya ibinyabuzima na umutungo kamere kibarizwa muri Kaminuza ya u Rwanda , Professor Beth Kaplin , yavuze ko Tumwesigye ari urugero rwiza rwerekana ko urubyiruko rwo mu Rwanda rugeze ahashimishije mu kubungabunga ibidukikije , ibyo bizatuma ruhanga imirimo urundi rukayibona mu miryango yita
ku bidukikije no kurengera urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima .
Kuri ubu Elisa Tumwesigye akomeje ibikorwa byo kwita ku bidukikije no kubungabunga urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima mu Rwanda nyuma yo kuva gutanga umusanzu muri Repubulika ya Centrafrique .
Gukunda ibyo yize muri Kaminuza ya u Rwanda byamuhesheje kujya kubitangamo umusanzu muri Centrafrique .

Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ingaruka zo gutwara imodoka ibirahuri bimanuye .
Ubu bushakashatsi bwakorewe mu mijyi icumi itandukanye , ari yo Dhaka ( Bangladesh ) , Chennai ( u Buhinde ) , Guangzhou ( u Bushinwa ) , Medellin ( Colombia ) , Sa ̃ o Paulo ( Brazil ) , Cairo ( Misiri ) , Sulaymaniyah ( Iraq ) , Addis Ababa ( Ethiopia ) , Blantyre ( Malawi ) , na Dar - es - Salaam ( Tanzania ) .
Ubu bushakashatsi bwakozwe na kaminuza ya Surrey , bugaragaza ko gutwara imodoka umanuye ibirahuri byongera umwuka mubi uhumekwa ku kigero cya 80 % , bikaba byanaba bibi kurushaho mu masaha arimo ingendo nyinshi .
Abashakashatsi bavuga ko abatwara imodoka mu bihugu biri mu nzira ya amajyambere bahura na iki kibazo kurusha abandi , kuko imihanda yo mu bihugu bikennye iba irimo imodoka nyinshi zishaje , zohereza imyuka mibi myinshi kandi uburyo bwo kwirinda , nko gukoresha imashini zitanga umwuka mu modoka , bukaba buri hacye cyane muri ibyo
bihugu .
Inama zitangwa na ubu bushakashatsi zirimo kwirinda gukora ingendo mu masaha arimo imodoka nyinshi , cyane aya mu gitondo na nimugoroba .
Harimo kandi gukoresha ubundi buryo bwo kubona umwuka mwiza , nko kugura imodoka zifite imashini zitanga umwuka ndetse zitanasohora imyuka mibi .
Ishami rya Umuryango wa Abibumbye , rivuga ko ikibazo cya ubwiyongere bwa imyuka mibi giteye inkeke .
Miliyoni zirindwi za abatuye Isi zipfa buri mwaka kubera indwara zifitanye isano na imyuka mibi mu gihe abantu icyenda mu 10 bahumeka umwuka udasukuye ku bipimo byiza .
Ibidasanzwe biri mu gishushanyo mbonera gishya cya imikoreshereze ya ubutaka .
Ubutaka ni imwe mu ngingo zidakunze kuvugwaho rumwe kuri ubu cyane cyane iyo bigeze ku mikoreshereze yabwo .
Buri muturage yumva umutungo ukomeye akwiriye kugira mu gihugu ari ubutaka , bigatuma benshi babushaka cyangwa babukoresha mu buryo bunyuranyije na amategeko .
Ikibazo cyari kimaze iminsi kivugwa ni uburyo ubutaka buhingwa bwari bukomeje kubakwaho inzu ku buryo budacunzwe neza , mu minsi iri imbere igihugu cyazasigara ari inzu gusa bigateza ikibazo gikomeye cyo kutihaza mu biribwa .
Igishushanyo mbonera gishya cya imikoreshereze ya ubutaka cyemejwe na inama ya abaminisitiri iherutse , cyatanze umucyo ku buryo ubutaka bugomba gukoreshwa mu gihugu , ubirenzeho agahanwa .
Mu bishya birimo ni uko ubuhinzi bwagenewe 47 , 2 % bya ubuso bwa igihugu , amashyamba yahariwe 29 , 3 % , imiturire na ibikorwaremezo bigenerwa 15 % , mu gihe amazi na ibishanga bibungabunzwe byagenewe 8 , 5 % bya ubuso bwa igihugu .
Iyemezwa rya iki gishushanyo mbonera kiruta ibindi bizafungurira amarembo na ibindi bishushanyo mbonera bya imiturire mu Mujyi wa Kigali na indi mijyi kugira ngo buri muturage amenye icyagenewe aho ubutaka bwe buherereye .
Ntawe uzongera kubaka inzu ukwe mu murima we
Abanyarwanda kuri ubu bagera kuri miliyoni 12 . 5 , bakaba biyongera ku kigero cya 2 . 4 % .
Bakomeje kwiyongera kuri uwo muvuduko , mu mwaka wa 2050 bazaba bageze kuri miliyoni 25 . 8 % cyangwa miliyoni 22 baramutse biyongereye ku muvuduko wa 2 % .
Mu miturire , igishushanyo kigaragaza ko kuri ubu 18 . 4 % batuye mu mijyi naho 81 . 6 % batuye bacucitse mu byaro .
Muri gahunda ya Guverinoma ya imyaka irindwi , abatuye mu mijyi byitezwe ko bazagera kuri 35 % bitarenze mu 2024 naho mu 2050 bakazaba ari 70 % .
Igishushanyo mbonera kigaragaza imijyi yose ikenewe mu gihugu ndetse na site zo guturaho mu cyaro .
Mu guteza imbere iyo gahunda , hateganyijwe ko umurwa mukuru uzakomeza kuba Kigali , habeho indi mijyi itatu iwukikije ( Satellite cities ) , indi mijyi ya uturere 16 na udusantere 73 dukomeye two mu byaro .
Imijyi igwa mu ntege Kigali yateganyijwe ni Bugesera , Rwamagana na Muhanga kugira ngo ifashe Kigali kwakira abantu na ibikorwa bimwe na bimwe byatumaga benshi baza gushakira ubuzima muri Kigali ariko imbaraga zigashyirwa mu kuyirinda ko ikomeza gukura mu kajagari .
Imijyi izakomeza kuba iyunganira Kigali iherereye hafi ya imipaka ni Musanze , Rubavu , Rusizi , Nyagatare , na Huye aho umwe ubarirwa kuzajya uba utuwe na abaturage bari hagati ya 300 , 000 na 650 , 000 .
Iyo mijyi izakomeza kunganirwa na Karongi , Kayonza na Kirehe yo izaba ituwe na abaturage bari hagati ya 150 , 000 na 300 , 000 .
Mu dusantere dukomeye twateganyijwe 73 , buri kamwe kazajya kaba gafite abaturage 24 , 500 .
Byagaragaye ku mu Rwanda ubu hari inzu zo guturamo miliyoni 2 . 8 , mu gihe hakenewe inzu miliyoni 5 . 5 zizahaza miliyoni zisaga 22 zizaba zituye igihugu mu 2050 .
Ibyo bituma hakenewe kubakwa inzu 150 000 buri mwaka kugira ngo habe icyizere cya uko abanyarwanda bose bizagera mu 2050 nta kibazo cya aho kuba bafite .
Nubwo hari icyo kibazo cya ubuke bwa inzu , igishushanyo mbonera gisaba ko uburyo bwo kubaka bwitonderwa , inzu zikubakwa bazamuka bajya hejuru , munsi ya ubutaka hagakoreshwa hubakwa parikingi na ibindi .
Nubwo hagikenewe inzu nyinshi , igishushanyo mbonera gisaba ko uburyo bwo kubaka bwitonderwa cyane kugira ngo abantu batototera na ubutaka buhingwaho .
Imyubakire mu cyaro , abasaga miliyoni 6 . 6 ni ukuvuga 30 % bya abazaba batuye u Rwanda mu 2050 bazaba batuye mu midugudu 3000 .
Nibura buri kagali kazajya kaba gafite site imwe cyangwa ebyiri zo gutuzamo abaturage bako abe ari naho hashyirwa ibikorwa remezo nka amazi , amashanyarazi , amashuri , amavuriro na ibindi .
Kubera ko akagali kazaba gafite ahantu hamwe cyangwa habiri hatuwe , ibyo biraca amarenga ko imidugudu isanzwe nka inzego za ubutegetsi izavaho ahubwo hagashyirwaho inzego nshya zishingiye ku miturire mishya .
Mu kubaka inzu mu cyaro ahagenewe imidugudu , hazakoreshwa uburyo bwo kubaka inzu enye muri imwe na umunani muri imwe , cyangwa ubundi buryo butuza abaturage benshi ahantu hato .
Umusaruro wa ubuhinzi uzongerwa
Mu gushaka uko ubutaka buhingwa bwongerwa kugira ngo abazaba batuye igihugu mu 2050 bazabone ibibatunga bihagije , ubutaka buhingwa bwavanywe kuri 41 . 5 % bya ubuso bwa igihugu , bugirwa 47 , 2 % .
Nubwo bimeze gutyo , ukurikije umusaruro uboneka ku buso buhingwa kuri ubu bikomeje bityo ntabwo uwo musaruro wazabasha guhaza miliyoni 22 bazaba batuye igihugu mu 2050 .
Ubuhinzi bukomeje gutanga umusaruro butanga kuri ubu , kugira ngo haboneke ibizahaza abazaba batuye u Rwanda icyo gihe hasaba ubutaka bungana na kilometero kare 103 , 000 , ni ukuvuga ubuso bwikubye inshuro enye ubwa igihugu gifite .
Mu gihe haba hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga mu buhinzi no kongera umusaruro , haba hakenewe ubuso bungana na kilometero kare 14 , 500 km ² bwo guhingaho ibizahaza abaturage .
Mu nama igishushanyo cyatanze , ni ugukomeza kurinda ubutaka buhingwa kuri ubu bungana na kilometero kare 12 , 433 kugira ngo budakoreshwa nabi cyangwa mu bindi .
Inzira za Gari ya Moshi zihuta
Mu bijyanye no gutwara abantu na ibintu , kuri ubu mu Rwanda hari imihanda ingana na kilometero 37 896 .
Imihanda ya kaburimbo izongerwa cyane , hazubakwa inzira za gari ya moshi zihuza u Rwanda na ibihugu bituranye ndetse na imihanda yihuta ihuza imijyi minini .
Ku bijyanye na ibidukikije igishushanyo mbonera gisaba ko ubuso bwa kilometero kare 1389 buteweho amashyamba ya kimeza bukomeza kubungabungwa , no kurinda amashyamba yandi ari mu gihugu angana na kilometero kare 3 , 873 km ² .
Gutera amashyamba mashya bizibanda ku misozi ihanamye , mu gihe gutera amashyamba ahagenewe ubuhinzi bitemewe keretse bikozwe haterwa ibiti bivangwa na imyaka .
Igishushanyo mbonera gisaba ko gucukura amabuye ya agaciro bikorwa habanje kurebwa niba byunguka kurusha ibigiye kuvanwaho .
Minisiteri ya ibidukikije igaragaza ko hagiye gushyirwaho uburyo bwa ikoranabuhanga buzafasha mu ikurikiranwa rya imikoreshereze ya ubutaka ku buryo unyuranyije nabyo babibona kare bitabaye ngombwa ko bifata igihe .
Hari gutegurwa amategeko azahana abazanyuranya nabyo .
Ibisubizo bya ibibazo byibazwa ku iruka rya Nyiragongo
Ku wa 22 Gicurasi 2021 cyongeye kuruka nyuma ya aho cyaherukaga kuruka mu 2002 .
Ubu habarurwa abantu barenga 30 bapfuye kubera iruka ryacyo , ibikorwa remezo bigasenyuka ndetse abaturage bagakwira imishwaro bahunga .
Iruka ryacyo rimaze iminsi ritera imitingito mu bice hafi ya byose bya u Rwanda ku buryo nka Akarere ka Rubavu kari mu icuraburindi .
Hari bimwe mu bibazo abantu bakomeje kwibaza ku iruka ryacyo na ingaruka zabyo .
Ni byo tugiye kugarukaho nyuma ya uko bisubijwe na ishami ribishinzwe mu Kigo cya Igihugu gishinzwe Peteroli , Gazi na Mine , RMB .
1 . Ko twumva imitingito yaba ari ikimenyetso ko ikirunga kizongera kuruka ?
Oya !
Imitingito nka iyi iterwa no gutogota kwa amazuku ( magma ) mu nda ya ikirunga .
Umwuka ushyushye mu nda ya isi uba mwinshi , urutare ruhazengurutse rugasa na uruturika bigatuma humvikana imitingito mito mito ya uruhererekane .
Ibipimo bya umwuka wo hejuru ya Nyiragongo byafashwe bigaragaza ko nta myuka ituruka mu mazuku ihari .
Ibi bivuze ko nta mazuku ari hafi ku buryo ikirunga cyakongera kuruka .
2 . Iyi mitingito izahagarara ryari ?
Ntawapfa kuvuga itariki cyangwa isaha imitingito izahagarariraho kuko nta gipimo kiyipima kugeza uyu munsi .
Ariko umuntu arebeye uko byagiye bigenda ( amateka ya iruka rya buri kirunga ) mu myaka yashize ntabwo imitingito ikurikira iruka rya ikirunga irenza ibyumweru bibiri .
Ubwo Nyiragongo iheruka kuruka mu 2002 imitingito yamaze iminsi 10 .
3 . Iruka rya ikirunga ryatewe na iki ?
Iruka rya ibirunga rigaragarira mu ivuburwa rya urusukume rwa ibikoma bishyushye cyane binyura ahagaragaza imbaraga nke mu gishishwa cya Isi .
Ikirunga kiruka kuko hari urutare mu nda ya Isi ruba rwashonze kubera ubushyuhe buri hagati ya dogere 700 na dogere 1200 .
Ibi bikajyana na umwuka mwinshi ushyushye noneho ugatera ibikoma byashonze kuzamuka bikanyura mu myenge bikazamuka hejuru mu buryo bwo guturika bishaka aho binyura bitewe na wa mwuka mwinshi ushyushye urimo .
4 . Imitingito yatewe na iki ?
Imitingito nka iyi iterwa no gutogota kwa amazuku ( magma ) ari mu nda ya Isi no gukubana hagati ya ibisate mu bice byiyashije .
Umwuka na igikoma bishyushye mu nda ya isi biba byinshi urutare ruhazengurutse rugasa na uruturika bigatuma humvikana imitingito mito mito ya uruhererekane .
5 . Kuki imitingito ituruka i Rubavu gusa ?
Imitingito yose mwumvise nyuma ya iruka rya Nyiragongo yabaga iturutse mu izingiro ryayo ( epicenter ) i Rubavu .
Iyi mitingito yashoboraga no kumvikana ahandi bitewe na uburemere bwayo kandi yanagendaga icika intege uko yagendaga ijya kure ya iryo zingiro ryayo .
Urugero ni uko iyo uteye ibuye cyangwa ikindi kintu mu mazi hari imirongo ya uruziga igenda inyuranamo yerekana ko hari ikintu kidasanzwe cyajugunywe muri ayo mazi ( waves ) .
Ku bayumviraga ahandi si ukuvuga ko aho bari naho habaga hari indi mitingito .
6 . Ni ukuri ko ikirunga kirutse bikagera mu Kivu byateza ibibazo ?
Ntabwo byapfa gushoboka !
Urugero ni uko mu 2002 ubwo Nyiragongo yarukagaga , amahindure ari ku muvuduko wa 100km ku isaha , ibyageze mu kiyaga cya Kivu byamanutse kugera muri metero 140 za ubujyakuzimu kandi gas methane iba muri metero hafi 200 .
Nyuma ya iruka rya Nyiragongo uyu mwaka leta yafashe ingamba zo gukorana na abaturanyi bya hafi mu kugenzura biriya birunga byegereye u Rwanda ku buryo na igihe byaruka byaba bizwi hagashyirwaho ingamba za ubwirinzi .
7 . Muri Congo ko ubuyobozi bwaburiye abaturage guhunga , natwe duhunge ?
Oya , ibipimo bigaragazwa na impuguke za RMB bigaragaza ko nta kibazo gihari ku ruhande rwa u Rwanda .
Ikibazo cyabaye ni imitingito gusa kandi nayo ibipimo bigaragaza ko yagiye igabanuka mu ngano no mu bukana ku buryo nta mpungenge biteye .
Gusa birasaba gukora gahunda ya igihe kirekire ifasha abaturage gukomeza kubana na iruka rya ibirunga ndetse na imitingito kuko kugeza uyu munsi bikiriho muri aka gace duherereyemo .
Minisiteri ya Ibidukikije yatanze impuruza ku bishora mu bikorwa byangiza urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima .
Ibi yabivuze mu muhango wo kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wo kwita ku rusobe rwa ibinyabuzima usanzwe wizihizwa tariki 22 Gicurasi , ariko ukaba wizihijwe kuri uyu wa 31 Gicurasi 2021 , mu cyumweru cyahariwe kubungabunga ibidukikije .
Patrick Karera yavuze ko u Rwanda rumaze gutera intambwe ishimishije mu kubungabunga urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima harimo kwita ku nyamaswa , imigezi , ibishanga na amashyamba .
Ati " " " " Turabona hari byinshi tumaze kugeraho mu rwego rwa amashyamba mwabonye ko pariki ya Gishwati - Mukura yashyizwe mu byanya bikomye bigomba kwitabwaho nka umurage wa Isi .
Ibi ni ibintu twishimiye cyane mu Rwanda na abafatanyabikorwa twakoranye . " " " "
Iyi Pariki ya Gishwati - Mukura yabayeho kubera ingufu za Guverinoma ya u Rwanda , mu gihe mbere yari yaratangiye guturwamo na abaturage , ikorerwamo ibikorwa bya ubuhinzi na ibindi bitandukanye ariko byose byarahagaritswe , abaturage barimurwa haterwa amashyamba , harongera hasubira uko hahoze .
Patrick Karera yakomeje avuga ko nubwo bimeze gutyo ariko hakiri byinshi byo gukora .
Yagize Ati " " " " Nubwo twungukira mu kubungabunga urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima , ibikorwa dukora mu buzima bwa buri munsi birarwangiza . Turi kimwe mu bigize urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima ariko turi kuruma ukuboko kutugaburira .
Kwangiza ibidukikije bitugiraho ingaruka , rero ni byiza ko tuba kimwe mu bisubizo mu kwita ku bidukikije . " " " "
Ambasaderi wa Umuryango wa Ubumwe bwa u Burayi mu Rwanda , Nicola Bellomo , yavuze ko u Rwanda ari kimwe mu bihugu bya intangarugero mu kubungabunga urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima ndetse ko uyu muryango uri kurufasha gukomeza muri iyo nzira binyuze mu gutera inkunga imishinga itandukanye .
Yongeyeho ati " " " " Hari ubushakashatsi bwinshi bwakozwe , hari byinshi byagezweho , ariko haracyari inzira ndende .
Nka EU turi gufasha cyane Guverinoma ya u Rwanda na Abanyarwanda muri uru rugendo , binyuze muri gahunda nyinshi zitandukanye .
Uyu munsi bya umwihariko turi kugerageza kwereka abantu uruhare rwabo mu kurinda urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima . " " " "
Zimwe mu mbogamizi u Rwanda rugihura na zo mu kubungabunga urusobe rwa ibinybuzima harimo ubwiyongere bwa abaturage butuma hakenerwa ubutaka bwinshi bwo guturaho , guhinga no gukoreraho imirimo ya buri munsi , gutema ibiti hashakwa inkwi na amakara , ihindagurika rya ikirere , impanuka zivamo gutwika amashyamba , imyumvire ikiri hasi na ibindi
Intego u Rwanda rwari rwarihaye yo kuba rufite amashyamba ari kuri 30 % bya ubuso bwarwo yagezweho buranarenga buba 30 . 4 % nka uko ibarura rya 2019 ryabigaragaje .
Hatangijwe umushinga wo kubungabunga urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima biciye mu mashuri ya u Rwanda na Israël .
Rwatangijwe na urubuga ruhuza Urubyiruko rwa Abanyarwanda baba muri Canada ( IRYD ) ku bufatanye na Umuryango Mpuzamahanga urengera Ibidukikije ( TiME ) , Umuryango Mpuzamahanga wa Abanya - Canada udaharanira inyungu , Harmony Foundation ndetse na Umuryango ukorera ibikorwa bya ubugiraneza mu Rwanda , Shelter Them .
Uwo mushinga wiswe Israël - Rwanda School Biodiversity Program watangijwe ku mugaragaro ku wa 25 Gicurasi 2021 , aho imikoranire izaba hagati ya abanyeshuri bo mu Rwunge rwa amashuri rwa Rugando ho mu karere ka Bugesera , ndetse na abo mu ishuri rya Rogozin Educational Campus riherereye i Kiryat mu Majyepfo ya Tel - Aviv .
Ni umushina ufite intego yo kurema ubufatanye mu myigire na imikorere ya abanyeshuri ba ibihugu byombi mu kubungabunga urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima .
Biteganyijwe ko binyuze muri uwo mushinga , abanyeshuri ba ibihugu byombi bazigira hamwe akamaro ka ibikorwa byo kubungabunga urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima , uburyo bwo gufata imyanzuro mu matsinda mu gihe bazaba bagena ahakwiye kurindwa mu bidukikije , bakongera ubumenyi bwabo mu rurimi na ubwumvane ( communication ) , imico mishya
na ubumenyi mu mikoranire hagati ya imico itandukanye , guteza imbere ubumenyi bushya mu buhinzi na izindi nzego mu kurinda urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima .
Mu muhango uwo gutangiza umushinga wabaye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga , Ambasaderi wa u Rwanda muri Canada , Higiro Prosper yashimiye Harmony Foundation ku bwo gufata umwanzuro wo gushyigikira uwo mushinga .
Yakomeje ati " " " " Iki gikorwa kigaragaza neza uko urubyiruko rufite intego rushobora gutanga umusanzu ku iterambere rirambye rya Isi . " " " "
Ambasaderi wa Israël mu Rwanda , Dr Ron Adam , yavuze ko kubungabunga urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima ari byo bizagira uruhare mu gutuma ahazaza ha Isi hamera neza mu rwego rwa ibidukikije no kurinda imihindagurikire ya ikirere .
Ati " " " " Nishimiye uyu mushinga uhuza abanyeshuri bo mu bihugu byombi , ukabafasha kugira ubumenyi bwisumbuye , ariko icya ingenzi cyane na ubufatanye mu kubungabunga ibidukikije . " " " "
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa TiME , Uri Shanas , yagaragaje ko buri segonda hari ubuso bwa ishyamba bungana na ikibuga cya umupira butakara , bityo ko hakwiye kwigishwa uburyo bwo kuyabungabunga hamwe na ibindi binyabuzima ; haherewe ku bakiri bato .
Ati " " " " Turashaka ko buri muntu wese mu Isi haba na umwana muto agira uruhare mu kugabanya iri yangirika . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa IRYD , Gashirabake Moses , yavuze ko nubwo kugeza ubu hamaze guhuzwa amashuri abiri ( rimwe ryo mu Rwanda na rimwe ryo muri Israël ) " " " " hari intego yo guhuza amashuri menshi ashoboka . " " " "
Intego nyamukuru ya uwo mushinga ni iyo kongerera ubumenyi ababyiruka mu kubungabunga urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima hakiri kare binyuze mu bigo bya amashuri .
Meyera s Parrot , gasuku zidasanzwe ziboneka no mu Bugesera ziri gukendera .
Bugesera ni akarere mu myaka yashize habonekaga inyamaswa zitangaje nka imvubu na izindi zitandukanye .
Muri izo nyamaswa habamo na inyoni nziza cyane ziba mu biti zizwi nka Gasuku , bya umwihariko izo mu bwoko bwa Meyera s Parrots .
Izi nyoni ziboneka mu karere ka Bugesera hafi ya icyuzi cya igikorano mu kibaya cya Kamatana .
Inyoni ya amabara ateye amabengeza
Ubaye warigeze kubona Gasuku zororwa kuko mu Rwanda hamwe na hamwe zibasha kuhaboneka , ubonye Meyera s Parrot ushobora gukeka ko ubonye Gasuku isanzwe kuko imiterere yazo isa neza na izindi ngenzi zazo .
Amababa ya Meyera s Parrot ahenshi asa na ikijuju cyangwa se ibara rijya gusa na ivu ariko kandi ikagira ibara rya umuhondo hamwe na hamwe nko hafi yo ku mpera za amababa zigurukisha .
Ibara rya umuhondo hari na ubwo riboneka ku mutwe wayo .
Ku nda hazo ni icyatsi kibisi .
Hejuru ku mirizo ku ruhande hasa na ikijuju mu gihe mu mirizo hasa na ikijuju cyijimye .
Umuzenguruko wo ku maso ndetse na umunwa bifite ibara rya umukara .
Meyera s Parrot uburebure bwayo bubarirwa hagati ya sentimetero ya 21 na 25 .
Uburemere bwayo buri buri gahati ya garama 100 - 135 .
Uburebure bwa amababa yayo iyarambuye ni santimetero 141 - 149 .
Iyi nyoni ibasha kurama kugera ku myaka hagati ya 25 - 35 .
Meyersa s Parrot ishobora kurya ibyo kurya bifite intungamubiri nka ibyo abantu barya .
Muri ibyo twavuga nka intoryi , ibigori bibisi , karoti , inkeri , imbuto , ubunyobwa , amababi ya epinari , inyanya , inanasi , udusimba duto , indabo zimwe na zimwe , pommes , imineke na izindi mbuto zitandukanye .
Ntitera amagi arenze ane
Izi Gasuku hamwe na hamwe barazifata bakazorora .
Iyo ziba mu gasozi bya umwihariko iziba muri Afurika zikunda kororoka iyo igihe cya imvura kirangiye .
Meyera s Parrot itera amagi mu mwobo wa igiti bya umwihariko iyo uwo mwobo uri hejuru cyane uvuye ku butaka .
Iyi nyoni itera amagi hagati ya abiri na ane .
Mu gutera ayo imagi hagati ya igi rimwe na irindi hacamo iminsi ibiri .
Iyo igi rya kabiri rimaze guterwa , kurarira bihita bitangira .
Ingabo na ingore bifatanya kurarira ayo magi cyane cyane ingore .
Kurarira bimara iminsi hagati ya 26 na 31 .
Imishwi igaburirwa na ababyeyi bombi .
Umushwi umaze ibyumweru icyenda uba ukuze bihagije .
Meyera s Parrot iba ikuze bihagije ku buryo ishobora kororoka iyo imaze imyaka itatu cyangwa ine .
Izi Gasuku zitwa Meyer " " " " Parrots zifite inkomoko munsi ya ubutayu bwa Sahara muri iki gihe zirimo guhura na ibibazo bitandukanye harimo kuba ziribwa na ibisiga birya inyama na inzoka , imihindagurikire ya ikirere , kwangirika kwa amashyamba , imiti ikoreshwa mu buhinzi ndetse na ba rushimusi bazitega kugira ngo bazigurishe ku masoko
mpuzamahanga .
Imiterere ya inzu ya mbere nini ku Isi igenewe guhingwamo .
Biteganyijwe ko igisenge cya iyi nzu kizaba kiriho imisego ishobora gutanga ubushyuhe izashyirwa ku byuma bitwikiriye bikoze muri aluminium .
Imbere ha iyi nyubako hazaba hari ubushyuhe bwa 28 ° C buzajya bufasha ibihingwa birimo gukura bimeze neza .
Thomas Coldefy , watangije igitekerezo cya uyu mushinga , ubwo yaganiraga na itangazamakuru yavuze ko intekerezo ze zihoramo ihurizo ryo kwibaza uko uyu mubumbe dutuye wakomeza kubungwabungwa .
Yanongeyeho ko amakuru menshi atangazwa ku ihindagurika rya ikirere ashobora kuba isoko ya imihangayiko ku batuye Isi .
Ati " " " " Amakuru yerekeye ihindagurika rya ikirere akenshi atangazwa mu buryo butifuzwa , bishobora kuba mu buryo bwihuse , isoko nshya ya impungenge . " " " "
Coldefy yavuze ko mu imurikagurisha ndetse na iserukiramuco rizwi nka " " " " Tropicalia " " " " bazerekaniramo umushinga wabo rizafasha abantu kwibaza ariko bakanabona amahirwe yo kwiga uko uyu mushinga uzakomeza gufasha mu kubungabunga urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima .
Biteganyijwe iyi nzu izaba irimo ibimera bya ubwoko butandukanye , ikaba ubuturo bwa inyoni zitandukanye na ubwoko bwa amafi asanzwe aboneka mu mugezi wa Amazon .
Izaba ari ndende kandi ku buryo itazabuza ibiti birebire bizaba bihinzemo gukura .
Coldefy mu gishushanyo mbonera cyayo yateganyije ibiraro birebire abantu bahasura bazajya bacaho , inateganya ko habamo restaurant umuntu yakwiciramo isari na inyota mu gihe yakenera kwikora ku munwa .
Binateganyijwe kandi ko hazaba harimo icyumba kinini gishobora kuberamo inama ndetse hakanagira laboratwari ya ubushakashatsi ku mirimo izaba ikorerwa muri iyo nyubako .
Ivumburamatsiko kuri Matene , inyoni nto ivugwaho udushya twinshi .
Ubusanzwe imiterere ya inyoni usanga ijya gutandukana na iy abantu kuko mu nyoni usanga ikigabo aricyo kiba ari cyiza cyane kandi gifite imiterere ikurura ikigore .
Iyo miterere yo guhinduka ngo ikigabo gikurure ikigore hari inyoni ziyihorana buri gihe cyose , ariko kandi hari na izigira iyo miterere mu gihe cyo kororoka .
Imwe muri izo nyoni zibasha guhindura imiterere yayo ngo ibashe gukurura ikigore ni inyoni yitwa Matene .
Matene bya umwihariko ingabo ni inyoni ishobora guhindura imiterere yayo bitewe na ibihe runaka .
Matene ya ingabo iyo iri mu gihe cyo kubangurira ingore ifata indi miterere na ishusho itari isanganywe .
Muri icyo gihe usanga ifite amabara ya umukara na umweru ndetse na imirizo miremire cyane kandi ikagira ibara rya umukara ku mutwe .
Imirizo yayo muri icyo gihe cyo kubangurira iba igizwe na amababa ane maremare afite uburebure bwa santimetero 20 - 22 .
Ku nda haba ari ibara rya umweru kandi umunwa wayo uba ari umutuku .
Amaso yayo aba ari ikigina ndetse amaguru na amajanga biba bijya gusa na umukara wa ivu .
Iyo miterere tuvuze haruguru iboneka kuri Matene ya ingabo mu gihe cyo kubangurira ingore .
Iyo Matene ya ingabo iri mu bihe bisanzwe iba ijya gusa na ingore bigatandukanira na utubara twinshi turi ku mababa kandi ikaba ari nini kuruta ingore .
Ibyo bivuze ko iba ifite imirizo migufi kandi amababa yayo aba ajya gusa na ikigina . Ku nda hayo haba hasa na umukara na ikigina kandi hari na utuntu twa udusharagure .
Matene zishobora kuboneka mu busitani , umukenke , mu byatsi , mu mirima na ahandi .
Uburebure bwa Matene bubarirwa kuri santimetero 12 , ikagira uburemere bwa garama 14 - 19 .
Matene kandi ishobora kubaho kugera ku myaka irindwi .
Iyi nyoni yitwa Matene itungwa na imbuto ikura mu byatsi ndetse na udusimba duto .
Utwo dusimba ibasha kudufata mu gihe tuba turimo kuguruka .
Imyororokere ya Matene
Matene kimwe na izindi nyoni zimwe na zimwe zigira imico idasanzwe yo kutubaka ibyari ahubwo zikajya gutera amagi mu bindi byari bya izindi nyoni kugira ngo zizifashe kurarira , guturaga no kuzirerera imishwi .
Matene ya ingabo iyo iri mu gihe cyo kubangurira ingore iba ifite umubare munini wa ingore ziyigaragiye kandi iba ifite amahane menshi ku buryo yirukana izindi nyoni kugira ngo yisanzure yo na ingore zayo .
Ingore iyo zimaze kubangurirwa hari utunyoni duto two mu bwoko bwa amafundi Matene iba izi igihe duterera amagi nayo ikagenda igateramo amagi .
Amagi ya Matene aba ari umweru .
Iyo Matene ije gutera amagi mu cyari cya izindi nyoni ntacyo itwara amagi isanzemo ahubwo yongeramo ayayo gusa .
Iteramo amagi ari hagati ya abiri na ane .
Izo nyoni zirarira amagi yose kandi zikayaturaga .
Amagi ya Matene aturagwa nyuma ya iminsi 11 - 12 .
Nyuma ya ibyumweru bitatu imishwi iba imaze gukura bihagije .
Imishwi ya Matene iba ishobora kwigana amajwi ya imishwi ya ya nyoni itari nyina .
Gusa , nubwo iyo imishwi iyo ikiri mito iba ijya gusa na iy inyoni yaraririye amagi iyo mishwi yaturutsemo , imishwi ya Matene iba ari minini kandi uko igenda ikura igenda ihirikira hasi iyo mishwi yindi , ibyo bigatuma imishwi ya ya nyoni yaraririye amagi ya Matene ipfa .
Mu Rwanda akenshi abantu ba igitsina - gabo bakunda guhiga Matene ya ingabo bya umwihariko igihe iri mu gihe cyo kubangurira .
Akenshi bayihiga bagamije kuyica ngo babone imirizo yayo kuko bizeraga ko yifitemo ubushobozi bwo kubafasha kureshya igitsina gore kabone na ubwo cyaba kitabakunda .
Mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe byo ku isi ahakorwa ubucuruzi bwa inyoni Matene iri mu nyoni zikundwa kugurishwa ikajya kororwa cyangwa gukoreshwa mu yindi mihango .
Ibyo bituma ziza mu nyoni zishobora gushira ku isi kuko zihigwa na benshi cyane .
Ivumburamatsiko ku bisiga bya ibigungumuka biboneka mu Rwanda bibasha kurama imyaka 70 .
Zimwe uzazibona zigusanze mu rugo , hari izindi uzabona ahantu bitewe na ibihingwa cyangwa ibiti bihari .
Ku bantu bakunda gutembera cyangwa se bakunda ibyaremwe muri rusange bashobora kwibaza byinshi ku mibereho ya inyoni na ibisiga dusanga mu Rwanda .
