Zitungwa na iki ?
Zirama imyaka ingahe ?
Na ibindi bibazo .
Uyu munsi twabahitiyemo igisiga gitangaje cyitwa Ikigungumuka kandi uko bizadushobokera tuzakomeza kurebera hamwe amakuru ya ibanze kuri ibi biguruka twahawe na uwahanze u Rwanda nta kiguzi .
Imiterere ya Ikigungumuka urebeye inyuma
Ikigungumuka cyitwa Southern ground hornbill nka uko mu cyongereza izina ryacyo ribivuga .
Gifite ku munwa wacyo aho uhera ikintu kimeze nka ihembe .
Iki gisiga kandi ni cyo kinini mu muryango wa ibindi bisiga bihuje ubwoko kuko kibasha kugira uburebure bwa santimetero 90 - 120 uvuye ku butaka .
Amababa yacyo ni umukara ariko ku mpera afite ibara rya umweru .
Iki gisiga ikigabo na ikigore ubasha kubitandukanya ubibonye na amaso kuko ikigabo gifite ibara rya umutuku ku maso no ku gikanu mu gihe ikigore gifite ibara rya ubururu ku muhogo .
Iki gisiga kandi gitandukanye cyane na ibindi byo mu muryango wacyo kuko cyo kigendagenda kandi kikibera hasi ku butaka kuruta kuba mu biti .
Iki gisiga iyo ari gito kiba gisa na igisiga gikuze .
Ibigungumuka bikunda kuba ku butaka nubwo gacye cyane wabibona mu biti .
Ibigungumuka kandi bikunda kuba ahantu hari umukenke .
Mu Rwanda ushobora kubisanga muri Pariki ya Akagera .
Ku rwego rwa Isi ubu harabarirwa ibigungumuka 1500 .
Umuvuduko wacyo ubasha kuba ibilometero 30 ku isaha .
Uburemere bwacyo iyo kimaze gukura ni ibiro 2 - 6 .
Uburambe bwa ikigungumuka ni imyaka 50 - 70 .
Ikigungumuka gitungwa na iki ?
Ikigungumuka ni indyanyama kuko gitungwa na inyamaswa zigenda ku butaka harimo ibikururanda , ibigenda bisimbagurika , inyamabere ntoya na ibindi .
Iki gisiga kandi gishobora kurya inyamaswa zapfuye iyo ibyo kurya byayo byibanze ari byo ibiburangoro byabuze .
Kuko iki gisiga gifite umunwa munini kiwukoresha gifata umuhigo kandi kigashobora kuwumira wose .
Iyo ari igihe kibasha kubona ibyo kurya bihagije kirabirundanya kandi kikajya kibirya gikurikije uko cyabibitse bikurikirana .
Uko ibigungumuka byororoka
Ibigungumuka ni ibisiga bikunda gusabana kuko ushobora kubisanga hamwe ari nka bibiri kugera ku munani .
No mu gihe cyo gutera amagi no kurera imishwi uko gukorera mu itsinda birakomeza .
Ikigungumuka kiba kimaze gukura ku buryo cyakororoka ku myaka itatu ariko gikora igisa no kuboneza urubyaro kuko nubwo kuri iyo myaka gishobora kubyara ariko kibikora ku myaka itandatu cyangwa irindwi ndetse gishobora no kugera mu myaka 10 kitarabyara .
Ibigungumuka bikora umuryango wa ingabo na ingore bizabana igihe kirekire . Akenshi ikigabo kinini na ikigore kinini mu muryango ni byo byororoka .
Buri muryango ugiye kororoka witabwaho nibura na ibindi bisiga bibiri .
Ikigungumuka cya ikigore gitera amagi mu mwobo wa igiti cyashaje cyangwa mu bitare .
Icyari kiba kimeze neza kuko kiba kirimo ibyatsi na amababi .
Ikigore gitera amagi 1 - 3 ya umweru kandi akavamo imishwi itatu ariko umushwi umwe wabanje kuvuka ni wo ubasha gukura kuko indi mishwi yicwa no kubura ibyo kurya mu gihe ikiri mito .
Igihe cyo kurarira amagi kiri hagati ya iminsi 40 - 45 .
Muri iki gihe cyo kurarira ingore iba igaburirwa na ibindi bisiga bigize umuryango .
Iyi ikigungumuka cyibyaye gishobora kongera kubyara nyuma ya imyaka itatu .
Imishwi ikomeza kubana na ababyeyi bayo nibura kugera ku myaka icyenda ikabona kuba yajya aho ishaka .
Ibibangamira Ibigungumira
Kubera ko ibi bisiga biba hasi ku butaka ibyo bituma inyamaswa zihiga nka ingwe na ingona bibifata mu buryo bworoshye cyane cyane iyo bikiri bito .
Ikindi ntabwo ibi bisiga bifite uburyo buhagije bwo kwirwanaho keretse gusakuza cyane kugira ngo bikange ikije kubihiga .
Ikindi bishobora gukora ni ugusakuza cyane nibura kugira biburire ibindi bibashe kwihisha .
Ku bwa iyo mpamvu ndetse na izindi zishingiye ku mihindagurikire ya ikirere , gutema amashyamba , kubyicisha uburozi , ubuhigi na ubushimusi bituma ibi bisiga bishyirwa ku rutonde rwa ibisiga birimo gucika ku rwego rwa isi .
Mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe ibi bisiga bikunda kumenagura ibirahure byo ku nzu mu gihe birebyemo bikibonamo , bityo abantu bakabyitura kubyica kuko byabangirije .
Ivumburamatsiko kuri " " " " Vautour Fauve de Ruppell , " " " " igisiga gitangaje cyo mu bwoko bwa inkongoro .
Ibyo ni ukuri ; gusa ku rundi ruhande mu Rwanda dufite ibindi bisiga byo mu muryango wa inkongoro bidashingira ibyo kurya byabyo buri gihe ku ntumbi , kuko bimwe muri byo bibasha kwica umuhigo , ariko kandi hakaba na ibindi bibeshwaho cyane na imbuto .
Mu bwoko bugera kuri bune bwa ibisiga dusanga mu muryango wa inkongoro , uyu munsi turibanda ku cyitwa vautour fauve de Ruppell , igisiga gifite imiterere idasanzwe .
Izina Ruppell kirikomora ku Mudage wize ibijyanye na inyamaswa kandi akaba umuvumbuzi wabayeho hagati ya 20 Ugushyingo 1794 na 10 Ukuboza 1884 witwaga Eduard Rüppell .
Mu Rwanda ibisiga byo muri ubu bwoko ushobora kubisanga muri Pariki ya Akagera ndetse muri Kigali ushobora kubisanga nko mu Murenge wa Kigali , Akagari ka Mwendo ahantu hari ikimoteri bajugunyamo ibisigazwa bya amatungo abagirwa mu ibagiro rya Nyabugogo , ushobora kandi kubisanga ku ibagiro rya Nyabugogo no ku kimoteri cya i Nduba
ahamenwa imyanda iva mu ibagiro .
Imiterere ya Ruppella s Griffon Vulture
Ruppella s griffon vulture ni igisiga ubasha kubona ukagitandukanya na ibindi .
Kigira amababa magari iyo kiyarambuye ariko kikagira amababa magufi ku mirizo .
Ijosi ryacyo hariho ubwoya bwa umweru kandi umunwa wacyo ni umuhondo .
Ku rwego rwa isi habarurwa ibisiga byo muri ubu bwoko bigera kuri 22 . 000 .
Iki gisiga gishobora kurama imyaka iri hagati ya 40 - 50 .
Iyo kigurutse cyihuta kigendera ku muvuduko wa kilometero 35 ku isaha .
Iyo gikuze gishobora gupima ibiro 6 , 4 - 9 .
Uburebure bwacyo buri hagati ya santimetero 85 - 103 .
Ibyo kurya bya Ruppella s Griffon Vulture
Ibi bisiga ni indyanyama kandi birya na ibisigazwa biva ku nyamaswa zapfuye cyangwa zishwe .
Bivugwa ko bitajya byica ahubwo birya ibintu byapfuye .
Ibyo bintu bishobora kuba byishwe na izindi nyamaswa nko mu mashyamba , bishobora kandi kuba byishwe na indwara cyangwa byapfuye kuko bishaje .
Kuba ibi bisiga bitica ntabwo ari uko ari ubunebwe cyangwa intege nke .
Hari inyandiko zimwe na zimwe zivuga ko ari byo bisiga bishobora gutumbagira hejuru cyane mu kirere kuruta ibindi byose kandi bikabasha kureba hasi bikabona ibyo kurya .
Uko Ruppella s Griffon Vulture yororoka
Ibi bisiga bikora umuryango wa ingabo na ingore imwe kandi bikabana mu buzima bwose .
Ibyo bivuze ko bidacana inyuma nka uko bigenda ku bisiga na inyoni zimwe na zimwe .
Ibi bisiga iyo bigeye gutera amagi byishyira hamwe mu matsinda atandukanye ku buryo ushobora gusanga imiryango hagati ya 15 na 20 yarateye amagi ahantu hamwe .
Iyo bishatse gutera amagi bishaka ahantu hatekanye ku buryo ikiremwamuntu bitacyorohera kuhagera ngo kibihungabanyirize umutekano .
Ingore itera igi rimwe ariko rikararirwa na ababyeyi bombi mu gihe kiri hagati ya iminsi 52 - 60 .
Iyo igi rikimara guturagwa umushwi uba ufite intege nke kandi upima nibura amagarama 170 .
Iyo umushwi umaze iminsi 60 uba umaze kumera amababa kandi usa na igisiga gikuru .
Nyuma ya amezi ane umushwi uba ushobora kuguruka neza ariko ntabwo uhita usiga ababyeyi bawo ahubwo bakomeza kuwitaho .
Ibi bisiga birasabana cyane kuko hari ubwo ushobora kubisanga ahantu hamwe ari nka ibisiga birenga 100 .
Uruhare rwa Ruppella s Griffon Vulture mu kubungabunga ibidukikije
Ubusanzwe nko muri za pariki aho usanga hari inyamaswa zibeshwaho no kurya inyama haramutse hatabayeho uburyo bwo gukoramo isuku wasanga ahantu hose huzuye umwanda na ibisigazwa bitari ngombwa .
Muri urwo rwego ni ho akamaro ka ibisiga byitwa Ruppella s griffon vulture kagaragarira kuko usanga bikora isuku binyuze mu kurya inyamaswa zipfushije kuko zishaje , amayezi na ibindi bisigazwa bya inyamaswa zishwe na izitunzwe na inyama , bityo bigatuma aho hantu hadahora umwanda utari ngombwa .
Ku rundi ruhande , byakabye byiza abantu batunze inyamaswa zo mu rugo igihe zipfuye bitagateje ikibazo kubwo kujugunywa ahabonetse hose cyangwa ngo zijugunywe mu mazi abantu bazakoresha kandi hari ibisiga byazirya bikamererwa neza .
Ibibangamira Ruppella s Griffon Vulture
Muri iki gihe Isi ihanganye na imihindagurikire ya ikirere ndetse ugasanga ibikorwa bya muntu bitita ku bidukikije ku rugero ruhagije , ingaruka zabyo zigera no ku bisiga .
Reba nawe ibikorwa byo gutema amashyamba bituma ibi bisiga bibura aho kuba byisanzuye , abantu barabihohotera mu buryo bumwe cyangwa ubundi kugeza na ubwo babyicisha uburozi .
Mu gice cya Afurika ya uburengerazuba bivugwa ko ibi bisiga bikoreshwa cyane mu mihango yabo ya gakondo .
Abantu barindwi bamaze kwicwa na ibiza , inzu 78 zarasenyutse muri Gicurasi .
Usibye abamaze kubura ubuzima , MINEMA yatangaje ko kuva tariki ya 1 kugera kuya 11 Gicurasi 2021 , inzu zigera kuri 78 zasenyutse , ubutaka bugera kuri hegitari 130 . 3 bumaze kwangirika mu gihe amatungo agera kuri abiri yapfuye naho imihanda itanu igasenyuka .
Umuyobozi wa Ishami Rishinzwe UbutabazI no gusana ibyangijwe muri Minisiteri ishinzwe ibikorwa bya Ubutabazi , MINEMA , Habinshuti Philippe , yabwiye IGIHE kuri ubu ikiri kwihutirwa ari ukurengera ubuzima bwa abahuye na ibiza bya imvura .
Ati " " " " Ikiba kiri gukorwa ni ukureba ko abo bahuye na ibibazo bari gukorerwa ubutabazi bwa ibanze noneho tugatangira gutegura ibyo gusana kuko ni ibintu bisaba gutegurwa , tukareba niba aho ari ahantu hakongera gutura cyangwa hakarebwa niba bashakirwa ahandi ho gutura . " " " "
Yakomeje ati " " " " Ingufu ziba zigomba gushyirwamo harebwa abo bagize ikibazo ngo bameze bate , bakeneye iki kugira ngo ubuzima bwabo bube bumeze neza . " " " "
Yavuze ko kuri ubu abamaze gusenyerwa inzu na imvura hari abacumbikiwe na abaturanyi abandi bakaba bacumbikiwe mu nsengero .
Habinshuti yasabye abaturage gukora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo birinde ibishobora kujyana ubuzima bwabo mu kaga .
Ati " " " " Turasaba abantu kugenzura niba aho batuye nta kibazo gihari , niba inzu zabo zitaratangiye gusaduka , bakareba cyane cyane ibibazo bya inkuba bakajya bugama mu nzu aho kujya hanze .
Turabashishikariza kugira ngo buri wese yumve ko iyo imvura iri kugwa haba hashobora kuza ibyago kandi buri wese aba agomba kuba akora ibyo akwiye kuba akora kugira ngo yirinde kandi agabanye ingaruka zo kuba yagerwaho na ibiza . " " " "
Ikigo cya Igihugu cya Iteganyagihe , Meteo Rwanda , giherutse gutangaza ko mu minsi 10 iri imbere , ni ukuvuga kuva tariki ya 10 kugera kuri 20 Gicurasi , hateganyijwe imvura nyinshi mu gihugu iri kuri milimetero hagati ya 40 na 120 bya umwihariko mu gice cya Amajyaruguru .
Loni yasabye ko hafatwa ingamba zo kugabanya Gaz Méthane mu maguru mashya
Iyo raporo yiswe Global Methane Assessment yamuritswe kuri uyu wa 6 Gicurasi 2021 , yerekana ko iyo gaz ihumanya ikirere ku gipimo cya 30 % nyuma ya dioxide de carbone , ariko bigatandukanywa na uko Méthane yo imara mu kirere imyaka icumi gusa naho carbone ikaba yahamara imyaka isaga 100 .
Ni aho abashakashatsi bakoze iyo raporo bahereye bavuga ko kuyigabanya bishoboka kandi byagira akamaro kuko nko kugabanya 45 % bya iyo gaz bishoboka mu myaka 10 , ndetse mu gihe byaba bigenze gutyo nyuma ya imyaka 25 ubushyuhe bwa Isi bukaganukaho dogere Celisius 0 , 3 .
Umuyobozi Nshingwabikorwa wa UNEP , Inger Andersen , yavuze ko hakenewe ubufatanye bwa amahanga mu kugabanya iyo gaz mu maguru mashya .
Yagize ati " " " " Kugabanya Méthane ni cyo kintu gikomeye twakora mu koroshya imihindagurikire ya ikirere mu myaka 25 iri imbere , bikuzuzanya na izindi mbaraga zikenewe mu kugabanya dioxyde de carbone .
Inyungu byagira kuri rubanda , ubukungu no ku bidukijije ni nyinshi kandi ntizabonerwa ikiguzi .
Dukeneye ubufatanye bwa amahanga mu kugabanya Méthane nyinshi ishoboka vuba na bwangu muri iyi myaka icumi . " " " "
Gaz Méthane ishobora kuva mu mu mazi cyangwa mu butaka nka ibindi binyabutabire kamere no mu bintu biba bimaze igihe kinini byaraboze no mu bikorwa bya muntu bisanzwe .
Ibyo birimo ikoreshwa rya ibicanwa ryongera 35 % , imyanda yongera 20 % ndetse na ubuhinzi bwongera 40 % .
Ku rundi ruhande , iyo raporo yanagaragaje ko kugabanya iyo gaz bishoboka kuko nka ibikorwa bya muntu biyongera ubu bishobora kwifashisha ikoranabuhanga rigezweho .
Ubuhinzi na ubworozi byakorwa mu buryo bwa kijyambere , ibimoteri na ahandi harundwa imyanda na ibishingwe ku Isi hakagabanywa , ndetse ikoreshwa rya ibicanwa nka amakara , inkwi , ibikomoka kuri peteroli na ibindi nka nyiramugengeri bikagabanywa himakazwa uburyo bujyanye na igihe butanangiza ibidukikije .
Amasezerano ya Paris agamije kugabanya imyuka ihumanya ikirere yashyizweho umukono na ibihugu 200 , agena ko buri gihugu cyayemeye cyakora iyo bwabaga kikagabanya imyuka cyohereza mu kirere ku buryo nibura mu 2050 ubushyuhe bwa Isi bwazaba buri kuri dogere Celisius 2 byaba byiza bukajya munsi ya dogere Celsius 1 , 5 .
Kuba gaz Méthane yatangira kugabanywa nka uko iyo raporo yabisabye , ndetse na uburyo bwo kugabanya dioxyde de carbone bugakomeza gushyirwamo ingufu hifashishwa amashanyarazi , bishobora kugeza kuri iyo nsinzi .
Abacuruzi basabye kubanza kwigishwa ibibi bya amashashi na pulastiki aho guhanwa .
Babitangaje ubwo kuwa 30 Mata 2021 , Ikigo cya Igihugu gishinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije ( REMA ) , cyongeraga gukora ubukangurambaga ku bacuruzi bagicuruza amashashi ndetse na ibikozwe muri purasitiki bikoreshwa rimwe , ari nako basobanurirwa ububi bwayo mu kwangiza ibidukikije .
Batamuriza Chantal akorera ubucuruzi mu murenge wa Kanombe mu Kagari ka Kabaza , yavuze ko atumva uburyo hari amasashe amwe yemerewa kwinjira mu gihugu .
Ati " " " " Icyashyirwamo imbaraga ni ukubanza kudusobanurira ibyemewe na ibitemewe .
Nka ubu baramutse banciye amande bakavuga ngo fanta yo muri pulastiki ntiyemewe kandi nta kindi cyayisimbuye , urumva ko ari ikibazo gihari kandi umucuruzi adafitiye igisubizo cyacyo .
Hari ibintu bavuga ko bitemewe kandi byageze ku isoko , nka OMO ziri mu masashe kandi zifite inganda zizikora kandi zizwi , ntekereza ko ari ho bakabanje kubikemura . " " " "
Ngizwenayo Musa nawe yavuze ko kuba hari ibicuruzwa bimwe byemererwa kwinjira mu gihugu bipfunyitse mu masashi cyangwa pulastiki , biba bishobora gushyira mu gihombo umucuruzi .
Ati " " " " Ibyiza bakabanje guca iyo pulastiki mbere ya uko yinjira mu gihugu kuko iyo yinjiye imbere mu gihugu uri kuyicuruza niwe ubihomberamo kurusha . Ibyiza bayikumira mbere ya uko yinjira .
Bakadushakiye mbere ibyemewe ku buryo bitadushyira mu gihombo .
Umuyobozi Mukuru wungirije wa REMA , Munyazikwiye Faustin , yavuze ko iyo itegeko ryasohotse rireba buri umwe gusa ko hari abica mategeko nkana banyuza amasashe mu nzira zitemwe .
Yavuze ko ibicuruzwa byinjira bisa na ibyemewe bipfunyitse mu masashe birimo inkweto , ibiribwa na ibindi biterwa na uko hari itegeko rigena amahoro ya ibidukikije , rigena ko agomba kuzajya acibwa ikintu icyo ari cyo cyose kivuye hanze gipfunyitse mu isashe kugira ngo ayo mahoro afashe mu gucunga neza uwo mwanda winjiye mu
gihugu .
Yavuze ko hakiri imbogamizi kuko iryo tegeko ritari ryemezwa na inzego zibishinzwe gusa ko rizakemura byinshi .
Ati " " " " Nirisohoka rizafasha guhagarika bimwe mu bicuruzwa bipfunyitse mu masashi bitabuzwaga kwinjira mu gihugu kubera amasezerano igihugu kiba gifitanye na ikindi mu bucuruzi .
Hakazajyaho amategeko ariko atabangamiye ubwo bucuruzi . " " " "
Munyazikwiye yavuze ko kandi hari ubwo abacuruzi bemererwa gutanga ibipfunnyitse mu masashi cyangwa pulastiki mu gihe hagaragaye ko nta kindi gihari kibisimbura .
Ati " " " " Itegeko ryateganyije ko mu gihe bigaragaye ko ikigiye gukorwa cyangwa ikigiye gupfunyikwa kidafite ikigisimbura REMA ishobora gutanga uburenganzira bwihariye ku muntu ufite ibyo ashaka gupfunyika . " " " "
Itegeko N ° 17 / 2019 ryo ku wa 10 / 08 / 2019 ribuza ikorwa , itumizwa mu mahanga , ikoreshwa na icuruzwa rya amasashe na ibikoresho bikozwe muri pulasitiki bikoreshwa inshuro imwe .
Naho ingingo ya 10 ivuga ko umuntu utumiza mu mahanga amasashe na ibikoresho bikozwe muri pulasitiki bikoreshwa inshuro imwe ahanishwa kwamburwa ayo masashe na ibyo bikoresho no kwishyura ihazabu yo mu rwego rwa ubutegetsi ingana na inshuro icumi ( 10 ) za agaciro ka ayo masashe na ibyo bikoresho bikozwe muri
pulasitiki bikoreshwa inshuro imwe .
Ni mu gihe umuntu uranguza amasashe na ibikoresho bikozwe muri pulasitiki bikoreshwa inshuro imwe ahanishwa ihazabu yo mu rwego rwa ubutegetsi ingana na amafaranga ya u Rwanda ibihumbi magana arindwi ( 700 . 000 FRW ) kandi ayo amasashe n " " " " ibyo bikoresho akabyamburwa , naho umuntu ucuruza mu buryo butaranguza amasashe
na ibikoresho bikozwe muri pulasitiki bikoreshwa inshuro imwe agahanishwa ihazabu yo mu rwego rwa ubutegetsi ingana na amafaranga ya u Rwanda ibihumbi magana atatu ( 300 . 000 FRW ) kandi ayo masashe na ibyo bikoresho akabyamburwa nka uko ingingo ya 11 na iya 12 za iryo tegeko zibivuga .
Malawi : Abaturage bagize ubwoba nyuma ya uko amazi ya ikiyaga ahindutse icyatsi .
Minisitiri ushinzwe amashyamba na umutungo kamere muri ucyo gihugu , Nancy Tembo yatangaje ko guhindura ibara kwa amazi ya ikiyaga byatewe na umwuka muke wa Oxygène nyuma ya imvura nyinshi imaze iminsi igwa .
Tembo yasabye abaturage kuba bitonze nibura mu gihe cya ibyumweru bibiri amazi agasubira uko yahoze .
Inzobere zivuga ko guhinduka icyatsi kwa amazi ya ikiyaga biterwa n " " " " ibyatsi bito cyane bitaboneshwa amaso ( birebeshwa microscope ) byo mu bwoko bwa urubobi ( blue green algae ) byiswe " " " " Cynobacteria , " " " " byiyongera mu kiyaga , bigatuma amazi ahindura ibara agasa na icyatsi cyererutse urebeye kure
, ibi bikaba bikunda kugaragara kenshi mu gihe cya itumba .
Ibi byagaragaye no mu kiyaga cya Kivu mu mwaka wa 2016 .
Umwaka wa 2022 uzashira nta nyubako zigisakaje Fibrociment .
Hashize imyaka itanu Ikigo cya Igihugu cya imiturire , RHA gitangiye urugendo rwo kurandura burundu amabati ya fibrocement , azwiho kugira ikinyabutabire cya Asbestos kigira ingaruka mbi ku buzima bwa muntu .
Nyamara urwo rugendo rwakomeje gukomwa mu nkokora na ingengo ya Imari nkeya .
Ikigo cya Igihugu cya imiturire cyivuga ko inzu zose zari zarasakajwe fibrociment hamaze gukurwaho izigera 70 . 1 % .
RHA igaragaza ko kugira ngo aya mabati akurweho , hakenewe agera kuri miliyari eshanu za amafaranga ya u Rwanda .
Umuhuzabikorwa muri RHA ushinzwe gahunda yo gukuraho ayo mabati , Ntakirutimana Mathias , yabwiye IGIHE ko hari icyizere ko umwaka wa 2022 uzasiga ayo mabati yakuweho .
Mu mu turere dutandukanye twa Igihugu twiganjemo itwa Intara ya Amajyepfo na Uburasirazuba ku nzu za leta niho hakigaragara cyane amabati ya fibrociment .
Ibi bishimangirwa na abaturage bo mu Karere ka Nyagatare bivuriza ku bitaro bya Karangazi aho basaba ko amabati ya Fibrociment asakaye ibyo bitaro yakurwaho kuko ashobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku buzima bwa umuntu .
Abavuganye na Flash Fm bavuze ko bafite amakuru ko aya mabati afite ingaruka mbi ku buzima bwa muntu bityo ko batumva ukuntu yaba agisakajwe ibitaro .
Umwe Ati " " " " Ariya mabati ya Fibro ciment ntekereza ya uko uretse hano Karangazi nta handi asigaye kandi ariya mabati afite ingaruka ku buzima bwa umuntu kuko ikintu abashakashatsi baba baratekerejeho , leta igafata icyemezo cyo kuyaca mu gihugu byanga bikunda ashobora gutera ubundi burwayi . " " " "
Aba baturage bavuze ko mu mwaka wa 2017 iki kibazo bari bakigejeje ku basenateri ubwo bari baje muri ako gace ariko kugeza ubu akaba atarakurwa kuri ibyo bitaro .
Ntakirutimana Mathias yavuze ko iki kibazo bakizi ndetse ko mu mwaka wa 2022 kizaba cyamaze gukemuka kuko ubu hagikorwa inyigo yabyo .
OMS ivuga ko abantu miliyoni 125 bakorera ahantu bashobora guhumeka umukungugu wa aya mabati bashobora kwandura kanseri ya ibihaha , ari nabyo bituma nibura ibihumbi 107 ku isi bipfa kubera ingaruka zo guhumeka uyu mukungugu .
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda hari ibyobo 13 byo gushyinguramo amabati ya fibrocement .
RAB igeze kure umushinga uzagoboka abaturage bo ku Mayaga bajyaga bahura na ikibazo cya ubwatsi bwa amatungo .
Mu ukwakira 2020 Ikigo cya Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere rya Ubuhinzi na Ubworozi , RAB , cyatangiye gushaka igisubizo kirambye ku kibazo cya ibura rya ubwatsi gikunze kugaragara mu gice cya Amayaga mu Rwanda kigatuma hari bamwe mu borozi bambuka bakajya kubushakira mu Burundi , bagahohoterwa cyangwa bagafatwa
bagafungirwayo .
RAB ibinyujije mu mushinga wayo ugamije guteza imbere ubworozi bwa inka zitanga umukamo witwa Rwanda Dairy Development Project ( RDDP ) yatangiye gutoza abaturage bo mu Karere ka Nyanza gutera ubwatsi ku bwinshi kugira ngo batazongera guhura na ikibazo cya ibura ryabwo .
Icyo gihe hahise haterwa ubwatsi ku buso bwa hegitari zigera kuri ebyiri mu Murenge wa Kibirizi kugira ngo abaturage bazabone imbuto yabwo ihagije .
Umukozi wa Umushinga RDDP , Nshokeyinka Joseph , yabwiye IGIHE ko kugeza ubu imbuto za ubwatsi batubuye zamaze kuboneka ku buryo zigiye guhabwa abaturage bagatera mu mirima yabo .
Ati " " " " Muri gihembwe cya ihinga cya 2021 A twari turi ku Mayaga muri Kibirizi aho twari twagiye gutangiza igihembwe cya ihinga rya ubwatsi ku rwego rwa igihugu .
Ni gahunda yakomereje no mu tundi turere . " " " "
" " " " Ubu imbuto irahari imeze neza , twiteguye ko mu gihembwe cya ihinga cya 2022 A izaba igeze ku gipimo cyo gutanga izindi mbuto zigahabwa bariya baturanyi bose bari hariya .
Tukaba tudashidikanya ko mu minsi iza abantu bose bambukaga bajya kwahira hakurya bitazongera kubaho . " " " "
Nshokeyinka akomeza avuga ko kugeza ubu imbuto yabonetse ari ibinyampeke birimo urubingo ruzwi nka Kakamega na Chloris Gayana ndetse na Panicum maximum na Panikum Chloratum .
Hari kandi ubwatsi bwa ibinyamisogwe aribwo Desmodium distrortum ; Desmodium incinatum ; Mucuna na Rabrab .
Ati " " " " Ibyo byose ni ibinyamisogwe usanga bijya kunganira bya binyampeke kuko iyo bigaburiwe inka iba ihawe ifunguro ryuzuye . " " " "
Bamwe mu bahinzi bo mu Karere ka Nyanza mu Murenge wa Kibirizi babwiye IGIHE ko biteguye kwakira imbuto ya ubwatsi kugira ngo babuhinge kuko babukeneye .
Mukakarera Immaculée ati " " " " Izi mbuto batuzaniye bigaragara ko ari nziza kandi zikura vuba .
Ubu rero dutegereje ko baziduha kugira ngo dutangire kuzihinga mu mirima yacu , turiteguye . " " " "
Undi mworozi witwa Nsigaye Paul na we yavuze ko nibamara kubaha imbuto , ikibazo cya ibira rya ubwatsi kizaba gikemutse .
Ati " " " " Hano ku Mayaga icyo kibazo cya ibura rya ubwatsi kimaze igihe kinini , ariko ziriya mbuto batuburiye inaha nibamara kuziduha tukazitera , kizaba gikemutse kandi nta muntu uzasubira kwahira mu Burundi . " " " "
Mu turere 14 umushinga RDDP ukoreramo mu gihembwe cya ihinga cya 2021 A hatewe ubwatsi ku buso bushya bungana na hegitari 2000 .
Hagaragajwe ingaruka za ifumbire mvaruganda ku mihindagurikire ya ikirere .
Politiki ya ubuhinzi yo muri 2018 ivuga ko " " " " Igihugu cyifuza kwihaza mu biribwa , imirire myiza na iterambere rirambye , biyoboye ubuhinzi muri 2030 " " " " naho politiki ya ibidukikije na imihindagurikire ya ikirere yo muri 2019 igira iti " " " " u Rwanda rukwiye kugira ibidukikije bisukuye , bishobora guhangana
na imihindagurikire ya ikirere bitanga ubuzima bwiza kuri sosiyete . " " " "
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na Dr John Musemakweli buvuga ko nubwo izi politiki zombi zisa na aho zuzuzanya ariko harimo byinshi bikenewe kunozwa kugira ngo hakomeze kwimakazwa kubungabunga ibidukikije no guhangana na imihindagurikire ya ikirere .
Muri ibyo harimo ko gukoresha inyongeramusaruro mvaruganda ndetse na imikoreshereze ya ibishanga bikigarara nka ikibazo gikomeye ku kubungabunga ibidukikije .
Raporo ivuga ko guhinga mu bishanga ahanini bitera ibyago birimo kugabanuka kwa amazi no kuyanduza , bagasaba ko habaho gukoreshwa ibishanga mu buryo bunoze hatitawe gusa ku musaruro wa ibihingwa ahubwo hagamijwe no kubungabunga ibidukikije .
Ku kijyanye no gukoresha imvaruganda na imiti imwe yica udukoko , raporo ivuga nubwo bigira umumaro ariko kubikoresha , cyane bituma ubutaka bwangirika , amazi akandura na ibiribwa ndetse bikaba na uburozi ku rusobe rwa ibinyabuzima .
Na ubwo iyo raporo ivuga ibitagenda ariko inagaragaza ko hari inzira zishobora kwifashishwa hashakirwa umuti urambye bimwe mu bibazo bikigaragara .
Raporo isaba inzego bireba kurushaho gukora mu buryo bwo kugabanya imvaruganda hakongerwa ikoreshwa rya ifumbire ya imborera , kugabanya no guhitamo neza imiti yica udukoko ikoreshwa mu rwego rwo kurinda abantu na urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima .
Umukozi muri Minisiteri ya Ubuhinzi na Ubworozi ushinzwe ibijyanye na ihindagurika rya ikirere André Gatete , yavuze ko ibyo abakoze ubushakashatsi basabye biri mu byo MINAGRI yiyemeje ariko agaragaza ko hari aho ubushakashatsi butagaragaza neza imikorere myiza ya ibishanga birimo kuba hakoreshwa na gahunda yo kuhira .
Yagize ati " " " " Ni raporo nziza kandi twishimiye ko na ibyo musaba biri muri gahunda za Minisiteri , muri gahunda yo gukora ubuhinzi ariko bugendanye na ihindagurika rya ikirere [ . . . ] icyo nashakaga kuvuga ni uko bitoroshye kugabanya ikoreshwa rya imvaruganda .
Turi gukora ubushakashatsi tureba ko hakoreshwa ifumbire na imiti icyarimwe ariko tugamije kugabanya ibikorerwa mu nganda .
Biragoye kandi gukoresha imborera yonyine ni ibintu bizadusaba igihe kitari gito , ndatekereza ko dukwiye kwibanda ku nyungu zo kubikoresha byombi ducunganana ihindagurika rya ikirere . " " " "
Nsengimana Aimable wari witabiriye iki kiganiro yavuze ko hari na igihe usanga inzego za ibanze nazo zibigiramo intege nke mu ishyirwa mu bikorwa ku ngamba zinyuranye zigamije kubungabunga ibidukikije ndetse no kurinda ibyagezweho .
Umukozi ushinzwe porogaramu muri AFSA , Umuryango ushinzwe ubuziranenge bwa ibiribwa muri Afurika , Bridget Mugambe , usanzwe utera inkunga RCCDN yashimangiye ko bazakomeza gutera inkunga ku kijyanye no kwita ku ihindagurika rya ikirere , mu bihugu bigera kuri 12 uyu muryango ukoreramo muri Afurika .
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri ya ibidukikije Patrick Karera yavuze ko gushyira mu bikorwa ingamba zijyanye na ihindagurika rya ikirere Leta ikorana na ibigo bya abikorera umunsi ku wundi ndetse anashimira abakoze iyo raporo no kugaragaza ingamba zagenderwaho kugeza kuri 2030 .
RCCDN ivuga hakwiye gushakishwa uburyo politiki ya ubuhinzi yavugururwa kugira ngo ingingo ziburamo zihuzwe neza na Politiki ya ibidukikije na imihindagurikire ya ikirere , gushyiraho uburyo buhoraho bwa ibiganiro byatuma izi politiki zirushaho kuzuzanya aho kuvuguruzanya no guhanira gushyira mu bikorwa ibivugwa muri izo
politiki zombi aho guhera mu nyandiko .
Amashuri yashishikarijwe gutera ibiti nka uburyo bwa isuku no kurwanya ibiza
Byatangarijwe mu gikorwa cyo gutera ibiti ku bigo bya amashuri mu Mujyi wa Kigali .
Ni igikorwa cyateguwe na Umuryango wa Urubyiruko Ruhanira Kurengera Ibidukikije , The Green Fighter na Ikigo Mpuzamahanga Cyita ku Bidukikije , Global Green Growth Institute ( GGGI ) , mu rwego rwo kwizihiza umunsi ngarukamwaka wahariwe kubungabunga Umubumbe wa Isi .
Ibi biti byatewe ku bigo bya amashuri bitatu mu Mujyi wa Kigali , birimo na Urwunge rwa Amashuri rwa Cyahafi .
Umukozi Mukuru muri , GGGI , Michelle DeFreese , yavuze ko gutera ibiti ari uburyo bwizewe bwo guhangana na ihindagurika rya ibihe no kubungabunga ibidukikije muri rusange .
Michelle kandi yabwiye IGIHE ko kuba urubyiruko rwitanga mu bikorwa byo kurengera ibidukikije bizafasha u Rwanda guhangana na imihindagurikire ya ibihe .
Ati " " " " Gutera ibiti ni imwe mu nzira zizewe zo guhangana na imihindagurikire ya ibihe .
Ni ibya agacira gakomeye kuba biri kugirwamo uruhare na urubyiruko .
Twizeye ko abanyeshuri bo kuri ibi bigo twateyemo ibiti bazabibungabunga . " " " "
Umukozi ushinzwe kwigisha ibidukikije na imihindagurikire ya ibihe mu Kigo cya Igihugu cyo kubungabunga ibidukikije , REMA , Rukwaya Jean Luc , yabwiye IGIHE ko ibiti byatewe birimo ibifite umumaro wo gufata ubutaka hirindwa inkangu na isuri , mu gihe ibindi bigenewe kurimbisha aho byatewe , kuyungurura umwuka abantu bahumeka
, na ibindi .
Icyakora kuko hari ahagiye haterwa ibiti nyuma ntibyitabweho bikaza kwangirika , Rukwaya yasabye abayobozi na abanyeshuri ba aho ibi biti byatewe kubibungabunga .
Ati " " " " Hari aho byaterwaga nyuma tugasanga batarabyitayeho bikangirika .
Ni yo mpamvu twasabye ubuyobozi bwa ishuri na abanyeshuri kubungabunga ibi biti twateye .
Tuzajya tugaruka kureba uko ibi biti bimeze . " " " "
Umubozi ushinzwe amasomo ku Rwunge rwa Amashuri rwa Cyahafi , Hategekimana Théogène , yabwiye IGIHE ko bishimiye guhabwa ibiti byera imbuto ziribwa , kandi babyitezeho kuzabafasha guhanga na ikibazo cya imirire mibi .
Ati " " " " Ni ikintu gikomeye kuri twebwe , kugira ubusitani burimbisha ikigo cyacu .
Akarusho ni uko harimo na ibiti byera imbuto ziribwa .
Twiteguye kubibungabunga tukabirinda kwangirika . " " " "
Ibiti 49 byatewe ku bigo bitatu bya amashuri , birimo ibifata ubutaka , ibyera imbuto ziribwa , indabo na ibindi bifite umumaro wo kurimbisha aho byatewe .
Ubwoko icumi bwa inyamaswa ziri gukendera mu Rwanda .
Abashakashatsi ku binyabuzima na abarebera hafi ibya inyamaswa zo mu gasozi , bavuga ko kuba zimwe zarashizeho na izindi zikaba ziri mu marembera bigirwamo uruhare na ubuhigi bunyuranyije na amategeko bukomeje kwiyongera , ba rushimusi , ndetse no kuziroga .
Zimwe zigenda zigabanyuka mu mibare na aho zagaragaraga , naho izindi hashize imyaka myinshi zitakiboneka ahantu na hamwe mu Rwanda ku buryo bitekerezwa ko zishobora kuba zitakihaba .
Ubu ni ubwoko bwa igikeri kigira amabara avanze ku buryo ubona ameze nka umutako cyashyizweho .
Amakuru aturuka mu Kigo gishinzwe Ubushakashatsi ku Rusobe rwa Ibinyabuzima na Umutungo Kamere , Center of Excellence in Biodiversity and Natural Resource Management ( CoEB ) , avuga ko icyo gikeri giheruka kugaragara mu Rwanda mu 1950 .
Ubu bikekwa ko cyamaze gucika burundu mu Gihugu .
Amakuru IGIHE yahawe na umwe mu barebera hafi inyamaswa zo muri Pariki ya Akagera , Karama Joseph , avuga ko inzobe zitakihaboneka , ndetse no mu bishanga bihegereye nta zihari .
Ati " " " " Ahubwo nta na icyizere dufite ko zigihari .
Inzobe ziba mu bishanga kandi nitwe dufite ibishanga binini haba muri Afurika ya Iburasirazuba na iyo Hagati , rero urumva ko zakabaye zihaboneka .
Abahigi barazigabije rwose ntiwapfa kuzibona . " " " "
Yavuze ko bakeka ko muri pariki zishobora kuba zitarashiramo burundu " " " " ariko iyo tubarura ntazo tubona . " " " "
Ni inyoni nini ifite umunwa munini umeze nka urukweto ari naho havuye izina " " " " bec de chaussure . " " " "
Yari isanzwe iboneka muri Pariki ya Akagera ariko hashize igihe itakigaraga nka uko bihamywa na CoEB ndetse na Karama uhaba umunsi ku munsi .
Karama yagize ati " " " " Mu mwaka ushize twazibonye hanze nko ku ruzitiro , ariko nazo zifite ibyago byinshi byo kuba zacika burundu . " " " "
Ubu ni bumwe mu bwoko bwa inyamaswa nini zigaragara hake kuko mu Isi yose habarurwaga izisaga 5 . 500 mu mwaka ushize .
Mu Rwanda ni zo zihaba gusa , ariko zari zarahashizeho burundu kugeza ubwo hazanwaga izindi mu myaka mike ishize ariko nazo ziracyari nke .
Mu 2017 hagejewe 18 ziturutse muri Afurika ya Epfo , mu 2019 hazanwa izindi eshanu zikuwe muri Repubulika ya Tchèque .
Ubu zose ziba muri Pariki ya Akagera ariko nazo ni nkeya " " " " ku buryo zifatwa nka izishobora kuzakendera . " " " "
Mu nyamaswa nini u Rwanda rufite ariko nazo nkeya kugeza ubu , Intare na zo zirimo .
Mu 2015 ni bwo hazanywe zirindwi zikuwe muri Afurika ya Epfo , nyuma ya imyaka 11 nta na imwe ibarizwa mu Gihugu kuko hagaragazwa ko iya nyuma yapfuye irozwe mu 2006 .
Ubu izihari zose zibarizwa muri Pariki ya Akagera iri mu Burasirazuba bwa Igihugu .
Iyi nyamaswa nayo iri mu zigaragazwa ko zifite ibyago byinshi byo gucika burundu mu Rwanda mu myaka iri imbere , bitewe na uko izigaragara mu ishyamba rya Buhanga riri mu Majyaruguru zikomeje kuba nke kandi ari ho zibarizwa .
Abaturiye Pariki ya Ibirunga batangiye guhabwa amazi meza .
Ibi ubuyobozi bwa akarere ka Rubavu bwabitangaje ubwo hasozwaga umushinga wa Water for Virunga wahaga aba baturage ibigega byo gufata amazi mu rwego rwo gukumira isuri no kurinda pariki yibasirwaga na aba baturage bajyagamo gushaka amazi mu masoko .
Muri uyu mushinga kandi hubatswe amavomero azafasha abaturage kubona amazi meza .
Umuhuzabikorwa wa umushinga Water For Virunga mu Rwanda , Uganda na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo , Gertjan Leereveld yavuze ko ibigega batanze byafashije mu gukumira amazi yambukaga muri Congo bigateza amakimbirane na abaturage ba Kibumba .
Ati " " " " Mu karere ka Rubavu twakoreye mu murenge wa Bugeshi aho twubatse ibigega 222 bikaba byarafashije abaturage gufata amazi ya imvura nyinshi yateraga isuri bigabanya na amakimbirane abaturage bagiranaga na abaturanyi ba Kibumba muri Congo kubera amazi yaturukaga mu Rwanda akabangiriza .
Ubu dusize hashyizweho komite za amazi eshatu zigizwe na abantu 21 bazasigara bakurikirana aya mavomero natwe kandi tuzaba tubari hafi " " " " . " " " "
Uzaribara Théonestel umwe mu bazasigara bacunga amavomero yijeje ubufatanye bwa abaturage mu kwita kuri ayo mavomero .
Ati " " " " Twishyize hamwe buri muturage atanga amafaranga adufasha kwizigamira kugira ngo nubwo umushinga urangiye tuzakomeze gufata neza ibi bigega nibiba ngombwa tuzagure ibindi .
Abahinzi ba ibirayi nabo barimo kwizigamira mbere bagiraga amafaranga igihe cya umwero nyuma ugasanga barimo kuguza " " " " . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa akarere ka Rubavu wungirije ushinzwe imari na iterambere rya ubukungu Nzabonimpa Déogratias yavuze ko ikibazo cya amazi kigiye kuba amateka mu bice bya ibirunga .
Ati " " " " Nka akarere ni inshingano kubungabaunga ibyakozwe mu gufata amazi tunabizeza ko ikibazo cya amazi mu gace ka ibirunga kigiye kuba amateka kubwa umushinga wa Virunga Belt ugiye gukora umuhanda mwemerewe na Perezida uzava muri Burera ukazagera hano unyuze Musanze na Nyabihu kandi uwo muhanda uzazana na imiyoboro ya amazi meza yo
mu ruganda " " " " . " " " "
Mu murenge wa Bugeshi uturiye ibirunga bya Nyiragongo na Kalisimbi hatanzwe ibigega 222 bizafasha abaturage guhangana na ingaruka za imvura idasanzwe ihoraho iturutse mu birunga igatwara ubutaka bwabo , ndetse no kubarinda kujya gushaka amazi mu masoko mu ishyamba rya ibirunga aho bahuriraga na imbogo zikabagirira nabi .
Abaturiye umugezi wa Sebeya bahawe ibigega 138 byo kugabanya amazi awisukamo .
Ubu butumwa babuhawe na ubuyobozi bwa Akarere ka Rubavu ubwo bwatangizaga igikorwa cyo guha ibigega ingo 120 zituriye umugezi wa Sebeya na amashuri 18 byitezweho kugabanya amazi ya imvura ava mu baturage akajya mu mugezi wa Sebeya .
Nyuma yo kubihabwa , abaturage batuye mu Murenge wa Nyundo , Akagari ka Mukondo , bavuze ko bizabafasha kubona amazi kuko na ubundi ntayo bagiraga .
Nyirabahutu Console yavuze ko kubona amazi bigoranye ashima ibigega bari guhabwa ko bifasha kugabanya amazi ajya mu mugezi wa Sebeya .
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Twebwe ubusanzwe nta mazi tugira , kuyabona ni ukujya ku mugezi wa isoko mu mubande kandi nabwo dukoresha isaha na igice .
Turasaba ubuyobozi ko bwadufasha kubona amazi , ndasaba ko nanjye nabona ikigega , ndi mu cyiciro cya mbere , nibabiduha bizadufasha gufata amazi ya imvura amanukana ubutaka . " " " "
Hakizimana Tharcisse yavuze ko kuba nta mazi bagiraga , bituma abana bakererwa amasomo bagiye kuvoma mu mibande , asaba ko na we yahabwa ikigega .
Ati " " " " Twe dusanzwe dukoresha amazi yo mu migezi iri mu mibande kandi kugerayo biragorana kuko bitwara isaha yose bigatuma abana bakererwa amasomo .
Ibi bigega bizatuma tuyabona hafi ndetse binakumire amazi yamanukaga akajyana isuri ijyana amazu , ahubwo ndasaba ko nanjye bakimpa wenda nkajya nishyura gahoro . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa Akarere ka Rubavu wungirije ushinzwe Imari na Iterambere rya Ubukungu , Nzabonimpa Déogratias , yashimiye abaturage kubera ubufatanye bugiye gutuma Sebeya iba umugezi winjiza amafaranga , abasaba gufata neza ibigega bahawe .
Ati " " " " Mu minsi iri mbere umugezi wa Sebeya uzajya usurwa winjize amadevize bitewe na ibikorwa bimaze gukorwa kandi mu gihe gishize yaradusenyeraga .
Mwakoze amaterasi kuri hegitari 365 ndakeka murimo kurya ibirayi na ibigori mwejeje . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Ibigega 120 bigiye guhabwa ingo na amashuri 18 muzabifate neza abana babone amazi meza , mujye mushyiramo imiti yabugenewe , abatabibona na bo bihangane aho ubushobozi buzabonekera buri wese azakibona . " " " "
Uretse ibigega , abaturage baturiye uyu mugezi bamaze guhabwa inka 285 muri 475 ziteganyijwe muri uyu mushinga wo kubungabunga icyogogo cya umugezi wa Sebeya .
Uyu mushinga wo kubungabunga imisozi na imicungire ikomatanyije ya umutungo kamere wa amazi muri Sebeya na ibindi byogogo ni uwa Leta ya u Rwanda , ukaba ukorera mu Turere twa Rubavu , Nyabihu , Rutsiro na Ngororero two mu Ntara ya Iburengerazuba .
Ushyirwa mu bikorwa na Ikigo gishinzwe Umutungo Kamere wa amazi mu Rwanda ku bufatanye na Ikigo Mpuzamahanga Kibungabunganga Ibidukikije , IUCN , Umuryango wa Abaholandi ushinzwe Iterambere , SNV , Umuryango Nyarwanda uharanira Iterambere rya Icyaro , RWARRI hamwe na Umuryango wa Abahinzi na Aborozi bo mu Rwanda IMBARAGA
ku nkunga ya Ambasade ya Abaholandi mu Rwanda .
Abaturiye Umugezi wa Sebeya bahawe ibigega byo gufata amazi .
Byakozwe mu gikorwa cyo guha ibigega ingo 120 zituriye Sebeya na amashuri 18 byitezweho kugabanya amazi ya imvura ava mu baturage .
Nyuma yo kubihabwa abaturage batuye mu Murenge wa Nyundo , Akagari ka Mukondo bavuze ko bizabafasha kubona amazi kuko na ubundi ntayo bagiraga .
Nyirabahutu Consolée yavuze ko bajyaga bagorwa no kubona amazi ku buryo ibigega bahawe bigiye kubafasha .
Ati " " " " Ubusanzwe nta mazi tugira , kuyabona ni ukujya ku mugezi wa isoko mu mubande kandi nabwo dukoresha isaha na igice .
Turasaba ubuyobozi ko bwadufasha kubona amazi , nibaduha ibigega bizadufasha gufata amazi ya imvura amanukana ubutaka . " " " " " " " "
Hakizimana Tharcisse yavuze ko kuba nta mazi bagiraga bituma abana bakererwa amasomo kuko babanza kujya kuvoma .
Ati " " " " Twe dusanzwe dukoresha amazi yo mu migezi iri mu mibande kandi kugerayo biragorana kuko bitwara isaha yose , bigatuma abana bakererwa amasomo .
Ibi bigega bizatuma tuyabona hafi ndetse binakumire amazi yamanukaga akajyana isuri ijyana inzu . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa Akarere ka Rubavu wungirije ushinzwe Imari na Iterambere rya Ubukungu , Nzabonimpa Déogratias , yasabye abaturage ubufatanye kugira ngo ibigega bahawe bitange umusaruro .
Ati " " " " Mu minsi iri mbere Umugezi wa Sebeya uzajya usurwa winjize amadevize bitewe na ibikorwa bimaze gukorwa kandi mu gihe gishize yaradusenyeraga .
Mwakoze amaterasi kuri hegitari 365 , ndakeka murimo kurya ibirayi na ibigori mwejeje .
Ibigega muzabifate neza abana babone amazi meza , mujye mushyiramo imiti yabugenewe abatabibona nabo bihangane aho ubushobozi buzabonekera buri wese azakibona . " " " "
Kwijandika mu busambanyi , imibereho mibi : Intandaro yo gutinda gushaka mu basore .
Uko imyaka igenda ishira niko ubuzima buhinduka ndetse na uburyo abantu babagaho bugahinduka .
Muri iyi myaka biragoye kubona umusore wubatse urugo ari munsi ya imyaka 25 , bibaho ariko si cyane nka mbere .
Ni ibisanzwe ko yarwubaka kuri iyi myaka ndetse hari na abarenza , ariko iyo umusore yagejeje mu myaka 40 abantu bavuga ko yatinze gushaka ndetse bamwe bakaba bamubaza ikibazo yagize kuko baba bumva bidasanzwe .
Muri raporo ya Ikigo cya Igihugu cya ibarurishamibare ( NISR ) , ivuga uburyo imibereho ya Abanyarwanda yari ihagaze mu 2020 , yagaragaje ko mu bantu 30 . 859 bashyingiwe byemewe na amategeko uwo mwaka , harimo abasore 3965 barengeje imyaka 40 .
Bamwe mu bakurikiranira hafi umuryango baganiriye na IGIHE , bavuze ko hari impamvu nyinshi zishobora gutuma umusore atinda gushaka .
Mukanzigiye Marie Goretti washinze Umuryango uharanira uburinganire , Ubwuzuzanye na Ubusugire bwa Umuryango mu Iterambere ( GEFAPRODO ) , yavuze ko akenshi usanga abasore batinda gushaka baba bafite ibibazo bitandukanye mu bijyanye na imibonano mpuzabitsina .
Yagize ati " " " " Birashoboka ko bagira ibibazo bijyanye na imibonano mpuzabitsina , aho babanza kwibana bakagira uko bifata mu buryo bwo kwifasha ku bijyanye na imibonano mpuzabitsina , kuko iyo umuntu agejeje igihe cyo gushaka umukunzi yakabaye abijyamo kuko bihita byikora . " " " "
" " " " Turebeye nko ku barokore usanga abahungu baho aribo bashaka mbere ndetse bakaba bashaka na abagore bakuze , bihita bigaragara ko kubera kwanga gukora ibyaha bahita bajya gushaka . " " " "
Kuba abasore baba baratangiye kuryamana na abakunzi babo batarabana byemewe na amategeko , Mukanzigiye abibona nka impamvu ishobora gutuma batinda gushaka .
Ati " " " " Usanga hari abajya mu busambanyi no gutendeka abagore benshi cyangwa se afite ukundi kuntu yirwanaho nko kwikinisha .
Hari no kuba abagabo basigaye babana na abandi , bakaba bafite ahandi barangiriza ibyo . " " " "
" " " " Akazajya gushaka yaratinze kubera abantu bari kumushyiraho igitutu , akajya gushaka ari nko gushaka aho gusazira . " " " "
Usibye ibi bibazo bijyanye na imibonano mpuzabitsina , Mukanzigiye asanga gutinda gushaka bishobora guturuka ku mateka u Rwanda rwanyuzemo .
Ati " " " " Hari abana baba ari impfubyi nta muryango afite , bikaba byatuma avuga ati ese ndashaka nshimishe nde ?
Ukabona ni wa muntu wibera mu nzoga na ibiyobyabwenge . " " " "
Yongeyeho ko kuba umuntu yakwisanga muri ibi bibazo atari ibintu byo guceceka ngo yumve ko ari ibisanzwe , ahubwo akwiye kwegera abajyanama ba indwara zo mu mutwe bakaba bamufasha .
Padiri Amerika Victor , umwanditsi wa ibitabo bigaruka ku muryango , yavuze ko kuri ubu abasore batinda gushaka bitewe na impamvu zitandukanye ariko zose zifite aho zihuriye na imibereho ikakaye abantu babayemo .
Ati " " " " Kera wasangaga umusore abyiruka icyerekezo kiri imbere ari ukubaka urugo , nta wajyaga mu mashuri ngo ajye gushaka imibereho , umwana yagera mu myaka 19 ababyeyi bakamukorera byose bakamushyingira . " " " "
" " " " Ubu rero ntabwo aricyo cyerekezo gihari ngo umwana agire iyo myaka ajye kubaka urugo , ahubwo ajya gushakisha amashuri , akazi na ibindi bigatuma ibyo gushaka atabyijyamo .
Kandi na ababyeyi ba ubu ntibagifashanya ngo babe bamwubakira . " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko indi mpamvu ikomeye ituma abasore batinda , ari ugutinya gufata inshingano .
Ati " " " " Hari ubwo umuntu agera mu myaka myinshi gushaka atabishoboye kubera kugira indwara yo gutinya gufata inshingano , akaba atabasha gutangira ikintu cyo kwiyemeza . " " " "
Ku ruhande rwa abasore nabo bavuga ko impamvu zishobora gutuma batinda gushaka , ari ubuzima bubasaba byinshi ndetse no kuba babona abashatse batarahiriwe nabyo .
Kamanzi Bosco yavuze ko ubushobozi na urukundo ruke aribyo bibyihishe inyuma .
Ati " " " " Bitewe na ubukungu bwifashe nabi muri ibi bihe , abasore bamwe bashobora gutinda bagira ngo babanze gukora ikofi . " " " "
" " " " Ikindi usanga nta rukundo ruhamye ruri mu bifuza kurushinga .
Bigaragarira muri za gatanya nyinshi ziriho muri ibi bihe kurenza mbere , bityo bigatuma batinda gufata umwanzuro . " " " "
Izi gatanya Kamanzi avuga ahanini zikomoka ku bibazo biri mu muryango nka ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina , gucana inyuma , imitungo na ibindi .
Ngo ibyo bitera abasore bamwe ubwoba , bakaba batinda cyangwa bakwanga gushaka kuko bakeka ko nabo ingo zabo zazamo ibibazo .
Uko agahinda ko kurwaza umwana katumye atangiza ikigo cyita ku bafite " " " " maladie rare . " " " "
Uyu mwana yagejejweyo basanga afite bumwe mu burwayi bwibasira abantu bake ku Isi ( maladie rare ) buzwi nka " " " " William syndrome , " " " " bisaba ko abagwa umutima inshuro ebyiri kugira ngo ubuzima bubashe kwicuma .
Uyu mwana wa umuhungu ibi yarabikuranye igihe kiragera cyo kujya ku ishuri ababyeyi bakora inshingano zabo zo kumugezayo , ariko kubera ingaruka za ubwo burwayi ntiyabashije gukurikira neza nka abandi bana .
Nyuma yo kubona ko ku ishuri ntacyo bamufasha , ababyeyi be bahisemo kumushakira umwarimu uzajya amwigisha ku buryo bwa umwihariko bujyanye na uburwayi bwe .
Ubu buryo bwaje gutanga umusaruro kuko yabashije kumenya gusoma no kwandika , kwikorera imirimo ya ibanze ndetse ubu akaba ageze ku rwego rwo guhabwa amasomo ku bumenyi ngiro nko kwiga mudasobwa , gusana ibintu , ubugeni na ibindi .
Iyi ntabwe ababyeyi be yarabashimishije bituma se yifuza gufasha abana barwaye izo ndwara kuba babona uburyo bitabwaho hakabasha kumenywa icyo umwana ashobora gukora .
Ubundi indwara zibasira abantu bake ziravukanwa zikaba zagufata mu buryo butandukanye , bituma uzirwaye ataba ameze nka abandi , akaba akeneye kwitabwaho mu buryo bwa umwihariko .
Hari ubwoko butandukanye bwazo burimo nka " " " " William syndrome , " " " " " " " " Achalasia , " " " " " " " " Trisomy 21 , " " " " " " " " Autism , " " " " na izindi nyinshi zifata mu buryo butandukanye .
Imibare ya Umuryango wa Abibumbye wita ku Buzima OMS , yagaragaje ko Ku Isi yose hari abantu miliyoni 300 barwaye izi ndwara .
Kuba izi ndwara zitamenyerewe bituma abazifite bahura na ibibazo bitandukanye birimo kubura ubuvuzi nyabwo , kutagira uburyo bwo kwitabwaho mu myigire yihariye no mu buzima busanzwe .
Abahanga mu bya ubuzima berekana ko nubwo abo bantu baba bafite ibibazo hari ibyo baba bashoboye bisaba ko bitabwaho byihariye , ariko mu Rwanda haracyari ikibazo cya uko abafite ubu burwayi badafashwa uko bikwiye kuko butamenyerewe .
Byamuteye inyota yo gufasha abandi
Manzi na umugore we Uwimbabazi , bari bamaze kwita ku mwana wabo bakabona hari icyo agezeho byatumye bagira inyota yo kuba bafasha na abandi bana barwaye izi ndwara ariko batabasha kwitabwaho nka uko bikwiye .
Mu kiganiro Manzi yagiranye na IGIHE yavuze ko yagerageje kujyana umwana we mu ishuri risanzwe gusa ku bwa imiterere ya ubuzima bwe byaragoranye kuko ritari rifite uburyo bwihariye bwo kumufasha .
Yagize ati " " " " Umwana wacu yahuye na ubu burwayi akiri muto agera igihe cyo kwiga yajya mu ishuri ntagendane na abandi uko bikwiye , biza kugeraho abandi bajya mu mashuri yisumbuye kandi we ntiyari kujyayo . " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko nyuma yo kubona ko umwana we atabasha kugendana na abandi yahisemo kumushakira umwarimu umwitaho , akaba yamufasha kumenya ibintu bya ibanze .
Ati " " " " Yajyaga mu ishuri nka abandi ariko ntabashe gukurikira neza ngo agendane nabo kubera ubwo burwayi .
Nyuma naje kumushakira umwarimu umwigisha muburyo bwumwihariko , biza gutanga umusaruro ko yamenye gusoma no kwandika na ubundi bumenyi bwa ibanze . " " " "
Nyuma yo kubona umwana ufite uburwayi bwibasira abantu bake ku Isi ashobora kwitabwaho bya umwihariko akagira aho agera byatumye agira igitekerezo cyo gushinga Ikigo , Centre Alliance , kizajya gifasha abana bafite ubu burwayi .
Manzi yavuze ko bashinze ikigo mu rwego rwo gufasha abana bafite uburwayi bwibasira abantu bake ku Isi kugira ubumenyi no gufasha imiryango ifite aba bana .
Yagize ati " " " " Iki kigo nagifunguye ngo kijye gifasha abana kugira ubumenyi bwa ibanze burimo gusoma no kwandika ndetse no kumenya kwikorera imirimo ya ibanze , ikindi kizajya gifasha abana ni ukubegereza abandi kugira ngo babashe kwisanga muri sosiyete . " " " "
" " " " Ikindi kizafasha ni ukuganiriza ababyeyi mu kubafasha kwiyakira kuko hari abatabyumva ko umwana yahura na ibibazo kandi hazajya hanatangwa inyigisho zitandukanye ku bijyanye na uburwayi bwibasira abantu bake ku Isi bizajya bibafasha kwita ku babana babo . " " " "
Yakomeje asaba ababyeyi bafite aba bana ko bakwihutira kubageza muri iki kigo kugira ngo bakurikiranwe bizabafashe kwisanga muri sosiyete .
Ati " " " " Hari ababyeyi babona umwana afite uburwayi bwibasira abantu bake ku isi ( maladie rare ) bakamuhisha mu nzu bavuga ko ntacyo azamara , nyamara hari icyo ashoboye .
Igikenewe ni ukumwitaho ukakimuvumburamo . " " " "
Isi na u Rwanda byijihije Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe kwita ku Ndwara zidasanzwe uba buri wa 28 Gashyantare .
U Rwanda rwawizihije ku nshuro ya kabiri mu nsanganyamatsiko igira iti " " " " Njyenyine ntacyo nageraho ariko twese twabishobora . " " " "
Ibya ingenzi utamenye ku mibonano mpuzabitsina
Nta bisobanuro byimbitse bikenewe kuri iyo ngingo kuko usibye no kuba ari isoko ya umunezero no kororoka kwa muntu , bimwongerera imbaraga zo kuyobora Isi na ibiyirimo , kandi gutera akabariro bigira akamaro kanini ku buzima na imibereho ya nyira ukubikora .
Icyakora nubwo buri wese umubajije yakubwira ko ibijyanye na icyo gikorwa abizi , umunsi ku munsi havumburwa amakuru mashya ajyanye nacyo ndetse ateye amatsiko cyane .
Uwavuga ko amakuru mashya kuri byo atazanigera abura ntiyaba agiye kure ya ukuri kuko buri wese ahora yifuza kurushaho kubisobanukirwa , bigatuma abashakashatsi bagerageza kugaragaza amakuru yimbitse kuri byo .
Nka ubu Greatist iherutse gukusanya ingingo zigera kuri 25 zavuzweho mu nyigo zakozwe mu bihe bitandukanye , zibumbatiye amakuru yihariye ajyanye na imibonano mpuzabitsina .
Icya mbere abashakashatsi berekanye ni uko abageze mu kigero cya imyaka 20 ari bo bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina kenshi cyane , aho bageza nibura ku nshuro 80 ku mwaka .
Ni umubare ugabanyuka cyane iyo bageze mu myaka ya ubusaza kuko bo bayikora inshuro 20 ku mwaka .
Hagaragajwe ko abantu benshi baryoherwa na icyo gikorwa iyo kibaye mu gihe kiri hagati ya iminota irindwi na 13 , ndetse ni na cyo gihe abenshi bifuza ko cyamara .
Abahanga muri ibyo kandi bagaragaje ko imibonano mpuzabitsina cyane cyane ikozwe mu gitondo igira uruhare runini mu kuba umubiri wabyaza ingufu ibyo wariye .
Ibyo ariko ntibikwiye gutuma hari abayisimbuza gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri isanzwe .
Icya kane benshi batamenye , ni uko 70 % bya abagabo bakunda kureba amashusho ya urukozasoni biherereye cyangwa bari bonyine .
Ni mu gihe abagore benshi baba bashaka gufashwa na undi muntu kugera ku munezero wa nyuma , 33 % byabo gusa akaba ari bo bareba amashusho ya urukozasoni .
Na none kandi hari abo usanga bajya kure ya icyo gikorwa bagiye imugongo , kandi ubushakashatsi bwaragaragaje ko muri ibyo bihe imibonano mpuzabitsina igira imimaro itandukanye irimo gutuma umugore ataribwa cyane , gutuma igihe amara imugongo kiba kigufi , kongerera ubushake na ibindi .
Buri wese agira urugero rwe rwa ubushake ntawe unganya na undi !
Muri rusange inyigo zagaragaje ko nta rugero runaka rwa ubushake umuntu muzima yakabaye afite , ahubwo buri wese agira urugero rwe rushobora kwiyongera cyangwa rukagabanyuka bitewe na impamvu .
Izo mpamvu zirimo ahanini imisemburo , imyaka ya umuntu , ubuzima bwo mu mutwe na imibereho ye na ibindi .
Nyuma ya inyigo za inzobere , byagaragaye ko mu mibereho ya muntu nta kindi kintu gishobora kumuha umunezero udasanzwe kurusha uwo agira iyo aryohewe na imibonano mpuzabitsina .
Hasobanuwe ko uko imyaka ya umuntu igenda yiyongera [ agana mu busaza ] ari ko na ubushake bwo gutera akabariro bugenda bukendera .
Abagore ni bo babutakaza mbere cyane ugereranyije na abagabo .
Hari ibintu byinshi bishobora gutuma umuntu atagira ubushake bwo kwinjira mu gikorwa , uhereye ku misemburo ya umubiri , imiti runaka ari gufata muri iyo minsi na ibindi .
Niba uwo mujyana mu gikorwa ubona abikora bitamuvuye ku mutima , banza ugenzure ikibyihishe inyuma nibiba ngombwa mugane muganga wabihuguriwe .
Niba waragiraga ubushake bwo gutera akabariro ukaba utakibugira nta rirarenga wabusubirana !
Byagaragajwe ko gukora siporo , kurya indyo yuzuye ndetse ugasinzira bihagije biri mu bifasha gusubirana ubukaka bwo mu gitanda .
Bitandukanye na umuco wa abantu runaka utuma baterwa ipfunwe no kwikinisha , ubushakashatsi bugaragaza ko bituma umuntu asobanukirwa uko yitwara mu gihe cyo gutera akabariro , ashingiye ku kunyurwa abigiriyemo na uko agira iyo abikoranye na undi muntu .
Si ako kamaro konyine kuko ubushakashatsi bwanemeje ko kwikinisha byongera icyizere umuntu yigirira kuko bituma arushaho kwibona mu isura nziza .
Abarenga kimwe cya kabiri cya abantu 3 . 000 bakoreweho inyigo mu Bwongereza bo bagaragaje ko imibonano mpuzabitsina yongera ingufu za umubano no gushyikirana hagati ya abayikoranye .
Ngo uwariye ni we urya !
Wasomye byinshi byagutunguye ariko icyatangaje na abashakashatsi bakivumbuye ni uko iyo umuntu akoze imibonano mpuzabitsina ari bwo arushaho kumva ayishaka , bikaba intandaro yo kumva agomba kuyikora kenshi .
Birashoboka cyane ko utigeze umenya ko gutera akabariro mbere yo gusinzira byatuma urara aharyana nka uko benshi babyifurizanya .
Inyigo yakozwe mu 2019 yerekanye ko abenshi mu bakora icyo gikorwa mbere yo gusinzira bituma babona ibitotsi vuba kandi bagasinzira neza .
Ibikoresho bizwi nka Sex toys hari ababihaye isura mbi ariko inyigo zitandukanye zagaragaje ko byongerera umuntu amarangamutima , ibyiyumvo bikarushaho kuzamuka mbere yo kujya mu gikorwa nyirizina .
Ku bagore , hagaragajwe ko gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina bizagufasha kugira amatariki yo kujya mu mihango adahindagurika .
Inzobere muri icyo gikorwa zisobanura kandi ko kuba umuntu yakora utuntu twa imyitozo ngororamubiri mbere yo kucyinjiramo bimwongerera imbaraga akagikorana umurava na ingufu ku buryo bigenda neza kurushaho .
Uretse gutanga umunezero wa imbonekarimwe , imibonano mpuzabitsina ifasha umubiri kurema abasirikari bawufasha guhashya indwara zimwe na zimwe zirimo ubukonje na ibicurane .
Ingingo ya 20 yerekanywe ni uko imiterere ya umubiri wa umuntu [ ibigaragara inyuma ] nayo igira uruhare rukomeye mu migendekere myiza ya igikorwa .
Ugaragara ko afite imbaraga , ukora imyitozo ngororamubiri na ufite umubyibuho uri mu rugero bazabyitwaramo neza ugereranyije na abatameze batyo .
Hasobanuwe kandi ko umuntu udakora imibonano mpuzabitsina nta bumenyi aba ayifiteho , ibintu abashakashatsi bashingiyeho bemeza ko uko umuntu abikora kenshi ari na ko abigiraho ubumenyi bwimbitse .
Ni mu gihe inyigo yakozwe muri Gicurasi 2020 yo yahamije ko iyo waryohewe na icyo gikorwa mu ijoro , akazi ukoze mu gitondo ukanoza .
Ibyo biniyongeraho kuba kubyitwaramo neza ukagera ku byishimo bya nyuma bigabanya intekerezo nyinshi mu mutwe , bigatuma ubwonko buruhuka bugakora neza kurushaho .
Ku rundi ruhande ariko si byiza kwinjira muri icyo gikorwa ugamije kugabanya umunaniro mu ntekerezo .
Hagaragazwa ko kubijyamo ubishyizeho umutima ari byo bituma urushaho kuryoherwa nabyo .
Ingingo ya 25 ari nayo ya nyuma , ni uko imigendendekere ya igikorwa ijyana na ubuzima bwo mu mutwe .
Ibyo bivuze ko ufite ihungabana na agahinda gakabije atazashimishwa na icyo gikorwa , mu gihe ufite akanyamuneza azagira umunezero udasanzwe .
Abantu benshi bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina bagamije kugera ku munezero , ariko hari izindi nyungu nyinshi bigira ku mubiri na ubuzima za umwihariko .
Ni igikorwa kigomba kwitonderwa kandi kikitabwaho kugira ngo kigende neza .
Ibikubiye muri iyi nkuru byakuwe mu bushakashatsi butandukanye bwahurijwe mu nkuru yashyizwe ku rubuga rwa Greatist ku wa 9 Nzeri 2020 .

Kapiteni wa Police FC yasabye Issa Leila kuzamubera umugore na we arabimwemerera , amwambika impeta .

Nyuma ya amasaha make ateye ivi , Jacques Tuyisenge yasezeranye mu mategeko
Rutahizamu wa APR FC akaba na Kapiteni wa Ikipe ya Igihugu Amavubi , Jacques Tuyisenge , yasezeranye imbere ya amategeko na umukunzi we Musiime Recheal Jordin nyuma ya amasaha make ateye ivi amusaba ko bazabana akaramata .
Jacques Tuyisenge na umukunzi we basezeranye imbere ya amategeko mu Murenge wa Kimihurura ku wa Kane , tariki ya 18 Gashyantare 2021 .
Ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 19 Gashyantare ni bwo ku mbuga nkoranyambaga hasakaye amafoto ya Tuyisenge na Jordin barahirira ku ibendera rya igihugu , bemera kubana nka umugabo na umugore .
IGIHE yamenye ko umukunzi wa Tuyisenge ari Umunyarwanda uba muri Uganda , ahari umuryango we mugari .
Hari na andi makuru avuga ko Tuyisenge na umugore we bari bamaze iminsi babana mu nzu .
Tuyisenge Jacques ufite imyaka 29 , yanyuze mu makipe atandukanye mu Rwanda no muri Afurika , arimo Kiyovu Sports yavuye mo yerekeza muri Police FC .
Yagiriyemo amahirwe yo kwerekeza muri Gormarhia yo muri Kenya ayigiriramo ibihe byiza .
Yavuye muri Kenya yerekeza muri Angola mu ikipe ya Petro - Atletic de Luanda yavuyemo asubira mu Rwanda asinyira ikipe ya Ingabo za Igihugu APR FC muri Mata 2020 amasezerano azageza mu mwaka 2022 .
Zimwe mu ngeso zishobora kwangiza umubano wa abakundana .
IGIHE yifashishije imbuga zitandukanye yateguye zimwe mu ngeso zishobora gutuma umubano wa abakundana wangirika niyo haba hari byinshi ukora byiza , ariko waba ufite zimwe mu ngeso zibangamira mugenzi wawe bikaba byatuma umubano ujyamo agatotsi .
Kunywa itabi ni imwe mu ngeso itihanganirwa na benshi kuko usanga rifite umuhumuro batishimira .
Hari ubwo umukunzi wawe aguhisha ko anywa itabi nyamara iyo mumaze kubana biragorana kubihisha ku buryo bishobora gutuma uwo muri kumwe atabyihanganira akaba yakureka .
Hari abantu bagira ingeso yo kuterekana amarangamutima yabo , ku buryo utamenya niba yishimye cyangwa ababaye .
Kuri we aba yumva ari byiza ariko ku wo babana ntibimushimisha kuko hari igihe agukorera ibintu byiza ntugaragaze ko ubyishimiye akaba yagufata nka umuntu utanyurwa bikabatandukanya .
Hari abantu batiyitaho haba ku bigaragara inyuma cyangwa imbere aho usanga umuntu afata amafunguro uko abonye ndetse akambara na ibyo abonye , ukaba agaragara nka umuntu utari kuri gahunda .
Kuba utiyitaho bishobora kwangiza umubano wawe kuko niba utiyitaho ubwawe biragora kuba wakwita kuri mugenzi wawe .
Iyo ubigize umuco bishobora kwangiza umubano wanyu .
Ubunebwe bushobora kuba ari nayo ntandaro yo kutiyitaho kuko usanga umuntu utiyitaho aba yabitewe no kugira ubute bwo kugira icyo yikorera , ibi bigatuma utagira byinshi ugeraho .
Biragoye kubona umuntu wa umunebwe atera imbere kuko ibyo yakabaye akora bimuteza imbere ahora abyimura bigatuma ahora genda biguru ntege .
Ibi bishobora kwangiza umubano wawe kuko nta wishimira kubana na umuntu udatera imbere .
Inzoga nyinshi ntabwo ari nziza kuko zishobora gutera ibibazo bya ubuzima nka uburwayi budakira ndetse na ubukene kuko ziba zigutwara ubushobozi bwinshi .
Iyo uwo mubana atabasha kubyihanganira na byo biri mu bishobora kwangiza umubano wanyu .
Guhora uri mu kazi igihe cyose ugakora amasaha menshi ha handi ni yo uvuye mu kazi ugera mu rugo ukongera ugakora bishobora kwangiza umubano wawe .
Icyo gihe iyo uhora mu kazi ntubona umwanya wo kugira ibindi utunganya mu rugo na uwo kwita ku mukunzi wawe bikaba byagutandukanya na we .
Kubeshya ni ingeso mbi cyane idashobora kwihanganirwa mu rukundo kuko iyo ubeshya umukunzi wawe agutakariza icyizere kandi urukundo rutarimo icyizere ruba rwamaze gusenyuka .
Niba ugira imwe muri izi ngeso ukwiye kuyireka kuko ibangamiye umukunzi wawe na ukomeza kuyikuza bishobora kuzababera intandaro yo gutandukana .
Zimwe mu ngeso zishobora kwangiza umubano wa abakundana .
IGIHE yifashishije imbuga zitandukanye yateguye zimwe mu ngeso zishobora gutuma umubano wa abakundana wangirika niyo haba hari byinshi ukora byiza , ariko waba ufite zimwe mu ngeso zibangamira mugenzi wawe bikaba byatuma umubano ujyamo agatotsi .
Kunywa itabi ni imwe mu ngeso itihanganirwa na benshi kuko usanga rifite umuhumuro batishimira .
Hari ubwo umukunzi wawe aguhisha ko anywa itabi nyamara iyo mumaze kubana biragorana kubihisha ku buryo bishobora gutuma uwo muri kumwe atabyihanganira akaba yakureka .
Hari abantu bagira ingeso yo kuterekana amarangamutima yabo , ku buryo utamenya niba yishimye cyangwa ababaye .
Kuri we aba yumva ari byiza ariko ku wo babana ntibimushimisha kuko hari igihe agukorera ibintu byiza ntugaragaze ko ubyishimiye akaba yagufata nka umuntu utanyurwa bikabatandukanya .
Hari abantu batiyitaho haba ku bigaragara inyuma cyangwa imbere aho usanga umuntu afata amafunguro uko abonye ndetse akambara na ibyo abonye , ukaba agaragara nka umuntu utari kuri gahunda .
Kuba utiyitaho bishobora kwangiza umubano wawe kuko niba utiyitaho ubwawe biragora kuba wakwita kuri mugenzi wawe .
Iyo ubigize umuco bishobora kwangiza umubano wanyu .
Kubeshya ni ingeso mbi cyane idashobora kwihanganirwa mu rukundo kuko iyo ubeshya umukunzi wawe agutakariza icyizere kandi urukundo rutarimo icyizere ruba rwamaze gusenyuka .
Niba ugira imwe muri izi ngeso ukwiye kuyireka kuko ibangamiye umukunzi wawe na ukomeza kuyikuza bishobora kuzababera intandaro yo gutandukana .
Impamvu zituma umuntu yumva ubushake bwo gutera akabariro bwiyongereye kurushaho .
Umuntu ni inyamaswa yihariye ifite ububasha bwo gutegeka Isi , ibimuha amahirwe yo kugenzura no kunonosora ikimubaho cyose ndetse akaba yamenya impamvu kiba , uburyo kibamo na ingaruka cyamugiraho .
Birumvikana ko nka igikorwa kimugeza ku kuryoherwa na ubuzima , ntasiba gusesengura ibijyanye na imibonano mpuzabitsina .
Muri rusange kugira ubushake bwo gutera akabariro ni ikintu cyishimirwa ku rwego rwo hejuru , bikanaba ikimenyetso gikomeye ko uri muzima bihagije .
Icyakora iyo ubushake bwabyo bubaye bwinshi cyane birabangama , ndetse bigahindurirwa inyito ntibyitwe ubushake ahubwo bikitwa irari .
Ubusanzwe irari si ryiza kuko ritera nyiraryo kwifuza ibyo atagenewe no kutanyurwa na ibyo yemerewe ndetse bikaba byamugaragaza nabi mu bandi bikamwambuza icyubahiro .
Kurarikira imibonano mpuzabitsina , kuri bamwe bishobora kubashimisha ariko hariho na abo bibangamira kuko byagutesha na amahirwe amwe na amwe arimo no kukwirukanisha ku kazi , bishobora gutuma uhatiriza undi muntu kujya muri icyo gikorwa atabishaka , cyangwa bikagukoresha ibyaha birimo no gusambanya abana .
Abashakashatsi batandukanye berekana ko kwiyongera ka ubushake bwo gutera akabariro [ bitari irari ] kurusha uko umuntu yari asanzwe yiyumva , " " " " si uburwayi kandi si na igikuba . " " " "
Umuhanga mu bya Imibonano Mpuzabitsina ukora mu iduka rya ibicuruzwa bigenewe abifuza kongera ibirungo mu bijyanye na icyo gikorwa riri i Calfornia , Dr Jill McDevitt , kuri iyo ngingo yagize ati " " " " Ni ibisanzwe rwose kuba ubushake bwo gutera akabariro bwakwiyongera kurusha uko bisanzwe , ndetse bikaba byanamara iminsi ,
ibyumweru , amezi cyangwa imyaka . " " " "
Dr Jess Oa Reilly ufite Impamyabumenyi ya Ikirenga ( PhD ) mu bya Imibonano mpuzabitsina unamenyerewe mu biganiro bitandukanye bigaruka ku ngingo nka izo , we yavuze ko " " " " Kwifuza gutera akabariro kurusha uko usanzwe wiyumva ntibyahita bihabwa inyito ya uko ufite ikibazo . " " " "
Bikugira umuntu .
Kuvuga ko ubushake bwo kujya muri icyo gikorwa bwiyongereye , ntibisobanuye ko hari igipimo runaka cya ubushake busanzwe abantu bagakwiye kuba bafite .
Ahubwo umuntu ku giti cye ni we wiyumva uko mu bihe runaka ameze agereranyije na uko yajyaga yiyumva mu bihe bitandukanye .
Hagaragazwa ko imyaka umuntu agezemo , uko yitwara ku bandi na abo bakunze kuba bari kumwe , igihe afata cyo gusinzira , imirire ye na uko akora imyitozo ngororamubiri bigira uruhare mu kuba yarushaho gushaka gutera akabariro .
Byumvikane neza ko umuntu ukora imyitozo ngororamubiri kenshi cyangwa ufite umubyibuho udakabije azagira ubushake bwo kujya mu gikorwa kurusha wa wundi utayikora .
Abari mu kigero cya ubwangavu na ubugimbi na bo bagira ubushake kurusha abarenze icyo kigero , naho abageze mu myaka ya 60 bakagenda barushaho kumva batabishaka .
Hari kandi uburyo umuntu apangamo gahunda ze , ibihe arimo na ubuzima bwo mu mutwe , uko imisemburo ya umubiri iri gukora , ubuvuzi cyangwa imiti yafataga akaba yayiretse , ndetse na uko ateye bigaragarira inyuma .
Nta bimenyetso bigaragarira amaso byerekana ko ubushake bwiyongereye , ahubwo kugira ngo ubimenye ushobora kugereranya ubushake ufite na ubwo wari ufite igihe nka icyo mu mwaka ushize , uko uri kubirarikira na uko wari usanzwe ubitekereza , ndetse ukagenzura hagati yawe na uwo mujyana mu gikorwa ubishaka cyane .
Ibyo nubigenzura ni byo byonyine bizagufasha kumenya niba urugero rwa ubushake bwawe bwo gutera akabariro rwazamutse .
Ibishobora kukongerera ubushake bwo gutera akabariro
Nubwo atari ihame ko ari byo byatuma abantu bose bagira ubushake bwo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina kurusha uko basanzwe biyumva , hari ibyo abashakashatsi bahurizaho bikunze kuba impamvu kuri benshi .
McDevitt avuga ko icya mbere ari ukuba nta ntekerezo nyinshi umuntu afite mu mutwe we , mbese nta bimuhangayikishije .
Ati " " " " Iyo uri mu bihe bitagusaba gutekereza bihambaye , ubushake bwo gutera akabariro buziyongera . " " " "
Iyo ngo ni yo mpamvu abantu bagira akazi kenshi baryoherwa cyane na icyo gikorwa ari uko bari mu karuhuko ( Vacation sex ) .
Umujyanama mu bijyanye na uburyo buboneye bwo kwinjira muri icyo gikorwa , Eric M . Garrison , avuga ko ubuzima bwo mu mutwe na bwo bugira uruhare mu kuba ubushake bwakwiyongera cyangwa bukagabanuka .
Yagize ati " " " " Kuba uwo mubana ataguha ubwisanzure byatuma utagira ubushake cyane bwo gukorana nawe icyo gikorwa . " " " "
Bisobanuye ko mu gihe uwo mubana cyangwa mugiye kwinjirana mu gikorwa akugusha neza bizatuma wumva ubishaka cyane .
Ku rundi ruhande ariko umuntu ashobora no kuba afite ibindi bibazo birimo agahinda gakabije na ihungabana , bikagira ingaruka ku buzima bwe bwo mu mutwe bityo ntabe yagira ubushake .
Hatangwa inama ko mu gihe uwo mubana atagira ubushake bwo kwinjira muri icyo gikorwa , mwakwegera muganga wabihuguriwe mukabimuganiriza akabibafashamo .
Dr McDevitt agaragaza kandi ko imikorere ya imisemburo ya umubiri wa umuntu mu bihe bitandukanye yatuma ubushake bwo gutera akabariro bwiyongera ; kuko ituma imyanya ya ibanga ikura neza bityo umubiri ukarushaho gukenera imibonano mpuzabitsina .
Imyitozo ngororamubiri ikorwa kenshi nayo Dr Oa Reilly asobanura ko kuri bamwe iba impamvu yo kongera ubushake , biturutse ku kuba yongerera umuntu icyizere , ikagabanya umunaniro mu ntekerezo ndetse igatuma uwayikoze asinzira neza .
Ubushakashatsi bunerekana ko guhagarika ifatwa rya imiti imwe na imwe bigira uruhare mu kongera ubushake bwo gutera akabariro .
Nka urugero mu 2015 , Pubmed yagaragaje ko imiti ivura agahinda gakabije na ihungabana igabanyiriza uyifata ubushake bwo kwinjira muri icyo gikorwa .
Imwe mu miti ivura indwara za umutima na ikoreshwa mu kuboneza urubyaro , na yo ubushakashatsi bugaragaza ko ishobora gutuma ubushake bugabanuka .
Mu gihe uwafataga imwe muri iyo miti yaba ayihagaritse rero , Garrison yemeza ko byatuma yiyumvamo icyo gikorwa kurushaho .
Hagaragazwa kandi ko ibihe umuntu arimo bishobora gutuma ubushake bwiyongera cyane cyane ku bagore .
Ibyo bigaragarira ku kuba hari igihe bagaragaza umushiha batanakeneye ku bijyamo mu gihe runaka , ubundi ukabona babikeneye cyane .
Abashakashatsi basobanura ko biterwa na imisemburo yabo , kandi ko ubushake bwabo bushobora kwiyongera mbere , nyuma cyangwa mu gihe cya imihango .
Ikigero cya imyaka umuntu agezemo na cyo gishobora gutuma ubushake bwiyongera cyangwa bukagabanuka .
Uvuye mu bwana ageze mu bugimbi cyangwa ubwangavu agira impinduka zidasanzwe zirimo no kongera ubushake cyane , iyo amaze kurenga imyaka 20 , uko agenda akura ni ko ubushake bugabanuka .
Ni ryari ukwiyongera ka ubushake bwo gutera akabariro biba ikibazo ?
Nka uko byagaragajwe haruguru , muri rusange kugira ubushake bwo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina birishimirwa ndetse ni ikimenyetso cya uko umuntu ari muzima .
Ku rundi ruhande ariko Garrison avuga ko " " " " Kwiyongera ka ubushake bwo gutera akabariro bizaba ikibazo igihe wowe ubwawe uziyumvamo ko ari ikibazo , cyangwa igihe bigutera kugira imyitwarire ibangamira izindi ngeri za ubuzima bwawe . " " " "
Urugero nka iyo bikubangamira mu kazi ukora , bituma uca inyuma uwo mwashakanye cyangwa uwo muri mu rukundo , bituma utakariza amafaranga mu kugura ibikoresho bigufasha kwikinisha , cyangwa bikagutera indi myitwarire iteye inkeke .
Igihe ingaruka nka izo zikugezeho , ni byiza ko wegera muganga wabihuguriwe akaba yagufasha gusubira ku murongo .
Ushobora kandi guhindura umuvuno cyane cyane ku bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina mu buryo bwo kugabanya intekerezo nyinshi bafite , ukaba washaka ubundi buryo ukoresha bubigufashamo .
Ikindi gishobora kugufasha gusubira ku murongo mu gihe ubushake bwo gutera akabariro bwiyongereye cyane , ni ukudahatira uwo mugiye gukorana igikorwa , ahubwo ukabanza kubimuganiriza ndetse igihe akubwiye ko atabishaka ukitoza kwakira igisubizo uhawe .
Ubuhamya bwa Uguyeneza warwaye agahinda gakabije akajya ahabwa inkwenene na bamwe mu nshuti ze .
Bamwe barwara agahinda gakabije " " " " Depression " " " " ntibabimenye cyangwa se bakabimenya batinze kuko atari ibintu wahita wiyumvamo cyangwa se ubimenye ako kanya kuko uba wumva ari ubuzima wabayemo cyangwa ubayemo bwatumye umera gutyo !
Ariko , siko biri ahubwo ni indwara nka izindi kandi iravurwa igakira .
Ibiranga ufite ubu burwayi ndetse na ubundi bujya gusa nkabwo harimo ukugaragaza impinduka mu myitwarire , imyifatire , imitekerereze bikaba byanagira ingaruka mu bikorwa umuntu yakoraga mu buzima busanzwe cyangwa mu busabane yagiranaga na abandi .
Umuganga wa Inzobere mu kuvura indwara zo mu Mutwe , Kanyandekwe Dr Simon , yigeze kubwira IGIHE ko izi ndwara ziterwa na uruhererekane rwa impamvu nyinshi .
Ati " " " " Ziterwa na uburyo ubwonko bwa umuntu bwaremwe [ nta budahangarwa ] , akenshi usanga bavuga ko umuntu ashobora kurwara kurusha abandi .
Uko umuntu yabayeho mu muryango akomokamo cyangwa aho yakuriye , ibibazo yahuye nabyo akiri umwana [ nka ihungabanga ] na imibereho ya umuntu aho asanzwe aba byaba mu muryango cyangwa na ahandi . " " " "
Uguyeneza Alliah ni umwe mu bagize uburwayi bwa " " " " Depression " " " " ndetse abubana igihe kinini biturutse ku kuba yarakuze adafite se ndetse nta rukundo rwa ababyeyi babiri yigeze yerekwa .
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na 1K Studio , uyu mukobwa wiga Amategeko muri kaminuza yagaragaje uko yagize ubu burwayi na uko yabukize .
Uguyeneza yavukiye mu muryango wa abana batatu ni imfura ariko ntabwo yigeze agira amahirwe yo kubana na se .
Ati " " " " Nabuze papa nkiri muto , ntabwo nigeze ngira ayo mahirwe ya uko hari umuntu wabiganiriza , ni ibintu byasabye uko ngenda nkura mbona ko hari ikibura ko nabuze umubyeyi . " " " "
Akomeza avuga ko bitajyaga bimutera ikibazo akiri umwana , ariko uko yagiye akura bikaba byaragiye nabyo bikura kugera aho bimubanye byinshi cyane akajya yigunga .
Ati " " " " Ntabwo byajyaga bintera ikibazo cyangwa se ngo mbyiteho mbere ariko iyo uri umwana urakura ugatangira kubona ibintu runaka .
Gusa uko nagiye nkura najyaga ku ishuri abandi bana bakambaza ngo twirirwa tukubona mama wawe akuzana , Papa wawe arihe ?
Ntabwo nigeze ngira imbaraga zo kubwira bagenzi banjye ko data yapfuye .
Narababwiraga nti muzamubona . " " " "
Yemeza ko ibi bintu iyo aba yarabivuzeho bitari kumugendekera uko byagenze ahubwo byari kuba byiza mu buzima bwe akanabyakira ariko akavuga ko byamwangije cyane akiri muto .
Uyu mukobwa avuga ko yarwaye ihungabana ari mu mashuri yisumbuye yaba ari kumwe na bagenzi be we akaba ari kwitekerereza ibindi ku ruhando bitandukanye ni byo barimo .
Ati " " " " Narwaye ihungabana ndi mu mashuri yisumbuye naba ndi kumwe na bagenzi banjye nkitekerereza ibindi bitandukanye na ibyo bari kuvuga , nkisanga ndi njyenyine .
Agahinda gakabije kwirirwa urira .
Ukumva ko agahinda kawe karuta aka abandi .
Kandi iyo urwaye agahinda uba wumva abandi bari mu Isi bari mu munezero . " " " "
Akomeza avuga ko abantu batangiye kujya bavuga ko adakunda kuvuga kandi ari ukubera agahinda ariko batazi ko ari ko .
Yarabyukaga buri munsi akumva adashaka guhura na abantu ahubwo ashaka kubaho wenyine kandi nabwo akirirwa .
Ati " " " " Naje kubimenya bitewe na uko nabonaga abandi .
Hari ukuntu abandi bagira agahinda cyangwa amarangamutima ariko bikarangira .
Ariko njye amarangamutima yarivangaga cyane ukabona umunota umwe urishimye ariko utishimye mu bya ukuri ahubwo ari ukugira ngo wiyibagize ibyo uri gucamo . " " " "
Avuga ko agahinda ke katangiye gukura ubwo yari ageze mu mashuri yisumbuye kuko akiri umwana nabwo yari agafite ariko katarakura cyane nka uko byaje kugenda nyuma .
Ati " " " " Agahinda kanjye katangiye gukura cyane ngeze mu mwaka wa mbere wa amashuri yisumbuye .
Ahantu nigaga kwiyandikisha wasangaga ababyeyi bose bazanye umwana nkihagera muri uko kwiyandikisha ninjye njyenyine wari uri kumwe na umubyeyi umwe .
Abantu bakajya bambaza ngo twabonye mama wawe turashaka kubona na papa wawe ariko batazi ko ari ibintu binkora ku mutima . " " " "
Avuga ko akiri umwana yarakazwaga na ibintu bito , ibi nabyo bikaba ari ibintu yaje kumenya ko byari kimwe mu bimenyetso bya ubu burwayi .
Ngo yagiye kwiga mu mashuri yisumbuye biba ibindi bibazo kubera ko yaganirizwaga na abandi bamubaza ikibazo yaza kugitekerezaho nyuma akarira .
Yatangiye kwiyumvamo ubu burwayi inshuti ye ya mbere abibwiye imugira umusazi biramubabaza cyane , ariko ntiyacika intege abibwira undi mugenzi we .
Ati " " " " Hari inshuti yanjye natangiye mbibwira aba arasetse .
Arambwira ngo niba urwaye agahinda urumva twebwe turwaye iki ?
Icyo gihe byarambabaje cyane .
Nyuma nabwiye indi nshuti yanjye ko nshobora kuba ndwaye agahinda .
Yampuje na umuvandimwe we wari inzobere mu kugira inama abantu barwaye agahinda aramfasha , nyuma nza gukira .
Numvaga atari ibintu nkeneye nanjye nabyiganiriza ariko iyo ufite umuntu ubwira biba byiza . " " " "
Arakomeza ati " " " " Maze kugirwa inama ni bwo narebye ku bintu nanyuzemo nkumirwa .
Nkirangiza icyo gihe cya agahinda kababaje naratekerezaga nti iyo ngira umuntu wanganirije nkiri muto ntabwo byari kugenda gutya . " " " "
Agira inama abantu barwaye agahinda kujya batobora bakabivuga kuko biba byiza kandi bikabafasha guhita bakira mu buryo bworoshye .
Uguyeneza Alliah afite imyaka 19 .
Yari mu bakobwa 11 bahataniye ikamba rya Miss Supranational uyu mwaka ariko yatangajwe muri batatu batabashije gukomeza mu kindi cyiciro .
Gukura ibyinyo , kururu kururu na aba - diaspora : Amafaranga ari kumunga inkundo za ubu .
Kuva mu myaka ya kera uyu mubano wahozeho kuko niwo uganisha ku kubaka urugo , ugakomeza kugenda neza cyangwa nabi bitewe na amahitamo yaba nyiri urugo .
Muri iki gihe cya urukundo rwa umusore na inkumi , usanga buri wese akora iyo bwabaga ngo hatagira agatotsi kaza mu mubano wabo .
Aha niho usanga basurana , basohokana ndetse inshuro nyinshi bagahana impano zitandukanye .
Nubwo buri wese akora iyo bwabaga ngo barusheho kunezerwa mu mubano wabo , hari bamwe mu basore bashinja inkumi gukunda ibyo batunze kurusha kubakunda bo ubwabo ndetse inkumi nazo rimwe na rimwe zikagaragaza ko hari abasore badukanye iyi ngeso itari ibamenyereweho .
Bamwe mu basore baganiriye na IGIHE , bavuze ko ahanini usanga mu mubano wa uyu munsi usanga abakobwa baba badakunze abahungu , ahubwo baba bakunze ibyo batunze .
Ibi ngo bigaragazwa na uko rimwe na rimwe iyo inkumi ibonye umusore urusha amafaranga uwo bari bari kumwe , ishobora gufata umwanzuro wo kumwanga nta kindi bapfuye .
Uwiragiye Jean Claude , yavuze ko muri iyi minsi bigoye ngo kubona umukobwa ugukunda iyo ufite ubushobozi buke , ngo nyamara wakira ntumenye aho bavuye .

Airtel Rwanda yatangije irushanwa rizahemba abanditsi beza ba inkuru za urukundo .
Sosiyete ya Itumanaho ya Airtel Rwanda kuri uyu wa 14 Gashyantare 2021 yatangije irushanwa ryiswe " " " " NkundaUrwanda " " " " rizahemba inkuru nziza zijyanye na urukundo zizahiga izindi .
Abazaba aba mbere muri " " " " NKundaUrwanda " " " " bazahabwa ibihembo birimo PocketWifi ndetse na 30GB zo gukoresha kuri internet .
Itangazo ryashyizwe hanze na Airtel rigaragara ko iri rushanwa riri mu rwego rwo gukomeza gufasha abantu , binyuze mu kugaragaza urukundo rukomeye bakunda u Rwanda .
Riti " " " " Twashatse ko uku kwezi kuba umwihariko duha ikaze buri wese tunamushishikariza gutanga inkuru ye mu rurimi yahisemo , kugira ngo bagaragaze urukundo rwabo ku Rwanda .
Inkuru zishobora kuba ku kintu icyo ari cyo cyose abakiliya bacu , abaturage ndetse na abatuye u Rwanda bumva bishimira . " " " "
Airtel Rwanda yatangaje ko buri munsi hazajya hahembwa abantu 50 .
Airtel yongeyeho ko inkuru zatanzwe na abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga za Twitter , Facebook na Instagram zishobora kuba zivuga ku rukundo rwa umuntu cyangwa zishimira abantu .
Zishobora kuba zishimira abaganga bari ruhembe rwo guhangana na icyorezo cya COVID - 19 , abaforomo na Polisi , abakozi ba supermarket , abakora muri farumasi , abahinzi na abantu bose bagize uruhare rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya COVID - 19 .
Izi nkuru zishobora kuba zivuga ku bantu bakunda imyitozo ngororamubiri , serivisi nka Irembo cyangwa umuyoboro mwiza wa umuhanda .
Ushaka kwitabira yandika inkuru agakurikizaho hashtag ya # NkundaUrwanda , akazishyira ku rubuga rwe bwite cyangwa kuri Twitter ya Airtel @ airtelrw , Facebook @ airtelrwanda cyangwa urubuga rwa airtelrw rwa Instagram .
Hashtag zizifashishwa harimo # NoLockDownOnLove # NkundaUrwanda na # UrukundoIsRed .

Uyu munsi wizihizwa ku wa 14 Gashyantare buri mwaka , urangwa na uko abakundana bibuka urukundo rwabo bagasangira .
Hambere aha COVID - 19 itaraza , abakundana barasohokanaga ariko bya umwihariko bagahana impano zitandukanye ziganjemo indabo .
Hirya no hino benshi mu bafite abakunzi bahangayikishijwe no kubashakira impano zabashimisha zigatuma babona ko bazirikanwe kuri uyu munsi ndetse bikagaragara nka ikimenyetso cya urukundo bafitanye .
Mu Mujyi wa Kigali na ahandi hari urujya na uruza rwa abagana mu masoko bajya gushaka impano nziza zizanyura abakunzi babo kuri St Valentin .
Impano zitangwa hagendewe ku byo ugiye kuyakira akunda ariko zigaherekezwa na indabo za amaroza atukura kuko afatwa na benshi nka agaragaza urukundo .
Kuva mu bihe byakera izi mpano zagiye zitangwa .
Na ubwo mu bihe byo hambere impano zatangwaga akenshi zabaga ari indabo , kuri ubu ibintu byahinduye isura haje uburyo bwo kubihuriza hamwe mu kintu kimwe indabo na izindi mpano bikaba birimbishirijwe hamwe .
