Yann Gwet yakomoje ku kiganiro yagiranye na Perezida Kagame cyamubereye imbarutso yo kuba Umunyarwanda .
Inama ya Abaminisitiri yateranye kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 2 Gashyantare 2021 iyobowe na Perezida Kagame , yahaye ubwenegihugu abantu batanu , nyuma yo kubisuzumana ubushishozi .
Yann Gwet , umwanditsi wo muri Cameroun akaba na umwarimu muri Kaminuza ya u Rwanda mu ishami rya itangazamakuru ndetse na umufasha we , Sidonie Kouam Gwet ni bamwe mu bahawe ubwenegihugu bwa u Rwanda .
Gwet yagaragaje ibyishimo byo guhabwa ubwenegihugu bwa u Rwanda na uburyo ikiganiro yagiranye na Perezida Kagame aricyo cyahinduye cyane uko yatekerezaga u Rwanda , akiyemeza kuba umwe mu baharanira iterambere ryarwo .
Mu nyandiko yanyujije muri Jeune Afrique , Gwet yavuze ko Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yabaye akiri muto .
Mu rwego rwo kugerageza kumva neza ibyabaye , yasomye ibitabo bitandukanye birimo La inavouable cya Patrick Saint - Exupéry .
Gwet avuga ko aho gusobanukirwa yakomezaga kugwa mu rujijo , gusa muri byose akumva ko ibyabaye mu Rwanda ari ibyago bidasanzwe .
Icyamutunguye cyane cyanatumaga yibaza byinshi , ni uburyo igihugu cyari cyarasenyutse mu myaka 27 ishize , cyiyubatse mu kanya gato ubu kikaba ari intangarugero muri Afurika .
Mu 2016 , uyu mugabo avuga ko yageze mu Rwanda .
Bwari ubwa kabiri ahageze .
Yari yitabiriye Inama Mpuzamahanga yiga ku Bukungu ( World Economic Forum ) .
Icyo gihe yagize amahirwe yo kuba umwe bitabiriye ikiganiro Perezida Paul Kagame yagiranye na abanyamakuru baba aba imbere mu gihugu na mpuzamahanga .
Gwet yavuze ko akimara guhabwa umwanya ngo abaze Perezida , yari afite ibibazo bitatu , ariko kimwe muri ibyo nicyo cyahinduye imyumvire ye kiba na inkomoko ya umwanzuro aherutse gufata wo kwaka ubwenegihugu bwa u Rwanda .
Ibibazo bibiri bya mbere byabazaga Perezida Kagame kuvuga uko atekereza imiyoborere mu myumvire nyafurika .
Ikibazo cya gatatu ari nacyo cyahinduriye Gwet ubuzima cyagiraga kiti " " " " Bivuze iki kuba Umunyarwanda ?
Iki kibazo numvaga gifite akamaro gakomeye kuri njye kuko nabonaga ko nubwo ubukungu ari ingenzi cyane , ariko ubwabwo budahagije ngo igihugu kibeho igihe kinini . " " " "
Gwet yavuze ko gushyira hamwe nka igihugu bidahari , ubukungu nta gaciro bwaba bufite uko bwaba ari bwiza kose .
Ati " " " " Gushyira hamwe niko kwari ku isonga mu byago u Rwanda rwanyuzemo ariko [ gushyira hamwe ] ni nako kwari mu mushinga wa FPR Inkotanyi ya Kagame .
Natekereje ko ari indangagaciro ishinze imizi mu muco nyarwanda . " " " "
Perezida Kagame yasobanuriye Gwet ko kuba Umunyarwanda no kuba umunyafurika mwiza ntaho bitandukaniye .
Ati " " " " Yansobanuriye ko u Rwanda ari igice kimwe kigize Afurika bityo ibyaruyabeho bitatandukanywa cyane na ibyagwiririye umugabane wose .
Kuba Umunyarwanda ni inzira yo kuba umunyafurika .
Indangagaciro nyarwanda zigomba kuba iziha ikaze Afurika na isi . " " " "
Perezida Kagame yamusobanuriye ko politiki nziza ibereye Afurika ikwiriye kuba irenga ibijyanye na amoko byahawe intebe kuri uwo mugabane , ikareba iterambere rya bose .
Ati " " " " Natekereje ko icyo gisubizo gitandukanye na icyo nari niteze .
Kuba twiyumvamo kuba abanyafurika ntabwo bigabanyiriza agaciro kuba turi Abanyarwanda .
Ushobora kunyurwa na injyana ifutse ya indirimbo za Cécile Kayirebwa [ . . . ] ukumva umeze nka uri mu rugo aho waba uherereye hose muri Afurika .
Ushobora kuva ikantarange ukisanga mu cyerecyezo cya u Rwanda .
Turi Abanyarwanda kubwa amaraso ariko birashoboka ko mbere na mbere turi bo kubwa umutima . " " " "
Gwet yaje gusesengura ibyo yabwiwe na Perezida Kagame , asanga mu bibazo byose u Rwanda rwagiye runyuramo , hari abanyafurika bake barunambyeho nta kindi baruca , ahubwo kuko bumvaga ko ari inshingano zabo kwifatanya na bagenzi babo bari mu kaga .
Byagaragaye ubwo impunzi ibihumbi za abanyarwanda zirukanwaga mu gihugu mu 1959 , zikakiranwa yombi na Abanyafurika bo mu bindi bihugu .
Yavuze kandi kuri Ibrahim Gambari ushinzwe ibikorwa bya inama ya abaminisitiri mu biro bya Perezida wa Nigeria Muhammadu Buhari , mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi wari ambasaderi wa igihugu cye muri Loni .
Gambari yarwanyije bikomeye umwanzuro wa ibihugu bikomeye byari byanze gutabara u Rwanda .
Gwet yavuze ko " " " " muri icyo gihe , Ibrahim Gambari yiyumvaga nka umunya - Nigeria , Umunyafurika na Umunyarwanda icyarimwe . " " " "
Yongeye gutanga urugero rwa nyakwigendera Jerry Rawlings wayoboraga Ghana mu 1994 , mu gisa nka ubwiyahuzi wemeje umwanzuro wari wafashwe na Brig Gen Henry Kwami Anyidoho , wari umugaba wa ingabo za Ghana zari mu butumwa bwa Loni mu Rwanda .
Anyidoho yafashe umwanzuro wo kurekera ingabo za igihugu cye mu Rwanda binyuranyije na icyemezo Loni yari yafashe cyo kugabanya ingabo ntizirenge 270 .
Gwet avuga no ku bandi basirikare ba Abanyafurika bari bari mu butumwa bwo kugarura amahoro mu Rwanda , bitanze barimo na umunya - Sénégal capitaine Mbaye Diagne wiciwe mu Rwanda agerageza gutabara abicwaga .
Ati " " " " Izi ntwari zose zatabaye ikuzo rya Afurika mu gihe abayobozi bayo bo batari bashishikajwe na dosiye irebana na u Rwanda mu 1994 .
Ibikorwa byabo bya ubutwari byabaye umurama washibutsemo u Rwanda rushya .
Bagaragaje icyo kuba umunyarwanda bivuze mu buryo bumwe na ubwa Paul Kagame , baharanira amahoro , ubumwe na iterambere rya abanyarwanda bose na abanyafurika muri rusange . " " " "
Gwet yavuze ko icyo kiganiro yagiranye na Perezida Kagame , cyatumye akunda u Rwanda anarwimukiramo , akemeza ko hari indi Afurika nziza ishoboka , Afurika yose iramutse ifite imyumvire nka iya Perezida Kagame .

Byinshi ku ndabo za amaroza , na ayo waha umukunzi wawe kuri Saint Valentin .
Guhana indabo ni kimwe mu byerekana urukundo ruri hagati ya abantu , iyo umuntu aruguhaye aba akwereka ko agufitiye urukundo rukomeye kandi ko ashimishishijwe na umubano wanyu .
Abantu bahana indabo mu buryo butandukanye bitewe na umubano bafitanye cyangwa na icyabaye hagati yabo , ariko akenshi abakunda guhana indabo ni abari mu rukundo , umusore na inkumi cyangwa umugabo na umugore .
Abakundana bahana indabo mu kugaragarizanya urukundo rukomeye ruri hagati yabo cyangwa bakazihana bitewe na ibirori bitandukanye bizihiza ariko akenshi biganisha ku rukundo rwabo .
Nubwo guhana indabo bigaragara nka ikimenyetso cya urukundo kiri hagati ya abakundana ariko siko indabo zose zisobanura urukundo kuko usanga hari na izisobanura agahinda cyangwa undi mubano utari urukundo .
Hari ubwo habaho ukwibeshya ka ugiye gutanga ururabo akumva gutanga amaroza ayo ariyo yose bisobanuye urukundo ariko ni ukwibeshya kuko buri maroza agira icyo asobanuye nubwo yose aba aganisha ku mubano mwiza .
Nka amaroza ya umuhondo asobanura ubucuti buri hagati ya abantu , ubu bwoko ushobora kubuha umuntu wa inshuti yawe umwereka ko unyuzwe na ubucuti mufitanye .
Naho amaroza afite ibara rya iroza yo asobanura gushima , ubuntu na umunezero .
Aya uyaha umuntu ushaka kumushimira bitewe na igikorwa runaka yagukoreye .
Byaba bitangaje ko ku munsi wahariwe abakundana ushobora guha uwo mwashakanye amaroza ya umuhondo kandi washakaga kumugaragariza urukundo ruri hagati yanyu .
Iki gihe ukoze ibi , ntiwaba umweretse rwa rukundo washakaga ko abona abaye ari umuntu usobanukiwe na iby indabo , ntabwo byamushimisha kuko yakwibaza uburyo urukundo rwa abashakanye uruhinduyemo ubucuti busanzwe , icyiza rero ni uko wamuha amaroza atukura asobanura urukundo .
Aya maroza atukura yamenyekanye ubwo yakoreshwaga na Abaromani na Abagiriki aho yagaragaza Aphrodite cyangwa Venus ikaba yari Imana ya urukundo .
Yaje gukoreshwa nka ikimenyetso cya abakundana bitewe na William Shakespeare wayakoreshaga mu bihangano bye bituma yamamara nka akoreshwa hagati ya abakunda .
Abahana aya maroza ni abakundana urukundo rwo kubana nka umugore na umugabo cyangwa abamaze kubana , kuko asobanura urukundo .

Bashobora no kuba abicanyi : Ubuzima bushaririye bwa abana bakurira mu miryango irimo amakimbirane .
Magingo aya biragoye ko hashira iminsi ibiri cyangwa itatu hatumvikanye inkuru ya umugabo cyangwa umugore wishe uwo bashakanye biturutse ku makimbirane arangwa mu miryango .
Iyi miryango igira amakimbirane kugeza ayigejeje ku kwicana iba ifite abana kandi ubwo bwumvikane buke hagati ya ababyeyi , buba bari kureba , bikaba byabatera ibibazo bya ihungabana .
Abahanga mu buzima bwo mu mutwe , bavuga ko abana bavuka ku babyeyi bagiranye amakimbirane arimo no kwicana , bahura na ibibazo byo mu mutwe bibatera kujya mu mihanda , kunywa ibiyobyabwenge na indi mico iterwa na agahinda gakabije baba bagize .
Umuhanga mu mitekereze akaba na umuganga mu bitaro bya Gihundwe , Mucyo Aline , yatangaje ko abana bavuka mu miryango iba yarabayemo ubwicanyi bahura na ingaruka za igihe kirekire zishobora kubaviramo guhinduka abagizi ba nabi .
Ati " " " " Umwana uturuka muri iyi miryango usanga akura afite ipfunwe ryo kwegera abandi , aba yumva ko nawe bamubona nka umwicanyi bigatuma ashaka ubundi buhungiro akajya mu biyobyabwenge ntiyegere abantu . " " " "
" " " " Kubera kugenda yihunza abantu , hari aho bigera agatangira kugira ihungabana , akagira uburwayi bwo mu mutwe , akaba yatangira kugirira nabi abantu ndetse no guhinduka umwicanyi . " " " "
Kuba abana bahura na izi ngaruka bituruka ku kuba batarakurikiranywe na umuryango , abaganga ndetse na inzego za leta kugira ngo umwana wahuye na ibi bibazo aganirizwe areke kugira ihungabana .
Ikigo cya Igihugu gishinzwe Imikurire no kurengera umwana , kivuga ko mu nzego za ibanze hari abantu baba bagenewe kuganiriza abana bahuye na ibyo bibazo .

Ati " " " " Buriya ku mudugudu habamo abo twita inshuti za umuryango kuri buri mudugudu , haba hari babiri bahuguriwe ibijyanye no kurengera umwana iyo byabaye , ni bo bafata iya mbere mu kureba uko byifashe . " " " "
" " " " Aba bakorana na inzobere mu buzima bwo mu mutwe baba bari mu bitaro bakaba bafasha umwana mu bijyanye na imitekereze ndetse na iyo adafite umuryango umwakira ahabwa ba malayika murinzi bakaba bamurera mu gihe tugishaka igisubizo kirambye . " " " "

Baptiste ni izina rihabwa umwana wa umuhungu rikaba rikomoka ku ijambo rya ikigereki baptizein , risobanura kwiyandikisha mu masakaramentu ya abakirisutu ubwo ni nko kubatizwa .
Baptiste arangwa na amahoro na umutuzo .
Buri igihe aba afite ibyiringiro bya ibintu byiza , ni umuntu ukunda kumvikana bikamufasha kumvikanisha ibitekerezo bye .
Akunda kuba ari wenyine ari gutekereza cyane bigatuma agenzura ibintu byose .
Ni umuntu abandi bagisha inama kandi agakunda gukemura amakimbirane , nta kintu afata nka icyoroheje icyo yinjiyemo cyose agikorana imbaraga ze zose kuko yizera ko ibintu byose biva mu gukora cyane .

Kuki abakobwa benshi bakunda kugira ikibuno kinini ?
Kugira amabere mato , mu nda zeru , ikibuno kinini ni ibintu biba ku mitima ya abakobwa benshi , aho usanga bamwe banywa ibinini byongeresha ikibuno , abandi bakiteresha inshinge , yewe hari na abishyura akayabo muri " " " " gym " " " " kugira ngo bakunde batere uko babyifuza .
Ushobora kwibaza impamvu ibitera , kuko uretse no mu Rwanda , usanga no hanze yarwo nko muri Amerika hari ibyamamare bivugwa ko byiyongeresheje ikibuno nka Cardi - B , Nicki Minaj , Iggy Azalea , Kim Kardashian , Kylie Jenner , Khloé Kardashian na abandi .
Abakobwa bamwe babakurikira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga , iyo babonye ukuntu bajegeza Isi , bafite ibihumbi bya abantu babakurikirana bumva bashatse kumera nkabo , bagakora ibishoboka byose ngo bagire ikibuno kinini , ari naho usanga hari abanyweye ibinini , abiteresha inshinge , abandi gym yarahindutse nka akazi .
Na ejo bundi aha Kicukiro , twumvise aho abagore na abakobwa bari barayobotse bashaka kongeresha ikibuno , bigaragaza ko urukundo rwacyo rutari urwa imahanga gusa , na aha iwacu rwose agatima kararehareha .
Uretse abakobwa babikunda , abahungu nabo ngo babikunda kurushaho ari nayo impamvu benshi bifuza kugira ikibuno kinini , kugira ngo bagire umubiri ukurura abahungu .
Kenshi uzasanga amafoto ya abakobwa batari bake ku mbuga nkoranyambaga bifotoje basa nkabacyerekana , yaba afite ikibuno kinini cyangwa gito akora ku buryo kigaragara mu ifoto .
Mu bushakashatsi bwakorewe muri Kaminuza ya Texas muri Austin , ku bagabo 100 bari hagati ya imyaka 17 na 34 , bwagaragaje ko abagabo bakunda abakobwa bafite umugongo muto wihese kuri dogere 45 kuva aho urangirira kugeza ku kibuno .
Niba utabyumva neza ariko ukaba uzi uko Kim Kardashian ateye , wamaze kubona neza ishusho ya uko biba bimeze .
Daily Mail ivuga ko impamvu abakobwa bakiri bato babaye imbata yo kugira ikibuno kinini .
Uwitwa Beth Cobb wa imyaka 24 yavuze ko babiterwa no kubona ibyamamare ku mbuga nkoranyambaga .
Yagize ati " " " " Urungano rwanjye 100 % bashishikajwe na imiterere ya ikibuno kuruta iya amabere , kubera ko tubona ibyamamare byinshi bicyerekana kuri Instagram . " " " "
Ikinyamakuru MTL Blog kivuga ko impamvu abakobwa bakunda kugira ikibuno kinini , ari ukubera ko bigaragara neza , bikurura abagabo , ndetse bifasha umukobwa mu gihe atwite kutagira imvune kuko ikibuno kimufasha kutaremerwa na inda ndetse na ibindi .
Icyo abahanga bavuga ku bakobwa bafite ikibuno kinini
Mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe na Sosiyete yitwa Elsevier yo mu Buholandi mu 2008 , bwagaragaje ko abakobwa bafite ikibuno kinini bagira ubwenge bwinshi kuruta abafite gito .
Ibi bikaba biterwa na uko ibinure biba ku kibuno bibamo ibyitwa " " " " Omega - 3 " " " " bisanzwe biboneka mu birirwa birimo ifi , byagaragaye ko bifasha mu gukura ka ubwonko .
Abakobwa bafite ikibuno kinini , baba bafite amahirwe yo kutarwara indwara za umutima na umwijima nka uko ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na cell metabolism bubivuga .
Ibi biterwa ahanini na uko ibinure biguma ku kibuno gusa , ntibikomeze kuzenguruka mu mubiri .
Ubu bushakashatsi kandi bukomeza buvuga ko ibinure byo ku kibuno atari bibi ku buzima bwa umuntu .
Ubundi bushakashatsi bwakozwe bwagaragaje ko ikibuno kibamo ibinure birimo ingano ya Cholesterol ihagije ku rugero rwiza , ituma imitsi ya amaraso izibuka , bikarinda indwara za umutima .
Abahanga mu bya siyansi muri Kaminuza ya Harvard , bo bagaragaje ko ubwoko bwa ibinure biba ku kibuno bigabanya ingaruka zo kurwara diabète yo mu bwoko bwa 2 , kubera ko ibyo binure biba munsi ya uruhu byongera imikorere myiza ya umusemburo wa insuline wifashishwa mu kugena isukari umubiri ukeneye .
Icyo wakora ngo ugire ikibuno kinini
Niba udafite ikibuno kinini ukaba wifuza kukigira , bisaba ko gushirika ubute ukabikorera .
Insaf Aouadi umutoza ukomeye wa siporo mu Bufaransa , afite umwihariko wo gutoza abakobwa bashaka kugira ikibuno kinini , avuga ko abakobwa bakora imyitozo yahimbwe na umutoza witwa Gady , ya iminota 15 gatatu mu cyumweru .
Iyi myitozo irimo gukora " " " " squats " " " " 20 , zikorwa uhagarara ukongera ugasa nka uwicara ariko ntugere hasi , ariko ukicara ushyize ikibuno inyuma .
Ukabikora inshuro 20 .
Bakongera bagakora " " " " squats " " " " 10 basimbuka , aho guhagarara ukongera ukicara ahubwo urasimbuka ukicara kwa kundi twavuze haruguru , ukabikora inshuro 10 .
Izindi " " " " sport " " " " bakora ni izitwa " " " " hip thrusts . " " " "
Ufata igikoresho kimeze nka intebe irambuye ariko kigufi , ugashikamizaho amaboko , ugashyira ikibuno hasi ugahina amavi , ukajya uzamuka ukongera ukamanuka inshuro 20 .
Insaf Aouadi avuga ko bakora iyo myitozo itatu bakaruhuka umunota umwe , bakabikora inshuro eshanu .
Hari abatoza benshi bagira uburyo bwabo bwo gukoresha izi sport zituma umuntu azana ikibuno , ndetse no mu rugo wabigerageza gusa zigomba guherekezwa no kurya ibiryo birimo poroteyine zifasha kongera umubiri .
Ushaka kumenya byinshi ku byerekeye indyo na sport wakora kugira ngo ugire ikibuno kinini , wasoma igitabo kitwa " " " " Grossir les fesses " " " " cya Natacha J . C cyangwa ukazasoma icyitwa " " " " Fesses bombées " " " " cya umufaransa witwa Valérie Orsoni kizasohoka tariki 11 Werurwe 2021 kuri Amazon .
Ibyo kwitaho mbere yo gusubira mu rukundo nyuma ya gatanya .
Gatanya ni ikintu gikomeye kuri buri muntu yaba ari wowe yaturutseho cyangwa ari mugenzi wawe , buri muntu ajya gushinga urugo yifuza kugira umuryango kandi wishimye iyo habayeho gutandukana ubabazwa na uko ya ntego itagezweho .
Nyuma ya gatanya umuntu anyura mu bihe bikomeye ariko usanga biba bimuganisha aheza , ni ibisanzwe ku muntu kugira amarangamutima atandukanye bitewe na icyamubayeho .
Kubwa Elisabeth Kubler Ross , inzobere mu bibanire ya abantu avuga ko hari ibyiciro umuntu anyuramo nyuma ya gatanya birimo kutumva ibyabaye , uburakari , kumvikana na uwo mwatandukanye , kugira agahinda gakabije no kwiyakira .
Nubwo biba ari ibihe bitoroshye ariko ubuzima burakomeza ndetse ukaba wakongera no kujya mu rukundo ko gutandukana nti bisobanuye ko ubuzima bwa urukundo burangiye .
Gusa gutangira undi mubano bisaba kwitonda kugira ngo uwo utangiye utazahungabana bitewe na ibisigisi bya uwa mbere .
Dore ibintu bitanu ukwiye kwitaho mbere yo gutangira urukundo rushya .
Igihe ni ingenzi mu kumenya niba witeguye kujya mu rukundo rushya .
Icyo bigufasha ni ukureba niba warihaye igihe gihagije cyo kwiyakira kuri gatanya wagize .
Biba byiza iyo uvuye mu rukundo kudahita utangira urundi rushya kuko ushobora gusanga utarakira ko rwa rundi rwarangiye bikaba byatuma na urushya ugiyemo rwangirika kuko uvanga ibishya na ibyashize .
Iyo wihaye igihe kirekire cyo kubanza kwiyakira , bituma ukora ibyo watekereje ugafata na umwanya wo gutekereza ku mukunzi mushya naho iyo uhubutse ushobora gufata uwo ubonye cyangwa utamukunze ari ubuhungiro ushaka .
Nubwo ibijyanye na urukundo rwawe ari ubuzima bwawe bwite ariko rushobora kugira aho ruhurira na abakuri hafi , niba uwo mwatandukanye mwari mufitanye abana kujya mu rukundo rushya biragusaba kubanza kwitonda .
Iyo ababyeyi batandukanye ntibituma na abana batandukana na ababyeyi babo baba bagomba gukomeza kubabona nkuko bikwiye , kandi bisaba no gukomeza kubereka urukundo ko bo ntibaba bumva uburyo mwatandukanye .
Iyo ugiye mu rundi rukundo rushya abana bawe batarakira itandukana ryanyu bishobora kubagora kubereka undi mukunzi wawe utandukanye na umubyeyi wabo , bikaba byabaviramo kumwanga bumva ariwe ntandaro ya gatanya ya ababyeyi babo .
Bisaba kwitonda abana bakabanza bakabyakira ndetse ukamenya na uko bazabana na umubyeyi wabo na umukunzi wawe nta kibazo biteje .
Nubwo mujya guhana gatanya mwabyumvikanyeho ariko uwo mwahoze mubana iyo yumvise ko uri mu rukundo bishobora kumutera gufuha , bikaba byatuma akwima uburenganzira ku bana abereka ko ari wowe wisangiye abandi .
Bisaba kugira uko ubyitwaramo kuburyo umubano wawe mushya utazamutera ishyari , ndetse ukareba neza niba mudashobora kwiyunga no gusubirana mbere yo kujya ahandi biba byiza kugutekereza kuwo mwatandukanye .
Gatanya ituma amarangamutima yawe ahungabana bikaba byagutera kwiyanga no kwitakariza icyizere .
Hari abagira agahinda gakabije bitewe no kwigaya ko batabashije kurinda umuryango wabo gutandukana .
Mbere yo gushaka umuntu mwakundana banza wikunde wowe ubwawe wongere wigirire icyizere , ndetse umenye na uruhare wagize muri gatanya kugira ngo utazongera gukora ayo makosa nanone .
Numara kongera kwikunda uzabona uko ukunda mugenzi wawe , kuko bitabaye ibyo bizatuma utigirira icyizere bikaba byatuma wumva udakunzwe na umubano mushya watangiye ukagupfira ubusa .
Kwakira ko utakiri kumwe nuwo mwatandukanye
Iyo wakunze umuntu cyane biragora kumva ko mutakiri kumwe hari na abahora bategereje ko yazabagarukira , umenya ko wamaze kubyakira iyo wumva wabana na undi kandi umwizeye kandi ko uwo mwatandukanye utamukeneye nka umukunzi wawe .
Biba byiza kubanza kwikuramo uwa mbere iyo utangiye urukundo rushya ukimutekereza bituma utangira kugereranya abantu babiri , ibi bituma uwo muri kumwe atanezerwa ndetse nawe ukabona utanyuzwe .
Musanze : Ntibanika afite imyaka 106 na abamukomokaho 102 kandi aracyakomeye ; ibanga ryo kuramba .
Ntibanika Agnes , ni umwe mu Banyarwanda bake bariye ingoma ya Yuhi V Musinga kuri ubu bakaba bari no gusogongera ku byiza bya Leta ya Ubumwe .
Afite imyaka irenga 100 kuko yavutse mu 1915 nka uko bigaragara mu byangombwa bya irangamimerere .
Uyu mukecuru utuye mu Karere ka Musanze , Umurenge wa Rwaza mu Kagari ka Kabushinge avuga ko atibuka neza igihe yavukiye gusa ibyangombwa bye bigaragaza ko yavutse mu 1915 , ubwo Intambara ya mbere y " " " " Isi yari irimbanyije , bivuze ko afite imyaka 106 .
Yabaye mu Rwanda rutagira imodoka , rutagira umujyi , rutagira inkweto ndetse rutarangwamo na urukarango , none ubu imihanda ya umukara yo mu Karere ka Musanze arayogoga nka abandi .
Yariye Ingoma araziyongeza .
Kuramba ni umugisha ndetse abandi babibona nka amahirwe cyane cyane iyo bigeze mu bihugu bikiri mu nzira ya amajyambere aho na 40 kuyirenza aba ari Imana bitewe na ubuzima bugoranye abaturage babyo banyuramo umunsi ku munsi .
Ku Isi yose byumvikana nka igitangaza ko umuntu arengeje imyaka 100 ya amavuko kuko uhiga abandi ari Umuyapanikazi , Kane Takana wa imyaka 118 .
Mu kiganiro kirambuye uyu mukecuru yagiranye na IGIHE yahishuye byinshi mu buzima bwe yemeza ko ari byo byamufashije kuramba .
IGIHE : Ese waba wibuka igihe wavukiye ?
Ntibanika : Nakwibuka se gute ?
Ntabwo nibuka igihe navukiye ; cyakora ba mama bambwiraga ko navutse inzara yarateye ariko icyo nibuka ni uko navukanye na undi twari impanga ngo njye nasigaye mu nda mvuka bukeye undi yaraye hanze .
IGIHE : Wibuka se aho wavukiye ?
Ntibanika : Navukiye Kirama ( Ubu Ni mu Murenge wa Gacaca muri Musanze ) hakurya ya uruzi rwa Mukungwa .
Ntibanika : Oya hasigaye umukobwa umwe abandi baratashye .
IGIHE : Tubwire muri make uko ubayeho kuri uyu musozi ?
Ntibanika : None se mbayeho ku bwanjye ?
Mbayeho ku bw " " " " Imana ; Nyagasani niwe umbeshejeho na abangaba ( Yavugaga abagore ba abuzukuru be bari aho ) .
IGIHE : Nonese , ni utekereza ari iki cyatumye ugira imyaka 100 ?
Ntibanika : Umva nariye neza kandi na aha nashakiye umugabo nashatse yandishije neza !
IGIHE : Ni iki wakundaga kurya ?
Ntibanika : Sinakunze kurya ibidasanzwe kuko twaryaga byinshi twiyejereje , gusa naryaga na akanyama , umuceri yewe nariye neza ntacyo nigeze nicuza kuko byose twabaga tubifite .
IGIHE : Naho mu byo kunywa wakundaga iki ?
Ntibanika : Nakundaga kunywa akagwa kuko twari dufite urutoki rwera cyane , tugakama kandi kera ntibasengerezaga ( Kugurisha inzoga ) , abagabo bacu bari abantu bashyize hamwe bagatumirana , bakanywa , tugateka ibishyimbo , amateke , ibihaza , ibijumba na ibindi kandi na ubu ni uko sinigeze mbura ibyo kurya rwose .
IGIHE : Ni gute kera mwarimbaga ?
Ntibanika : Ni impu twambaraga zivuye ku ntama bakazinyuka zanoga tukazambara na imishumi , tugashyiraho ingimba na imihagatiro mu mutwe .
Twiyambariraga impu rwose .
IGIHE : Ni iyihe nama wagira urubyiruko rwa ubu ugendeye ku mahirwe ubona ahari ?
Ntibanika : Urubyiruko rwa ubu rufite amahirwe menshi tutigeze tugira ariko bararangaye !
Twe kera ntitwigaga ariko bo bariga bakagera na aho baba Abaminisitiri , Abadepite bakaba na abategetsi bakomeye , gusa icyo nababwira gikomeye urubyiruko rya ubu ni rwirinde ubusambanyi .
None ubu abakobwa bariraye , bari kubyara uko bishakiye , abahungu bari kubatera inda bakiri bato bikabicira ubuzima , bitware nka uko twitwaraga .
IGIHE : Ni iki wumva wicuza utakoze mu buzima bwawe wumva wicuza ?
Ntibanika : Ntacyo !
Ntacyo nicuza rwose !

Yakomeje ati " " " " Tuvuze ku guhangayika ( Stress ) , nabyo byongera ibibazo mu mubiri , iyo ukora akazi cyane cyane aka ijoro nturuhuke nabyo byaba intandaro . " " " "
" " " " Ibi nabyo bisaba kumenya ngo ni gute nakwitwara mu gihe cyo guhangayika ariho hakenewe ibiribwa bifite intungamubiri " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko kuba uyu mucekuru yararambye bijyanye na uburyo kera babagaho barya ibiribwa bya umwimerere kandi byabonekaga mu buryo bworoshye harimo kuba byareraga mu mashyamba yabaga abakikije .
Ntibanika ni umupfakazi kuva mu 1987 ubu afite abamukomokaho bagera ku 102 harimo abuzukuru na abuzukuruza .
Valentin izina rya umuhungu ugira urukundo .
Valentin ni izina rihabwa umwana wa umuhungu rikaba rikomoka ku ijambo rya ikiratini Valens bisobanura imbaraga .
Ba Valentin ni abantu bafite impano ya urukundo kandi bakita ku bantu batizigamye , akaba ari abantu ba abanyembaraga kuko bakunda guhatana ndetse iyo bamaze kumenya umuhamagaro wabo bashyiramo imbaraga zabo zose mu kuwukirikira .
Iri zina akenshi rifatwa nka iry urukundo bitewe na mutagatifu Valentin wapfuye kubera urukundo .
Hari ibindi byamamare byagiye byitwa iri zina nka Valentin Sardou , umukinnyi wa amafilimi ndetse akaba na umunyarwenya ukomeye .
Hari na umunyamakuru wa Québec , Valentin Jautard , na Umufaransa wa umunyabugeni Valentin Shavtcheko washinze umutwe wa Sens - Art
Ernest izina rya umuhungu wa impirimbanyi
Ernest ni izina rihabwa umwana wa umuhungu urangwa no kwirwanaho ndetse no kugira umurava .
Iri zina rikomoka ku ijambo rya Ikidage eornost bisobanura gushakisha .
Ernest iyo ukimubona uba ubona ari umuntu wikunda nyamara siko biba bimeze ko ni umuntu witangira abandi kandi abantu akunda ashobora kubakorera buri kimwe gishoboka .
Usanga mu nshuti ze aganza ariko akarangwa no kumvikana na abandi .
Akunda gukora ibijyanye na ubugeni kandi usanga ari wa muntu udacika intege ko na inzitizi ahura nazo zimutera imbaraga zo gukomeza gukora cyane .
Hari bamwe mu bantu babayeho ba ibyamamare bagiye bitwa ba Ernest nka umuhungu wa umwami wa u Bwongereza George III , icyo gikomangoma cyikaba cyaritwaga Ernest - Augustus .
Ibindi byamamare byiswe iri zina ni umuhanzi Ernest Pignon , ndetse na umuhanga mu butabire Ernest Solvay .
Undi wamenyekanye cyane ni Ernest Hemingway Umunyamrika wamenyekanye mu kwandika ibitabo .
Clémence izina rya umukobwa wa umwizerwa
Clémence ni izina rihabwa umwana wa umukobwa , rikomoka ku magambo ya Ikigereki " " " " Clementia " " " " na " " " " Clemens , " " " " bisobanura imbabazi cyangwa ikintu kiryoshye .
Clémence ni umuntu urangwa ni imico ishimwa na buri wese .
Ni umukobwa urangwa no kuvugisha ukuri akaba umwizerwa kandi yanga guhemuka .
Ni umuntu uhorana ibyishimo kandi usanga abantu bishimira kumuguma iruhande .
Arangwa no guhanga udushya ndetse no gutera imbere , ni umunyembaraga kandi yanga gukandamizwa ni wa muntu udatinya kuvuga ikimubangamiye , kandi icyo yiyemeje gukora aruhuka akigezeho .
Bimwe mu byamamare byamenyekanye kuri iri zina harimo Clémence de Habsbourg , umukobwa wa umwami Rudolf wayoboye u Budage .
Undi wamenyekanye cyane ni umufaransakazi wa impirimbanyi ya uburenganzira bwa abagore Clémence Augustine Royer .
Vanessa izina rya umukobwa urangwa na urukundo .
Vanessa ni izina rihabwa umwana wa umukobwa rikaba rikomoka ku jambo rya ikigereki " " " " apporte , " " " " bisobanura intsinzi .
Vanessa arangwa no kuba ari umuntu ufite inzozi kandi yizera ko ejo ari heza cyane .
Uyu mu kobwa arangwa na impuhwe nyinshi bikaba bigarazwa na uko adakunda kubona abantu bari mu byago cyangwa babaye .
Izi mpuhwe zigaragarira mu bikorwa bye aho aba aharanira ibyishimo bya buri muntu , akora uko ashoboye ngo abantu bari hafi ye bahorane umunezero .
Uyu mukobwa kandi azi kujya inama cyane kandi mu bikorwa bye arangwa na urukundo bikaba bituma abantu benshi bifuza kubana na we .
Bimwe mu byamamare byabayeho byagiye byitwa iri zina harimo nka umurimbyi akaba na umukinyi wa amafilimi Vanessa Paradis .
Undi wamenyekanye cyane ni Umufaransakazi wa umukinnyi wa filimi Vanessa Demouy .
Tracy Agasaro wa KC2 yahishuye impamvu abantu babyibushye batisanzura kuri bose .
Umunyamakuru wa KC2 , Tracy Agasaro ni umwe mu bagezweho cyane cyane mu rubyiruko ndetse hari ibirori byinshi asigaye abera umuyobozi wabyo .
Agasaro Tracy Michella ubusanzwe avuka mu bana babiri ba abakobwa akaba ari imfura .
Mu buzima busanzwe ni umunyamakuru wa KC2 ishami rya Televiziyo ya u Rwanda ryashyiriweho urubyiruko .
Yivuga nka umuntu ukunda gusabana na abandi ndetse no kuririmba , agakunda akazi ke ka itangazamakuru akishimira ibyo abandi bagezeho mu buryo bwose bushoboka .
Mu kiganiro na 1K Studio yavuze ko ikintu yibuka akiri umwana ari uko yakundaga gukererwa mu ishuri , ariko mu mashuri makuru biza gukosoka kubera ko yari umuyobozi wa bagenzi be , agomba kuba icyitegererezo .

Umurebye , ni umukobwa ubyibushye ukunda guseka iteka ryose , nubwo aterura ngo avuge ibiro afite , umuntu umurebye na amaso abona ko ari mu bantu bafite ibiro byinshi .

Kigali : Yahamagariwe akazi ko mu rugo atungurwa no kubwirwa kwinjira mu ko mu buriri .
Umukobwa wa imyaka 19 ya amavuko utuye mu Kamenge mu Murenge wa Kimisagara , Akarere ka Nyarugenge yatengushywe na uwamuhamagaye ashaka kumuha akazi ko mu rugo atungurwa no kwakirizwa ako mu buriri ariko arakanga .
Iyo uganiriye na Umutesi Marie Claire [ izina yahawe ] ubusanzwe uvuka mu Karere ka Gisagara , akubwira uburyo yaje gushaka akazi ko mu rugo mu Mujyi wa Kigali hanyuma agashishikarizwa gukora aka uburaya .
Yabwiye IGIHE ko amaze ibyumweru bitatu gusa muri Kigali , aho yaje aje kureba mugenzi we wari wamubwiye ko yamuboneye akazi ko mu rugo .
Uyu mukobwa yemeza ko ari bwo bwa mbere yari akandagiye mu mihanda yo mu mujyi .
Mu rugendo rwe ngo yari afite amatsiko yo kureba uwo Murwa Mukuru wa u Rwanda wirahirwa na abawuzi .
Aya mashyushyu ngo yaje gushira ndetse atangira kuzinukwa Kigali nyuma yo kumenya akazi uwari umuzanye yiteguraga kumwinjizamo .
Ati " " " " Njye naje ari mugenzi wanjye umpamagaye kuri telefoni ambwira ko yamboneye akazi naho njye simenye ko ari akazi ka uburaya yashakaga ko nkora .
Nyuma nibwo naje kumenya ko ari indaya . " " " "
Umutesi akomeza avuga ko nyuma ya iminsi ibiri ageze muri Kigali yasabye mugenzi we kumujyana aho azakora akamubwira ko hari akandi kazi gahari kandi karimo amafaranga menshi .
Ati " " " " Mbere ntabwo nari nzi ko ari indaya gusa numvaga mu cyaro babivuga nyuma yo kuza rero nibwo nabonye bwa mbere ararana na abagabo imbonankubone kuko yabinjizaga ndeba . " " " "
Ahamya ko yatunguwe na ukuntu uwo mukobwa yazanye umugabo aho yabaga yinjira mu cyumba arangije amusaba kumusangamo .
Ati " " " " Icyo gihe agace kose karabimenye kuko twahise twiteza abantu kuko yarambwiye ngo ngende turyamane aranyishyura ibihumbi 20 Frw ndanga , noneho umugabo aza kunyifatira mu ruganiriro ndasakuza ahita andeka kuko yumvaga abantu benshi hanze bahuruye . " " " "
Kuva icyo gihe ngo yicujije icyamuzanye i Kigali ndetse yemeza ko kuri ubu atindiwe na uko gahunda yo guhagarika ingendo zihuza uturere irangira akisubirira ku ivuko i Gisagara .
Si rimwe cyangwa kabiri humvikanye inkuru nyinshi zivuga abakobwa bizezwa imirimo haba mu Rwanda no mu mahanga ya kure ariko bahagera bagasunikirwa kuryamana na abagabo kugira ngo babone amaramuko .
Inzego zitandukanye zitanga inama ko bakwiye gushishoza mbere yo gufata icyemezo cyo gukurikira umuntu wabijeje akazi .

Ntabwo biramenyekana neza ibijyanye na ibiganiro bazajya bakora gusa amakuru avuga ko byerekeye imyidagaduro kuko bose aribyo basanzwe bazwiho .

Mu muco wa ubu mu Rwanda bimaze kumenyerwa ko benshi mu bakobwa bagiye kurushinga ari nka ihame ko bakorerwa ibirori byo gusezera ku bukumi benshi bazi nka Bridal Shower .
Ni ibirori bikunze gukorwa na abo mu mijyi naho mu cyaro bikorwa na bake cyane , kuko bataracengerwa na imico nka iyi .
Uretse gukorerwa ibi birori ku bakobwa , bivugwa ko abagore bamaze igihe bubatse babagira inama ya uko zubakwa bakanasezera kuri bagenzi babo baba basize mu bukumi , abasore bo ntabwo ibirori nka iki bijya bibaho .
Mutesi Jolly wabaye Nyampinga wa u Rwanda mu 2016 , yanditse kuri Twitter yibaza impamvu ibirori nka ibi bitajya bikorerwa abasore kandi nabo baba bakeneye impanuro ziturutse ku bagabo bamaze igihe bubatse .

Ariko , ikibazo cyanjye ni iki twajya tugira ibirori nka ibi bya abagabo benshi bagira inama abahungu uko zubakwa na uko bagomba kuzuza inshingano nka abagabo mu gihe barushinze . " " " "

Bridal shower hagombye kubaho inama za impande zombi za ba nyirasenge na ba se wabo na abandi . " " " "
Audace Hirwa we yavuze ko na ubundi Bridal shower ntacyo iba imaze kuko umuntu atakwigishwa uko yitwara mu rugo mu masaha abiri .
Mu muco wo hambere umukobwa iyo yajyaga gushyingirwa habagaho umuhuro bakararira umukobwa , amajoro icyumweru kimwe cyangwa bibiri ugamije kumutinyura no guhimba indirimbo zizabyinwa ku munsi wo gushyingirwa .
Abakoraga uyu muhuro babaga ari abo mu rungano rwe .
Naho , ku musore ho nta birori nka ibi byabagaho .
Ku mpande zombi habagaho guhabwa impanuro zo kurushinga ariko ku mukobwa ntabwo na ubundi zanyuraga mu muhuro .
Uretse ibigega abaturage baturiye Sebeya bamaze guhabwa , hanatanzwe inka 285 muri 475 ziteganijwe muri uyu mushinga wo kubungabunga icyogogo cya uyu mugezi .
Sebeya yasenyeraga abayituriye ubu yatangiye kuzamura imibereho yabo .
Ubuyobozi bwatangaje ko kuba uyu mugezi wa Sebeya wari ikibazo abaturage batangiye kubonamo igisubizo kuko umushinga wo kubungabunga uyu mugezi umaze kuzamura imibereho ya abayituriye .
Nyirabarirushya Annonciata wo mu murenge wa Nyundo avuga ko nubwo umugezi wa Sebeya wamusenyeraga ubu ari mu bisubizo kuko bamukoreye amaterasi none bamuhaye na inka .
Ati " " " " Sebeya yaruzuraga ikantwarira ubutaka na imyaka aho nabaga nahinze , ubu ni ibyishimo kuko ubu umurima wanjye bawukozemo amaterasi ntaho ubutaka bwajya none bampaye na inka izajya impa ifumbire yo gushyira mu murima nta bihombo tuzongera kugira " " " " . " " " "
Semagambo Fabien wo mumurenge wa Kanama , yavuze ko nubwo asanzwe akora mu kubungabunga Sebeya ahembwa ashimishijwe cyane no guhabwa inka .
Ati " " " " Nahawe akazi mu kubungabunga umugezi wa Sebeya , bampembaga neza kuburyo nanjye mbona imibereho yarahindutse mu rugo none bampaye na inka ndishimye cyane nanjye ngiye kuyifata neza " " " " . " " " "
Umuyobozi ushinzwe imishinga mu muryango nyarwanda uharanira iterambere rya icyaro , RWARRI , Hitimana yavuze ko bafite intego yo gukangurira abantu kubungabunga umutungo wa amazi , kongerera ubushobozi abagenerwabikorwa no kuzamura imibereho myiza na ubukungu bya abaturage baturiye Sebeya .
Umuyobozi wa akarere ka Rubavu wungirije ushinzwe imari na iterambere rya ubukungu , Nzabonimpa Déogratias yabwiye abaturiye Sebeya ko amaterasi bubatse mu kuyibungabunga yatangiye gutanga umusaruro .
Ati " " " " Amaterasi mwaciye mu mezi make mu rwego rwo kubungabunga uyu mugezi , ndakeka mwatangiye gusarura mukaba murimo gukirigita ifaranga .
Izi nka nazo muhawe si iza nyuma ziracyaza , no mu minsi iri imbere na izindi zizaza zizasange izi mwarazifashe neza zarabyaye .
Ndashimira inzego mukorana hano mu mushinga wo kubungabunga icyogogo cya umugezi wa Sebeya kuko bigaragara ko ubuzima na imibereho yanyu byarahindutse . " " " "
" " " " Tugirane umuhigo ko mu myaka izi nka eshatu zizaba zikubye gatatu kandi birashoboka musabwa gukomeza urugendo rwo kuzifata neza " " " " . " " " "
Uyu mushinga wafashije ingo 782 kubaka uturima twa igikoni , abaturage barenga 11 , 000 babonye akazi , hakozwe amatsinda 194 yo kuzigama ubu bakaba bamaze kugeza kuri miliyoni zirenga 38 Frw .
Abaturage 18 . 000 babashije kwizigamira muri EJO HEZA amafaranga agera kuri miliyoni 120 .
Umushinga wo kubungabunga Imisozi na imicungire ikomatanyije ya umutungo kamere wa amazi muri Sebeya na ibindi byogogo ni uwa Leta ya u Rwanda ushyirwa mu bikorwa na Ikigo gishinzwe Umutungo Kamere wa amazi mu Rwanda ku bufatanye na Ikigo Mpuzamahanga kibungabunganga Ibidukikije , IUCN , Umuryango wa Abaholandi ushinzwe Iterambere ,
SNV , Umuryango Nyarwanda uharanira Iterambere rya Icyaro , RWARRI hamwe na Umuryango wa Abahinzi na Aborozi bo mu Rwanda IMBARAGA ku nkunga ya Ambasade ya Abaholandi mu Rwanda .
Ukorera mu Turere twa Rubavu , Nyabihu , Rutsiro na Ngororero two mu Ntara ya Iburengerazuba .
Abagore bahawe umukoro wo kurinda u Rwanda ingaruka zo kwangiza ibidukikije zirimo ubutayu .
Ibi iki kigo cyabitangaje ko kuwa 7 Werurwe 2021 mu biganiro na abantu batandukanye ku rubuga rwa Twitter mu rwego rwo kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga wa Umugore .
Ni ikiganiro cyitabiriwe na abagore batandukanye barimo ndetse na abahoze bakora mu nzego za ubuyobozi bafite mu nshingano kubungabunga ibidukikije ndetse na abandi bafite aho bahuriye na ibidukikije .
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa REMA , Kabera Juliet yavuze ko umugore ari umutima wa urugo bityo ko agomba kwigisha umuryango akamaro ka ibidukikije .
Ati " " " " Umugore afitanye isano rikomeye na ibidukikije kuko ni we uza ku isonga mu gucunga umutungo kamere urimo amazi na amashyamba . Yifashisha uyu mutungo kamere mu mirimo ye .
Umugore agomba kwigisha umuryango akamaro ka ibidukikije . " " " "
Yavuze ko abagore bagomba kugaragaza neza ingaruka zo kwangiza ibidukikije haba ku gihugu no ku muryango .
Akenshi ingaruka zo kwangiza ibidukikije zigera ku bagore cyane kurusha abagabo .
Nka iyo amashyamba yangijwe ibicanwa bikabura , abagore nibo bahababarira cyane bajya gushaka ibicanwa .
Kabera asubiza ikibazo cya uwari umubajije uburyo ki urubyiruko rukwiye gukangurirwa kubungabunga ibidukikije , yavuze ko urubyiruko ari abayobozi ba none ndetse na ejo hazaza bityo ko bakwiye kwigishwa no kugira ubunarararibonye mu kubungabunga ibidukikije .
Ati " " " " Urubyiruko ni abayobozi ba none ndetse na ejo hazaza kandi dukeneye kubaha ubumenyi ndetse no kubasangiza na ubunararibonye mu kubungabunga ibidukikije . " " " "
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Ikigega cyo kubungabunga ibidukikije ( FONERWA ) , Mugabo Teddy yakanguriye imiryango iyobowe n " " " " abagore kugira uruhare mu gutanga umusanzu wabo mu gucunga no kubungabunga umutungo kamere hagamijwe kurinda ihindagurika rya ikirere .
Ati " " " " Ndakangurira imiryango iyobowe na abagore gutanga umusanzu wabo mu gucunga no kubungabunga umutungo kamere habyazwa amahirwe ari muri gahunda zo zo guhangana no guhindagurika kwa ikirere . " " " "
Mu rwego rwo gukomeza gushyigikira umugore Ikigega cya Igihugu cyo kubungabunga ibidukikije FONERWA , cyatangaje ko abagore 14 . 500 bahawe akazi mu mirimo 9000 yahanzwe mu mushinga wa Green Gicumbi ugamije kubungabunga ibidukikije muri ako karere .
U Rwanda rwafashe ingamba zitandukanye zigamije kubungabunga ibidukikije mu ngeri zose harimo gutera amashyamba menshi no gusazura ahari , kubungabunga imigezi na ibishinga , kugabanya imyuka yoherezwa mu kirere na ibindi .
REMA yatangiye gutanga imbabura zirondereza ibicanwa zikanagabanya imyuka ihumanya ikirere .
Izo mbabura zirondereza ibicanwa zikanagabanya imyuka ihumanye yoherezwa mu kirere ziri gutangwa mu rwego rwo gushyira mu bikorwa intego za umushinga Green Amayaga wo gusubiranya igice cya Amayaga kikongera gutoha .
Kugeza ubu imbabura 4 , 000 zahawe abagenerwabikorwa ba umushinga mu Murenge wa Mugina mu Karere ka Kamonyi , mu rwego rwo kubafasha kurengera ubuzima bwabo , kugabanya itemwa rya amashyamba no kurengera ikirere hagabanywa ingano ya imyuka ihumanye icyoherezwamo .
Mu karere ka Kamonyi hazatangwa imbabura ibihumbi 11 harimo 4 , 000 zatanzwe mu Murenge wa Mugina , izindi 4 , 000 zizatangwa mu Murenge wa Nyamiyaga , 1 , 500 zizatangwa mu Murenge wa Nyarubaka ndetse na 1 , 500 zizatangwa mu Murenge wa Rugarika .
Mu tundi turere nka Gisagara , Nyanza na Ruhango gutanga izo mbabura bizatangira mu mwaka utaha wa ingengo ya imari wa 2021 / 2022 .
Mu turere twose uko ari tune umushinga ukoreramo hazatangwa Imbabura 60 , 000 mu gihe cya imyaka itandatu umushinga uzamara .
Biteganyijwe ko izo mbabura mu gihe cya imyaka itandatu zizagira uruhare mu kugabanya toni hafi miliyoni eshanu za imyuka ihumanye yoherezwa mu kirere , ikigo REMA kikagaragaza ko mu myaka 20 , izo mbabura zizaba zigabanyije toni zisaga miliyoni 15 za imyuka ihumanye yoherezwa mu kirere .
Imbabura zihabwa abagenerwabikorwa ba umushinga Green Amayaga zikora neza kuko igipimo cyazo ( thermal efficiency ) kiri hejuru ya 30 , ibi bigatuma zirondereza ibicanwa ku gipimo kiri hejuru ya 50 % ugereranyije na ibicanwa bikoreshwa mu mashyiga gakondo .
Umuhuzabikorwa wa uwo mushinga , Nkurunziza Philbert , avuga ko ibyo bizafasha kugera ku ntego za umushinga zo gusubiranya igice cya amayaga kikongera kugira amashyamba menshi , kuko izo mbabura zizatuma ibiti bidatemwa ku bwinshi hagamijwe gushaka ibicanwa nka uko byari bisanzwe .
Ati " " " " Izi mbabura kandi zizafasha mu guteza imbere ubukungu na imibereho myiza ya abaturage , kuko bitewe na uburyo irondereza ibicanwa , abazihawe bazabyaza umusaruro igihe kinini bamaraga bashaka ibicanwa , gikoreshwe mu yindi mirimo ibabyarira inyungu . " " " "
Umushinga Green Amayaga wo gusubiranya igice cya Amayaga ni uzakora ibikorwa bitandukanye birimo kurwanya isuri hacukurwa imiringoti , gutera no kuvugurura amashyamba , gutera ibiti bivangwa na imyaka no gutera ibiti bya imbuto hagamijwe kugabanya indwara ziterwa na imirire mibi .
Abagenerwabikorwa ba uwo mushinga bashima ibikorwa watangiye gukorera mu gice cya Amayaga , bakavuga ko bizabateza imbere abatuye muri icyo gice muri rusange na abagore bya umwihariko .
Nyiramana Jeannette utuye mu murenge wa Mugina agira ati " " " " Abagore dukunze kubazwa ibyerekeranye na imirimo myinshi yo mu rugo harimo na ibyo guteka .
Izi mbabura zizatuma tubona umwanya wo gukora ibiduteza imbere kuko batubwiye ko zikoresha udukwi duke cyane , ndetse ukaba wayicanisha na ibindi bintu byoroheje birimo na ibitiritiri bya ibigori . " " " "
Umushinga Green Amayaga ushyirwa mu bikorwa na ikigo cya Igihugu cyo kubungabunga ibidukikije ( REMA ) ku bufatanye na uturere twa Kamonyi , Nyanza , Ruhango na Gisagara ,
ugaterwa inkunga na ikigega mpuzamahanga gitera inkunga imishinga yo kubungabunga ibidukikije ( GEF ) binyuze mu ishami rya umuryango wa abibumbye rishinzwe iterambere ( UNDP ) .
Danny Mutabazi na Mahoro Berry batangiye umushinga wa ubukwe bwabo berekanwa mu rusengero rwa ADEPR Kumukenke kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 21 Werurwe .
Aba bombi bamaze imyaka ibiri bakundana .
Mahoro aririmba muri Korali yitwa Himbaza yo muri ADEPR Kacyiru .
Danny Mutabazi yabwiye IGIHE ko icyatumye ahitamo uyu mukunzi we ari uko yamunyuze .
Ati " " " " Impamvu ari we nahisemo ni uko ari we wanyuze umutima wanjye , nanyuzwe na urukundo rwe , cyane kubera indangagaciro zimuranga no guca bugufi . " " " "
Yavuze ko kumenyana na Berry byari mu muteguro wa Imana .
Ati " " " " Ni Imana yabinshoboje mu buryo bwa amarangamutima mbona birakwiye kandi umutima wanjye uranyuzwe cyane .
Cyari igihe cya Imana , twarahuye turahuza . " " " "

Musenyeri Sinayobye wa Diyosezi ya Cyangugu agiye kwimikwa
Tariki ya 6 Gashyantare 2021 nibwo Musenyeri Sinayobye yagizwe Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Cyangungu mu itangazo rya Papa Francis rimuha izo nshingano nyuma ya igihe ari Padiri akaba na Umuyobozi wa Seminari Nkuru ya i Nyumba .
Inama ya Abesipikopi Gatolika mu Rwanda igaruka ku gihembwe cya mbere cya umwaka wa 2021 , yateranye tariki 9 kugera ku ya 12 Werurwe , niyo yemeje ko mu byaganiriweho harimo na ibyo gutegura umuhango wa itangwa rya Ubwepisikopi .
Itangazo ryayo rigira riti " " " " Umunsi wa nyuma wa Inama wabaye uwo kwitegura imihango ya itangwa rya ubwepisikopi izabera i Cyangugu ku wa 25 Werurwe 2021 saa tatu na igice . " " " "
Diyosezi ya Cyangugu yari imaze imyaka ibiri iragijwe Musenyeri Hakizimana Célestin wayiyoboraga abifatanya no kuba umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Gikongoro kuko uwari musenyeri wayo Musenyeri Bimenyimana Jean Damascène yitabye Imana mu 2018 .
Musenyeri Sinayobye yavukiye mu Karere ka Gisagara tariki ya 20 Mata 1966 .
Yahawe Ubusaseridoti tariki ya 12 Kanama 2000 , yari asanzwe ari Umuyobozi wa Seminari ya i Nyumba .
Ni umuhanga wize isomo rizwi nka " " " " Logotherapie " " " " isobanurwa nka uburyo bwo kuzanzamura imbaraga karemano umuntu aba afite ziba zarazikamishijwe na ibyago yagiye ahura na byo .
Bikowa mu buryo bwa gihanga bwa ibiganiro ku buryo umuntu agarukane imbaraga mu buzima .
Jeff King yinjiranye amaraso mashya mu muziki wo kuramya Imana .
Uyu muhanzi utuye muri Texas yabwiye IGIHE ko ari gukora cyane kugira ngo abantu ba Imana bazahemburwe na ubutumwa abitse ku mutima kimwe na ubwo yamaze kubaha .
Yasabye Abanyarwanda bose kumushyigikira mu buryo bwose kugira ngo abashe kugera kure afashe isi kumva ubutumwa bwiza .
Ati " " " " Imana niyo imfasha muri byose , Imana niyo inyobora , Imana niyo muyobozi wanjye kandi ndashaka ko isi yose yumva ko Imana ariyo byose muri ubu buzima dufite hano ku isi .
Byansabye imbaraga nyinshi cyane kugira ngo mbashe kugera aho ndi ubu ariko nzi neza ko hari ahandi nkeneye kugera kandi nzabifashwamo na abakunzi ba indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana . " " " "
Yasabye abanyarwanda batandukanye bakunda umuziki cyane cyane uwo kuramya Imana gukomeza kumuha hafi no kumugira inama .
Uyu muhanzi amaze gukora indirimbo zitandukanye zirimo " " " " Tembea na Level Yako " " " " ndetse aheruka gushyira hanze iyo yise " " " " Icyubahiro . " " " "
Korali Elayono ya i Remera yasohoye indirimbo nshya ivuga ku mirimo ya Imana .
Indirimbo nshya ya Korali Elayono yitwa " " " " Imirimo . " " " "
Yashyizwe hanze nyuma ya ukwezi kumwe hatangajwe umushinga wo gusohora izigize album ya kabiri .
Mu magambo ayigize , abaririmbyi ba Korali Elayono bumvikana bahamagarira abantu bose " " " " kureba imirimo ya Imana . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa Abaririmbyi muri Korali Elayono , Mutoni Josiane , yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi ndirimbo itanga ubutumwa bushimangira gukomera kwa Imana kubera imirimo ikora itangaje .
Yagize ati " " " " Igitekerezo cya indirimbo gishingiye ku gukomera kwa Imana .
Kuko uwubaha Imana imukorera imirimo itangaje , hari ibitashobokaga ariko kubera ko urinzwe na Imana ikagira uko ibigenza neza .
Yubakiye ku nkuru ya ibyo Imana igukorera na we ukabona bitangaje , utabikekaga . " " " " " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko muri Korali Elayono hari ibyo babonaga bigoranye ariko Imana igaca inzira .
Ati " " " " Ibihe byose iyo turebye Imirimo Imana idukorera , tubona ihambaye kuko ku bwacu ntacyo twakwishoboza .
Uhereye kera warebaga ahazaza ha korali ukabona ntaho ariko Imana yahinduye amateka kubera kuyihanga amaso . " " " " " " " "
Korali Elayono yasohoye indirimbo ya kabiri ya amashusho mu zigera ku icumi ziri kuri album ya kabiri iteganya guha abakunzi na incuti za ibihangano byabo .
Uwera Sarah wo muri Ambassadors Of Christ yashyize hanze amashusho ya indirimbo ye ya mbere .
Iyi ndirimbo ya Uwera Sarah yayise " " " " Mwana wanjye . " " " "
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE ubwo yatangiraga urugendo rwo kuririmba ku giti cye , yavuze ko kuba yakora indirimbo wenyine yabitekereje biturutse ku buryo yaririmbiye umugabo we mu bukwe bwabo benshi bakanyurwa bakamusaba ko yatanga ubutumwa ku giti cye .
Yavuze ko agiye kuririmba ubutumwa bufasha benshi kugandukira Imana ari ko anatanga ubutumwa bwiza bugamije kubaka umuryango Nyarwanda .
Yagize ati " " " " Ntabwo bituma mpinduka , ngo mbe uwo ntari we [ . . . ] ngo bitume ngira uburyo mpindukamo .
Nzaguma ndi Sarah muzi muri Ambassadors , umwe uzi hano hanze uko umbona .
Niko ndi bugume . " " " "
Ku bijyanye no kuba gukora umuziki nka umuhanzi wigenga byazabangamira uko asanzwe aririmba muri Ambassadors of Christ , yavuze ko hatazabaho kugongana kandi ko muri korali batababuza gukoresha impano zabo ngo batange ubutumwa mu buryo bubanyuze .
Indirimbo ye ya mbere yayise " " " " Mwana wanjye . " " " "
Ni indirimbo yakoreye umwana we wa imfura nyuma ya imyaka ibiri arushinze na Kayumba Aimé .
Ubutumwa buri muri iyi ndirimbo bugusha ku gukangurira ababyeyi bose gufata neza no kwita ku bana kuko ari abatware kandi aribo bahanzwe amaso mu mpinduka zikenewe ku Isi no kuyubaka neza .
Yavuze ko gukorera amashusho iyi ndirimbo ari ibintu byamugoye kubera ibihe bya Guma mu rugo igihugu cyari kirimo .
Ati " " " " Gukorera amashusho indirimbo ntabwo byoroshye bisaba ubushishozi na ubwitonzi kugira ngo ube watanga ikintu kizima .
Njye numvaga bitazafata igihe ariko nasanze uko mbyibwira atari ko biri kuko bisaba ibintu byinshi birimo amafaranga na ibindi . " " " "
Aya marushanwa azakorwa mu byumweru bibiri azasozwa ku wa 25 Mutarama 2021 , abayitabiriye basabwa kugeza ibihangano ku Rwego Rushinzwe Intwari za Igihugu , Imidali na Impeta bya Ishimwe bifashishije uburyo butandukanye .

Imivugo na indirimbo bizagezwa kuri CHENO mbere ya tariki ya 25 Mutarama , bizatoranywamo bitanu bya mbere ku wa 26 Mutarama , ababikoze bakaba basabwa kugaragaza imbere ya itsinda ( presentation ) ndetse muri aba batanu ni ho hazatoranywamo batatu ba mbere , muri buri cyiciro ari nabo bazahembwa kandi ibihangano byabo bigatunganywa mu buryo bwa amajwi
na amashusho .
Imivugo itatu ya mbere izahembwa hagati ya ibihumbi 500 Frw na ibihumbi 300 Frw mu gihe indirimbo eshatu za mbere zizahembwa hagati ya ibihumbi 650 Frw na ibihumbi 950 Frw ( ni ukuvuga habariwemo ibihumbi 150 Frw byo kuzitunganya muri studio ) .
Imivugo na indirimbo byose bizakusanywa bizatoranywamo bitanu bya mbere na abakozi ba CHENO ku bufatanye na abakozi ba Minisiteri ya Urubyiruko na Umuco .
Imivugo itanu na indirimbo eshanu bizaba byatoranyijwe bizavugirwa imbere ya abagize itsinda rya ubukangurambaga rya Inteko ya CHENO ku matariki azagenwa , rihitemo imivugo na indirimbo eshatu bya mbere ari nabyo bizahabwa ibihembo .
Umuvugo mwiza na indirimbo nziza byitezweho gusingiza Intwari za u Rwanda mu byiciro byazo ( Imanzi , Imena na Ingenzi ) , gukomoza ku bikorwa byaranze Intwari za u Rwanda na icyo buri Munyarwanda cyane cyane urubyiruko akwiye kwigira ku Ntwari , kwerekana indangagaciro za umuco wa ubutwari , kwigisha , gususurutsa
na injyana inogeye amatwi , Ikinyarwanda kinoze na ubuhanga mu buvanganzo .
Biseruka Joshua yatoranyijwe guhagararira u Rwanda mu imurikabikorwa rya ubugeni ku Isi .
Muri iri murikabikorwa , buri gihugu gihagarariwe na umunyabugeni umwe ndetse na igihangano kimwe .
Iri murikabikorwa ribaye ku nshuro yaryo ya mbere ryatangajwe mu Ukuboza 2020 abanyabugeni bo mu bihugu byose batanga ibihangano byagombaga gutoranywamo kimwe gihiga ibindi muri buri gihugu hagendewe ku nsanganyamatsiko yo gusakaza ubutumwa bwa amahoro na ibyishimo ku Isi .
Biseruka avuga ko abanyabugeni ba Abanyarwanda bitabiriye gutanga ibihangano byabo bagendeye ku butumire bwemereraga ibihugu bigize Umuryango wa Afurika ya Iburasirazuba kwitabira .
Ati " " " " Njyewe ubutumire bwangezeho habura iminsi itanu , ubundi mbusangiza abandi harimo abashushanya , abakora ibihangano mu biti , mu ibumba na ibindi kugira ngo turebe ko hari umunyamahirwe ushobora kuvamo agahagararira igihugu cyacu . " " " " " " " "
Uyu musore yahiriwe no kuba igihangano cye ari cyo cyatoranyijwe mu Rwanda , ni kimwe mu bishushanyo bigize amashusho mbarankuru ( graphic novel ) ya igitabo ari kwandika cyerekeye imibereho ya Abanyarwanda mu buzima bwa buri munsi muri iki gihe , aho icyo gishushanyo cyerekana mu Mujyi wa Kigali ahazwi nko kuri City Tower .
Ucyitegereje ntabwo wahita wumva isano gifitanye na insanganyamatsiko yo gusakaza ubutumwa bwa amahoro na ibyishimo ku Isi imurikabikorwa ryubakiyeho ariko iyo agisobanuye uhita ubyumva .
Agira ati " " " " Kiriya gihangano gihuye na insanganyamatsiko cyane .
Kubera ko cyerekana uburyo u Rwanda ari igihugu gikataje mu kwiyubaka kandi mu mahoro na umutekano , bisobanuye ko ahantu hari amahoro na abanyabugeni babasha gutembera ndetse bakabika imibereho ya igihugu mu bihangano . " " " " " " " "
" " " " Iyi shusho yakozwe mu buryo budasanzwe bumenyerewe mu Rwanda aho umuntu ashushanya ahantu na ibintu ako kanya , [ live sketch ] ntabwo rero wajya gushushanya ahantu nka uko hatari amahoro .
Ntekereza ko biri mu byo bashingiyeho kugira ngo kijye guhagararira igihugu cyane ko umuntu wese uzi u Rwanda arebye iyi shusho ahita amenya ko ari mu rwa imisozi igihumbi . " " " "
Icyo gihangano giherekejwe na ibindi byinshi byerekena Abanyarwanda mu mirimo yabo ya buri munsi mu mahoro na ubwisanzure bwa buri wese .
Biseruka avuga ko ayo mashusho yose azasohoka muri icyo gitabo ari gutegura .
Ati " " " " Uretse rero njye nka umunyabugeni , abantu bose bakeneye amahoro kuko iyo hari amahoro iterambere rya buri muntu rirashoboka . " " " "
Iri murikabikorwa ryatangiye muri Mutarama rizarangira muri Werurwe 2021 niryo rya mbere rihuje abanyabugeni ba Isi yose .
Ryateguwe na Umuryango mpuzamahanga uteza imbere Ubugeni , IARF ( International Artists Radart Foundation ) riri gukorwa hifashishijwe .
Rugwizangoga yasohoye " " " " Tales of Fairytales , " " " " igitabo gikubiyemo ibisigo byomora abababajwe mu rukundo .
Iki gitabo cyanditse mu rurimi rwa Icyongereza , Rugwizangoga avuga ko ibikubiyemo bishingiye ku byamubayeho na ibyo yagiye abona mu buzima busanzwe .
Yabwiye IGIHE ko yacyanditse ashaka guhumuriza abahura na ibizazane mu rukundo , rimwe na rimwe bakaba bacika intege .
Yagize ati " " " " Ubutumwa nifuza gutanga ni ubwa uko urukundo na ubwo rushobora kuba rubabaza ariko atari ko gucika intege ahubwo ari ukwizera kandi ugakomera kuko urukundo ruriho kandi buri wese yarubona . " " " "
Ibijyanye na urukundo si kenshi bikunze kwandikwaho ibitabo cyane cyane mu Rwanda .
Rugwizangoga yavuze ko nabyo biri mu byamuteye imbaraga zo kwandika .
Ati " " " " Nabonye abanditsi benshi batabyandikaho , ndavuga nti uwabikora nkareba ko nakora igitabo abantu benshi bakibonamo kandi bikaba byaba ari intandaro yo gutinyuka kwa abandi bandika . " " " "
Uyu musore avuga ko ibyo gusoma no kwandika yatangiye kubikunda akiri muto dore ko umubyeyi we yabimukundishaga .
Umuhanzi Rugamba Cyprien ni we afatiraho icyitegererezo .
Igitabo Tales of Fairytales " " " " kuri ubu kiboneka ku rubuga rwa Amazon , icyakora Rugwizangoga avuga ko vuba aha kizaba kiboneka mu nzu zicuruza ibitabo mu Rwanda .
Kuki Ababiligi batifuzaga ko Abanyarwanda benshi batura mu mijyi ?
Nubwo imyinshi muri iyi mijyi itanga icyizere kuri ubu kubera ibikorwa bya iterambere bikomeje kuyikwirakwizwamo , mu myaka ijana ishize ubwo yashingagwa siko yari imeze , ndetse imwe yari inkambi , insisiro cyangwa udusantere tudashinga twabonwaga na bamwe nka utw igihe gito .
Byinshi mu bihugu bya Afurika byagiye bikolonizwa na Abanyaburayi , ikintu bagiye bashyira imbere ni uguteza imbere imijyi no kuyishishikariza abaturage gakondo bari bamenyereye kwibera ku misozi .
Icyakora , inyandiko zitandukanye za amateka zigaragaza ko mu Rwanda atari ko byagenze bya umwihariko nyuma ya uko Abadage birukanywe mu gihugu guhera mu 1916 bagasimburwa na Ababiligi .
Igitabo " " " " Ibitaramo ku mateka ya u Rwanda " " " " cya Zephrin Kagiraneza kivuga ko Ababiligi bamaze kugera mu Rwanda batigeze bashaka guteza imbere imijyi cyane .
Bageze mu Rwanda umujyi ugaragara uhari ari Kigali ariko nayo nta bidasanzwe yari ifite uretse inzu ya Richard Kandt , Umudage wahoze ari na Rezida wa u Rwanda .
Mu gihe Abadage bamaze mu Rwanda kandi , bashinze inkambi za gisirikare zitandukanye mu gihugu .
Aho bagiye bazishingaga , Kagiraneza agaragaza ko ariho nyuma hagiye haba imwe mu mijyi u Rwanda rufite ubu .
Mu Ruhengeri inkambi bayihashinze mu 1903 , Gisenyi bayihashyira mu 1907 , Kigali ihajya mu 1908 , Gatsibo ihashyirwa mu 1913 naho muri Cyangungu bayishinga mu 1914 .
Izo nkambi za gisirikare zagendaga zikurura ibikorwa bimwe na bimwe nka ubucuruzi bwa ibyo abasirikare babaga bakeneye , bigatuma bamwe batangira kuhatura .
Abadage bamaze kugenda , Ababiligi ntabwo bashyize imbaraga mu gukundisha Abanyarwanda kujya mu mijyi , bitandukanye na uko babikoze mu bindi bihugu nka Congo Mbiligi .
Kagiraneza mu gitabo cye yagize ati " " " " Ababiligi ntibigeze bashaka guteza imijyi imbere .
Abanyarwanda bavaga mu giturage bakajya mu mijyi babasoreshaga inshuro eshatu za umusoro usanzwe .
Nka umujyi wa Kigali , mu 1916 wari utuwe na abantu batarenze 700 barimo abakora mu bucuruzi , abazungu bane , abarabu nka 60 , na abaswahili nka 350 . " " " "
Uko kudakunda ko Abanyarwanda bava mu byaro bajya mu mijyi , Ababiligi ngo baba barabisabwe na abamisiyoneri .
Kubera ko imijyi yabagamo abayisilamu benshi , Abamisiyoneri ngo bumvaga ko nibemerera abantu benshi kujya mu mijyi bashobora kuzahinduka Abayisilamu , Idini ya Islam igakwira mu Rwanda , Kiliziya igatakaza abayoboke .
Baba Abanyagatolika na Abaporotestanti kandi barwanyaga ko Abanyarwanda abenshi bahinduka abayisilamu .
Bimwe mu byatumaga babirwanya harimo umuco wa abayisilamu wo kuba kuzana abagore benshi ntacyo bitwaye , ikintu batifuzaga kuko byari bihabanye na inyigisho zabo , bigahura na ibyari bisanzwe mu muco Nyarwanda byo guhagarika kandi abamisiyoneri aribyo bashakaga guca .
Leta nayo yagiye ikora ibishoboka byose ngo Abayisilamu bature ukwabo bativanga na abaturage basanzwe .
Nko muri Kigali bashyiriweho inkambi yabo mu Biryogo , izindi zishyirwa Rwamagana , ku Gisenyi , Cyangugu na ahandi .
Mu mwaka wa 1956 nibwo Inama Nkuru ya igihugu iyobowe na Umwami Mutara II Rudahigwa yakuyeho izo nkambi , itegeka ko Abayisilamu bavangwa na abandi baturage .
Ababiligi bashatse uburyo bwo gukomakoma abashakaga kujya gucururiza mu abahaga hafatwa nka imijyi , babaremera amasoko bazajya bacururizamo bakahubaka amaduka .
Mu mwaka wa 1940 nibwo ayo masoko yatangiye kubakwa ageze ku icumi , atuma abashaka guhahirana babona aho guhahira bitabagoye kandi batiriwe bajya mu mijyi .
Mu nyandiko ya Dalmasso Etienne na Pierre Sirven bise " " " " La Sous - Urbanisation et les villes du Rwanda et du Burundi , " " " " bavuga ko ahanini ahagiye hazamuka imijyi mu Rwanda habaga hari ibindi bikorwa bya iterambere nka ubutegetsi bwa gikoloni , ibikorwa bya ubucukuzi bwa amabuye ya agaciro , ubucuruzi na ibindi .
Kubera kudashishikariza Abanyarwanda kugana imijyi cyane , u Rwanda rwabonye ubwigenge mu 1962 Umujyi wa Kigali utuwe na abatarenze 5000 .
U Rwanda rwabonye ubwigenge Umujyi wa Butare ariwo urimo ibikorwa byinshi bya iterambere ariko Kigali ihabwa amahirwe menshi kuko wari umujyi uri hagati .
Nubwo nyuma ya ubwigenge hashyizwe imbaraga mu guteza imbere twa dusantere na ahahoze inkambi zikavamo imijyi , Sirven na Dalmasso bagaragaza ko kugeza mu 1984 nibura 3 . 5 % bya Abanyarwanda aribo bari batuye mu mijyi .
Bitandukanye no muri Congo kuko muri icyo gihe 50 % bya abaturage bari batuye mu mijyi .
Abo banditse bavuga ko ubwiyongere bwa abaturage mu mijyi yo mu Rwanda ahanini butagiye buterwa na imbaraga Leta yashyiragamo mu kubibashishikariza ahubwo byaturukaga ahanini ku igabanuka rya ubutaka bwari butunze Abanyarwanda benshi , urubyiruko rukajya mu mujyi nka uburyo bwo kujya gushaka imibereho .
Mu 1990 , Umujyi wa Kigali wari wihariye 61 % bya abari batuye mu mijyi icyo gihe .
30 % bya abakozi ba Leta bose babaga muri Kigali , 75 % bya ibigo bya imari niho byabarizwaga , 60 % bya imodoka zari mu gihugu na 60 % byinganda .
Umubano wa ibihugu byombi watangiye kuzamba guhera mu 2014 ubwo Karegeya Patrick wabaye mu Ngabo za u Rwanda , yicirwaga muri Afurika ya Epfo , mu cyumba cya hotel ya Mischelangelo mu ijoro ryo rishyira ku wa 1 Mutarama 2014 .
Karegeya afatwa nka umwe mu bashinze Umutwe wa RNC uyoborwa na Kayumba Nyamwasa , umutwe washinjwe uruhare mu bitero bya grenade zatewe mu bice bitandukanye cyane cyane mu Mujyi wa Kigali , guhera mu 2009 .
Urupfu rwe rwakurikiwe na umwijima mu mubano wa Afurika ya Epfo na u Rwanda , abayobozi ba icyo gihugu barwitirira abantu boherejwe na u Rwanda nubwo nta na rimwe mu rukiko biragaragazwa isano ya abishe Karegeya na Guverinoma ya u Rwanda .
Mu 2014 Afurika ya Epfo yahagaritse bya agateganyo visa ku Banyarwanda berekezayo bakoresheje pasiporo zisanzwe .
Icyo gihe iki gihugu cyirukanye abadipolomate ba u Rwanda batatu i Pretoria , narwo rwirukana batandatu ba Afurika ya Epfo i Kigali .
U Rwanda rwashinjaga Afurika ya Epfo gucumbikira abari inyuma yo gutera ibisasu mu gihugu , byahitanye inzirakarengane , Afurika ya Epfo yo yarushinje kuba inyuma ya igitero abantu bitwaje intwaro bagabye ku rugo rwa Kayumba muri icyo gihugu .
Uyu wahoze ari Jenerali mu Ngabo za u Rwanda yanabereye Umugaba Mukuru , mu 2011 Urukiko Rukuru rwa Gisirikare rwamukatiye adahari , igifungo cya imyaka 24 no kwamburwa impeta za gisirikare .
Rwari rumaze kumuhamya ibyaha birimo kurema umutwe wa iterabwoba , kubangamira umutekano wa igihugu , kurema amacakubiri no gutoroka igisirikare .
Afurika ya Epfo iracyacumbikiye Kayumba Nyamwasa ukuriye RNC na Umutwe wa Abarwanyi wa P5 , uhuriweho na amashyaka atanu arwanya Leta ya u Rwanda .
Uyu mutwe wakomeje gutegura ibikorwa bigamije guhungabanya umutekano wa u Rwanda no kugirira nabi ubutegetsi buriho ndetse bamwe mu bari bawugize barimo umuyobozi wabo Rtd Major Mudathiru Habib , barimo kuburanishwa na inkiko za Gisirikare mu Rwanda , nyuma yo gufatwa na Ingabo za RDC , abandi bakishyikiriza MONUSCO .
Kugeza ubu kandi Abanyarwanda bakomeje kugorwa no kubona visa zo kwerekeza muri Afurika ya Epfo .
U Rwanda mu bihugu bishobora kujya byoherezwamo abasabye ubuhungiro muri Denmark .
Mu bihugu biri kunugwanugwaho koherezwamo izo mpunzi birimo u Rwanda , Eritrea na ibindi .
The Guardian yatangaje ko iryo tegeko ryatowe na abadepite 70 kuri 24 baryanze .
Iri tegeko rizaha icyo gihugu ububasha bwo kwakira abasaba ubuhungiro ariko bakoherezwa mu kindi gihugu gifitanye amasezerano ya imikoranire .
Umuvugizi mu kigo gishinzwe abinjira muri Denmark , Rasmus Stoklund yagize ati " " " " Nuramuka usabye ubuhungiro muri Denmark ugomba kumenya ko uzoherezwa mu kindi gihugu kitari mu Burayi .
Twizeye ko bizahagarika umubare wa abantu basaba ubuhungiro muri Denmark . " " " "
Icyo gihugu cyatangaje ko kikiganira na ibindi bihugu bishobora kuzajya byoherezwamo abasabye ubuhungiro .
Muri Mata uyu mwaka Minisitiri ushinzwe abimukira , Mattias Tesfaye yagiriye uruzinduko mu Rwanda , rwasojwe hasinywe amasezerano ya ubufatanye hagati ya ibihugu byombi , azibanda ku guteza imbere ubufatanye mu ngeri zirimo politiki no kwita ku bibazo bya impunzi .
Denmark ni kimwe mu bihugu byasabye ko hongerwa ubufasha mu nkambi yakira abimukira bavuye muri Libya iherereye i Gashora mu Rwanda .
Bamwe mu badashyigikiye iryo tegeko rishya rya Denmark bavuze ko kohereza abimukira mu bihugu bidafite amikoro ahagije , bizabangamira imibereho myiza yabo na umutekano .
Umubare wa abasaba ubuhungiro muri Denmark ukomeje kugabanyuka uko imyaka ishira , aho wavuye ku basaba 21000 mu 2015 bagera ku 1500 umwaka ushize .
Umuzi wa amakimbirane yatumye Abadepite Nyafurika barwanira mu Nteko ; Abanyarwanda bari he ? .
Ni amashusho ababikurikiraniraga hafi babonaga ko ashoboka nyuma ya izindi mvururu zabaye kuwa kane wa icyumweru gishize , ubwo Julius Malema umwe mu bahagarariye Afurika ya Epfo yumvikanaga abwira mugenzi we wo muri Mali ko nibasohoka araza kumwica .
Uwo munsi amahirwe ni uko inteko rusange yasubitswe kuko hari umwe mu bakozi ba Inteko wagaragayeho icyorezo cya Covid - 19 .
Imirimo ya Inteko yasubukuwe kuwa Mbere tariki 31 Gicurasi , noneho biba bibi kurushaho , bamwe bararwana ndetse umwe mu badepite bo muri Afurika ya Epfo , Pemmy Majodina akubitwa umugeri na mugenzi we wo muri Sénégal .
Izi mvururu zimaze iminsi muri PAP intango yazo ni ukutumvikana ku buryo bwo gutora Perezida mushya wa iyo Nteko Ishinga Amategeko na ibyegera bye ( ba Visi Perezida bane ) .
Abadepite bo muri Afurika ya Amajyepfo bamaganye uburyo bwo gutora bwari busanzweho , aho Perezida yatorwaga hagendewe ku bwiganze bwa amajwi , bagasaba ko atorwa hagendewe ku gusimburana bishingiye ku turere .
Ni ukuvuga ngo niba uwo muri Afurika ya Amajyepfo asoje manda , agasimburwa na uwo mu Burasirazuba , agasimburwa na uwo mu Burengeraziba , uwo mu Majyaruguru , uwo muri Afurika yo hagati gutyo gutyo .
Depite Izabiriza Marie Médiatrice ni umwe mu badepite na abasenateri batanu bahagarariye u Rwanda muri PAP .
Mu mvururu zazamutse kuwa Kane wa icyumweru gishize , yari ari mu nteko rusange icyakorwa kuwa Mbere wa iki Cyumweru ntabwo imvururu zabaye abo mu Rwanda babashije kuzikurikira kubera izindi nshingano za Inteko Ishinga Amategeko mu Rwanda bagomba kuzuza .
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE , Izabiriza yavuze ko ikibazo gikomeye gihari ari uko amasezerano avuguruye ashyiraho PAP ataremezwa burundu na ibihugu bigize AU .
Ayo masezerano niyo arimo uburyo buhamye bwa uburyo uyoboye PAP atorwa hashingiwe ku gusimburana ka uturere tugize AU .
PAP ikijyaho mu 2004 , Perezida wayo yatorwaga binyuze mu bwiganze busesuye icyakorwa abamwungirije bo bagatorwa hashingiwe ku tundi turere twa Afurika .
Ni ukuvuga ko muri Komite ya PAP , buri karere kabaga gahagarariwe ariko umwanya wa Perezida ukaba ushobora kuguma mu maboko ya akarere kamwe imyaka na imyaka bitewe na uko ari we utorwa iyo igihe cya amatora kigeze .
Ibyo byatumye mu myaka 17 iyi Nteko imaze , nta we urayiyobora aturutse muri Afurika ya Amajyepfo .
Izabiriza yavuze ko nubwo amasezerano avuguruye ya PAP agena ko gutora Perezida mushya bishingira ku gusimburana ka uturere , bamwe mu bagize Inteko babyanze bavuga ko hakwiriye gukomeza uburyo bwo kwiyamamaza busanzwe utowe na benshi akayobora , bitwaje ko amasezerano ya PAP ataremezwe na ibihugu .
Kugira ngo ayo masezerano azatangira gukurikizwa , bizasaba ko yemezwa burundu na ibihugu 28 bigize AU , nyamara kugeza ubu ibimaze kuyemeza ntibirenga bitanu .
Izabiriza yavuze ko nubwo amasezerano atari yagasinywe , mu nteko bari bumvikanye ko mu gihe cyo gutora bajya bakurikiza ibiyarimo bya uko Perezida wa Inteko atorwa hagendewe ku gusimburana ka uturere .
Ati " " " " Ubushize ka ucyuye igihe nabwo twaratoye ugize amajwi menshi aba ari we ujyaho , yari kuri manda ye ya kabiri .
Nabwo haje izo mpaka bidufata umwanya ariko abantu baza kuvuga bati nibatore utsinda atorwe .
Ni uko arongera aratsinda ariko ubu noneho baravuga bati birakabije ntabwo byakongera . " " " "
" " " " Haje kuba amahane nka ariya ariko yo ntabwo yakabije byageze nyuma umutuzo uraboneka ariko tukavuga tuti ntabwo ubutaha ibintu bikwiriye kugenda gutyo [ . . . ] Induru mwabonye , amahane mwabonye byatewe ahanini na icyo kintu cyo kutumvikana ku gusimburana . " " " "
Nubwo bari bemeje ko mu 2021 amatora azaba meza kurushaho bagatora hashingiwe ku gusimburana ka uturere , ntabwo byubahirijwe nanone .
Haje kuboneka bamwe mu bagize Inteko batabyemera bya umwihariko abo muri Afurika ya Iburengerazuba bashaka ko hakomeza gukurikizwa uburyo bwari busanzwe , utowe na benshi akayobora .
Abadepite bo muri Afurika ya Amajyepfo bashinja abo mu Burengerazuba na abo mu Burasirazuba kwitambika uwo mugambi , kuko bazi ko ari benshi nibatora mu buryo busesuye , umukandida wabo ari we uzatsinda .
" " " " Ntabwo turi kureba inyungu za Afurika " " " "
Kugeza ubu abakandida bashaka iyo ntebe ya Perezida wa Inteko , hari uwo muri Zimbabwe , uwa Sudani ya Epfo na uwo muri Mali .
Hari Komite ya PAP ishinzwe ibya amatora ariko nayo yananiwe gufata umurongo wumvikanwaho na bose kuri iyo ngingo ari nabyo bikomeje guteza imvururu .
Izabiriza yavuze ko hari abantu ku giti cyabo bakomeje kubangamira ubwo bwumvikane bwari bwabayeho bwo gusimburana , ku buryo bitakwitirirwa agace kose cyangwa igihugu .
Ati " " " " Ni ikibazo cya imyumvire kikiri aho abantu bagakwiriye guca bugufi bakumvikana [ . . . ] Ikibazo tugifite ni izo nyungu zo kwireba , ntabwo turi kureba inyungu za Afurika .
Ntiwanavuga ngo ni iza igihugu , ni inyungu za umuntu uri aho adashaka ngo yumvikane . " " " "
Mu kwirinda ko imvururu zifata indi ntera , Perezida wa Komisiyo ya AU , Moussa Faki Mahamat , kuwa Kabiri tariki 1 Kamena yahagaritse imirimo ya PAP mu gihe cya ukwezi , kugira ngo habanze hashakwe uburyo amatora yategurwa neza .
Iyo habaye ibibazo nka ibi , Komisiyo ishinzwe amategeko , ubudahangarwa na imyitwarire ifata umwanya ikajya kwiga kuri ibyo bibazo , ikazatanga raporo mu nteko rusange .
Izabiriza yavuze ko hategerejwe icyo iyo Komisiyo izatangaza .
Ati " " " " Buriya kandi na AU nka urwego rukuriye PAP ruragira icyo ruganira bazatange umurongo . " " " "
Icyakora , nubwo hafatwa umwanzuro runaka , ntabwo uzaba ukemuye ikibazo burundu mu gihe cyose ibihugu bitaremeza burundu amasezerano ashyiraho PAP .
Ati " " " " Kwemeza amasezerano burundu nicyo cyakemura ibibazo [ . . . ] Hagati aho turategereje ariko no mu gihe tugitegereje nta mpaka zagakwiriye kubaho twarabyemeranyijeho .
Ni ibintu byagakwiriye kumvikanwaho bitageze muri ziriya mpaka zingana kuriya . " " " "
Kuba amasezerano ashyiraho PAP yasinywa , ntibyakemura imvururu zo mu matora ya abayobozi ba Inteko gusa , ahubwo byitezweho no guharurira inzira PAP ikaba inteko ihoraho ikora nka uko izindi zo mu bihugu zikora .
Kuri ubu uru rwego rufatwa nka ngishwanama muri AU .
Ruterana rimwe na rimwe si nka inteko zisanzwe kubera ko rutaremererwa gukora umunsi ku munsi kuko amasezerano atarasinywa .
Ati " " " " Dufitiye icyizere sosiyete ya Ampersand , turizera ko igihe ari iki .
Twishimiye gufatanya na Ampersand nka sosiyete yatangiriye mu Rwanda igakomeza no mu bindi bihugu bya Afurika ya Iburasirazuba . " " " "
" " " " Twizera ko gukoresha amashanyarazi mu binyaziga bya amapine abiri cyangwa atatu mu bihugu bikiri mu nzira ya amajyambere bigira ingaruka nziza ku mihindagurikire ya ikirere ndetse bikanongera umwuka mwiza mu mijyi iberamo urujya na uruza rwa ibintu byinshi . " " " "
Ampersand niyo ikora batiri nini zishyirwa muri moto kugira ngo ibashe gukoresha ingufu za amashanyarazi , aho ikura ibikoresho bya ibanze hanze ya igihugu zigateranyirizwa mu Rwanda ndetse ifite station zabugenewe aho izo moto zishyirirwamo umuriro .
Kuva Ampersand yatangira ibikorwa byayo muri Gicurasi mu 2019 , imaze kugira abamotari bakoresha moto za amashanyarazi bagera kuri 35 , bakoze ingendo za kilometero miliyoni 1 . 4 ndetse hari na abandi 7000 bifuza gukorana na abo .
Ubu iyi sosiyete irateganya kwagura ibikorwa byayo muri Kenya ahari isoko rya moto nyinshi , aho mu 2019 hagaragaye ko hakorera moto zirenga ibihumbi 210 .
Nyuma ya imyaka irenga 15 , Yahoo Answers igiye guhagarikwa .
Ibi byatangajwe na sosiyete ikora ibijyanye na itumanaho ya Verizon isigaye icunga urubuga rwa Yahoo Answers nyuma yo kugura Yahoo mu 2017 .
Yavuze ko uru rubuga ruzahagarikwa ku itariki 4 Gicurasi 2021 , mu gihe guhera tariki 20 Mata abakoresha uru rubuga batazongera kubasha kwandika babaza ibibazo cyangwa basubiza , ahubwo ikizaba gishoboka ari ugusoma ibyanditseho gusa .
Yahoo yatangaje ko abakunzi ba Yahoo Answers bazabasha gukuraho " " " " download " " " " ibibazo bya abo na ibisubizo basubijwe kugeza tariki 30 Kamena , gusa ntawe uzemererwa gukora download ya ibibazo bya abandi na ibisubizo byabyo .
Yongeyeho iti " " " " Yahoo Answers yari imwe muri serivisi Yahoo itanga , ariko uko imyaka yagiye ihita abayikoresha baragabanutse , duhitamo kuyifunga kugira ngo dushyire imbaraga mu bindi bikorwa byacu . " " " "
Yahoo Answers yari urubuga ruha buri wese ubwisanzure bwo kubaza ibibazo bitandukanye , yaba ibizima cyangwa ibidafite ishingiro , mu nzego zose yaba amateka , politiki , ubuzima , ibitabo na ibindi .

nkamenya niba yanciye inyuma ? . " " " "
