Ku rundi ruhande , mu gihe ubuzima twari tumenyereye kubamo busa nka ubwahindutse bitewe na iki cyorezo , abenshi ubu bahindukije amaso , bayerekeza ku ikoranabuhanga na murandasi ( internet ) .
Kuva ku bato na abakuru , ubu ibikorwa byinshi bisigaye bikorwa hifashishijwe murandasi , mu buryo buteye imbere cyane tutashoboraga kwiyumvisha mu myaka micye ishize .
Ubu aho kugira ngo umuntu yicarane na inshuti na umuryango imbonankubone , aho baganira kandi bagahuza urugwiro , bahurira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ndetse bakaganira bifashishije ikoranabuhanga rya video .
Bitandukanye na mbere ya Covid - 19 , ubu abantu bari gukorera mu rugo , bagakurukirana amasomo , bakaruhuka ndetse bakanakora ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye , byose kubera murandasi na ibikoresho bya ikoranabuhanga nka telefoni na mudasobwa bisigaye biboneka mu buryo bworoshye .
Gusa nta byera ngo de !
Kuko uko turushaho gukenera no gukoresha Ikoranabuhanga cyane , ni ko na ibyago birikomokaho birushaho kwiyongera .
Uko imibare ya abakoresha murandasi irushaho kwiyongera , ni ko abayikoresha mu gukora ibyaha na ihohotera barushaho kubona uburyo bushya bwo kuturiganya , kutwiba ndetse no kutugirira nabi .
Ariko se dusubije amaso inyuma , twaba tumaze kumenyera ibyo byago byose ku buryo twumva nta ngaruka zikomeye byatugiraho ?
Mu gihe nta bukangurambaga bubayeho , twese dushobora kugerwaho na izo ngaruka .
Ibi bishobora kutugiraho ingaruka zinyuranye zirimo kubangamirwa , uburakari , agahinda gakabije , kumva wanze abantu ndetse rimwe na rimwe ukaba wanagambirira kwigirira nabi , bishobora no gutuma wiyahura .
Gusa ku bwa amahirwe , hari imiryango igenda ivuka hirya no hino ku Isi , igamije kudufasha kumenya ibyo byago ndetse na uburyo bwo kubyirinda .
Umwe muri iyo miryango witwa " " " " Get Safe Online Rwanda . " " " "
Ku bufatanye na Minisiteri ya Ikoranabuhanga no Guhanga Ibishya ( MINICT ) ndetse na Ikigo cya Igihugu Gishinzwe Ikoranabuhanga mu Itumanaho na Isakazabumenyi ( RISA ) , uyu muryango watangije ubukangurambaga mu gihugu hose muri Nyakanga 2020 [ bugamije gufasha Abanyarwanda kugira ubumenyi buhagije mu bya ikoranabuhanga ] .
Abantu benshi bakoresha murandasi , ntibumva ubushobozi bwa ingaruka ishobora kubagiraho .
Abenshi ntibumva ko iyo ukanze " " " " button " " " " cyangwa ka kamenyetso ko kohereza ubutumwa , ifoto cyangwa ubutumwa wohereje buba bugiye ku Isi hose , kandi umuntu akaba yabufata akabuhindura , cyangwa akabukwirakwiza ahandi kure , ku buryo uramutse ushatse ko buvaho , nka igihe ukuze ariko ugasanga ibyo wakoze ukiri
umwana ntibifututse , bishobora kukugora gukuraho bwa butumwa .
Uretse no kuba abakoresha bacu , abo dushobora kuzashaka , ndetse na imiryango yacu bashobora kubona ibyo dukorera kuri murandasi , abakoreraho ibyaha nabo bashobora gukusanya amakuru yacu bakayifashisha badukorera uburiganya , batwiba cyangwa se badutera ubwoba bagamije inyungu runaka .
Kuri iyi ngingo , abantu benshi bakunze kwibeshya no gutekereza ko uburiganya bwo kuri murandasi bukorerwa abandi bantu gusa , bakishyiramo ko bo bitabareba , gusa ibi ni ukwibeshya .
Ku muntu wese udafashe ingamba zifatika zo kwirinda , aba ashobora kugira ibyago birimo kuriganywa , kandi imibare yerekana ko ibi byaha biri kwiyongera mu Rwanda .
Nko kuva muri Mutarama kugera muri Nzeri 2020 , abantu 141 bakorewe ibikorwa bya uburiganya bikorerwa kuri murandasi , kandi ibyo bikorwa byari bigamije kwiba miliyoni 371 Frw .
Miliyoni 89 zaragarujwe naho arenga miriyoni 280 Frw aribwa , ba nyirayo barahomba burundu .
Ni gute ubujura bwo kuri murandasi bukorwa ?
Muri bimwe mu byaha bikorwa kuri murandasi byagaragaye cyane mu mwaka wa 2020 , harimo gushuka abantu hagamijwe kubiba amakuru .
Ibi bikorwa binyuze mu kohereza ubutumwa bwa " " " " email " " " " bushukana , kwifashisha amagambo ya ibanga ( passwords ) adafite imbaraga ndetse na ubujura bwifashisha simukadi .
Imibare itangwa na Urwego rwa Igihugu rwa Ubugenzacyaha , RIB , igaragaza ko mu mezi atatu u Rwanda rwamaze muri gahunda ya " " " " Guma mu Rugo , " " " " ibyaha bikorerwa kuri murandasi byiyongereye , ku buryo amafaranga yabigendeyemo yiyongereye ku kigero cya 72 % .
Bamwe mu bantu bakorerwa ibi byaba bakunda kubihisha , bitewe na uko bacyeka ko biteye ipfunwe , kandi ibi bituma ikibazo kirushaho gukomera .
Kugira ngo ubeho utekanye , ukwiriye kugabanya ingano ya amakuru yawe bwite ushyira kuri murandasi , arimo amatariki ya amavuko yawe , aderesi , amafoto adasanzwe ndetse na ibitekerezo byawe ( cyane cyane ibishobora gukurura impaka ) .
Mu gihe ugize inkomanga ku mutima mbere yo gushyira ikintu kuri murandasi , ukwiye kubanza kugitekerezaho kabiri , byaba ngombwa ukaba uretse kubishyira hanze , ukabanza kureba ingaruka byakugiraho , ku buryo utazabyicuza .
Niba kandi ugize ibyago byo gukorerwa uburiganya , si byiza kubihisha , ahubwo ni ngombwa kubimenyesha inzego zibishinzwe no kuburira abandi .
Mu gihe abantu bahugijwe na akababaro na ubwoba baterwa na iki cyorezo , abakora ibikorwa bya ubujura kuri murandasi babonye urwaho rwo kwibasira abayikoresha , kandi abakorerwa iri hohoterwa bahura na ingaruka za uburyo butari bumwe .
Ibikorwa bya ihohoterwa bishobora kubamo kohererezwa ubutumwa buteye isoni cyangwa bwa iterabwoba , gushyira kuri murandasi amafoto cyangwa video biteye isoni , guteshwa umutwe binyuze mu kohererezwa ubutumwa bwisukiranya , gukwiza ibihuha no guhabwa amakuru atari yo ndetse na ibindi byinshi .
Ni gute wakwirinda ibyago bishobora guterwa na murandasi ?
Mu gihe uri gukoresha murandasi , hari ingamba zikwiye gufatwa mu rwego rwo kwirinda ko ingaruka zayo zishobora kukugeraho .
Icya mbere ni uko utagomba gushyira ibintu kuri murandasi utabwira umuntu mu buzima busanzwe .
Bivuze ko mu gihe ufite amabanga akomeye , murandasi siho hantu heza ho kubika amakuru ya ibanga , kuko ibyago bya uko yakwibwa cyangwa agahindurwa biba biri hejuru .
Ikindi ni uko mu gihe ubonye ibikorwa bitagushimishije , ndetse ukabona bimeze nka ihohotera , ni ngombwa ko umuntu abimenyesha inzego zirimo iza umutekano ndetse na inshuti ze , kugira ngo agirwe inama muri rusange .
Ikindi ni uko ari ngombwa guhagarika ( block ) ibikorwa na ubutumwa ubona utishimiye .
Ni ngombwa kandi kumenyesha urubuga uri gukoresha ko hari ibintu utari kwishimira , kugira ngo bikorweho iperereza .
Ibi kandi bigomba kumenyeshwa abandi bantu barimo Polisi na abakuri hafi .
MU gihe abantu basigaye bakoresha telefoni mu kohererezanya amafaranga , ni ngombwa kwitondera kohereza amafaranga ku bantu utizeye , ukabanza kugenzura no gukora amasuzuma ashobora kukwereka niba uwo muntu ugiye koherereza amafaranga ari we ukwiye koko .
Kimwe mu bintu dukwiriye guha agaciro , ni uguteza imbere umuco wo kuganira ku mutekano wo kuri murandasi .
Reka tujye tuganira ku mbuga dusura , ku bantu tuvugana na bo kuri murandasi ndetse no ku buriganya dukorerwa .
Umutekano wo kuri murandasi uhera kuri wowe .
Sura kugira ngo umenye byinshi kuri iyi ngingo .
Singita Grumeti igizwe na inyubako enye zitandukanye na ahantu hamwe umuntu ashobora gukambika mu buryo bwimukanwa : Ni ukuvuga Singita Sasakwa Lodge , Singita Sabora Tented Camp , Singita Faru Faru Lodge , Singita Serengeti House na Singita Explore , ku butaka bwisanzuye bukora kuri Pariki ya igihugu ya Serengeti .
Sasakwa Lodge igizwe na inzu icyenda zihariye na imwe yo ku rwego rwa " " " " villa , " " " " ukahasanga ibikoresho bikoze mu buryo bwo hambere , na serivisi zigezweho .
Ku rundi ruhande , Sabora ifite amahema icyenda , mu gihe Faru Faru ifite amahema umunani mu biti bikikije umugezi wa Grumeti .
Singita Explore yo igenda yimurwa bitewe na impamvu zirimo inyamaswa abantu bashaka kureba mu cyanya cya Grumeti Reserves .
Singita Serengeti House yo ikunze kwakira imiryango yagutse , igihe iba ikeneye kuruhukira hamwe yitaruye urugo .
Abantu bagera ku munani bashobora kuguma muri Serengeti House .
Twin Farms - Barnard , Vermont
Twin Farms ni imwe mu nyubako zikundwa cyane zo mu majyepfo ya Vermont , mu mujyi wa Bernard muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika .
Uretse serivisi ntagereranywa uhasanga zirimo amafunguro , haba na abantu bagufasha gutembera mu ishyamba rihakikije , na abantu bashobora kukuzanira ibyo ukeneye byose byaba amata , na ibindi uko ubyifuza .
Twin Farms - Barnard , Vermont
Twin Farms ni imwe mu nyubako zikundwa cyane zo mu majyepfo ya Vermont , mu mujyi wa Bernard muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika .
Uretse serivisi ntagereranywa uhasanga zirimo amafunguro , haba na abantu bagufasha gutembera mu ishyamba rihakikije , na abantu bashobora kukuzanira ibyo ukeneye byose byaba amata , na ibindi uko ubyifuza .
Anantara Chiang Mai Resort - Chiang Mai , Thailand
Ni inyubako ya ibyumba 84 , ikozwe mu buryo urusaku ruva hanze rudashobora kwinjiramo imbere , umuntu akaba aba yitegeye neza umugenzi wa Thai .
Ni ahantu abahasura basanga amafunguro ya ubwoko bwose , imitobe na ibindi byinshi , ku buryo umuntu yisanga na ubwo ari muri Aziya .
Mu bishimisha abantu bahasura harimo amasomo atangwa mu mikino njyarugamba ya Muay Thai , cyangwa gutwara ubwato mu mugezi cyane cyane mu bihe bya izuba .
The Nautilus Maldives - Maldives
Ni resorts igizwe na inzu 26 , zimwe zikora neza ku mucanga wa inyanja , mu gihe izindi zikora neza ku mazi , umuntu agahabwa serivisi ku buryo abaho mu buzima bwihariye , nta muntu ushobora kumuvogera bitewe na uburyo hateguwe .
Ni ahantu hakunze kubera ibiruhuko , ku buryo umuntu aba shobora gufata amafunguro ya mu gitondo yibereye mu bwato , ndetse mu cyumba cye agashyikirizwa byinshi akenera .
The Mulia & Mulia Villas - Bali , Indonesia
Ni inyubako zifite ibyumba 219 , hakaba hamwe mu hakundwa cyane muri Aziya kandi ku mpamvu nyinshi : Zirimo ko inyanja ya Abahinde uba uyirebaimbere yawe muri metero nke .
Ni ahantu habereye abakeneye kuruhuka mu buryo bwa umwihariko , banishimira amafunguro arimo ibinyabuzima byo mu mazi cyane cyane ibyokeje , na amafunguro ahuza na ibyifuzo bya abaturuka mu byekerezo binyuranye bya isi .
La Horizon Resort & Spa - Palm Springs , California
Umujyi wa Palm Springs ni umwe mu ibonekamo amahoteli menshi , ariko yose si amwe , agera arushanwa umwihariko .
La Horizon Resort & Spa ifite umwihariko wo kuba imwe mu zirambye cyane , kuko inyubako yayo ya ibanze na " " " " bungalow " " " " 25 za ikubitiro byubatswe mu 1952 , nka ahantu hakundaga kuruhukirwa muri ibyo bihe .
Imiterere yaho ariko yagiye inozwa hakoreshejwe ubugeni bwa abahanga bo hambere , serivisi zayo zirushaho gushyirwa ku rundi rwego , ku buryo ari ahantu ushobora kugirira ibihe bitibagirana kandi umudendezo wawe ntuhungabanywe na gato .
Nka piscine iba igenewe abashyitsi ba hoteli gusa , hari byinshi umushyitsi agenerwa ari mu cyumba bituma agubwa neza kurushaho byaba nka " " " " ice cream " " " " cyangwa akarahuri ka tequila ; ndetse impande ya piscine haba hari abahanga bananura ingingo , haba mu kwita ku birenge cyangwa gukanda ibitugu .
Uretse ku rwego rwa isi , ku mugabane wa Afurika resorts eshanu za mbere , nka uko zikurikirana ni Singita Grumeti - Singita Sasakwa Lodge ( Tanzania ) , Bisate Lodge ( Rwanda ) , Olivera s Camp ( Tanzania ) na Singita Pamushana Lodge ( Zimbabwe ) .
Indi " " " " Resorts " " " " iza hafi yo mu Rwanda ni One & Only Gorillaa s Nest nayo yubatswe hafi ya ibirunga iza ku mwanya wa 17 muri Afurika , ariko yo ntabwo iza muri 50 za mbere ku Isi zirimo Bisate Lodge .
Umwaro wa Ikiyaga cya Kivu na imisozi ya Rubavu na Muhungwe bigiye guhabwa abikorera
Ubuyobozi bwa Akarere ka Rubavu bwabitangaje nyuma ya inama nyunguranabitekerezo na abafatanyabikorwa bako no gusura iyi misozi nyaburanga na umwaro wa Ikiyaga cya Kivu .
Mu rwego rwo guteza imbere ubukerarugendo bwo mu misozi , Ubuyobozi bwa Akarere ka Rubavu , bukangurira abashoramari gushora imari muri ibi byiza aho umusozi wa Rubavu , ugomba kubyazwa umusaruro kuko wo wamaze kugezwamo inzu zifasha abantu kuruhuka ndetse na inzira zifasha abawusura .
Umusozi wa Muhungwe ndetse na umwaro wa Ikiyaga cya Kivu nabyo birimo gushakirwa abashoramari mu rwego ko kuzamura ubukerarugendo .
Impuguke mu bya ubukerarugendo , Gisagara Karim , avuga ko iyi misozi iri ahantu nyaburanga hakenewe kwitabwaho , hagacungwa neza , hagashyirwamo ibikorwaremezo byorohereza abakerarugendo .
Ati " " " " Ikintu kiburamo ni ubumenyi , umuntu uzi icyo ba mukerarugendo bashaka , akaza nawe agashyiramo ubumenyi bwe abantu bagatangira kuhasura . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa akarere wungirije ushinzwe iterambere rya ubukungu , Nzabonimpa Deogratias , nyuma yo gusura iyi misozi yavuze ko hagiye gushyirwa ibikorwa ndetse hagahabwa abikorera bakahabyaza umusaruro .
Ati " " " " Mu gihe cya vuba imirimo igomba kuba itangira noneho byamara gushyirwaho ba rwiyemezamirimo na abikorera ku giti cyabo tukabahereza ibyo bikorwa bakabicunga bakabibyaza umusaruro mu nyungu za igihugu muri rusange ndetse na leta " " " " " " " "
Umukozi wa Urwego rwa Igihugu rushinzwe iterambere ushinzwe kongera ibikorwa bya ubukerarugendo , Kambogo Ildephonse , yavuze ko iyi misozi nitunganywa neza , izashyirwaho utundi duce abakerarugendo bajya basura igihe bari mu gihugu .
Ati " " " " Ari abasura Musanze baje kureba ingagi tuzi ko hari umubare munini wa abarara Rubavu ndetse na abambuka umupaka bavuye Goma , tuzashaka uburyo bwose twabageraho dufatanije , turebe uko bajya bitabira gusura ibikorwa bizaba byagezemo . " " " "
Muhungwe ni umusozi ufite ubutumburuke bwa metero 2928 , ni wo muremure mu misozi itari ibirunga .
Ukora ku Mirenge ya Kanama na Nyakiriba mu Karere ka Rubavu ndetse ugahura na Pariki ya Gishwati .
Ni umusozi urimo urusobe rwa ibinyabuzima birimo ibiti na inyoni biruhura abawusura .
Iyo uwusuye , usangamo inzira zifasha ba mukerarugendo kuwutembera .
Akarusho ni uko iyo uri hejuru yawo uba witegeye umujyi wa Gisenyi na uwa Goma na ikiyaga cya Kivu .
Hari undi wanditse agaragaza ko kureba iyi filime byatumye agira amatsiko menshi yo kumenya ibigorana mu rushako birimo na ibijyanye no gutera akabariro .
Hari na abandi bavuze ko kureba iyi filime ntaho bitandukanye no kureba " " " " Pornographie . " " " "
Iyi filime igisohoka yagereranyijwe na iyo muri Pologne yitwa " " " " 365 Dni " " " " cyangwa se " " " " 365 days " " " " mu rurimi rwa Icyongereza .
Uretse abantu babivuze , na ikinyamakuru Sydney Morning Herald cyanditse inkuru ivuga ko izi filime ziri mu mujyo umwe .
" " " " 365 days " " " " yagiye hanze mu mwaka ushize gusa ntiyavugwaho kubera ibiyirimo .
Ishingiye ku nkuru ya agatabo ka Blanka Lipi ń ska .
Ivuga ku mukobwa muto ukomoka muri Varsovie muri Pologne witwa Laura Biel ushimutwa na umusore witwa Don Massimo Torricelli ukomoka mu gace ka Sicily mu Butaliyani aho uyu mukobwa aba yagiye kwishimishiriza .
Don Massimo Torricelli aramushimuta akamutegeka ko bakundana mu gihe cya iminsi 365 kandi bagakorana imibonano mpuzabitsina babana muri ako gace .
Umukobwa agerageza gutoroka ariko bikanga .
Amara igihe kinini yaranze kuryamana na uwo musore nyuma uwo musore akajya azana abandi bakobwa bagakora ibisa no gusambana .
Nyuma yo kujya hanze hari abayikurikije imijugujugu bavuga ko igaragaza ibisa nka " " " " pornographie " " " " ndetse na ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina .
Uyu muyobozi yakomeje avuga ko hari imitego myinshi we na Komite Nyobozi ye batezwe , bikaba byarabakomye mu nkokora mu ntego bari bafite , ariko ahamya ko iyo mitego itazongera kubafata .
Ati " " " " Ndabizeza ko uyu mwaka uzatubera mwiza .
Ntawe uzongera kudutega imitego ngo bimuhire . " " " "
Mu kiganiro kirambuye yagiranye na Minani Hemedi , Mvukiyehe yemeye ko uyu mwaka wababereye igihombo ariko asaba abakunzi ba Kiyovu Sports kwirinda ababarangaza babangisha ikipe yabo .
Ubuyobozi bwa iyi kipe buhamya ko bwagize igihombo cyatewe no kuba hari abakinnyi baguzwe bafite uburwayi buzatinda gukira .
Mvukiyehe yakomeje avuga ko abakunzi ba Kiyovu Sports badakwiye kurangazwa cyangwa ngo bacibwe intege na ibivugwa mu kipe abereye umuyobozi .
Yongeyeyeo ko we na Komite Nyobozi ye , biteguye gukorera mu ibanga rikomeye , ku buryo urutonde rwa abakinnyi bashya bazinjira muri iyi kipe ndetse na abazasigara , rutangazwa habura ukwezi kumwe ngo Shampiyona itangire .
Ibi ngo bizabafasha gukora ibyabo neza kandi bizatuma bagera ku ntego zabo .
Kiyovu Sports yari yaguze abakinnyi ba amazina akomeye yaba mu Rwanda no mu Burundi nka Kimenyi Yves yakuye muri Rayon Sports , Ngendahimana Eric yakuye muri Police FC , Bigirimana Abedi yakuye i Burundi na Ngandu Omar wari ukubutse muri Oman .
Bamwe mu bakinnyi barimo Saba Robert na Samson Babuwa , bamaze gusoza amasezerano yabo muri iyi kipe , ndetse ibiganiro bya ahandi bazerekeza bikaba bigeze kure .
Igihe ni iki : Mvukiyehe yongeye kwizeza Abayovu igikombe .
FC Barcelone mu ihurizo ryo kwandikisha abakinnyi bashya , kurenza imishahara yagenwe no kugumana Messi .
Ikinyamakuru Goal cyatangaje ko FC Barcelone yamaze kurenza umubare wa imishahara wemewe ku ikipe imwe muri Shampiyona ya Icyiciro cya Mbere muri Espagne , La Liga , ndetse ubu idashobora kwandikisha abakinnyi bashya iherutse kugura barimo Sergio Agüero , Memphis Depay , Emerson na Eric Garc í a .
Lionel Messi ni undi mukinnyi ushobora kwiyongera kuri aba nyuma ya uko amasezerano ye yarangiye ku wa 30 Kamena ndetse ibiganiro byo kuyongera bikaba bikomeje , ariko FC Barcelone isabwa kubanza kugabanya imishahara yayo mbere yo kongera kumusinyisha .
Bamwe mu bakinnyi ba iyi kipe batangiye gusunikirwa ku muryango ugana hanze , bamwe babyihitiyemo , abandi ku gahato bitewe na uko bikwiye ko batanga umwanya ku bandi baguzwe .
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri , Junior Firpo yagurishijwe muri Leeds United yo mu Bwongereza kuri miliyoni 13 £ .
Uyu musore ukina inyuma ku ruhande , yari amaze imyaka ibiri gusa ageze muri FC Barcelone .
Kumugurisha birafasha iyi kipe kuzigama miliyoni 8 £ ku mwaka wa imikino .
Francisco Trinc ã o yoherejwe mu Bwongereza nka intizanyo muri Wolves , ku buryo ishobora kumugura .
Konrad De La Fuente yagurishijwe muri Marseille naho Jean Claire - Todibo agurishwa muri Nice .
Aba babiri ba nyuma bashobora gutuma FC Barcelone yizigama miliyoni 9 £ yatangaga mu kubahemba no kwishyura ibindi bitandukanye .
Myugariro Matheus Fernandes yashyizwe ku ruhande nyuma yo gusesa amasezerano ye ndetse avuga ko azitabaza inkiko kuko yirukanywe binyuranyije na amategeko .
Gusa , kurekura abo bakinnyi bose ntibigahije kuri FC Barcelone ndetse kuri ubu amaso yayerekeje ku bandi batatu ishobora kugurisha barimo Samuel Umtiti , Philippe Coutinho na Miralem Pjani ć kugira ngo ishake uko igabanya miliyoni 171 £ ku mishahara yayo .
Bivugwa kandi ko ubundi buryo buri gutekerezwa ari ukugabanyiriza imishahara abahembwa menshi barimo Gerard Piqué , Jordi Alba , Sergi Roberto , Sergio Busquets , Antoine Griezmann na Ousmane Dembélé .
Kugabanya iyo mishahara bizabafasha kongera gusinyisha Lionel Messi wasoje amasezerano ndetse kuri ubu akaba ari kumwe na Ikipe ya Igihugu cye cya Argentine muri Copa América .
Uyu munyabigwi wa FC Barcelone , yitezweho gukomereza urugendo rwe rwo gukina i Camp Nou , ariko ahembwa menshi ndetse ntazongera amasezerano natabona ibyo yasabye .
Mu mwaka utaha wa imikino , FC Barcelone itegerejweho kwitwara neza nyuma ya uko ibaye iya gatatu muri Shampiyona ya 2020 / 21 mu gihe yasezerewe itarenze 1 / 8 muri UEFA Champions League .
APR FC yasinyishije Nsabimana Aimable na Bacca .
Amakuru IGIHE yamenye ni uko Nsabimana wari usoje amasezerano muri Police FC , yasubiye muri APR FC nyuma yo kumvikana na yo muri iki cyumweru .
Uyu myugariro wo hagati yari amaze imyaka itatu akinira Police FC yagezemo muri Gashyantare 2018 , avuye muri Minerva Punjab FC yo mu Buhinde .
Yasubiye muri APR FC yakiniye hagati ya 2016 na 2018 ubwo yari avuye muri Marines FC , na yo yagezemo avuye muri SEC Academy .
APR FC ishobora gutakaza Kapiteni wayo , Manzi Thierry , bivugwa ko yifuzwa na ikipe yo mu Cyiciro cya Mbere muri Georgia , akaba yaba umusimbura we .
Undi mukinnyi werekeje muri APR FC ni Kwitonda Alain " " " " Bacca " " " " ukina asatira izamu .
Amakuru IGIHE yamenye ni uko ubuyobozi bwa Ikipe ya Ingabo na ubwa Bugesera FC uyu mukinnyi yakiniraga , bwombi bwamaze kumvikana ku buryo isaha na isaha azerekanwa yambaye umukara na umweru .
Kwitonda agiye gusimbura abakinnyi barimo Byiringiro Lague uzerekeza mu Cyiciro cya Kabiri mu Busuwisi .
Andi mazina bivugwa ko yifuzwa muri APR FC ni Nshuti Dominique Savio usoje amasezerano muri Police FC , Nishimwe Blaise ufite amasezerano ya umwaka umwe muri Rayon Sports na Mugisha Gilbert usoje amasezerano muri Rayon Sports .
Ndayiragije watozaga Kiyovu Sports ageze mu muryango usohoka .
Ku wa 5 Gicurasi 2021 ni bwo ubuyobozi bwa Kiyovu Sports bubicishije kuri Twitter bwatangaje ko bwamaze gusinyisha umutoza Ndayiragije Étienne , gusa ntabwo bigeze basobanura uko aya masezerano ateye ( igihe azarangirira ) .
Nubwo abayobozi ba Kiyovu Sports ndetse na Ndayiragije batatangaje igihe amasezerano bagiranye azarangirira , ariko amakuru IGIHE yamenye avuga ko uyu mutoza yari yasinye amasezerano ya amezi abiri gusa hanyuma yarangira impande zombi zigasubira mu biganiro ku masezerano mashya .
Ibi bisobanuye ko uyu mutoza ari ku isoko nka abandi bose badafite amasezerano ya akazi .
Amakuru IGIHE yamenye avuga ko mbere ya uko Ndayiragije asubira i Burundi gusura umuryango we , yabanje kugirana ibiganiro na ubuyobozi bwa Kiyovu Sports ku bijyanye na amasezerano mashya na ibiyakubiyemo ariko ntibabyumvikanyeho .
Bivuze kandi ko mu gihe impande zombi zitahuza , Ndayiragije yatandukana na Kiyovu Sports .
Muri bimwe uyu mutoza yifuza harimo kugumana bamwe mu bakinnyi beza ba iyi kipe barimo Saba Robert na abandi bakomeje kwifuzwa na andi makipe .
Kuva ageze muri Kiyovu Sports , Ndayiragije yatoje imikino 11 atsindamo itanu , atsindwamo ine , anganyamo ibiri .
Yasoje Shampiyona ku mwanya wa mbere mu makipe umunani yahataniraga kutajya mu Cyiciro cya Kabiri .
Gorilla FC yirukanye abakinnyi barindwi barimo Kapiteni wayo .
Ikipe ya Gorilla FC byayisabye gutsinda umukino wa nyuma wa Shampiyona yahuyemo na Sunrise FC ku bitego 2 - 1 kugira ngo igume mu Cyiciro cya Mbere .
Gusa , uyu mwaka hari abakinnyi batayihaye umusaruro yari ibitezeho .
Mu rwego rwo kwiyubaka yirinda kuzisanga ahabi nka uko byayigendekeye muri uyu mwaka wa imikino ushize , Gorilla FC yamaze gusezerera abakinnyi barindwi ndetse irateganya kwirukana abandi .
Abamaze kwirukanwa kugeza ubu ni Tuyisenge Pekeyake " " " " Pekinho " " " " wayizamuye akaba yari na Kapiteni wayo , rutahizamu Sinamenye Cyprien , abanyezamu Mugisha Yves na Mpawenimana Emmanuel , Mukunzi Vivens ukina hagati mu kibuga , Munyeshuri Aaron na Manace .
Uretse aba bakinnyi kandi , hari na abandi bane cyangwa batanu barimo abanyamahanga bagomba kwirukanwa muri iyi kipe .
Gorilla FC yamaze gusinyisha amasezerano ya imyaka itatu , umunyezamu Ndoli Jean Claude wavuye muri Musanze FC , inongerera amasezerano ya imyaka itatu Iradukunda Simeon ukina hagati mu kibuga .
Iyi kipe imaze umwaka umwe mu Cyiciro cya Mbere , yasoje Shampiyona iri ku mwanya 14 mu makipe 16 .
Brésil yageze ku mukino wa nyuma wa Copa América , Neymar ati " " " " Ndashaka Argentine . " " " "
Brésil izakina na ikipe ikomeza hagati ya Argentine na Colombia mu wundi mukino wa ½ uteganyijwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri .
Iki gihugu cyakiriye irushanwa rya uyu mwaka , cyaritwaye inshuro zose ryabaga ryabereye ku butaka bwacyo .
Kuri iyi nshuro , cyongeye kubishimangira gitsinda Peru .
Mu minota 20 ya mbere , umunyezamu wa Peru , Pedro Gallese , yakuyemo imipira ibiri ikurikiranye yatewe na Neymar na Richarlison mu gihe kandi na Casemiro yagerageje uburyo bwiza bugasubizwa inyuma na abanya - Peru .
Brésil yakomeje gukina umukino wuzuyemo amacenga , ariko byayisabye gutegereza umunota wa 35 , itsinda igitego cyinjijwe na Paqueta na ubundi wayifashije gusezerera Chili muri ¼ .
Neymar winjiriye mu ruhande rwa ibumoso , yacenze abakinnyi batatu mbere yo guhindura umupira washyizwe mu izamu na Paqueta atereye ishoti muri metero 10 .
Kwinjira mu kibuga kwa Marcos Lopez na Raziel Garcia mu gice cya kabiri , byafashije Peru guhindura umukino , ishaka uburyo yishyura .
Ubu bushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko siporo ikoreshejwe imbaraga nyinshi ari ikozwe mu hagati ya iminota 15 na 30 , mu minsi irenze ibiri cyangwa itatu .
Gusa benshi bakora izi siporo ntabwo barware MND , bikaba ariyo mpamvu bikibazwaho ndetse ubushakashatsi bugikomeje .
Dr Cooper - Knock yagize ati " " " " Ntabwo tuzi uri mu byago byo kwandura niyo mpamvu tutavuga ngo ni uyu ugomba kuyikora na uyu ugomba kuyihagarika .
Kandi buri wese aramutse aretse imyitozo byateza ingaruka nyinshi kurushaho . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa ishuri ryigisha siyansi ya uturemangingo [ Neurosciences ] muri Sheffield , Prof Dame Pamela Shaw , yavuze ko impamvu bitekerezwa ko siporo ikoreshejwe imbaraga nyinshi ishobora kuba intandaro yo kwandura MND , ari ukubera ko umubiri uba ufite umwuka muke mu gihe umuntu akora iyo myitozo , bigateza ikibazo mu turemangingo twitwa Motor [ Neurone
moteur ] .
Bigatuma dushobora gupfa ku muntu ufite umubiri ufite intege nke .
Dr Brian Dickie we yavuze ko hagikenewe ubundi bushakashatsi bwimbitse kuri iki kibazo cya abakora imyitozo na indwara ya Motor Neurone Disease .

Umugore wa imyaka 57 yitabye Imana i Kigali azize Covid - 19 , umubare wa abo imaze guhitana uba 366 .
Mu barwayi bashya abenshi babonetse mu mujyi wa Kigali 59 naho 14 babonetse muri Rubavu .
Abakirwaye bose ni 953 barimo icyenda barembye .
Abantu bamaze guhabwa urukingo rwa Covid - 19 ni 388716 barimo 238 , 734 bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri ya urukingo rwa AstraZeneca .
Ubwandu bwa Covid - 19 bukomeje kwiyongera mu Rwanda muri iyi minsi mike ishize kuko ni ku munsi wa gatatu wikurikiranya haboneka abantu barenze ijana banduye ku munsi .
Minisitiri wa Ubuzima , Dr Ngamije Daniel yasabye abaturage kutirara ngo badohoke ku ngamba zo kwirinda Covid - 19 kuko igihari kandi yica .
Minisitiri Ngamije yakomoje ku mpamvu imibare ya abandura Covid - 19 iri kwiyongera .
Aganira na Televiziyo ya Igihugu kuri uyu wa Kane , Dr Ngamije yatangaje ko kudohoka ku mabwiriza biri mu bikomeje gutuma umubare wa abandura wiyongera .
Yagize ati " " " " Ndumva imwe mu mpamvu yatumye ubwandu bwiyonhera ari ubwinshi bwa ibipimo bifatwa ariko nanone twapimye abantu benshi bambutse baturuka muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo mu minsi ishize . " " " "
Yongeyeho ko hari abaturage bamwe badohotse ku mabwiriza bakirara nyuma yo kubona bimwe mu bikorwa byari byarahagaritswe bikomorerwa .
Hari hashize iminsi imibare itangazwa ya abantu bandura ku munsi itagera kuri 50 ariko mu minsi mike ishize byariyongereye .
Mu minsi ibiri ishize , abantu 239 nibo banduye Covid - 19 mu gihe yahitanye batanu .
Minisitiri Ngamije yavuze ko urugamba rwo guhashya Covid - 19 rureba buri wese .
Ati " " " " Imibare ihari kuyigenzura biracyashoboka ariko tugomba kwitonda .
Tugomba kumva ko mu gihe habonetse ubwandu burenze abantu ijana ku munsi , biba ari umutwaro ku gihugu . " " " "
Yashishikarije abaturage gukomeza kwitabira ibikorwa byo kwikingiza nka uburyo bwizewe bwo guhashya icyorezo .
Kugeza kuri uyu wa Gatatu abantu bari bamaze kwandura Covid - 19 mu Rwanda bangana na 27548 barimo 26341 bakize mu gihe Abakirwaye ari 842 barimo batandatu barembye .
Abantu 238 , 319 nibo bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri ya urukingo rwa rwa AstraZeneca mu gihe abasaga 375 , 000 bamaze guhabwa nibura doze imwe .

Perezida Kagame yagaragaje amakosa yakozwe ubwo Afurika yetereranwaga mu guhashya SIDA
Yabitangaje kuri uyu wa Kabiri mu nama ya Inteko rusange ya Loni yigaga ku cyorezo cya SIDA .
Iyi nama izasozwa kuwa 10 Kamena igamije kurebera hamwe ibimaze kugerwaho ku ntego zari zafashwe mu 2016 zo kuba virusi itera SIDA ari amateka mu 2030 .
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ku ruhande rwa u Rwanda , hari ibyagezweho mu guhashya virusi Itera SIDA , birimo intego ya 90 , 90 , 90 isaba ko nibura hejuru ya 90 % bya ababana na HIV baba bazi uko bahagaze , 90 ku ijana bafata imiti igabanya ubukana kandi nibura 90 % bafite virusi nke cyane mu maraso .
Yavuze ko kandi guhera mu 2005 , ubwandu bwa virusi Itera SIDA mu Rwanda bwagumye kuri 3 % .
Ati " " " " Icyakora si umwanya wo kwishimira intsinzi .
Haracyari 95 dukwiriye kuba tugeraho ndetse 100 % .
Niyo mpamvu icyerecyezo gishya cya politiki gikenewe ngo virusi itera SIDA irandurwe burundu bitarenze 2030 . " " " "
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko nubwo ubu isi ihanganye na icyorezo cya Covid - 19 , ari icyorezo nka virusi Itera SIDA kandi byombi bifite amasomo bikwiriye kwigisha isi arimo ubufatanye , nubwo imyaka bimaze itangana .
Ati " " " " Icya mbere imbaraga mu guhangana nabyo byombi ziracyashingira ku bukire cyangwa ubukene .
Kumara igihe kugira ngo hagire igitangira gukorwa mu guhangana na virusi Itera SIDA muri Afurika byari amakosa kuko byatumye virusi ikomeza gukwirakwira nubwo kuyivura byashobokaga . " " " "
" " " " Hari na abumvaga ko Abanyafurika batazabasha kujya bafatira imiti ku gihe .
Imyaka icumi yarihiritse ari ko ubuzima bwa abaturage buhatikirira .
Ibintu byahinduye isura mu guhashya virusi itera SIDA muri Afurika ubwo habaga ubwumvikane busesuye bwo gushora cyane mu nzego za ubuzima imbere mu bihugu biciye muri gahunda nka PEPFAR , Global Fund na izindi . " " " "
Yavuze ko ibyo bikorwa byubatswe mu guhashya virusi Itera SIDA mu myaka ishize , ahenshi muri Afurika ari nabyo byifashishijwe ubwo icyorezo cya Covid - 19 cyibasiraga isi .
Ati " " " " Nko mu Rwanda , Laboratwari ya igihugu yapimye ibizamini byinshi bya Covid - 19 , nayo yubatswe igamije guhangana na virusi itera SIDA .
Nubwo twaba turi mu murongo wo guhashya icyorezo runaka , dushobora gukorera hamwe nka abafatanyabikorwa amikoro agakoreshwa mu buryo bwumvikana hagamijwe kubakira ubushobozi inzego za ubuzima . " " " "
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko iyo hari ibyubatswe mu buvuzi bigamije kurwanya icyorezo runaka , bitabuza ko byifashishwa mu gihe habonetse ikindi kibazo gisaba gutabara ubuzima bwa abantu .
Yatanze urugero nka igihe haba hubatswe ahavurirwa ababyeyi babana na virusi Itera SIDA , nyamara nyuma hakaboneka umubyeyi urwaye na malaria .
Yavuze ko ari ibintu bishoboka ko yahavurirwa ubuzima bwe bugatabarwa .
Ati " " " " Dukwiriye gufatirana iki gihe mu kongera imikoranire mu bushakashatsi muri Afurika , no gushora mu ikorwa rya imiti na inkingo ku mugabane wacu . " " " "
Ishami rya Loni rishinzwe kurwanya SIDA rigaragaza ko abagera kuri miliyoni 37 . 6 ku isi babanaga na Virusi Itera SIDA mu 2020 barimo miliyoni 1 . 5 bayanduye uwo mwaka .
Habarurwa nibura abantu ibihumbi 690 bishwe na SIDA na izindi ndwara zifite aho zihuriye nayo mu 2020 .
Ku wa Gatandatu tariki 6 Nyakanga 2019 nibwo iki gitaramo ku nshuro yacyo ya cumi kuva gitangijwe mu Rwanda , cyabereye muri Kigali Serena Hotel .
Cyahurije hamwe abamurika imideli batandukanye bo mu Rwanda no hanze yarwo ndetse na abayihanga , biyerekanye mu buryo bwanyuze abacyitabiriye .

Abahanga imideli bo mu Rwanda biyerekanye barimo Aqua , Ihogoza Design , Dk Textiles , Ibya iwacu Summer Collection , Mundi Design na Karen Karsh wa Karsh Collections .
Ibi birori byatangijwe na John Bunyeshuri , kuri iyi nshuro byari bitandukanye na ibyabanje cyane ko ubu byamaze kujya mu maboko ya Sosiyete yitwa " " " " Ibya iwacu " " " " ya Umulisa Fiona Cécile ikaba ariyo yabiteguye ndetse ikanabikurikirana kuva bitangiye kugeza birangiye .

Leo Sugo yavuze ko muri iki gikorwa batumiye abamurika imideli na abayihanga bo mu Rwanda kuba bazacyitabira cyane ko bafitanye imikoranire .
Iki gikorwa cyahujwe na Kigali International Fashion Week izabera mu Buyapani .
John Bunyeshuri watangije Kigali Fashion Week akaba ari nawe wari uyoboye ibirori , yavuze ko aho Kigali Fashion Week iri uyu munsi ari aho kwishimirwa kuko hari abantu benshi yafashije .
Yakomeje avuga ko icyo ashaka ari ukuzamura buri muntu ufite impano mu ruganda rwa imideli kuko aribyo bizatuma rukomeza gukura umunsi ku wundi rukagera kure .
Ati " " " " Impamvu Kigali Fashion Week itandukanye na ibindi birori bya imideli ni uko njya ahantu hatandukanye ; uyu mwaka nagiye i Musanze na Huye nkabwira umuntu nti uhanga imyenda ?
Reka tukuzamure .
Akambwira ati " " " " ese nzishyura angahe ? " " " "
Nkamubwira nti ntabwo nkeneye amafaranga ahubwo icyo nshaka ni ukukumenyekanisha . " " " "
Kigali Fashion Week yatangiye mu 2012 , itangirana na ibindi birori birimo icya Kampala , Bujumbura na Nairobi Fashion week .
Inategura ibitaramo muri Ghana na ibindi bihugu bikomeye ndetse yanatangiye ibirori birimo Kigali International Fashion Week ibera mu Buholandi , u Bubiligi , u Budage na u Bwongereza .
Uyu mwaka bazatangira ibindi birori birimo ibizabera i New York , Tokyo , Thailanda na Singapore .
Ati " " " " Mu Bubiligi ntitwiga byinshi byerekeye u Rwanda , twiga amateka make mu muryango ariko ubukungu ntacyo twiga , politike ntacyo twiga , amateka yo aba ari make cyane .
Ubu ndishimye cyane . " " " "
Ibyo Louise yavuze abihuriyeho na Mike nawe utuye mu Bubiligi , aho yemeza ko urugendo yagize rwasize amenye byinshi ku gihugu akomokamo .
Ati " " " " Ntababeshye iyi ndi mu rugo ababyeyi banjye ntibajya bavuga u Rwanda cyane , kuri iyi nshuro nagize amahirwe yo kwiga byinshi ku butaka nkomokaho ni nsubira mu Bubiligi nzaba nzi byinshi ku gihugu cyanjye kandi ndabyishimiye . " " " "
Aba bombi hamwe na bagenzi babo bahuriza ku kuba nibasubira mu bihugu baturutsemo bazagira uruhare mu gusangiza abandi ukuri ka u Rwanda kandi bakabashishikariza kuba nabo barusura .
Biteganyijwe ko uru rubyiruko ruzakomeza gusura ibice bitandukanye bya Igihugu birimo Inzu Ndangamurage ya u Rwanda , Pariki ya Akagera na ibyiza nyaburanga bigize ikiyaga cya Kivu .
Iyi kipe yatsindiwe ku mukino wa nyuma mu 2019 , yakomeje gusatira ndetse yabonye uburyo bwiza bwageragejwe na Gianluca Lapaduka , umunyezamu Ederson Mor ã es atabara izamu rya Brésil .
Gutsinda uyu mukino byatumye Brésil igera ku mukino wa nyuma wa Copa América yimuriwe muri uyu mwaka nyuma ya uko itabaye mu 2020 kubera COVID - 19 .
Aganira na itangazamakuru nyuma ya umukino , rutahizamu wa Brésil , Neymar , yavuze ko yifuza guhura na Argentine ku mukino wa nyuma .
Ati " " " " Ndashaka Argentine ku mukino wa nyuma .
Ni yo nshyigikiye kuko mfitemo inshuti nyinshi .
Ku mukino wa nyuma , Brésil izatsinda . " " " "
Umukino wa nyuma wa Copa América , uzabera kuri Stade Maracan ã saa Munani za ijoro rishyira ku Cyumweru , tariki ya 12 Nyakanga 2021 .
Kuki Police FC yaryumyeho kuri Muhadjiri ?
Ku wa 2 Nyakanga ni bwo hamenyekanye amakuru avuga ko Hakizimana Muhadjiri yamaze gusinyira Police FC amasezerano ya umwaka umwe , agahabwa miliyoni 15 Frw , akanemererwa umushahara wa miliyoni 1 Frw buri kwezi .
Gusa , ubwo aya makuru yamenyekanaga , ubuyobozi bwa Police FC bwahakanye ko koko Muhadjiri yamaze gusinyira iyi kipe nka uko Umunyamabanga Mukuru wayo , CIP Bikorimana Obed , yabibwiye IGIHE .
Ati " " " " Ntabwo ari byo , gusa na we ni umwe muri benshi twifuza kandi nta na ikipe itakwifuza umukinnyi mwiza . " " " "
Kugeza ubu ntabwo Police FC iremeza aya makuru yaba ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zayo cyangwa biciye mu buyobozi bwayo nka uko byagiye bigenda ku bandi bakinnyi yagiye isinyisha , ari na yo mpamvu bikomeje guteza urujijo .
Gusa , ubwo hari hashize amasaha make hagiye hanze amakuru ya isinyishwa rya Hakizimana Muhadjiri , kuri Twitter ya Police FC , hashyizweho ifoto ya umukinnyi utaragaragajwe , ashyira umukono ku masezerano , bikurikizwa amagambo agira ati " " " " Mufore uwo ari we ? " " " "
Amakuru IGIHE yamenye , avuga ko uyu mukinnyi ashobora kuba yarahawe sheki yo kuzabikuza ku wa Gatatu , tariki ya 7 Nyakanga .
Amakuru avuga ko impamvu yo kuba ubuyobozi bwa Police FC butaremeza ibya isinya rya Hakizimana Muhadjiri , ari uko hari ibitarasobanuka neza hagati ya impande zombi birimo kuba uyu mukinnyi atarabona amafaranga yasezeranyijwe .
Ibinyujije kuri Twitter , AS Kigali yasezeye kuri Hakizimana Muhadjiri ku Cyumweru , imwifuriza amahirwe ahandi azerekeza nyuma ya umwaka umwe yayikiniye , aho yayifashije kugera mu ijonjora rya nyuma rigana mu matsinda ya CAF Confederation Cup ya 2020 / 21 ndetse akaba yarasize ibonye itike yo gukina iri rushanwa Nyafurika mu mwaka utaha wa imikino .
Uyu mukinnyi wa imyaka 27 ku byangombwa akiniraho , amaze mu Rwanda umwaka umwe yakiniyemo AS Kigali nyuma yo gutandukana na Emirates Football Club yakiniye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Abarabu mu mwaka wa imikino wa 2019 / 20 .
Yerekeje muri Asia nyuma ya imyaka itatu akinira APR FC yari yaragezemo muri Nyakanga 2016 avuye muri AS Kigali , na yo yari yamuguze muri Mukura Victory Sports .
Hakizimana Muhadjiri uvukana na Kapiteni wa Amavubi , Haruna Niyonzima , yatowe nka umukinnyi mwiza wa umwaka wa imikino wa 2017 / 18 mu Rwanda .
Nyuma yo kuzamurwa na umutoza Mungo Jitiada " " " " Vigoureux , " " " " Muhadjiri yakiniye Etincelles , ayivamo yerekeza muri Kiyovu Sports , nyuma ajya gukinira Mukura Victory Sports yamazemo imyaka ibiri mbere yo kugurwa na AS Kigali FC atakiniye igahita imutanga muri APR FC .
Manchester City na Tottenham ni andi makipe yo mu Bwongereza aheruka gukorwaho filimi mbarangankuru nka iyo .
Mu mwaka utaha wa imikino wa 2021 / 22 uzatangira muri Kanama , Arsenal ni yo kipe izaba igezweho muri All or Nothing , aho izajya yemerera camera za Amazon gufata amashusho atandukanye yo hanze ya ikibuga no kuri Emirates Stadium .
Iyi gahunda ya televiziyo ikunzwe na abatari bake , izaba igaragaza imikorere ya imbere ya iyi kipe ya umupira wa amaguru irimo uburyo abakinnyi bitwara mu rwambariro mbere na nyuma ya umukino ndetse hazaganirizwa na abafite amazina akomeye bo muri Arsenal barimo abakinnyi na abatoza .
Manchester City na Tottenham zagarutsweho mu bice byabanje bya iyi filimi mbarankuru ndetse kuri ubu Arsenal itegerejweho kuva mu makipe yo hagati ku rutonde , ni yo izaba igezweho mu mwaka utaha wa mikino .
All or Nothing ni iki ?
All or Nothing ni filimi mbarankuru ikorwa na Amazon , ikagaruka ku buzima bwa imbere mu makipe atandukanye akomeye mu mupira wa amaguru .
Amakipe aheruka kuyigaragaramo arimo umukeba wa Arsenal mu Majyaruguru ya Londres , Tottenham , na Manchester City yatwaye igikombe giheruka cya Premier League .
Hari kandi na Juventus na Bayern Munich zikomeye i Burayi .
Uruhererekane rwayo rwatangiye gukorwa mu 2015 haherewe ku makipe yo muri NFL ( umupira wa amaguru wo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ) , ariko kuri ubu yaguriwe mu mupira wa amaguru wa i Burayi nyuma ya uko ikigo cya Amazon cyaguye ibikorwa byacyo bikajyamo no kwerekana imikino ya Premier League kuri Amazon Prime .
Umuyobozi wa Itumanaho na itangazamakuru muri Arsenal , Mark Gonnella , yagize ati " " " " Twiteguye guha abafana bacu bari hirya no hiryo ku Isi ishusho yihariye ya imbere mu ikipe na uburyo ikora umunsi ku munsi .
All or Nothing izaha abafana bacu na abakunzi bacu amahirwe yo kumenya ikigira Arsenal ikipe idasanzwe , amateka yacu yo gutwara ibikombe na intego dufite ngo twitware neza ahazaza . " " " "
Dani Grabiner uhagarariye ibiganiro bya Amazon mu Bwongereza , yavuze ko Arsenal ari ikipe ya amateka ndetse biteguye kugeza ku bakunzi bayo urugendo rwayo rwose mu mwaka utaha wa imikino .
Filimi mbarankuru izakorwa kuri Arsenal , izagaragara kuri Prime Video mu 2022 .
Izakorerwa ahantu hatandukanye harimo kuri Emirates Stadium , ku kibuga cya imyitozo no hanze yacyo , aho hazarebwa na uburyo abayigize babaho mu buzima busanzwe .
Inkoramutima za APR FC zashimiwe kuzirikana abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu ( Amafoto )
Ku Cyumweru , tariki ya 4 Nyakanga 2021 , ni bwo abagize Inkoramutima za APR FC basuye abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu bo mu Murenge wa Muyumbu , babagenera ibiribwa na ubwisungane mu kwivuza bwahawe abantu 180 .
Umuyobozi wa Akarere ka Rwamagana , Mbonyumuvunyi Radjab , yashimiye Inkoramutima za APR FC ndetse na ubuyobozi bwa iyi kipe ku gikorwa cya urukundo bakoze , abasaba ko cyaba ngarukamwaka .
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Umurenge wa Muyumbu , Bahati Bonny , yavuze ko igikorwa cyakozwe na Inkoramutima za APR FC akigereranya na icy ubutwari .
Ati " " " " Ni igikorwa gishimishije buri muntu wese yaba ari umuyobozi cyangwa undi wese yakwishimira .
Byaradushimishije kuko byakozwe ku munsi wo Kwibohora , bikorerwa abamugariye ku rugamba na ubundi bagize uruhare mu Kwibohora .
Mu bya ukuri njye ni igikorwa mbona nka icy ubutwari . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Buri mwaka ubuyobozi bwa Umurenge dufatanye na ubw Akarere , ku munsi wo Kwibohora dutegura igikorwa cyo kwishimana na bariya bamugariye ku rugamba kugira ngo turebeke ko tubaha agaciro kandi ko uyu munsi igihugu gitekanye kubera bo .
Twifuza ko ibikorwa nka ibi byakomeza . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa Inkoramutima za APR FC , Sam Friend , yavuze ko impamvu bahisemo kwifanya na abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu ari uko ibimaze kugerwaho babigizemo uruhare .
" " " " Twashatse kwifatanya na bo ku munsi wo kwibohora ariko tunabagaragariza ko tuzirikana ubutwari bwabo mu rugamba rwo kwibohora . " " " "
Murigande Charles uhagarariye abamuriye ku rugamba , na we yashimiye cyane Inkoramutima za APR FC ku gikorwa cya urukundo zaberetse , ababwira ko aho bari hose na bo ari APR FC ku mutima , anaboneraho kubasaba kubashimirira cyane ubuyobozi bwa Ikipe ya Ingabo .
Mu Murenge wa Muyumbu habarizwa abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu bari mu miryango igera kuri 81 , batujwe mu midugudu ibiri kuva mu myaka itandatu ishize .
Mu mwaka ushize , ubuyobozi bwa uyu Murenge bwatanze inka ku miryango itanu .
Izabiriza ati " " " " Kuba ikiri urwego rusa nka ngishwanama nibyo bigitera ibyo bibazo , kuko bicaye hamwe bakiga ibibazo byose .
Kuba ayo masezerano atarasinywa ntabwo ishobora kujyaho ngo ikore nka izindi nteko . " " " "
PAP ntabwo iratangira gutora amategeko , icyo ikora ni ugutora imishingashusho ya itegeko ritanga imirongo migari ( Model law ) bitewe na ikibazo gihari bashaka gukemura .
Iyo umushingashusho umaze gutorwa muri PAP , wohererezwa AU , hanyuma byakwemezwa bikoherezwa mu bihugu kugira ngo byemezwe burundu bitangire gukurikizwa .
Ibyitezwe ku mubano wa u Rwanda na Tanzania ku buyobozi bwa Suluhu .
U Rwanda nka igihugu , rufite Tanzania nka umuturanyi wo mu Burasirazuba bwarwo ariko bya umwihariko ibihugu byombi bifitanye amateka na umubano wihariye haba mu buhahirane , politiki , ibikorwaremezo , ubukungu na umutekano .
Mu myaka itanu ishize ubwo Tanzania yayoborwaga na Dr John Pombe Magufuli [ aruhukire mu mahoro ] , u Rwanda na igihugu cye byagaragaje ubushake buhambaye bwa ubufatanye mu nzego zitandukanye .
Paji nshya ya ubufatanye hagati ya ibihugu byombi yagaragaye cyane kuva mu myaka ya 2015 , ubwo Dr Magufuli yari amaze gutorerwa kuyobora iki gihugu ndetse muri Nyakanga 2016 , Perezida Kagame yagiye i Dar es Salaam muri Tanzania , aho yafunguye ku mugaragaro imurikagurisha rya 40 ryiswe " " " " Dar es Salaam International Trade Fair ( DITF ) . " " " "
Muri urwo ruzinduko hasinywe amasezerano ya ubufatanye mu nzego za ubuhahirane .
Mu mpera za uwo mwaka kandi itsinda rya intumwa za u Rwanda ryagiye muri Tanzania riganira na ubuyobozi bwaho ku kuzamura ubucuruzi bwa ibihugu byombi no kwigira hamwe uko hakemurwa amananiza mu bucuruzi yagaragaraga cyane ku ruhande rwa Tanzania nka ahantu abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda banyuraga kugira ngo bagere ku cyambu cya Dar es Salaam
Mu 2018 , nibwo ibihugu byombi byasubukuye umushinga mugari wa Gari ya Moshi wari waratangiye kuganirwaho muri za 2000 ariko abari abayobozi ba Tanzania barakomeje kugenda biguru ntege mu ishyirwa mu bikorwa ryawo .
Muri uwo mwaka wa 2018 , nibwo kandi bahise basinya amasezerano yo kubaka uyu muhanda wa ibilometero 532 , yashyizweho umukono ku wa 9 Werurwe 2018 .
Uyu mushinga wagombaga gutwara miliyari 3 , 6 $ .
Ku ruhande rwa u Rwanda , inzira umuhanda uzanyuramo yerekana ko uzanyura ku Rusumo ukagera mu Mujyi wa Kigali [ ahari Dubai Ports muri Kicukiro ] ariko hakiyongeraho agace ka ibilometero 18 kagera ku Kibuga cya Indege cya Bugesera .
Mu myaka 10 Kikwete yayoboye Tanzania , ubucuruzi hagati ya ibihugu byombi bwabarirwaga muri miliyoni 5 . 7 $ ku mwaka .
Mu mwaka wa mbere wa Magufuli bwarazamutse bugera kuri miliyoni 17 , 6 $ .
Imibare yo mu 2019 , igaragaza ko u Rwanda rwoherezaga muri Tanzania ibicuruzwa bifite agaciro ka miliyoni 5 , 1 $ mu gihe Tanzania yacuruzaga mu Rwanda ibifite agaciro ka miliyoni 224 , 54 $ .
Ku wa 17 Werurwe nibwo Perezida Dr Magufuli yatabarutse azize indwara ya umutima , asimburwa na Samia Suluhu Hassan wabaye umuperezida wa gatandatu wa Tanzania na Perezida wa mbere wa umugore uyoboye icyo gihugu .
Mu muhango wo gusezera kuri Magufuli ku wa 22 Werurwe , Minisitiri wa Intebe wa u Rwanda , Dr Ngirente Edouard yavuze ko ku buyobozi bwe , yaharaniye ukwishyira hamwe kwa ibihugu bigize Umuryango wa Afurika ya Iburasirazuba , EAC , kandi aharanira kwaguka no gutera imbere umubano wa u Rwanda na Tanzania .
Icyo gihe yagize ati " " " " Leta ya u Rwanda yatewe ishema no gukorana bya hafi na Magufuli , nka uwaharaniye ukwishyira hamwe ka Umuryango wa Afurika ya Iburasirazuba ndetse akanagira uruhare runini mu gukomeza umubano hagati ya u Rwanda na Tanzania .
Ibikorwa bye byiza bizibukwa ibihe byose . " " " "
Perezida Suhulu yitezweho gushyigikira ibyagezweho
Perezida mushya wa Tanzania , Samia Suluhu Hassan , azayobora icyo gihugu kugeza mu 2025 ubwo manda yari iya John Pombe Magufuli yari kuzaba irangiye .
Magufuli yari muri manda ye ya kabiri yatangiye muri 2020 .
Impuguke muri Politiki akaba bya umwihariko akurikiranira hafi iyo mu Karere ka Afurika ya Uburasirazuba , Nizeyimana Alexis , yabwiye IGIHE ko politiki ya Perezida Suluhu itazatandukana cyane na iya Magufuli cyane ko bose ari abo mu Ishyaka rya CCM [ Chama Cha Mapinduzi ] .
Ati " " " " Yatangiye gufungura imibanire ya igihugu cye na ibindi , Tanzania ubona ko iri mu murongo wa uko ikomeza bwa buryo bwayo bwo kubakira ubukungu bwayo imbere ariko bakareba no hanze ku buryo mu mibanire ya Tanzania na amahanga bizagenda neza . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Perezida Suluhu ubona ari umuntu ushaka gufungura amarembo bitabangamiye ya politiki yari isanzwe ya CCM , yo kuvuga ngo ni ukubakira igihugu ku banye - Tanzania ariko ubona yaramaze kumenya ko Isi isa na aho yegeranye . " " " "
Nizeyimana yavuze ko ikintu cya ibanze Perezida Suluhu yahise akora ari ugusura ibihugu byo mu karere byari bidafitanye umubano mwiza na uwo yasimbuye cyangwa hari amasezerano yadindiye .
Mu bihugu yasuye harimo Uganda na Kenya .
Ati " " " " Iyo ugiye kureba yihutiye kubanza kugira ibyo akemura cyane cyane ku bihugu navuga ko bari bafitanye akangononwa , nka Uganda hari amasezerano ya umuyoboro wa Peteroli uwamubanjirije hari ibyo ibihugu byombi bitabashije kumvikanaho ariko ejo bundi Perezida Suluhu yahise ajya muri Uganda basubukura ibiganiro ndetse hari byinshi
bumvikanyeho . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Ni umuntu kandi ubona ko ibyo yatangaje mu bihe bitandukanye , ashyize imbere kubana neza na ibihugu byo mu Karere harimo na u Rwanda cyane ko ku Rwanda ho basanzwe babanye neza . " " " "
Samia Suluhu Hassan yari asanzwe ari Visi Perezida wa Tanzania , ndetse yaherukaga mu Rwanda mu 2016 , aho yari yahagarariye Umukuru wa Igihugu mu Nama ya 27 ya Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe .
Ubwo yageraga mu Rwanda ari ku wa 17 Nyakanga 2016 , Suluhu Hassan yakiriwe na Francis Gatare wari Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RDB , [ kuri ubu ayobora Ikigo cya Igihugu gishinzwe Peteroli , Gazi na Mine ] ndetse na Mukaruliza Monique wari Umuyobozi wa Umujyi wa Kigali , ubu ni Umujyanama muri Minisiteri ya Ububanyi na Amahanga .
Umwarimu muri Kaminuza , Umwanditsi wa ibitabo akaba na Umunyamakuru ndetse wakurikiraniye hafi politiki ya ishyaka rya CCM dore ko yabaye muri Tanzania , Prof Malonga Pacifique , yabwiye IGIHE ko na ubwo u Rwanda rusanzwe rufitanye umubano mwiza na Tanzania ariko bigaragara ko Perezida Suluhu hazabaho impinduka zigamije kuwushimangira .
Ati " " " " Ntabwo bariya bantu bagendera kuri politiki yabo nka abantu , bagendera kuri politiki ya CCM , ariko itari imwe ya cyera , ni CCM nshya igezweho igendera ku bitekerezo bya igisekuru gishya .
CCM nshya rero ishyira imbere kubana neza na ibihugu bigize akarere kandi wabonye ko u Rwanda ari igihugu kibanye neza na CCM muri iyi myaka . " " " "
Prof Malonga kandi avuga ko azi neza Perezida Suluhu nka umugore uvuga make ariko akarasa ku ntego ndetse agahagarara ku ijambo .
Ikindi kimugira umuntu udasanzwe ngo ni ukuba yarabashije gukorana na Magufuli imyaka itanu , ibintu ahuza no kuba azi neza icyerekezo uyu mugabo yari afite .
Ati " " " " Politiki ye [ Suluhu ] ntabwo ari nshya , ni imwe ya Magufuli , ariko yoroshya ibintu bimwe na bimwe birimo no kuba mwabonye uburyo yahinduye intekerezo kuri Covid - 19 , ariko muri rusange politiki ni ya yindi ikomeza . " " " "
Umunsi uzaba mwiza uboneka mu gitondo . . .
Muri Werurwe 2021 , ubwo Perezida Suluhu yarahiriraga kuyobora Tanzania , Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri ya Ububanyi na Amahanga ushinzwe Umuryango wa Afurika ya Uburasirazuba , Prof Nshuti Manasseh ,
yahagarariye u Rwanda ndetse mu minsi ishize Umugaba Mukuru wa Ingabo za u Rwanda , Gen Jean Bosco Kazura na Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Polisi ya u Rwanda , CG Dan Munyuza bagiriye uruzinduko muri iki gihugu .
Ku ruhande rwa Polisi za ibihugu byombi , ni uruzinduko rwari rugamije gukomeza gushimangira imikoranire isanzwe hagati yazo cyane ko hari amasezerano ibihugu byombi bisanzwe bifitanye ajyanye na imikoranire hagamijwe kurwanya ibyaha byambukiranya imipaka .
CG Munyuza yashimangiye ko Polisi ya u Rwanda na Leta ya u Rwanda muri rusange bafite ubushake bwo kurwanya ibyaha byambukiranya imipaka ya ibihugu byombi .
Ati " " " " Polisi ya u Rwanda ndetse na Leta ya u Rwanda muri rusange dufite ubushake na umuhate mu kurwanya ibyaha byambukiranya ibihugu byacu byombi .
Guhanahana amakuru , guhuza ibikorwa ku mipaka , guhanahana amahugurwa na imyitozo , gukorana inama kenshi mu byiciro byose ni bimwe mu bizadufasha gushyira mu bikorwa amasezerano ya ubufatanye dufitanye . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa Polisi ya Tanzania , IGP Simon Nyakoro Sirro , yashimiye Umuyobozi wa Polisi ya u Rwanda kuba yigomwe umwanya we akajya muri Tanzania .
Yavuze ko ibihugu byombi bisangira byinshi harimo no gufatanya kurwanya ibyaha .
Ati " " " " Ibi bihugu byacu bisangira byinshi harimo kurwanya ibyaha , ariko cyane cyane hakenewe imbaraga na ubufatanye mu kurwanya ibyaha byambukiranya imipaka , tugomba gukorera hamwe mu gushimangira umutekano ku mipaka yacu mu rwego rwo kugabanya ibyaha byambukiranya ibihugu byaciyemo .
Ibi tugomba kubigeraho dushyira mu bikorwa amasezerano ya ubufatanye asanzwe hagati ya Polisi zacu ya u Rwanda na Tanzania . " " " "
Izi nzego zombi zemeranyije guhanahana amakuru ku bijyanye na iterabwoba na ibindi byaha byambukiranya imipaka , gufatanya kugenzura umutekano wo ku mipaka hagamijwe kugabanya ibibazo byateza umutekano muke , guhanahana abanyabyaha , gushyiraho gahunda yo kurwanya ubutagondwa no gushyiraho ikigo gifasha abagizweho ingaruka na ibikorwa
bya iterabwoba na ibindi byaha .
Prof Malonga Pacifique yabwiye IGIHE ko uru ruzinduko rusobanuye byinshi mu bijyanye na imibanire ya ibihugu kuko Umukuru Mukuru wa Ingabo na Umuyobozi wa Polisi bagiye muri Tanzania bahagarariye u Rwanda ndetse na abo bagiranye nabo ibiganiro bakaba ari abahagarariye icyo gihugu kandi bafite na ijambo rikomeye .
Prof Malonga avuga ko kuba u Rwanda na Tanzania bisanzwe bifitanye umubano , igikwiye gukurikiraho ubu ari uko abakuru ba ibihugu byombi baganira bakarebera hamwe icyakorwa ngo uyu mubano wongere usubukurwe cyangwa ushyirwemo ibirungo .
Ati " " " " Ku rwego rwa u Rwanda , ntabwo nzi muri dipolomasi ngo ni nde utangira cyangwa uhamagara undi , njyewe nkanjye mbona intambwe yakurikiraho ari uko u Rwanda rwatumira Perezida Suluhu akaza mu gihuhu akagirana ibiganiro na mugenzi we bakareba uko basubukura ibikorwa na imishinga ibihugu byombi bihuriyeho . " " " "
Prof Malonga agaragaza ko ariko kugeza ubu ibihugu byombi bibanye neza ndetse abavandimwe ba abanyarwanda baba muri Tanzania , bakora ibikorwa bya ubucuruzi ndetse ku mupaka wa Rusumo , urujya na uruza rukomeje kunyuzwaho ibicuruzwa byaba ibiva mu Rwanda cyangwa ibiva muri Tanzania bigana mu Rwanda .
Perezida Kagame yavuze kuri Coup da Etat muri Mali na ibyakurikiye urupfu rwa Idriss Déby .
Yabitangaje mu kiganiro aherutse kugirana na TV5 Monde muri Village Urugwiro , nyuma ya uruzinduko rwa Perezida Emmanuel Macron i Kigali .
Ku mapaji ya imbere mu binyamakuru byo ku Isi muri iki Cyumweru , inkuru ya ihirikwa rya ubutegetsi muri Mali iri mu zikomeye ziri kuvugwaho .
Ni ihirikwa ryabaye ku wa Mbere wa icyumweru gishize ubwo Perezida wa inzibacyuho Bah Ndaw na Minisitiri we wa Intebe Moctar Ouane bafungirwaga mu Kigo cya Gisirikare cya Kati , bugacya begura bashinjwa gufata ibyemezo batagishije inama Visi Perezida Colonel Assimi Goita .
Colonel Assimi Goita wanagize uruhare mu ihirikwa rya ubutegetsi bwa Ibrahim Boubacar Keïta mu 2020 , yahise yigira Perezida asezeranya amatora mu mwaka utaha .
Ibihugu bitandukanye na imiryango mpuzamahanga byamaganye iryo hirikwa rya ubutegetsi , ndetse inzego zitandukanye zirimo Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe ziri mu buhuza bugamije gusubiza ibintu ku murongo muri Mali .
Perezida Kagame yabajijwe icyo avuga kuri iryo hirikwa rya ubutegetsi ribaye hashize amezi icyenda habaye irindi mu gihugu nka Mali , cyazahajwe na ibibazo bya umutekano bishingiye ku mitwe ya iterabwoba .
Yavuze ko icyangombwa abantu bagakwiriye kurebaho , ari umutekano wa abaturage na ububabare bari kunyuramo kubera ibyabaye , mbere yo kwamagana cyangwa kutamagana ihirikwa rya ubutegetsi .
Ati " " " " Ntabwo ntekereza ko umuyobozi uwo ari we wese wo muri Afurika cyangwa se undi muturage wo muri Afurika yakwishimira umutekano muke nka uriya .
Abantu bavuga ku ihirikwa rya ubutegetsi , bakavuga ku bayobozi na ibindi ariko ikintu gikomeye gikwiriye kuduhangayikisha , ni ububabare abaturage bari kunyuramo kubera ibyo . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Ikibazo cyo kumenya byimbitse ngo ni ibiki byabaye , ni nde wabikoze ?
Ibyo abantu babivugaho ariko igikomeye ubu ni umutekano muke na ububabare bwa abaturage , ni bariya bantu batabona neza ejo hazaza .
Ni byiza ko twishyira mu mwanya wa abaturage ba Mali . " " " "
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko kubyamagana cyangwa kutabyamagana mu matangazo gusa , ntacyo byamarira abaturage , ahubwo igikenewe ari icyakorwa ngo basubirane amahoro .
Mu 2007 , Kigali yari yihariye 44 % bya abakozi ba Leta bose , 50 % bya ibikorwa bya abikorera na inganda .
Mu mashuri makuru na za Kaminuza byari mu gihugu , ane muri atandatu yari muri Kigali .
Kuko ariho hari amahirwe , benshi mu barangiza Kaminuza bagumaga muri Kigali bashakisha imirimo .
Mu cyerecyezo 2050 , byitezwe ko u Rwanda ruzaba rutuwe na abaturage basaga miliyoni 22 , barimo 70 % bazaba batuye mu mijyi bavuye kuri 18 . 7 % batuye mu mijyi kuri ubu .
Mu kubigeraho imijyi yo mu Rwanda yagabanyijwemo ibyiciro bitanu birimo Umujyi wa Kigali , imijyi itatu igaragiye Umujyi wa Kigali , imijyi umunani yunganira uwa Kigali , imijyi 16 iciriritse ya uturere na imijyi mito ( santeri ) 73 .
Manzi Rugirangoga yanditse igitabo La légende da Havilah kivuga ku buzima bwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .
Iki gitabo cya Rugirangoga cyasohowe na inzu ye itunganya ibitabo , Maison da Edition Elimu .
Cyanditse mu buryo bwa ibarankuru ( fiction ) , aho avuga amateka ashaririye yanyuzemo bya umwihariko ajyanye na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE avuga ku mpamvu yanditse iki gitabo , Rugirangoga yagize ati " " " " Nari mfite imyaka ibiri nibwo nabashije kurokoka mpungira mu Bufaransa , nkomeza kujya nibaza byinshi nti kuki ari twe byabayeho ?
Mu bitekerezo byanjye hakagarukamo kenshi kuki ?
Kuki ari twebwe tugirirwa ubugome butagira ubutabera , ibi byose bigaragara mu gitabo cyanjye . " " " "
Uyu musore wiciwe abarimo mama we muri Jenoside , yavuze ko yanditse iki gitabo ashaka gufasha abandi bari mu kigero cye gukunda gusoma no kwandika , gusobanukirwa amateka ariko bya umwihariko gushishikariza Abanyarwanda kwiyandikira amateka yabo .
Ati " " " " Njye na urungano rwanjye twakuze tubona ibitabo bya amashusho na amafilimi ya Abanyamerika na Abayapani , kuburyo najyaga nibaza uko bo babigenza ngo basangize abandi umuco wabo gutyo bikatugiraho ingaruka , tukabikunda kandi turi Abanyarwanda cyangwa Abanyafurika muri rusange .
Nibwo nagize nti natwe ibi twabikora kuko dufite amateka yo kuba twavuga iwacu tubwira Isi . " " " "
Manzi Rugirangoga yavuze ko kwandika byamufashije kuruhuka mu mutwe , no kumva atari wenyine kuko ibimurimo aba abisangije abandi .
Yavuze ko Abanyarwanda na Abanyafurika bakwiriye kwandika amateka yabo kandi ko bidakomeye nkuko bamwe babikeka .
Ati " " " " Ntibyoroshye ariko birashoboka kuko icya mbere ni ugutangira ukabishyira ku rupapuro .
Nubwo wabikora ukajya ubyihorera ariko ukazagaruka kongera , ariko nturekere iyo .
Nka iki gitabo nacyanditse imyaka myinshi .
Kwandika bisaba gukunda gusoma no kwandika kandi bifungura na ibitekerezo .
Kwandika ni ukwemera gukora amakosa kandi ugafata umwanya wo kuyakosora , ukagira ukwihangana muri wowe cyane . " " " "
Manzi Rugirangoga yize amashuri yisumbuye mu Rwanda , ajya kwiga uburezi muri Kaminuza yo mu Bufaransa .
Kubera inzu yandika ibitabo " " " " Elimu " " " " yashinze mu Rwanda , bituma ahaza kenshi .
Yavuze ko yifuza ko inzu ye ya ibitabo yazaba inzu ikomeye kandi ifasha benshi mu bandika haba mu Rwanda no muri Afurika .
Yavuze ko nubwo La légende da Havilah aricyo gitabo asohoye bwa mbere , atari cyo cya nyuma kuko azasohora ibindi byinshi .
Igitabo cya Manzi Rugirangoga uwagishaka yagisanga hano :
Reba ikiganiro IGIHE yagiranye na Manzi Rugirangoga
Amateka ya icyemezo cyavaga mu Bubiligi kigahesha Abanyarwanda guhinduka no gusangira na abazungu .
Hari abazi ko ivangura ku birabura ari Apartheid yabaye ikimenyabose muri Afurika ya Epfo , nyamara no mu Rwanda yarahabaye cyane cyane guhera mu 1916 ubwo Abadage basimburwaga na Ababiligi .
Igitabo " " " " Ibitaramo ku mateka ya u Rwanda " " " " cya Zephrin Kagiraneza , kigaragaza ko abazungu bakigera mu Rwanda , baranzwe no gusuzugura cyane abo basanze , Abanyarwanda bagafatwa nka abashenzi , bari mu mwijima kandi bakeneye urumuri .
Na uyu munsi hari abafata kwitwara ruzungu nka ubusirimu na ubujijuke , mu gihe hari abagishinja abazungu ko ibyo bakoze byari bigamije gusenya umuco nyarwanda .
Kagiraneza avuga ko abazungu bamaze kugera mu Rwanda , Abanyarwanda baciwemo ibice binyuze no mu buryo bwa imibereho kugeza aho hashyizweho utubari na hoteli abirabura batemerewe kwinjiramo , mu gihe babaga batarahabwa icyangombwa cyatangwaga na umwami wa u Bubiligi kibemerera kwitwa Abazungu .
Iyo migenzereze yigeze kurakaza umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa , ubwo yavumburaga ko kuri hotel Faucon i Butare handitse ko nta mbwa cyangwa umwirabura wemerewe kuhinjira .
Icyangombwa cyo kwita umuzungu ngo usangire nabo
Mu gitabo cya Kagiraneza cyasohotse mu 1990 , havugwamo uburyo nyuma ya uko amashuri amaze kwiyongera hirya no hino mu Rwanda , abayavuyemo batangiye kugira imyitwarire irenze gato iya ababyeyi babo na abavandimwe babaga batarayagezemo .
Byatumye mu Rwanda rwa icyo gihe , abazungu bahimba amagambo agamije gushyira abahindutse mu byiciro .
Abaturage basanzwe , bamwe batageze mu ishuri bitwaga " " " " Indigènes , " " " " naho ababaga bakubutse mu mashuri batangiye kwitwara kizungu bavuga na Igifaransa , abo bitwaga évolués , abanyarwanda baje kubahimba imvuruwe .
Abenshi muri abo babaga barangije amashuri , babaga bafite imirimo runaka bakora banahemberwa itandukanye no korora no guhinga byakorwaga na rubanda rusanzwe .
Imirimo yabo akenshi yabaga ifite aho ihuriye na iy abazungu dore ko aribo ahanini babagenzuraga .
Nubwo abazungu babaga baziranye , abo birabura ba imvuruwe ntibabaga bemerewe gusabana , kugenderana no gusangira na abazungu , keretse ababaga bafite icyangombwa cyatanzwe na umwami wa u Bubiligi kibahindura abazungu .
Kagiraneza mu gitabo cye agaragaza ko no mu rusengero abazungu , imvuruwe na abaturage basanzwe babaga batandukanye .
Agira ati " " " " I Kigali mu Kiliziya ya Umuryango Mutagatifu ba évolués bagenerwaga umwanya wabo , bagateganyirizwa na intebe zegamirwa bityo bakaba batandukanye na abakirisitu bo muri rubanda .
Abazungu nabo bagiraga uruhushya rwabo bagategurirwa na udusego two gupfukumaho .
Utwo dusego tukabatandukanya na ba évolués . " " " "
Ubwo mu Rwanda utubari na hoteli byari bitangiye kuhagera , ntabwo Abanyarwanda babaga bemerewe kunywera aho abazungu banyweraga cyangwa bariraga .
Igitabo cya Kagiraneza kivuga ko nka akabari kitwaga Café Impala kabaga i Kigali cyangwa muri hoteli Faucon i Butare hagitangira , nta munyafurika wakandagiragamo uretse umwami gusa .
Umukambwe Dr . Venant Ntabomvura , akaba uwa Mbere wiyandakishije kwiga muri Kaminuza Nkuru ya u Rwanda ubwo yatangiraga muri 1963 , muri 2016 yabwiye IGIHE ko ubwo umwami Rudahigwa yamenyaga ko nta Munyarwanda wemerewe kwinjira muri hotel Faucon byamubabaje cyane .
Yagize ati " " " " Sinzi neza niba Rudahigwa yari azi amakuru ya uko abirabura basuzugurwa ako kageni bagahezwa kuhinjira [ . . . ] ubwo yari avuye i Burundi , yarahageze ashaka kuharuhukira gato , nibwo we na abo bari kumwe babonye ya magambo avuga ngo " " " " Entrée interdit aux noirs et chiens . " " " "
Umwami yahise arakara bituma yinjirana ingufu , [ . . . ] hari na abavuga ko yakubise urushyi umuzungu wari ahacunze umutekano ashatse kumubuza kwinjira . " " " "
Kugira ngo ushyikirane na abazungu , musangire , mugenderane wagombaga kugira icyangombwa cyanditse cyerekana ko nawe wabaye umuzungu .
Icyo cyangombwa cyitwaga carte du mérite civique .
Icyo cyemezo cyanahabwaga abaturage bo muri Congo babaga bagaragaza kwitwara nka abazungu .
Itegeko rigishyiraho ryari riri mu mategeko mbonezamubano ya Congo Mbiligi yasohotse mu 1948 .
Iyo umunyarwanda yashakaga gufatwa nka umuzungu , hakorwaga akanama kazajya kugenzura ko yitwara kizungu .
Abagize ako kanama bazaga iwe mu rugo kureba uko yitwara , bakareba niba atunze intebe nziza mu nzu , niba afite ameza , utubati , imashini yo kudoda imyenda yacitse na ibindi .
Kagiraneza agaragaza ko banarebaga uko we na umugore na abana bambaye haba imyenda na inkweto , basanga bambaye nabi bakavuga ko bakiri abaturage .
Mu byagenzurwaga kandi harimo uburyo usaba icyemezo yitwara mu gihe ari kurya we na umuryango we .
Uwo basangaga arisha intoki yabaga atakaje amanota .
Barebaga ko iwe barya amagi , ko banywa icyayi , ko barya imigati , niba anywa umuvinyo .
Uwo bazaga kugenzura akagira umwaku bakahasanga urwagwa cyangwa amarwa , yabaga avuye mu mubare wa abazitwa abazungu .
Mu gihe isuzuma ryabaga rirangiye , abagize akanama bakoraga raporo ikoherezwa i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi , icyemezo kigatangwa na umwami wa u Bubiligi .
Uwabaga amaze kugihabwa , yajyaga kucyandikisha mu rukiko rwa teritwari , agahabwa na nimero imuranga .
Uwahabwaga icyangombwa , yagengwaga na amategeko agenga abazungu , agahembwa umushahara umwe nabo , akaregwa mu nkiko zifite ububasha bwo kuburanisha abazungu na ibindi .
Igitabo " " " " Ibitaramo ku mateka ya u Rwanda , kivuga ko atari Abanyarwanda benshi babashije gutambuka icyo kizamini .
Abazwi babashije kubona icyo cyangombwa kibemerera gushyikirana na abazungu harimo nka Prosper Bwanakweli waje kuba mu ishyaka RADER , Alexis Karekezi wahoze mu nama nkuru ya igihugu kubwa umwami Mutara II Rudahigwa , Anastase Makuza wabaye Minisitiri muri Guverinoma ya Kayibanda Gregoire , na Lazaro Ndazaro na we wabaye muri RADER
Umusaza Ntabomvura Venant yavuze ko umwami Rudahigwa amaze gukubitira umuzungu kuri Faucon , yatangiye no kujya ahakoreshereza inama za abatware ndetse akanabakiriramo .
Nubwo Rudahigwa yabikoraga kugira ngo Abanyarwanda bahatinyuke , Ntabomvura avuga ko bakomeje kuhatinya .
Ubwoba bwo kujya muri izo hoteli zitwaga ko zigenewe abazungu , Abanyarwanda batangiye kubushira gahoro gahoro nyuma ya 1962 u Rwanda rumaze kubona ubwigenge .
Yavuze ko hari izindi ndirimbo kugeza ubu ari gutunganya muri studio ariko zo zikazasohokana na amashusho .
Ati " " " " Hari izindi ndirimbo turimo gutunganya mu buryo bwa amajwi nyinshi kandi nziza , nizirangira tuzazikorera amashusho kandi nizera ko bizagenda neza mbifashijwe na Imana . " " " "
Yavuze ko nyuma yo gushyira hanze amashusho ya iyi ndirimbo ye ya mbere abantu bayakiriye neza kandi akaba atekereza ko na izindi azashyira hanze mu minsi iri mbere zizakirwa neza .
Uwera Sarah Sanyu azwi cyane muri Ambassadors of Christ kubera ijwi rye ryuje ubuhanga kandi rikundwa na abatari bake bafashwa na indirimbo za iyi korali , aririmbanamo na musaza we Nelson Manzi .
Yamenyekanye cyane atera mu ndirimbo zirimo " " " " Birakwiye gushima , " " " " " " " " Yesu we " " " " na izindi .
Yatangiye kuririmba muri Ambassadors of Christ mu mpera za 2006 akiga mu mashuri yisumbuye .
Yafungiwe gutunga imbunda atarayibonesha amaso !
Ubuzima bushaririye Padiri Ubald yanyuzemo na umurage yasize .
Padiri Ubald Rugirangoga washyinguwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri , ni umwe mu Banyarwanda banyuze muri ubwo buzima bushaririye ariko aza kubirenga ababarira abamwiciye umuryango wa abantu 86 ndetse arihira amashuri abana babo .
Padiri Ubald ni mwene Kabera Jacques na Mukaruhamya Anesia , yavukanye na abana batatu na we wa kane .
Babiri baracyariho , umwe yazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatusti hamwe na nyina mu gihe hasigaye murumuna we na mushiki we .
Umuhango wo kumusezeraho wabaye mu byiciro bitatu harimo icyabereye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika , icyabereye i Kigali muri Paruwasi Regina Pacis ndetse na icyo kumusezeraho bwa nyuma cyabereye kuri " " " " Centre Ibanga rya Amahoro " " " " ari naho yashyinguwe kuri uyu wa 2 Werurwe 2021 .
Umuhango wo kumusezerano witabiriwe na Umuyobozi wa Akarere ka Rusizi , Kayumba Ephrem wari uhagarariye leta ndetse na Abepiskopi Gatolika batatu barimo Musenyeri Sinayobye Edouard uherutse kuragizwa Diyosezi ya Cyangugu ari nayo Ubald yakoreragamo umurimo .
Hari kandi Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Ruhengeri , Musenyeri Harorimana Vincent ndetse na Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Gikongoro , Musenyeri Hakizimana Célestin [ ni na we umaze igihe ari Umuyobozi wa Diyosezi ya Cyangugu mu gihe yari itegereje Umwepiskopi usimbura Musenyeri Bimenyimana Jean Damascène witabye Imana mu myaka ibiri ishize ] .
Ubuhamya bwatanzwe kuri Ubald bwagarutse ku buzima bwamuranze kuva akiri umwana kugeza aho amaze kuba Umusaseridoti , hibandwa ku bikorwa bya isanamitima no gushishikariza abantu ubumwe na ubwiyunge byamuranze nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 .
Murumuna we , Rugwizangoga Revelien wavuze mu izina rya umuryango wa Padiri Ubald akomokamo , yashimiye Abanyarwanda bose , abaje kwifatanya na bo mu kumusezeraho ndetse na Umuryango mugari wa Abihayimana Ubald yabarizwagamo .
Yavuze ko kubura Ubald ari igihombo gikomeye ku muryango na igihugu muri rusange ku buryo bitoroshye gusobanura icyo yari avuze ku muryango Nyarwanda .
Yagize ati " " " " Ntibyoroshye kubona amagambo yo kuvuga nyuma yo gutakaza umuvandimwe , bya umwihariko umuvandimwe nka Padiri Ubald .
Kuri njye , yari Mukuru wanjye , yari umubyeyi , yari inshuti nziza akaba na umujyanama wa ikirenga kubera ubunararibonye yari afite . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Kandi nka Umusaseridoti mwiza , nzi neza ko yabaye umubyeyi wa bose , inshuti ya bose , umujyanama wa bose .
Umutima we wahoraga ufunguye kuri bose , imiryango ya urugo rwe yahoraga ifunguye kuri bose ; abato na abakuru , abakomeye na aboroheje , abakire na abakene . " " " "
Padiri Ubald yavukiye mu muryango wa abakirisitu bubaha Imana kandi bayikunda ku buryo yakuze bamutoza kuvuga ishapure buri mugoroba .
Ibi ariko byiyongeraga ku kuba nyina yarabarizwaga muri Rejiyo Mariya mu gihe se yari umuririmbyi muri Korali .
Papa wa Ubald yaje kwicwa mu 1963 azize amacakubiri yariho aho Abatutsi bicwaga , bagasenyerwa abandi bakameneshwa .
Rugwizangoga yavuze ko " " " " Padiri Ubald rero yabyirukiye mu mibereho myiza ya icyo gihe kuko Se yari umwarimu mu mashuri gusa siko byakomeje kuko Se yaje kwicwa mu 1963 , Ubald akiri umwana muto wa imyaka irindwi . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Ubwo Ubald yasigaranye na nyina nawe ukiri muto , muziko kera bashakaga bakiri bato .
Kuva icyo gihe Ubald yatangiye inzira ya umuruho , ni umwana wa imfura ubwo ahindutse umugabo mu rugo aho yafashaga nyina kurera abo bavukana .
Agafatanya ishuri na imirimo yo mu rugo kenshi ivunanye ariko ariwe , ari nyina nta yandi mahitamo bari bafite . " " " "
Rugwizangoga yavuze ko Ubald kuva icyo gihe ariwe wahindutse nka umugabo mu rugo , akaba umujyanama wa nyina ndetse uko yakuraga akagenda arushaho kubyitwaramo neza .
Ku rundi ruhande ariko nubwo Padiri Ubald yakuriye mu muruho , urwango rushingiye ku macakubiri , itotezwa na ibindi bibazo , ibyo byose yarabyihanganiye arabirenga , akurana umutima mwiza , wuzuye urukundo , urugwiro , ubusabane na impuhwe nyinshi kandi kuri bose .
Murumuna we avuga ko ibyo byose ari imico yatojwe na nyina na Imana yamuhanze kuko ni yo yari izi icyo yamuteguragamo .
Yashinjwe gutunga imbunda !
Mu 1973 , ni bwo Ubald yari mu mashuri yisumbuye aho yigaga mu Iseminari yo ku Nyundo gusa yaje kuvayo ahunze abanyeshuri biganaga bari bamaze kwishakamo igico cyo kwica bagenzi babo bishingiye ku macakubiri .
Imodoka yacikishije Ubald na bagenzi be yamugejeje ku Kibuye [ I Karongi ] , ibavanye i Gisenyi ku Nyundo , ubundi bakomeza na amaguru bakora urugendo rwa iminsi itatu batarya , batanywa , bataryama .
Icyo gihe Ubald yari afite imyaka 15 .
Murumuna we ati " " " " Ageze mu rugo , icyo gihe nyina yishimiye kumwakira ariko ibihe ntabwo byari byoroshye kuko yasanze barahunze inzu zabo barara mu bihuru , barahunze ibitero bya abaturanyi babo bashakaga kubica . " " " "
Padiri Ubald na nyina na barumuna we na mushiki we bahungiye i Burundi , ni ho yashoboye gukomereza amashuri mu Iseminari ya Ngozi ari naho yarangirije amashuri mu 1978 .
Yaje kugaruka mu Rwanda ashaka gukomereza amashuri mu Iseminari Nkuru ya Nyakibanda ubwo yashakaga kuba Padiri .
Murumuna we ati " " " " Icyo gihe yarambwiye ati , Papa yishwe kubera urwango , twahunze kubera urwango , nsubiye mu Rwanda kwigisha urukundo kuko ineza itsinda inabi . " " " "
Mu 1984 , ubwo yari amaze kuba Umusaseridoti yabaye Padiri muri Paruwasi ya Nyamasheke kugeza mu 1994 .
Yitangiye iyo paruwasi atizigama na umutima mwiza , ubushake na imbaraga .
Mu 1992 , igihe hirya no hino mu Rwanda , hatangiraga igeragezwa rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi nanone urwango rwageze kuri Padiri Ubald inzu yari yarubakiye nyina iratwikwa , bukeye ajya gutabara ahageze aravuga ati " " " " Abakoze ibi ndabababariye . " " " "
Murumuna we ati " " " " Nyuma yaho , Padiri Ubald yaje gufungwa bamubeshyeye ko yatunze imbunda kandi mu buzima bwe ntabwo yigeze yiga kurasa . " " " "
Uko Padiri Ubald yaje kuba rusumbanzika !
Muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 , abahigwaga bagera ku bihumbi 45 i Nyamasheke bamuhungiyeho kuva tariki 8 Mata kugeza 13 Mata 1994 yari kumwe nabo , amarana nabo iyo minsi yose bahanganye na Interahamwe zifite intwaro bo bafite amabuye na amatafari gusa .
Padiri Ubald yaje guhungishirizwa i Cyangugu icyo gihe abo bari baje kumuhungiraho basigarana agahinda bazi ko bagiye kwicwa cyane ko uwarimo abafasha mu rugamba rwo guhangana na abo bantu yari agiye .
Rugwizangoga bavukana yakomeje ati " " " " Padiri Ubald yababajwe cyane na ukuntu yitangiye Paruwasi ya Nyamasheke atizigama akabigisha ineza na urukundo bikarangira mu 1994 , abakirisitu bishe abakirisitu bagenzi babo .
Avuye muri ubu buzima bikimushegesha cyane cyane ko abasabye imbabazi bakiri mbarwa . " " " "
Muri Gicurasi 1994 , Padiri Ubald yabashije guhungira mu Bufaransa anyuze muri Repubulika Iharanira Demukarasi ya Congo .
Ageze mu Bufaransa yakiriwe na inshuti ze zimuha buri kimwe cyose ariko ntiyanyuzwe yagarutse mu Rwanda kwigisha urukundo na amahoro .
Rugwizangoga yavuze ko mu 1995 , aribwo Ubald yamuhamagaye akamubwira ko agiye kugaruka ariko ngo ageze mu Rwanda kubera ihungabana rikomeye yari agifite byatumye adahita asubira i Cyangugu ahubwo aba muri Paruwasi St André .
Padiri Ubald yaje kugirwa Padiri Mukuru wa Paruwasi Mushaka ari nabwo yatangiye kumenyekana mu bikorwa byo gusengera abantu bagakira indwara zitandukanye akaba ari naho yatangirije urugendo rwa isanamitima na ubumwe na ubwiyunge .
Ahagana mu 2000 , Padiri Ubald yamenyekanye cyane mu bikorwa bya Gacaca ya Gikristu yiswe Sinodi , akajya asaba abantu kuvugisha ukuri ari abagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , ari abayirokotse na ababirebaga bose bakavugisha ukuri kwa ibyabaye .
Muri iyi paruwasi ya Mushaka kandi ni ho Padiri Ubald yahise atangirira ibikorwa byo gushishikariza abantu gusaba imbabazi ari uwakoze Jenoside agasaba imbabazi uwo yayikoreye kandi bakiyunga .
Muri iyi paruwasi ya Mushaka yahuje abishe na abiciwe bagera muri 446 bibumbiye mu matsinda 10 .
Murumuna we ati " " " " Padiri Ubald yarabahuje mu rugendo rwa isanamitima , gusaba imbabazi no gutanga imbabazi biganisha ku kuruhuka byatanze umusaruro kandi ingero ni nyinshi .
I Mushaka umusore wa umusirikare yababariye umugabo wishe se kugeza na aho ashakanye na umukobwa we , Padiri Ubald arabashyingira ndetse anabyara umwana muri batisimu . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Padiri Ubald ibyo yigishaga yarabyemeraga , nawe ubwe yababariye uwamarije umuryango we wari ugizwe na abantu 86 barimo nyina umubyara .
Imbabazi yamugiriye zaherekejwe na ibikorwa bya impuhwe birimo kurihira amashuri abana ba uwo mugabo ndetse umwana umwe wa umukobwa ubu ni dogiteri . " " " "
Mu 2015 , Komisiyo ya Igihugu ya Ubumwe na Ubwiyunge yahaye Padiri Ubald Umudali wa Umurinzi wa Igihango nka uwimakaje ibi bikorwa bya isanamitima na ubumwe na ubwiyunge .
Rugwizangoga ati " " " " Icyakora agiye akibona ko ibyo yari amaze gukora bikiri nka agatonyanga mu nyanja . " " " "
Padiri Ubald yabonye izuba muri Gashyantare 1955 , yavukiye mu yahoze ari Segiteri ya Rwabidege muri Paruwasi ya Mwezi , Komini ya Karengera , Perefegitura ya Cyangugu .
Yagizwe umupadiri mu 1984 ubwo yari afite imyaka 29 ya amavuko .
Uko umuhango wo gushyingura mu cyubahiro Padiri Rugirangoga Ubald wagenze ( Amafoto na Video ) .
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 2 Werurwe 2021 , nibwo habaye umuhango wo kumusezeraho bwa nyuma no kumushyingura mu cyubahiro , mu Karere ka Rusizi ahazwi nko ku Ibanga rya Amahoro .
Centre Ibanga rya Amahoro , ni agasozi gaherereye mu Kagari ka Kamatita , Umurenge wa Gihundwe , Akarere ka Rusizi mu Burengerazuba .
Ni muri Diyosezi Gatolika ya Cyangugu , Paruwasi Nkanka , Santarari Muhari .
Ni agasozi gafite ubuso busaga hegitari 25 ndetse hari ibikorwa yagizemo uruhare .
Ibikorwa byo gusengera abarwayi bagakira indwara zitandukanye zirimo ibyorezo na izindi zabaga zarabaye akarande , Padiri Ubald ntabwo yabikoreraga mu Rwanda gusa kuko na umunsi yandura Coronavirus ari nayo yaje kugeza ku rupfu rwe yari amaze iminsi muri Amerika mu bikorwa bya amasengesho .
Uretse muri Amerika , Padiri Ubald yatumirwaga henshi mu bihugu bya amahanga mu bikorwa byo gusengera abarwayi no kubibutsa ko abantu bose ari bene mugabo umwe bakwiye kubana mu mahoro na urukundo .
Ni nayo mpamvu umuhango wo kumuherekeza iyo bitaza kuba icyorezo cya COVID - 19 , wari kwitabirwa na ingeri nyinshi za abantu baturutse imihanda yose haba mu Rwanda no hanze yarwo .
Ababanye na we bose batanze ubuhamya bugaruka ku mirimo yakoze ndetse yashimiwe umurage yasigiye abakirisitu na Abanyarwanda muri rusange ushingiye ku ndangagaciro yo guca bugufi no guharanira amahoro .
Abo mu muryango we bakomoje ku buryo yababereye urugero rwiza rwa umuntu urangwa na urukundo .

Twamwakiriye nka umwana mu rugo : Abanya - Gihundwe bishimiye umushumba mushya Past Nsabayesu .
Imitima yabo yari ishimishijwe no kuba ururembo rugiye kuyoborwa na umwana wabo , kuko muri Gihundwe ariho yakuriye ndetse akahakora na imirimo itandukanye mu itorero .
Byari ibyishimo bikomeye kuri iki Cyumweru ku bakirisitu ba i Gihundwe kongera kubonana na umwana wabo bakoranye umurimo wa Imana mu gihe cya imyaka myinshi , ubu bakaba bamwakira nka umushumba wa ururembo rwabo .
Pasiteri Nsabayesu yakuriye mu Itorero rya Gihundwe kuko ariho yakirijwe afite imyaka 11 , ahakorera imirimo itandukanye .
Nyuma kubera impamvu za ubuzima yaje kuhava ariko akomeza gukurikirana uko imirimo igenda muri iri torero .
Bamwe mu bakirisitu bo mu itorero rya Gihundwe baganiriye na IGIHE , bavuze ko bishimiye kubona umwana wabo aje kubabera umushumba .
Majyambere Cyprien yagize ati " " " " Ni ishimwe rikomeye .
Twarishimye cyane kubona Nsabayesu ari we uje kutubera umushumba .
Ni umuntu utuzi neza , bizadufasha gutera imbere .
Kuba kandi ari umuntu ukiri muto ni byiza buri wese bazabasha kumvikana . " " " "
" " " " Haba abakuru bazumvikana kuko ni umwana wabo bareze baramuzi neza ndetse natwe urubyiruko tuzumvikana kuko turi bamwe .
Ni ishimwe rikomeye kuri twe kubona umuntu nka uyu ukunda Imana kandi uzi na ubwenge , bizadufasha mu iterambere . " " " "
Ibi byishimo abihuje na Twagira Pierre wavuze ko ari Imana ibikoze kuko nta mwana wakifuriza ibibi iwabo .
Ati " " " " Imana iradushumbushije .
Buriya nta mwana utifuriza iwabo ibyiza turabihamya tudashidikanya ko tuzabana neza .
Nka Korali Bethania twese byaradushimishije nubwo afite inshingano nyinshi ariko azadufasha muri korali . " " " "
Pasiteri Nsabayesu Aimable na we ibyishimo ni byose kongera gusubira ku ivuko ari umushumba .
Yavuze ko azakorana na abavandimwe bakoranye umurimo kuva kera mu gushaka icyateza imbere itorero .
Ati " " " " Nanejejwe no guhabwa inshingano zo kuba Umushumba wa Ururembo navukiyemo , nakuriyemo kandi nakoreyemo umurimo wa Imana igihe kirekire . " " " "
" " " " Ndashimira abambanjirije kandi nanjye niteguye gutanga umusanzu wanjye mu gihe cyanjye tukamamaza ubwami bwa Imana kandi tukarushaho no kwiteza imbere dutegereje kugaruka kwa Yesu Kirisitu . " " " "
Yakomeje avuga ko icyo ashyize imbere ari uko amaparuwasi yose ya Gihundwe uko ari 71 atera imbere mu buryo bwa umwuka ndetse no mu bwa umubiri .
Ati " " " " Turifuza Gihundwe ifite ububyutse budasanzwe bwuzuyemo kwigaragaza kwa Imana mu mibereho ya abantu , ifite ubwiza bugaragarira amaso ya abantu bugatera abandi kuhabenguka , kandi ifite iterambere ryuzuye kuri roho no ku mubiri . " " " "
" " " " Tuzashyira imbaraga mu ivugabutumwa rizana benshi kuri Kirisitu no kubungabunga intama turagijwe , nazo zifite ubugingo buzima mu mibiri mizima .
Tuzita ku kuzamura umutungo mu rwego rwo guca ubukene mu itorero .
Ikindi ni ukugarura urukundo na ubumwe mu itorero . " " " "
Yongeyeho ko byose bazabifashwa no gusenga cyane , gukora cyane no gukiranuka .
Pasiteri Nsabayesu yari ayoboye Umudugudu wa Kacyiru muri ADEPR akaba asanzwe ari umuhanga mu bijyanye na umuziki kuko ari umwarimu mu Ishuri rya Umuziki rya Nyundo .

Igihe nka iki mu 1900 !
Dutembere Kiliziya ya mbere yubatswe mu Rwanda .
Ni aho byahereye ngo uyu munsi benshi tube twarabatijwe , tube turi abakirisitu .
Abo Bapadiri bahereye i Save muri Diyosezi ya Butare , bahavuye bakomereza i Zaza , Nyundo , Mibirizi , Kabgayi na ahandi hose maze inkuru nziza ikwira i Rwanda .
Nyuma ya imyaka 43 gusa bari bamaze kugera na ibwami , bumvisha Umwami Rudahigwa ko akwiriye kubatizwa maze ku wa 17 Ukwakira 1943 , atega uruhanga rwe Musenyeri Léon Classe amusukaho amazi ahera ko abona izina rya irikirisitu rya Charles Léon Pierre , ni uko u Rwanda rwegurirwa Kirisitu Umwami gutyo .
Rudahigwa icyo gihe yabyawe muri Batisimu na Guverineri Mukuru wa Congo Mbiligi na Rwanda - Urundi , Pierre Ryckmans , abatiranwa na nyina , Umugabekazi Nyiramavugo Kankazi , wiswe Radegonde .
Kiliziya Gatolika ni uko yashinze imizi mu Rwanda , bihera aho bigera mu buzima busanzwe bwa buri munsi bwa abanyarwanda iva mu iyobokamana igera no mu bikorwa bya iterambere nka amashuri aho ubu ariyo ifite menshi mu gihugu , yubaka ibitaro na ibindi bikorwa remezo byinshi .
