Mu 2019 , IGIHE yakoze urugendo i Save ku isoko ya Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda , aho abamisiyoneri ba mbere bicaye bavuye ibwami , bamaze kuganira na Umwami Musinga , baba ariho bubaka Kiliziya .
Iyo Kiliziya yubatswe muri Gashyantare 1900 , nta gihe cya nyacyo kizwi ariko amateka menshi asobanura ko hari ku itariki ya munani ubwo ibuye rya mbere ryagerekwaga ku rindi .
Icyo gihe Kiliziya yubatswe yari iya ibyatsi ariko nyuma hubakwa iya amatafari ahiye .
Byinshi mu bikoresho byarimo na ubu biracyahari , urugero nka iriba rya Batisimu ryakoreshwaga mu kubatiza , inanga yakoreshwaga mu gucuranga mu kiliziya yakoreshwaga na abantu batatu bahagaga umwuka kugira ngo ikore .
Padiri Mukwiye Fidèle yantembereje muri iyi kiliziya aho yari iri hose , anyereka ikibindi kimaze iyo myaka yose cyashyirwagamo amazi yo kubatiza .
Ati " " " " Ababatijwe bwa mbere ni kiriya gikoresho bakoreshaga , yari kiliziya nini cyane . " " " "
Yari ifite inkingi 24 , ubu hafi ya zose zaraguye hasigara imwe ari nayo ifite agace gato ka Chapelle gakoreshwa nka urwibutso rwa iyo kiliziya ya kera .
Ati " " " " Kahindutse aka abantu bashaka gusenga no gushimira Imana ko yatumye aha hantu haba ahantu urebye abantu ba mbere babatirijwe , baherewe amasakaramentu . " " " "
Imbere muri iyo chapelle nta bintu bya kera bikihagarara gusa hifashishwa nka uburyo bwo kwiga amateka .
Abakirisitu bo muri Paruwasi ya Save mu bijyanye na imyemerere nyobokamana , ntabwo batandukanye na ab ahandi ariko hari umwihariko .
Ati " " " " Hari utuntu tugaragaza ko bafite umuco wa Gikirisitu , nko guhabwa isakaramentu rya Penetensiya kenshi , umuntu yumva ko hatashira ukwezi , ibyumweru bibiri atayihawe .
Ni cyo kintu nabonye barusha ahandi .
Ikindi ni ugukunda misa . " " " "
Mu bihe bisanzwe kuri Paruwasi ya Save hasomwa misa enye , abantu barenga ibihumbi bibiri baba buzuye .
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Iyo bafite umuntu urwaye , babona yarembye , bahamagara umupadiri kugira ngo ajye kumuha amasakaramentu ya nyuma , nta rugo na rumwe haba hari umuntu urembye ngo azitabe Imana adahawe amasakaramentu . " " " "
Padiri Mukwiye avuga ko bikwiye ko Save ibungabungwa , amateka yayo ajyanye na uko Kiliziya yageze mu Rwanda ntasibangane .
Kiliziya iri gutekereza icyo St Michel izakoreshwa nyuma yo kwimurira Cathédrale ahahoze 1930 .
Ubusanzwe Cathédrale ya Kigali iherereye mu Kiyovu mu Karere ka Nyarugenge ahari Paruwasi ya St Michel , ahantu iherereye hakaba ari hato , hatisanzuye kandi hegeranye na umuhanda ku buryo ibikorwa byo kuyagura bisa na ibidashoboka .
Muri Mutarama 2019 , nibwo Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda bya umwihariko Arikidiyosezi ya Kigali yasabye Umukuru wa Igihugu ubufasha mu kubaka Cathédrale ijyanye na igihe .
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE , Antoine Cardinal Kambanda yavuze ko " " " " Kuva cyera uko Umujyi ugenda ukura , Kigali yari ifite umushinga wo kubaka Katederali nini kuko iyi aho iri nta bwinyagamburiro , nta buryo bwo kubaka buhari cyangwa kwaguka . " " " "
Muri Mutarama 2020 , nibwo byatangajwe ko ubutaka bwa ahahoze Gereza ya Nyarugenge bungana hegitari 5 . 5 , Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda yabwemerewe , aho yasabwaga gukora igenamigambi rya uko yabukoresha .
Cardinal Kambanda yavuze ko kuba ikibanza baragihawe , ubu ikigezweho ari ugukora inyigo ijyanye na igishushanyo mbonera kandi nayo yatangiye gukorwa .
Ati " " " " Icyakurikiyeho ni ugukora inyigo , ubu inyigo niyo irimo gukorwa .
Tugenda rero dutangariza abantu aho bigeze . " " " "
Yavuze ko na ubwo hagiye kubakwa Cathédrale nshya ya Kigali , bitavuze ko iyari isanzwe iri ahubatse Paruwasi St Michel izahita isenywa ahubwo hari gushakwa icyo hazakoreshwa .
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Ibya hano St Michel irahari , ariko uko igenamigambi rya Umujyi na uko abantu bagenda bimuka cyangwa bagana ahantu , ibyo byose nibyo bigenda bigira [ . . . ] ntabwo ari ibintu wavuga ngo bizagenda gutya . " " " "
Yavuze ko ashyigikiye inzira yatangijwe na Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe yo kumvikanisha impande zitavuga rumwe muri Mali , umutekano na ituze rusange bikagaruka .
Ibya Tchad aba mbere bireba ni Abanya - Tchad
Tariki 20 Mata 2021 , inkuru itunguranye yaturutse i Ndjamena ivuga ko uwari Perezida wa Tchad , Idriss Déby Itno yapfuye biturutse ku bikomere bya amasasu yarasiwe ku rugamba .
Déby wari umaze imyaka 30 ku butegetsi , yapfuye ku munsi Komisiyo ya Amatora yari yatangarijeho ko ari we watsinze amatora yari aherutse kuba .
Igisirikare cyahise gitangaza ko umuhungu we Mahamat Idriss Déby ari we umusimbura , akayobora Komisiyo idasanzwe ya gisirikare mu gihe hagitegurwa amatora mashya ya Perezida .
Ni umwanzuro utaravuzweho rumwe haba imbere muri Tchad no hanze yayo , bamwe bavuga ko ari ihirikwa rya ubutegetsi kuko Itegeko Nshinga Tchad yagenderagaho rivuga ko iyo Perezida apfuye asimburwa na Umuyobozi wa Inteko Ishinga Amategeko .
Ubutegetsi bwa Tchad bwo bwatangaje ko Perezida wa Inteko Ishinga Amategeko yanze izo nshingano , bikaba ngombwa ko zifatwa na igisirikare kugira ngo ubuzima bukomeze .
TV5 Monde yabajije Perezida Kagame icyo avuga kuri ibyo bibazo byakurikiye urupfu rwa Déby , maze avuga ko igikwiriye kwitabwaho ari ukuri kwa ibiri kubera muri Tchad , no guha umwanya abaturage ba icyo gihugu bakagira uruhare rukomeye mu gukemura ibibazo byabo .
Yagize ati " " " " Mu bihugu byose haba hari ibiri kuba ariko icyo tugomba kwitaho ni ibiri kubera aho hantu , duti ese uyu ari gukora iki mubo bireba ?
Tukagendera ku biri kubera imbere mu banya - Tchad ubwabo .
Ni inshingano za mbere za abaturage ba Tchad hanyuma twe tukaza dufasha . " " " "
Mu ntangiriro za Gicurasi 2021 , Perezida Kagame yakiriye mu biro bye Abdelkerim Déby Itno , Umuyobozi wa Ibiro bya Perezida wa Urwego rwa Gisirikare ruyobora Tchad bya agateganyo , akaba murumuna wa Mahamat Déby uyobora igihugu nyuma ya urupfu rwa se .
Mu buzima ibintu ntibitungana ijana ku ijana - Kagame avuga ku bataranyuzwe na imbabazi Macron yasabiye i Kigali .
Perezida wa u Bufaransa , Emmanuel Macron yagiriye uruzinduko rwa iminsi ibiri mu Rwanda ku wa 27 - 28 Gicurasi 2021 .
Mu bikorwa yakoze ahageze harimo gusura Urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali aho yavugiye imbwirwaruhame yari itegerejwe na benshi nyuma ya imyaka 27 ya umwuka mubi hagati ya u Rwanda na u Bufaransa .
Muri iyi mbwirwaruhame , Macron yemeye uruhare rwa u Bufaransa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda , nka uko byari biherutse gushyirwa ahagaragara muri raporo Duclert yakozwe ku busabe bwe na raporo Muse yakozwe ku busabe bwa leta ya u Rwanda .
Yagize ati " " " " Mpagaze aha nciye bugufi kandi niyoroheje , nazanywe no kwemera uruhare rwacu .
Kwemera ibyabaye , ni no kwemera ko ubutabera bukomeza duharanira ko nta na umwe mu bakekwaho ibyaha bya Jenoside uzacika ubutabera . " " " "
Perezida Kagame mu kiganiro yagiranye na TV5 Monde yabajijwe uko yakiriye amagambo ya Macron na agaciro yayahaye .
Yavuze ko nubwo urugendo rukiri rurerure amagambo ya Macron ari ukuri kuzifashishwa mu gukomeza kuzahura umubano .
Yagize " " " " Ntushobora kubona ibyo ushaka mu buryo bwuzuye 100 % , ubuzima niko bumeze .
Ibyo Macron yavuze ni ukuri .
Kwemera uruhare ni ikintu gikomeye . " " " "
Yakomeje agira ati " " " " Tugomba kumva neza aho tuvuye , imyaka 27 irashize duhuye na aya mahano , abantu barahizwe baricwa nka uko mubizi .
Kuba Macron yaje akavugira ijambo rye ahantu hari ikimenyetso cya ibyabaye ntiyabikoreye ubusa .
Yabivuganye amarangamutima . " " " "
Nubwo hari abantu bavuga ko ibyo yavuze bidahagije , Perezida Kagame yasobanuye ko icyo aha agaciro ari intambwe Macron yateye asura u Rwanda .
Ku bwe ngo abantu ntibashobora kunyurwa ku rugero rungana , ikindi ni uko ngo urugendo rwo kuvugurura umubano wa ibihugu byombi rudahagarariye aho .
Ati " " " " Umuhate we watumye ibintu bigera ku rwego nishimira .
Ni icyerekezo cyiza tugomba gukomeza , ntabwo turasoza urugendo , tuzakomeza , turi mu nzira nziza .
Ku bwanjye kwemera uruhare ni ikintu gikomeye . " " " "
Ibi ariko ntibivuze ko yanyuzwe 100 % nka umuntu ufite ubushobozi bwo gusesengura ibifatika na ibidafatika ahubwo nka umunyapolitiki ngo hari uburyo bwo kuganisha ibintu aho bikwiye kugana kandi amateka " " " " ntareberwa mu cyerekezo kimwe . " " " "
Ati " " " " Sinanyuzwe 100 % .
Nta muntu unyurwa 100 % ; ubuzima niko bumera , tugomba gukomeza kubaho twifashishije ibyo dufite , ibyo twabonye .
Haracyari ibyo gukora , nta " " " " formule " " " " ihari kugira ngo tubone ibisubizo . " " " "
Ku bandi bavuga ko imbabazi Macron yasabye zidahagije , Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ari byiza kubaha uburyo babonamo ibintu .
Ati " " " " Niko bigenda mu buzima hari abantu batajya banyurwa .
Haracyari ibyo gukora , nta " " " " formule " " " " ihari kugira ngo tubone ibisubizo , tugomba kureba ibintu mu buryo bwagutse . " " " "
" " " " Ku bijyanye na ingaruka byatugizeho icyo navuga ni uko aho twavuye ari kure , hari abagizweho ingaruka mu buryo ndengakamere , turabatekereza , agahinda kabo turakumva ariko murabizi niko ubuzima bumeze .
Mu buzima ntabwo ibintu bitungana . " " " "
Perezida Macron niwe wa mbere mu bayoboye u Bufaransa nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , wemeye uruhare rwa igihugu cye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , akanasaba imbabazi ndetse agafata ingamba zigamije gusubiza mu murongo umubano mwiza .
Perezida Kagame yatabarije abari mu kaga batewe na iruka rya Nyiragongo .
Hashize icyumweru kirenga Ikirunga cya Nyiragongo giherereye muri Kivu ya Amajyaruguru muri Congo cyongeye kuruka nyuma ya ibyabaye mu 2002 .
Aya makuba yabaye bitunguranye yangije imitungo , bene yo bamwe barapfa abandi barakomereka hatibagiranye na abatesetse bagerageza gukiza amagara yabo .
Hari abageze ku butaka bwa u Rwanda bahamara igihe gito basubira iwabo nyuma yo kumva amakuru ko Nyiragongo yatanze agahenge ariko bagezeyo baragaruka mu kwirinda ingaruka za iki kirunga na none .
Kugeza ku wa Kane tariki 27 Gicurasi 2021 , Abanye - Congo bari bagihunga aho abasaga 8 . 735 binjiriye ku mupaka wa Grande Barrière , 5 . 100 binjirira kuri Petite Barrière naho 60 binjirira ku mupaka wa Busasamana .
Perezida Kagame mu kiganiro yagiranye na TV5 Monde yagaragaje ubukana bwa ibibazo byasizwe na iruka rya Nyiragongo ku baturage ba ibihugu byombi .
Yavuze ko bitoroshye guhangana na ibiza nka ibi biza bitunguranye kandi bigashegesha abantu benshi .
Ati " " " " Turimo gukora ibishoboka ngo duhangane na iki kibazo cya iruka rya Ikirunga cyashegeshe RDC ariko bikagera no ku Rwanda .
Hari urujya na uruza rwa abantu bahunga hanyuma bakongera bagasubirayo , ni abantu bahungabanyijwe na aya makuba .
Hari icyo kibazo cyo gutungurana no kuba umubare wa abantu ari munini , ni ibihumbi bya abantu baza imbokoboko biruka . " " " "
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko inzego za u Rwanda zakoranye na iza Congo kugira ngo abavanywe mu byabo " " " " tubasaranganye ibyo dufite mu bushobzi bwacu buke tugerageza kubashakira aho bacumbika , tubagaburira , tubavuza . " " " "
Kuba byarabaye bitunguranye byatumye na uburemere bwabyo bwiyongera burenga ubushobozi bwa ibihugu byombi , ibi bikaba ari byo bituma ahamagarira amahanga kubatera ingabo mu bitugu .
Ati " " " " Imiterere ya ikibazo ubwacyo ikwiye gutuma amahanga ahaguruka agafasha natwe tuzabatabariza kuko ni ibigaragara ko uburemere bwa ikibazo burenze ubushobozi bwa u Rwanda na Congo , Isi yose ikurikira ibiri kuba kuri aba baturage bari mu kaga ikwiye guhaguruka . " " " "
Imibare ya agateganyo ya abamaze guhitanwa na iruka rya Nyiragongo igaragaza abarenga 32 .
Bamwe batwitswe na amazuku , abandi bicwa na imyotsi .
Hari abaguye mu mpanuka za imodoka bahunga , abaguye mu mubyigano na ibindi .
Ni mu gihe imitungo irimo inzu yahiye igasiga benshi mu kangaratete .
Bya umwihariko ku ruhande rwa u Rwanda mu Karere ka Rubavu inzu zibarirwa hejuru ya 1200 zarasenyutse kubera imitingito ya hato na hato , ibitaro bya Gisenyi na amwe mu mashuri birafungwa , bamwe mu baturage basabwa kwimuka aho bari batuye kubera imitutu yashoboraga gushyira ubuzima bwabo mu kaga .
Hari kandi imirima yatwikiriwe na amakoro mu Murenge wa Cyanzarwe .
Perezida Kagame yavuze icyo u Rwanda rwiteze kuri " " " " Centre Culturel Francophone " " " " yafunguwe i Kigali .
" " " " Centre Culturel Francophone " " " " ni ikigo giherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali ku Kimihurura cyasimbuye icyitwaga " " " " Centre da Echanges Culturels Franco - Rwandais " " " " cyari giherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali rwagati .
Iki kigo gishya kiragutse kurushaho kuko ibihugu bihuriye ku rurimi rwa Igifaransa bizajya bicyibonamo nka uko byatangajwe na Perezida wa u Bufaransa , Emmanuel Macron ubwo yagifunguraga ku wa 27 Gicurasi 2021 , mu ruzinduko rwa iminsi ibiri aheruka kugirira mu Rwanda .
Yavuze ko icyo kigo gikwiriye kuba ahantu ho guteza imbere indangagaciro ziri mu Gifaransa na abakoresha urwo rurimi hirya no hino ku Isi , abantu bakahakorera ibikorwa bya ubuvumbuzi ibya umuco no guteza imbere urubyiruko bya umwihariko .
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na TV5 Monde , Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ari ibya ingirakamaro kuba u Rwanda rufite ikigo nka iki afata nka umuryango uzakomeza guhuza u Rwanda na u Bufaransa .
Ati " " " " Twishimiye cyane kuba dufite ikigo cya Francophonie mu Rwanda .
Nka urugero dufite umuturage wacu uyobora Umuryango Mpuzamahanga wa Ibihugu bikoresha Igifaransa , Louise Mushikiwabo , ndakeka ko ari ibintu byumvikana .
Ni ikintu cya ingenzi mu gihe turimo kugerageza kongera kuzahura umubano wacu na u Bufaransa mu bya dipolomasi , ni nka umuryango uzakomeza kuduhuza . " " " "
Mu ijambo Emmanuel Macron yavugiye ku Rwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali , ku wa 27 Gicurasi 2021 , yagarutse ku mateka yaranze Politiki ya u Bufaransa ku Rwanda aho yemeye ko iki gihugu cyagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , avuga ko nubwo aya mateka adashobora gusibangana hakiri amahirwe ya ubufatanye nka bumwe mu buryo bwo
kuzirikana abahitanywe na yo bakavutsa ahazaza habo .
Ati " " " " Ndagira ngo uyu munsi nizeze urubyiruko rwa u Rwanda ko kongera gukorana bishoboka .
Hari andi mahirwe ya ubufatanye bwiyubashye , butanga inyungu ku mpande zombi hagati ya urubyiruko rwa u Rwanda na urw u Bufaransa .
Ni uburyo bwo guha agaciro abo twibuka bavukijwe ahazaza habo dufiteho inshingano zo kubaka . " " " "
Aya magambo yongeye kuyashimangira ubwo yafunguraga ku mugaragaro " " " " Centre Culturel Francophone " " " " agira ati " " " " Ndifuza ko urubyiruko rwa u Rwanda rubyaza umusaruro aha hantu .
Hazatangirwa amasomo , hazigishirizwa kandi hari buruse tuzajya dutanga mu myaka iri imbere .
Hari byinshi tutarabona urubyiruko ruzavumburira aha . " " " "
Centre Culturel Francophone yagombaga kuzura ikanatahwa mu 2020 ariko imirimo yayo yadindijwe na icyorezo cya COVID - 19 bituma irangira muri Mata uyu mwaka .
Yimanye inkoni yo kumukubitisha mu Bufaransa - Amarangamutima ku ruzinduko rwa Macron i Kigali .
Kuri iyi tariki nibwo Perezida wa u Bufaransa Emmanuel Macron bwa mbere yemeye uruhare rwa igihugu cye muri ayo mateka ashaririye u Rwanda rwanyuzemo .
Mu marangamutima menshi , Macron nyuma yo gusura urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali , yagize ati " " " " Mpagaze aha imbere yanyu nciye bugufi kandi niyoroheje , nazanywe no kwemera uruhare rwacu . " " " "
Macron ntiyeruye ngo asabe imbabazi mu buryo butomoye ariko imbwirwaruhame ye uburyo yari iteguye yumvikanishije ko igihugu cye gishaka imbabazi ziturutse ku " " " " barokotse Jenoside . " " " "
Yagize ati " " " " Kwemera aya mateka na uruhare rwacu , ni ikimenyetso kidashidikanywaho .
Tubikoze ku bushake , tubyikorera .
Ni umwenda ku nzirakarengane nyuma ya igihe kirekire ducecetse .
Ni impano ku bakiriho bagifite ububabare baramutse babitwemereye , twafatanya kubagabanyiriza umubabaro . " " " "
" " " " Iyi nzira yo kuzirikana , binyuze mu madeni na impano zacu , biraduha icyizere ko tuzayasohokamo twese dufatanyije .
Muri iyo nzira , abanyuze muri iri joro ribi nibo bashobora kutubabarira , bakaduha impano ya imbabazi . " " " "
Yari afite amarangamutima no kwicisha bugufi
Imbwirwaruhame ya Macron ntabwo yavuzweho rumwe mu Rwanda .
Hari abumvise ibyo yakoze bihagije bakurikije uburyo ari we watinyutse kwemera uruhare rwa igihugu cye muri Jenoside .
Hari abandi bavuga ko bidahagije kuko ateruye ngo avuge ko " " " " u Bufaransa busabye imbabazi , " " " " ibyo yakoze bakabifata nko gucenga inkurikiza zakurikira kwemera urwo ruhare .
Umunyamategeko wa Umunyarwanda uba mu Bufaransa , Richard Gisagara yabwiye IGIHE ko ijambo rya Macron ryari riteguye neza kandi ryumvikana .
Yagize ati " " " " Ijambo rya Macron narishimye rwose , ryari ijambo ryiza cyane kandi ryateguwe umwanya munini .
Ntabwo ari ijambo rihutiyeho , yafashe umwanya ashaka amagambo agomba kuvuga , ni ikintu cya amateka .
Icya mbere nashimye ni ukunamira inzirakarengane yamara kubunamira akicisha bugufi akavuga ko akababaro kabo yakumvise , kandi ko hari uruhare rwa u Bufaransa . " " " "
Kuba ateruye ngo avuge ko asabye imbabazi bitomoye , Gisagara ntabibonamo ikibazo .
Yavuze ko abantu badakwiriye kwibagirwa ko Macron ari umunyapolitiki .
Ati " " " " Yabonye ubundi buryo bwo kubivuga .
Yavuze ko abakorewe icyaha aribo bonyine bashobora kugira umutima wo kubabarira ariko ntabwo yeruye ngo avuge ati " " " " mbasabye imbabazi . " " " "
Wenda nka Perezida w " " " " u Bufaransa ni umunyapolitiki afite aho agarukira ariko muri rusange ijambo narishimye . " " " "
Umuyobozi wa Umuryango wa abapfakazi ba Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , Avega - Agahozo , Mukabayire Valérie yavuze ko nka abarokotse Jenoside , bishimiye cyane ijambo Macron yavugiye ku Gisozi .
Nka umwe mu bari begereye Macron ubwo yavugaga ijambo ku Gisozi , Mukabayire yavuze ko ibyo yatangaje byaturukaga ku ndiba ya umutima .
Ati " " " " Twe twanamurebaga hafi yari afite amarangamutima ubona ko bimuri ku mutima .
Yavuze ko anemera uruhare rwa u Bufaransa , aganisha no ku mwenda u Bufaransa bufite kandi anavuga ko ba bandi baraye ijoro ari bo bakwiriye gutanga imbabazi , ko nibabona ko bakwiriye kuzitanga bazazitanga . " " " "
Kuba atatomoye ngo avuge ko asabye imbabazi za uruhare rwa u Bufaransa mu mateka mabi ya u Rwanda , Mukabayire ntabwo abibonamo ikibazo .
Ati " " " " Ni uburyo bwe bwo kuvuga , hari aho yavuze ko Jenoside nta magambo wabona yo kuvuga usaba imbabazi kuri Jenoside , abarokotse bo bafite uko babyumva nibo batanga imbabazi .
Ni amagambo ye yashatse kubinyuzamo ariko ni intambwe . " " " "
No kuba yavugiye ijambo ku rwibutso rwa Gisozi , ngo ni intambwe ikomeye kuko nta bandi bayobozi bakuru bagiye basura urwibutso , ngo bahavugire ijambo rikomeye nka iryo .
Mukabayire kandi yongeyeho ko ijambo rya Macron ritanga icyizere ku busabe u Rwanda rwari rumaze igihe rutanga bwo gufata abakekwaho Jenoside bihishe muri icyo gihugu .
Ati " " " " Birwaga badusekera , batwishongoraho no kudukina ku mubyimba bazi ko ntawe uzabakoraho .
Macron yavuze ko nta na umwe uzacika ubutabera , ni ikintu cyiza . " " " "
Yimanye inkoni yo kumukubitira mu Bufaransa
Umwaka utaha wa 2022 , hateganyijwe amatora ya Perezida mu Bufaransa kandi biteganyijwe ko Macron azongera kwiyamamaza kuko Itegeko Nshinga ribimwemerera .
Amatora yo muri icyo gihugu aba akomeye cyane bya umwihariko ku bakandida kuko ikosa rimwe rishobora gutuma abari bamushyigikiye bamushiraho .
Macron na ubusanzwe igikundiro cye mu Bafaransa kimaze iminsi kidahagaze neza ahanini bitewe na ibibazo birimo ibya iterabwoba , ubukungu na ibindi bimaze igihe .
Kwemera ku mugaragaro uruhare rwa igihugu cye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bishobora guha icyuho abatavuga rumwe na we cyane cyane abahoze mu butegetsi bwagize uruhare muri Jenoside bagifite ijambo rikomeye muri politiki ya u Bufaransa .
Umusesenguzi mu bya Politiki , Albert Rudatsimburwa yabwiye IGIHE ko Macron yari afite impamvu mu kwirinda gutomora neza uruhare rwa igihugu cye muri Jenoside kugira ngo itaba inkoni izifashishwa na abamurwanya mu matora ataha .
Ati " " " " Uburyo yabivuze hari abaza kumunenga mu Bufaransa ariko ntabwo yabahaye inkoni yo kumukubita .
Na we arabizi ko udapfa guhindura ibintu byageze ku mugaragaro , kuvuga ko abawe bafitemo uruhare , ni guhita ukurura abazakurwanya . " " " "
" " " " Bishobora gutuma abura amahirwe yo gutorwa cyangwa akabona abantu benshi bamurwanya .
Aramutse atongeye gutorwa twaba tubihombeyemo kuko afite icyerecyezo kandi yashatse kwerekana ko yubaha u Rwanda , ko anumva aho u Rwanda rwigeje nyuma ya ibyo byose . " " " "
Rudatsimburwa yavuze ko no kuba byonyine yemeye ko u Bufaransa bwagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , ari ikintu gikomeye ndetse kirenze ibindi bihugu byasabye imbabazi .
Ati " " " " Kuri twebwe ni ikintu gikomeye kurusha na abandi bose baje .
Icyo u Bufaransa bwakoze ni akataraboneka kuko bo bari ku ruhembe , si nka ba bandi bavuga ngo mutubabarire kuko tutahabaye , bo bari bahari bari ku rundi ruhande .
Ibyo byose kubihakana arabihagaritse . " " " "
Nubwo yanyuzwe , Richard Gisagara we yavuze ko atishimiye uburyo Macron yongeye gusubiramo ko abayobozi ba u Bufaransa bagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , babikoze " " " " buhumyi " " " " batabizi .
Gisagara yavuze ko ibimenyetso byose bihari byerekana ko Perezida François Mitterrand na ibyegera bye bari bazi ibyaberaga mu Rwanda ariko bagahitamo guceceka no gufasha Leta yateguraga Jenoside .
U Bufaransa bwahaye u Rwanda inkunga ya miliyoni 60 za amayero azifashishwa mu kurwanya Covid - 19 na ingaruka zayo .
Amasezerano yashyizweho umukono na Minisitiri wa Imari na Igenamigambi , Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana , ku ruhande rwa u Rwanda na Umuyobozi Mukuru wa AFD , Rémy Rioux .
Mu rwego rwa ubuzima , iyi nkunga izatanga umusanzu muri gahunda ya igihugu yo kurwanya icyorezo cya Covid - 19 hagurwa inkingo igihugu gikeneye , gushyigikira ibikorwa bizatuma intego yo kongera ubushobozi bwo gusuzuma no kwita ku barwayi cyane cyane abagore batwite igerwaho .
Iyi nkunga yitezweho kandi gufasha mu gutera inkunga abatishoboye binyuze muri gahunda ya VUP na izindi zifasha abo mu byiciro biciriritse kubona serivisi za ubuzima na uburezi bwa ibanze .
Minisitiri wa Imari na Igenamigambi , Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana , yavuze ko u Rwanda rushaka kuzahura ubukungu bwarwo no kugaruka mu bihe bisanzwe nyuma ya Covid - 19 .
Yagize ati " " " " Iyi nkunga izongera ubushobozi bwacu mu kugura inkingo , kongera ingufu mu bikorwa bizamura urwego rwa ubuzima no gufata ingamba zikwiye mu guhangana na Covid - 19 , abaturage batishoboye batibagiranye . " " " "
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa AFD , Rémy Rioux , we yavuze ko izafasha mu gukemura ibibazo bya abaturage barimo abakozi bo mu nzego ziciriritse [ zitanditse ] ubukungu bwabo bwazahajwe na Covid - 19 .
Ati " " " " Nubwo impfu ziturutse kuri Covid - 19 zabashije gukumirwa mu gihugu kubera ingamba zikomeye kandi za intangarugero , ingaruka ku bukungu na imibereho ya abaturage cyane ku bakora mu nzego " " " " zitanditse " " " " zigomba gukemurwa .
AFD ibinyujije muri porogaramu yayo yo gushyigikira gahunda za ubuzima , yiyemeje gutera inkunga u Rwanda mu ngamba zarwo zo kurengera imibereho hagamijwe kugabanya ingaruka za ibibazo abaturage batishoboye bahuye na byo . " " " "
Kuva icyorezo cya Covid - 19 cyatera , u Bufaransa bwarushijeho gushimangira ubufatanye na u Rwanda .
Kugeza ubu AFD imaze gutanga inkunga ya miliyoni 40 za amayero kandi ibihugu byombi biri gushaka uko bifatanya mu nzego zitandukanye zirimo ingufu , uburezi , ubuzima , urwego rwa abikorera na izindi .
Mu yindi mishinga u Bufaransa bwateye inkunga harimo iyo gukwirakwiza amashanyarazi yashyizwemo miliyoni 80 za amayero na miliyoni 5 . 8 yo guteza imbere uburezi mu mashuri ya imyuga na ubumenyingiro .
AFD kandi yasinyanye amasezerano na Minisiteri ya Uburezi arimo umushinga wo gutangiza ishami ryigisha ibijyanye na ikoranabuhanga rihuza " " " " électronique " " " " na " " " " mécanique " " " " ibizwi nka " " " " Mécatronique " " " " muri Tumba College of Technology , ishuri riherereye mu Karere ka Rulindo .
Amafaranga u Bufaransa bwahaye u Rwanda akubiye mu bufatanye ibihugu byombi byashyizeho umukono uyu munsi , ni inguzanyo izishyurwa ku nyungu iciriritse , azatangira kwishyurwa nyuma ya imyaka itandatu .
U Bufaransa kandi bwahaye u Rwanda inkunga ya dose ibihumbi 100 bya inkingo za Covid - 19 , yazanywe na Perezida Emmanuel Macron ubwo yagiriraga uruzinduko muri iki gihugu .
Icyo Perezida Macron agiye gukora ngo abarimo Agatha Kanziga bafatwe .
Agathe Kanziga ashyirwa mu majwi cyane nka umwe mu bantu bari ku ruhembe rwa abagize uruhare mu itegurwa rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi dore ko yabaga mu " " " " Akazu " " " " kari kagizwe na abakomokaga mu Majyaruguru ya Uburengerazuba bwa u Rwanda , bya umwihariko mu zahoze ari Perefegitura za Ruhengeri na Gisenyi .
Hashize igihe kinini aba mu Bufaransa bwaranze kumwohereza mu Rwanda kugira ngo akurikiranyweho ibyaha bya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ashinjwa .
Mu ijambo Macron yavugiye ku Rwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali , yemeye uruhare rwa igihugu cye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda maze yiyemeza ko azatanga umusanzu we kugira ngo abakekwaho Jenoside bagezwe mu butabera .
Ibi nibyo itangazamakuru ryuririyeho mu kiganiro yagiranye na ryo , rimubaza icyo yiteguye gukora kugira ngo Agatha Kanziga atabwe muri yombi .
Perezida Macron yasubije ko atari uwo gusa ahubwo muri rusange hazabaho kuvugurura imikoranire hagati ya inzego za ubutabera bwa ibihugu byombi kugira ngo na abandi bihishe muri iki gihugu bafatwe .
Yagize ati " " " " Ntacyo navuga ku muntu ku giti cye kuko ni akazi kareba ubutabera ariko icyo twiyemeje gukora nka abakuru ba ibihugu ni ugushyiraho uburyo bwose bwa ubufatanye mu bya ubutabera na ibisubizo byoroshya ugushyira ukuri ahabona , kugeza mu butabera no koherezwa abakekwaho Jenoside .
Perezida Kagame mu kiganiro aherutse kugirana na France 24 , na we yagarutse ku kibazo cya Agatha Kanziga , avuga ko u Bufaransa ari bwo buzamufataho icyemezo .
Yagize ati " " " " Yaba Agatha cyangwa abandi , urutonde ni rurerure , ari ku isonga ryarwo , u Bufaransa buzafata umwanzuro wa icyo bugomba gukora kuri we .
Simbategeka icyo bakora , icyo nakora ni ukubisaba kandi kubisaba bikorwa ku mugaragaro . " " " "
U Bufaransa buvugwaho kuba buri mu bihugu bicumbikiye benshi mu bakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda , nyamara abamaze kugezwa mu butabera ni mbarwa .
Urugero nka Ikinyamakuru Médiapart kimenyereweho gucukumbura amakuru ku Banyarwanda bakoze Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda bihishe mu Bufaransa , mu minsi minsi ya vuba cyatahuye amazina ya abantu batatu bakekwaho ibyaha bikomeye bya Jenoside bamaze igihe kinini bihishe muri iki gihugu .
Barimo Hyacinthe Bicamumpaka wahoze ari umunyamakuru wa Radio Rwanda , Joseph Mushyandi na Anastase Rwabizambuga .
Biteganywa ko iyo Cathédrale nshya igomba kuba ijyanye na igihe , yajya yakira abantu nibura ibihumbi bitanu , hanyuma ikagira na imbuga yayo nini ku buryo mu gihe habaye nka iminsi mikuru abantu bashobora kuyiteraniramo bageze nko ku bihumbi 10 kugera kuri 20 .
Aline Gahongayire yafashije Jackson Jack mu ndirimbo yo guhigurira umuhigo Imana .
Indirimbo nshya Aline Gahongayire yahuriyemo na Jackson Jack yiswe " " " " Nyemerera . " " " "
Iyi ndirimbo ya amashusho igizwe na iminota itanu na amasegonda 38 .
Aba bahanzi hari igice baririmbamo bavuga bati " " " " Kubyirengagiza byamvunnye .
Ibicuro byanyuzuye mu mutima , uyu munsi sinawurenza ntavuze kugira neza ku buzima bwanjye [ . . . ] ongera unyemerere ngushime , tega amatwi wumve indirimbo naguhimbiye , nyemerera ukunde uyakire . " " " "
Mu kiganiro Aline Gahongayire yahaye IGIHE yavuze ko iyi ndirimbo bayihimbye nyuma yo kwibuka ibyo Imana yagiye ibakorera ariko ntibayishime , kandi byari ngombwa cyane .
Yagize ati " " " " Hari ibintu byinshi umuntu ahigira Imana ari mu bihe bigoye ntabashe kuyisohoza .
Numvaga mfitiye Imana ideni .
Naravugaga nti " " " " icyampa rero Imana ikaduha amahirwe tukongera kuyishima . " " " " " " " "
Sinzoyiheba Jackson Jack ubusanzwe aba muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika , yahuje imbaraga na Aline Gahongayire uri mu bafite igikundiro mu muziki uhimbaza Imana mu kurushaho kwegereza abakunzi be ibihangano bihembura imitima yabo .
Indirimbo " " " " Nyemerera " " " " mu buryo bwa amajwi yakozwe na Boris , naho amashusho yafashwe na Bob Chris Raheem na Dieudonne Nb .
Jackson Jack amaze isaga itatu atangiye umuziki nka umuhanzi wigenga .
Uyu muhanzi yavukiye muri Tanzania ku babyeyi bafite inkomoko mu Burundi .
Afite intego yo gukora umuziki wubahisha Imana mu mfuruka zose za Isi .
Mu gihe amaze mu muziki yashyize hanze ibihangano birimo " " " " Wema Wako , " " " " " " " " Tawala Yesu , " " " " " " " " Nitainuliwa , " " " " " " " " Wavuze " " " " yakoranye na Karim na izindi .
Imbuga nkoranyambaga : Ubucuruzi bwitwikiriye umutaka wo guteza imbere ubwisanzure bwo gutanga ibitekerezo .
Niba ukoresha internet usoma amakuru , ukora ubushakashatsi , uhaha cyangwa ukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga mu buryo butandukanye , ujya ubona ubutumwa bwamamaza bwikubise mu byo warimo usoma cyangwa ubona amakuru akwizaniye atari mu byo washakaga ako kanya .
Ingero , ushobora kuba uri gusoma amakuru ku rubuga rwa internet , uri kureba amashusho kuri YouTube ukabona hari ubutumwa bwikubisemo ; ku rukuta rwawe rwa Facebook cyangwa Twitter , ujya uzasangaho ubutumwa bwa abantu cyangwa ibigo bitari mu bo ukurikira cyangwa abagukurikira ( Followers ) .
Ubwo ni uburyo bwo kwamamaza hakoreshejwe internet , kandi mbere ya uko utangira gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga , wabanje gusinya amasezerano wemera ko ubwo butumwa uzajya ububona , nubwo abenshi basinya ayo masezerano batabanje kuyasoma .
Ushobora kuba wibaza uti " " " " izi mbunga nkoranyambaga ko tuzikoresha ku buntu , ba nyirazo bunguka iki ?
" " " " Hari na abatekereza ko amafaranga bishyura ku mirongo ya itumanaho icuruza internet , agera kuri banyira imbuga nkoranyambaga zitandukanye .
Kugira ngo usobanukirwe neza uburyo abashinze imbuga nkoranyambaga ndetse na imbuga za internet ( websites and social media ) bunguka , nabigusobanurira mu buryo bworoshye .
Abakoresha internet na imbuga nkoranyambaga , bameze nka abantu bazana amazi bakayasuka mu ruhombo runini ariko ku yindi mpera ya urwo ruhombo , aho badashobora kureba , hakaba hari abantu bateze ibivomesho ayo mazi yisukamo , bagahita bayajyana ku isoko kuyagurisha .
Muri make , igihe cyose ukoresha internet , waba usoma amakuru cyangwa uganira na inshuti ku mbuga nkoranyambaga , ni amafaranga uba utanga .
Ibi rero bishimangira ko abakoze imbuga za internet na imbuga nkoranyambaga na ingufu bahora bashyiramo mu kuzivugurura kugira ngo zirusheho kunezeza abazikoresha , ntabwo bashishikajwe cyane no guteza imbere ubwisanzure mu gutanga ibitekerezo ndetse no guhuza abantu .
Intego nyamukuru ni ubucuruzi kandi bwunguka cyane .
Ni byo koko imbuga nkoranyambaga na itangazamakuru ryo kuri internet byagize uruhare rufatika mu guteza imbere ubwisanzure mu gutanga ibitekerezo .
Uyu munsi , umuntu wese ashobora gufungura umuyoboro we agatangaza ibyo atekereza ku buryo bumworoheye kurusha uko byari bimeze mu bihe byashize .
Ariko ibitekerezo byose bitangwa muri ubwo bwisanzure , aho bibikwa hahinduka ikirombe gicukurwamo zahabu ibyara amafaranga menshi ku bashinze izo mbuga nkoranyambaga .
Ibi bigaragazwa na uko ibigo bifite imbuga nkoranyambaga biri mu bikize kuri iyi si .
Amakuru ya urubuga agaragaza agaciro ka imigabane ya Ikigo Aplhabet Inc ( gifite urubuga rwa Google rurimo YouTube na izindi ) ku isoko rya Imari na Imigabane ( Market Cap ) kageze kuri Tiliyari ( $ 1 Trillion ) ya Amadolari ya Amerika muri 2020 , aho urubuga rwa Google rwonyine rwari wihariye hafi 80 % .
Iki kikaba cyarabaye ikigo cya kane mu bigo bicuruza ikoranabuhanga byesheje uwo muhigo muri Amerika .
Imibare igagagazwa na urubuga kandi igaragaza ko agaciro ka imigabane ya Facebook yari ku isoko rya imari na imigabane mu mpera za Kamena 2020 kari Miliyari 984 za Amadolari ya Amerika ( $ 984 . 00 Billion )
Ako gaciro ka imigabane ya ibyo bigo karuta cyane umusaruro mbumbe ( GDP ) wa ibihugu bimwe na bimwe bibarizwa muri 20 bikize ku isi ( G20 ) birimo nka Arabia Soudite ( Miliyari 793 $ ) , Afurika ya Epfo ( Miliyari 351 . )
cyangwa Singapore ( Miliyari 372 $ ) .
Ikindi kigaraza ko imbuga nkoranyambaga ari ubucuruzi bukomeye ni uko banyirazo bari mu baherwe ba mbere ku isi .
Urubuga rwa Forbes rugaragaza ko kugeza muri Kamena 2021 , Mark Zuckerberg washinze Facebook yari uwa gatanu ku rutonde rwa abaherwe ku isi aho umutungo we ubarirwa kuri Miliyari 97 za Amadolari ya Amerika ( 97 $ Billion ) , mu gihe Larry Page uri mu bashinze Google ari ku mwanya wa munani na umutungo wa Miliyari 91 . 5 za amadolari ( 91 . 5 $ Billion ) akurikiwe na
mugenzi bafatanije gushinga urwo rubuga , Sergey Brin na umutungo wa Miliyari 89 Za amadolari ya Amerika ( 89 $ Billion ) .
Ibi bigo amafaranga biyakura cyane cyane mu kwamamaza binyuze kuri izo mbuga nkoranyambaga ndetse no mu gucuruza amakuru .
Amakuru yose abantu binjiza ku mbuga zitandukanye hariho ikoranabuhanga riyakusanya rikayasesengura , akagurishwa ku babafite ibigo bya ubucuruzi kugira ngo bashobore gukora ibicuruzwa na serivisi bihwanye na ibyifuzo bya abaguzi .
Urugero , ikigo cya ubucuruzi gishobora gushingira ku makuru abanyarwanda binjiza bakora ubushakashatsi , bashaka ibikoresho , serivisi cyangwa baganira ku mu mbuga nkoranyambaga , kikamenya ubwoko , amabara , impuzandengo ya igiciro cya ibikoresho ( imodoka , imyenda , mudasobwa na ibindi ) abanyarwanda bakunda kugura .
Ibyo bikagifasha gukora ibijyanye na ibyifuzo bya abanyarwanda mu gihe gishaka gucuruza mu Rwanda .
Ibyo mu gihe byasabaga gukora ubushakashatsi buhenze bunatwara igihe ku bashinzwe guteza imbere ubucuruzi , ubu ntibigoye , ayo makuru yose aba ahari kuri buri wese ayageraho bitewe na ayo yifuza kandi kuyagura birahendutse kurusha gukora ubushakashatsi .
Ikindi ni uko ayo makuru yizewe cyane kuko agaragaza ibyo abantu bakeneye , aho baherereye , ikigero cya imyaka yabo , igitsina , ubushobozi bwabo , uko imibare yabo igenda ihindagurika na ibindi .
Ubu bucuruzi bwa imbuga nkoranyambaga ntabwo bugaburira ba nyirazo gusa .
Ubu noneho batangiye no kuvunguriraho na abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga mu rwego rwo kubatera akanyabugabo ngo bazikoreshe cyane haboneke ibitekerezo byinshi , byumvikana ko hakenewe amakuru menshi agurishwa .
Muri iki gihe abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga bafite ababakurikira benshi na bo bahabwa amafaranga , hashingiwe ku mubare wa ababakurikira , igihe abareba ibyo bashyiraho bamara na ibindi .
Iyi miyoboro ya imbuga nkoranyambaga ikurikirwa na benshi igakoreshwa mu kwamamaza .
Ibigo bya ubucuruzi utaretse na ibya Leta na imiryango itari iya Leta ubu bitanga amafaranga ku bantu bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga cyane kugira ngo babafashe kwamamaza ibicuruzwa cyangwa gutanga ubutumwa ku babakurikira ( ibyitwa influencer marketing ) .
Ibi rero ni byo bihindura za mbuga nkoranyambaga uburucuruzi kuruta ubwisanzure bwo gutanga ibitekerezo .
Ubu bucuruzi ni bwo bituma abantu bahururira mu gushyira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zabo ibiganiro na amakuru bishitura abantu , bibakurura kugira ngo bagire ababakurikira benshi ( subscribers and views ) bityo bibonere umugati .
Uzasanga ku mbuga nkoranyambaga bashyiraho imitwe ya inkuru zishitura abantu , ariko nufungura usange ibivugwa bitandukanye na ibyanditse .
Uzabona inkuru za impimbano nyamara zitangazwa nka aho ari ukuri , ubuhamya butangwa na abantu ariko budafitiwe ibimenyetso ndetse na ababutangaza ntibite ku kubugenzura , ahubwo bakita ku kuba bukurura abantu .
Ubu noneho bamwe mu bafite imiyoboro ya imbuga nkoranyambaga na bo bungutse ubundi bwenge aho bishyura abantu kugira ngo babakurikire ndetse barebe ibyo bakora .
Ubu hari abantu bishyurwa kugira ngo bafate umwanya wabo barebe amashusho kuri YouTube , basangize abandi amakuru kugira ngo banyirabyo bagwize ababakurikira bityo bongere amafaranga binjiza .
Ubushakashatsi buto nakoze ku miyoboro 15 ya YouTube ( channels ) natoranije nkurije iyo nkuze gukurikira hano mu Rwanda nifashishije urubuga rwa bwangaragarije umuyoboro winjiza menshi muri iyo ari ibihumbi 30 ya Amadolari ( 30 , 000 $ ) ku kwezi mu gihe uwinjiza make ari 1 , 200 ya amadolari ya Amerika ( 1200 $ ) ku kwezi .
Aya mafaranga avomwa mu gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga niyo ari inyuma ya ubushake na ububyutse mubona muri iyi minsi bwa abantu bahururiye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga mu Rwanda , cyane cyane YouTube , ntabwo ari uko abantu basobanukiwe na uruhare rwabo mu gutanga ibitekerezo kurushaho .
Ikindi ni uko bidasaba igishoro kinini kuko telefone igendanwa irahagije kugira ngo umuntu akore Televiziyo ikorera kuri YouTube .
Gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga bikaba byaguha amafaranga si bibi , yewe byaba na igisubizo ku bibazo bya ubushomeri byugarije urubyiruko .
Imbuga nkoranyambaga ntizitangaza ibibi gusa na ibyangiza byonyine .
Hari na andi makuru menshi zitangaza ajijura abantu .
Gusa , birakwiye ko abantu basobanukirwa ko imbuga nkoranyambaga zidakwiye gukomeza kureberwa mu mutaka wo guteza imbere ubwisanzure bwo gutanga ibitekerezo gusa , kuko abazishinga si cyo kibashishikaje cyane .
Ni abacuruzi bakomeye kuruta uko ari impirimbanyi za uburenganzira bwo gutanga ibitekerezo .
Uko zigenda zigwiza amafaranga niko zigira imbagara zikomeye ndetse zishobora kugera na aho zihanga na za guverinoma mu gihe zashyizeho amabwriza cyangwa amategeko abangamira inyungu zabo .
Abakoresha izi mbuga nkoranyambaga na bo kuba baratangiye kwinjiza agatubutse , bakora bagamije kwinjiza menshi , bityo ibituma bakurikirwa na benshi ni byo bibashishikaje cyane , batitaye ku kuba byangiza cyangwa bikayobya sosiyete muri rusange .
Birakwiye ko abantu babyaza umusaruro amahirwe atangwa no gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga ariko bigakorwa hirindwa kuyoborwa na inda bigatuma abantu batangaza ibinyoma , ibihuha na ibindi ibyangiza rubanda .
Birashoboka cyane gutangaza ibyubaka ndetse na ayo mafaranga ukayakorera .
Abasoma na abakurikira ibitangazwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga na bo bakwiye gushishoza cyane , ntibemere ibyo babonye byose cyangwa ngo babikwirakwize batabanje kugenzura byimbitse .
Daily Monitor na abayobozi ba Uganda bafata abatuye EAC nka abadatekereza neza .
Iyo usomye ibitangazamakuru byo muri Uganda , ushobora kubona ko nta bushake ku ruhande rwa abayobozi ba Uganda bwo kuzahura umubano wa iki gihugu na u Rwanda nubwo hari imbaraga nyinshi zashyizwemo na abahuza barimo Angola na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo .
Abayobozi ba Uganda bakomeje gutsimbarara ku ngingo zabo bakomeje kuzamura na mbere zirimo ibijyanye na uko ngo u Rwanda rwafunze umupaka bakirengagiza umuzi wa ikibazo , ariwo mugambi umaze igihe wo guhungabanya u Rwanda .
Inkuru iheruka ya Daily Monitor yari ifite umutwe ugira uti " " " " Umupaka wa Katuna umaze imyaka ibiri ufunzwe kuva ibiganiro byatangira , " " " " yashushe nka iyobya uburari inatanga na amakuru atari ukuri ku mpamvu ya umwuka mubi umaze igihe hagati ya ibihugu byombi .
Ikinyoma cya mbere cyari muri iyo nkuru ya Daily Monitor ni uko ngo igikorwa Uganda yakoze cyo kwambura Pasiporo abayobozi ba Umutwe wa Iterabwoba wa RNC ariyo nzitizi yonyine yari isigaye mu rugendo rwo gusubiza umubano ku murongo .
Daily Monitor iherutse kwandika ku nama yo ku wa 21 Gashyantare 2021 yabereye i Gatuna na ibijyanye no kwambura Charlotte Mukankusi Pasiporo yari yarahawe na Uganda .
Icyo kinyamakuru cyagize kiti " " " " Icyo gikorwa kigomba kuzagenzurwa , bikemezwa na Komisiyo yo ku rwego rwa ba minisitiri ihuriweho mu gushyira mu bikorwa amasezerano ya Luanda . . . mu gihe uyu mwanzuro ushyizwe mu bikorwa bikamenyeshwa abakuru ba ibihugu , abahuza bazahura mu minsi 15 mu nama izabera Gatuna / Katuna mu gufungura umupaka no
gusubiza mu buryo umubano wa ibihugu byombi . " " " "
Mukankusi ni Umuyobozi muri RNC , Umutwe wa Iterabwoba ufite uruhare mu bikorwa bitandukanye bya ibitero bya grenade byagabwe mu Mujyi wa Kigali mu 2010 .
Perezida Museveni yemeye ko bahuye ku bwa impanuka hamwe na abandi bayobozi ba RNC ubwo bapangaga guhungabanya u Rwanda .
Gusa , kwambura Mukankusi Pasiporo ntabwo byigeze bivugwa mu myanzuro ya inama ya Gatuna .
Ikibazo nyamukuru cyagombaga kugenzurwa na Komisiyo ya ba Minisitiri cyari " " " " ibirego bya u Rwanda ku bikorwa Uganda ikorera ku butaka byayo bigamije guhungabanya u Rwanda . " " " "
Itangazo rigira riti " " " " Mu gihe ibi birego bigaragaye , Guverinoma ya Uganda izafata ingamba zose mu kubihosha no guharanira ko bitongera kubaho ukundi . " " " "
Ryongeraho ko Uganda ifite igihe cya ukwezi ko kugenzura niba koko ibyo ishinjwa bifite ishingiro .
Umwaka urashize ariko ibinyamakuru byo muri Uganda ntibishaka kubaza Guverinoma yabo ibyo idashyira mu bikorwa .
Ahubwo , byahisemo inzira yo kuyobya ababikurikira ku bijyanye na imyanzuro ya Inama yabereye Gatuna ari nayo nzira yonyine izakemura ibibazo byose Uganda yaba ifite ku cyiswe " " " " ibibazo bya umupaka . " " " "
Biragaragara ko ikibazo Uganda ifite atari ibirego bya ubutasi [ yashinja Abanyarwanda ] yananiwe no gutangira ibimenyetso ndetse Perezida wayo ubwe akemera mu ibaruwa yandikiye mugenzi we wa u Rwanda ko byari " " " " ibihuha bisa . " " " "
Ikibazo nyamukuru ntabwo kigeze gihinduka .
Ni umugambi kirimbuzi wa Uganda wo gufasha imitwe yihebeye guhungabanya umutekano wa u Rwanda na ibikorwa byo gukomeza gutoteza no gufunga Abanyarwanda ba inzirakarengane .
Umunsi ibi bibazo bizaba byakemuwe , Komisiyo ihuriweho ya abaminisitiri izagenzura niba koko Uganda yarahagaritse ubufatanye na RNC na indi mitwe , hanyuma mu minsi 15 inama ya abakuru ba ibihugu izaterana nyuma ya ishyirwa hanze rya imyanzuro ya inama ya abaminisitiri .
Daily Monitor rero ikwiriye guhagarika gufata abasomyi bayo nka injiji , ibabwize ukuri nkuko yirirwa ibyigamba mu kivugo cyayo ngo " " " " Ukuri buri Munsi . " " " "
Inkotanyi ni amasomo kuri twese
Icyizwi ku bayobozi bayoboye kuri Repubulika ya mbere na iya kabiri , ni uko bose baranzwe na imitegekere mibi ibiba amacakubiri na ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside mu Banyarwanda .
Iyo mitegekere mibi yabyaye kwirukana mu gihugu Abatutsi , kubatwikira , kubamenesha ndetse no kubagira impunzi .
Abahunze bahungiye mu bihugu nka Tanzania , Uganda , Congo , Burundi na ahandi .
Amacakubiri na imitegekere mibi yari mu Rwanda yabyaye Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu mwaka wa 1994 aho Abatutsi barenga Miliyoni bishwe bazira ubusa , bazira uko basal , bazira uko bavutse .
Ku itariki 25 Ukuboza mu mwaka 1987 havutse Umuryango RPF - Inkotanyi ugamije kuzura u Rwanda no kubohora Abanyarwanda .
Inkotanyi zaranzwe na ubutwari , umutima ukomeye , Urukundo rwa u Rwanda na urw Abanyarwanda ndetse no kurwanya imitegekere mibi yose yari mu Rwanda .
Zashyize imbere guharanira ko iyo miyoborere mibi yari mu Rwanda icika kandi zabigezeho zibohora u Rwanda na Abanyarwanda , zibavana kuri iyo ngoyi .
Uretse iyo miyoborere mibi , Inkotanyi zanahagaritse Jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi , zirokora abicwaga .
Hari amsomo menshi abanditsi ndetse na Abanyarwanda twigira ku Nkotanyi zabohoye u Rwanda .
Muri ayo masomo twavuga nko Gukunda u Rwanda na Abanyarwanda .
Iri ni isomo rikomeye ko twese dukwiriye gukomeza kurangwa na urukundo rwa u Rwanda nkuko byaranze Inkotanyi bakemera gusiga byose , bakaza ku rugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda .
Inkotanyi kandi tuzigiraho indangagaciro ya ubutwari .
Nubwo bari bato , ntibatinye amasasu ubwo urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu rwatangiraga , ntibatinye inzara cyangwa imvura .
Bahisemo gukotanira kuzura u Rwanda .
Iri ni isomo ku banyarwanda ko dukwiriye kuba Intwari muri byose tukubaka u Rwanda , nta gucika intege kabone na iyo byaba bisaba ubwitange .
Inkotanyi zaranzwe na indangagaciro yo kureba kure , guca bugufi , kujya inama , kwihuta , kutazarira no gutekereza ku buryo bwagutse .
Izi ndangagaciro zose zaranze Inkotanyi Abanyarwanda muri rusange dukwiriye kuzimakaza kugira ngo bidufashe kugera ku ntsinzi yo kubaka u Rwanda ababohoye u Rwanda bifuzaga .
Abanyarwanda dukwiriye kwishimira ko twabonye abo twigiraho imikorere myiza na imyifatire bibereye Intore za u Rwanda .
Dukwiriye rero gukomeza kuzirikana ko dufitanye igihango na Inkotanyi cyo kuba abarinzi ba ibyagezweho kandi tukabyubakiraho ibindi bikorwa byinshi .
Abanyarwanda twese tuzirikane indangagaciro dukesha Inkotanyi zaduhaye Ubuzima .
Tujye duhora tuzirikana ko hari za kirazira zabafashije kubohora u Rwanda zirimo kudatatira Igihango , cyaraziraga kumena amaraso ya mwene Kanyarwanda , cyaraziraga kubiba amacakubiri muri bene Kanyarwanda , cyaraziraga kuba Ikigwari , cyaraziraga kugambanira mwene Kanyarwanda na ibindi byabaye imbarutso yo gutsinda urugamba .
Inkotanyi ni indorerwamo yacu twese mu mitekereze , imyifatire ndetse na ibikorwa byose bigamije kubaka u Rwanda .
Dukomere ku ndangagaciro na Kirazira twigira ku Nkotanyi bizadufasha kubaka u Rwanda ndetse na Afurika dushaka .
Urubyiruko rwa u Rwanda rurahirwa kuko Inkotanyi zaranzwe na izo ndangagaciro .
Dukomere kuri icyo Gihango bizadufasha kubaka u Rwanda ndetse na Afurika twifuza !
Raporo ya " " " " Rwanda Vital Statistics " " " " ya Ikigo cya Igihugu Gishinzwe Ibarurishamibare ( NISR ) , yo mu 2019 , hagaragajwe ko mu mwaka wa 2019 , gatanya zatanzwe mu Rwanda mu buryo bwemewe na amategeko zari 8 . 941 .
Ni imibare yazamutse cyane kuko mu 2018 hari hatanzwe gatanya 1311 , ni ukuvuga ko zikubye inshuro 6 . 8 . mu Mujyi wa Kigali hatanzwe gatanya 2400 , mu Majyepfo hatangwa gatanya 1989 , mu Burengerazuba hatanzwe gatanya 1820 , mu Burasirazuba hatanzwe 1482 naho mu Majyaruguru hatangwa gatanya 1250 .
Imbuga nkoranyambaga : Birakwiye ko ziba gasenyamiryango ?
Imibare ya NISR igaragaza ko ufashe gatanya zatanzwe mu 2019 ukagereranya na imiryango yashyingiwe mu buryo bwemewe na amategeko uwo mwaka , wavuga ko nibura mu miryango 100 , imiryango 18 . 4 yatandukanye .
imibare yatanzwe na Urukiko rwa Ikirenga umwaka ushize igaragaza ko imanza za gatanya zakiriwe hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga mu 2016 zari 21 , mu 2018 ziba 69 naho 2018 zigera 1311 .
Imbuga nkoranyambaga ziratungwa agatoki ?
Muri iyi minsi turi mu bihe bya ikoranabuhanga , hari benshi bemeza ko izi gatanya zifitanye isano na ikwirakwira rya ikoranabuhanga cyane cyane imbuga nkoranyambaga , kuko bamwe ribashuka bakarikoresha mu bikorwa bya ishimishamubiri , bakamenyaniraho na abantu bazatuma imiryango yabo isenyuka , mbega ugasanga ryababereye ikibazo aho kubabera
igisubizo .
Mu bya ukuri ikoranabuhanga si igikoresho cya Satani nka uko bamwe babikeka , ahubwo ni igikoresho cyakomotse ku bwenge Imana yahaye abantu , cyagakwiye no kuba igituma ubuzima bwabo burushaho kuba bwiza , aho kubusenya .
Uretse kuba imbuga nkoranyambaga zisigaye zisenya imiryango myinshi , zanahungabanyije uburere bwa abana kuko zisigaye zituma imiryango itakibona umwanya wo kuganira , abana bakabura umwanya wo kwisanzura ku babyeyi babo nyamara uruhare rwa umubyeyi ku burere bwa umwana rukaba ari ntasimburwa .
Imbuga nkoranyambaga zabaye nka irangamuntu nshya , kuko hari ubwo usanga umuntu utajya abwira umukunzi we ko amukunda , ashobora kugira atya akabimubwirira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga , cyangwa se umuntu udafite ubumenyi buhagije mu kintu runaka ugasanga yabaye inararibonye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ari gusobanura uko ibintu bikorwa
na uko bigenda nyamara nta bumenyi abifiteho .
Izi mbuga kandi zabaye inzira yo gukwirakwiza imico mibi iganisha ku busambanyi , aho usanga umugabo cyangwa umugore azirirwaho yibwira ko aganira na abantu bamukunda , nyamara wajya kureba neza ugasanga abo bantu atanabazi , ari uko gusa bahuriye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga , yarakuruwe gusa na ikimero na ibindi birungo byisigwa
na abo bantu .
Abantu bakunze kwirengagiza ko izi mbuga zitwara ni umwanya munini abazikoresha , kandi buryo ugutwaye umwanya aba agutwaye ubuzima .
Dukwiriye rero kwisuzuma tukareba uburyo dukoresha izi mbuga , tukareba niba zituzanira inyungu cyangwa igihombo .
Niba ziguteranya na uwo mwashakanye cyangwa zigatuma ubura umwanya uha abana na abandi bantu , ni ikimenyetso cya uko ukwiye kugerageza ukagabanya igihe uzimaraho .
Mu gitabo cya Umubwiriza mu gice cya Gatatu , yaravuze ngo " " " " Buri kintu kigira umwanya wacyo , kandi icyo uha agaciro nicyo uha umwanya munini , " " " " niyo mpamvu dukwiye kwisuzuma tukareba niba abantu ba ingenzi mu buzima bwacu tukibaha umwanya , cyangwa tuwumara ku bantu batatwitayeho muri rusange .
Mu bya ukuri imbuga nkoranyambaga ni nziza kuko zidufasha byinshi , ndetse wavuga ko ubuzima bwacu busigaye buzishingiyeho .
Birakwiye ko dukomeza kuzibyaza umusaruro , tukamenyana na abantu kandi tukamenya amakuru arimo Ijambo rya Imana , ariko ntidukwiye kuzemerera kutubera imbogamizi mu buzima bwacu , kugira ngo ejo na ejo bundi tutazasanga twarabaye ingaruzwamuheto ya Facebook , Twitter , Snapchat , WhatsApp , Instagram na izindi .
Uwanga u Rwanda arakabura u Rwanda , arushakire aho atazarubona .
Buri mwaka tariki ya 4 Nyakanga twizihiza Umunsi wo Kwibohora .
Uyu munsi hashize imyaka 27 u Rwanda rwibohoye .
Ariko rwakwibohora rwagira ruracyari mu rugendo rwo gukomeza kwibohora , ntabwo rurarangiza kuko rwageze kure hatagira kure handi hashoboka .
Rwibohoye amacakubiri mu bana barwo , ari na yo yarugejeje aho rwari ruri .
Abana babo basubizwa agaciro ka Ubunyarwanda rwari rwaranyazwe na abanzi ba amahoro yarwo .
Urugendo rutoroshye rwo kwibohora ruracyakomeza nubwo aho rugeze ari aho kwishimirwa .
Nidukomerereze aho tubohore imyumvire yacu .
Iyo myumvire twapakiwemo imyaka myinshi , tukabuzwa gutekereza ngo duhitemo icyiza twemye .
Iyo myumvire ya ubuhezanguni , henshi yigwaga mu mashuri kandi ubuhezanguni iyo buguheranye buvamo indwara idakira imunga ubwonko ikabusiga butagikora , budashobora kukuyobora neza .
Turacyari mu rugendo rwo kwibohora ubukene .
Muri urwo rugendo rwa inkubiri , twibohore igihatse byose , ari cyo ingengabitekerezo ya urwango , ari yo yavuyemo Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .
Ingangabitekerezo yahekuye benshi kandi hari abo yagize imbata .
Tutayiranduye burundu twazasubizwa muri ya minsi icuraburindi ryasimbuye izuba , ijoro ridacya rigasimbura umucyo .
Nitutayirwanya ngo tuyitsinde , nitutayitaho ngo tuyibohore na ibyo twibohoye twabiha ingufu zo kugaruka , tugasubira aho tutazikura .
Ntitwibagirwe aho twavuye , ejo tutazasubirayo , agaciro twihaye kakazapfa ubusa .
Rubyiruko rwacu ni mwe mizero dufite , muzirinde kwikorera amateka mabi , mutigeze mugiramo uruhare .
Mumenye kwibohora ubujiji , amateka mabi agumane banyirayo .
Nimwibohore ingoyi ya ubujiji ni cyo mukeneye mbere ya ibindi .
Igihugu kikujijura kiba kikwifuriza gutera imbere .
Ndabifuriza kutagira ababyeyi gito bazabaraga ubuhezanguni kuko burya umubyeyi gito araga abana ibyamunaniye .
Aho turi hose turate u Rwanda , burya igihugu kiruta byose .
Uyu munsi tuzahore tuwuzirikana kuko twawugezeho twabiruhiye .
Kugira ngo uyu munsi ushoboke watwaye ibitambo byinshi .
Kubyibagirwa ni ukwiyahura .
Abana ba u Rwanda bahasize ubuzima kandi nta cyabusimbura .
Ntitugomba kwibagirwa uyu munsi , watumye abana ba u Rwanda bagarura ubumuntu , amahoro agasimbura amahano , ubuhezanguni bukaba icyaha kuko nta wuhitamo aho avuka .
Ku Munsi nka uyu wo Kwibohora , ntidukangwe na ibihinda bya inyangabirama zisebya u Rwanda ziririmba Jenoside ebyiri .
Niba atari injiji mu mitwe ni injiji mu mitima cyangwa ubugome bwasimbuye ubwenge bakibagirwa amateka bazaraga urubyiruko .
Urugero muri nyinshi nabaha ni uru : hashize imyaka 75 , Jenoside yakorerwaga Abayahudi mu Burayi ihagaritswe na ingabo za Amerika zagombye gutabara iza u Burayi mu ntambara ya kabiri ya isi yose .
Izo ngabo zatwitse umugi wa Dresden uri mu majyepfo ya u Budage .
Bivugwa kandi ko uwo mujyi warimo inganda nyinshi , zicura intwaro zajyanwaga kurimbura Abayahudi .
Tariki ya 13 Gashyantare 1945 , ingabo za Amerika na iz u Bwongeleza zishyize hamwe zitwikisha za bombe uwo mujyi , ibyarimo byose birashya ndetse na abantu .
Tariki ya 14 Gashyantare indege ziragaruka zihatera noneho toni 750 za bombe .
Bivugwa ko hatewe toni 2978 mu mujyi wa Dresden .
Hapfuye inzirakarengane zitabarika zirenga miliyoni , zirimo na Abayahudi bari bahahungiye Jenoside yabakorerwaga kuko intambara itarobanura .
Ubu amagambo avuga ko habaye Jenoside mu mujyi wa Dresden , asigaye mu bahezanguni bakumbuye ubutegetsi bwa Abanazi twagereranya na Hutu pawa mu Rwanda .
Abo na bo kandi bahaguruka iyo icyunamo cya Abayahudi cyegereje .
Nyamara ibyo byatangiye kuvugwa , iyo Jenoside yakorewe Abayahudi igihagarikwa na ingabo za isi yose zishyize hamwe , ntibyatumye habaho ihakana na ipfobya bya Jenoside yabakorewe , kandi ntibivuze ko habaye Jenoside yakorewe Abadage .
Jenoside yakorewe Abatututsi yakozwe na Abanyarwanda , ihagarikwa na abana barwo nta munyamahanga ubafashije .
Ahubwo amahanga yari kubafasha ni yo yabarwanyaga ngo idahagarara kubera kuyigiramo uruhare .
Ni yo mpamvu kuvuga ko mu Rwanda habaye Jenoside ebyiri bitagomba kugira uwo bikanga kuko ari intambara tuzarwana igihe isi izaba ikimeze uko imeze none .
Amateka akwiye kutubera urugero .
Uyu munsi ukwiye kuba uwo kwibaza uko twahangana na ipfobya na ihakana bya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kuko ari yo ntwaro abanzi basigaye bakoresha basebya igihugu cyacu na ubuyobozi bwacyo .
Ntidukwiye gutega amatwi abatubeshya demokarasi iwabo nta yihari , usinziriye atabibona ni uwisinzirije .
Demokarasi ya mbere ni ukubaha amateka na indangagaciro byacu tuzaraga abo tubyara .
Demokarasi ya mbere ni ukuba ufite ubuzima , icyo urya na aho uryama .
Demokarasi ya mbere ni amahoro na umutekano .
Indangagaciro za ababivuga si zo zacu .
Indangagaciro zabo ni nyamwinshi .
Nyamwinshi yabo kandi si amoko ni politiki na yo bahora bahindura uko bashaka kuko buri wese areba inyungu .
Nyamwinshi yabo zi ubwoko badupfunyikiye kuko turi ubwoko bumwe , twese turi bene Kanyarwanda .
Iyo nyamwinshi badupfunyikiye ntayo iba mu Rwagasabo kuko turi ubwoko bumwe Nyarwanda .
Badupfunyikiye nyamwinshi na bo batasobanukiwe , nyamwinshi ya ibitekerezo bayihindura nyamwinshi ya ubwoko buhimbano bwadutesheje agaciro bukatwambura Ubunyarwanda .
Ubumuntu batwambuye bakatugira ikintu , uyu munsi twarabwisubije tububumbatire butaducika .
Ni nde wakwibagirwa uyu munsi muri 1994 , abantu bakicwa bazira uko bavutse ?
Hashize imyaka 27 , ubwirakabiri bwabyaye umucyo .
Ni nde wakwibagirwa aho inkotanyi zakuye u Rwanda ?
Ni nde wakwibagirwa ko zatanze ibitambo byinshi kugira ngo u Rwanda rutazimangana ku ikarita ya isi ?
Ni nde wakwibagirwa ko zazanye amahoro amahanga aturebera , nubwo abenshi twasigaye mapfubyi ?
Ni nde ?
Ni nde ?
Ni nde wakwibagirwa bigakunda , uretse uwarwifurizaga kuba umuyonga ?
Nkotanyi bana ba u Rwanda , ni nde wakwibagirwa igiciro mwatanze , cyo gusiga ibyanyu mugasiga abanyu , mukitanga mutizigama inzara na inyota bitagira urugero , mugasiga imiryango mugasiga byose kugira ngo urwa Gasabo rugire ituze ?
Ni nde wakwibagirwa urubyiruko rutabonye intsinzi , rukagwa mu mashyamba rurwanira amahoro , ababyeyi bakamarira abana ku rugamba , hakaba hari abasigaye bigunze kandi bari barabyaye ?
Gutanga umwana byasimburwa na iki ?
Gutanga amaraso ngo urokore ayandi twabinganya iki ?
Ni nde wakwibagirwa agaciro mwatweretse ko kudahora nyamara urwango rukiri rwose ?
Ni nde wakwibagirwa aho mwakuye impunzi mutibagiwe na abahekuye u Rwanda ?
Ni nde wakwibagirwa ubumuntu mwashubije inzirabwoba , maze mukishyira hamwe mukiyunga , mukatubera urugero rwo kubana nka Abanyarwanda , Ubwiyunge bukava mu byiyumviro bukaba bwarahindutse ihame nubwo urugendo rukiri rwose ?
Muzabyare muzaheke , muzasubize ingobyi imugongo , maze mwuzukuruze ingoma ibihumbi , u Rwanda rukomeze rwibaruke intwari .
Gutuka Perezida wa Repubulika ni ukwikenya
bikaba akaga gakomeye iyo umututse aba yitirirwa izina rya Imana cyangwa ushyira Bibiliya imbere akayikurikirisha amagambo ameze nka ubumara bwica abayumva .
Ikindi kandi twabonye ko yaba mu mategeko mbonezamubano , muri za kirazira za umuco Nyarwanda no mu ijambo rya Imana kubaha ni ibwiriza mbonezabupfura , bikaba inkomoko ya umugisha ka ubikoze kandi gutukana bikaba icyaha , byagera ku gutuka ukuruta byo bikakubera akaga kagukururira umuvumo na urupfu .
Muri iki gice cya kabiri tugiye kurebera hamwe uburyo Imana ibona kandi ifata Perezida wa Repubulika mu buryo bwihariye , ingaruka zizanwa no kumutuka haba ku muntu ku giti cye ( umututse ) , ku babyumva bakabishyigikira no ku gihugu muri rusange .
Umwanditsi wa igitabo cya Umubwiriza muri Bibiliya igice cya 10 : 16 - 17 , avuga uburyo Imana ifata umuyobozi mukuru wa igihugu , ibyago na amahirwe abagituye bagira bitewe na imyitwarire ye .
Yagize ati " " " " Wa gihugu we , iyo ufite umwami ari umwana muto , kandi ibikomangoma byawe bikaba ibiryakare , uba ubonye ishyano .
Wa gihugu we , ube uhiriwe iyo ufite umwana wa imfura ho umwami , kandi ibikomangoma byawe bikarya mu gihe gikwiriye , kugira ngo bigire amagara bitarimo isindwe . " " " "
Uyu mwanditsi akomeza asaba abantu kwirinda gutuka umwami .
Agira ati " " " " Ntugatuke umwami ndetse ntukabitekereze , ntugatuke abakire uri mu nzu uryamamo , kuko inyoni yo mu kirere yagurukana ijwi ryawe , kandi igifite amababa cyabyamamaza . " " " "
( Umubwiriza 10 : 20 ) .
Ubu butumwa bujya gusa neza na uburi muri 1 Timoteyo 2 : 1 ; 2 hagira hati " " " " Irya mbere ya byose ndaguhugurira kwingingira abantu bose no kubasengera no kubasabira no kubashimira ariko cyane cyane abami na abatware bose kugira ngo duhore mu mahoro tutabona ibyago , twubaha Imana kandi twitonda rwose . " " " "
Perezida wa Repubulika ni umuntu umwe rukumbi mu gihugu ufite inshingano zihariye , udafite undi wagereranya nawe , ni ikirango gikuru cya igihugu , akaba na umurinzi wa ibindi birango bya igihugu .
Ni umugaba mukuru wa ikirenga wa ingabo za igihugu , ni umurinzi wa itegeko risumba ayandi mu gihugu na andi mategeko arishamikiyeho .
Uretse Imana yo mu ijuru , Perezida ni we wenyine mu gihugu uca iteka rya urupfu na ubuzima bikaba bityo .
Imana ifata Perezida wa Repubulika nka umuyoboro wa ibyago cyangwa amahirwe nka uko twabisomye mu Umubwiriza kandi imufata nka umusingi wa amahoro ku gihugu nka uko Timoteyo abivuga .
Iyo igihugu gifite Umukuru wa Igihugu mwiza kandi wubashywe na abenegihugu , kibona amahirwe na amahoro .
Intumwa Pawulo mu rwandiko yandikiye Itorero rya i Roma , yahuguriye abakirisitu kubaha ubuyobozi , ababwira ko kubaha ubuyobozi ari imwe mu nzira yo kubaho neza kandi ari uburyo bwo kubaha Imana ariko ku rundi ruhande yaberetse na ingaruka zizagera ku muntu wese utazubaha ubuyobozi .
Yabisobanuye muri aya magambo , agira ati " " " " Umuntu wese agandukire abatware bamutwara , kuko ari nta butware butava ku Mana , na abatware bariho bashyizweho na Imana .
Ni cyo gituma ugandira umutware aba yanze itegeko rya Imana , kandi abaryanga bazatsindwa na urubanza .
Abatware si abo gutinywa na abakora ibyiza , keretse abakora nabi .
Mbese ushaka kudatinya umutware ?
Kora neza na we azagushima , kuko ari umukozi wa Imana uguhesha ibyiza .
Ariko nukora nabi utinye , kuko adatwarira inkota ubusa .
Ni umukozi wa Imana , uhoresha umujinya ukora nabi . " " " "
( Abaroma 13 : 1 ; 4 ) .
Mu mpuguro Pawulo yahaye Abanyeroma yabagaragarije ko umwami ( Perezida ) ari umukozi wa Imana washyizweho nayo kandi ikamushyiriraho kugira ngo ihe ituze abayubaha inahoreshe umujinya wayo kubakora ibibi niyo mpamvu usuzuguye umwami aba yanze itegeko rya Imana .
Imana ifata Perezida nka umuntu udasanzwe kandi wihariye , uri mu mwanya ukwiye wo gukoreshwa mu gutanga ibyiza , mu gusendereza umugisha na amahoro ku batuye igihugu .
Ariko na none ikamubona nka umuntu ukwiye wo guhoresha umujinya ku muntu wese ukora ibibi .
Utuka Perezida , ntiyubahe abamukuriye azatsindwa na urubanza .
Mu nshingano za umunyagihugu wese harimo kubaha amategeko na abayobozi ba igihugu bya umwihariko Perezida wa Repuburika kuko ni umuntu wihariye uba waratoranyijwe na Imana agahabwa inshingano zihariye .
Dawidi ni icyitegererezo cyiza cyo kwerekana uburyo umwami akwiye kubahwa kabone nubwo hari ibyo waba ubona bitakunyuze mu bikorwa nawe cyangwa abatware , ibyo uvuga byose , mu guharanira uburenganzira bwawe , mu gukora imirimo ya Politiki na ibindi hagomba kubamo kubaha umwami .
Nubwo Sawuli yariho ahiga Dawidi ngo amwice , nubwo Dawidi yagize amahirwe menshi yo kuba yahitana Sawuli , nubwo Dawidi yari afite abamushyigikiye benshi bamwerekaga ko hari icyo yakora kuri Sawuli , yirinze kugira ikibi amukoraho , yirinze kugira amagambo mabi amuvugaho .
Yahamagariye abantu bari bamushyigikiye kubaha umwami kumwumvira no kumuramya kugeza igihe Imana yamushyiriye ku ngoma ibonye ko ari ngombwa gushyira iherezo ku gihe cye cyo gutwara .
Kubaha Umukuru wa Igihugu ni ihame rituma Imana ikubonamo kuba igisonga cyiza cyaragizwa ibyananiye abandi .
Ni urufunguzo rugukingurira imiryango itandukanye yo kurama no kubaho unezererewe ibyiza byo mugihugu .
Ni ukugandukira no kumvira Imana yamwimitse nka umukozi wayo wo gusohoza ibyiza no guhoresha umujinya abakora ibibi .
Igihugu gifite abanyagihugu bubaha kandi bingingira Umuyobozi wabo baba mu mahoro na ibyishimo ariko igihugu gifite abanyagihugu batubaha kandi bagandira umuyobozi wabo , bahora mu marira na imiborogo .
Imana igufashe gusobanukirwa ihame ryo kubaha umuyobozi mukuru wa igihugu naho kumutuka burya ni ukwikenya .
" " " " Irya mbere ya byose ndaguhugurira kwingingira abantu bose , no kubasengera no kubasabira no kubashimira , ariko cyane cyane Abami na abatware bose kugira ngo duhore mu mahoro tutabona ibyago , twubaha Imana kandi twitonda rwose . " " " "
( 1 Timoteyo 2 : 1 ; 2 ) .
Ibikubiye muri iyi nyandiko ni ibitekerezo bwite bya Urinzwenimana Mike
Inkuru ya The WSJ yerekana ko USA na u Bubiligi bikwiye gushyira hanze ukuri ku iterabwoba rya Rusesabagina .
Inkundura zitagira iherezo zo gukomeza gusaba ko Paul Rusesabagina arekurwa zikomeje kugenda zitera ishozi umunsi ku munsi .
Vuba aha The Wall Street Journal ( WSJ ) , ikindi kinyamakuru cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika gikomeje gutesha agaciro amahame agenga itangazamakuru , cyatanze umwanya ku mbaga ya abashyigikiye iterabwoba , ibintu kitashoboraga gukora iyo umwe mu bantu icyenda bahitanywe na ibitero bya Umutwe wa Iterabwoba wa FLN ya Rusesabagina aza kuba
Umunyamerika .
Pearson na Zoellner mu nkuru yahawe umutwe ugira uti " " " " kuva muri Hotel Rwanda ujya mu ibagiro " " " " basabye Perezida Biden gushyira igitutu ku Rwanda kugira ngo rurekure umugabo wagizwe uruhare mu iyicwa rya Abanyarwanda ba inzirakarengane .
Wenda , iki ni cyo gihe ngo Abanyarwanda basabe abayobozi ba Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na u Bubiligi gusangiza abatuye Isi amakuru bafite ku byaha byatumye Rusesabagina ajya muri gereza .
Icya mbere izi guverinoma zafasha gushyira iherezo ku bivugwa ko Rusesabagina ari gukurikiranwa kubera ko gusa anenga Guverinoma ya u Rwanda .
Ibi birego , byateguwe na Pierson na Zoellner byoroshye kunyomozwa na uwari we wese uha agaciro ukuri .
Ku rundi ruhande , ibimaze iminsi biba byerekana ko Abanyarwanda bakwiye guhaguruka bagasaba Guverinoma za Amerika na u Bubiligi gusangiza abandi amakuru zifite kuri iki kirego .
Urugero , mu minsi mike ishize , ibihuha byatijwe umurindi na umunyamakuru wa New York Times , bivuga ko Rusesabagina " " " " yimwe ibiryo , amazi na ubuvuzi " " " " byanyomojwe na itangazo rigufi rya Minisiteri ya Ububanyi na Amahanga ya Amerika , bituma Rusesabagina , umuryango we , abamushyigikiye na ibinyamakuru birangwa
na ubunebwe byo mu Burengerazuba bwa Isi bigorora imvugo yabyo irimo ibinyoma ndetse igamije no kurwanya u Rwanda .
Kuva ibi binyamakuru bigayitse byo mu Burengerazuba bwa Isi bibona ko ibyo guverinoma za ibihugu byabyo bitangaza kuri Rusesabagina ari ibyo kwizerwa kurusha ibitangazwa na inzego za u Rwanda , abizerwa nka abavuga ukuri ntibagomba kugira icyo basiga inyuma .
Ku rundi ruhande abanyura mu nkuru mbere ya uko zitangazwa , barimo na abo kuri The Wall Street Journal bafite inshingano zo kugenzura amakuru atariyo ari mu nyandiko zabo .
Akazi kabo ku bijyanye na iki kibazo bya umwihariko ntigashimishije .
Icya kabiri , izi guverinoma ziramutse zikoreye mu mucyo ku bijyanye na iki kibazo , byasobanura neza ikikigaragara nka amayobera kuri Pierson na Zoellner ku mpamvu " " " " Guverinoma ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika idashyira igitutu ku Rwanda ngo rurekure Paul Rusesabagina " " " " nka uko aba banditsi babiri ba iyi nkuru yamamaza
iterabwoba babyibaza .
Impamvu isa na aho yigaragaza ku muntu wese ushyira mu gaciro .
Hejuru ya ibi byose niba Amerika itirengagiza ibirego bya Human Rights Watch bidafite agaciro bijyanye na ihonyora rya uburenganzira bwa muntu kuki yaterwa isoni no guhagarara ku muntu wayo watsindiye " " " " Presidential medal of freedom " " " " no gutegeka ko Rusesabagina arekurwa ?
Hejuru ya byose , itabwa muri yombi rye ni ikimenyetso gifatika , bitandukanye na ibirego bidafite ishingiro bya Human Rights Watch .
Ese ntibigaragarira buri wese ushyira mu gaciro ko ubuyobozi bwa Amerika buzi ko Rusesabagina atari utavuga rumwe na ubutegetsi gusa wagaragajwe na Pearson na Zoellner .
Mu bya ukuri ahubwo , mu myaka 10 ishize , inzego za Amerika zitungiwe agatoki na Professor Michelle Martin , Umunyamerika wahoze ari umukorerabushake muri Rusesabagina Foundation zatangije iperereza ku byaha bya Rusesabagina .
FBI yabonye ibimenyetso bya uko Rusesabagina yoherereje amafaranga abayobozi ba FDLR , umutwe wakoze Jenoside wanashyizwe ku rutonde rwa imitwe ya iterabwoba na Amerika .
Ibyavuye muri iri perereza byakusanyirijwe hamwe mu ibaruwa yo ku wa 4 Ukwakira 2013 Minisiteri ya Ubutabera ya Amerika yoherereje Ubushinjacyaha bwa u Rwanda .
Mu byumvikana , Pierson na Zoellner bagomba kumenya ko bidashoboka ko igihugu cyavumbuye ibyakoreshejwe nka ibimenyetso mu rubanza rukiri kuba gishobora kugira ikindi gisaba kirenze guhabwa ubutabera bukwiye .
Hejuru ya ibi niba ubutabera bukwiye , aho gusaba kurekurwa ako kanya ku muyobozi wa umutwe wa iterabwoba aricyo kibazo , iburanisha riri kuba rikwiye gukomeza kugeza ripfundikiwe .
Uretse imbaraga zikomeje gukomeza gushyirwa mu kugaragaza u Rwanda nka igihugu kitagendera ku mategeko , turakoze bihagije byo kumenya ko mu myaka itatu gusa ishize ndetse hanashingiwe kuri raporo ya Word Economic Forum u Rwanda rwashyizwe ku mwanya wa mbere muri Afurika na uwa 23 ku Isi mu bihugu bifite ubutabera bukora neza cyane cyane mu bijyanye
na ubwigenge bwa urwego rwa ubutabera .
Mu yandi magambo , u Rwanda rwakoze neza kurenza bimwe mu bihugu itangazamakuru rirurwanya riturukamo .
Kimwe na Amerika , abayobozi ba u Bubiligi bagize uruhare mu isakwa ryakorewe mu rugo rwa Rusesabagina mu Bubiligi bafite amakuru bakwiye gusangiza ariko bahaye abatuye Isi amakuru atariyo .
Ndacyahamya ko Guverinoma ya Amerika na iy u Bubiligi bafite inshingano zo gusobanura impamvu baruciye bakarumira kuva Rusesabagina yatabwa muri yombi , niba badafite inyungu muri gahunda ya itangazamakuru yo guharabika u Rwanda .
Abagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Ubumwe bwa u Burayi , nta na isoni bafite bamaganye u Rwanda kubera ibikorwa Komisiyo ya u Burayi ishinzwe Uburenganzira bwa Muntu yagaragaje nka ibyubahirije amategeko mu kibazo cya " " " " Walter stocke na u Budage . " " " "
Guverinoma ya Amerika na u Bubiligi ntizishobora guha ikaze igitutu cya abashyigikiye iterabwoba .
Ndetse na u Rwanda ntirwabikora .
Gushyigikira Rusesabagina byatumye " " " " Lantos Foundation " " " " iba nka cya gisiga kimennye inda
Nyuma ya urupfu rwa Tom Lantos wari wararokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abayahudi ndetse akaba na umwe mu bari bagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika aho yari Umuyobozi wa Komite ishinzwe Ububanyi na Amahanga , abari bamushyigikiye batangiye Umuryango bise Lantos Foundation for Human Rights and Justice .
Uyu muryango utandukanye na " " " " Tom Lantos Human Rights Commission " " " " wavuze ko intego zawo " " " " ari ukugeza ibijyanye na uburenganzira bwa ikiremwa muntu muri buri nguni ya Isi . " " " "
Buri mwaka , Lantos Foundation itanga ibihembo bijyanye na iyubahirizwa rya uburenganzira bwa muntu .
Gusa gake cyane ni bwo ikora ibisa na ibyihariye nka uko bikunze kugenda ku yindi miryango nka iyi , itanga ibihembo ku bantu basa na aho bamaze kumenyekana ndetse bakaba barahawe ibindi bihembo na abafite amazina akomeye abaterankunga bazamenya ubundi bakayihundagazaho amafaranga .
Byashoboka ko ari no muri ubu buryo mu 2011 , uyu muryango wahaye Paul Rusesabagina , wabaye ikimenyabose mu 2004 nyuma ya uko hasohotse filimi ya Hotel Rwanda yamukinweho .
Byashoboka ko guha iki gihembo Rusesabagina bishobora kuba byarumvikanaga muri icyo gihe : Kubera ko Perezida George W . Bush yari yaramaze guha uyu mugabo umudali uzwi nka " " " " Presidential Medal of Freedom . " " " "
Muri uwo mwaka nabwo Rusesabagina yahawe " " " " Wallenberg Medal " " " " na " " " " National Civil Rights Museum Freedom Award . " " " "
Ikibazo ni uko uku kugirwa igitangaza byahishuye imigambi ya Rusesabagina .
Yashakaga kugera ku butegetsi , kunanirwa kubigeraho mu nzira za demokarasi , byatumye akoresha ubundi buryo bwose bushoboka .
Ibimenyetso birivugira .
Rusesabagina yashyize imbere ibikorwa bya ubugizi bwa nabi .
Amagambo ye ntiyari agamije impaka zisanzwe .
Yatanze inkunga ku mitwe yagabye ibitero biteye ubwoba .
Iyi mitwe ntiyibasiye abayobozi ba u Rwanda cyangwa igisirikare ahubwo yibasiye abahinzi , abaturage na imodoka , aho bishe urwa agashinyaguro abaturage ba inzirakarengane .
Muri Kanama 2020 , Rusesabagina yarabeshywe yisanga mu ndege yari igiye i Kigali .
Nyuma yo kuhagera yatawe muri yombi .
Ubu ari kuburanishwa .
Enter Katrina Lantos Swett , umukobwa wa Lantoa s akaba na Perezida wa Lantos Foundation , mu ntangiriro za uku kwezi yasabye ko Amerika igendera kuri " " " " Magnitsky Act " " " " igafatira ibihano abagize uruhare mu itabwa muri yombi rya Rusesabagina .
Magnitsky Act ni itegeko rihereza Perezida uburenganzira bwo gufatira igihugu ibihano bitandukanye ahanini biturutse ku birego byo guhonyora uburenganzira bwa muntu na ruswa .
Igitekerezo cya uyu mukobwa , gisa na icyivuguruza ibyo se yubatse ndetse na ibyo yemeraga .
Swett ntatesha gusa agaciro ibimenyetso birimo na amagambo Rusesabagina yavugiye mu ruhame ashyigikira imitwe ya iterabwoba na inyemezabwishyu za Western Union zerekana ko Rusesabagina ku giti cye yateye inkunga iyo mitwe , ahubwo arengaho akavuga ko ibyo Rusesabagina aregwa " " " " Bidafite ishingiro ndetse ko yagejejwe mu Rwanda mu
buryo buhamanye na amategeko mpuzamahanga . " " " "
Ntari mu kuri .
Hari ingero nyinshi zemewe na inkiko zikurikirana ibijyanye na uburenganzira bwa muntu , aho abakekwako ibyaha bagiye babeshywa kugira ngo bagezwe imbere ya ubutabera kandi bikemezwa nka ibyubahirije amategeko .
Lantos yakunze kumvikana avuga uburyo Adolf Eichmann wari mu bikomerezwa bya Aba - Nazi wagize uruhare rukomeye mu byaha bya intambara , yagiye muri Hungary mu 1994 gutegura umugambi wo gutsemba Abayahudi .
Byatumye Lantos yisaga mu nkambi zakorerwagamo imirimo ya uburetwa aho yaje kuva ari nta nkuru .
Ku wa 11 Gicurasi 1960 , Inzego za ubutasi za Israel zashimuse Eichmann zimukuye i Buenos Aires zimujyana muri Israel ngo ashyikirizwe ubutabera .
Ese Swett yemera ko ishimutwa rya Eichmann ritesha agaciro ibyaha yakoze ku bwa ibyo akaba yaheraho yemeza ko ifatwa rye atari ikintu cyari gikwiye gukorwa ?
Aho niho uyu mugore yahisemo kubakira Lantos Foundation .
Kugereka ibyaha kwa Swett kuri Perezida wa u Rwanda Paul Kagame kubera kugira icyo avuga kuri Rusesabagina nabyo ntibyumvikana .
Ese kuba Perezida Joe Biden yasaba ko hakwiye gufatwa " " " " umwanzuro ukwiye " " " " bya impamvu yo kwirengagiza ikirego cya ubwicanyi Derek Chauvin akurikiranyweho ?
Rimwe na rimwe , bibaho ko abantu badakwiriye begukana ibihembo .
Umunyarwenya Bill Cosby yabonye ibihembo byinshi birimo na " " " " Presidential Medal of Freedom , " " " " ibi byose byari mbere ya uko ahamywa ibyaha byo gufata ku ngufu .
Bamwe batanze ibitekerezo bagaragaza ko Cosby akwiye kwamburwa ibi bihembo .
Ibi ni nako byagenze ku kanama gashinzwe gutanga ibihembo bya Nobel ubwo kagihaga Minisitiri wa Intebe wa Ethiopia , Abiy Ahmed ariko katazi ko ashobora guhinduka umwe mu bijandika mu byaha bya intambara ku Mugabane wa Afurika .
Kuri aka kanama Abiy ashobora kuba ari igisebo ariko mu kwikuraho ikosa ntigashobora gushyigikira ibyaha akora cyangwa ngo kabihakane .
Nta na kimwe muri ibi kigamije kuvuga ko iburanishwa rya Rusesabagina ari nta makemwa .
Haracyari byinshi bikwiriye kunozwa mu butabera bwa u Rwanda .
Urugaga rwa Abanyamategeko bo muri Amerika rwagaragaje hamwe mu hakwiriye amavugurura cyane cyane " " " " mu bijyanye no gutandukanya ibimenyetso bidashidikanywaho na ibindi . " " " "
Kugeza na na ubu , imiryango iharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu yitesha agaciro iyo ishyira imbere politiki na ubwibone kurenza amahame abagenga .
Kwanga Kagame si impamvu yasobanura iterabwoba nka uko kwanga uwahoze ari Minisitiri wa Intebe wa Israel , Benjamin Netanyahu , bidashobora kuba impamvu yo kwemera ibikorwa na Hamas .
Ku bwa amahirwe make bitewe no kwitiranya ibimenyesto no gushyira amarangamutima mu rubanza rwa Rusesabagina byatumye Lantos Foundation iba nka cya gisiga cya urwara rureru kimennye inda ndetse mu buryo bwagutse byangiza ibijyanye na ubuvugizi mu iyubahirizwa rya uburenganzira bwa muntu .
Imyaka ijana irashize ishyaka CPC riri ku butegetsi mu Bushinwa ridatezuka ku ntego zaryo .
Harabura iminsi mike gusa ngo ishyaka riri ku butegetsi mu Bushinwa [ Communist Party of China : CPC ] ryizihize imyaka ijana rimaze ribayeho .
Ushobora kuba uzi byinshi ku iterambere ryihuta rya u Bushinwa ndetse na ubukungu bwabwo buhamye muri iki gihe ariko utazi urugendo iki gihugu cyanyuzemo mu myaka ijana ishize ngo kibe kiri aho kiri ubu .
U Bushinwa bwarwanye intambara ikomeye yo kubaho nka igihugu cyakoronizwaga ndetse kibaho mu buhake .
Ku ruhande rumwe ibihugu bikize byarabwigabije byubaka amazu mu mijyi , bizana ingabo bitangira kunyunyuza ubukungu bwabwo .
Ku rundi ruhande abatware babwo barwana hagati yabo , bituma igihugu kigwa mu manga ndetse na abaturage ba u Bushinwa barahazaharira .
Ibi byatumye abakunda igihugu bashakisha inzira zo kukizahura no gukura abaturage mu bibazo , ariko ntibyaborohera kuko yaba gukura abaturage mu bukene , gukora impinduka , gushyiraho amategeko agenga ingoma ya ubwami ndetse no gushyiraho impinduka za demokarasi byose byaranze .
Iki gihe ni bwo ishyaka rya CPC ryavutse muri Nyakanga 1921 .
Guhera ubwo iri shyaka ryafashije abaturage kugera ku byishimo nyabyo ndetse no guhindura igihugu gishya .
Mu 1949 , ishyaka rya CPC ryashyize hamwe imbaraga riyobora abaturage ku ntsinzi ya intambara ya Abayapani bashakaga gutwara tumwe mu duce twa u Bushinwa bakatwomeka ku Buyapani ndetse iri shyaka ryatsinze ubutegetsi bwa igitugu bwari buyobowe na ishyaka rya Kuomintang rishyiraho Repubulika ya Abaturage ba u Bushinwa , igihugu
gitangira kunamuka .
Mu 1978 iri shyaka rya CPC ryafashe umwanzuro udasanzwe wazanye impinduramatwara , riyobora igihugu ku rugendo rurerure rwa " " " " socialism " " " " [ politike yo gusangira ubukungu ] ishyize imbere inyungu za Abashinwa .
Mu myaka 40 yakurikiye , iyi politiki yatumye ubukungu bwa iki gihugu bushinga imizi , ndetse urugendo rwo gushyira imbere inyungu za abaturage ba u Bushinwa rurabahira .
Ubukungu bwa u Bushinwa bwiyongeragaho 9 % buri mwaka , bukora igitangaza cyo kuba igihugu cyihuta cyane mu bukungu kandi mu gihe gito cyane ko cyari kikiri mu nzira ya amajyambere .
Kugeza ubu , u Bushinwa ni cyo gihugu cya kabiri gikize ku Isi ndetse kikaba na igihugu cya mbere ku Isi giteye imbere mu bya inganda , aho kigize hafi 30 % ya izamuka rya ubukungu bwa Isi .
Amafaranga umuturage yinjizaga ku mwaka yavuye ku madolari 200 mu 1980 agera ku bihumbi 10 bya amadolari mu 2020 .
Ni ikinyejana cyari cyuzuye amarira , ibyuya na amaraso ariko nanone cyaranzwe na umuhate , ubwenge ndetse na imbaraga .
Mu gihe cya ibibazo , abarwanashyaka ba CPC ntibigeze bacika intege .
Ntibahwemye gushakira igihugu inzira iboneye no gushaka icyatera ibyishimo abaturage no guteza imbere u Bushinwa .
Icya mbere , CPC yari ishishikariye gushaka inzira iboneye igihugu cya u Bushinwa cyanyuramo ngo gitere imbere .
Mu myaka ya mbere ya ubuyobozi bwayo , yakoresheje inzira za abandi mu buryo bwa imikoreshereze ya abakozi mu mijyi iteye imbere ariko bigenda byanga .
Nyuma yo kugerageza bikanga , CPC yabonye uburyo bushya buboneye buganisha ku mpinduramatwara ya u Bushinwa .
Ubwo buryo bwari ukwiyunga na abakozi ndetse na abaturage , imijyi izengurutswa uburinzi , hatangira intambara za amasasu .
Mu myaka ya 1950 na 1970 , ishyaka rya CPC ryahuye na imbogamizi nyinshi mu miyoborere ya igihugu kubera ko yari iri kugihindura ngo kigendere ku matwara ya socialism no kucyubaka bundi bushya , ndetse kubera ubunararibonye budahagije mu miyoborere no gukopera imiyoborere ya abasoviyete byatumye intangiriro yayo igorana .
Gusa nyuma yo kunyura muri byinshi no gukurikira intero igira iti " " " " bohora ibitekerezo , ushakire ukuri ku bimenyetso , " " " " CPC yafashe umwanzuro wo gukora impinduka no kuvuga byose bigamije gukuraho ubukungu bwa u Bushinwa .
Icya kabiri , CPC ntiyigeze ihindura icyerekezo , yagumanye intego yatangiranye yo guteza imbere abaturage .
Kuko iterambere rishyirwaho na abaturage , rikaba irya abaturage kandi rigasangirwa na abaturage .
Kurwanya ubukene ni kimwe mu ngero zifatika zigaragaza uku kudatezuka ku cyerekezo cyayo .
Mu 2012 , u Bushinwa bwatangije intambara ku bukene .
Mu mpera za 2020 hafi miliyoni 100 za abaturage bavanywe mu bukene [ ni ukuvuga abantu binjizaga 1 , 90 $ ku munsi ] .
Amafaranga yinjizwaga na abaturage batuye mu bice bya ibyaro yikubye inshuro zirenga ebyiri aba amadolari 1900 .
Imiryango miliyoni 7 , 9 yimuriwe mu mazu meza afite umutekano ; imihanda ireshya na kilometero miliyoni 1 , 1 yaravuguruwe ; hubakwa inzira za gari ya moshi nshya zingana na ibirometero 37 . 00o .
Abaturage batuye mu bice bya ibyaro hafi ya bose babonye umuriro wa amashanyarazi uhoraho .
Mbere ya imyaka icumi yari yarateganyijwe , u Bushinwa bwabashize kugera ku ntego yo kurwanya ubukene bukabije , imwe muri gahunda yashyizweho n " " " " Umuryango wa Abibumbye yo kugera ku majyambere arambye mu 2030 .
Ku nshuro ya mbere mu mateka ya imyaka ibihumbi iki gihugu kimaze , u Bushinwa bwakuyeho burundu ubukene bukabije .
Icya Gatatu , CPC yagize uruhare mu iterambere rya ikiremwamuntu .
Ititaye ku bihe , CPC yagumye mu nzira yo gushaka iterambere rinyuze mu mahoro , ishyigikira amahame yo kubaho mu mahoro ndetse na ubu iracyashishikajwe na uko isi igira amahoro , binyuze mu guteza imbere inyungu rusange no kubaka umuryango usangiye ejo hazaza .
Dufashe urugero , u Bushinwa bwatanze inguzanyo itagira inyungu igera hafi kuri miliyoni 406 $ yo gufasha kubaka umuhanda wa gari ya moshi Tanzania - Zambia mu 1970 ndetse bwohereza na abahanga mu bya ubwubatsi na abatekinisiye hafi 50 . 000 .
Ubwo uyu mushiga wamurikwaga mu 1970 , umusaruro mbumbe wa u Bushinwa wari miliyari 93 $ gusa .
Uretse na ibyo mu myaka mike ishize , u Bushinwa bweguriye 50 % bya umwenda wa imishinga ibihugu bitandukanye byari bibubereyemo , ndetse na ubu buri gukorana na Tanzania na Zambia mu kuvugurura umuhanda wa gari ya moshi .
Ubu mu gihe Isi ihanganye na icyorezo cya Covid - 19 , u Bushinwa bwatanze ubufasha butandukanye mu guhungana na iki cyorezo .
Ubufasha burimo inkunga ya miliyari 22o za udupfukamunwa , miliyari 2 , 25 za imyenda yambarwaga bikingira Coronavirus ndetse na udukoresho two gupima iyi virus tungana na miliyari 1 . 02 .
Ibi byose yabitanze mu bihugu birenga 150 harimo na u Rwanda ndetse na imiryango mpuzamahanga .
U Bushinwa bwakoze uko bushoboye mu gutanga inkingo hirya no hino ku Isi , bunagira uruhare mu gukora ubushakashati ku nkingo za Covid - 19 , ndetse gahunda yo gutangira kuzikora iri mu hafi gushyirwa mu bikorwa mu bihugu birenga icumi .
Uruhare rwa u Bushinwa mu iterambere rya Afurika na rwo ni urundi rugero .
Mu myaka 12 ishize , u Bushinwa ni cyo gihugu kigira ubuhahirane cyane na ibihugu bya Afurika kuruta ibindi .
