Ubuhahirane hagati ya Afurika na u Bushinwa bwarenze miliyari 200 $ mu 2019 , ishoramari ryabwo muri Afurika rigera kuri miliyari 3 mu 2020 .
Nubwo Covid - 19 yateje ingaruka ku bukungu muri rusange , imishinga 1 . 100 ihuriweho yakomeje gushyirwa mu bikorwa .
Kugeza ubu u Bushinwa na Afurika bishyize hamwe bimaze kubaka ibilometero birenga 6000 bya inzira zo mu kirere na iza gari ya moshi , byubatse kandi ibyambu hafi 20 kimwe na ingomero za umuriro wa amashanyarazi zirenga 80 .
Dusibije amaso inyuma , u Bushinwa na u Rwanda bifite amateka amwe , kuko bihuje kuba bifite iterambere ryihuta mu gihe gito , ndetse bikaba bisangiye umwuka wo kwigenga no kwigira .
Turebye mu gihe kizaza , amashyaka ari ku butegetsi mu bihugu byombi , Communist Party of China ndetse na Rwanda Patriotic Front bifite intego imwe yo guteza imbere igihugu no kugihindura gishya .
Uyu mwaka hazizihizwa imyaka ijana ishize ishyaka rya CPC rishinzwe ndetse na imyaka 50 umubano wa u Bushinwa na u Rwanda utangiye . Ibihugu byombi na amashyaka yombi bizakomeza gutsura umubano no gufatanya mu bikorwa bibyara inyungu , bikomeze bishimishe abaturage ba ibihugu byombi .
Nizeye ko ubuyobozi bushikamye bwa aya mashaka [ CPC na RPF ] buzatuma ibihugu byombi biguma mu nzira yo guharanira ibyiza .
Iyi nkuru ni igitekerezo cya Rao Hongwei , Ambasaderi wa u Bushinwa mu Rwanda .
The Daily Monitor na The New Vision byinjijwe mu mugambi wo guharabika u Rwanda .
Ku Cyumweru tariki ya 13 , 2021 , Uganda yinjiye mu icengezamatwara riteye isoni ubwo u Rwanda rwasubizaga Umusirikare wa Ingabo za Uganda wari winjiye ku butaka bwarwo .
Inkuru nyinshi zirimo iyanditswe na New Vision na iya Daily Monitor imwe ifite umutwe ugira uti " " " " Uganda irashaka ko u Rwanda ruyisubiza umusirikare wayo " " " " na indi ifite uvuga ngo " " " " U Rwanda rwarekuye umusirikare wa UPDF wafatiwe ku mupaka . " " " "
Izi nkuru zose zivuga ko u Rwanda rwashimuse umusirikare wa UPDF ubwo yari ari kugenzura umutekano ku mupaka ku wa Gatandatu .
Ku rundi ruhande , Ukuri kwari aho ibintu byabereye kwerekana ko uyu musirikare wa UPDF , Pte Baruku Muhuba , yarenze imbibi za Uganda akinjira mu Rwanda atabizi , ibi ni ibintu yiyemereye ubwo yagiranaga ikiganiro na itangazamakuru mbere ya uko asubizwa mu gihugu cye .
Nyuma yasubijwe muri Uganda , mu gikorwa cyari kitabiriwe na abakozi ba gasutamo ku mpande zombi ndetse na abayobozi ba ingabo mu turere twa Kisoro na Cyanika .
Umuyobozi mu Karere ka Kisoro , Peter Mugisha yasabye imbabazi mu izina rya uyu musirikare ndetse ashimira bagenzi babo ba u Rwanda kuba iki kibazo baracyitwayemo kinyamwuga ndetse na uburyo bafashemo umusirikare wabo wari warenze imbibi .
Ati " " " " Twishimiye cyane kwakira umusirikare wacu watubwiye ko atigeze ahohoterwa cyangwa ngo akomeretswe .
Badusubije kandi PK Machine gun iri kumwe na amasasu yayo 100 , byose byari bifitwe na uyu musirikare mbere ya uko afatwa . " " " "
Mugisha yongeyeho ko UPDF ikwiye gutangira gukoresha ikoranabuhanga rya GPS kugira ngo yirinde amakosa nka aya no mu minsi iri imbere .
Bigaragarira amaso ko iri hererekanya ryabayeho hagati ya abayobozi ba gasutamo ba ibihugu byombi ryerekana ubushake bwiza , ariko itangazamakuru rya Uganda ritanga isura mbi ikomeza gushimangira gahunda yo kugaragaza u Rwanda nka umwanzi wa gahunda yo kubanira neza abaturanyi .
Ibinyoma byabo bigamije gukomeza kurenganya u Rwanda hejuru ya amakosa akorwa na ubuyobozi bwa i Kampala ndetse no mu gihe bwo bwemeye amakosa ya umusirikare wabo .
Hejuru ya ibi , ibirego bya Abanya - Uganda bakoraga ubucuruzi bwa magendu barashwe bikabaviramo urupfu , ubwo bageragezaga kurwanya polisi yari iri mu kazi byahindutse intero mu itangazamakuru rya Uganda , byahisemo guha ishingiro no kwamamaza ibyaha , mu gihe bishobora gukoresha ijambo bifite mu kurwanya no gukora ubukangurambaga ku cyaha
cya ubucuruzi bwa magendu .
Daily Monitor binyuze mu nkuru zayo ebyiri zijyanye na ikibazo cya uyu musirikare warenze imbibi ikomeza guhuza ishimutwa rya ikinyoma rya uyu musirikare wa UPDF na itotezwa rya abaturage ba u Rwanda bari Uganda ( U Rwanda rwabujije abaturage barwo kujya Uganda kuko umutekano wabo utizewe igihe bariyo ) , ibintu itangazamakuru rya Uganda rikwiye
kuryoza Guverinoma yabo , nka uko ribigenza igihe abashyigikiye abatavuga rumwe na ubutegetsi bashimuswe ku manyarwa ya ihangu , bakabura cyangwa bakicwa .
Aho gukora ibi , itangazamakuru rya Uganda ryahisemo gukoreshwa na ubuyobozi bwa i Kampala mu guhuza iki kibazo kibangamiye imibereho ya abaturage ba Abanyarwanda bari Uganda na impamvu za politike zidafite ishingiro .
Ku ruhande rwa u Rwanda , rwakomeje gufata Abanya - Uganda mu buryo bwubahirije amategeko ndetse no mu gihe baba bakoze ibyaha nka uko binerekanwa na ikibazo cya uriya musirikare warenze imbibi za igihugu cye .
Ibi bitandukanye no gukomeza gukurikirana Abanyarwanda ba inzirakarengane cyangwa Abanya - Uganda bafite inkomoka mu Rwanda , icyaha cyabo kikaba gusa ubwenegihugu .
Abanyarwanda bibasiwe na itotezwa , gufatwa mu buryo bwa kinyamaswa , iyicarubozo na itabwa muri yombi binyuranyije na amategeko bikorwa na Inzego za umutekano za Uganda zitumwe na abayobozi ba Uganda bicyeka umwanzi na maneko muri buri nguni za umuhanda .
Abanyarwanda bagiye bagira amahirwe yo kuva mu maboko ya aba bahohotera bagiye bajugunywa ku mupaka , bacucuwe utwo bari batunze .
Kandi iki ni kimwe mu bindi bibazo bikomeje gutuma umubano wa ibihugu byombi udasubira mu buryo .
Gahunda ya itangazamakuru rya Uganda yo gukomeza gukwirakwiza ibihuha no kubeshya yerekana umugambi mubi no kutagira ubushake ku ruhande rwa ubuyobozi bwa Uganda ku bijyanye no gukemera ikibazo cya Uganda na u Rwanda , ariko ubushotoranyi bwabo ntibuzabuza u Rwanda gukomeza gufata neza Abanya - Uganda ndetse na abasirikare ba UPDF nka Private Baruku
nubwo Guverinoma yabo ikomeje gutsimbarara ku mugambi wo guhohotera Abanyarwanda bari Uganda .
Frédéric Martel yavuye imuzi ikendera rya burundu rya amatwara yiswe " " " " Védrinisme " " " " ku Rwanda .
Umwanditsi , umunyamakuru na umwarimu muri " " " " Université des Arts i Zürich " " " " mu Busuwisi , Frederic Martel , yavuze uko amatwara ya Hubert Védrine yiswe " " " " Védrinisme " " " " ku Rwanda , yakubiswe inshuro kuva ubwo Perezida wa u Bufaransa , Emmanuel Macron , agiriye uruzinduko mu Rwanda .
Védrine yari umujyanama wa Perezida François Mitterrand mu bya dipolomasi , yabaye Umunyamabanga Mukuru muri Perezidansi ya u Bufaransa aza no kuba Minisitiri wa Ububanyi na Amahanga ku bwa Minisitiri wa Intebe , Lionel Jospin , guhera mu 1997 kugeza mu 2002 .
Anengwa kugerageza guhisha ukuri ku ruhare rwa igihugu cye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , kugabanya uburemere bwayo no kwifatanya na abayihakana .
Mu gihe abandi bayobozi bakomeye barimo na abaminisitiri bo ku butegetsi bwa Miterrand bagaragaje ko igihugu cyabo cyari gifite akaboko muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , Védrine we yakomeje kwinangira ndetse agakora icengezamatwara ryo guhisha ukuri nka uko uyu mwanditsi abisobanura .
Nka Michel Rocard , umwe mu bari bagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Ubumwe bwa u Burayi , yavugiye mu Nteko mu 1998 yemeza ko ibikorwa bya u Bufaransa mu Rwanda bigaragaramo imyitwarire ikemangwa .
Icyo gihe yagize ati " " " " Twaribeshye dushyigikira igihe kirekire ubutegetsi bubi . " " " "
Ni mu gihe kandi hari abandi Bafaransa batunguwe no gutahura ko u Bufaransa bwateye inkunga ubutegetsi bwishe Abatutsi basaga miliyoni mu mezi atatu gusa , kandi imikoree mibi ikaba yaraturutse mu nzego zo hejuru Hubert Védrine yabarizwagamo .
Ni mu gihe Védrine yari afite ijambo ku gisirikare no ku Badipolomate bya umwihariko mu gihe Mitterrand yari afite uburwayi bukomeye mu 1994 .
Anengwa kugira dipolomasi itarimo indangagaciro na ubumuntu bidafite aho bihuriye na kimwe mu byo u Bufaransa bwimakaza , guhohotera uburenganzira bwa muntu nka uko byagenze muri Yougoslavie aho igihugu cye cyivanze muri politiki yaho buhumyi nka uko byagenze mu Rwanda .
Muri Yougoslavie , Védrine ngo yashyigikiye umunyagitugu Milosevic na inyeshyamba za aba - Serbe i Vukovar , Sarajevo na Kossovo .
Uruhare rwa Védrine rwanagaragariye no mu gushaka gutinza uko byagenda kose Abanyamerika ngo badatabara muri Bosnia .
Ngo yari umuntu wifata nka umunyambaraga mu banyantege nke na umunyantege nke mu bakomeye .
Uyu mwanditsi avuga ko Macron yerekanye ko ari mu murongo wa ibintu bifatika , yitaye ku buremere bwabyo no kubungabunga inyungu za igihugu ariko indagagaciro zacyo zidahungabanye , mu gihe kuri Védrine izo ndangagaciro nta gaciro zifite .
Ku Rwanda " " " " Védrinisme " " " " yari amatwara yo guhakana , na imyumvire ya ubuhangange bwa igihugu cye bivanze no kwishima hejuru ya abagezweho na ingaruka .
Ati " " " " Niba u Bufaransa butarigeze butegura jenoside yahitanye abasaga miliyoni bishwe na abasirikare na intagondwa za abahutu , bwatumye ishoboka .
Hatariho ibitekerezo , ntiyari gushoboka , niba nta ruhare rufatika bwari bufitemo inyungu zabwo .
Ni yo mpamvu Védrine azahora afatwa nka umugome ukomeye muri dipolomasi ya u Bufaransa . " " " "
Uyu mwanditsi asobanura ko Védrinisme yarandutse bya nyabyo ku ya 27 Gicurasi 2021 .
Ubwo Emmnanuel Macron yavugiraga imbwirwaruhame ya amateka mu Rwanda yemera uruhare rukomeye rwa u Bufaransa muri Jenoside .
Hubert Védrine wahoze ari umunyamabanga mukuru wa Perezida Mitterand akaba Minisitiri wa Ububanyi na Amahanga kuva mu 1997 kugeza mu 2002 , ubwo yaganiraga na Komisiyo ya Paul Quilès yavuze ko nta kosa igihugu cye cyakoze mu gufasha Habyarimana .
Yagize ati " " " " Kuba Perezida Habyarimana yari umuhutu ntabwo byari ikibazo kuko abahutu bagize 80 % bya abaturage .
Ubwo u Bufaransa bwari gushingira kuki bushyigikira abashaka kumuvanaho ?
Frederic Martel wavuze ku myitwarire ye ni umwanditsi , umunyamakuru na umwarimu muri Université des Arts i Zürich .

Ibinyoma bya Abdi Latif bigaragaza umurongo wa The New York Times kuri Afurika .
Muri Nyakanga 2019 ubwo The New York Times ( NYT ) yarimo gushaka umunyamakuru uzakora ku Biro byayo biri i Nairobi , abayobozi bayo bagaragaje neza ubwoko bwa inkuru bari biteze ku munyamakuru wari buhabwe akazi , wagombaga " " " " Gushaka amakuru mu bihugu bitandukanye , kuva mu butayu bwa Sudani na ihembe rya Afurika , kumanuka
kugera mu mashyamba ya Congo na inkombe za Tanzania . " " " "
Bamwe mu Banyafurika babonye iri tangazo , barivugiyeho karahava , bavuga bishimiye uburyo Umunyamakuru wa NYT yari buzagenzure ubutayu na ibihugu bya Afurika bitagira amategeko , ndetse akajya atangaza " " " " Inkuru zitunguranye zitanga icyizere " " " " ku Mugabane wa Afurika .
Abakwennye iri tangazo , bahuje ubutumwa bwaryo na imitekerereze ishingiye ku kwemera ko abazungu bashoboye kurusha Abirabura kandi ko ibyo Abirabura bifuza gukora neza bigomba kugenzurwa na abazungu .
Nyuma yo kunengwa mu buryo bukomeye , iri tangazo ryaje gukurwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga za NYT , ariko imitekerereze na umurongo wa inkuru zikorwa na iki kinyamakuru kuri Afurika byagumyeho .
Abdi Latif Dahir ni we wabonye ako kazi ka indyankurye kandi na we yakinjiyemo abizi , azana amatwara na amashagaga mashya mu rwego rwo kwemeza abamukuriye .
Inkuru aherutse kwandika ifite umutwe ugira uti " " " " Hoteli Rwanda utavuga rumwe na ubutegetsi yimwe ibiryo na imiti muri gereza , nka uko umuryango we wabitangaje . " " " "
Iyi nkuru yakabirizaga ubuzima Rusesabagina abayemo kandi bisa nka aho Latif ari kuregera abazungu .
Uwa mbere ibi byagizeho ingaruka ni Paul Rusesabagina nyirizina , wizeye ikabyankuru rya abazungu mu butwari bwe bwakabirijwe bwa uko yarokoye Abatutsi muri hoteli .
Mu mezi icyenda ashize , uyu Rusesabagina yarimo kuvuga ko afashwe neza muri kasho ya Polisi ya u Rwanda .
Mu kiganiro na The East African , ari na cyo cya mbere Rusesabagina yari agiranye na itangazamakuru kuva yagezwa mu Rwanda , yagize ati " " " " Nafashwe neza , mu ijoro ryakeye nariye amakaroni ubu nanyoye igikoma .
Mfite imiti yanjye kuko ngendana ibipimo bya umuvuduko wa amaraso ndetse na akuma gapima uko umutima wanjye uri gutera . " " " "
Ibi kandi yabisubiyemo mu kiganiro cya kabiri yahaye itangazamakuru , icyo gihe akaba yaraganiraga na Latif wari uhagarariye NYT , na bwo Rusesabagina yaragize ati " " " " Ntacyo nanenga , ndi kurya ibyo buri Munyarwanda arya , mpabwa ibyo nifuza byose .
Rero mfashwe nka undi muntu usanzwe . " " " "
Muri ibyo bihe , Rusesabagina yasaga nka ufite icyizere cyo kuzatsinda urubanza , kuko yabwiye The East African ati " " " " Harabura igihe gito nkajya mu Rukiko kandi niteguye kwiregura ku byaha bya iterabwoba ndi kuregwa . " " " "
Birumvikana ko Rusesabagina na abunganizi be banyuze muri paji ibihumbi ya ikirego cye ndetse ntibanyurwa na ibyo babonye .
Ntibari biteze kuzabona abatangabuhamya ba ubushinjacyaha bizewe kandi bazi gusobanura ibyo bavuga .
Kuva kuri Visi Perezida akaba na umuvugizi wa FLN , Callixte Sankara , kugera kuri Michelle Martin , Umunyamerika wakoze nka umukorera bushake mu Muryango wa Rusesabagina ; ubuhamya bwabo ni bumwe , aho bugaragaza ko Rusesabagina yatanze inkunga ya amafaranga na iy ibitekerezo ku mitwe ya iterabwoba , ari yo FDLR na FLN .
Ibi byose byagize ingaruka zikomeye ku izina rya Rusesabagina ndetse binagaragarira mu nyandiko ya NTY iherutse , kuko batakimwita " " " " intwari , " " " " ahubwo basigaye bamwita " " " " utavuga rumwe na ubutegetsi . " " " "
Ku ruhande rwa Rusesabagina na umuryango we , barabizi ko badashobora kuzatsinda iki kirego , ari na yo mpamvu bakoresha abazungu bizeye ko bazahatira Leta ya u Rwanda kurekura Rusesabagina nyamara yaragize uruhare mu bwicanyi bwakorewe abaturage ba inzirakarengane .
Aba batangiye basaba ko Rusesabagina arekurwa kubera uburwayi bwe nubwo nyirubwite yari yavuze ko abona imiti akeneye ndetse agahura na abaganga ; ibi nyuma biza guhindurwa , bavuga ko indi mpamvu akwiye kurekurwa ari icyorezo cya Covid - 19 , gishobora kumwica kuko afite indwara karande .
Igitangaje ni uko abasabaga ko Rusesabagina arekurwa kubera gutinya icyorezo cya Covid - 19 , babivugiraga muri Amerika aho icyo cyorezo cyari gikaze nyamara gereza zo mu Rwanda icyo gihe zikaba zitari zakagize ubwandu bwa Covid - 19 .
Rusesabagina yaje kubona urukingo rwa Covid - 19 mbere ya uko na abamuvugiraga bari mu mahanga barubona .
Nyuma , aba bigize abavugizi ba Rusesabagina bazanye andi mayeri bavuga ko Leta ya u Rwanda ifite umugambi mubisha wo kwica Rusesabagina , kandi yari imaze kumuha urukingo .
Birumvikana ko iki kinyoma kitamaze kabiri kuko aba bananiwe gusobanura uburyo Leta ifite uwo mugambi kuko iyo iza kubishaka , byari koroha kumureka ntakingirwe maze yazahura na Covid - 19 ikamuzahaza kuko asanganwe indwara za akarande .
Mu minsi ishize , Rusesabagina usa nka uwatewe akanyamuneza na urukingo yabonye , yanenze icyumba yagenewe kirimo ibintu birenze ibiri mu byumba bya abandi bagororwa , avuga ko " " " " yafungiwe muri gereza yihariye . " " " "
Urwego rwa Imfungwa na Abagororwa ( RCS ) , rwasobanuye ko " " " " Rusesabagina yari yaragenewe icyumba na ifunguro byihariye ubwo yimurirwaga muri Gereza ya Nyarugenge .
Rusesabagina aherutse gushyirwa mu cyumba rusange gihuriweho na abagororwa benshi , nyuma ya uko anenze icyumba yari yarahawe acyita " " " " gereza yihariye , " " " " kandi zitabaho mu Rwanda .
Ubu ari guhabwa amafunguro nka ay abandi bagororwa kandi ashobora kubona umuganga igihe cyose amukeneye , nka uko byari bisanzwe . " " " "
Amakuru yavugaga ko impamvu Rusesabagina yimwe ibiryo na imiti , bigamije kumuhatira gusubira mu rubanza yikuyemo ariko umuntu akibaza impamvu Leta ya u Rwanda yahatira umuntu kwiregura .
Mu 2010 , Ingabire Victoire na we yagerageje gukoresha ubu buryo maze yikura mu rubanza , ahari atekereza ko ibihugu bimwe bya i Burayi bizakora ibishoboka byose bikamurokora ariko ibi byari ukwibeshya kuko yamaze imyaka umunani afunzwe , akaza kurekurwa ku mbabazi za Perezida .
Ibi na byo bisa nka ibyabaye kuri Ingabire , uretse ko imbaraga ziri gushyirwamo zitandukanye aho bigaragara ko izigamije kugumisha Rusesabagina mu makuru abantu babona ari nyinshi .
Impungenge ziri ku ruhande rwa abashyigikiye Rusesabagina , ni uko mu gihe yareka kuvugwa mu Burayi na Amerika , u Rwanda narwo rudafite inyungu mu gukomeza kuvuga izina rye , rumwereka uruhande rushyigikiye ibinyoma bye ariko rwaranze kureba ku bagizweho ingaruka za ibitero bye ndetse no kwemera ko ibyaha yakoreye mu Rwanda abiryozwa imbere
ya ubutabera .
Abdi Latif Dahir wa NYT ntiyigeze anagenzura inyandiko ya Urwego rwa Amerika Rushinzwe Ububanyi na Amahanga , rwavuguruje ayo makuru mu buryo bufatika .
Itangazo rya urweo rwego ryaragiraga riti " " " " Ambasade yacu i Kigali yavuganye na ubuyobozi bwa u Rwanda , abadipolomate baturutse mu Bubiligi ndetse na abanyamategeko ba Rusesabagina , bose bemeje ko Rusesabagina akomeje guhabwa ibiryo , amazi ndetse na imiti .
Leta ya u Rwanda ikomeje guha abakozi ba ambasade uburenganzira bwo gukomeza gusura Rusesabagina . " " " "
Birakwiye ko Latif yigira kuri izi nkuru zamukojeje isoni , ubundi akongera kwita ku mahame agenga umwuga wa itangazamakuru .
Ikindi kandi akwiye kumenya ni uko abayobozi ba u Rwanda badashobora kubona umwanya wo kujya basubiza buri gihuha cyose kigiye kwandikwa muri NYT .
Icya nyuma ni uko abanyamategeko ba i Burayi na Amerika bakwiye kumenya ko , nka uko iyo abanyamategeko ba Abanyafurika batitega ko abakiliya babo bafungurwa , ni nako bakwiye kwitega ko Leta ya u Rwanda ishinzwe kureberera Abanyarwanda bagizweho ingaruka na ibitero byashyigikiwe na Rusesabagina , izahindura umuvuno kubera igitutu cyabo .
Uburenganzira bwemerera abanyamategeko ba abanyamabanga kuburanira mu Rwanda ntibutangwa bishingiye ku cyo umuntu ari cyo , hari inzira bigomba kunyuramo yubahirije amategeko kandi bitandukanye na abayobozi ba NYT , u Rwanda ni igihugu kiyobowe na amategeko .
Nyuma ya u Bwongereza , abatekamutwe ba Abanyarwanda badukiriye na Australia .
Hashize igihe René Mugenzi yigaragaza nka utavuga rumwe na Guverinoma ya u Rwanda kugeza na ubwo yigeze kuvuga ko ubuzima bwe buri mu kaga .
Polisi ya i Londres yatekewe umutwe ibyinjiramo , Mugenzi abyina intsinzi .
Icyakora intsinzi ntiyamaze akanya , agakino ke Polisi yaje kukavumbura .
Yaje gutabwa muri yombi ku butekamutwe yakoreye Abongereza abacucura amafaranga yari ashinzwe kubika muri Paruwasi .
Yari amaze imyaka igera ku icumi abiba rwihishwa nyamara akigaragaza nka umuturage wa intangarugero .
Umucamanza Katharine Moore na we yaje kwanzura ko ubwoba Mugenzi yavugaga ko aterwa na Guverinoma ya u Rwanda nta buhari , ko ari ibinyoma bisa bidafite ishingiro .
Byagaragaye ko yari amayeri kugira ngo yigarurire icyizere cya abaturage ba u Bwongereza , ngo abone uko abacacura .
Kuri ubu noneho , undi munyarwanda uba muri Australia yinjiye mu gakino nka aka Mugenzi .
Tariki 9 Kamena , ikinyamakuru The Sydney Morning Herald cyatangaje inkuru ifite umutwe ugira uti " " " " Australian citizen asks for UNa s help to locate missing brothers in Rwanda " " " " ( Umuturage wa Australia arasaba ubufasha bwa Loni ngo abashe kubona abavandimwe be baburiwe irengero mu Rwanda . " " " "
Uyu mugabo Noel Zihabamwe avuga ko ubuyobozi bwa u Rwanda na Ambasade yabwo muri icyo gihugu byamugezeho bishaka " " " " kumwiyegereza ngo ababere umukangurambaga muri Australia . " " " "
Ngo yarabyanze , maze " " " " abavandimwe be baburirwa irengero nyuma ya ukwezi atangaje inkuru ye muri ABC muri Kanama 2019 . " " " "
Nta na umwe wakwemera ibyo binyoma ko Guverinoma ya u Rwanda ishobora gushimuta abaturage bayo kuko gusa ngo banze kuba abakangurambaga .
Wibuke ko ari igihugu aho abana ba umuyobozi wa FDLR bahawe buruse zo kwiga muri Kaminuza nziza mu Rwanda no mu mahanga .
Igitangaje kurushaho , Zihabamwe yanumvishije Polisi ya Australia ko ubuzima bwe buri mu kaga .
Ikigaragara , René Mugenzi ari muri gereza mu Bwongereza ariko hari undi Mugenzi uri mu ishusho ye muri Australia yiyise Noel Zihabamwe .
Nkuko Mugenzi yabigenje agamije guhishira ubuhakanyi bwe bwa Jenoside , Zihabamwe na we afite icyo ahishe .
Uyu Zihabamwe ni umunyamuryango wa imandwa za RNC , Ihuriro ryiyise Alliance for National Pact ( RANP - Abaryankuna ) ryashinzwe na Cassien Ntamuhanga nyuma yo gutoroka gereza mu Rwanda akanyura muri Uganda kugeza ubwo yageraga muri Afurika ya Epfo .
Ni aho bahereye bashakisha abanyamuryango cyane cyane mu Burayi na Australia .
Ni ibintu bizwi ko Abaryankuna bakomeje gushakisha abanyamuryango bifashishije uburyo Ntamuhanga yakoresheje anyura i Kampala .
Aho niho bamara igihe bategereje kubona impapuro za inzira zibageza muri Afurika ya Epfo , u Burayi na Australia .
Ubuyobozi bwa u Rwanda bufite amakuru ko hari amagana ya Abaryankuna binjijwe muri uyu mutwe ubu bari i Kampala bategereje kujyanwa mu bice bitandukanye bya Isi .
Kuba Zihabamwe yaragiye muri The Sydney Morning Herald ni byiza kuko ubu noneho Leta ya u Rwanda izi ko bishoboka cyane kuba yaba yarinjije abavandimwe be muri uwo mutwe wa iterabwoba , akaba azi aho baherereye .
Ahubwo mu magambo yoroshye , ari kugaragaza ibyaha byabo .
Ni ukuri kwigaragaza ko ahubwo atari umuvandimwe wabo gusa ushingiye ku nshingano afite mu Baryankuna aho ari umuhuzabikorwa , umukangurambaga na umuterankunga wa uyu mutwe wa iterabwoba ugamije kuzana akavuyo mu Rwanda nka uko icengezamatwara banyuza ku mbuga nkoranyambaga cyane cyane YouTube ribigaragaza .
Zihabamwe avuga ko ubuzima bwe buri mu kaga kuko yamaze kubona abandi bagerageje guhungabanya umutekano wa u Rwanda bakisanga i Kigali mu butabera .
Arabizi ko amahitamo ari abiri , kureka iterabwoba cyangwa se akazisanga imbere ya inkiko haba muri Australia cyangwa i Kigali .
Mugenzi arimo yigana , aho ari ubu harazwi , ni muri gereza mu Bwongereza .
Abanya - Australia bakwiriye kumenya neza aba batekamutwe .
Igitutu cya iterabwoba no guhimba ibinyoma mu gushaka gufunguza abakora ibikorwa bya iterabwoba ku Rwanda .
Umuyobozi wa umutwe wa iterabwoba yisanze mu Rwanda , ubwo yerekezaga mu Burundi , ubu akaba ari muri Gereza ya Nyarugenge i Mageragere .
Yakomeje gukoresha uburyo bwose bushoboka kugira ngo akureho uburyo bwo gukurikiranwa na Inzego za ubutabera bwa u Rwanda .
Mu rubanza yazanyemo inzitizi nyinshi , ahabwa na umwanya wo kuzisobanurira ubucamanza , agamije kutaburanishwa na ubucamanza bwa u Rwanda , ndetse akanasaba ko ahita afungurwa kubera ko uko yageze mu Rwanda , akisanga mu maboko ya Ubutabera , abyita gushimutwa .
Izi ni zimwe mu nzitizi yumvaga ko zifite ingingo zitakwigobotorwa yazanye mu rubanza ariko biza kurangira zihanduwemo inenge yazo , ubucamanza bwanzura ko aburanishwa na ubucamanza bwa u Rwanda kubera ko bubifitiye ububasha ntakuka .
Uwo muyobozi wa ibikorwa bya iterabwoba yaje kwikura mu rubanza , bamwe tubibona nko kwirinda kumwarira mu Rukiko imbere ya amahanga na abo yayoboraga bigeze kumwubaha .
Iki kimwaro ntabwo yabashije kugisimbuka , urubanza rwarakomeje abatangabuhamya na abo bafatanyije gukora ibyaha , bamushinja ku buryo buziguye na ubutaziguye uruhare runini yagize mu bikorwa bya iterabwoba byahekuye u Rwanda , ubwo abari mu mutwe wa iterabwoba wa FLN , bateraga mu bice byo mu Majyepfo , mu Murenge wa
Nyabimata , Akarere ka Nyaruguru no mu bice bya Akarere ka Nyamagabe ndetse no mu Karere ka Rusizi .
Iki ni igisebo gikomeye cyane ku muntu wigize , akanitirirwa ibikorwa bya ubutwari , akanabyambarira umudari , awambitswe na Perezida wa Igihugu gikomeye .
Ni igisebo kandi kugaragara ko yabeshye amahanga , akabikora imyaka myinshi , yigaragaza nka intungane yavamo umunyapolitiki mwiza wayobora u Rwanda .
Mu bo yabeshye hari ababyemeye bamutera inkunga .
Hari abamuteye inkunga nka Fondasiyo yari igamije ibikorwa byiza , hari na abamuteye inkunga bazi neza ko aje gukuraho Ubuyobozi bwa u Rwanda , yasebeje imyaka myinshi ashaka kubusiga icyasha ko ari ubuyobozi bwa igitugu .
Uwitwaga Intwari yaje kuvamo icyihebe , umugome , umuhemu wahekuye igihugu cyamubyaye .
Abanyarwanda benshi banabonye ko na ibyo yitaga ko arwanira , atari byo ko ahubwo akomeje gukuza inda , ubwikanyize na umururumba wo gutunga ibya Mirenge .
Abo bafatanyije muri ibi bikorwa bya iterabwoba harimo abagaragaje ububisha bwe no gukeza ba mpatsibihugu bagamije kurimbura Abanyafurika , bifashishe inkozi za ibibi zishyira inyungu zazo imbere , nka ba mpemuke ndamuke .
Uwo muyobozi wa ibikorwa bya iterabwoba ageze muri Gereza uwiyitaga umukobwa we , ariko bikaza kugaragara ko ari umutsindirano , yakomeje kuvugira uwo yita se wa intwari .
Abenshi bakamwereka ko nta ntwari igira imigambi yo kwica , kwihakana aho avuka no guhekura igihugu cyamubyaye .
Uyu muterabwoba yakomeje gucuya no guta izina mu ruhando mpuzamahanga , abamwizeraga , bakamwizeza no kumufasha kumufunguza bakomeje kubona ko ari umubeshyi , atunzwe no guhimba ibinyoma bigamije kuzuza inda ye idahaga .
Bamwe mu Bunyamahanga bitabiriye urubanza rwe mu itangira , uko rwakomeje ntibahagarutse nka ikimenyetso cyo kugaragaza ko batashyigikira inkozi za ibibi .
Bamwe mu banyapolitiki bo mu mahanaga bashatse kwivanga mu Butabera bwa u Rwanda , bakuyemo akarenge kabo , bamaze kubona ko gushyigikira Umuyobozi wa umutwe wa iterabwoba , byabasigira inenge na igisebo .
Uburyo bushya bwuzuye ikinyoma bwo gushaka impamvu zafunguza umuterabwoba
Kubera ko hari abantu benshi baharanira ukuri kandi badashyigikira umuco wo kudahana , bongeye kugaragaza ko u Rwanda rubifitiye uburenganzira bwo gukurikirana imitwe ya iterabwoba nka intego Isi isangiye .
Wa muyobozi wa umutwe wa iterabwoba yahinduye umuvuno .
Aho atangiye kugaragaza ko abayeho nabi , ko yamenyeshwejwe ko ashobora kwimwa uburyo bwo guhabwa ifunguro , akomeza abeshya ko adahabwa ibimufasha bihagije mu buzima bwe .
Yongeyeho ko arimo gufatwa nabi mu kwivuza aho avuga ko nka umuntu usanzwe urwaye umutima , akaba yaranarokotse kanseri ko ashobora kuhaburira ubuzima .
Urwego Rushinzwe Imfungwa na Abagororwa mu Rwanda rwagaragaje ko rufata Abafungwa na Abagororwa bose kimwe kandi neza .
Ubuyobozi bwa Gereza ya Nyarugenge bwagaragaje ko ahabwa ifunguro ndetse agahabwa na uko agera kwa Muganga .
Ibi ni ibinyoma birimo gucurwa kugira ngo barebe ko noneho hari icyo byamara ngo afungurwe .
Ubwe yisabiye abana be kuvuza induru bamamaza ibi binyoma .
Ibi kandi barabikoresha nka iterabwoba bifashishije abanyamakuru ba ibinyamakuru mpuzamahanga , imiryango mpuzamahanga idafashije , Inganga za Abavoka buzuye agasuzuguro gashingiye ku gutesha agaciro Abanyafurika no kutumva ko nta butabera buba mu bihugu bya Afurika .
Abazi uyu Muyobozi wa ibyihebe , bavuga ko ari umuntu ushobora guhimba ikinyoma cyose ariko akabaho , bakomeza bavuga ko ari umuntu wuzuye ubutiriganya , amafuti , uburyarya na ubugome , akaba adatinya guhemuka no kwihekura .
Kuri we yakora ibibi byose bishoboka ariko akabaho .
Bavuga kandi ko azi kwibonekeza , kwivuga ibyiza no kwigira umunyabwenge agamije gusebya abandi no kubatesha agaciro .
Inyungu rusange ntacyo zimubwiye , amahoro mu Rwanda ntacyo amubwiye mu gihe abona ko konti ze za banki , zidashishe amadolari amuhundagazaho indonke no kugwiza imitungo ivuye mu buhemu .
Uku kutagira umutima , guha icyicaro ububisha abihuriyeho na abo yareze ndetse na abamukomokaho , bashyize imbere guhimba ibinyoma byinshi bakwirakwiza hirya no hino ku Isi ibihuha , bagamije gukura icyaha cya ubugome ku muyobozi wa ibikorwa bya iterabwoba , bakabyambika Leta ya u Rwanda .
Bize no gukoresha ikinyoma nka iterabwoba bumva ko bazatera Ubuyobozi bwa u Rwanda bukaba bwakwivanga mu kazi ka ubutabera kugira ngo uyu muterabwoba afungurwe .
U Rwanda ruyobowe na Abayobozi baharaniye uburenganzira bwa Abanyarwanda , harimo kuringaniza Abanyarwanda imbere ya amategeko .
Nta gihangange imbere ya Amategeko ya u Rwanda .
Bigaragara ko u Rwanda rwarakoze uko rushoboye ntirwivanga mu miburanishirize ya izi manza zirimo abibumbiye mu mitwe ya iterabwoba ihungabanya umutekano wa u Rwanda .
Ikigaragara kandi , Ubuyobozi bwa u Rwanda bwimye amatwi abashaka kurukoresha amakosa kugira ngo rwivange muri izi manza .
Harimo ubwisanzure no kubahiriza uburenganzira bwa muntu imbere ya amategeko .
Urubyiruko ruba mu Budage rwasubije Minisitiri Bamporiki .
Ubwanditsi : Hashize ukwezi na iminsi mike , Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri ya Urubyiruko na Umuco , Bamporiki Edouard , yanditse ibaruwa igenewe Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bya umwihariko urubyiruko , abasaba kwitandukanya na inyigisho za ubugome zikomoka kuri bamwe mu babyeyi babo , buganisha ku ipfobya rya Jenoside
yakorewe Abatutsi no guharabika u Rwanda .
Icyahagurukije Bamporiki ni uburyo ibikorwa byo guhakana no gupfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bikomeje gukaza umurego cyane cyane hifashishijwe imbuga nkoranyambaga , urubyiruko rukaba rubyishoramo ku bwinshi mu gihe harimo na urwavutse nyuma ya Jenoside .
Bigaragara ko ubutumwa Bamporiki yatanze bwageze ku bo bugenewe bamwe bakaba batangiye kumusubiza na bo babinyuje mu ibaruwa bamugeneye bamwizeza ko batari mu mubare wa abagomera urwababyaye .
Ibaruwa urubyiruko rwa Abanyarwanda baba mu Budage banditse basubiza Bamporiki
Nyakubahwa muyobozi wacu twishimiye intashyo mwaduhaye zuje ubwema na ubwenge .
Turabashimira kutuzirikana mukagera aho muduha inama nyinshi ndetse na impanuro zikubiye mu ibaruwa muherutse kutwandikira .
Twebwe urubyiruko ruba mu Budage ( Rwanda Youth Transformers ) twishimiye kubasubiza tugira tuti " " " " Murakarama ! " " " "
Nyakubahwa nka uko mutwibutsa amateka ya igihugu cyacu kuva mu ihangwa ryacyo kugeza none , aho turi mu mahanga duhora dukotanira gusigasira umuco , indangagaciro na kirazira bya aho dukomoka nka uko twatongerewe na Umwami Gihanga Ngomijana gushakira u Rwanda imbuto na amaboko .
Nyakubahwa muragira muti " " " " Abanyarwanda bo hambere aha batatiriye igihango , bagasemura ubwiru , umuco ugaca injishi , kirazira ikimukira ikizira !
Twebwe urubyiruko amaboko ya igihugu mizero yacyo , twiyemeje gukurikiza urugero rwa abimanye u Rwanda ari bo bato batari gito , Inkotanyi zabohoye u Rwanda zikanahagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 .
Nyakubahwa ntitwirengagije ko hari abasoroma imbuto za ubuyobe bakomora ku bataramana u Rwanda aho kurutarama .
Twe nka urubyiruko ruba mu Budage twumva byinshi birimo na ihakana rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 .
Abandi na bo bakavuga ko habaye Jenoside ebyiri .
Ariko kubera ko tuzi ko umuti wa ikibazo uhera mu kukimenya no kugisobanukirwa , twiyemeje guhagarara ku kuri no kurwanya abo bose bagoreka ayo mateka baharanira inyungu zabo bwite no guhunga ingaruka za ibyo basize bakoze .
Ibyabaye mu Rwatubyaye ni amahano ariko ntibigasubire : Nka uko Umukuru wa Igihugu cyacu ahora abisubiramo , ntitwasubiza isaha inyuma ngo duhindure amateka yaranze u Rwanda rwa ejo hashize ariko Urwatubyaye tuzi neza ko turufite mu maboko yacu .
Nirweme !
Dufite rero uruhare mu kugena ejo hazaza harwo .
Duharanira u Rwanda rutarangwamo ivangura rishingiye ku cyo ari cyo cyose , u Rwanda rwa abanyarwanda rwimakaza ubumwe na iterambere .
Ndi Umunyarwanda ni yo ntero kandi idufasha gusobanurira Abanyarwanda na abanyamahanga batarasobanukirwa aho u Rwanda rugeze na icyerekezo cyarwo .
Nyakubahwa , mwe dufata nka indorerwamo yacu , tubijeje ko mu byatujyanye tuzahaha , duhahira u Rwanda , tukaniyungura ubumenyi tubigiriye aho dukomoka .
Abazadutinza mu nzira badushukisha ibishashagirana tuzabazwira tuti " " " " Turihuta . " " " "
Kandi tuzihuta tudasize u Rwanda inyuma tutazamera nka aka wa mukozi wakoraga mu ndege akayigurutsa yasize igitabo cya ingenzi .
Twiyemeje kuba ba Mutagoma .
Twakiranye amaboko yombi impanuro zanyu , ibyo mudusaba twiyemeje kubikora kuko biri mu nyungu zacu , iza abanyarwanda ndetse na abazadukomokaho .
Ubufatanye namwe , kugendera kure ikibi na ababi no gukora ibyungura u Rwanda turemera neza ko ari ibuye rya ifatizo rizadufasha kuba abahuza ba ibihe turimo na ibizaza bityo natwe tukazasigira abazadukomokaho umurage mwiza natwe dukomora ku bari kurenga mu gihe twe duhinguka .
Ndetse na urumuri rwa ikizere duhabwa na intore izirusha intambwe tuzaruhererekanye uburaherezo maze imirasire ya umucyo warwo isakare ku Banyarwanda aho bari hose .
Murakoze tubifurije ubuzima buzira umuze .
Ingurube zica abantu muri Uganda ni iza Museveni , u Rwanda ni urwitwazo .
Umwe mu bacengezamatwara ba Leta ya Uganda , Charles Kazooba ufite urubuga rwa Internet rwitwa Skynewsug . com aherutse kwandika inkuru avuga abo akeka kuba inyuma ya umugambi wo gushaka guhitana abayobozi bakuru muri iki gihugu .
Muri iyo nkuru yatangajwe hashize iminsi itatu hageragejwe umugambi wo kwica Minisitiri wa Umurimo na Ubwikorezi muri Uganda , Gen . Wamala Katumba , Kazooba atondekanya ibyo akeka byateye umutekano muke muri Kampala .
Mu byo avuga hari aho abihuza na umubano mubi uri hagati ya u Rwanda na Uganda kugira ngo ace ku ruhande ikibazo cya nyacyo giteje umutekano muke muri Uganda .
Ni ukuvuga ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Museveni .
Nkuko asanzwe abigenza , Museveni avuga kuri ubwo bwicanyi yagaragaje ko ababikoze ari " " " " ingurube " " " " ziri kwica Abanya - Uganda ariko akagerageza kwivanaho uruhare rwe nubwo bitanyuze amatwi ya abaturage ba igihugu cye .
Benshi bahise bajya ku mbuga nkoranyambaga bavuga ko abicanyi ba nyabo babazi .
Abo ni abishe Kaweesi , Abiriga , Kirumira , Annie Kagezi , abayobozi muri Islam na abandi .
Ingurube abo baturage bavuze ko ziri imbere muri " " " " Guverinoma ya Uganda . " " " "
Bati " " " " kuki nyuma ya ibi byose , nta na umwe uragezwa mu butabera ? " " " "
Kuki inzego za umutekano za Uganda na amafaranga yose zikoresha nta na umwe zirageza mu butabera kuri ubu bwicanyi bwakorewe abahoze ari abayobozi ? " " " " " " " "
Nka urugero , abishe AIGP Andrew Kaweesi wahoze ari Umuvugizi wa Polisi , bari bari kuri moto , bamwicira muri metero nke uvuye kuri Sitasiyo ya Polisi banakoresha imbunda zo mu bwoko bumwe na izikoreshwa na Umutwe udasanzwe urinda Museveni .
Nyamara na Kazooba yemeza ko hari ibibazo no kutumvikana mu butegetsi bwa Museveni .
Avuga ko harimo ruswa no kutavuga rumwe ka uzasimbura Museveni , ibyo bishobora kuba bifite uruhare muri ibyo bibazo bya umutekano muke .
Mu mwaka wa 2005 , Gilbert Bukenya wari Visi Perezida yavuze ku mugaragaro ko hari za " " " " mafia " " " " zishaka agahanga ke .
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri ya Imari na Ishoramari , Evelyn Anite na we yatanze intabaza nka iyo , ko ubuzima bwe buri mu mazi abira kubera za " " " " mafia . " " " "
Ubu ikigezweho ni Gen Katumba wasimbutse urupfu .
Mu buryo budasubirwaho , aha Kazooba avuga ko mu butegetsi bwa Uganda hashobora kuba harimo ikibazo .
Mu nkuru ye kandi , avuga ko umutwe wa iterabwoba wa ADF ushobora kuba wihishe inyuma ya ibyo bitero .
Kuri ibi , mu buryo butunguranye kandi bwo gukeka , yongeraho ko ngo " " " " ADF iterwa inkunga na u Rwanda . " " " "
Ni ikirego gikomeye nyamara atagaragariza ibimenyetso .
Mu byo Kazooba avuga na ibimenyetso agaragaza birahabanye .
Uti kuki ?
Hagaragajwe ko imbunda yakoreshejwe bagaba igitero kuri Katumba ari ubwoko bwa imbunda ADF yakoreshejwe hicwa Maj Kiggundu mu Ugushyingo 2016 .
Kazooba avuga ko iyo mbunda yasizwe aho icyaha cyabereye mu myaka itanu ishize .
Mu buryo budasanzwe , mu ijambo Museveni yagejeje ku baturage tariki 4 Kamena 2021 , yavuze ko iyo mbunda ari nayo yakoreshejwe mu gitero cyari kigamije guhitana Katumba .
Mu yandi magambo , iyo mbunda yari iri mu maboko ya inzego za umutekano za Uganda kuva mu 2016 , yongeye gukoreshwa mu 2021 .
Ibi ni ibimenyetso simusiga ko iyo Museveni avuga " " " " ingurube , " " " " nta handi ziri atari mu butegetsi bwe .
Birashoboka ko zihishe mu nzego za umutekano za Uganda .
Ku kibazo cya umubano wa u Rwanda na Uganda , umwanditsi avuga ko Abanyarwanda baba muri Uganda bagiye bibasirwa , nyamara abyica aho akomeza avuga ko " " " " hari Abanyarwanda batawe muri yombi bakekwaho ubutasi bakoherezwa mu gihugu cyabo . " " " "
Ibi ni ibinyoma bisa bya ubutegetsi bwa Uganda .
Ibihumbi bya Abanyarwanda ( si amagana nkuko Kazooba abivuga ) mu myaka ine ishize bagiye bashimutwa na inzego za umutekano za Uganda , bagafungirwa ahantu hatazwi mu mabohero ya inzego za umutekano .
Bagiye bashinjwa " " " " ubutasi , " " " " " " " " gutunga intwaro mu buryo butemewe , " " " " " " " " ishimuta " " " " na ibindi .
Icyo Kazooba yibagiwe kuvuga , ni uko nta na umwe wigeze ahabwa amahirwe yo kwiregura mu rukiko .
Bakorewe ihohoterwa ngo bemere ku ngufu ibyaha bahimbiwe , bamwe bakanagwa ku mupaka ari intere nabwo kubera igitutu cya u Rwanda .
Ni inzirakarengane za ibinyoma byacuriwe i Kampala bigamije kuyobya rubanda , ari naho habarizwa icya uko u Rwanda rukorana na ADF .
Leta ya Uganda na inzego zayo za umutekano ku isonga CMI , ari nazo zicura ibinyoma bigamije kwangiza isura ya u Rwanda , zakunze guhirikira ubwo bwicanyi bwa abayobozi bakuru kuri Leta ya u Rwanda , nyamara bwakozwe na ubutegetsi bwa Museveni .
Kuri iyi nshuro , na igitambambuga nticyapfa kwemera ibyo binyoma .
Imikoreshereze ya ubutaka ikwiriye guhinduka , Intara ya Amajyepfo igahabwa umurwa mukuru wa ubucuruzi .
U Rwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu bituwe cyane muri Afurika .
Ibarura rusange ryakozwe na Ikigo cya Igihugu cya Ibarurishamibare mu 2012 , ryagaragaje ko Abanyarwanda bari bageze kuri miliyoni 10 . 5 , mu gihe biteganyijwe ko muri 2032 bazaba babarirwa hagati ya milioni 15 , 4 na 16 , 9 naho mu 2050 bakazaba bari hagati ya miliyoni 23 na 25 .
Muri 2015 ubucucike kuri kilometero kare bwari buhagaze kuri 461 mu gihe muri 2050 buzaba buhageze kuri 934 .
Ubu bwiyongere bwa abaturage bujyana no gukenera ubutaka bwo guturaho no gukoreraho ibikorwa bya iterambere bitandukanye , twavuga nka ubuhizi na ubworozi , ubucukuzi bwa amabuye ya agaciro na ibindi .
Bitewe na ubu bwiyongere bwa abaturage , ahakabaye hakorerwa ibikorwa bya ubuhinzi kandi bitanga na umusaruro harimo haraturwa ku muvuduko wo hejuru .
Urugero twavuga ni nka igice kinini cya Intara ya u Burasirazuba ndetse na Akarere ka Ibirunga bizwiho kuba ari byo bigize Ikigega cya igihugu mu biribwa .
Nta gikozwe ubu butaka bugakomeza guturwaho ku muvuduko biriho ubu , byazagira ingaruka mu gihe kirekire mu kwihaza mu biribwa kwa igihugu .
Ese ubwiyongere bwa abaturage muri utu turere twa ubuhinzi buva he ?
Intara ya Iburasirazuba
Nkuko bigaragara mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe na Ikigo cya Igihugu cya Ibarurishamibare ( NISR - EICV - 4 ) , ndetse na raporo ya Banki ya Isi ( World bank report ) muri iki gihe usanga abaturage bava mu duce twa imisozi miremire kandi yagundutse , abandi bakava mu duce dufite amasambu mato cyane .
Aha twavuga nka uturere twa Gakenke , Muhanga , Rulindo , Gicumbi , Nyamagabe , Burera , Nyaruguru , Gasabo na Nyamasheke berekaza aho bashobora kubona amasambu manini kandi atanga umusaruro cyane cyane mu gace ka iburasirazuba mu turere twa Nyagatare , Gatsibo , Kayonza na Rwamagana .
Muri utu turere abaturage bavamo ntibaba bagishobora kubona umusaruro uhagije watunga ingo zabo bityo bagafata icyemezo cyo gusuhuka .
Minisiteri ya Ubuhinzin Ubworozi ( Minagri _ Psta 4 ) igaragaza ko mu turere 10 two mu Ntara za Iburengerazuba , Amajyepfo ndetse na Amajyaruguru abahinzi bari hagati 40 - 50 % bakorera ibikorwa byabo ku buso bungana na 0 . 2 ha mu gihe mu Karere ka Rubavu abahinzi bangana na 70 % bafite ubutaka muri minsi ya 0 . 2 ha .
Bigaragare rero ko ubutaka butera kandi buto ari imwe mu mpamvu ituma abantu bimukira cyane mu Ntara ya Iburasirazuba .
Akarere ka Ibirunga bihagaze bite ?
Akandi gace gafite umuvuduko wo hejuru mu guturwa ni aka Ibirunga aho imijyi ya Musanze na Rubavu ndetse na udusantere twaho twaguka vuba .
Kuba aka gace gahana imbibi na ibihugu bituranyi aho byoroha gukora ibikorwa bya ubucuruzi kandi kakaba gafite na ubutaka bwera bituma hari abaturage bava hirya no hino bajya kuhatura .
Ibi bituma imijyi na amasantere byaguka vuba .
Hari impungenge ko ugukura kwa iyi mijyi kugenda gutwara ubutaka buhingwa kandi ari bwo bwakabaye buzakomeza gutanga umusaruro wa ibiribwa ku baturarwanda biyongera umunsi ku munsi .
Hakwiriye kurebwa uburyo ubu bwiyongere bwa abaturage butahutaza urwego rwa ubuhinzi mu Rwanda .
Mu ngamba abantu barebaho neza harimo ko : Intara ya Amajyepfo ari yo yakwakira cyane ibikorwa bya amajyambere birimo inganda , ibikorwa bya ubucuruzi na ibindi .
Hakwiye gushyiraho umurwa mukuru wa ubucuruzi hagati ya Muhanga na Ruhango kugira ngo ukurure abantu benshi .
Birakwiye ko ahazajya ibikorwa bya amajyambere na imiturire hategurwa neza igishushanyo mbonera cya imikoreshereze ya ubutaka ;
gutuza abantu mu buryo bugezweho kandi bitwara ubuso buto bushoboka no kugabanya cyane umuvuduko wa ubwiyongere mu turere twa igihugu dufatwa nka igigega ( akarere ka ibirunga , Intara ya Iburasirazuba ) .
Kubera iki imiturire na inganda byagenerwa Intara ya Amajyepfo ?
Igice kinini cya Intara ya Amajyepfo ntabwo kiberanye na ibikorwa bya ubuhinzi kuko gifite ubutaka busharira .
Ikindi kandi niho hagarara udusozi tuberanye na imiturire .
Aho iyi ntara iherereye byoroshye guhahirana na izindi ntara na umujyi wa Kigali .
Ibi birashoboka kuko u Rwanda ari igihugu gito kandi gifite abaturage benshi .
Bityo rero hakwiriye kujyaho ingamba zikomeye zinoza imiturire ndetse zikabungabunga ubutaka bwera cyangwa bugaragaza ko bwatanga umusururo kugira ngo na abazabaho kera bazabone amahirwe abariho ubu bafite .
Icya kabiri , igihugu kimaze kugira ibikorwa remezo twavuga nka imihanda na ibindi bituma ubuhahirane bworoha kandi bushoboka mu gihugu hose .
Bikaba rero byakoroha cyane gushyira agace ka inganda ahantu hamwe ndetse hagati aho umusaruro ushobora kuva mu bice byose bya igihugu bikagera aho bitunganirizwa bitarangirika .
Ibi kandi byagabanya cyane igihombo kigenda kigaragara mu nganda zigenda zubakwa hirya no hino kandi nta musaruro uhagije wo gutunganya zifite .
Icya gatatu ni uko umubare wa abantu batuye ahantu ha imisozi miremire kandi hashyira ubuzima bwabo mu kaga wagenda utuzwa mu Ntara ya Amajyepfo .
Nka ubu politiki ya imikoreshereje ya ubutaka ( Rwanda Land policy ) igaragaza ko Intara ya Amajyaruguru ndetse na Uburengerazuba zifite abaturage benshi batuye mu manegeka kandi badafite aho bimurirwa habashyira mu mutekano .
Karimba Yannick / Umwarimu muri Kaminuza ya u Rwanda
Muve kuri The Guardian , vuba isi izamenya ukuri ku icengezamatwara rya Michela Wrong .
Niba Michela Wrong yari yizeye ko igitabo cye giheruka kizahindura uko Isi ifata u Rwanda , bisa nka aho uruzinduko rwa Perezida Macron rwamubereye kidobya .
Inkuru ya Wrong ivuga ko " " " " Isi iri kugenda ihumuka gahoro gahoro ku bijyanye na ibikorwa bya indengakamere bya Perezida Kagame mu Rwanda , " " " " ntisobanura neza " " " " Isi " " " " yashakaga kuvuga iyo ari yo .
Ikinyamakuru The Guardian ni umufatanyacyaha kuko nta buryo inkuru yitwa ko ishingiye ku kuri yari kugaragara nka igamije gutwerera Isi yose isura mbi Wrong afite ku Rwanda .
Ibi nibyo mu mvugo iboneye , umuntu ashobora kwita akazi ka icengezamatwara .
Icya mbere , Wrong akunze gukoresha abantu bo mu Burengerazuba bwa Isi atavuga amazina kugira ngo agaragaze ibyo avuga nka ibifite ireme .
Hari ngo abadipolomate bo mu Burayi atavuga amazina , abasesenguzi na abakora muri gahunda za iterambere bose batifuza ko imyirondoro yabo ijya hanze ku mpamvu umwanditsi azi wenyine .
Ariko umuntu ashingiye ku rwango Wrong afitiye ubutegetsi bwa u Rwanda , ashobora kuvuga ko aba bantu atari ugushaka kutavuga umwirondoro wabo ahubwo ko batabaho .
Atabifashishije aka kazi ka icengezamatwara ke ntikagerwaho cyane ko muri aba avuga abazwi ari babiri gusa .
Umwe ni Gerard Prunier , Umunyamakuru wa Umufaransa wagaragaje uruhare rutaziguye muri gahunda ya agatsiko yo guhirika Guverinoma ya u Rwanda mu 1998 mu gitabo yise " " " " Africaa s World War . " " " "
Uwa kabiri ni David Himbara , umwiyemezi umara igihe cye kinini kuri internet asebya Guverinoma ya u Rwanda .
Wrong byamusabye guhimba abasesenguzi batazwi , abadipolomate ba i Burayi na abakozi muri gahunda za iterambere kugira ngo atange ishusho ya uko hari abantu benshi bari hanze ya agatsiko gasanzwe gasebya u Rwanda bashyigikiye ibitekerezo bye ndetse bakaba batangiye " " " " guhumuka amaso " " " " ku mateka na ibindi byose ahimba .
Icya kabiri mu nyungu ze agerageza gukoresha amoko agamije kugwiza umubare wa abanga u Rwanda .
" " " " Kuba abenshi mu bahigwa na ubutegetsi atari Abahutu ari na bo benshi ahubwo akaba ari abo mu bwoko bwa Kagame bwa Abatutsi ari nabo bake - Aho abenshi muri bo bahoze ari abizerwa na byo byatewe imboni na abo mu Burengerazuba bwa isi . " " " "
Ibi nibyo Wrong avuga , aho anahishura mu byukuri icyo aba ashatse kuvuga iyo avuze " " " " Isi . " " " "
Birumvikana ko niba Isi igarukira ku bo mu Burengerezuba bwa Isi , mu bigaragara Perezida Macron , Umuyobozi wo mu Burengerazuba bwa Isi ntiyaba ari mu mujyo wa ibyo Wrong ashaka .
Hejuru ya ibyo , kuba Wrong afata ivanguramoko yifitiye ryimakaza ibitekerezo bya Hutu - Power nka uko byagaragajwe na umunyamakuru wa Umwongereza ukora inkuru zicukumbuye , Linda Melvern akaritwerera u Rwanda ni ibintu byamaze gutahurwa mu Rwanda .
Yego nibyo , Diane Rwigara , Kizito Mihigo , Kayumba Nyamwasa na Patrick Karegeya bagaragazwa neza na Wrong mu gitabo cye , bose bagejejwe imbere ya inkiko za u Rwanda .
Bose uretse Diane Rwigara bahamijwe ibyaha kandi nka uko bigomba kugenda no mu kindi gihugu cyose kigendera ku mategeko , ubwoko bwabo nta mwanya bwari bufite mu rukiko .
Ku bijyanye na ibyo yavuze byo kugerageza kwivugana bamwe muri abo , turacyategereje ko Wrong atanga ibimenyetso bishinja Guverinoma ya u Rwanda .
Kugeza ubu ni ikirego kimwe kiza gikurikira ikindi kandi byose bidafite ishingiro .
Kandi The Guardian ifatwa nka ikinyamakuru cyakabaye cyizerwa , isa na aho idashaka kumubaza ibyo akora .
Icya gatatu , mu buryo buhoraho hari ugukomeza guhirikira kuri RPF amahano yabereye muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo .
Ariko Wrong ntashobora kugereka ikosa ku Rwanda atabishyize mu mboni za amoko yamusaritse .
Urugero ku bijyanye na impunzi zari zarafashwe bugwate na abasize bakoze Jenoside mu nkambi zo muri Congo , Wrong yasubiyemo amagambo ya Gerard Prunier agira ati " " " " Ushobora kwica ibihumbi amagana ntibigire ingaruka zikomeye ku rwego mpuzamahanga , ariko ugufunga umubyeyi ushaka , bigahindura bya iteka ryose uburyo ibihugu bya inshuti
byakubonaga . " " " "
Kuba Wrong na Prunier bahabwa urubuga rwo kugoreka ibyabaye mu mateka , bigaragaza ko Isi yabo igifite ibibazo .
Imyaka 27 ntihagije kugira ngo umuntu yibagirwe uko iyo " " " " Si " " " " yirengagije ubwo Abatutsi barenga miliyoni bicwaga .
Iyi Si niyo yirengagije ubwo abakoze Jenoside bongeraga guhabwa intwaro muri izo nkambi bagatangira kugaba ibitero ku Rwanda bafite intego yo kurangiza akazi bari baratangiye .
Wrong atekereza ko ari u Rwanda rukwiye kugerekwaho amakosa ya imfu zabayeho muri gahunda yo gusenya inkambi za impunzi aho abantu bari baragizwe ingabo ikingira abakoze Jenoside bari bari mu mugambi wo kwishyira hamwe ngo basoze Jenoside batangiye , aho kuba Isi ye na abakoze Jenoside yakingiye ikibaba kugeza na uyu munsi ibarinda ubutabera
Ariko tuzi neza igikwiye gukorwa , sibyo ?
Ubuhamya bukomeye bwa Senateri Marie - Rose Mureshyankwano ni umuburo waziye igihe wa icyo tugomba guha agaciro .
Ubuhamya bwe butanga ishusho ya nyayo kandi yagutse ku byabaye muri Zaire .
Ati " " " " Nababwiye ukuntu turi muri ayo mashyamba ya Congo , Inkotanyi zaje zigasanga umugabo wanjye yararwaye yararembye bakamufata bakamuheka , bakatugeza ku Kibuga cya indege cya Mbandaka , bakadushyira mu ndege tugahunguka , tukagaruka hano mu Rwanda , . . , inkotanyi njye ni zo zankijije ubuhutu kuko numvaga bari bunyice
kubera ko ndi Umuhutu ariko zankijije ubuhutu kuko zanyeretse ubudasa . " " " "
Ni ubu budasa Wrong ahora arwanya abinyujije mu kurebera ibintu mu ndorerwamo za amoko , ntashobora kurebera u Rwanda na Abanyarwanda hanze ya amoko .
Ariko birumvikana mu maso ya abahakana Jenoside u Rwanda rwari isibaniro ya amoko kandi niko ruzahora .
Nka uko Perezida Kagame yabivuze mu kiganiro na abanyamakuru ubwo yari ari kumwe na mugenzi we wa u Bufaransa , " " " " Byari byoroshye ko u Rwanda rwashoboraga kuguma ari igihugu kidafite ejo hazaza .
Ndetse bamwe bashobora kuba barumvaga ibyo ari byo bikwiye .
Abandi banashyize imbaraga mu kugira ngo u Rwanda rube igihugu kidafite ejo hazaza . " " " "
Abanyarwanda bazi aho bashyira Michela Wrong muri ibyo byiciro nubwo bishobora kumusaba gukora cyane kugira ngo niba ashaka ko ibindi bihugu byiyunga kuri Guverinoma za Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na u Bwongereza mu kugoreka amateka ya u Rwanda .
Twamenyereye amasomo duhabwa mu bijyanye na uburenganzira bwa muntu ndetse dushobora kuyakira bitworoheye .
Ariko nta gihugu kiba cya igihangage ku buryo bigiha ubushobozi bwo guhindura ukuri kuri mu mateka ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .
Uruzinduko rwa Perezida Emmanuel Macron mu Rwanda : Ubutwari ntagereranywa .
Uruzinduko rwa Perezida wa u Bufaransa , Emmanuel Macron mu Rwanda ni imbarutso ya umubano mushya hagati ya ibihugu byombi ndetse na ibya Afurika bihuriye ku rurimi rwa Igifaransa .
Ni impano itanga icyizere ku rubyiruko rwa impande zombi ko imbere harwo hari icyezezi cya urumuri cyari cyarafunzwe na abagome .
Ntibigira uko bisa iyo umubano hagati ya abantu cyangwa se na ibihugu utangiriye ku kuri .
Icyo kikaba aricyo Perezida Paul Kagame wa u Rwanda na Emmanuel Macron wa u Bufaransa biyemeje .
Umubano mushya wa u Rwanda na u Bufaransa ushingiye ku kuri ko mu mateka .
Umubano ushingiye ku bwubahane .
Ibyo ndemeza ko bibaye ubwa mbere muri Afurika ya ibihugu bihuriye ku rurimi rwa Igifaransa .
Ahandi hose muri iyo Afurika , witonze ukitegereza , usanga u Bufaransa ari bwo bushyiraho Umukuru wa Igihugu nyamara ngo binyuze mu matora , kandi bukaba ari nabwo bumugusha mu mutego wo kuvaho .
Kandi nta na rimwe avaho neza .
Iri ni ishimwe rikomeye kuko Perezida Kagame yongeye gukora agashya muri Afurika .
Abanyafurika ni bo bagomba kumenya ibibazo byabo , ndetse na umuti ukwiye wo kubikemura kuko aka imuhana kaza imvura ihise .
Nta muntu ugomba kukwigisha uko uyobora urugo rwawe kuko atakurusha kurumenya nka nyirarwo .
Abavuga Igifaransa bumvise neza amagambo akomeye Perezida Macron yavuze .
Nibaza ko abatumvise ko yasabye imbabazi , nyamara yarazisabye mu kinyabupfura , mu magambo yujuje ubuhanga , hari ibyo batari kwifuza .
Nka umuyobozi wa igihugu , twari dutegereje ko apfukama akavuga ngo mu izina rya igihugu nyoboye ndasaba imbabazi u Rwanda ?
Mbafiteho na ikibazo : Muribuka Guy Verhofstadt , wari Minisitiri wa Intebe wa u Bubiligi ko yasuye u Rwanda ku wa Mutarama 2000 , agasaba imbabazi mu izina rya Ababiligi ?
Hakurikiyeho iki ?
Ntacyo , uretse kutubeshyeshya ngo baciriye imanza abahekuye u Rwanda , bagacira imanza interahamwe nazo nke zuzuyeyo .
Ko abarokotse Jenoside nanjye ndimo batsinze , hari icyakurikiye ?
Abantu bicaranye incarubanza zaho nyamara basabye ibyo inkiko zabageneye , wabaza ikigega kibishinzwe bakakubwira ko ngo keretse icyaha cyarakorewe mu Bubiligi .
Nkibaza impamvu bavuga ko baca imanza za ibyaha bitakorewe iwabo niba ntaho bigeza ababikorewe .
Perezida Emmanuel Macron ni intwari .
Ijambo yavugiye ku Rwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali ku Gisozi ku bumva Igifaransa ni irya agaciro .
Ni intsinzi ku Banyarwanda kuko uwitonze amira ibinoze .
Kwihangana no kudateshuka ku ntego kwa Abanyarwanda byabaye intwaro ikomeye kugira ngo ibyo bigerweho .
Kandi ntihagire uwibeshya ko ijambo rye ryashimishije Abafaransa bose , kuko abagize uruhare mu mateka yatugejeje aha , ntibishimiye kuba yemeye icyaha cyakozwe mu izina rya u Bufaransa , intwaro ikomeye ikaba ibendera riranga igihugu cyabo ryareshejwe agaciro .
Abo rero nabo ubutabera burabategereje .
Ni yo mpamvu nsanga tudakwiye kuvuma iritararenga .
Mbere ya Macron hari abandi bayoboye u Bufaransa batateye intambwe nka iyo ateye .
Nanone dutegereze ibyo yasezeranije u Rwanda na Abanyarwanda , tube turetse guca urubanza .
Dore bimwe mu byo Macron yavugiye ku Gisozi .
Yatangiye avuga ati " " " " Ijoro ribara uwariraye . " " " " " " " "
Ayo magambo aratwumvisha ijwi rya abagifite igisebe cyasamye kikiri gishyashya cyo kuba bari bahari na na ubu bagihari .
Abo tutateze amatwi ububabare bwabo , mbere , mu gihe cya Jenoside ndetse na nyuma yayo kikaba gishobora kuba ari nacyo kibi kurusha ibindi .
Abarokotse , imfubyi , ngo dutege amatwi ubuhamya bwabo , umuhate , agaciro byabo ari naho tubonera ko atari umubare cyangwa amagambo , ahubwo kubera uburemere bwa ubuzima bwabo ntasimburwa bushaririye . . . Imbere yanyu mu cyubahiro no kwicisha bugufi , nje kwemera uruhare rwacu .
Kwemera ibyabaye , ariko cyane cyane gukurikirana akazi ka ubutabera .
Abariraye bonyine ni bo baduha impano yo kutubabarira babishatse .
Ntawe ukekwaho Jenoside ugomba gucika ubutabera . . . Ni umwenda turimo inzirakarengane zishwe .
Nyuma yo guceceka igihe kirekire , ni umwenda turimo abakiriho , dushobora , niba babitwemerera kuborohereza ububabare .
U Bufaransa bufite inshingano yo kwemera uruhare bwagize mu mateka yababaje Abanyarwanda igihe kirekire cyane no kugira ngo ukuri kutamenyekana . . . Ayo magambo avuga icyiza ariko gifite izina ariryo Jenoside . . . Kuko ari ukubaho kwa buri wese na indoto ze byishwe inshuro miliyoni . . . Jenoside ntigereranywa na ikindi , ntacyo wabona
uha umuntu ngo kiyimwibagize .
Igira aho ituruka , abo yibasira , kandi igategurwa .
Ikagira gahunda yo gutsemba abantu na ubumuntu , kandi ntisibangana . . . Ntitubaho nyuma ya jenoside , tubana nayo .
Ariko kandi u Bufaransa bwagize uruhare ndengakamere rwa politiki muri ayo mateka . . .
Ntabwo gahunda yacu ari uguhindura mu Kinyarwanda ijambo ryose Perezida Emmanuel Macron yavugiye ku Rwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali ku Gisozi .
Aha turifuza kumara impungenge abumva atavuze abasirikare ba Abafaransa .
Mwibuke ko ziriya komisiyo zombi [ iya Duclert yashyizweho na Perezida Macron na iyitiriwe Muse yashyizweho nu Rwanda ] , hari ibyo zitarabasha kubona kandi zikaba zikomeje akazi ko gushakisha uruhare rwa u Bufaransa muri Jenoside .
Abanyepolitiki bakoresheje abasirikare ariko hari impapuro zarigitishijwe , ndetse na Ambasade ya u Bufaransa mu Rwanda mbere yo guhunga hari izo yatwitse na izo yashwanyaguje .
Ubushakashatsi buracyakomeza .
Mu gihe rero ubushakashatsi bugikomeje , ntabwo Perezida wa u Bufaransa yavuga uruhare rwa abasirikare ba igihugu cye .
Nitwihangane dutegereze , tureke kuvuma iritararenga .
Ibikubiye muri iyi nyandiko ni ibitekerezo bwite bya Umwanditsi wa ibitabo Mukagasana Yolande , washinze Foundation Yolande Mukagasana , Umuryango urwanya abapfobya na abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .
Gutuka Perezida wa Repubulika ni ukwikenya
Ishyano rikomeye risigaye ryaragwiriye urwa Gasabo ni ukumva umuntu wifatira mu gahanga Perezida wa Repubulika akamutuka kandi ukabona abenshi babifashe nka ibintu bisanzwe , abandi bakabyita uburenganzira bwo kuvuga icyo umuntu atekereza na ibindi bigayitse .
Ku mbuga nkoranyambaga nka YouTube , Facebook , Instagram na izindi uhasanga abantu batandukanye , yaba abiyita abanyapolitiki , impirimbanyi za uburenganzira bwa muntu na abandi bavuga ko bari kugaragaza ibitekerezo byabo , banenga ibitagenda mu miyoborere ya igihugu ariko ugasanga mu byo bita ibitekerezo hibanzemo kubahuka , kwibasira no gutuka Umukuru
wa Igihugu .
Ubusanzwe mu muco Nyarwanda gutukana ni kirazira naho mu muco wa Gikiristu gutukana bikaba icyaha .
Mu ndangagaciro za umuco wa Kinyarwanda , buri muryango wose utoza abana gukura bubaha ariko cyane cyane bakubaha ababaruta .
Gusuzugura cyangwa kubahuka umukuru bifatwa nko kubura ikinyabupfura , akenshi bikagaragaza umwana wabuze uburere , iyo bigeze ku gutinyuka ugukuriye ukamutuka , bifatwa nka ishyano ryaguye bikururira ubikoze guhabwa ibihano bikomeye , byagera ku gutuka umubyeyi cyangwa umukuru wa umuryango bikaba byakururira ubikoze kuvumwa no
gucibwa mu muryango .
Akenshi iyo umwana atutse umubyeyi we uwo mwana bakunda kumwita igikenya .
" " " " Wubahe so na nyoko uko Uwiteka Imana yawe yagutegetse , kugira ngo uramire mu gihugu Uwiteka Imana yawe iguha , uboneremo ibyiza . " " " "
( Gutegeka Kwa Kabiri 5 : 16 , 18 . 20 ; Abefeso 6 . 2 , 3 )
Uretse no kuba Umukuru wa Igihugu , Perezida wa Repubulika aba ari na umuntu , ufite ibyiyumviro byose , ushobora kubabara cyangwa kwishima , gukomereka haba mu marangamutima , mu mitekerereze no mu mwuka bitewe na amagambo mabi cyangwa ibitutsi bamutuka .
Ni umuntu ufite ubumuntu kandi ufite uburenganzira na amategeko amurengera nka undi mwenegihugu wese .
Ikigeretse kuri ibyo kandi Perezida wa Repubulika aba ari umubyeyi mu buryo bubiri .
Ubwa mbere ni umubyeyi , ufite umuryango we bwite , ufite abana na abamukomokaho bagomba kubahwa kandi bakarindwa gukomeretswa mu marangamutima na ibitutsi bitukwa umubyeyi wabo .
Nka abandi bana bose , aba Umukuru wa Igihugu bakeneye kubona umubyeyi wabo yubashywe nka abandi babyeyi bose .
Ubwa kabiri , Umukuru wa Igihugu ni umubyeyi wa abenegihugu mu maso ya abandi baturage ba ibindi bihugu .
Abenegihugu hose burya baba bagize umuryango mugari wa abatuye igihugu runaka , ni yo mpamvu itegeko rya Repubulika ya u Rwanda rigaruka ku ijambo rivuga ngo umuryango Nyarwanda , ni ukuvuga ko umuryango Nyarwanda ugizwe na Abanyarwanda bose kandi nta muryango utagira umubyeyi , uyu muryango Nyarwanda burya umubyeyi uba ufite ni
Perezida wa Repubulika .
Abana bagize umuryango Nyarwanda , bafite inshingano zo kubaha no kubahisha umubyeyi cyangwa umukuru wa uyu muryango , bakwiye kubabazwa na umuntu wese umwubahutse akamutuka , akamuvuga nabi ndetse bafite inshingano zo kumurinda no kugaragariza umuntu wese umututse ko batishimiye ko abatukiye umubyeyi .
Mu mategeko icumi Imana yahaye umuryango wa inyokomuntu ibicishije mu kuyabwira umuryango wa Israel harimo itegeko rikomeye risaba umwana wese kubaha umubyeyi kandi rigaragaza na inyungu uzabikora azabona .
Izo nyungu ni " " " " ukuramira mu gihugu no kukibamo unezerewe " " " " bivuze ko uwishe iri tegeko agerwaho na ingaruka zo kutumvira no kutubaha arizo " " " " gukenyuka no kuba mu gihugu utanezerewe . " " " "
Itegeko rya Imana ni ihame riba rigomba kubahirizwa uryubahirije akabona umugisha uryishe akabona umuvumo .
Kutubaha umubyeyi bizana umuvumo wo gukenyuka , kubaho utishimye ni yo mpamvu iyi nyandiko yacu twayihaye umutwe ugira uti " " " " gutuka Perezida wa Repubulika ni ukwikenya . " " " "
Uretse kandi Perezida wa Repubulika na umubyeyi ukubyara , Imana isaba umuntu wese kubaha umuntu umukuriye .
Bibiliya mu Gitabo cya Abalewi 19 : 32 hagira hati " " " " Ujye uhagurukira umeze imvi , wubahe umusaza , utinye Imana yawe .
Ndi Uwiteka .
" " " " Ni inshingano za abakiri bato kubaha abakuru kandi na abakuru na bo bafite inshingano zo kudasharirira abato nka uko Intumwa Pawulo yabyandikiye Itorero rya Efeso agira ati " " " " 1 Bana , mujye mwumvira ababyeyi banyu mu Mwami wacu , kuko ari byo bibakwiriye .
Wubahe so na nyoko ( iryo ni ryo tegeko rya mbere ririmo isezerano ) , kugira ngo ubone amahoro uramire mu isi .
Namwe ba se ntimugasharirire abana banyu , ahubwo mubarere mubahana , mubigisha ibya Umwami wacu . " " " "
( Abefeso 6 : 1 ; 4 ) .
Iyo urebye ibyo ijambo rya Imana rimaze kutubwira mu bitabo dusomye , ukareba na ibikorwa muri ino minsi uhita usobanukirwa impamvu yo gukenyuka mu buryo butandukanye mu rubyiruko no kubaho abenshi bashaririwe na ubuzima .
Abana benshi ntibacyubaha abakuru , ugera mu modoka ugasanga umwana aricaye na ecouteur mu matwi , umusaza wa imvi za uruyenzi ahagaze , umwana akaba atamwimukira , ku murongo ahatangirwa serivisi zitandukanye usanga urubyiruko rubyigana na abasaza na ibindi ariko kubaha abadukuriye ni ihame kandi ni itegeko rya Imana riduha umugisha wo kurama no
kubaho twishimye .
Biratangaza , birababaza kandi bitera kwibaza byinshi , aho ubona umuntu wiyita umukirisitu , umukozi wa Imana afata Bibiliya akayihisha inyuma , undi akihisha mu mwambaro uriho umusaraba cyangwa ikanzu ya abihaye Imana , akifatira Perezida wa Repubulika mu gahanga akamutuka akamwandagaza , cyangwa agahamagarira abantu kwigomeko no kwigumura ku
mabwiriza ya ubuyobozi bukuru bwa igihugu kandi abandi bakirisitu na bo bakabireba cyangwa bakabyumva bagaceceka bakumva ntacyo bitwaye ariko ibi ni ishyano ryagwiriye igihugu cyacu kandi rikizanamo umwuka wo gukenyuka no kubaho abantu batishimye .
Intumwa Pawulo mu rwandiko yandikiye Itorero rya i Roma , yahuguriye abakirisitu baho kubaha ubuyobozi , ababwira ko kubaha ubuyobozi ari imwe mu nzira yo kubaho neza kandi ari uburyo bwo kubaha Imana ariko ku rundi ruhande yaberetse na ingaruka zizagera ku muntu wese utazubaha ubuyobozi .
Yabisobanuye muri aya magambo , ati " " " " Umuntu wese agandukire abatware bamutwara , kuko ari nta butware butava ku Mana na abatware bariho bashyizweho na Imana .
Ni cyo gituma ugandira umutware aba yanze itegeko rya Imana , kandi abaryanga bazatsindwa na urubanza .
Abatware si abo gutinywa na abakora ibyiza , keretse abakora nabi .
Mbese ushaka kudatinya umutware ?
Kora neza na we azagushima , kuko ari umukozi wa Imana uguhesha ibyiza .
Ariko nukora nabi utinye , kuko adatwarira inkota ubusa .
Ni umukozi wa Imana , uhoresha umujinya ukora nabi . " " " "
( Abaroma 13 : 1 ; 4 ) .
Aya magambo Pawulo yabwiye abaroma tuzayagarukaho mu gice cya kabiri cya iyi nyandiko .
Umuntu wese akwiye kwirinda gusuzugura , gutuka umukuriye bya umwihariko Perezida wa Repubulika .
Urubyiruko bya umwihariko , dukwiye kwirinda kugwa mu mutego wa abanyapolitiki , abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga mu buryo butandukanye bagambiriye kubabibamo umwuka wo kwigomeka no gutuka ababyeyi banyu , kuko kwifatanya nabo bituzanira umuvumo wo gukenyuka no kubaho tutishimiye ibyiza byo mu gihugu ariko ijambo rya Imana
ritubwira ko nitwemera tukumvira tuzarya ibyiza byo mu gihugu ariko nitwanga tukagoma inkota izaturya .
Mu gice cya kabiri tuzarebera hamwe uburyo Imana ibona kandi ifata Perezida wa Repubulika mu buryo bwihariye , ingaruka zizanwa no kumutuka haba ku muntu ku giti cye ( umututse ) , kubabyumva bakabishyigikira no ku gihugu muri rusange .
" " " " Nimwemera mukumvira muzarya ibyiza byo mu gihugu .
Ariko nimwanga mukagoma inkota izabarya , " " " " kuko akanwa ka Uwiteka ari ko kabivuze . " " " "
( Yesaya 1 : 19 - 20 )
Gutanga igihugu mu maboko ya ababisha ni ukwirahuriraho umuriro .
Kuva kera buri Munyarwanda yatozwaga kwimana igihugu mu maboko ya ababisha , kurengera igihugu na abagituye , agaharanira ko u Rwanda rugira ijambo , rugasumbya icyubahiro na ishema ibindi bihugu .
Abanyarwanda batozwaga kubaha no gusigasira indangagaciro , bakimika umuco wa kirazira .
Abanyarwanda batozwaga kandi no kubumbatira ubumwe , bakarengera ubusugire bwa umuryango wo shingiro ryo kuramuka kwa igihugu .
Uwahemukiraga umuryango yahamagazwaga muri gacaca , agakubitwa icyuhagiro kugira ngo asubire mu muryango agarukanye umutima wa Igihugu , uwinangiraga umutima , yafatwaga nka umubisha , ntahabwe ijambo na gato , ntagere mu gitaramo cya abahizi .
Guhezwa mu gitaramo cyari igihano gikomeye kubera ko byarakugoraga kuzagabana nka abandi .
U Rwanda rwubatswe kandi rwagurwa na ubutwari , aho buri wese yaharaniraga kutagaragarwaho na ubugwari .
Ingabo ku rugamba zaharaniraga kudatanga igihugu mu maboko ya ababisha .
Mu 1924 , abakoloni bakuyeho Itorero rya Igihugu ryari irerero ryatozaga imico myiza na imyifatire myiza mu bantu .
Gusenya ibikorwa bya Itorero byatumye Abanyarwanda bacika igikuba , maze uburere na ikinyabupfura bikomwa mu nkokora na imigirire mburamumaro ya imico mibi mvamahanga .
Abakoloni bakuyemo Abanyarwanda umutima wa Igihugu bityo bareka ubuntu na Ubunyarwanda bupfunditse ku bumwe bwabo .
Muri iki gihe hari abacurira u Rwanda urwango
Hari abamaze kugurana urukundo rwa Igihugu indamu na inda nini , ubugome no kubura ubupfura , bashyira imbere inabi ngo imunge ineza .
Ibyari ukurengera inyungu za igihugu , ba mpemuke ndamuke bamaze kubigurana kurusebya mu mahanga ngo bihungabanye umubano mwiza u Rwanda rufitanye na inshuti za amahanga .
Aho bageze kwifuza ko u Rwanda rwakomanyirizwa na amahanga , ngo ubuhahirane na ubufatanye mu bikorwa bya iterambere bicube .
Iyi myitwarire ikomeje kugaragara ku bacumuye ku Rwanda , bakabura umutima wo gusaba imbabazi .
Harimo abasize boretse u Rwanda , bagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 , inshuti zabo na ababakomokaho bayobotse umurongo mubi wo gushaka kurimbura u Rwanda .
Hari na abanyamahanga batifuriza u Rwanda ineza kubera urwango barufitiye .
Harimo abashinjwa ibyaha bitandukanye , harimo no kumunga umutungo wa igihugu .
Aba bose bakurikiranwa na ubutabera bwa u Rwanda .
Ntibifuriza u Rwanda na Abanyarwanda ituze na iterambere .
Bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambanga aho bahimba ibinyoma no gukabya inkuru , bagamije gushyira icyasha ku Rwanda .
Bagaragaza ko u Rwanda rutubahiriza amahame ya uburenganzira bwa muntu , aho bafata abakoze ibyaha bakabandikaho inkuru nziza zigamije kubambika ibyera , bagamije kwerekana ko u Rwanda rubarenganya , nyamara barakoze ibyaha ku manywa ya ihangu .
Ibi byongeye kugaragara cyane , ubwo u Rwanda rwitegura kwakira Inama ya Ibihugu bihuriye mu Muryango wa " " " " Commonwealth , " " " " hagaragaye bamwe mu Banyarwanda bavuga ko batavuga rumwe na ubutegetsi bwa u Rwanda , basabaga u Bwongereza buyobora iyi nama ku rwego , kutemera ko iyi nama yabera mu Rwanda .
Ubusanzwe iyi nama ikaba igomba gusiga Ubunyamabanga Bukuru bwa " " " " Common Wealth " " " " bukorera mu Rwanda , muri manda ya imyaka ibiri .
U Rwanda rukaba rwiteguye gukuramo amahirwe aganisha igihugu mu iterambere rusange Abanyarwanda bakarushaho kunguka uburyo bwo gukora ibikorwa bya ishoramari muri uyu muryango .
Harimo kumenyekanisha u Rwanda mu ruhando rwa amahanga ku buryo abashoramari bashora imari mu Rwanda , Abanyarwanda bakabona imirimo , bakaronka amafaranga azamura iterambere rya imiryango yabo na igihugu .
Hagaragaye abiyita abanyapolitiki na abanyamakuru , bishimira ko iyi nama isubitswe , bamwe bakavuga ko nta kazi bazaba bafitemo , ko kandi nta na inshuti cyangwa bene wabo bafitemo akazi .
Ibi bigaragaza ko aba biyitirira kutavuga rumwe na ubutegetsi bwa u Rwanda , ari abanzi ba u Rwanda , batarwifuriza iterambere na ituze .
Ni icyaha cya ubugome gutanga igihugu mu maboko ya ababisha
Iyo uvutse mu gihugu uba uhanye igihango na cyo , kukigambanira aba ari ugutatira igihango .
Ni ubugwari kwifatira ku gahanga igihugu cyakubyaye .
Kuva u Rwanda rwabaho , cyari icyaha gutanga igihugu mu maboko ya ababisha no gukora igikorwa cyashyira igihugu mu kaga .
Itegeko Ngenga ryo ku wa 14 Kamena 2012 , mu ngingo zaryo 461 kugeza ku ngingo ya 469 , bya umwihariko muri iyi ngingo ya 461 , risobanura ibya icyaha cyo kugirira nabi ubutegetsi buriho cyangwa Perezida wa Repubulika , rigateganya na ibihano byacyo .
Rigira riti " " " " ukora icyaha cyo kugirira nabi ubutegetsi buriho cyangwa cyo kubuhirika akoresheje intambara cyangwa izindi mbaraga zose ; ukora , muri iyo migambi ivugwa mu gaka ka 1 º ka iki gika , icyaha kigamije kugirira nabi Perezida wa Repubulika ; ahanishwa igifungo cya burundu . " " " "
Aha twibutse kandi ko aba ahemukiye Abanyarwanda kubera ko ubutegetsi ari ubwabo nka uko biteganywa na Itegeko Nshinga mu ngingo yaryo ya mbere : " " " " Ubutegetsi bwose bukomoka ku Banyarwanda kandi bugakoreshwa hakurikijwe ibiteganywa na iri Tegeko Nshinga . " " " "
Uyu ni umurage dukomora ku bakurambere bitanze bagahanga u Rwanda .
Kirazira kugaba igihugu mu maboko ya ababisha .
Abanyarwanda dukwiye kuba umwe mu kurengera ubusugire bwa u Rwanda .
Ku Ngoma ya Umwami Cyilima II Rujugira , watwaye u Rwanda guhera mu 1675 kugeza 1708 , rubanda rwarengeye u Rwanda bikomeye , ubwo u Burundi , u Bugesera , i Gisaka na i Ndorwa , bagambiriraga kugiria nabi u Rwanda .
Kubera icyo gikorwa yafatanyije na rubanda rwamwumviye bagahigika ibihugu bine bikomeye , ni bwo hadutse imvugo igira iti " " " " U Rwanda ruratera , ntiruterwa . " " " "
Abashaka kwirenza igihugu baca muri rubanda , kandi akaba ari na rwo rugerwaho na ingaruka kurusha abarushoye mu mwiryane , dore ko bo baba barinzwe kandi bafite na uburyo bwo guhunga ako kaga bashoje .
Kudatanga igihugu mu maboko ya ababisha , ni ukutemera ko kijyaho icyasha , ukakirwanira ishyaka mu Rwanda no mu mahanga .
Abakoresha inzira ya politiki na itangazamakuru basebya u Rwanda , bamenye ko barimo gutatira igihango , bateranya rubanda na igihugu , dore ko abenshi bakora politiki na itangazamakuru binyuranye na amategeko .
Igihango kizabasama .
Perezida Ndayishimiye yahawe urwa amenyo kubera kwita Museveni " " " " Umubyeyi wa u Burundi " " " "
Ubuhamya bwo kurokoka kwa Ugiriwabo Gaparayi Justitia na igihango afitanye na Inkotanyi
" " " " Ndazivuga imyato kuko Inkotanyi ni ubuzima , " " " " ni umutwe wa ubuhamya bwa Ugiriwabo Gaparayi Justitia wavukiye i Nyamata mu Bugesera bugaruka ku buryo yarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 .
Ku wa 14 Gicurasi 2021 , imyaka yari ibaye 27 ndokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , ndokowe na Inkotanyi .
Kuri njye uyu munsi nywufata nka uw umuzuko .
Ubwo urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda 1990 rwatangiraga nari nkiri muto .
Icyo gihe rero sinasobanukiwe neza ibyabaye .
Umugambi wa Interahamwe wari warateguwe kuva kera .
Ndibuka mu 1992 iwacu mu Bugesera habaye igerageza rya Jenoside icyo gihe mu rugo baradusenyeye baradusahura turara twiruka tugana ku mashuri i Nyamata .
Iwacu bahageze ndi mu rwogero , uko nasohotse , ni ko nahunze ntambaye .
Icyo gihe abaturanyi bamwe baricwa .
Sinjya nibagirwa umubyeyi witwaga Josephine twari duturanye , wishwe icyo gihe .
Iwacu bari barize ndetse baranakoraga batangiye ubuzima bundi bushya ndetse biranaduhira ubuzima burakomeza .
Icyo gihe nari mfite imyaka itandatu , nde ni bwo natangiye kumenya ko Abatutsi bicwa na ubwo nta mubyeyi washoboraga gusobanurira abana neza ibyo ari byo .
Mu buhemu bwinshi , urwango ndetse na ubugome , bateguye kumara icyitwa Umututsi wese mu Rwanda ku buryo umwaka wa 1994 waje ari rurangiza ndetse sinatinya kuvuga ko abakoze cyangwa abateguye Jenoside bari bazi ko ari imperuka ariko si bo Mana .
Ku wa 6 Mata 1994 ubwo indege yarimo Perezida Habyarimana Juvénal yaraswaga ntitwahise tubimenya ako kanya gusa uko amasaha yakomezaga gukura bigeze nko mu masaa Sita za ijoro ku muhanda twumvise urusaku .
Icyo gihe umubyeyi wanjye yarabyutse ajya ku idirishya ngo amenye ikibaye yumva bari kuvuga ngo ni ukubahumbahumba bose dore uko bigenje ako kanya yahise akoma agatima ku byabaye mu 1992 .
Niko kwihutira gufungura radio ahita yumva itangazo ko Kinani yapfuye birumvikana nka umuntu mukuru yahise abona ko ibyacu birangiye yatekerezaga ko bucya bamaze kutwica !
Yaratubyukije atubwira ibyabaye .
Imfura ya iwacu iramubwira ngo imperuka ya Abatutsi irageze , iryo niryo ryasigaye mu matwi yanjye .
Twatangiye kwambara nka abiteguye guhunga , amapantaro dushyiramo .
Mama yafashe amafaranga make aca ikabutura za abakuru ayashyiramo aradoda aratubwira ati " " " " wenda ntazabura aho abafasha , wenda yazabarengera aho nzaba ntakiri kumwe namwe . " " " "
Bugicya Mama yatwohereje kwa musaza we ku musozi wa Nyiramatuntu [ Nyamata ] we arasigara ajya ku muyobozi wa ishuri twigagaho kuko umugore we bari inshuti , yibwira ko ahari bazamuhisha .
Bwarakeye umugore aramwegera aramubwira ati " " " " mvira aha ugende sinshaka kubona intumbi yawe hano umugabo yambwiye ko bakwica uri ku rutonde rwa abantu bagomba guherwaho . " " " "
Ni bwo yashatse uko ahava aza adusanga ku musozi twariho .
Twari ku musozi utuyeho Abatutsi benshi kandi basanzwe bazi kwirwanaho , bumvaga bari buhuze imbaraga bagatsinda .
Ariko amazi ntiyari ya yandi na ubwo bagerageje uko bashoboye bagakoresha ingabo , amabuye na amacumu byarangiye Interahamwe zivanze na abasirikare ziturushije imbaraga turatsindwa , abantu bacu bakwira imishwaro .
Ubwo urugamba rwari rurimbanyije i Nyamata grenade zaraye zituragurika , twakwiye imishwaro turiruka , twirirwa tugenda mu ntege nke za abana na ababyeyi , tugera ku musozi wa Ntarama ahagana saa Kumi .
Umusozi wa Nyiramatuntu twari tuwitegeye wose wari wahindutse umuyonga bari gutwika inzu , inka ziruka tubona ko akacu koko kashobotse .
Twaraye aho , bukeye baravuga ngo dukomeze twambuke tujye ku Mugina wenda ahari byasaga nko kubunza umutima tuti ahari hariya ho nta kizahaba wasanga ari mu Bugesera gusa .
Sinari nzi ko umuntu yarara mu gihuru iminsi itatu igashira , sinari nzi ko umuntu yaburara ndetse akanabwirirwa iminsi igashira , indi igataha .
Navuye mu Bugesera na amaguru ngera ku Mugina .
Twambutse Akanyaru dusanga Interahamwe ziradutegereje zitwambura ibyo dufite tugenda imbokoboko , gusa bo bari bataratangira kwica kubera ko Burugumesitiri wabo yari yabibujije ibikorwa byose bya ubwicanyi .
Twashyikiye ku mashuri .
Ntibyatinze rero batangiye kwiremamo udutero bakaza ariko burugumesitiri agategeka abapolisi kubihagarika .
Twaje kuva aho twerekera ku kiliziya , tutarahagera igitero cyaraje tugihungira ku ivuriro ryari aho hafi ariko batumishamo amasasu .
Twaraye dushatse uko twinjira mu kiliziya yo ku Mugina .
Bwaracyeye igitero kiraza , abakuru bari muri twe birwanaho bagisubiza inyuma , ariko si ko byakomeje kuko Interahamwe zo muri Ntongwe , abasirikare na impunzi za Abarundi zabaga mu nkambi baje ari igitero simusiga .
Ariko byakozwe babanje gutumaho Burugumesitiri baramwica .
Icyo gihe abantu birwanyeho ariko biranga biba ibya ubusa baraza batemagura abari hanze abarimo imbere bakajya bateramo amagrenades bamishamo na amasasu uwo rifashe agapfa .
Iryo joro baraye baturaririye , bukeye akazi kabo karakomeza baca inzugi barinjira baratemagura .
Bamaze kunanirwa baradusohora bashyira abagabo ukwabo na abagore ukwabo ngo bagiye kudushakira uko twajya i Kabgayi .
Ariko si ko byagenze , abagabo babatemaguye tureba abagore na abana baradushorera batujyana ku Akanyaru .
Twamanutse ku Mugezi wa Akanyaru badukomera , maze bagafata abagore na abakobwa bakuze bakabambura ubusa babafata ku ngufu , amaso yanjye yabonye ibyo atakagombye kubona .
Aho ni ho mukuru wanjye Liliane yatanze amafaranga ngo batwambutse , tugira amahirwe tubasha kugaruka i Ntarama .
Kubera amagrenade baduteraga tukiri mu kiliziya umubyeyi wanjye za " " " " fragments " " " " zari zamufashe mu maso no ku maboko yacitse ibisebe .
Yasaga nka uwamaze kwakira urupfu ategereje isaha ye .
Ntibyatinze rero haje kuza igitero simusiga ku wa 30 Mata 1994 , maze batwiraramo baratemagura .
Ni bwo bishe mama umbyara ndetse na mukuru wanjye twakundanaga cyane .
Icyo gihe twari kumwe na murumuna wanjye wari muto kuko we yaronkaga ndetse na mukuru wanjye nakurikiraga wari wihishe ahatandukanye natwe gato .
Icyo gihe Interahamwe zaratuvumbuye mu rufunzo ziturasa amasasu menshi abo twari kumwe aho ni njye wavuyemo ndi muzima na murumuna wanjye waviriranaga kuko bari bamurashe ari mu gituza cya mama .
Njye baranyegereye ngo banteme , umugabo witwa Gasharankwanzi twari duturanye abonye ko abandi byarangiye aravuga " " " " tugende dukomeze , " " " " uwo munsi ndokoka ntyo .
Nga uko uko banyiciye mu maso abanjye nta cyaha bakoze .
Ni bwo natangiye kwitwa imfubyi .
Icyambabaje kurushaho ndetse gihora kinshengura umutima ni uko ntashoboye kubashyingura kuko isayo yabamize .
Nyuma ya aho ubuzima bwaranze dusigara twumva gupfa biturutira kubaho , ubuzima nari naravukiyemo sinari nzi ngo ibyo kurya biva he babishaka bate ku myaka umunani uwabwira umwana ngo natangire yibesheho anihishe atazi umuhiga ngo ni uwuhe byari bikomeye .
Uwo nakurikiraga yari afite imyaka 13 ni we wabaye mama , aba na Papa , mbese yabaye byose .
Yabaga ahetse murumuna wanjye wari wararasiwe mu gituza cya Mama .
Igisebe cye gitangira kubora kugera na aho tubona ko umwana agiye kudupfira mu ntoki kuko nta na icyo kurya twabonaga cyo kumuha .
Uko rero Inkotanyi zagendaga zirwana na abicanyi ari na ko zirokora abo zisanze bagihumeka , ubundi zikagira abo zitesha abicanyi bakirimo akuka , ni ko natwe twagiye kumva twumva ngo Inkotanyi zaje .
Twari mu rufunzo rw " " " " i Cyugaro muri Ntarama , twumva kurokoka ari nka inzozi , aho icyo wakwita kubaho twumvaga ari nko kubonekerwa .
Kubona Inkotanyi ni wo munezero twabonye uruta iyindi .
Mbega umunezero mbega amarira ya ibyishimo mbega kwiruhutsa ubwo twabakubitaga amaso .
Batubwiraga bati muhumure ntabwo mugipfuye .
Inkotanyi zaje zivura inkomere harimo na murumuna wanjye .
Njye ndibuka no kugenda byari byanze batwuriza imodoka njye na murumuna wanjye .
Tugeze i Nyamata baturamije amata ubuzima burongera buragaruka .
Twageze iwacu dusanga inzu yacu Interahamwe zarayitwitse .
Inkotanyi zaratugaburiye twari dushonje , zahetse abana bateshejwe ababyeyi , zaduhaye aho kuba , zivura indembe na inkomere , zidushakira icyo kwambara , mbese zakoze akazi kuzuyemo ibitangaza na ubumuntu bwinshi .
Ese ubu umuntu yazishimira ate ubundi ?
NKOTANYI mwarakozeee .
Babyeyi batwibarutse , za NKOTANYI mwakundaga zaduhaye UBUZIMA .
Zarakoze kundokora urupfu zo kabyara , zo gaheka !
Ndashimira Inkotanyi cyane zirangajwe imbere na Perezida Paul Kagame , bakoze uko bashoboye ngo turokoke Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 .
Abajenosideri na abimitse ingengabitekerezo ya amacakubiri nibirindwe nka icyorezo cyica .
U Rwanda ni igihugu gifite amahoro asesuye akaba ikiguzi kinini cyishyuwe na abari urubyiruko .
U Rwanda rworetswe na ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside , ivangura na amacakubiri .
Ingabo zari iza RPA zibohora u Rwanda , zihagarika Jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi mu 1994 , u Rwanda rwongera gutahwamo ituze na umutima wa u Rwanda wunga bene rwo .
Ntawe ukwiye kwifatanya na abishoye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 .
Mu Rwanda , urubyiruko ruri hejuru ya 60 % , nirwo rwibasirwa cyane na abashaka kuyobya intekerezo zabo cyane ko nabo bazi ko ari amaboko ya igihugu .
Ni ejo ha u Rwanda , ni amizero yo kuramuka kwarwo , ni abayobozi ba uyu munsi na ejo , ni ababyeyi ba u Rwanda , bakaba inkingi ya mwamba yarwo .
Ni mbaraga za u Rwanda , nibo bazabazwa u Rwanda .
Mu buzima ntawe utagira ikimwaro iyo atsinzwe , yewe na iyo ibyo atsinzwemo byari bibi , azongwa na ikimwaro .
Ni yo mpamvu na abahekuye u Rwanda , ubwo bishoroga muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 bifuza kugira uwo basangira icyo cyaha cya indengakamere .
Abakoze jenoside umubare munini bari urubyiruko , bimitse ingengabitekerezo ya jenoside na amacakubiri , maze mu 1994 bishora muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .
Ubu abo bose buzuye ikimwaro kimunga intekerezo zabo aho bari hose .
Iki kimwaro cyuzuye igisebo , bagiterwa na uko bishoye mu migambi mibisha , batsindwa na Inkotanyi zari mu Ngabo za RPA , zari zishamikiye ku Muryango wa FPR , kandi bari urubyiruko nkabo gusa bo bafite icyerekezo kizima na gahunda ihamye yo kubaka Igihugu .
Inkotanyi zabatsinze , zashyizeho inzego na ubuyobozi buhamye , zikuraho ubutegetsi bubi .
Ubwo bagarukaga ari abacengezi , mu gihe gito basanze Abanyarwanda basobetse ubumwe , maze batsindwa burundu , bajyana na ingengabitekerezo ya amacakubiri na jenoside .
Iyi niyo soko ya ikimwaro gikabije interahamwe na abagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bahorana .
Abakoze Jenoside na ababafasha bafite ikimwaro , intekerezo zicuramye zubakiye ku ngengabitekerezo ya Jenoside na amacakubiri ziracyimitswe ziracyaganje muri bo .
Baracyari abagaragu ba Hutu power , aho abahezanguni biyumvamo ubuhutu , bumva ko ari bo batura mu Rwanda bonyine kandi bakaruturamo nta Mututsi ururimo .
Iyi ngengabitekerezo ya Jenoside na amacakubiri ikomeje kuboneka muri bamwe mu Banyarwanda baba mu mahanga , harimo abakizererezwa na ikinyoma cya uko mu Rwanda nta mahoro ahari , ababaye mu muhanga ku bwo gushakira indamu na indonke mu kwiyita impunzi za politike na abakomeje kwihisha ubutabera kubera ko bavuye mu Rwanda baruhekuye .
Aha harimo kandi na abakomoka ku bagize urahare muri Jenoside , bakoreshwa na bene wabo ndetse na ababyeyi babo kugira ngo bakomeze bahakane , banapfobye Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 .
Abakoze Jenoside buzuye ikimwaro .
Imigambi mibisha yabo yo gushyira mu bikorwa ingengabitekerezo ya " " " " Hutu Power " " " " yaratsinzwe kubera ko Inkotanyi zahagaritse Jenoside , maze zigarura u Rwanda interahamwe zari zimaze kugira itongo .
