Interahamwe zatwaye Abanyarwanda mu nkambi zo muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo , zibafata bugwate , mu 1996 , Ingabo za u Rwanda zabohoje izo mpunzi maze zigarurwa mu Rwanda , zituzwa mu gihugu cyunga Abanyarwanda , cyifashishije Politike ya Ubumwe na Ubwiyunge ya Leta ya Ubumwe bwa Abanyarwanda .
Guhera muri Nyakanga 1994 , abagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 , bakurikiranywe na amategeko ya u Rwanda na amategeko mpuzamahanga , abatarafunzwe , bihishe mu mahanga , abandi baba mu mashyamba ya Congo , mu mitwe ya iterabwoba , bafite gahunda yo gukomeza umugambi mubisha wo kubuza amahoro u Rwanda .
Aba bose amajwi yabo bishe arabahamagara , bahungabanye intekerezo na roho , ntibariho , babayeho nabi .
Mu miterere ya muntu , abananiwe ubunyangamugayo , bakunda ko basangira umubabaro na ikimwaro na abandi ndetse na iyo babona utarafatanyije nabo mu bibi bakoze baba bumva waba umwe muri bo , bikarushaho kubanezeza cyane iyo nawe wakoze icyaha nka icyabo .
Abahakana , bakanapfobye Jenoside ntibakwiye ijambo .
Abakora Jenoside , bayikora , banateganya na uko bazayipfobya , bakanayihakana , niyo mpamvu abategetsi bayishoyemo umubare munini wa abayikora ku buryo hari na abibwiraga ko kubera ko ikozwe na abantu benshi amategeko atabakurikirana .
Ubu amategeko arabakurikiranye aho bari hose .
Hari abakiruka mu mashyamba , basaziyemo , hari abafunze basaziye muri Gereza , hari na abari mu mahanga , basaziyeyo , ariko icyaha bakoze cyo ntigisaza , bashaje nabi kubera ko ibiganza byabo birimo amaraso .
Bari kure ya imiryango bakomokamo , ababyaye ntibashobora kurera abana babo , abatarashyingiwe ntibazamenya icyanga cya ubukwe na ubuzima , ntibabona icyerekezo cya ubuzima .
Iminsi yabo ihora yijimye kubera ubuhemu bumunga umutima wabo , kwicuza bitagira igaruriro , ipfunwe no kwiyanga , kwifuza urupfu ntibarubone .
Imitima yabo yabaye akahebwe , ubuzima bwabo burangwa no gutekereza nabi bakarota nabi .
Abashakira ineza u Rwanda , ntibakwiye gutwaza aba barukarabankaba umutwaro wa icyaha bakoreye u Rwanda , ubwo bicaga inzirakarengane za Abatutsi .
Abakunzi ba u Rwanda ntibakwiye kuyobywa na abayobye ngo na bo bayobe ahari urumuri , rwacanywe na ubuyobozi bwiza bwunga .
Ntibakwiye gutekereza nabi ngo barote nabi , mu gihe hari isoko iva ku buyobozi buzira amacakubiri na ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside , ntibakwiye kuba ba bangamwabo , Igihugu kigabura amahoro na umutuzo gisendereye amahirwe .
Abato batari gito ba u Rwanda , ntibazahumwe na igihu kibazitira kureba imbere , ngo basaye mu macakubiri na ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside .
Nibiyambure abashaka kubagira abafatanyacyaha , babatoza guhakana no gupfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 , ngo bazaryozwe ibingana na ibyo abakoze jenoside , babazwa na itegeko .
Ni bime amatwi , ababyeyi gito bababibamo ivangura iryari ryo ryose .
Nibitandukanye na abimitse inabi yo guhemukira u Rwanda .
Ni biremere u Rwanda bazabamo , banezerewe , badashyamirana , basabana , bagabirana mu bufatanye .
Niko kuba umuntu .
Ineza niganze .
Byagenda gute kugira ngo umuntu agire umuryango ushoboye ?
Kugira umuryango bikomoka ku gushinga urugo .
Gushinga urugo rero ni urugendo umugabo na umugore batangirana , batabona neza aho bagana ariko muri urwo rugendo bakiyemeza gusangira byose : bahura na ibyiza , bagasangira ubudacuranwa , bahura na ibibi bagahozanya , bagafashanya bagakomeza urugendo .
Umuryango ushoboye ni urimo isangira buzima risesuye rya umugabo na umugore mu mibereho yabo , mu bikorwa mu bitekerezo , mu bibazo na ibisubizo byabo .
Aha nibutse ko umuryango utagizwe na umugabo na umugore gusa na ubwo aribo shingiro rya umuryango .
Kubera impamvu zitandukanye , mu muryango twibona muri ibi bice birindwi bya ingenzi birimo umuryango wa umugabo na umugore bakibana ( jeune couple ) , umuryango wa umugabo na umugore na abana , Umuryango wa umugabo na umugore babuze urubyaro , Umuryango wa umubyeyi urera abana wenyine ( uwabyariye iwabo ku mugabo umwe
cyangwa batandukanye . . . ) , Umuryango wa imfumbyi zirera , Umuryango wa umupfakazi ( incike cyangwa afite abana ) na Umuryango wa ababyeyi batakibana ( Divorcés ) .
Iterambere mu muryango
Ni ibikorwa bya muntu bigamije kumufasha kubaho neza uyu munsi ndetse na ejo hazaza he na ah abe .
Ibyo bikorwa bihera mu bitekerezo , bigashakirwa ubushobozi ubundi bigashyirwa mu bikorwa .
Inyungu ishobora kugaragara vuba cyangwa itinze ariko biba bitanga icyizere cyo kubaho neza muri ubu buzima .
Urugero , Iyo ababyeyi bumvikanye bakajyana umwana mu ishuri , icyo ni igikorwa cya iterambere rirambye .
Iyo abagize Umuryango bumvikanye bagashyira hamwe bakagura ikibanza , nyuma ya igihe runaka bakacyubaka , gitangira kwinjiza ubushobozi bushya mu muryango , hagamijwe kuzamura imibereho ya abagize umuryango ku buryo bwizewe .
Umuryango ushoboye ni uwuhe ?
Aha umuntu yakwibaza ati " " " " Umuryango ushoboye ni uwuhe ?
Ushoboye mu biki ? " " " "
Umuhanzi Niyo Bosco yigeze niwe waririmbye ati " " " " Ufite amahoro waba ukungahaye " " " " kandi ibi nibyo rwose .
Umuryango ushoboye ni ufite amahoro , ni ufite urukundo , ni uwateguwe neza kuva mu ntangiriro .
Abanyarwanda nibo bagira ati " " " " Akaburiye mu isiza ntikabonekera mu isakara . " " " "
Umuryango ushoboye ni uyobowe neza bityo abawugize bakagira ubwisanzure bwo gutanga umusanzu ukwiye kandi uri mu cyerecyezo rusange cya urugo rwabo .
Niyo mpamvu ku bwanjye umuryango ushoboye atari ufite za Miliyoni kuri konti gusa !
Si ufite amashuri menshi gusa .
Kuko ubutunzi atari bwo gusa butuma abagize umuryango babaho banezerewe .
Ijambo rya Imana riragira riti : " " " " Igaburo rya imboga za imbwija ririmo urukundo , riruta irya ikimasa riherekejwe na urwango " " " " ( reba Imigani 15 , 16 - 17 ) .
Uduke turasangirwa .
Gusa ariko na none umuryango ushoboye ntusigara mu iterambere rirambye kuko ahari ubwumvikane na urukundo ibindi biraharanirwa , bigashakwa kandi bikagerwaho .
Abashakanye bagomba guharanira gukora cyane kugira ngo babeho babesheho na ababo .
Nibyo rwose , nka uko bizwi , duhamagarirwa gukora neza kandi cyane kugira ngo tuzasige Isi ari nziza kurusha uko twayisanze .
Ibiranga Umuryango ufite iterambere rirambye
Umuryango ufite iterambere rirambye ugaragazwa na ibintu bikurikira : Nta nzara ( Nta mirire mibi , nta ndwara . . . ) , nta makimbirane , nta bwikubire ku mitungo , uhari ucungwa neza .
Imishinga rusange yo guteza umuryango imbere yumvikanwaho kandi igashyirwa mu bikorwa .
Abana barazigamirwa ( Bubaka ejo heza habo na abana babo ) .
Abana bariga kandi heza bitewe na ubushobozi .
Abagize umuryango bose bagira ubwishingizi bwa ubuzima , basengera hamwe mu bwisanzure na ubwubahane igihe badahuje imyemerere .
Ijambo rya Imana riragira riti " " " " Hahirwa abashakanye bakunda Imana kandi nabo bakundana . " " " "
Abagize umuryango birinda kwishora mu bidafite akamaro , ntibabyara abo badashoboye kurera .
Kugira ngo umuntu agire Umuryango ushoboye , agomba kuwutegura kare kandi agaharanira kubigeraho , aka wa mugani ugira uti " " " " Uzi icyo ashaka , ntafata icyo abonye ahubwo aragiharanira . " " " "
Burya ubushobozi burubakwa .
Niba umusingi urugo rwubakiyeho udakomeye nta cyizere ko ibihe bya imihengeri bizasiga rugihagaze .
Ikindi gituma umuryango utera imbere ni ukugira umuco mwiza wo gusigasira ibyiza bagezeho .
no guhanga udushya twubaka mu nguni zose za ubuzima mu muryango .
Umuryango ushoboye ni uwubakiye ku Mana no kugushaka kwayo .
Ijambo rya Imana riragira riti " " " " Erega buriya niba Uhoraho atari we wubatse inzu , ba nyira inzu baba bagokera ubusa .
Niba Uhoraho atari we urinze umugi , abanyezamu bawo baba bagokera ubusa " " " " ( reba Zab 127 , 1 ) .
Umuryango ushoboye kandi utekanye ni ryo shema ryacu .
Ni wo musingi shingiro uzatugeza ku iterambere rirambye .
Gusubika CHOGM si igihombo ku Rwanda !
Ijoro rya uwa Gatanu ushize , nta kabuza ko hari benshi ryasize batagohetse batekereza ku gihombo basigiwe na imyiteguro bakoze bategereje inama ihuza abakuru ba ibihugu na za Guverinoma bo muri Commonwealth , yari iteganyijwe kubera mu Rwanda muri Kamena uyu mwaka .
Isubikwa rya iyi nama ku nshuro ya kabiri , ryaje ari inkuru itanyura amatwi ya benshi dore ko nka abashoramari , yari amahirwe akomeye yo kongera kubyutsa umutwe nyuma ya umwaka urenga ubucuruzi bwabo buguye hasi kubera ingaruka za icyorezo cya COVID - 19 .
No ku batari abashoramari kandi , byari amahirwe akomeye kuko burya iyo mugenzi wawe yariye , iyo yungutse mu buryo bumwe cyangwa ubundi nawe uba wungutse .
Hari abo nabonye bishimira ko iyo nama itakibaye , kandi ugasanga harimo na Abanyarwanda , ariko abo nabo nta kibazo , ba bangamwabo bahozeho kandi bazahoraho !
Hari abandi nakwita ko batekereza hafi , bishimiye ko inama isubitswe kuko ngo ingamba zari zarafashwe zo kwirinda icyorezo no gusigasira umutekano ngo iyo nama ibe mu mutuzo , ngo zababangamiye !
Abo nabo bahozeho , wenda ntibarabona aho umutekano wabuze uko biba bimeze cyangwa se barabyirengiza .
Igishimishije ni uko mu itangazo risubika iyo nama , hagaragajwe impamvu kandi yumvikana , ko inama isubitswe kubera icyorezo cya COVID - 19 gikomeje gukaza umurego .
Ukurikije aho imyiteguro yari igeze , birumvikana ko ku mpande zombi , haba u Rwanda na Ubunyamabanga bwa Commonwealth , byagoranye gufata icyemezo nka icyo cyo gusubika inama ibura ukwezi kumwe ngo ibe , nyuma ya iminsi batangaza ko nta gisibya izaba .
Perezida Paul Kagame yabigarutseho mu itangazo ryasohowe na Commonwealth , ati " " " " Umwanzuro wo gusubika iyi nama ku nshuro ya kabiri ntabwo wafashwe mu buryo bworoshye .
Ubuzima na imibereho myiza ya abaturage ba Commonwealth ni ingenzi muri ibi bihe bikomeye .
Duhaye ikaze umuryango mugari wa Commonwealth i Kigali mu gihe nyacyo . " " " "
CHOGM ntiyahagaritswe , yarasubitswe igihe icyorezo kizacogorera izaba kandi izabera i Kigali .
Ariko icyo si cyo kibazo , ahubwo ikibazo ni abatumva neza impamvu yo gusubikwa kwayo na inyungu u Rwanda rubifitemo kurusha igihombo .
Hirya no hino ku Isi hari kuvugwa ubwoko bushya bwa COVID - 19 kandi bwandura vuba kurusha ubusanzwe ku buryo na ibihugu byitwa ko byishoboye , ibyinshi byatangiye kudagadwa ko nta gikozwe bishobora kwisanga mu nkundura mbi ya icyorezo nka iyabayeho mu gihembwe cya mbere na icya kabiri cya umwaka ushize .
Ubwoko bushya bwa COVID - 19 buhangayikishije Isi cyane , ni ubwagaragaye mu Bwongereza ( buzwi nka B . 1 . 1 . 7 ) , ubwagaragaye muri Afurika ya Epfo ( B . 1 . 351 ) na uburi guca ibintu mu Buhinde ( B . 1 . 617 . 2 ) .
Ibi bihugu byose uko ari bitatu , ni abanyamuryango ba Commonwealth , bivuze ko hari abashyitsi runaka batari bake bagombaga kubiturukamo bitabiriye inama mu Rwanda .
Kugeza ubu uretse ubwoko bwo muri Afurika ya Epfo na ubwo mu Bwongereza bwabonetse mu Rwanda muri Werurwe , nta bundi burahaboneka .
Bumaze kuhaboneka , Minisiteri ya Ubuzima yahumurije Abanyarwanda ko ababonetseho ubwoko bushya batahuriwe ku Kibuga cya Indege bagahita bashyirwa ahantu hihariye , bivuze ko nta byago byo kubukwirakwiza mu baturage byari bihari .
Ni nako byagenze kuko iyo buza gukwirakwira , twari kuba tuvuga inkuru itandukanye na iyi uyu munsi !
Nubwo kwipimisha COVID - 19 byari kuba ingenzi cyane ku bazitabira inama ya CHOGM , ntabwo ubwabyo ari urukingo rwa uko nta wakwinjiza bumwe muri ubwo bwoko bushya bwa COVID - 19 mu gihugu , kuko kugeza na ubu hari abashobora kwandura ntibagaragaze ibimenyetso ariko bakanduza .
Ikindi ni uko umuntu ashobora no kuyandura ari mu ndege yaraye yipimishije .
Ikindi kandi , si ibihugu byose bifite ubushobozi bwo kubona ubwo bwoko bwose bushya bwa COVID - 19 .
Ngaho mwibaze hagize umwe , babiri , batatu cyangwe benshi binjirana iyo virusi yandura mu buryo bwihuse , ikagera mu Rwanda mu gihugu gituwe na abasaga miliyoni 12 , kikaba mu bya mbere bifite ubucucike bukabije ku Isi ?
Ibikomere bya Guma mu rugo yamaze hafi amezi abiri umwaka ushize , biracyari bibisi mu buzima na imitima bya abanyarwanda benshi , ese ni nde wakwifuza ko ubuzima bwongera gufungwa kuriya , tukongera gufungirwa mu nzu ntawe utarabuka , ntawe usura mugenzi we , ntawe ukora ubukwe kubera gusa kurangamira amadolari ya abanyamahanga azakomeza
gukenerwa na nyuma ya icyorezo ?
Na ibihugu byishoboye birabogoza .
Nka u Buhinde bwa gatatu mu bukungu ku Isi , kuri iki Cyumweru bwatangaje ko abantu ibihumbi 400 ( Akarere kose ko mu Rwanda ) banduye Covid - 19 , mu gihe abandi bagera ku bihumbi bine ( Akagari ko mu Rwanda ) bapfuye mu masaha 24 gusa .
Ikirenzeho , ni uko ubushakashatsi butaragaragaza neza ubushobozi bwa inkingo zimaze gukorwa mu guhangana na ubu bwoko bushya bwa icyorezo .
Gusa na iyo bwaboneka , ntacyo byafasha cyane ku Rwanda rumaze gukingira ibihumbi 300 muri miliyoni 12 .
Urukingo rwa mbere ni ukwirinda .
Niba u Buhinde bwananiwe kugenzura icyorezo na ubushobozi bufite , u Bwongereza bukaba bwahangayitse buri mu bihugu byihagazeho , byagenda bite mu gihe ubwoko bushya nka ubwo bwandura ku kigero cyo hejuru , bwaba bugeze mu gihugu nka u Rwanda ?
Igisubizo cyonyine gishoboka ni Guma mu rugo .
Bibayeho ko mu Rwanda handura abantu ibihumbi 400 ku munsi , bivuze ko mu kwezi kumwe igihugu cyose cyaba cyanduye Covid - 19 .
Amavuriro yose yafunga imiryango mu kuvura izindi ndwara akita gusa ku barwayi ba Covid - 19 , abakozi bita ku barwayi baba ingume abapfa bakiyongera , imiti na ibikoresho byo kwa muganga byabura , ubucuruzi bwahagarara , ubuzima bwaba bubi kurusha Guma mu rugo twabonye ubushize , ya madolari yo muri CHOGM ntacyo yaba
akitumariye .
Aho kwirukira amafaranga na inyungu za ubukungu cyangwa ibindi mu nama nka CHOGM izitabirwa na abarenga ibihumbi umunani ukirengagiza ubuzima , bwa miliyoni 12 ( ubwo ntidushyizemo ibyago ku bakwitabira inama na isura ya igihugu ) , ubuyobozi bwafashe icyemezo cyiza cyo kuyisubika kuko umugani
wa Umuvugizi wa Polisi ya u Rwanda CP John Bosco Kabera " " " " Iminsi mikuru na Noheli bizahoraho , " " " " nakongeraho nti " " " " Inama zizahoraho " " " " ariko twe tubaho rimwe , iyo upfuye cyangwa umugaye biba birangiye .
Icyo kwishimira ni uko ibikorwa remezo byubatswe mu kwitegura CHOGM ntaho byagiye , imihanda yubatswe Abanyarwanda bazakomeza kuyikoresha mu nyungu zabo , hoteli zubatswe zizakomeza gukoreshwa , amatungo tworoye na imyaka twahinze twanabigurisha ahandi , igihombo si cyinshi nka inyungu iyo amahitamo ari " " " " urupfu
cyangwa ubuzima . " " " "
Byaba byiza kurindira icyorezo kikagenza make inama ikazaba mu mutuzo aho gushyuhaguzwa bikarangira duhiye .
Erega na abo banyamahanga nta bwisanzure bagira mu gihe baza bazi ko hanze icyorezo kimeze nabi .

Dobbs na Wrong , intumwa za abashaka kugena ahazaza ha u Rwanda zifashishije The Washington Post .
Hari igihe cyageze umuntu agatekereza ko abagize Umuryango Mpuzamahanga bose bumva kimwe ibyabaye mu Rwanda mu 1994 ndetse bafite ubushake na umuhate wo kwemera uruhare rwabo muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .
Byagaragaye mu mbwirwaruhame Perezida Bill Clinton yavuze tariki 25 Werurwe 1998 ubwo yasuraga u Rwanda .
Mu mbwirwaruhame ye , yavuze ko kwemera uruhare no kurwanya ihakana rya Jenoside bigiye kujya muri politiki mpuzamahanga ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika , natwe kandi ni uko twatekerezaga .
Nyuma yo gusoma inyandiko ya Michael Dobbs agira ati " " " " Hea s been hailed as Rwandaa s hero .
But is he really his countrya s villain ? " " " "
( Yakunze gufatwa nka intwari ya u Rwanda , ariko se ahubwo siwe mugome wa igihugu cye ? )
inyandiko ishimagiza igitabo cya Michela Wrong " " " " Do not Disturb , " " " " bigaragara ko icyita rusange ari kimwe mu buryo Guverinoma ya u Bwongereza na iya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zifatamo Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ndetse uburyo itangazamakuru ryabo rishimagiza icyo gitabo ni bumwe , ni ubwo guhakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi .
Dobbs mu nyandiko ye , nta banga bigaragara ko hari impamvu za politiki zimuri inyuma mu guhindura amateka nyayo ya u Rwanda .
Mu gushaka guhindura amateka ya u Rwanda , Dobbs arivugira ati " " " " Ubashije kugena ahahise , ni na we ugena ahazaza kandi ubashije kugena uyu munsi , ni nawe uba ugena ahahise . " " " "
Nta gushidikanya Dobbs yahishuye intego yo guhakana Jenoside bikorwa na izi Guverinoma na ibinyamakuru byabo , bagamije " " " " kugena ahazaza ha u Rwanda . " " " "
Ibi bashaka kubigeraho bahindura amateka Abanyarwanda banyuzemo .
Babona ko amateka ya Abanyarwanda ari ikibazo gikomeye ku mugambi wabo wo guhindura ubutegetsi , ibintu bakomeje kugerageza kenshi bitwikiriye umutaka wa demokarasi na uburenganzira bwa muntu .
Mu bigaragara , Dobbs na Wrong bizeye ubufasha bwuzuye bwa Guverinoma zabo mu mugambi bamaze igihe bamamaza .
Gusa umuntu yakwibaza ngo , uzabasha ute kugenzura uko wishakiye abantu bafite amateka yubakiye ku buhamya bwa abarokotse , imyanzuro ya inkiko , ubushakashatsi bwa abahanga aho kuba ku bushake na politiki bya Kagame nkuko Dobbs na Wrong babyibwira ?
Mu myaka 23 ishize , ubwo ibimenyetso bya amahano ya ibyari bimaze kuba mu maso ya Umuryango wa Abibumbye byari bikiri byose , na Perezida wa igihugu gikomeye nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ntiyatinyutse guhakana ko habaye Jenoside nkuko Dobbs na Wrong babitinyuka uyu munsi .
Bibwira ahari ko abantu bibagiwe .
Icyo gihe Bill Clinton yagize ati " " " " Ni ibya ingenzi ko isi imenya ko ubu bwicanyi butaje kubwa impanuka . . . . ni ibintu byaturutse kuri politiki yari igamije kurimbura imbaga . " " " "
Icyo gihe Amerika yakoresheje ijwi ryayo rikomeye mu kwamagana umugambi wa abari barateguye Jenoside bashakaga guhunga uruhare rwabo bahakana amahano bakoze , bavuga ko Jenoside yatewe na umujinya wa Abahutu watewe no kubura Perezida bakundaga , kandi ko ngo Guverinoma yakoze Jenoside nta bubasha yari ifite bwo kubihagarika .
Icyo gihe Clinton yagize ati " " " " Ubugizi bwa nabi bwarateguwe , ibinyamakuru byuzuzwa urwango , Abatutsi bagirwa ibitambo bya ibibazo u Rwanda rwari rufite , babima uburenganzira bwo kubaho . . . Urutonde rwa abagombaga kwicwa , izina ku rindi byari byarateguwe mbere . " " " "
Ntaho Clinton yigeze avuga ko guhanurwa kwa indege ariyo nyirabayazana wo kurimbura Abatutsi .
Nyamara uyu munsi , ibinyamakuru bikomeye muri Amerika no mu Bwongereza biri guha rugari Dobbs na Wrong ngo bamamaze ubwiregure bwa abajenosideri ari nako biha gusobanura Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi uko itari .
Wrong arihandagaza akavuga ko Abahutu bari bafite ubwoba bwa umutekano wabo , ngo ko aribyo byatumye abatutsi basaga miliyoni bicwa , abagore , abana .
Ati " " " " Niba gahunda yari nutica nawe uricwa , ni ikintu twese twakumva . " " " "
Mu gukora ibi , ibimenyetso na ubushakashatsi bya abahanga birirengagizwa muri izi nyandiko kugira ngo bihe imbaraga guhakana kwa Wrong .
Hirengagizwa kandi ubushakashatsi bushingiye ku bimenyetso na imyanzuro ya inkiko ku ihanurwa rya indege .
Niba rero uyu atari umugambi wihishe unyuzwa mu itangazamakuru mu kumvikanisha uruhande rwa ibi bihugu bibiri bikomeye , ubwo sinzi ukundi twabyita .
Bagamije gukwirakwiza andi mateka ya u Rwanda , aho ba bantu batereranye Abanyarwanda mu myaka 27 ishize aribo bagaruka bagahakana ishingiro rya intwari zatabaye u Rwanda zikarubuza kuzimira .
Ni nko kuvuga bati " " " " Niba atari twe ntwari , tuzahimba andi mateka yacu twifashishe itangazamakuru ryacu mu kuyamenyekanisha . " " " "
Igitabo cya Wrong kigaragazwa nka igishingiye ku iperereza ku iyicwa rya Karegeya , umugabo avuga ko yari afite uruhu " " " " runyerera nka ubuki , " " " " nyamara urebye neza intego ya icyo gitabo irenze kure ibyo .
Arihandagaza agasaba ko u Rwanda ruhabwa akato mu mahanga ariko nta shingiro bifite .
U Rwanda ntabwo ari u Rwanda kuko Abanyaburayi baruhanze .
Nta na ubwo ruzarekera aho kubaho kuko abaterankunga basomye igitabo cya Wrong .
Kwikeka amababa kwa Wrong
Mu iyigantekerezo ( psychology ) , kwikeka amababa bisobanurwa nko " " " " gufata ibyiyumviro udashaka cyangwa se imyitwarire utishimiye , ukabitwerera undi muntu . " " " "
Nibyo Wrong akora . Urugero ashimangira uburyo ubwicanyi bwasembuwe na iyicwa rya Perezida wa Umuhutu .
Mbere na mbere , kubigenza gutya bimufasha kwandagaza abo ashaka guhuza na ubwo bwicanyi .
Icya kabiri , bimufasha kwinjira mu ngengabitekerezo ya abahezanguni ba Abahutu , biyamuruyeho uruhare rwo gutegura no gushyira mu bikorwa Jenoside .
Icya gatatu ari nacyo cya ingenzi , yabyifashishije mu gushyashyariza ko ngo u Rwanda " " " " ari nka ikirunga cyubakiye ku moko gitegereje guturika " " " " nkuko na Dobbs abivuga mu nkuru ye ishimagiza igitabo cya Wrong , nta sesengura na mba bashingiyeho .
Usibye muri Leta yari yaramunzwe na urwango rwibasiye Abatutsi , ivangura no kubatesha agaciro , nta handi Wrong yabeshyeshya ubuhanuzi bwe ko hari ikirunga kigiye guturika .
Muri Leta idashingira ku moko , aho Guverinoma irajwe ishinga no kubaka igihugu gishingiye ku bumwe , aho Abanyarwanda basanzwe bemeza ko Guverinoma yabo ishishikajwe na imibereho myiza na iterambere nta vangura iryo ari ryo ryose nka ibyaranze Leta zayibanjirije , aho kandi ibitero bya imitwe yitwaje intwaro bidakurikirwa no kwibasira igice
kimwe cya abaturage , nta shingiro na mba Wrong afite mu kuvuga gutyo .
Mu gihe urubyiruko rwa u Rwanda rurimo abarokotse bari abana mu 1994 , abana ba abarokotse ndetse na abana ba abagize uruhare muri Jenoside batahiriza umugozi umwe mu kwibuka biyemeza gushimangira ubumwe bwabo , abanyamakuru ba abanyaburayi bo barajwe ishinga no guhanurira u Rwanda ibibi , birengagiza ahubwo ibibi byugarijwe sosiyete bo
ubwabo baturukamo .
Ukwivana mu muryango wa Ubumwe bwa Uburayi ka u Bwongereza ( Brexit ) , imyigaragambyo ya abahezanguni , imvururu ku Nteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Amerika , ni bimwe mu bikorwa bigaragaraza ko ahubwo aribo bari mu bibazo bishingiye ku moko ( ukwishyira hejuru kwa abazungu ) bishobora guturika isaha na isaha .
Niba ubuhanuzi bwa Dobby na Wrong atari ukwikeka amababa , wavuga ko ari iki kindi ?
Birushaho kuba agahomamunwa noneho aho abo banyamakuru ba Abanyamerika na Abongereza , bashinja u Rwanda kwiba ibindi bihugu .
Ni ibintu bakora bagamije gutesha agaciro impamvu nyayo yatumye ingabo za u Rwanda zijya muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo .
Kuri iki kibazo , Bill Clinton hari ikintu gikomeye yabwiye Abanyarwanda mu mbwirwaruhame ye yo mu 1998 .
Yagize ati " " " " Ntabwo twakabaye twaremeye ko inkambi za impunzi ziba ubwihisho bwa abicanyi [ . . . ] Mu majyaruguru ashyira Uburengerazuba bwa Igihugu cyanyu , ibitero bya abagize uruhare mu bwicanyi mu 1994 biracyakomeje kugeza na uyu munsi . " " " "
Niba u Bwongereza , Guverinoma za Amerika na ibinyamakuru byabo badafite ikibazo cyo kwibagirwa , bakabaye bongera gusoma imbwirwaruhame ya Clinton wenda byabafasha .
Nibwo bafata igitabo cya Wrong uko kiri , bakabona ko Wrong ari indyarya ya umubeshyi , umuhakanyi wa Jenoside utakabaye ahabwa urubuga mu binyamakuru byo mu bihugu byateye imbere .
Ibihugu byateye imbere ntabwo byakabaye bikomeza gutesha umutwe abaturage barajwe ishinga no gukoresha uburenganzira bwabo ngo babeho ubuzima bubabereye .
Niba hari ukeneye gutabarwa , ntabwo ari Abanyarwanda .
Ibintu byo kwikeka amababa ukayatwerera abandi bikwiriye guhagarara .
Ivumburamatsiko ku mibereho ya Igisiga cyitwa Samusure
U Rwanda uwavuga ko ari igihugu cyatatswe ibyiza na Rurema ntabwo yaba akabije .
Nawe se reba imisozi myiza , imirambi , ibirunga , ibiyaga , inzuzi na imigezi , ibibaya na amashyamba kimeza ahantu hose na ibindi byiza nyaburanga bitandukanye .
Ntabwo ari ibyo gusa ahubwo iki gihugu gifite amoko menshi atandukanye ya ibiguruka harimo ibisiga , inyoni , ibinyugunyugu , amavubi , inzuki na ibindi .
Buriya inyoni na ibisiga tubona mu kirere biguruka na ibyo tutabasha kubona kuko tudakunze gusura aho byibera kuko hari ibiba mu mashyamba kimeza , ibiba mu bishanga na ahandi , ariko burya buri bwoko buba bufite umwihariko mu miterere na imibereho yabwo ya buri munsi .
Uwavuga igisiga cyitwa Samusure nubwo waba utakiziho byinshi ariko hari amakuru yacyo azwi .
Abana bato bakunda kukibaza niba bazapfa cyangwa bazarama .
Iyo kirebye hejuru abana barishima bavuga ko bazarama ariko iyo kirebye hasi barababara ngo bazapfa .
Iki gisiga gifite amababa hafi ya yose ajya gusa na umukara uretse ko agira uturongo twa umweru ku mirizo .
Amaguru ya Samusure ni umweru kandi iyo iguruka ubona utubara twa umweru mu mababa .
Samusure ya ingore rimwe na rimwe ishobobora kugira amaguru ahinduka ikigina bigaterwa na imyaka iba igezemo .
Ubusanzwe Samusure bayita Samusure wa Rusunzu bitewe na isunzu riri ku mutwe wayo .
Ingabo na ingore zose zigira isunzu uretse ko irya ingore riba ari rito .
Amaso ya Samusure aba ari umuhondo wa zahabu .
Iyo Samusure ikiri nto iba ijya gusa na igisiga gikuze ariko amababa ya intoya aba atijimye cyane kandi na isunzu riba ari rigufi .
Igisiga cya Samusure gishobora kugira uburebure buri hagati ya santimetero 53 - 58 .
Ingabo ishobora gupima uburemere buri hagati ya garama 912 na kilogarama 1 . 3 , naho ingore igapima kilogarama ziri hagati ya 1 . 3 na 1 . 5 .
Ubusanzwe igisiga cya Samusure ntigikunda kugenda kiguruka mu gihe kirimo guhiga , ahubwo kijya ahantu hamwe kigatuza ubundi cyabona umuhigo kikamanuka kikawucakira .
Samusure ikunda kurya imbeba , utunyoni duto , imiserebanya , ibiburangoro na amafi , uretse ko kandi ishobora no kurya inkeri na imizabibu byo ku gasozi .
Imyororokere ya Samusure
Samusure ya ingabo na iy ingore zikora umuryango urangwa no kudacana inyuma kandi igihe icyo ari cyo cyose mu mwaka iyo zibishatse zitera amagi .
Iyo zishatse gutera amagi zubaka icyari hejuru mu giti hagati ya metero 7 - 45 uvuye ku butaka .
Iyo ingore imaze kubangurirwa itera amagi nibura abiri cyangwa igi rimwe .
Ingore yonyine ni yo igira uruhare mu kurarira ariko muri icyo gihe ingabo ni yo ifata inshingano zo kuyigaburira .
Gusa rimwe na rimwe ingore ishobora kujya gushaka ibyo kurya .
Igihe cyo kurarira ni iminsi 42 .
Igitangaje ni uko iyo yateye amagi abiri igihe cyo guturaga igi rimwe na irindi kiba kirimo ikinyuranyo cya iminsi 15 .
Umushwi cyangwa imishwi iba imaze gukura mu minsi 53 ariko ikagumana na ababyeyi bayo hagati ya amezi abiri cyangwa atatu kugira ngo ibone kwigenga .
Ibisiga bya Samusure bikuze nubwo bidafite ibindi bikunda kubirya ariko imishwi yazo iyo ikiri mu cyari inkende zirayirya .
Ntabwo ari ibyo gusa kuko na amagi ya Samusure hari ubwoko bwa injangwe zo ku gasozi zikunda kuyarya .
Aba ubukwe na imodoka nituve mu mikino byarahindutse - erega isuku igira isoko
Mu nama ya Komite Nyobozi yaguye ya Umuryango FPR - Inkotanyi yabereye ku cyicaro cyawo i Rusororo mu Intare Arena , Chairman wa Umuryango akaba na Umukuru wa Igihugu Paul Kagame yahavugiye byinshi byiza , harimo na ibikomeye .
Nifuje ko tugaruka ku ngingo ya imyitwarire yacu nka Abanyarwanda muri rusange , ariko duhereye ku byo yavuze ku bageni bajyanywe muri stade .
Nyuma yo kwisegura ku baba barabangamiwe , ndetse na aba bakibangamiwe na ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya ingamba zo kurwanya COVID - 19 , yagize ati ubonye ngo batubaze ukuntu dutinyuka gufata abageni , aho kwibaza ukuntu abageni batinyutse kwica amategeko !
Ngaho rero mwe mwese abibwiraga maye ko na Umukuru wa Igihugu atashyigikira ifatwa rya abageni ubwo mwariyumviye .
Maze kubyumva nibajije ukuntu Umuvugizi wa Polisi CP Kabera John Bosco na bagenzi be bishimiye ririya jambo .
Kuko bari barikeneye pe !
Dukurikije ukuntu byavuzwe hanze aha batukwa na benshi , bazira ko ngo biriya byari agahomamunwa ku buryo buteje igihugu isoni , Polisi yari ikeneye ubuvugizi bukomeye buyirengera ku mugaragaro .
Ni uko rero ubuvugizi mwarabubonye buhamye Polisi mwe , kandi twizere ko iryo joro mwiguriye kamwe .
Maze byari binakwiye rwose .
Perezida Kagame ntari ku ruhande rwa abatubahiriza amategeko
Ahubwo nyuma ya ririya jambo sindumva imvugo nshya yakurikiyeho mu bibwiraga ko Umukuru wa Igihugu ari ku ruhande rwabo .
Uruhande rwo gushyira mu bikorwa itegeko hakurikijwe imyambaririre , imyanya , imyato , na ibindi nka ibyo .
Ntabwo muri kumwe , mwihangane .
Erega igikuba cyari cyacitse !
Ngo yewe abageni barajwe muri stade bavutswa umunezero wuzuye na uburenganzira bagahawe na umunsi umwe wa amateka mu buzima bwabo .
Bati rwose buriya amafoto nka ariya ya agatimba ko mu byicaro bya abafana ba ruhago bazajya bayasobanura bate , abandi ngo bazabwira iki abana babo ?
Ngo aho kuba bagiye mu ijoro rya buki , ahubwo barajwe rwantambi .
Ngo twari tuzi ko abageni ari abadahangarwa .
Ayinya !
Na uko abandi ndetse bakanavuga ko ngo Polisi yagiye cyera kubusa ariko noneho akayo gashobotse .
Ngo rwose ntabwo biri bubahire .
Abamaganaga igikorwa nubwo bataburagamo nka umwe ubibutsa ko amategeko atarobanura , bene uwo baramubwiraga ngo rahira ko noneho ibukuru batari bubahitane babaziza " " " " kuba ba ruharwa . " " " "
Sinzi ngo iyo Polisi ya Igihugu iza kuba igira impuhwe na umutima wa kimuntu ntiyagafashe abageni ngo ibaraze hanze mu mbeho ya stade bahanye intera , kandi ngo iryo joro ryakabaye iryabo rya mbere ryo kuryamana begeranye .
Polisi yo si uko yabibonaga , muyibabarire .
Covid - 19 ntabwo irobanura ku butoni .
Yo iraguterura ikakwesa , uwo waba uriwe wese .
Ese ni kuki ibyo Abapolisi babizi kuturusha ?

Nyoni nyinshi we !
Gukosa kenshi tudahanwa bimaze kuturemaza !
Ngaho nimureke twibukiranye , ubwo wenda bishoboka ko kwibagirwa bibaho .

Igira iti : " " " " Imvugo ni yo ngiro . " " " "
Ubwo se koko harya tugiye kuzajya turenga ku mabwiriza ( yashyiriweho gufasha twebwe ubwacu mbere na mbere ) kenshi tudafatwa , maze rimwe nidufatwa twisararange twibaza impamvu na iryo rimwe dufashwe ?
Cyera mu mategeko ya umuhanda habagamo guhanirwa icyaha cya agasuzuguro .
Ibi ndumva na byo byenda gusa na ibyo , ku buryo uwaduhanira agasuzuguro yaba ataturenganyije .
Ni gute twumva ko ubuyobozi bwa igihugu bwashyizeho amategeko cyangwa amabwiriza , yubahirizwa na ubishatse gusa , ariko utabishatse ntayubahirize .
Nkaho ari ntacyabaye ra ?

Aba polisi baduca amande mu mihanda basigaye babyihutisha
Ku munsi ukurikiye wa Kane 22 - 04 - 2021 tugaruka tugeze Kavumu , Inyanza , Traffic Police baraduhagarika .
Ubwo ariko nari naregeje , agapfukamunwa namanuye .
Ibya uko kutakambara , cyangwa kukambara nabi bihanwa na amategeko , narabyumvaga gusa , ariko byari bitarambaho .
Umunsi wari wageze sinabimenya .
Kandi nari nasenze ( nari nasubijwe , Imana yambwiye kwitwararika amategeko sinabyumva ) .
Umupolisi ati ko utambaye agapfukamunwa ?
Inti disi umbabarire nari narushye .
Ati ndabiguhanira , mbanza kugirango arakina .
Umushoferi abonye ko bikomeye ati rwose watubabariye ko na ejo camera yari yadufashe .
Umupolisi ati nimwigendere byarangiye .
Nashimye nibura ko byihuse .
Ariko amande ubwo yo aba ariyongere , 25 . 000 Frw .
Igiteranyo ni 50 . 000 Frw .
Igitero ni cya kindi cya satani kuri bamwe basenga bakanabibona gutyo .
Nanjye ndasenga ariko si uko mbibona .
Nararangaye .
Amande nayishyuye ubukererwe butarinjiramo ngo ibihumbi makumyabiri byongerweho .
Ngayo nguko .
Aba ubukwe na imodoka twisubireho birakomeye
Umva rero nimureke aba ubukwe na imodoka twisubireho , tuve mu mikino .
Ntabwo twakwishimira ndetse tukanaterwa ishema no kuba dufite igihugu kigendera ku mategeko , ni byiza cyane , maze ngo twibagirwe ko ibyo tubikesha urwego rwa Polisi ya Igihugu itajenjeka , nka abashinzwe iyubahirizwa rya amategeko .
Ni mu nyungu zacu kugira Polisi ikanira , na yo kandi ubwayo irikanira , bigatuma irangwa na ikinyabupfura .
Wari uzi ko buri mwaka birukana mu Gipolisi abagera kuri 400 , bazira imyitwarire idahwitse ?
Umva ukuri : Polisi na iy Igihugu cyawe nanjye .
Ubuyobozi bwa Igihugu budutoza kubahiriza amategeko tuba twarishyiriyeho ari byo bibereye u Rwanda .
Ibyo rero ubwo byari bimaze gufata kandi bikaba binaryoshye , iki ni igihe cyo gukataza , si icyo kuregeza .
Umva ukuri : Ntabwo Polisi ari iya CP Kabera John Bosco , yemwe nta na ubwo ari iya IGP Dan Munyuza .
Umwe ni Umuvugizi undi akaba Umuyobozi Mukuru , ba Polisi ya u Rwanda .
Burya abavuga ko ngo isuku igira isoko , na amata agira gitereka , baba bavuga ko icyiza cyose kigira inkomoko nzima .
Maze nidukunda u Rwanda tukarwizihirirwamo , mu mahoro , isuku , umutekano mu mihanda no mu makaritsiye , imbaraga turwanyisha Covid - 19 na ubudasa bundi buturanga , tujye tumenya inzego za igihugu tubikesha .
Rumwe muri zo ni Polisi ya Igihugu .
Ubufatanye tubagomba na ikinyabupfura ibihe byose .
Byose ni mu nyungu zawe nanjye ku giti cyacu , mbere yo kuba iza u Rwanda rwacu muri rusange .
Urubyiruko ; igitambo cya ibisahiranda bitifuza ejo hazaza , amaraso yabo akaba ikiguzi cyo kwinezeza ku babashutse
Ku isi hose , urubyiruko ni imbaraga za Igihugu .
Iyo rurezwe neza rugahabwa ubushobozi na ubumenyi , rugira uruhare runini mu kuzamura iterambere rya Igihugu ku buryo bwihuse .
Iyo ruyobejwe rugahabwa amatiku asenya , ni mu gihe gito rukaba rusenye igihugu kigasigara ari umuyonga .
Niyo mpamvu ugiye kugira icyo akora cyose , urubyiruko nirwo ashyira imbere .
Mu bashyize imbere politiki zidafatika , barushyira imbere ngo barwungukireho , bakarwinjiza mu ntambara za urudaca , akenshi bakabikora barubeshya ko bashaka kuvanaho ubutegetsi ngo barwubakire ejo hazaza , byahe byo kajya !
Iyo urubyiruko rubyemeye nta gushishoza , akenshi rwiroha muri izo ntambara rutazi imvo na imvano zayo .
Abarushoyemo biruka muri bampatsibihugu basaba inkunga zo kugura intwaro na ibindi bikenerwa mu ntambara .
Abenshi iyo bamaze kubona izo nkunga , amafaranga bakuyemo bayashora mu mishinga yabo bwite ibateza imbere , itagize aho ihuriye na intambara yo gukuraho ubwo butegetsi bubi bise ubwa igitugu , maze rwa rubyiruko rugakomeza kubabarira mu mashyamba , mu mbeho nyinshi , ku izuba rya igikatu , kurara mu myobo , kwambara ubusa ,
guhangayika , kudasinzira na ibindi , nyamara ba bandi baboherejeyo babayeho neza , mu nzu nziza , bagenda mu modoka ahenze meza , bagenda mu ndege zabo bwite , barya neza , baryama neza , babona umwanya wo gutembera ku mazi .
Nsabimana Callixte wiyise " " " " Sankara " " " " ni urugero rwiza .
Mu rukiko aherutse kuvuga uburyo Kayumba Nyamwasa yabashutse , bakikokora bagatanga imisanzu ngo baje gufata " " " " Kigali , " " " " yarangiza akajya kwiguriramo za rukururana .
Uzasanga bene abo basaba urubyiruko kuva mu mashuri rukabasanga mu mashyamba , nyamara abana babo biga za Burayi , ntawe uzabona yazanyemo umwana we ngo abere abandi urugero .
Uhereye kera , abasokuruza bacu basigasiraga ukubyiruka kwa abato , bakabarinda ibyonnyi bibangisha Igihugu , bakabakundisha Igihugu , babaremamo ingabo nziza na bamutima wa urugo bazarema imiryango ikomeye yuje ubuntu na ubunyarwanda .
Mu mwaka wa 1476 , Umwami Ndahiro Cyamatare , amaze kubona bene se Juru na Bamara banze kumuyoboka ahubwo bashaka kumuhirika ku ngoma , bagashaka kumwicira umwana Ruganzu II Ndoli , yigiriye inama yo guhungisha Ruganzu kwa nyirasenge Nyabunyana , wari wararongowe kwa Karemera I Rwaka watwaraga Akaragwe ka Abahinda .
Ibyakozwe na se wa Ruganza kwari ukwimana u Rwanda kugira ngo rutazabura umuvunyi .
Ruganzu II Ndoli yaje kubunduka ( guhunguka ka umwami ) araza akura Igihugu mu kaga , maze atangira umushinga wo kurwagura no kururemera , ahoza Abanyarwanda amarira bari baratewe na ababisha .
Umuco wo kurengera u Rwanda wongeye kugaragara mu 1990 , ubwo Inkotanyi zirimo Abanyarwanda bahunze u Rwanda mu 1959 , ziyunze na abari mu gihugu barwanyaga ubutegetsi bubi , bwubakiye ku macakubiri na ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside yageje kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 .
Inshingano ikomeye ku babyeyi ni ukurinda ko urubyiruko rubura uburere , rukabura epfo na ruguru , rukabura Igihugu , rukabura umutima wa u Rwanda .
Inshingano za urubyiruko ni ugushaka ibyungura Igihugu , kukirengera , kucyubaka , kukirinda , kukimana , kukirwanira na ibindi byakorwa kugira ngo igihugu gihorane ituze na iterambere .
Ibitari ibi ni uguha urwaho no gutiza umurindi ababisha .
None se , igihugu kitakubujije kwiga , ntikikubuze gucuruza , ntikikubuze kwisanzura , ushukwa ute ngo ujye kwifatanya na abakirwanya ?
Mu minsi ishize hagaragaraye urubyiruko rushorwa mu mitwe ya iterabwoba kugira ngo ihungabanye ituze rya Abanyarwanda .
Bamwe muri bo bagiye bashukwa kuzahabwa imyanya ikomeye muri Leta , mu gihe bafashe ubutegetsi .
Basezeranyijwe guhabwa amafaranga , amamodoka na amazu meza ndetse na izindi ndonke .
Hari urubyiruko rwishoye mu mashyamba ya Congo , ikibabaje noneho bigakorwa na bamwe mu bize amashuri cyangwa abayarimo .
Nyamara ababashuka ngo bajye mu mashyamba , bibereye mu bususuruke ku Mugabane wa u Burayi , uwa Amerika na ibindi bihugu bya Afurika .
Mu buzima bubi abo bana babamo muri ayo mashyamba , abatishwe na amasasu bicwa na indwara za imirire mibi , inzara na ibindi .
Kuri izi mpfu hiyongeraho kwicuza , kubyara agahinda gakabije , kwiheba no kwiyanga , aho bamwe biyahura , abarokotse ibi bakarasirwa mu ntambara nta bwirinzi kubera ko nta bikoresho bya intambara bafite kuko amafaranga yakabiguze yagiye gutunga imiryango ya ababashoye muri ayo mashyamba .
Muri uko kwifata neza kwa abana babo , usanga ya mafaranga yashakishijwe hejuru ya amaraso ya urubyiruko rwashutswe , abana ba bya bisahiranda aribo birirwa bayasesagura mu mahoteli ahenze cyane , bihata inzoga nyinshi na ibiyobyabwenge nka ikimenyetso cya umurengwe , mu gihe indushyi zoherejwe ku rugamba ziri gupfa
umusubizo nka isazi .
Ubu Leta ya u Rwanda yahaye ababyiruka icyubahiro gihebuje , guhera bakiri bato .
Urugero Itegeko Nshinga rya Repubulika ya u Rwanda rya 2003 ryavuguruwe muri 2015 , mu ngingo yaryo ya 139 , rishyiraho Inama ya Igihugu ya Urubyiruko .
Uru ni urubuga rwa urubyiruko aho rusabanira , ruhana ibitekerezo , rukanakora ibikorwa byubaka u Rwanda .
Byari byoroshye kwita ku bindi ariko yasanze nta cyakorwa urubyiruko rusigaye inyuma .
Leta ya u Rwanda kandi ikomeje kubaka ubumwe bwa urubyiruko biciye muri gahunda za Itorero rya Igihugu , aho abato batorezwa hamwe bitewe na ibyiciro bya ibikorwa bakora , bakabaremamo ubunyarwanda .
Ni ko havutse Itorero rya Indangamirwa , Urungano , Inkomezamihigo , Inkomezabigwi na andi aho abato batozwa kuba Intore zibereye u Rwanda , bubaka Igihugu badasobanya .
Leta kandi ntiyatereye iyo , abafite ibitekerezo na imishinga ya iterambere bashyiriweho ikigega BDF , ngo bahabwe igishoro babashe gushyira itafari mu rugamba rwo kwiyubakira igihugu .
Umuhanzi Hakizimana Amani uzwi nka AMAG the Black aherutse kuvuga ati " " " " Aho utinya uhatuma ikigoryi . " " " "
Urubyiruko rukwiye kuzibukira ababatuma mu rupfu , bagata imiryango yabo , nyamara abana ba ababatuma bibereyeho neza .
Urugamba utaraga uwo wabyaye , ntukarurage umwana wa abandi .
Abato nibamenye ko ababashora mu makimbirane nta kiza babifuriza , urugamba batarwana ubwabo ngo babe barushoraho abo babyaye , ni nde wundi ukwiye kururwana ?
Ntawe .
Ibikubiye muri iyi nyandiko , ni ibitekerezo bya umwanditsi
Niba nta gikozwe ku cyaha cya ubusambanyi ibintu bizakomeza kujya irudubi .
Ubushakashatsi bwa Ikigo cya Ibarurishamibare bwo mu 2014 / 2015 bwagaragazaga ko mu Rwanda abakobwa bageza imyaka 19 ya ubukure , muri bo 15 % baba baratwaye inda zitateguwe .
Ubu bushakashatsi bwagaragazaga ko Intara ya Iburasirazuba iza ku isonga mu kugira abangavu benshi batwaye inda kuko yari ifite 10 , 7 % , Umujyi wa Kigali ukagira 10 , 2 % , hagakurikiraho Uburengerazuba na 5 , 8 % , Amajyepfo ni 5 , 6 % , mu gihe Intara ya Amajyaruguru yo ifite 4 , 9 % .
Mu mibare yavuye mu bushakashatsi bwa UNICEF Rwanda mu 2015 / 2016 bwakorewe ku bana 2000 bugamije kureba ihohoterwa rikorerwa abana , bwasanze 24 % bya abakobwa na 10 % bya abahungu barakorewe ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina .
Minisiteri ya Ubutabera igaragaza ko mu 2019 yakiriye ibirego bya abana bafashwe ku ngufu barenga 5000 mu gihe mu 2018 yari yakiriye ibirego 4127 .
Ubundi bushakashatsi buheruka gushyirwa hanze na Minisiteri ya Ubuzima bwerekanye ko nibura mu Rwanda abagore na abakobwa bagera ku bihumbi 60 bahura na ikibazo cyo gukuramo inda buri mwaka .
Ubwo bushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko mu bagore na abakobwa bari mu kigero cya imyaka 15 na 44 , byagaragaye ko abagera kuri 25 / 1000 bahura na ikibazo cyo gukuramo inda .
Mu mibare ya inkiko iheruka gutangazwa igaragaza ko gatanya zizamuka ubutitsa kuko kugeza mu Ugushyingo 2018 , hari hamaze gucibwa imanza za gatanya 1311 , ni ubwikube bwa inshuro 19 ugereranyije na umwaka wa 2017
Abajyanama na impuguke ku muryango nyarwanda bagaragaza ko 90 % ya isenyuka rya ingo rishingiye ku busambanyi .
Imibare imenyekana nitamenyekana ya abana baterwa inda zitateguwe ni umwe mu musaruro wa abantu bamwe bamaze kumva ko ubusambanyi ari igikorwa kidafite inkurikizi .
Dushingiye kuri iyi mibare yagaragajwe na ubu bushakashatsi yaba iya abana baterwa inda zitateguwe , abana bafatwa ku ngufu , abana ba abakobwa bakuramo inda ndetse na itandukana rya ingo igaragaza uburyo icyaha cya ubusambanyi ari kimwe mu bifite ubukana ndengakamere muri iyi minsi , cyane ko cyugarije abantu ba ingeri zose
Ikibabaje kurushaho ni uko usanga mu gihe tugezemo ubu busambanyi butakirangwa gusa mu batizera Imana ahubwo bimaze kugaragara ko na bamwe mu bakora imirimo ya imbere mu nzu ya Imana ( ba Pasiteri , Padiri na abandi ) batangiye kwandura uyu muze wa icyaha .
Nyamara twibuke ko ubwinshi bwa aba basambanyi budatagatifuza icyo cyaha ngo bireke kwitwa icyaha ndetse cyabasha kurimbuza benshi nka uko byabaye ku bari batuye muri Sodomu na Gomora .
Iyo usomye muri Bibiliya mu Itangiriro igice cya 18 , ijambo rya Imana ryerekana ukuntu habonetse gutaka gukomeye kurega Sodomu na Gomora ku Mana kubera ibyaha byaho , nyamara Aburahamu agatakamba cyane ngo Imana ibabarire abahatuye .
Icyaje kubaho kinateye agahinda ni uko Abamalayika Imana yohereje ngo bajye kureba ukuri kwa ibibera i Sodomu , abaho babasanganiye bashaka kubasambanya ku ngufu , byerekana ko icyaha cyo gusambana cyari kimaze kubarenga .
Nka uko bigaragara mu gice cya 19 : 23 , bikururiye akaga maze ngo Uwiteka agusha kuri Sodomu na Gomora amazuku na umuriro bivuye ka uwiteka mu ijuru .
Atsemba iyo midugudu yose na cya kibaya na abayituyemo bose na ibyameze ku butaka .
Satani afite ubukana na uburiganya bukabije cyane , azi neza ko benshi abategera mu busambanyi barangiza bakanga no kwihana ngo batazabaseka cyangwa bakabambura ibyubahiro bari bafite .
Nyamara bibaye byaranakugwiririye ukagwa mu cyaha cya ubusambanyi ibyiza ni uko wakwihana ukatuza akanwa kawe ukareka kubebera , ukareka kwihesha amahoro mu mutima kuko na ubundi wayihesha wagira ute uracyari umusambanyi nyamara imbabazi za Imana ziruta urubanza uramutse wemeye mu gihe gito waba umukiranutsi ugasezera ku kuba
umusambanyi .
Biranashoboka ko waba warigeze kujya ugendera muri izo ngeso za ubusambanyi , urabe maso ntushukwe na ubwo buranga , kenshi umuntu akumbura ibyo yariye , akararikira ibyo yabayemo , nta cyabuza Satani kongera kukwereka ibibero bya inkumi niba uri umusore maze ugata umurongo , ubukumi bwawe buracyakenewe hagarara kigabo uteshe ,
usenge usabe Imana imbaraga zo kurimbura iyo kamere mbi ya ubusambanyi , ibuka aho watsindirwaga na aho satani yagutegeraga maze uhirinde .
Wowe wirinze kuva cyera uri uwo gushimwa , nyamara Satani araguhigira ngo nawe agushyire mu rutonde rwa abasambanyi , ariko muvandimwe komera uhagarare kigabo , tumbira umusaraba uzagushoboza , ubusugi bwawe na ubumanzi bwawe ni icyubahiro kuri wowe kandi ni na ishimwe ku Mana , komeza ubwo butwari ntuzatatire igihango dore ko tutari
na abacu ngo twigenge kandi rwose humura uzanesha .
Muhaguruke twifate , dufashe bagenzi bacu kwifata turwanye ubusambanyi twivuye inyuma , twigire ku mateka ya abatubereye akabarore maze twirengere .
Kurwanya abahakana Jenoside : Nta bwumvikane bukenewe ku kwemera ukuri .
Ububi bwo guhakana Jenoside ni cyo kintu nashoboraga kwizera ko ibigo bya amashuri byubashywe bitazigera byijandikamo .
Nka abarimu , abo bakorana ndetse na abanyeshuri bajijutse ba Kaminuza ya Cambridge bakamenya ubwicanyi ndengakamere bwakorewe Abatutsi barenga miliyoni mu gihe cya amezi 3 mu myaka 27 ishize , muri Jenoside yaturutse ku rwango rwa ubwoko , ari narwo u Rwanda rwashatse kurandura kuva icyo gihe .
Izi mbaraga zo komora ibikomere no kunga Abanyarwanda zashingiye ku cyifuzo cya igihugu cyo guhangana na ukuri kwari icuraburindi .
Biteye isoni ko Judi Rever , umunyamakuru ushidikanywaho , uhakana Jenoside kandi ushyigikira iterabwoba , ashobora guhabwa urubuga mpuzamahanga akagoreka ukuri kwacu muri ibi bihe bya ihungabana ku Barokotse Jenoside na imiryango yabo .
Ishyano ryo guha uruvugiro abantu bakwirakwiza ko habayeho Jenoside ebyiri nka Rever bakagirwa ngenderwaho mu gusesengura byimbitse Jenoside ( kandi akoresha inyandiko zidasobanutse ndetse akavuga ko yahawe amakuru na abantu atagaragariza imyirondoro ) muri Kaminuza iri mu za mbere ku Isi ari yo Cambridge , biteye ubwoba .
Ikibabaje kurushaho ni ubugome buziguye buhora bushyigikiye urwango na ikinyoma usanga bikorwa na Abazungu ( cyangwa bishingiye ku nyungu za abo mu Burengerazuba bwa Isi ) kandi ingaruka zabyo ziza ku Banyafurika .
Mu bihe byo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi hakunze kugaragara ibibazo byo gukomeretsa imutima .
Abarokotse berekana ibimenyetso bifatika bitabarika bumvikanisha ukubabazwa gukabije bakorewe mu 1994 ariko igishengura cyane ni uko muri ibyo bihe ari bwo abo bifatanya na abakoze Jenoside nka Judi Rever ( na abandi ntakwirirwa ndondora ) bagerageza kurushaho gusunikira inkota muri bya bikomere , bagatuma abarokotse batabikira kubera uko
batesha agaciro ihungabana ryabo .
" " " " Guhindura intekerezo za umuntu umuhatira kwibaza ku byo atekereza , ku byo yanyuzemo na ibiri kumubaho " " " " si uburyo bushya bwo gutesha umutwe Abanyafurika bagiriwe urwango butuma bibaza ku mateka yabo na ibibaranga .
Bwagiye bunakoreshwa na impuguke zo mu Burengerazuba bwa Isi zikora inyandiko ku bukoloni ku Banyafurika .
Ku kibazo cya u Rwanda , byarakoreshejwe mu gushyira mu rujijo abantu bose ku mateka yabo uyahurije hamwe .
Nta Munyarwanda ushobora kongera kwemera kwamburwa ubumuntu nka iby ahahise , gukandamizwa no guterwa ubwoba .
Icyakora twarababaye cyane nta mahitamo dufite .
Kuvura ibikomere bya Abanyarwanda bishingiye ku guhangana na amateka yacu ashaririye no kurwanya twivuye inyuma ibyo abo bo mu Burengerazuba bwa Isi bahakana , bayavugaho bashaka kuyasobanura ukundi .
Ikinyuranyo kiri hagati ya ihakana rya Jenoside yakorewe Abayahudi na iyakorewe Abatutsi bigaragaza ugutesha agaciro ubuzima bwa Umunyafurika .
Nshimishijwe cyane na uko abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abayahudi batabarizwa ubutitsa ngo bagezwe imbere ya ubutabera , ariko nkanashengurwa na uko iyo bigeze ku Banyafurika bakomeza kwishyirira agati mu ryinyo .
Na none kandi , gutakaza ubuzima ku bo mu Burengerazuba bwa Isi byagiye bifatwa nka ikintu kibi cyane mu myaka myinshi yaranzwe na ubunyangamugayo bwo kumva agahinda ka undi , abakoze ibyo byaha bakabiryozwa , naho abo byagizeho ingaruka na imiryango yabo bagahabwa indishyi .
Ku rundi ruhande , guhangana no kwikura mu kaga , urupfu no kwamburwa ubumuntu biracyajyanishwa no gusobanura ibiranga Umunyafurika .
Itangazamakuru ryo mu Burengerazuba bwa Isi ryitwaza ubuzima turimo bugoye rigakuririza inzangano zishingiye ku moko ngo zatangiye kera ( ntirigaragaze uruhare rwa abakoloni mu gutangiza izo nzangano ) , kuvuga imibare ya Abatutsi bazize Jenoside itari yo ku bushake ndetse no kwemera ibitekerezo bya uko habayeho jenoside ebyiri byatumye
Isi itumva agahinda ka Abanyarwanda muri rusange bya umwihariko Abarokotase Jenoside .
Ahubwo abo bari mu mwanya wo kuba bahoza bakanavura ibikomere , bagaragajwe nka abantu babi ndetse bashinjwa kwitwaza akababaro kabo nka igikoresho cyo kwanduza isura nziza ya umukoloni .
Hagaragazwa ko Umunyafurika utabangamirwa na amarangamutima ya kimuntu afuditse agaragarizwa na abo mu Burengerazuba , adashobora mu bya ukuri kugira akababaro nyako .
Ku bwa ibyo , nta hungabana rihari ryakwemerwa cyangwa akarengane .
Aha ngaha irondaruhu ni inkota ifite uturumyo tubiri : kamwe mu kiganza kerekana abantu nka Judi Rever bashimagiza abakoreye ibyaha Abanyafurika , akandi kakaba ku nzirakarengane za Abanyafurika bitezweho kwemera kugorekerwa ukuri mu buryo batigeze bifuza ; bagahakana ubumuntu bwabo ndetse bakibagirwa ibihe byabagoye .
Mu buryo buninura , buri karengane abo mu Burengerazuba bakorera Abanyafurika gahurirana na ingufu baba bashyira mu guharanira ko ababo bafatwa nka abantu .
Hari amategeko menshi ahana ihakana rya Jenoside yakorewe Abayahudi , yose agamije kwibutsa ko ari ngombwa kurinda ukuri kwayo mu kurwanya ivangura bakorerwa .
Mu Bufaransa , itegeko rya Gayssot ryatowe mu 1990 , rigena ko guhakana bifatwa nka ibyaha byibasiye inyokomuntu .
Kuva ubwo mu Bufaransa hahise hashyirwa umucyo ku byo kwirengagiza ibyabaye .
Kwemera imurikwa na ikwirakwizwa rya igitabo cya Rever , ni kimwe mu bigamije kwibutsa Raporo ya Duclert igaragaza uko Guverinoma ya u Bufaransa yariho yitwaye " " " " buhumyi " " " " mu mugambi wa Leta ya Abahutu yari ifitanye umubano nayo yagerageje kumaraho Abatutsi mu 1994 .
Muri ibyo byombi , uko " " " " kudafasha Abazungu badafite amakuru , " " " " binyuranyije na uruhande bagombye guhagararaho mu gutegeka ibikwiye kwimakazwa mu mibereho ya Isi , kuko bibuza abo mu Burengerazuba gukora igikwiye iyo bigeze kuri Afurika .
Kaminuza ya Cambridge yahaye ijwi icyifuzo cyo guhakana ibitekerezo bishingiye ku irondaruhu , yewe inatangiza iperereza ku bifite aho bihuriye na ubucuruzi bwa abacakara .
Cambridge kimwe na ibindi bigo bya Abongereza bifite amazina akomeye muri iki gihe , byagaragaje ko hari inyungu ya amafaranga yavuye mu bukoloni na ubucuruzi bwa abacakara .
Ariko biteye isoni nka Kaminuza kuvuga kuri ibi bijyanye na amateka nta bimenyetso utanga !
Cambridge ubu iri gushyira imbaraga mu gushyigikira Rever imuha urubuga rwo kugaragarizaho ibitekerezo bye .
Imbuto yo kwambura ubumuntu ikurana ikinyoma gitoshye kivuye mu butaka buhehereye buyikikije , ariko ntizongera guterwa .
Ku bwa amahirwe , hari ibihamya byemejwe kandi byashyizwe ahagaragara bisenya amanjwe ya River .
Abishe Abanyarwanda bakingiwe ikibaba na itangazamakuru ndetse ribagaragaza nka abantu beza byitirirwa " " " " guteza imbere demokarasi " " " " muri Afurika .
Igitekerezo cy " " " " " " " " ubwisanzure bwo kuvuga " " " " bwuzuye gikomeza gushyigikirwa cyane na abakoloni nka aho ari uburenganzira bwa muntu , bigashyirwa hejuru ya uburenganzira bwo kubaho ku Batutsi nta vangura bakorerwa no guhinyuza akababaro kabo bitiza umurindi ihakana .
Ariko niba badashobora na rimwe kwemera ubwisanzure kuri abo bafite imitekerereze mishya ya Aba - Nazi mu Burayi nka kimwe mu bya ingenzi byakubaka demokarasi ya Abanyaburayi ahubwo bakumva bibereye Abanyafurika , bigomba kwibazwaho .
Kuba Judi Rever yahabwa urubuga rwo guhakaniraho , kugabanya uburemere no gutesha agaciro intimba ya Abanyarwanda batabarika , ni yo mpamvu Abarokotse Jenoside bagomba gukomeza umutima bakagaragaza uko hageragejwe kubamaraho , ari nako bibuka abo bakundaga bishwe muri Jenoside mu 1994 .
Abakoze Jenoside bahawe ubuhungiro mu Burayi , aho bapangira neza ibikorwa byabo bya iterabwoba ku Banyarwanda , ari nako bakomeza gushaka uko bazagaruka ku butegetsi " " " " bakuzuza ako kazi , " " " " ibintu bahora bifuza kenshi .
Aho niho batererwa ingabo mu bitugu na abo mu Burengerazuba babafasha gusobanya amateka ya Abanyarwanda bo bateye ubwoba ndetse bagikomeje kubutera .
Ububi bwabyo ni uko bitaba nka impanuka , kandi si ni ikintu cyo gushimirwa .
Igituma bibabaza kurushaho ni uko bikorerwa Abanyarwanda na bagenzi babo ba Abanyafurika , bagerageza kugaragaza ukuri , cyangwa icyubahiro cyabo .
Birashoboka ko iyo amateka yacu asharira aba atarabagariwe na imvugo zihembera urwango , Abanyarwanda ntibari gushobora kwamagara abapfobya .
Ku rundi ruhande , dufite ibikomere bidashobora kwirengagizwa .
Uko Abanyarwanda bazakomeza komora ibikomere uko bikwiye , ihungabana ryabo rizumvikana , inkuru zabo zigomba kurindwa mu buryo bwa ukuri , ndetse abazishyiramo ibinyoma bakamaganwa .
Kugira ngo ubutabera bugerweho bizahora bisaba ubunyangamugayo tudashobora kubaza umuntu utemera ukuri .
Iyi nkuru yanditswe mu cyongereza na Veronique Nyiramongi Mbaye itambuka kuri Panafrican Rreview , ishyirwa mu kinyarwanda na IGIHE
Ni ibaruwa yakunzwe cyane na Abanyarwanda batandukanye , ndetse bamwe bifuza kuyitangaho ibitekerezo .
Mu bo yacengeye bakifuza kugira icyo bayivugaho , harimo Kwezi Jean .
Uyu yifashishije ibitekerezo bitandukanye , yunze mu rya Bamporiki agaragaza isano Abanyarwanda bafitanye kuva kera , ibibazo bagiye banyuranamo na isomo bikwiriye kubasigira kugira ngo abazavuka nyuma batazisanga mu nsobe ya ibibazo abariho ubu na ababayeho mu minsi ishize banyuzemo .
Ibaruwa ifunguye ku Banyarwanda bose
Nkimara gusoma ibaruwa yanditswe na Nyakubahwa Minisitiri Edouard Bamporiki ubwo yandikiraga urubyiruko ruba i mahanga , byatumye nanjye mfata uyu mwanya ngo dusangire ibyiyumviro byanjye .
Ndabanza gushimira cyane Minisitiri Bamporiki ku bwo kudatezuka ku mugambi mwiza we wo gutanga umusanzu atizigamye wo kubaka u Rwanda cyane cyane ibitekerezo atanga byubaka urubyiruko rwo mizero yacu ya ejo hazaza ha u Rwanda .
Nakunze bidasubirwaho intekerezo ze no kudahinduka ku ntego yo gutanga umusanzu wo kubaka u Rwanda , muzi neza duhuriye mu buhanzi bwa amakinamico na ubusizi ahagana mu wa 2003 na nyuma yaho twinjira mu kwandika no gukora amafilimi mu wa 2006 .
Nyuma yaho nabwo imyaka yagiye ikurikirana kugeza ubu nakunze umwete na ishyaka byo gutanga umusanzu wo kubaka u Rwanda agira , ibi akaba aribyo abakibyiruka bafatiraho urugero rwiza rwo kugira intego no kutavaruka kuri yo mu gihe cyose ari nziza iganisha u Rwanda na Abanyarwanda ku bumwe , amahoro na iterambere rirambye .
Tugendeye kuri uru rugero rwiza rwe , buri wese yakagize umusanzu agenera u Rwanda mu byo akora byose ku neza ya Abanyarwanda abariho na abazavuka ibinyejana ku bindi .
Nuko rero nanjye ndabandikiye na ukuboko kwanjye mwe Abanyarwanda bari mu gihugu no hanze yacyo .
Abafite inkomoko muri icyo na abemeye kwitwa abacyo , ubuntu bwa Imana data bubane namwe .
Hashize imyaka myinshi itazwi neza gusa ba bwenge bwa Isi bafite uko bayihuza bakatubwira igihe tumaze Isi ibayeho , uko rero kukaba ukuri abo baduhaye , gusa ikidashidikanywaho ni uko nyine hari imyaka Isi imaze iriho ibinyabuzima natwe turimo .
Kuri iyi Si habayeho uburyo abantu bagiye babaho mu matsinda yabo , ahantu habo byose mu bushake bwa umuhanzi wahanze Isi ari we Rurema ndatekereza ko ari we Abanyarwanda bise Gihanga Ngomijana abandi mu kwemera kwabo bakamwita Imana .
Uwo yarabishimye asanga hakwiriye kubaho Abanyarwanda batuye ahantu hitwa i Rwanda .
Icyo bishatse kuvuga ni uko kuvuka kwacu kuva ku batubanjirije kugeza ku bariho none na abazabaho ingoma ibihumbi , twese turi mu mugambi wa Rurema kwitwa Abanyarwanda ku bwa kavukire , ku bwa inkomoko no ku bushake bwa ababisaba .
Na iyo kandi waba uri muri bamwe batemera Rurema cyangwa Imana , turemeranya ko turiho kandi twitwa Abanyarwanda kubera ubushake karemano twisanze turimo kandi dutuye i Rwanda .
Kuri njye rero wemera Imana , kubaho kwacu si impanuka na gato ahubwo biri mu mugambi wa Umuremyi wa byose .
Kuba twaravukiye ku bandi bafite igisekuru muri iki gihugu tukitwa Abanyarwanda , bivuga ko ariho hadukwiriye kugira ngo tuhagire heza kandi tuhaheshereze icyubahiro Imana bamwe twita Rugira cyangwa Rurema .
Ndetse no kuri bamwe batari abemera uwo Rurema , ntekereza ko twahurira ku kwemera kumwe ko kubaho kwa ikiremwa runaka ahantu runaka biba bifitanye isano byose na aho hantu ku mpamvu ifatika ya uko ariho hakwiriye kuri uwo muntu cyangwa icyo kintu mu gihe runaka .
Kwisanga muri ubwo buzima kenshi tudahitamo byakaduhaye umutuzo .
Gukunda aho tubarizwa , tugakundana ubwacu byakabaye ari yo ntego yacu kandi bikaba indangagaciro ituranga mu buzima bwacu bwa buri munsi .
Twibukiranye rwose ko hari impamvu tutavukiye mu butayu mu bihugu byo mu Majyaruguru ya Afurika , hari impamvu kandi tudafite igisekuru mu mashyamba ya Amazon .
Hari impamvu tutavukiye kandi tudafite igisekuru ku mpera ya Isi ngo twitwe Aba - Eskimo batunzwe na ibiva mu nyanja ya ubutita .
Rwose hari impamvu tutavukiye ibwotamasimbi mu rubura na ubukonje .
Hari impamvu tutari Abanyamerika na abanya - Aziya ndetse ntitube Abanya - Australia .
Byose nkuko nabivuze ni umugambi wa Rurema .
We yari abizi ko ahadukwiriye kuvukira kandi hakaba igisekuru cyacu ari i Rwanda mu gihugu cya ubuhehere , imisozi na ibibaya , imigezi itemba , ahari ibiyaga bya amazina atandukanye , ahari ibyanya bya inyamaswa za amoko atabarika .
Mu Rwanda niho iwacu kandi dukwiriye kuba tuhishimiye ku kiguzi cyose byadusaba , tukahaba tudasenya kandi tutangiza , twubahana ubwacu kugeza ku bindi bidukikije .
Abakera muzi neza bidasubirwaho akaga kagiye kagwira Abanyarwanda mu buryo butandukanye , akenshi bishingiye ku bibazo byagiye byangiza ubumwe bwacu byaba ku bushake , umugambi wa abandi cyangwa twe ubwacu ikigamijwe ari ukugabanya ubudahangarwa karemano bwari muri twe .
Nkuko mubizi , ibyo byagiye biteza akaga gakomeye kugeza ubwo bamwe mu bana ba u Rwanda bitwaga Abatutsi bataye ya gakondo yabo ya abasekuruza bakajya kubabarira i mahanga aho badafite inkomoko .
Byarabaye ahagana mu myaka ya 1959 na indi myaka yakurikiye kugeza ubwo bamwe muri abo bana ba Abanyarwanda bafashe umugambi wo guharanira kugaruka kuri ya gakondo yabo .
Icyo bivuze ni uko gakondo ya muntu ari ikintu cya ingenzi cyane kuko nyine isanishwa no kubaho muri wa mugambi wa Imana buri wese aba aho yagenewe kuba kuko aho babaga batagombaga kuhagirira umutuzo na umutekano mu gihe cyose bitwaga abanyarwanda .
Ibi byumvikane ko kari akaga gakomeye , aribyo byatumye bumva bagize iryo shyaka rya gakondo yabo .
Ntabwo abariho mu buyobozi bwa icyo gihe barebye igikwiriye ngo boroshye uburyo abo bakwiriye gutaha iwabo ngo nyuma bunge ubumwe bwo gukomeza kuba ishyanga rikomeye .
Nkuko amateka abyerekana , habayeho kwirengagiza uko kuri nyamara gufite ishingiro ko buri wese witwa Umunyarwanda akwiriye kuba iwabo akaba ahandi ashatse ku bwo kuba ari ubwende bwe .
Abariho muri icyo gihe muribuka ko mu 1994 abantu benshi bapfuye bazira kwitwa Abatutsi , bicwa na bamwe mu Bahutu , abandi bavandimwe babo ba Abanyarwanda baturukaga muri ya moko amateka avuga ko twatwererewe ku bwa inyungu zo kuducamo ibice .
Iri rero ryabaye ikosa rikomeye cyane ridakwiriye gusubira ukundi .
Ni ikosa rikwiriye kudusigira isomo ryo gusubira kuri ya ntego ya umugambi wa Rurema wo kuba yarahisemo ko twese twitwa Abanyarwanda bavukiye hamwe kandi babana hamwe ku neza na amahoro iwabo mu Rwanda aho bahawe nka gakondo yabo .
Ku bwa ibyo byose , ndahugura abakuze kwibuka impamvu basigaye .
Kwari ukugira ngo bafashe abakivuka kongera kubaho neza nka Abanyarwanda muri wa mujyo wa umugambi wa Rurema ari we Rugira byose wo gusigasirana no kwita kuri iyi gakondo yacu .
Benshi muri mwe mwabonye na amaso yanyu uburyo habaye ubwicanyi ndengakamere bwa Abatutsi bishwe bazira uko bavutse , nyamara bitari bikwiriye kwica umuntu .
Amaraso yabo batutsi yamenekeye kuri ubu butaka yakagombye kutubera isomo rya uko nta Munyarwanda wundi ukwiriye kwicwa yishwe na undi Munyarwanda mu buryo bwose , ahubwo dukwiriye gufatanya kuba ishyanga ryera kandi rikomeye .
Muharanire gukurira mu kuri ko kumenya ko muri Abanyarwanda bafite gakondo yitwa u Rwanda ikwiriye kubugwabungwa no gutezwa imbere , bigakorwa mufashanya umwe ku wundi mu mbaraga buri wese afite , mudasigana ahubwo mubikorana ubushake bwose bukwiriye .
Twese abariho na abazavuka , dufite inshingano zo gusigasirana umwe ku wundi ntawe uhutaza undi ibi bikaba indangagaciro ituranga buri wese abato na abakuru .
Abashoboye na abadashoboye twese dukwiriye gufatanya tudasigana kandi tutangiza umujyo Rurema yadushyiriyeho .
Gufashanya kwacu bihere kuri buri wese mu byo akora kugeza ku rwego Rurema yashimye ko rutoyobora rwa igihugu .
Mwibuke inkuru za irindi shyanga ryaremwe nkatwe rivugwa mu gitabo cyitwa Bibiliya cya iyobokamana aho batubwira inkuru za Abanya - Israel ubwo baharaniraga gutaha kuri gakondo yabo bayobowe na uwitwa Musa .
Mu nzira banyuragamo , iyo uwo muyobozi wabo yatentebukaga asenga azamuye amaboko , baramufashaga bakayazamura kugeza ashoje icyo kivi . Uru ni urugero rwiza rwo kuba hafi abatuyobora tukarangwa no kubumvira kuko muri icyo gihe nibo Imana ishimye ko batuyobora .
Tukabanihira tubasengera ubudatuza , tukabazamurira amashimwe muri byose , aho batentebutse tukabafasha kuva mu ntege nke bityo nabo bagaharanira kuba abungeri beza bakora ibiri mu ntego na umugambi wa Imana yo yabahamagariye .
Abo rero nabo bakwiriye kuba ibisonga byiza bihesha iyo Mana mvuga icyubahiro .
Mureke tube umwe dushyigikirane , uwakosheje tumucyahe kandi na we ace bugufi abisabire imbabazi abikuye ku mutima kandi uwo yumve ko gucyahwa kwe bikozwe hagamijwe kugira ngo dukomeze dushyigikirane mu nzira yo gukora neza ku bwa inyungu za benshi aribo Banyarwanda kuri ya gakondo yabo .
Twange rwose ikidutanya kigatatanya imbaraga zacu .
Ndasaba abacu bakoze amakosa mu ngeri zose guca bugufi bakibuka kuri wa mugambi wa Imana wa ubumwe bwacu bagatuza bakayoboka inzira ya ineza yo gusaba imbabazi .
Twese duhuze umutima kandi twitegure kubabarirana ku bwa inyungu zo kubaka gakondo yacu itajegajega .
Mureke dushyire hamwe Imana itwishimire kuba ishyanga ritanga isomo rya ubu - Mana bwayo ku bindi biremwa na ibindi bihugu .
Abacu batataniye mu mahanga ya kure mushishikazwe no kubaka ubwami bwa Imana aho muri hose kugeza kuri iyi gakondo yacu , muharanira buri kimwe cyose cyatuma umunyarwanda atekana kuri iyi gakondo yahaweho isezerano nka impano ikwiriye ya aho azayiheshereza icyubahiro .
Iyi gakondo yacu buri wese ayifate nka inzu yiyubakira agomba gushyiramo amarangi na ubusitani bikwiriye ahantu heza akwiriye kuba atuye .
Ibibazo byo muri iya Isi bigenda byaduka ntibigatume tuvaruka ku mugambi wa ubumwe bwacu , ahubwo tujye tubirebera hamwe tutitana bamwana , duharanira kubona ibisubizo bihamye kandi byuje ukuri ku mugambi wa Imana .
Abato na abakuru ndabahugurira kwanga ikibi cyose muharanira gukora icyiza .
Imirimo ya kamere isayisha mu bibi muyireke .
Buri wese asobanukirwe kandi yange ikibi cyose cyatuma gutera imbere kwacu kutagerwaho .
Ni nde utabona ko kwiroha mu bibi byose bituma tutagera kuri wa mugambi wa icyo twaremewe kuba ibiremwa bihesha Imana icyubahiro ?
Dutekereze umunsi umwe twisanze gakondo yacu yarabaye muzunga ku bwo gusinda ingeso mbi zose .
Duharanire kugira gakondo idafite isindwe iryo ari ryo ryose rirangwa ku basayishije mu gukora ibyaha bya ubwoko bwose .
Umutima wa buri wese umubere umujyanama mwiza wo kwanga ikibi cyose cyatuma dutakaza icyitwa uba umuntu .
Ntimubona ko urwango na urwangano bidakwiriye abizera kandi bamenye bagasobanukirwa impamvu nyayo yo kuremwa kwabo ?
Muharanire kubaka umuryango utajegajega mubikorana umuhate na ubushake bivanze na intego yo kuba Abanyarwanda beza ba ejo hazaza bafite aho bakomoka kandi barezwe neza .
Musobanukirwe neza ko igihe ishyari na urwango tuzabishyira ku ruhande tukajya tubona iterambere rya umwe muri twe ko ari iryacu , twese nta kabuza tuzaba turimo gutera intambwe igana aheza hazira amatiku akurura ubwicanyi .
Twemeranye ko nta muntu ukwiriye kwica undi ataragize uruhare na ruto kwa iremwa rye kuko nkuko mubizi , ubwo ari ubwiru bwa Imana kandi twahishwe .
Ndangira nti " " " " Mukundane rwose kandi mwunge ubumwe muri byose , mushyigikirane mwubahana kugeza kuri ba bandi Imana yahisemo ko batubera abungeri bakwiriye . " " " "
Mwarabyumvise kandi murabizi neza ko nta butware na bumwe butava ku bushake bwa Imana .
Kuva ku muyobozi wacu wa ikirenga kugera ku bato mu miryango bose ni aba agaciro mu maso ya umuremyi mu buryo bwose .
Tugire rero indangagaciro yo kubahana no gushyigikirana muri byose .
Mbibutse ko kubaka ari urugendo , bityo ibyo buri wese yifuza ko yagirirwa kuri iyi gakondo ntabwo byarara bigezweho uyu munsi cyane ko iyi gakondo yacu mu 1994 yari yarasenyutse , byose byari ugutangira bundi bushya .
Uko biri kose twishimire ibyagezweho , dutegerezanyije amatsiko gusingira na ibisigaye twese tugomba kugiramo uruhare .
Twirinde ubunebwe no kurebera ahubwo tube abakozi rwose .
Murebe inshishi , udukoko duto tudatekereza nkatwe tuzi neza kwishakira uko tubaho mu ntaho yatwo tukabikorana umurava no gushyira hamwe muri byose .
Muzitegereze ukuntu dushaka amahaho yatwo .
Ababa batarabona ibitangaza bya utwo dukoko mwitegereze ibiguruka bya amoko yose ndetse na ibindi bigendera ku butaka bitazi ubwenge nka ubwa muntu uburyo bibayeho mu buryo bwa agatangaza aho bikorana umwete buri cyose gituma bibaho .
Mube abakozi bakorana umurava kandi bakorera ku gihe rwose .
Niba hari ugusabye serivisi uyimuhe neza uko bikwiriye umugaragu wahamagariwe kugaba ibya shebuja ari we Mana data wa twese .
Nta na kimwe dukora ku bwacu ahubwo ni ku bwa Imana Data .
Ntitube abakorera ku jisho imirimo yose dukora kuko naho ijisho ryawe ryakwirengagiza uko ubikora nabi ndetse na ijisho rya abandi ritakubona ko rwose ubikora uko bidakwiriye ariko ijisho rya umuremyi wawe wakuremeye uwo muhamagaro wo kuba umuhereza ukwiriye ryo rikubaho iteka , rero muharanire kuba abizerwa muri byose .
Nongere mbasabe ngana umusayuko nti " " " " mukundane rwose kandi mugirirane umutwaro umwe ku wundi . " " " "
Iyi tuyigire intwaro yo kwiteza imbere bibe umuco kuri twe ba none na abandi bazavuka bazasange harabayeho intwari ari zo twe zateguye gakondo yitwa u Rwanda ifite akarusho mu mibereho ya muntu .
Umubabaro wa amateka ashaririye buri wese yagize awuture hasi tuwubakireho dutegurire abandi bazavuka kutababara , ibi ni byo nakwita ubutwari rwose .
Kwihanganira umubabaro ushaka kubakira ejo heza abazitwa aba ejo .
Nuko rero muri byose mukora , mu biganiro mugirana , mu mpaka mujya zose murangwe na urukundo .
Habeho kumvana no kumvikana mwirinda umwiryane .
Mbasabe rwose , mwirinde gusenyana no gusenya ibyagezweho .
Muharanire kubaka urukundo na ubumwe muri mwe , nta kabuza ibyo bizatuma dukomeza kuba indashyikirwa muri byose bityo abazadukomokaho bazishimire umusanzu twatanze twigomwa byose ku bwabo .
Dukeneye u Rwanda abazavuka bazakomeza kubamo bishimye kandi babanye neza , kubiharanira rero ni ukubaka ibitekerezo bihamye kandi bizira urwango na ivangura bizira ubunebwe .
Buri wese akore icyo ashoboye kandi agikore neza ku kigero nawe yishimira umusaruro atanga .
Ndagira nti " " " " urukundo rwanyu ni ruganze muri byose mu bihe bibi na ibyiza . " " " "
Ndabatashya , uwanyu kandi umwe mu rimwe kuri gakondo yacu u Rwanda .
